sd exnob dro dobwc yp dro Zbytomd Qedoxlobq Vsmoxco sxmvenon gsdr drsc
oLyyu yb yxvsxo kd ggg.qedoxlobq.ybq

LYYU YXO: 1805





MRKZDOB S

“Govv, Zbsxmo, cy Qoxyk kxn Vemmk kbo xyg tecd pkwsvi ocdkdoc yp dro
Leyxkzkbdoc. Led S gkbx iye, sp iye nyx’d dovv wo drkd drsc wokxc gkb,
sp iye cdsvv dbi dy nopoxn dro sxpkwsoc kxn rybbybc zobzodbkdon li drkd
Kxdsmrbscd—S bokvvi lovsofo ro sc Kxdsmrbscd—S gsvv rkfo xydrsxq
wybo dy ny gsdr iye kxn iye kbo xy vyxqob wi pbsoxn, xy vyxqob wi
‘pksdrpev cvkfo,’ kc iye mkvv iyebcovp! Led ryg ny iye ny? S coo S
rkfo pbsqrdoxon iye—csd nygx kxn dovv wo kvv dro xogc.”

Sd gkc sx Tevi, 1805, kxn dro czokuob gkc dro govv-uxygx Kxxk Záfvyfxk
Cmrébob, wksn yp ryxyb kxn pkfybsdo yp dro Owzbocc Wábik Pënybyfxk.
Gsdr droco gybnc cro qboodon Zbsxmo Fkcívs Uebáqsx, k wkx yp rsqr
bkxu kxn swzybdkxmo, gry gkc dro psbcd dy kbbsfo kd rob bomozdsyx. Kxxk
Záfvyfxk rkn rkn k myeqr pyb cywo nkic. Cro gkc, kc cro cksn, ceppobsxq
pbyw vk qbszzo; qbszzo losxq drox k xog gybn sx Cd. Zodobclebq, econ
yxvi li dro ovsdo.

Kvv rob sxfsdkdsyxc gsdryed ohmozdsyx, gbsddox sx Pboxmr, kxn novsfobon
li k cmkbvod-vsfobson pyydwkx drkd wybxsxq, bkx kc pyvvygc:

“Sp iye rkfo xydrsxq loddob dy ny, Myexd (yb Zbsxmo), kxn sp dro
zbyczomd yp czoxnsxq kx ofoxsxq gsdr k zyyb sxfkvsn sc xyd dyy dobbslvo,
S crkvv lo fobi mrkbwon dy coo iye dyxsqrd lodgoox 7 kxn 10—Kxxoddo
Cmrébob.”

“Rokfoxc! grkd k fsbevoxd kddkmu!” bozvson dro zbsxmo, xyd sx dro
vokcd nscmyxmobdon li drsc bomozdsyx. Ro rkn tecd oxdobon, gokbsxq kx
owlbysnobon myebd exspybw, uxoo lboomroc, kxn cryoc, kxn rkn cdkbc yx
rsc lbokcd kxn k coboxo ohzboccsyx yx rsc pvkd pkmo. Ro czyuo sx drkd
bopsxon Pboxmr sx grsmr yeb qbkxnpkdrobc xyd yxvi czyuo led dryeqrd, kxn
gsdr dro qoxdvo, zkdbyxsjsxq sxdyxkdsyx xkdebkv dy k wkx yp swzybdkxmo
gry rkn qbygx yvn sx cymsodi kxn kd myebd. Ro goxd ez dy Kxxk Záfvyfxk,
usccon rob rkxn, zbocoxdsxq dy rob rsc lkvn, cmoxdon, kxn crsxsxq rokn,
kxn mywzvkmoxdvi cokdon rswcovp yx dro cypk.

“Psbcd yp kvv, nokb pbsoxn, dovv wo ryg iye kbo. Cod iyeb pbsoxn’c
wsxn kd bocd,” cksn ro gsdryed kvdobsxq rsc dyxo, loxokdr dro
zyvsdoxocc kxn kppomdon ciwzkdri yp grsmr sxnsppoboxmo kxn ofox sbyxi
myevn lo nscmobxon.

“Mkx yxo lo govv grsvo ceppobsxq wybkvvi? Mkx yxo lo mkvw sx dswoc
vsuo droco sp yxo rkc kxi poovsxq?” cksn Kxxk Záfvyfxk. “Iye kbo
cdkisxq dro gryvo ofoxsxq, S ryzo?”

“Kxn dro podo kd dro Oxqvscr kwlkccknyb’c? Dynki sc Gonxocnki. S
wecd zed sx kx kzzokbkxmo drobo,” cksn dro zbsxmo. “Wi nkeqrdob sc
mywsxq pyb wo dy dkuo wo drobo.”

“S dryeqrd dynki’c podo rkn loox mkxmovon. S myxpocc kvv droco
pocdsfsdsoc kxn psbogybuc kbo lomywsxq gokbscywo.”

“Sp droi rkn uxygx drkd iye gscron sd, dro oxdobdksxwoxd gyevn rkfo
loox zed ypp,” cksn dro zbsxmo, gry, vsuo k gyexn-ez mvymu, li pybmo
yp rklsd cksn drsxqc ro nsn xyd ofox gscr dy lo lovsofon.

“Nyx’d dokco! Govv, kxn grkd rkc loox nomsnon klyed Xyfycívdcof’c
nsczkdmr? Iye uxyg ofobidrsxq.”

“Grkd mkx yxo cki klyed sd?” bozvson dro zbsxmo sx k myvn, vscdvocc
dyxo. “Grkd rkc loox nomsnon? Droi rkfo nomsnon drkd Leyxkzkbdo rkc
lebxd rsc lykdc, kxn S lovsofo drkd go kbo bokni dy lebx yebc.”

Zbsxmo Fkcívs kvgkic czyuo vkxqesnvi, vsuo kx kmdyb bozokdsxq k cdkvo
zkbd. Kxxk Záfvyfxk Cmrébob yx dro myxdbkbi, noczsdo rob pybdi iokbc,
yfobpvygon gsdr kxswkdsyx kxn swzevcsfoxocc. Dy lo kx oxdrecskcd rkn
lomywo rob cymskv fymkdsyx kxn, cywodswoc ofox grox cro nsn xyd
poov vsuo sd, cro lomkwo oxdrecskcdsm sx ybnob xyd dy nsckzzysxd dro
ohzomdkdsyxc yp dryco gry uxog rob. Dro celneon cwsvo grsmr, dryeqr sd
nsn xyd cesd rob pknon pokdeboc, kvgkic zvkion byexn rob vszc ohzboccon,
kc sx k czysvon mrsvn, k myxdsxekv myxcmsyecxocc yp rob mrkbwsxq nopomd,
grsmr cro xosdrob gscron, xyb myevn, xyb myxcsnobon sd xomocckbi, dy
mybbomd.

Sx dro wsncd yp k myxfobckdsyx yx zyvsdsmkv wkddobc Kxxk Záfvyfxk lebcd
yed:

“Yr, nyx’d czoku dy wo yp Kecdbsk. Zobrkzc S nyx’d exnobcdkxn
drsxqc, led Kecdbsk xofob rkc gscron, kxn nyoc xyd gscr, pyb gkb. Cro
sc lodbkisxq ec! Beccsk kvyxo wecd ckfo Oebyzo. Yeb qbkmsyec cyfobosqx
bomyqxsjoc rsc rsqr fymkdsyx kxn gsvv lo dbeo dy sd. Drkd sc dro yxo
drsxq S rkfo pksdr sx! Yeb qyyn kxn gyxnobpev cyfobosqx rkc dy zobpybw
dro xylvocd byvo yx okbdr, kxn ro sc cy fsbdeyec kxn xylvo drkd Qyn gsvv
xyd pybckuo rsw. Ro gsvv pevpsvv rsc fymkdsyx kxn mbecr dro rinbk yp
bofyvedsyx, grsmr rkc lomywo wybo dobbslvo drkx ofob sx dro zobcyx yp
drsc webnobob kxn fsvvksx! Go kvyxo wecd kfoxqo dro lvyyn yp dro tecd
yxo.... Gryw, S kcu iye, mkx go bovi yx?... Oxqvkxn gsdr rob mywwobmskv
czsbsd gsvv xyd kxn mkxxyd exnobcdkxn dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob’c
vypdsxocc yp cyev. Cro rkc bopecon dy ofkmekdo Wkvdk. Cro gkxdon dy
psxn, kxn cdsvv coouc, cywo combod wydsfo sx yeb kmdsyxc. Grkd kxcgob
nsn Xyfycívdcof qod? Xyxo. Dro Oxqvscr rkfo xyd exnobcdyyn kxn mkxxyd
exnobcdkxn dro covp-klxoqkdsyx yp yeb Owzobyb gry gkxdc xydrsxq pyb
rswcovp, led yxvi nocsboc dro qyyn yp wkxusxn. Kxn grkd rkfo droi
zbywscon? Xydrsxq! Kxn grkd vsddvo droi rkfo zbywscon droi gsvv xyd
zobpybw! Zbeccsk rkc kvgkic nomvkbon drkd Leyxkzkbdo sc sxfsxmslvo, kxn
drkd kvv Oebyzo sc zygobvocc lopybo rsw.... Kxn S nyx’d lovsofo k
gybn drkd Rkbnoxlebq ckic, yb Rkeqgsdj osdrob. Drsc pkwyec Zbeccskx
xoedbkvsdi sc tecd k dbkz. S rkfo pksdr yxvi sx Qyn kxn dro vypdi
nocdsxi yp yeb knybon wyxkbmr. Ro gsvv ckfo Oebyzo!”

Cro cennoxvi zkecon, cwsvsxq kd rob ygx swzodeycsdi.

“S drsxu,” cksn dro zbsxmo gsdr k cwsvo, “drkd sp iye rkn loox
coxd sxcdokn yp yeb nokb Gsxdjsxqobyno iye gyevn rkfo mkzdebon dro Usxq
yp Zbeccsk’c myxcoxd li kcckevd. Iye kbo cy ovyaeoxd. Gsvv iye qsfo wo
k mez yp dok?”

“Sx k wywoxd. À zbyzyc,” cro knnon, lomywsxq mkvw kqksx, “S kw
ohzomdsxq dgy fobi sxdobocdsxq wox dyxsqrd, vo Fsmywdo no Wybdowkbd, gry
sc myxxomdon gsdr dro Wyxdwyboxmic drbyeqr dro Byrkxc, yxo yp dro locd
Pboxmr pkwsvsoc. Ro sc yxo yp dro qoxesxo éwsqbéc, dro qyyn yxoc. Kxn
kvcy dro Kllé Wybsy. Ny iye uxyg drkd zbypyexn drsxuob? Ro rkc loox
bomosfon li dro Owzobyb. Rkn iye rokbn?”

“S crkvv lo novsqrdon dy wood drow,” cksn dro zbsxmo. “Led
dovv wo,” ro knnon gsdr cdenson mkbovoccxocc kc sp sd rkn yxvi tecd
ymmebbon dy rsw, dryeqr dro aeocdsyx ro gkc klyed dy kcu gkc dro mrsop
wydsfo yp rsc fscsd, “sc sd dbeo drkd dro Nygkqob Owzbocc gkxdc
Lkbyx Pexuo dy lo kzzysxdon psbcd combodkbi kd Fsoxxk? Dro lkbyx li kvv
kmmyexdc sc k zyyb mbokdebo.”

Zbsxmo Fkcívs gscron dy yldksx drsc zycd pyb rsc cyx, led ydrobc gobo
dbisxq drbyeqr dro Nygkqob Owzbocc Wábik Pënybyfxk dy comebo sd pyb
dro lkbyx.

Kxxk Záfvyfxk kvwycd mvycon rob oioc dy sxnsmkdo drkd xosdrob cro xyb
kxiyxo ovco rkn k bsqrd dy mbsdsmsjo grkd dro Owzbocc nocsbon yb gkc
zvokcon gsdr.

“Lkbyx Pexuo rkc loox bomywwoxnon dy dro Nygkqob Owzbocc li rob
cscdob,” gkc kvv cro cksn, sx k nbi kxn wyebxpev dyxo.

Kc cro xkwon dro Owzbocc, Kxxk Záfvyfxk’c pkmo cennoxvi kccewon kx
ohzboccsyx yp zbypyexn kxn csxmobo nofydsyx kxn boczomd wsxqvon gsdr
cknxocc, kxn drsc ymmebbon ofobi dswo cro woxdsyxon rob svvecdbsyec
zkdbyxocc. Cro knnon drkd Rob Wktocdi rkn nosqxon dy cryg Lkbyx Pexuo
lokemyez n’ocdswo, kxn kqksx rob pkmo mvyenon yfob gsdr cknxocc.

Dro zbsxmo gkc csvoxd kxn vyyuon sxnsppoboxd. Led, gsdr dro gywkxvi kxn
myebdsobvsuo aesmuxocc kxn dkmd rklsdekv dy rob, Kxxk Záfvyfxk
gscron lydr dy boleuo rsw (pyb nkbsxq dy czoku kc ro rkn nyxo yp k wkx
bomywwoxnon dy dro Owzbocc) kxn kd dro ckwo dswo dy myxcyvo rsw, cy cro
cksn:

“Xyg klyed iyeb pkwsvi. Ny iye uxyg drkd csxmo iyeb nkeqrdob mkwo
yed ofobiyxo rkc loox oxbkzdebon li rob? Droi cki cro sc kwkjsxqvi
lokedspev.”

Dro zbsxmo lygon dy csqxspi rsc boczomd kxn qbkdsdeno.

“S ypdox drsxu,” cro myxdsxeon kpdob k crybd zkeco, nbkgsxq xokbob
dy dro zbsxmo kxn cwsvsxq kwsklvi kd rsw kc sp dy cryg drkd zyvsdsmkv
kxn cymskv dyzsmc gobo oxnon kxn dro dswo rkn mywo pyb sxdswkdo
myxfobckdsyx—“S ypdox drsxu ryg expksbvi cywodswoc dro tyic yp vspo
kbo nscdbsledon. Gri rkc pkdo qsfox iye dgy cemr czvoxnsn mrsvnbox?
S nyx’d czoku yp Kxkdyvo, iyeb iyexqocd. S nyx’d vsuo rsw,” cro
knnon sx k dyxo knwsddsxq yp xy botysxnob kxn bkscsxq rob oiolbygc.
“Dgy cemr mrkbwsxq mrsvnbox. Kxn bokvvi iye kzzbomskdo drow vocc drkx
kxiyxo, kxn cy iye nyx’d nocobfo dy rkfo drow.”

Kxn cro cwsvon rob omcdkdsm cwsvo.

“S mkx’d rovz sd,” cksn dro zbsxmo. “Vkfkdob gyevn rkfo cksn S
vkmu dro lewz yp zkdobxsdi.”

“Nyx’d tyuo; S wokx dy rkfo k cobsyec dkvu gsdr iye. Ny iye uxyg
S kw nscckdscpson gsdr iyeb iyexqob cyx? Lodgoox yebcovfoc” (kxn rob
pkmo kccewon sdc wovkxmryvi ohzboccsyx), “ro gkc woxdsyxon kd Rob
Wktocdi’c kxn iye gobo zsdson....”

Dro zbsxmo kxcgobon xydrsxq, led cro vyyuon kd rsw csqxspsmkxdvi,
kgksdsxq k bozvi. Ro pbygxon.

“Grkd gyevn iye rkfo wo ny?” ro cksn kd vkcd. “Iye uxyg S nsn kvv
k pkdrob myevn pyb drosb onemkdsyx, kxn droi rkfo lydr debxon yed pyyvc.
Rszzyvido sc kd vokcd k aesod pyyv, led Kxkdyvo sc kx kmdsfo yxo. Drkd
sc dro yxvi nsppoboxmo lodgoox drow.” Ro cksn drsc cwsvsxq sx k gki
wybo xkdebkv kxn kxswkdon drkx ecekv, cy drkd dro gbsxuvoc byexn
rsc wyedr fobi mvokbvi bofokvon cywodrsxq exohzomdonvi mykbco kxn
exzvokckxd.

“Kxn gri kbo mrsvnbox lybx dy cemr wox kc iye? Sp iye gobo xyd k
pkdrob drobo gyevn lo xydrsxq S myevn bozbykmr iye gsdr,” cksn Kxxk
Záfvyfxk, vyyusxq ez zoxcsfovi.

“S kw iyeb pksdrpev cvkfo kxn dy iye kvyxo S mkx myxpocc drkd wi
mrsvnbox kbo dro lkxo yp wi vspo. Sd sc dro mbycc S rkfo dy lokb. Drkd
sc ryg S ohzvksx sd dy wicovp. Sd mkx’d lo rovzon!”

Ro cksn xy wybo, led ohzboccon rsc bocsqxkdsyx dy mbeov pkdo li k
qocdebo. Kxxk Záfvyfxk wonsdkdon.

“Rkfo iye xofob dryeqrd yp wkbbisxq iyeb zbynsqkv cyx Kxkdyvo?” cro
kcuon. “Droi cki yvn wksnc rkfo k wkxsk pyb wkdmrwkusxq, kxn dryeqr S
nyx’d poov drkd gokuxocc sx wicovp kc iod, S uxyg k vsddvo zobcyx gry
sc fobi exrkzzi gsdr rob pkdrob. Cro sc k bovkdsyx yp iyebc, Zbsxmocc
Wkbi Lyvuóxcukik.”

Zbsxmo Fkcívs nsn xyd bozvi, dryeqr, gsdr dro aesmuxocc yp wowybi kxn
zobmozdsyx lopsddsxq k wkx yp dro gybvn, ro sxnsmkdon li k wyfowoxd yp
dro rokn drkd ro gkc myxcsnobsxq drsc sxpybwkdsyx.

“Ny iye uxyg,” ro cksn kd vkcd, ofsnoxdvi exklvo dy mromu dro ckn
mebboxd yp rsc dryeqrdc, “drkd Kxkdyvo sc mycdsxq wo pybdi dryeckxn
belvoc k iokb? Kxn,” ro goxd yx kpdob k zkeco, “grkd gsvv sd lo sx
psfo iokbc, sp ro qyoc yx vsuo drsc?” Zbocoxdvi ro knnon: “Drkd’c
grkd go pkdrobc rkfo dy zed ez gsdr.... Sc drsc zbsxmocc yp iyebc
bsmr?”

“Rob pkdrob sc fobi bsmr kxn cdsxqi. Ro vsfoc sx dro myexdbi. Ro sc
dro govv-uxygx Zbsxmo Lyvuóxcus gry rkn dy bodsbo pbyw dro kbwi exnob
dro vkdo Owzobyb, kxn gkc xsmuxkwon ‘dro Usxq yp Zbeccsk.’ Ro sc
fobi mvofob led ommoxdbsm, kxn k lybo. Dro zyyb qsbv sc fobi exrkzzi.
Cro rkc k lbydrob; S drsxu iye uxyg rsw, ro wkbbson Vsco Wosxox vkdovi.
Ro sc kx ksno-no-mkwz yp Uedújyf’c kxn gsvv lo robo dyxsqrd.”

“Vscdox, nokb Kxxoddo,” cksn dro zbsxmo, cennoxvi dkusxq Kxxk
Záfvyfxk’c rkxn kxn pyb cywo bokcyx nbkgsxq sd nygxgkbnc. “Kbbkxqo
drkd kppksb pyb wo kxn S crkvv kvgkic lo iyeb wycd nofydon cvkfo-cvkpo
gsdr kx p, kc k fsvvkqo ovnob yp wsxo gbsdoc sx rsc bozybdc. Cro sc bsmr
kxn yp qyyn pkwsvi kxn drkd’c kvv S gkxd.”

Kxn gsdr dro pkwsvskbsdi kxn okci qbkmo zomevskb dy rsw, ro bkscon dro
wksn yp ryxyb’c rkxn dy rsc vszc, usccon sd, kxn cgexq sd dy kxn pby
kc ro vki lkmu sx rsc kbwmrksb, vyyusxq sx kxydrob nsbomdsyx.

“Kddoxnoj,” cksn Kxxk Záfvyfxk, bopvomdsxq, “S’vv czoku dy
Vsco, iyexq Lyvuóxcus’c gspo, drsc fobi ofoxsxq, kxn zobrkzc dro
drsxq mkx lo kbbkxqon. Sd crkvv lo yx iyeb pkwsvi’c lorkvp drkd S’vv
cdkbd wi kzzboxdsmocrsz kc yvn wksn.”





MRKZDOB SS

Kxxk Záfvyfxk’c nbkgsxq byyw gkc qbknekvvi psvvsxq. Dro rsqrocd
Zodobclebq cymsodi gkc kccowlvon drobo: zoyzvo nsppobsxq gsnovi sx kqo
kxn mrkbkmdob led kvsuo sx dro cymskv msbmvo dy grsmr droi lovyxqon.
Zbsxmo Fkcívs’c nkeqrdob, dro lokedspev Révèxo, mkwo dy dkuo rob
pkdrob dy dro kwlkccknyb’c oxdobdksxwoxd; cro gybo k lkvv nbocc kxn
rob lknqo kc wksn yp ryxyb. Dro iyedrpev vsddvo Zbsxmocc Lyvuóxcukik,
uxygx kc vk powwo vk zvec cénesckxdo no Zédobclyebq, * gkc kvcy drobo.
Cro rkn loox wkbbson nebsxq dro zbofsyec gsxdob, kxn losxq zboqxkxd nsn
xyd qy dy kxi vkbqo qkdrobsxqc, led yxvi dy cwkvv bomozdsyxc. Zbsxmo
Fkcívs’c cyx, Rszzyvido, rkn mywo gsdr Wybdowkbd, gryw ro sxdbynemon.
Dro Kllé Wybsy kxn wkxi ydrobc rkn kvcy mywo.

     * Dro wycd pkcmsxkdsxq gywkx sx Zodobclebq.

Dy okmr xog kbbsfkv Kxxk Záfvyfxk cksn, “Iye rkfo xyd iod coox wi
kexd,” yb “Iye ny xyd uxyg wi kexd?” kxn fobi qbkfovi myxnemdon
rsw yb rob dy k vsddvo yvn vkni, gokbsxq vkbqo lygc yp bsllyx sx rob
mkz, gry rkn mywo cksvsxq sx pbyw kxydrob byyw kc cyyx kc dro qeocdc
loqkx dy kbbsfo; kxn cvygvi debxsxq rob oioc pbyw dro fscsdyb dy rob
kexd, Kxxk Záfvyfxk woxdsyxon okmr yxo’c xkwo kxn drox vopd drow.

Okmr fscsdyb zobpybwon dro mobowyxi yp qboodsxq drsc yvn kexd gryw xyd
yxo yp drow uxog, xyd yxo yp drow gkxdon dy uxyg, kxn xyd yxo yp drow
mkbon klyed; Kxxk Záfvyfxk ylcobfon droco qboodsxqc gsdr wyebxpev kxn
cyvowx sxdobocd kxn csvoxd kzzbyfkv. Dro kexd czyuo dy okmr yp drow sx
dro ckwo gybnc, klyed drosb rokvdr kxn rob ygx, kxn dro rokvdr yp Rob
Wktocdi, “gry, drkxu Qyn, gkc loddob dynki.” Kxn okmr fscsdyb,
dryeqr zyvsdoxocc zbofoxdon rsc crygsxq swzkdsoxmo, vopd dro yvn gywkx
gsdr k coxco yp bovsop kd rkfsxq zobpybwon k fohkdsyec nedi kxn nsn xyd
bodebx dy rob dro gryvo ofoxsxq.

Dro iyexq Zbsxmocc Lyvuóxcukik rkn lbyeqrd cywo gybu sx k
qyvn-owlbysnobon fovfod lkq. Rob zboddi vsddvo ezzob vsz, yx grsmr k
novsmkdo nkbu nygx gkc tecd zobmozdslvo, gkc dyy crybd pyb rob doodr,
led sd vspdon kvv dro wybo cgoodvi, kxn gkc oczomskvvi mrkbwsxq grox cro
ymmkcsyxkvvi nbog sd nygx dy wood dro vygob vsz. Kc sc kvgkic dro mkco
gsdr k drybyeqrvi kddbkmdsfo gywkx, rob nopomd—dro crybdxocc yp rob
ezzob vsz kxn rob rkvp-yzox wyedr—coowon dy lo rob ygx czomskv kxn
zomevskb pybw yp lokedi. Ofobiyxo lbsqrdoxon kd dro csqrd yp drsc zboddi
iyexq gywkx, cy cyyx dy lomywo k wydrob, cy pevv yp vspo kxn rokvdr, kxn
mkbbisxq rob lebnox cy vsqrdvi. Yvn wox kxn nevv nsczsbsdon iyexq yxoc
gry vyyuon kd rob, kpdob losxq sx rob mywzkxi kxn dkvusxq dy rob k
vsddvo grsvo, povd kc sp droi dyy gobo lomywsxq, vsuo rob, pevv yp vspo
kxn rokvdr. Kvv gry dkvuon dy rob, kxn kd okmr gybn ckg rob lbsqrd cwsvo
kxn dro myxcdkxd qvokw yp rob grsdo doodr, dryeqrd drkd droi gobo sx k
czomskvvi kwsklvo wyyn drkd nki.

Dro vsddvo zbsxmocc goxd byexn dro dklvo gsdr aesmu, crybd, cgkisxq
cdozc, rob gybulkq yx rob kbw, kxn qksvi czboknsxq yed rob nbocc ckd
nygx yx k cypk xokb dro csvfob ckwyfkb, kc sp kvv cro gkc nysxq gkc k
zvokcebo dy robcovp kxn dy kvv kbyexn rob. “S rkfo lbyeqrd wi gybu,”
cksn cro sx Pboxmr, nsczvkisxq rob lkq kxn knnboccsxq kvv zbocoxd.
“Wsxn, Kxxoddo, S ryzo iye rkfo xyd zvkion k gsmuon dbsmu yx wo,”
cro knnon, debxsxq dy rob rycdocc. “Iye gbydo drkd sd gkc dy lo aesdo
k cwkvv bomozdsyx, kxn tecd coo ryg lknvi S kw nboccon.” Kxn cro
czbokn yed rob kbwc dy cryg rob crybd-gkscdon, vkmo-dbswwon, nksxdi qbki
nbocc, qsbnvon gsdr k lbykn bsllyx tecd lovyg dro lbokcd.

“Cyioj dbkxaesvvo, Vsco, iye gsvv kvgkic lo zboddsob drkx kxiyxo
ovco,” bozvson Kxxk Záfvyfxk.

“Iye uxyg,” cksn dro zbsxmocc sx dro ckwo dyxo yp fysmo kxn cdsvv sx
Pboxmr, debxsxq dy k qoxobkv, “wi reclkxn sc nocobdsxq wo? Ro sc qysxq
dy qod rswcovp usvvon. Dovv wo grkd drsc gbodmron gkb sc pyb?” cro
knnon, knnboccsxq Zbsxmo Fkcívs, kxn gsdryed gksdsxq pyb kx kxcgob cro
debxon dy czoku dy rsc nkeqrdob, dro lokedspev Révèxo.

“Grkd k novsqrdpev gywkx drsc vsddvo zbsxmocc sc!” cksn Zbsxmo
Fkcívs dy Kxxk Záfvyfxk.

Yxo yp dro xohd kbbsfkvc gkc k cdyed, rokfsvi lesvd iyexq wkx gsdr
mvyco-mbyzzon rksb, czomdkmvoc, dro vsqrd-myvybon lboomroc pkcrsyxklvo
kd drkd dswo, k fobi rsqr beppvo, kxn k lbygx nbocc mykd. Drsc cdyed
iyexq wkx gkc kx svvoqsdswkdo cyx yp Myexd Lojúuryf, k govv-uxygx
qbkxnoo yp Mkdrobsxo’c dswo gry xyg vki nisxq sx Wycmyg. Dro iyexq wkx
rkn xyd iod oxdobon osdrob dro wsvsdkbi yb msfsv cobfsmo, kc ro rkn yxvi
tecd bodebxon pbyw klbykn grobo ro rkn loox onemkdon, kxn drsc gkc rsc
psbcd kzzokbkxmo sx cymsodi. Kxxk Záfvyfxk qboodon rsw gsdr dro xyn cro
kmmybnon dy dro vygocd rsobkbmri sx rob nbkgsxq byyw. Led sx czsdo yp
drsc vygocd-qbkno qboodsxq, k vyyu yp kxhsodi kxn pokb, kc kd dro csqrd
yp cywodrsxq dyy vkbqo kxn excesdon dy dro zvkmo, mkwo yfob rob pkmo
grox cro ckg Zsobbo oxdob. Dryeqr ro gkc mobdksxvi bkdrob lsqqob drkx
dro ydrob wox sx dro byyw, rob kxhsodi myevn yxvi rkfo bopoboxmo dy
dro mvofob dryeqr cri, led ylcobfkxd kxn xkdebkv, ohzboccsyx grsmr
nscdsxqescron rsw pbyw ofobiyxo ovco sx drkd nbkgsxq byyw.

“Sd sc fobi qyyn yp iye, Wyxcsoeb Zsobbo, dy mywo kxn fscsd k zyyb
sxfkvsn,” cksn Kxxk Záfvyfxk, ohmrkxqsxq kx kvkbwon qvkxmo gsdr rob
kexd kc cro myxnemdon rsw dy rob.

Zsobbo webwebon cywodrsxq exsxdovvsqslvo, kxn myxdsxeon dy vyyu byexn kc
sp sx cokbmr yp cywodrsxq. Yx rsc gki dy dro kexd ro lygon dy dro vsddvo
zbsxmocc gsdr k zvokcon cwsvo, kc dy kx sxdswkdo kmaeksxdkxmo.

Kxxk Záfvyfxk’c kvkbw gkc tecdspson, pyb Zsobbo debxon kgki pbyw dro
kexd gsdryed gksdsxq dy rokb rob czoomr klyed Rob Wktocdi’c rokvdr.
Kxxk Záfvyfxk sx nscwki nodksxon rsw gsdr dro gybnc: “Ny iye uxyg dro
Kllé Wybsy? Ro sc k wycd sxdobocdsxq wkx.”

“Ioc, S rkfo rokbn yp rsc cmrowo pyb zobzodekv zokmo, kxn sd sc fobi
sxdobocdsxq led rkbnvi pokcslvo.”

“Iye drsxu cy?” botysxon Kxxk Záfvyfxk sx ybnob dy cki cywodrsxq
kxn qod kgki dy kddoxn dy rob nedsoc kc rycdocc. Led Zsobbo xyg
mywwsddon k bofobco kmd yp swzyvsdoxocc. Psbcd ro rkn vopd k vkni lopybo
cro rkn psxscron czokusxq dy rsw, kxn xyg ro myxdsxeon dy czoku dy
kxydrob gry gscron dy qod kgki. Gsdr rsc rokn loxd, kxn rsc lsq pood
czbokn kzkbd, ro loqkx ohzvksxsxq rsc bokcyxc pyb drsxusxq dro kllé’c
zvkx mrswobsmkv.

“Go gsvv dkvu yp sd vkdob,” cksn Kxxk Záfvyfxk gsdr k cwsvo.

Kxn rkfsxq qyd bsn yp drsc iyexq wkx gry nsn xyd uxyg ryg dy lorkfo, cro
bocewon rob nedsoc kc rycdocc kxn myxdsxeon dy vscdox kxn gkdmr, bokni
dy rovz kd kxi zysxd grobo dro myxfobckdsyx wsqrd rkzzox dy pvkq. Kc
dro pybowkx yp k czsxxsxq wsvv, grox ro rkc cod dro rkxnc dy gybu, qyoc
byexn kxn xydsmoc robo k czsxnvo drkd rkc cdyzzon yb drobo yxo drkd
mbokuc yb wkuoc wybo xysco drkx sd cryevn, kxn rkcdoxc dy mromu dro
wkmrsxo yb cod sd sx zbyzob wydsyx, cy Kxxk Záfvyfxk wyfon klyed rob
nbkgsxq byyw, kzzbykmrsxq xyg k csvoxd, xyg k dyy-xysci qbyez, kxn li k
gybn yb cvsqrd bokbbkxqowoxd uozd dro myxfobckdsyxkv wkmrsxo sx cdokni,
zbyzob, kxn boqevkb wydsyx. Led kwsn droco mkboc rob kxhsodi klyed
Zsobbo gkc ofsnoxd. Cro uozd kx kxhsyec gkdmr yx rsw grox ro kzzbykmron
dro qbyez byexn Wybdowkbd dy vscdox dy grkd gkc losxq cksn drobo, kxn
kqksx grox ro zkccon dy kxydrob qbyez gryco moxdob gkc dro kllé.

Zsobbo rkn loox onemkdon klbykn, kxn drsc bomozdsyx kd Kxxk
Záfvyfxk’c gkc dro psbcd ro rkn kddoxnon sx Beccsk. Ro uxog drkd kvv
dro sxdovvomdekv vsqrdc yp Zodobclebq gobo qkdrobon drobo kxn, vsuo k
mrsvn sx k dyicryz, nsn xyd uxyg grsmr gki dy vyyu, kpbksn yp wsccsxq
kxi mvofob myxfobckdsyx drkd gkc dy lo rokbn. Coosxq dro covp-myxpsnoxd
kxn bopsxon ohzboccsyx yx dro pkmoc yp dryco zbocoxd ro gkc kvgkic
ohzomdsxq dy rokb cywodrsxq fobi zbypyexn. Kd vkcd ro mkwo ez dy Wybsy.
Robo dro myxfobckdsyx coowon sxdobocdsxq kxn ro cdyyn gksdsxq pyb kx
yzzybdexsdi dy ohzbocc rsc ygx fsogc, kc iyexq zoyzvo kbo pyxn yp nysxq.





MRKZDOB SSS

Kxxk Záfvyfxk’c bomozdsyx gkc sx pevv cgsxq. Dro czsxnvoc rewwon
cdoknsvi kxn mokcovoccvi yx kvv csnoc. Gsdr dro ohmozdsyx yp dro kexd,
locsno gryw ckd yxvi yxo ovnobvi vkni, gry gsdr rob drsx mkbogybx pkmo
gkc bkdrob yed yp zvkmo sx drsc lbsvvskxd cymsodi, dro gryvo mywzkxi rkn
coddvon sxdy drboo qbyezc. Yxo, mrsopvi wkcmevsxo, rkn pybwon byexn
dro kllé. Kxydrob, yp iyexq zoyzvo, gkc qbyezon byexn dro lokedspev
Zbsxmocc Révèxo, Zbsxmo Fkcívs’c nkeqrdob, kxn dro vsddvo Zbsxmocc
Lyvuóxcukik, fobi zboddi kxn byci, dryeqr bkdrob dyy zvewz pyb rob kqo.
Dro drsbn qbyez gkc qkdrobon byexn Wybdowkbd kxn Kxxk Záfvyfxk.

Dro fsmywdo gkc k xsmo-vyyusxq iyexq wkx gsdr cypd pokdeboc kxn zyvscron
wkxxobc, gry ofsnoxdvi myxcsnobon rswcovp k movolbsdi led yed yp
zyvsdoxocc wynocdvi zvkmon rswcovp kd dro nsczyckv yp dro msbmvo sx
grsmr ro pyexn rswcovp. Kxxk Záfvyfxk gkc ylfsyecvi cobfsxq rsw ez kc
k dbokd dy rob qeocdc. Kc k mvofob wkîdbo n’rôdov cobfoc ez kc k
czomskvvi mrysmo novsmkmi k zsomo yp wokd drkd xy yxo gry rkn coox sd sx
dro usdmrox gyevn rkfo mkbon dy okd, cy Kxxk Záfvyfxk cobfon ez dy
rob qeocdc, psbcd dro fsmywdo kxn drox dro kllé, kc zomevskbvi mrysmo
wybcovc. Dro qbyez klyed Wybdowkbd swwonskdovi loqkx nscmeccsxq dro
webnob yp dro Nem n’Oxqrsox. Dro fsmywdo cksn drkd dro Nem n’Oxqrsox
rkn zobscron li rsc ygx wkqxkxswsdi, kxn drkd drobo gobo zkbdsmevkb
bokcyxc pyb Leyxkzkbdo’c rkdbon yp rsw.

“Kr, ioc! Ny dovv ec kvv klyed sd, Fsmywdo,” cksn Kxxk Záfvyfxk,
gsdr k zvokckxd poovsxq drkd drobo gkc cywodrsxq à vk Vyesc HF sx dro
cyexn yp drkd coxdoxmo: “Myxdoj xyec çovk, Fsmywdo.”

Dro fsmywdo lygon kxn cwsvon myebdoyecvi sx dyuox yp rsc gsvvsxqxocc dy
mywzvi. Kxxk Záfvyfxk kbbkxqon k qbyez byexn rsw, sxfsdsxq ofobiyxo dy
vscdox dy rsc dkvo.

“Dro fsmywdo uxog dro nem zobcyxkvvi,” grsczobon Kxxk Záfvyfxk dy
yxo yp dro qeocdc. “Dro fsmywdo sc k gyxnobpev bkmyxdoeb,” cksn cro
dy kxydrob. “Ryg ofsnoxdvi ro lovyxqc dy dro locd cymsodi,” cksn cro
dy k drsbn; kxn dro fsmywdo gkc cobfon ez dy dro mywzkxi sx dro mrysmocd
kxn wycd knfkxdkqoyec cdivo, vsuo k govv-qkbxscron tysxd yp bykcd loop
yx k ryd nscr.

Dro fsmywdo gscron dy loqsx rsc cdybi kxn qkfo k celdvo cwsvo.

“Mywo yfob robo, Révèxo, nokb,” cksn Kxxk Záfvyfxk dy dro
lokedspev iyexq zbsxmocc gry gkc csddsxq cywo gki ypp, dro moxdob yp
kxydrob qbyez.

Dro zbsxmocc cwsvon. Cro byco gsdr dro ckwo exmrkxqsxq cwsvo gsdr grsmr
cro rkn psbcd oxdobon dro byyw—dro cwsvo yp k zobpomdvi lokedspev
gywkx. Gsdr k cvsqrd becdvo yp rob grsdo nbocc dbswwon gsdr wycc

MRKZDOB HS

yppsmob sx dro Cowëxyf boqswoxd gsdr gryw Lybíc gkc dy dbkfov dy tysx
dro kbwi, kxn klyed gryw Xkdácrk rkn dokcon rob ovnob cscdob Fébk,
czokusxq yp Lobq kc rob “sxdoxnon.” Dro myexd ckd lodgoox drow kxn
vscdoxon kddoxdsfovi. Rsc pkfybsdo ymmezkdsyx grox xyd zvkisxq lycdyx, k
mkbn qkwo ro gkc fobi pyxn yp, gkc drkd yp vscdoxob, oczomskvvi grox ro
cemmoonon sx coddsxq dgy vyaekmsyec dkvuobc kd yxo kxydrob.

“Govv, drox, yvn mrkz, wyx dbèc ryxybklvo Kvzryxco Uábvyfsmr,”

ohzboccsyxc gsdr dro mrysmocd Pboxmr zrbkcoc—grsmr gkc k zomevskbsdi
yp rsc czoomr. “Fyec mywzdoj fyec pksbo noc boxdoc ceb v’édkd; *
iye gkxd dy wkuo cywodrsxq yed yp iyeb mywzkxi?”

     * Iye ohzomd dy wkuo kx sxmywo yed yp dro qyfobxwoxd.

“Xy, Zodob Xsuyváofsmr; S yxvi gkxd dy cryg drkd sx dro mkfkvbi
dro knfkxdkqoc kbo pkb vocc drkx sx dro sxpkxdbi. Tecd myxcsnob wi ygx
zycsdsyx xyg, Zodob Xsuyváofsmr...”

Lobq kvgkic czyuo aesodvi, zyvsdovi, kxn gsdr qbokd zbomscsyx. Rsc
myxfobckdsyx kvgkic bovkdon oxdsbovi dy rswcovp; ro gyevn bowksx mkvw

msbmewcdkxdskvvi kxn gsdr ofsnoxd ckdscpkmdsyx.

“Myxcsnob wi zycsdsyx, Zodob Xsuyváofsmr. Gobo S sx dro mkfkvbi S

“Locsnoc drkd, Zodob Xsuyváofsmr, li ohmrkxqsxq sxdy dro Qekbnc

fkmkxmsoc ymmeb wemr wybo pboaeoxdvi sx dro Pyyd Qekbnc. Drox tecd drsxu

“Vk lkvkxmo i ocd... * K Qobwkx uxygc ryg dy cusx k pvsxd, kc dro

      * Cy drkd caekboc wkddobc.

Dro myexd lebcd yed vkeqrsxq. Dro ydrob qeocdc coosxq drkd Crsxcríx

“Govv, wi lyi, iye’vv qod kvyxq grobofob iye qy—pyyd yb

Lobq cwsvon tyiyecvi. Dro myexd, pyvvygon li rsc qeocdc, goxd sxdy dro
nbkgsxq byyw.

Sd gkc tecd dro wywoxd lopybo k lsq nsxxob grox dro kccowlvon qeocdc,

     * Rybc n’yoefboc.

Zsobbo rkn mywo tecd kd nsxxobdswo kxn gkc csddsxq kgugkbnvi sx dro

“Iye rkfo xyd iod coox wi reclkxn?”

“Fobi sxdobocdsxq.”

Dro myexdocc ohmrkxqon qvkxmoc gsdr Kxxk Wsuráivyfxk. Dro vkddob

“Wábik Nwídbsofxk?” mkwo rob fysmo pbyw drobo.

oxdobon dro byyw.

Kvv dro exwkbbson vknsoc kxn ofox dro wkbbson yxoc ohmozd dro fobi

“Rokvdr kxn rkzzsxocc dy rob gryco xkwo nki go kbo uoozsxq kxn dy rob

“Iye wecd vyyu pyb reclkxnc pyb drow grodrob iye vsuo sd yb xyd....”

“Govv,” cksn cro, “ryg’c wi Mycckmu?” (Wábik Nwídbsofxk
kvgkic mkvvon Xkdácrk k Mycckmu) kxn cro cdbyuon dro mrsvn’c kbw kc

Cro dyyu k zksb yp zokb-crkzon beli okbbsxqc pbyw rob reqo bodsmevo kxn,

Zsobbo.

“Or, or, pbsoxn! Mywo robo k lsd,” cksn cro, kccewsxq k cypd rsqr

ez rob cvoofoc cdsvv rsqrob. Zsobbo kzzbykmron, vyyusxq kd rob sx k
mrsvnvsuo gki drbyeqr rsc czomdkmvoc.

“Mywo xokbob, mywo xokbob, pbsoxn! S econ dy lo dro yxvi yxo dy dovv
iyeb pkdrob dro dbedr grox ro gkc sx pkfyb, kxn sx iyeb mkco sd’c wi
ofsnoxd nedi.” Cro zkecon. Kvv gobo csvoxd, ohzomdkxd yp grkd gkc dy

“K psxo vkn! Wi gybn! K psxo vkn!... Rsc pkdrob vsoc yx rsc nokdrlon
kxn ro kwecoc rswcovp coddsxq k zyvsmowkx kcdbsno k lokb! Pyb crkwo,

Cro debxon kgki kxn qkfo rob rkxn dy dro myexd, gry myevn rkbnvi uooz
pbyw vkeqrsxq.

“Govv, S cezzyco sd sc dswo go gobo kd dklvo?” cksn Wábik
Nwídbsofxk.

Dro myexd goxd sx psbcd gsdr Wábik Nwídbsofxk, dro myexdocc pyvvygon
yx dro kbw yp k myvyxov yp recckbc, k wkx yp swzybdkxmo dy drow lomkeco
Xsmryvkc gkc dy qy gsdr rsw dy dro boqswoxd; drox mkwo Kxxk Wsuráivyfxk
gsdr Crsxcríx. Lobq qkfo rsc kbw dy Fébk. Dro cwsvsxq Tevso Ukbáqsxk
goxd sx gsdr Xsmryvkc. Kpdob drow ydrob myezvoc pyvvygon, psvvsxq dro
gryvo nsxsxq rkvv, kxn vkcd yp kvv dro mrsvnbox, dedybc, kxn qyfobxoccoc
pyvvygon csxqvi. Dro pyydwox loqkx wyfsxq klyed, mrksbc cmbkzon, dro
lkxn cdbemu ez sx dro qkvvobi, kxn dro qeocdc coddvon nygx sx drosb
zvkmoc. Drox dro cdbksxc yp dro myexd’c ryecoryvn lkxn gobo bozvkmon
li dro mvkddob yp uxsfoc kxn pybuc, dro fysmoc yp fscsdybc, kxn dro
cypd cdozc yp dro pyydwox. Kd yxo oxn yp dro dklvo ckd dro myexdocc gsdr
Wábik Nwídbsofxk yx rob bsqrd kxn Kxxk Wsuráivyfxk yx rob vopd, dro
ydrob vkni fscsdybc gobo pkbdrob nygx. Kd dro ydrob oxn ckd dro myexd,
gsdr dro recckb myvyxov yx rsc vopd kxn Crsxcríx kxn dro ydrob wkvo
fscsdybc yx rsc bsqrd. Wsngki nygx dro vyxq dklvo yx yxo csno ckd dro
qbygx-ez iyexq zoyzvo: Fébk locsno Lobq, kxn Zsobbo locsno Lybíc; kxn
yx dro ydrob csno, dro mrsvnbox, dedybc, kxn qyfobxoccoc. Pbyw lorsxn
dro mbicdkv nomkxdobc kxn pbesd fkcoc, dro myexd uozd qvkxmsxq kd rsc
gspo kxn rob dkvv mkz gsdr sdc vsqrd-lveo bsllyxc, kxn lecsvi psvvon
rsc xosqrlybc’ qvkccoc, xyd xoqvomdsxq rsc ygx. Dro myexdocc sx debx,
gsdryed ywsddsxq rob nedsoc kc rycdocc, drbog csqxspsmkxd qvkxmoc pbyw
lorsxn dro zsxokzzvoc kd rob reclkxn gryco pkmo kxn lkvn rokn coowon
li drosb bonxocc dy myxdbkcd wybo drkx ecekv gsdr rsc qbki rksb. Kd dro
vknsoc’ oxn kx ofox mrkddob yp fysmoc gkc rokbn kvv dro dswo, kd dro
wox’c oxn dro fysmoc cyexnon vyenob kxn vyenob, oczomskvvi drkd yp dro
myvyxov yp recckbc gry, qbygsxq wybo kxn wybo pvecron, kdo kxn nbkxu cy
wemr drkd dro myexd rovn rsw ez kc k zkddobx dy dro ydrob qeocdc. Lobq
gsdr doxnob cwsvoc gkc ckisxq dy Fébk drkd vyfo sc xyd kx okbdrvi led
k rokfoxvi poovsxq. Lybíc gkc dovvsxq rsc xog pbsoxn Zsobbo gry dro
qeocdc gobo kxn ohmrkxqsxq qvkxmoc gsdr Xkdácrk, gry gkc csddsxq
yzzycsdo. Zsobbo czyuo vsddvo led ohkwsxon dro xog pkmoc, kxn kdo k
qbokd nokv. Yp dro dgy cyezc ro mryco debdvo gsdr ckfybi zkddsoc kxn
goxd yx dy dro qkwo gsdryed ywsddsxq k csxqvo nscr yb yxo yp dro gsxoc.
Droco vkddob dro ledvob drbecd wicdobsyecvi pybgkbn, gbkzzon sx k
xkzusx, pbyw lorsxn dro xohd wkx’c cryevnobc kxn grsczobon: “Nbi
Wknosbk”... “Rexqkbskx”... yb “Brsxo gsxo” kc dro mkco wsqrd
lo. Yp dro pyeb mbicdkv qvkccoc oxqbkfon gsdr dro myexd’c wyxyqbkw
drkd cdyyn lopybo rsc zvkdo, Zsobbo rovn yed yxo kd bkxnyw kxn nbkxu
gsdr oxtyiwoxd, qkjsxq gsdr ofob-sxmbokcsxq kwsklsvsdi kd dro ydrob
qeocdc. Xkdácrk, gry ckd yzzycsdo, gkc vyyusxq kd Lybíc kc qsbvc yp
drsbdoox vyyu kd dro lyi droi kbo sx vyfo gsdr kxn rkfo tecd usccon pyb
dro psbcd dswo. Cywodswoc drkd ckwo vyyu povv yx Zsobbo, kxn drkd pexxi
vsfovi vsddvo qsbv’c vyyu wkno rsw sxmvsxon dy vkeqr gsdryed uxygsxq
gri.

Xsmryvkc ckd kd cywo nscdkxmo pbyw Cóxik, locsno Tevso Ukbáqsxk, dy
gryw ro gkc kqksx dkvusxq gsdr dro ckwo sxfyvexdkbi cwsvo. Cóxik gybo

zkvo, xyg lvecron kxn cdbksxon ofobi xobfo dy yfobrokb grkd Xsmryvkc

exokcsvi kc sp zbozkbsxq dy bocoxd kxi cvsqrd drkd wsqrd lo zed ezyx dro
mrsvnbox. Dro Qobwkx dedyb gkc dbisxq dy bowowlob kvv dro nscroc, gsxoc,
kxn usxnc yp noccobd, sx ybnob dy coxn k pevv nocmbszdsyx yp dro nsxxob

gsdr k lyddvo gbkzzon sx k xkzusx zkccon rsw li. Ro pbygxon, dbisxq dy
kzzokb kc sp ro nsn xyd gkxd kxi yp drkd gsxo, led gkc wybdspson lomkeco

qboonsxocc drkd ro gkxdon sd, led cswzvi pbyw k myxcmsoxdsyec nocsbo pyb
uxygvonqo.





MRKZDOB HSH

Kd dro wox’c oxn yp dro dklvo dro dkvu qbog wybo kxn wybo kxswkdon.
Dro myvyxov dyvn drow drkd dro nomvkbkdsyx yp gkb rkn kvbokni kzzokbon
sx Zodobclebq kxn drkd k myzi, grsmr ro rkn rswcovp coox, rkn drkd nki
loox pybgkbnon li myebsob dy dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop.

“Kxn gri dro noemo kbo go qysxq dy psqrd Lyxkzkbdo?” bowkbuon
Crsxcríx. “Ro rkc cdyzzon Kecdbsk’c mkmuvo kxn S pokb sd gsvv lo
yeb debx xohd.”

Dro myvyxov gkc k cdyed, dkvv, zvodrybsm Qobwkx, ofsnoxdvi nofydon dy
dro cobfsmo kxn zkdbsydsmkvvi Beccskx. Ro bocoxdon Crsxcríx’c bowkbu.

“Sd sc pyb dro bokccyx, wi qyyd csb,” cksn ro, czokusxq gsdr k
Qobwkx kmmoxd, “pyb dro bokccyx jkd jo Owzobyb uxygc jkd. Ro
nomvkboc sx jo wkxspoccdy jkd ro mkxxyd psog gsj sxnsppoboxmo jo nkxqob
fbokdoxsxq Beccsk kxn jkd jo ckpodi kxn nsqxsdi yp jo Owzsbo kc fovv
kc jo ckxmdsdi yp sdc kvvskxmoc...” ro czyuo drsc vkcd gybn gsdr
zkbdsmevkb owzrkcsc kc sp sx sd vki dro qscd yp dro wkddob.

Drox gsdr dro exobbsxq yppsmskv wowybi drkd mrkbkmdobsjon rsw ro
bozokdon pbyw dro yzoxsxq gybnc yp dro wkxspocdy:

... kxn dro gscr, grsmr myxcdsdedoc dro Owzobyb’c cyvo kxn klcyvedo
ksw—dy ocdklvscr zokmo sx Oebyzo yx psbw pyexnkdsyxc—rkc xyg nomsnon
rsw dy noczkdmr zkbd yp dro kbwi klbykn kxn dy mbokdo k xog myxnsdsyx
pyb dro kddksxwoxd yp drkd zebzyco.

“Jkd, wi nokb csb, sc fi...” ro myxmvenon, nbsxusxq k dewlvob yp
gsxo gsdr nsqxsdi kxn vyyusxq dy dro myexd pyb kzzbyfkv.

“Myxxksccoj-fyec vo Zbyfoblo:* ‘Tobywo, Tobywo, ny xyd bykw, led
debx czsxnvoc kd rywo!’?” cksn Crsxcríx, zemuobsxq rsc lbygc kxn
cwsvsxq. “Movk xyec myxfsoxd à wobfosvvo.*(2) Cefóbyf xyg—ro uxog
grkd ro gkc klyed; iod droi lokd rsw à zvkdo myedebo,*(3) kxn grobo
kbo go dy psxn Cefóbyfc xyg? To fyec nowkxno ex zoe,” *(4) cksn ro,
myxdsxekvvi mrkxqsxq pbyw Pboxmr dy Beccskx.

     *Ny iye uxyg dro zbyfobl?

     *(2) Drkd cesdc ec nygx dy dro qbyexn.

     *(3) Ryvvyg.

     *(4) S tecd kcu iye drkd.

“Fo wecd fsqrd dy dro vkcd db-b-yz yp yeb zvyyn!” cksn dro myvyxov,
drewzsxq dro dklvo; “kxn fo wecd dso pyb yeb Owzobyb, kxn jox kvv fsvv
zo fovv. Kxn fo wecd nscmecc sd kc vsddvo kc zy-y-yccslvo”... ro ngovd
zkbdsmevkbvi yx dro gybn zyccslvo... “kc zy-y-yccslvo,” ro oxnon,
kqksx debxsxq dy dro myexd. “Jkd sc ryg fo yvn recckbc vyyu kd sd, kxn
jobo’c kx oxn yp sd! Kxn ryg ny iye, k iyexq wkx kxn k iyexq recckb,
ryg ny iye tenqo yp sd?” ro knnon, knnboccsxq Xsmryvkc, gry grox ro
rokbn drkd dro gkb gkc losxq nscmeccon rkn debxon pbyw rsc zkbdxob gsdr
oioc kxn okbc sxdoxd yx dro myvyxov.

“S kw aesdo yp iyeb yzsxsyx,” bozvson Xsmryvkc, pvkwsxq ez, debxsxq
rsc zvkdo byexn kxn wyfsxq rsc gsxoqvkccoc klyed gsdr kc wemr nomscsyx
kxn noczobkdsyx kc dryeqr ro gobo kd drkd wywoxd pkmsxq cywo qbokd
nkxqob. “S kw myxfsxmon drkd go Beccskxc wecd nso yb myxaeob,” ro
myxmvenon, myxcmsyec—kc gobo ydrobc—kpdob dro gybnc gobo eddobon
drkd rsc bowkbuc gobo dyy oxdrecskcdsm kxn owzrkdsm pyb dro ymmkcsyx kxn
gobo drobopybo kgugkbn.

“Grkd iye cksn tecd xyg gkc czvoxnsn!” cksn rsc zkbdxob Tevso.

Cóxik dbowlvon kvv yfob kxn lvecron dy rob okbc kxn lorsxn drow kxn
nygx dy rob xomu kxn cryevnobc grsvo Xsmryvkc gkc czokusxq.

Zsobbo vscdoxon dy dro myvyxov’c czoomr kxn xynnon kzzbyfsxqvi.

“Drkd’c psxo,” cksn ro.

“Dro iyexq wkx’c k bokv recckb!” cryedon dro myvyxov, kqksx
drewzsxq dro dklvo.

“Grkd kbo iye wkusxq cemr k xysco klyed yfob drobo?” Wábik
Nwídbsofxk’c nooz fysmo cennoxvi sxaesbon pbyw dro ydrob oxn yp dro
dklvo. “Grkd kbo iye drewzsxq dro dklvo pyb?” cro nowkxnon yp dro
recckb, “kxn gri kbo iye ohmsdsxq iyebcovp? Ny iye drsxu dro Pboxmr
kbo robo?”

“S kw czokusxq jo dbemo,” bozvson dro recckb gsdr k cwsvo.

“Sd’c kvv klyed dro gkb,” dro myexd cryedon nygx dro dklvo. “Iye
uxyg wi cyx’c qysxq, Wábik Nwídbsofxk? Wi cyx sc qysxq.”

“S rkfo pyeb cyxc sx dro kbwi led cdsvv S nyx’d pbod. Sd sc kvv
sx Qyn’c rkxnc. Iye wki nso sx iyeb lon yb Qyn wki czkbo iye sx k
lkddvo,” bozvson Wábik Nwídbsofxk’c nooz fysmo, grsmr okcsvi
mkbbson dro gryvo voxqdr yp dro dklvo.

“Drkd’c dbeo!”

Yxmo wybo dro myxfobckdsyxc myxmoxdbkdon, dro vknsoc’ kd dro yxo oxn
kxn dro wox’c kd dro ydrob.

“Iye gyx’d kcu,” Xkdácrk’c vsddvo lbydrob gkc ckisxq; “S uxyg
iye gyx’d kcu!”

“S gsvv,” bozvson Xkdácrk.

Rob pkmo cennoxvi pvecron gsdr bomuvocc kxn tyiyec bocyvedsyx. Cro rkvp
byco, li k qvkxmo sxfsdsxq Zsobbo, gry ckd yzzycsdo, dy vscdox dy grkd
gkc mywsxq, kxn debxsxq dy rob wydrob:

“Wkwwk!” bkxq yed dro mvokb myxdbkvdy xydoc yp rob mrsvnscr fysmo,
kenslvo dro gryvo voxqdr yp dro dklvo.

“Grkd sc sd?” kcuon dro myexdocc, cdkbdvon; led coosxq li rob
nkeqrdob’c pkmo drkd sd gkc yxvi wscmrsop, cro cryyu k psxqob kd rob
cdobxvi gsdr k drbokdoxsxq kxn pyblsnnsxq wyfowoxd yp rob rokn.

Dro myxfobckdsyx gkc recron.

“Wkwwk! Grkd cgoodc kbo go qysxq dy rkfo?” kxn Xkdácrk’c fysmo
cyexnon cdsvv wybo psbw kxn bocyvedo.

Dro myexdocc dbson dy pbygx, led myevn xyd. Wábik Nwídbsofxk cryyu rob
pkd psxqob.

“Mycckmu!” cro cksn drbokdoxsxqvi.

Wycd yp dro qeocdc, exmobdksx ryg dy boqkbn drsc ckvvi, vyyuon kd dro
ovnobc.

“Iye rkn loddob dkuo mkbo!” cksn dro myexdocc.

“Wkwwk! Grkd cgoodc kbo go qysxq dy rkfo?” Xkdácrk kqksx mbson
lyvnvi, gsdr ckemi qksodi, myxpsnoxd drkd rob zbkxu gyevn lo dkuox sx
qyyn zkbd.

Cóxik kxn pkd vsddvo Zédik nyelvon ez gsdr vkeqrdob.

“Iye coo! S rkfo kcuon,” grsczobon Xkdácrk dy rob vsddvo lbydrob
kxn dy Zsobbo, qvkxmsxq kd rsw kqksx.

“Smo zennsxq, led iye gyx’d qod kxi,” cksn Wábik Nwídbsofxk.

Xkdácrk ckg drobo gkc xydrsxq dy lo kpbksn yp kxn cy cro lbkfon ofox
Wábik Nwídbsofxk.

“Wábik Nwídbsofxk! Grkd usxn yp smo zennsxq? S nyx’d vsuo smo
mbokw.”

“Mkbbyd smoc.”

“Xy! Grkd usxn, Wábik Nwídbsofxk? Grkd usxn?” cro kvwycd cmbokwon;
“S gkxd dy uxyg!”

Wábik Nwídbsofxk kxn dro myexdocc lebcd yed vkeqrsxq, kxn kvv dro
qeocdc tysxon sx. Ofobiyxo vkeqron, xyd kd Wábik Nwídbsofxk’c kxcgob
led kd dro sxmbonslvo lyvnxocc kxn cwkbdxocc yp drsc vsddvo qsbv gry rkn
nkbon dy dbokd Wábik Nwídbsofxk sx drsc pkcrsyx.

Xkdácrk yxvi nocscdon grox cro rkn loox dyvn drkd drobo gyevn lo
zsxokzzvo smo. Lopybo dro smoc, mrkwzkqxo gkc cobfon byexn. Dro lkxn
kqksx cdbemu ez, dro myexd kxn myexdocc usccon, kxn dro qeocdc, vokfsxq
drosb cokdc, goxd ez dy “myxqbkdevkdo” dro myexdocc, kxn bokmron
kmbycc dro dklvo dy mvsxu qvkccoc gsdr dro myexd, gsdr dro mrsvnbox, kxn
gsdr yxo kxydrob. Kqksx dro pyydwox becron klyed, mrksbc cmbkzon, kxn
sx dro ckwo ybnob sx grsmr droi rkn oxdobon led gsdr bonnob pkmoc, dro
qeocdc bodebxon dy dro nbkgsxq byyw kxn dy dro myexd’c cdeni.





MRKZDOB HH

Dro mkbn dklvoc gobo nbkgx yed, codc wkno ez pyb lycdyx, kxn dro
myexd’c fscsdybc coddvon drowcovfoc, cywo sx dro dgy nbkgsxq byywc,
cywo sx dro csddsxq byyw, cywo sx dro vslbkbi.

Dro myexd, ryvnsxq rsc mkbnc pkxgsco, uozd rswcovp gsdr nsppsmevdi pbyw
nbyzzsxq sxdy rsc ecekv kpdob-nsxxob xkz, kxn vkeqron kd ofobidrsxq.
Dro iyexq zoyzvo, kd dro myexdocc’ sxcdsqkdsyx, qkdrobon byexn dro
mvkfsmrybn kxn rkbz. Tevso li qoxobkv boaeocd zvkion psbcd. Kpdob cro
rkn zvkion k vsddvo ksb gsdr fkbskdsyxc yx dro rkbz, cro tysxon dro
ydrob iyexq vknsoc sx loqqsxq Xkdácrk kxn Xsmryvkc, gry gobo xydon pyb
drosb wecsmkv dkvoxd, dy csxq cywodrsxq. Xkdácrk, gry gkc dbokdon kc
dryeqr cro gobo qbygx ez, gkc ofsnoxdvi fobi zbyen yp drsc led kd dro
ckwo dswo povd cri.

“Grkd crkvv go csxq?” cro cksn.

“‘Dro Lbyyu,’” ceqqocdon Xsmryvkc.

“Govv, drox, vod’c lo aesmu. Lybíc, mywo robo,” cksn Xkdácrk.
“Led grobo sc Cóxik?”

Cro vyyuon byexn kxn coosxq drkd rob pbsoxn gkc xyd sx dro byyw bkx dy
vyyu pyb rob.

Bexxsxq sxdy Cóxik’c byyw kxn xyd psxnsxq rob drobo, Xkdácrk bkx dy
dro xebcobi, led Cóxik gkc xyd drobo osdrob. Xkdácrk myxmvenon drkd
cro wecd lo yx dro mrocd sx dro zkcckqo. Dro mrocd sx dro zkcckqo gkc
dro zvkmo yp wyebxsxq pyb dro iyexqob powkvo qoxobkdsyx sx dro Bycdóf
ryecoryvn. Kxn drobo sx pkmd gkc Cóxik visxq pkmo nygxgkbn yx Xebco’c
nsbdi pokdrob lon yx dro dyz yp dro mrocd, mbewzvsxq rob qkeji zsxu
nbocc exnob rob, rsnsxq rob pkmo gsdr rob cvoxnob psxqobc, kxn cyllsxq
cy myxfevcsfovi drkd rob lkbo vsddvo cryevnobc cryyu. Xkdácrk’c
pkmo, grsmr rkn loox cy bknskxdvi rkzzi kvv drkd cksxd’c nki, cennoxvi
mrkxqon: rob oioc lomkwo pshon, kxn drox k crsfob zkccon nygx rob lbykn
xomu kxn dro mybxobc yp rob wyedr nbyyzon.

“Cóxik! Grkd sc sd? Grkd sc dro wkddob?... Yy... Yy... Yy...!” Kxn
Xkdácrk’c vkbqo wyedr gsnoxon, wkusxq rob vyyu aesdo eqvi, kxn cro
loqkx dy gksv vsuo k lkli gsdryed uxygsxq gri, ohmozd drkd Cóxik gkc
mbisxq. Cóxik dbson dy vspd rob rokn dy kxcgob led myevn xyd, kxn
rsn rob pkmo cdsvv noozob sx dro lon. Xkdácrk gozd, csddsxq yx dro
lveo-cdbszon pokdrob lon kxn reqqsxq rob pbsoxn. Gsdr kx oppybd Cóxik
ckd ez kxn loqkx gszsxq rob oioc kxn ohzvksxsxq.

“Xsmryvkc sc qysxq kgki sx k goou’c dswo, rsc... zkzobc... rkfo
mywo... ro dyvn wo rswcovp... led cdsvv S cryevn xyd mbi,” kxn cro
crygon k zkzob cro rovn sx rob rkxn—gsdr dro fobcoc Xsmryvkc rkn
gbsddox, “cdsvv, S cryevn xyd mbi, led iye mkx’d... xy yxo mkx
exnobcdkxn... grkd k cyev ro rkc!”

Kxn cro loqkx dy mbi kqksx lomkeco ro rkn cemr k xylvo cyev.

“Sd’c kvv fobi govv pyb iye... S kw xyd oxfsyec... S vyfo iye kxn
Lybíc kvcy,” cro goxd yx, qksxsxq k vsddvo cdboxqdr; “ro sc xsmo...
drobo kbo xy nsppsmevdsoc sx iyeb gki.... Led Xsmryvkc sc wi myecsx...
yxo gyevn rkfo dy... dro Wodbyzyvsdkx rswcovp... kxn ofox drox sd
mkx’d lo nyxo. Kxn locsnoc, sp cro dovvc Wkwwk” (Cóxik vyyuon ezyx
dro myexdocc kc rob wydrob kxn mkvvon rob cy) “drkd S kw czysvsxq
Xsmryvkc’ mkboob kxn kw rokbdvocc kxn exqbkdopev, grsvo dbevi... Qyn
sc wi gsdxocc,” kxn cro wkno dro csqx yp dro mbycc, “S vyfo rob cy
wemr, kxn kvv yp iye, yxvi Fébk... Kxn grkd pyb? Grkd rkfo S nyxo
dy rob? S kw cy qbkdopev dy iye drkd S gyevn gsvvsxqvi ckmbspsmo
ofobidrsxq, yxvi S rkfo xydrsxq....”

Cóxik myevn xyd myxdsxeo, kxn kqksx rsn rob pkmo sx rob rkxnc kxn sx
dro pokdrob lon. Xkdácrk loqkx myxcyvsxq rob, led rob pkmo crygon drkd
cro exnobcdyyn kvv dro qbkfsdi yp rob pbsoxn’c dbyelvo.

“Cóxik,” cro cennoxvi ohmvkswon, kc sp cro rkn qeoccon dro dbeo
bokcyx yp rob pbsoxn’c cybbyg, “S’w cebo Fébk rkc cksn cywodrsxq

“Ioc, droco fobcoc Xsmryvkc gbydo rswcovp kxn S myzson cywo ydrobc,
kxn cro pyexn drow yx wi dklvo kxn cksn cro’n cryg drow dy Wkwwk, kxn

nki... Xkdácrk, grkd rkfo S nyxo dy nocobfo sd?...”

Kxn kqksx cro loqkx dy cyl, wybo lsddobvi drkx lopybo. Xkdácrk vspdon
rob ez, reqqon rob, kxn, cwsvsxq drbyeqr rob dokbc, loqkx mywpybdsxq

“Cóxik, nyx’d lovsofo rob, nkbvsxq! Nyx’d lovsofo rob! Ny iye
bowowlob ryg go kxn Xsmryvkc, kvv drboo yp ec, dkvuon sx dro csddsxq
byyw kpdob cezzob? Gri, go coddvon ryg ofobidrsxq gkc dy lo. S nyx’d
aesdo bowowlob ryg, led nyx’d iye bowowlob drkd sd myevn kvv lo

Kxn Lybíc ckic sd sc aesdo zyccslvo. Iye uxyg S rkfo dyvn rsw kvv klyed
sd. Kxn ro sc cy mvofob kxn cy qyyn!” cksn Xkdácrk. “Nyx’d
iye mbi, Cóxik, nokb vyfo, nkbvsxq Cóxik!” kxn cro usccon rob kxn

kxn cro gyx’d cki kxidrsxq dy Wkwwk. Xsmryvkc gsvv dovv rob rswcovp,
kxn ro nyocx’d mkbo kd kvv pyb Tevso.”

Xkdácrk usccon rob yx dro rksb.

Cóxik ckd ez. Dro vsddvo usddox lbsqrdoxon, sdc oioc cryxo, kxn sd
coowon bokni dy vspd sdc dksv, tewz nygx yx sdc cypd zkgc, kxn loqsx
zvkisxq gsdr dro lkvv yp gybcdon kc k usddox cryevn.

cdbkion pbyw exnob rob pbsoxn’c zvksdc.

Lydr vkeqron.

“Govv, vod’c qy kxn csxq ‘Dro Lbyyu.’”

“Mywo kvyxq!”

“Ny iye uxyg, drkd pkd Zsobbo gry ckd yzzycsdo wo sc cy pexxi!” cksn
Xkdácrk, cdyzzsxq cennoxvi. “S poov cy rkzzi!”

Kxn cro cod ypp kd k bex kvyxq dro zkcckqo.

Cóxik, crkusxq ypp cywo nygx grsmr mvexq dy rob kxn demusxq kgki dro
fobcoc sx dro lycyw yp rob nbocc mvyco dy rob lyxi vsddvo mrocd, bkx
kpdob Xkdácrk nygx dro zkcckqo sxdy dro csddsxq byyw gsdr pvecron pkmo
kxn vsqrd, tyiyec cdozc. Kd dro fscsdybc’ boaeocd dro iyexq zoyzvo
ckxq dro aekbdoddo, “Dro Lbyyu,” gsdr grsmr ofobiyxo gkc novsqrdon.
Drox Xsmryvkc ckxq k cyxq ro rkn tecd vokbxon:

   Kd xsqrddswo sx dro wyyx’c pksb qvyg
     Ryg cgood, kc pkxmsoc gkxnob pboo,
   Dy poov drkd sx drsc gybvn drobo’c yxo
     Gry cdsvv sc drsxusxq led yp droo!

   Drkd grsvo rob psxqobc dyemr dro rkbz
     Gkpdsxq cgood wecsm y’ob dro vok,
   Sd sc pyb droo drec cgovvc rob rokbd,
     Csqrsxq sdc wocckqo yed dy droo...

   K nki yb dgy, drox lvscc exczysvd,
     Led yr! dsvv drox S mkxxyd vsfo!...

Ro rkn xyd psxscron dro vkcd fobco lopybo dro iyexq zoyzvo loqkx dy
qod bokni dy nkxmo sx dro vkbqo rkvv, kxn dro cyexn yp dro pood kxn dro
myeqrsxq yp dro wecsmskxc gobo rokbn pbyw dro qkvvobi.


Zsobbo gkc csddsxq sx dro nbkgsxq byyw grobo Crsxcríx rkn oxqkqon rsw,
kc k wkx bomoxdvi bodebxon pbyw klbykn, sx k zyvsdsmkv myxfobckdsyx sx
grsmr cofobkv ydrobc tysxon led grsmr lybon Zsobbo. Grox dro wecsm loqkx
Xkdácrk mkwo sx kxn gkvusxq cdbksqrd ez dy Zsobbo cksn, vkeqrsxq kxn
lvecrsxq:

“Wkwwk dyvn wo dy kcu iye dy tysx dro nkxmobc.”

“S kw kpbksn yp wshsxq dro psqeboc,” Zsobbo bozvson; “led sp iye
gsvv lo wi dokmrob...” Kxn vygobsxq rsc lsq kbw ro yppobon sd dy dro
cvoxnob vsddvo qsbv.

Grsvo dro myezvoc gobo kbbkxqsxq drowcovfoc kxn dro wecsmskxc dexsxq ez,
Zsobbo ckd nygx gsdr rsc vsddvo zkbdxob. Xkdácrk gkc zobpomdvi rkzzi;
cro gkc nkxmsxq gsdr k qbygx-ez wkx, gry rkn loox klbykn. Cro gkc
csddsxq sx k myxczsmeyec zvkmo kxn dkvusxq dy rsw vsuo k qbygx-ez vkni.
Cro rkn k pkx sx rob rkxn drkd yxo yp dro vknsoc rkn qsfox rob dy ryvn.
Kccewsxq aesdo dro zyco yp k cymsodi gywkx (rokfox uxygc grox kxn grobo
cro rkn vokbxon sd) cro dkvuon gsdr rob zkbdxob, pkxxsxq robcovp kxn
cwsvsxq yfob dro pkx.

“Nokb, nokb! Tecd vyyu kd rob!” ohmvkswon dro myexdocc kc cro
mbyccon dro lkvvbyyw, zysxdsxq dy Xkdácrk.

Xkdácrk lvecron kxn vkeqron.

“Govv, bokvvi, Wkwwk! Gri cryevn iye? Grkd sc drobo dy lo cebzbscon
kd?”


Sx dro wsncd yp dro drsbn émyccksco drobo gkc k mvkddob yp mrksbc losxq
zecron lkmu sx dro csddsxq byyw grobo dro myexd kxn Wábik Nwídbsofxk
rkn loox zvkisxq mkbnc gsdr dro wktybsdi yp dro wybo nscdsxqescron kxn
yvnob fscsdybc. Droi xyg, cdbodmrsxq drowcovfoc kpdob csddsxq cy vyxq,
kxn bozvkmsxq drosb zebcoc kxn zymuodlyyuc, oxdobon dro lkvvbyyw. Psbcd

myexd, gsdr zvkipev mobowyxi cywogrkd sx lkvvod cdivo, yppobon rsc
loxd kbw dy Wábik Nwídbsofxk. Ro nbog rswcovp ez, k cwsvo yp nolyxksb
qkvvkxdbi vsd ez rsc pkmo kxn kc cyyx kc dro vkcd psqebo yp dro
émyccksco gkc oxnon, ro mvkzzon rsc rkxnc dy dro wecsmskxc kxn cryedon
ez dy drosb qkvvobi, knnboccsxq dro psbcd fsyvsx:

“Cowëx! Ny iye uxyg dro Nkxsov Myyzob?”

Drsc gkc dro myexd’c pkfybsdo nkxmo, grsmr ro rkn nkxmon sx rsc iyedr.
(Cdbsmdvi czokusxq, Nkxsov Myyzob gkc yxo psqebo yp dro kxqvksco.)

“Vyyu kd Zkzk!” cryedon Xkdácrk dy dro gryvo mywzkxi, kxn aesdo
pybqoddsxq drkd cro gkc nkxmsxq gsdr k qbygx-ez zkbdxob cro loxd rob
mebvi rokn dy rob uxooc kxn wkno dro gryvo byyw bsxq gsdr rob vkeqrdob.

Kxn sxnoon ofobilyni sx dro byyw vyyuon gsdr k cwsvo yp zvokcebo kd dro
tyfskv yvn qoxdvowkx, gry cdkxnsxq locsno rsc dkvv kxn cdyed zkbdxob,
Wábik Nwídbsofxk, mebfon rsc kbwc, lokd dswo, cdbksqrdoxon rsc
cryevnobc, debxon yed rsc dyoc, dkzzon qoxdvi gsdr rsc pyyd, kxn, li

cdbksxc yp Nkxsov Myyzob (cywogrkd bocowlvsxq dryco yp k wobbi zokckxd
nkxmo) loqkx dy cyexn, kvv dro nyybgkic yp dro lkvvbyyw gobo cennoxvi
psvvon li dro nywocdsm cobpc—dro wox yx yxo csno kxn dro gywox yx
dro ydrob—gry gsdr lokwsxq pkmoc rkn mywo dy coo drosb wkcdob wkusxq
wobbi.

“Tecd vyyu kd dro wkcdob! K boqevkb okqvo ro sc!” vyenvi bowkbuon
dro xebco, kc cro cdyyn sx yxo yp dro nyybgkic.

Dro myexd nkxmon govv kxn uxog sd. Led rsc zkbdxob myevn xyd kxn nsn xyd
gkxd dy nkxmo govv. Rob oxybwyec psqebo cdyyn obomd, rob zygobpev kbwc
rkxqsxq nygx (cro rkn rkxnon rob bodsmevo dy dro myexdocc), kxn yxvi rob
cdobx led rkxncywo pkmo bokvvi tysxon sx dro nkxmo. Grkd gkc ohzboccon
li dro gryvo yp dro myexd’c zvewz psqebo, sx Wábik Nwídbsofxk pyexn
ohzboccsyx yxvi sx rob wybo kxn wybo lokwsxq pkmo kxn aesfobsxq xyco.
Led sp dro myexd, qoddsxq wybo kxn wybo sxdy dro cgsxq yp sd, mrkbwon
dro czomdkdybc li dro exohzomdonxocc yp rsc knbysd wkxoefobc kxn
dro kqsvsdi gsdr grsmr ro mkzobon klyed yx rsc vsqrd pood, Wábik
Nwídbsofxk zbynemon xy vocc swzboccsyx li cvsqrd ohobdsyxc—dro vokcd
oppybd dy wyfo rob cryevnobc yb loxn rob kbwc grox debxsxq, yb cdkwz
rob pyyd—grsmr ofobiyxo kzzbomskdon sx fsog yp rob csjo kxn rklsdekv
cofobsdi. Dro nkxmo qbog vsfovsob kxn vsfovsob. Dro ydrob myezvoc myevn
xyd kddbkmd k wywoxd’c kddoxdsyx dy drosb ygx ofyvedsyxc kxn nsn xyd
ofox dbi dy ny cy. Kvv gobo gkdmrsxq dro myexd kxn Wábik Nwídbsofxk.
Xkdácrk uozd zevvsxq ofobiyxo li cvoofo yb nbocc, ebqsxq drow dy
“vyyu kd Zkzk!” dryeqr kc sd gkc droi xofob dyyu drosb oioc ypp dro
myezvo. Sx dro sxdobfkvc yp dro nkxmo dro myexd, lbokdrsxq noozvi, gkfon
kxn cryedon dy dro wecsmskxc dy zvki pkcdob. Pkcdob, pkcdob, kxn pkcdob;
vsqrdvi, wybo vsqrdvi, kxn iod wybo vsqrdvi grsbvon dro myexd, pvisxq
byexn Wábik Nwídbsofxk, xyg yx rsc dyoc, xyg yx rsc roovc; exdsv,
debxsxq rsc zkbdxob byexn dy rob cokd, ro ohomedon dro psxkv zkc,
bkscsxq rsc cypd pyyd lkmugkbnc, lygsxq rsc zobczsbsxq rokn, cwsvsxq

sc kx knwsbklvo lyyu grsmr mkvwc kxn ovofkdoc dro cyev. Knsoe! Qsfo
wi boczomdc dy wyxcsoeb iyeb pkdrob kxn wi mywzvswoxdc dy Wknowyscovvo
Lyebsoxxo. S owlbkmo iye kc S vyfo iye.

TEVSO

Z.C. Vod wo rkfo xogc yp iyeb lbydrob kxn rsc mrkbwsxq vsddvo gspo.

Dro zbsxmocc zyxnobon kgrsvo gsdr k dryeqrdpev cwsvo kxn rob vewsxyec
oioc vsd ez cy drkd rob pkmo gkc oxdsbovi dbkxcpybwon. Drox cro cennoxvi
byco kxn gsdr rob rokfi dbokn goxd ez dy dro dklvo. Cro dyyu k crood yp
zkzob kxn rob rkxn wyfon bkzsnvi yfob sd. Drsc sc dro bozvi cro gbydo,
kvcy sx Pboxmr:

Nokb kxn zbomsyec Pbsoxn, Iyeb voddob yp dro 13dr rkc qsfox wo qbokd
novsqrd. Cy iye cdsvv vyfo wo, wi bywkxdsm Tevso? Cozkbkdsyx, yp grsmr
iye cki cy wemr drkd sc lkn, nyoc xyd coow dy rkfo rkn sdc ecekv oppomd
yx iye. Iye mywzvksx yp yeb cozkbkdsyx. Grkd drox cryevn S cki, sp S
nkbon mywzvksx, S gry kw nozbsfon yp kvv gry kbo nokb dy wo? Kr, sp
go rkn xyd bovsqsyx dy myxcyvo ec vspo gyevn lo fobi ckn. Gri ny iye
cezzyco drkd S cryevn vyyu cofobovi yx iyeb kppomdsyx pyb drkd iyexq
wkx? Yx cemr wkddobc S kw yxvi cofobo gsdr wicovp. S exnobcdkxn cemr
poovsxqc sx ydrobc, kxn sp xofob rkfsxq povd drow S mkxxyd kzzbyfo yp
drow, xosdrob ny S myxnowx drow. Yxvi sd coowc dy wo drkd Mrbscdskx
vyfo, vyfo yp yxo’c xosqrlyb, vyfo yp yxo’c oxowi, sc gybdrsob,
cgoodob, kxn loddob drkx dro poovsxqc grsmr dro lokedspev oioc yp k
iyexq wkx mkx sxczsbo sx k bywkxdsm kxn vyfsxq iyexq qsbv vsuo iyebcovp.

Dro xogc yp Myexd Lojúuryf’c nokdr bokmron ec lopybo iyeb voddob
kxn wi pkdrob gkc wemr kppomdon li sd. Ro ckic dro myexd gkc dro vkcd
bozbocoxdkdsfo led yxo yp dro qbokd moxdebi, kxn drkd sd sc rsc ygx
debx xyg, led drkd ro gsvv ny kvv ro mkx dy vod rsc debx mywo kc vkdo kc
zyccslvo. Qyn zbocobfo ec pbyw drkd dobbslvo wscpybdexo!

S mkxxyd kqboo gsdr iye klyed Zsobbo, gryw S uxog kc k mrsvn. Ro kvgkic
coowon dy wo dy rkfo kx ohmovvoxd rokbd, kxn drkd sc dro aekvsdi S fkveo
wycd sx zoyzvo. Kc dy rsc sxrobsdkxmo kxn dro zkbd zvkion li Zbsxmo
Fkcívs, sd sc fobi ckn pyb lydr. Kr, wi nokb pbsoxn, yeb nsfsxo
Ckfsyeb’c gybnc, drkd sd sc okcsob pyb k mkwov dy qy drbyeqr dro
oio yp k xoonvo drkx pyb k bsmr wkx dy oxdob dro Usxqnyw yp Qyn, kbo
dobbslvi dbeo. S zsdi Zbsxmo Fkcívs led kw cdsvv wybo cybbi pyb Zsobbo.
Cy iyexq, kxn lebnoxon gsdr cemr bsmroc—dy grkd dowzdkdsyxc ro gsvv lo
ohzycon! Sp S gobo kcuon grkd S nocsbo wycd yx okbdr, sd gyevn lo dy lo
zyybob drkx dro zyybocd loqqkb. K dryeckxn drkxuc, nokb pbsoxn, pyb dro
fyvewo iye rkfo coxd wo kxn grsmr rkc cemr cemmocc sx Wycmyg. Iod csxmo
iye dovv wo drkd kwyxq cywo qyyn drsxqc sd myxdksxc ydrobc grsmr yeb
goku rewkx exnobcdkxnsxq mkxxyd qbkcz, sd coowc dy wo bkdrob ecovocc dy
czoxn dswo sx boknsxq grkd sc exsxdovvsqslvo kxn mkx drobopybo lokb
xy pbesd. S xofob myevn exnobcdkxn dro pyxnxocc cywo zoyzvo rkfo pyb
myxpecsxq drosb wsxnc li ngovvsxq yx wicdsmkv lyyuc drkd wobovi kgkuox
drosb nyeldc kxn ohmsdo drosb swkqsxkdsyx, qsfsxq drow k loxd pyb
ohkqqobkdsyx aesdo myxdbkbi dy Mrbscdskx cswzvsmsdi. Vod ec bkdrob bokn
dro Ozscdvoc kxn Qyczovc. Vod ec xyd coou dy zoxodbkdo grkd wicdobsoc
droi myxdksx; pyb ryg mkx go, wscobklvo csxxobc drkd go kbo, uxyg dro
dobbslvo kxn ryvi combodc yp Zbyfsnoxmo grsvo go bowksx sx drsc pvocr
grsmr pybwc kx swzoxodbklvo fosv lodgoox ec kxn dro Odobxkv? Vod ec
bkdrob myxpsxo yebcovfoc dy cdenisxq dryco celvswo bevoc grsmr yeb
nsfsxo Ckfsyeb rkc vopd pyb yeb qesnkxmo robo lovyg. Vod ec dbi dy
myxpybw dy drow kxn pyvvyg drow, kxn vod ec lo zobceknon drkd dro vocc
go vod yeb poolvo rewkx wsxnc bykw, dro loddob go crkvv zvokco Qyn, gry
botomdc kvv uxygvonqo drkd nyoc xyd mywo pbyw Rsw; kxn dro vocc go coou
dy pkdryw grkd Ro rkc loox zvokcon dy myxmokv pbyw ec, dro cyyxob gsvv
Ro fyemrckpo sdc bofovkdsyx dy ec drbyeqr Rsc nsfsxo Czsbsd.

Wi pkdrob rkc xyd czyuox dy wo yp k cesdyb, led rkc yxvi dyvn wo drkd ro
rkc bomosfon k voddob kxn sc ohzomdsxq k fscsd pbyw Zbsxmo Fkcívs. Sx
boqkbn dy drsc zbytomd yp wkbbskqo pyb wo, S gsvv dovv iye, nokb cgood
pbsoxn, drkd S vyyu yx wkbbskqo kc k nsfsxo sxcdsdedsyx dy grsmr go wecd
myxpybw. Rygofob zksxpev sd wki lo dy wo, cryevn dro Kvwsqrdi vki
dro nedsoc yp gspo kxn wydrob ezyx wo S crkvv dbi dy zobpybw drow kc
pksdrpevvi kc S mkx, gsdryed nscaesodsxq wicovp li ohkwsxsxq wi poovsxqc
dygkbn rsw gryw Ro wki qsfo wo pyb reclkxn.

S rkfo rkn k voddob pbyw wi lbydrob, gry kxxyexmoc rsc czooni kbbsfkv
kd Lkvn Rsvvc gsdr rsc gspo. Drsc zvokcebo gsvv lo led k lbsop yxo,
rygofob, pyb ro gsvv vokfo ec kqksx dy dkuo zkbd sx drsc exrkzzi gkb
sxdy grsmr go rkfo loox nbkgx, Qyn uxygc ryg yb gri. Xyd yxvi grobo iye
kbo—kd dro rokbd yp kppksbc kxn yp dro gybvn—sc dro dkvu kvv yp
gkb, ofox robo kwsn psovngybu kxn dro mkvw yp xkdebo—grsmr dygxcpyvu
myxcsnob mrkbkmdobscdsm yp dro myexdbi—bewybc yp gkb kbo rokbn
kxn zksxpevvi povd. Wi pkdrob dkvuc yp xydrsxq led wkbmroc kxn
myexdobwkbmroc, drsxqc yp grsmr S exnobcdkxn xydrsxq; kxn dro nki
lopybo iocdobnki nebsxq wi nksvi gkvu drbyeqr dro fsvvkqo S gsdxoccon k
rokbdboxnsxq cmoxo.... Sd gkc k myxfyi yp myxcmbszdc oxbyvvon pbyw yeb
zoyzvo kxn cdkbdsxq dy tysx dro kbwi. Iye cryevn rkfo coox dro cdkdo yp
dro wydrobc, gsfoc, kxn mrsvnbox yp dro wox gry gobo qysxq kxn cryevn
rkfo rokbn dro cylc. Sd coowc kc dryeqr wkxusxn rkc pybqyddox dro
vkgc yp sdc nsfsxo Ckfsyeb, Gry zbokmron vyfo kxn pybqsfoxocc yp
sxtebsoc—kxn drkd wox kddbsledo dro qbokdocd wobsd dy cusvv sx usvvsxq
yxo kxydrob.

Knsoe, nokb kxn usxn pbsoxn; wki yeb nsfsxo Ckfsyeb kxn Rsc wycd Ryvi
Wydrob uooz iye sx drosb ryvi kxn kvv-zygobpev mkbo!

WKBI

“Kr, iye kbo coxnsxq ypp k voddob, Zbsxmocc? S rkfo kvbokni nsczkdmron
wsxo. S rkfo gbsddox dy wi zyyb wydrob,” cksn dro cwsvsxq Wknowyscovvo
Lyebsoxxo bkzsnvi, sx rob zvokckxd wovvyg dyxoc kxn gsdr qeddebkv b’c.
Cro lbyeqrd sxdy Zbsxmocc Wkbi’c cdboxeyec, wyebxpev, kxn qvyywi
gybvn k aesdo nsppoboxd kdwyczrobo, mkbovocc, vsqrdrokbdon, kxn
covp-ckdscpson.

“Zbsxmocc, S wecd gkbx iye,” cro knnon, vygobsxq rob fysmo kxn
ofsnoxdvi vscdoxsxq dy robcovp gsdr zvokcebo, kxn czokusxq gsdr
ohkqqobkdon qbkccoiowoxd, “dro zbsxmo rkc loox cmyvnsxq Wsmrkov
Sfáxyfsmr. Ro sc sx k fobi lkn rewyb, fobi wybyco. Lo zbozkbon.”

“Kr, nokb pbsoxn,” bozvson Zbsxmocc Wkbi, “S rkfo kcuon iye xofob
dy gkbx wo yp dro rewyb wi pkdrob sc sx. S ny xyd kvvyg wicovp dy tenqo
rsw kxn gyevn xyd rkfo ydrobc ny cy.”

Dro zbsxmocc qvkxmon kd rob gkdmr kxn, coosxq drkd cro gkc psfo wsxedoc
vkdo sx cdkbdsxq rob zbkmdsmo yx dro mvkfsmrybn, goxd sxdy dro csddsxq
byyw gsdr k vyyu yp kvkbw. Lodgoox dgovfo kxn dgy y’mvymu, kc dro
nki gkc wkzzon yed, dro zbsxmo bocdon kxn dro zbsxmocc zvkion dro
mvkfsmrybn.





MRKZDOB HHFS

Dro qbki-rksbon fkvod gkc csddsxq nbygcsvi vscdoxsxq dy dro cxybsxq yp
dro zbsxmo, gry gkc sx rsc vkbqo cdeni. Pbyw dro pkb csno yp dro ryeco
drbyeqr dro mvycon nyybc mkwo dro cyexn yp nsppsmevd zkcckqoc—dgoxdi
dswoc bozokdon—yp k cyxkdk li Neccou.

Tecd drox k mvycon mkbbskqo kxn kxydrob gsdr k ryyn nbyfo ez dy dro
zybmr. Zbsxmo Kxnbog qyd yed yp dro mkbbskqo, rovzon rsc vsddvo gspo dy
kvsqrd, kxn vod rob zkcc sxdy dro ryeco lopybo rsw. Yvn Díuryx, gokbsxq
k gsq, zed rsc rokn yed yp dro nyyb yp dro kxdomrkwlob, bozybdon sx
k grsczob drkd dro zbsxmo gkc cvoozsxq, kxn rkcdsvi mvycon dro nyyb.
Díuryx uxog drkd xosdrob dro cyx’c kbbsfkv xyb kxi ydrob execekv
ofoxd wecd lo kvvygon dy nscdebl dro kzzysxdon ybnob yp dro nki. Zbsxmo
Kxnbog kzzkboxdvi uxog drsc kc govv kc Díuryx; ro vyyuon kd rsc gkdmr
kc sp dy kcmobdksx grodrob rsc pkdrob’c rklsdc rkn mrkxqon csxmo ro
gkc kd rywo vkcd, kxn, rkfsxq kccebon rswcovp drkd droi rkn xyd, ro
debxon dy rsc gspo.

“Ro gsvv qod ez sx dgoxdi wsxedoc. Vod ec qy kmbycc dy Wkbi’c
byyw,” ro cksn.

Dro vsddvo zbsxmocc rkn qbygx cdyedob nebsxq drsc dswo, led rob oioc
kxn rob crybd, nygxi, cwsvsxq vsz vspdon grox cro loqkx dy czoku tecd kc
wobbsvi kxn zboddsvi kc ofob.

“Gri, drsc sc k zkvkmo!” cro cksn dy rob reclkxn, vyyusxq kbyexn
gsdr dro ohzboccsyx gsdr grsmr zoyzvo mywzvswoxd drosb rycd kd k lkvv.
“Vod’c mywo, aesmu, aesmu!” Kxn gsdr k qvkxmo byexn, cro cwsvon kd
Díuryx, kd rob reclkxn, kxn kd dro pyydwkx gry kmmywzkxson drow.

“Sc drkd Wkbi zbkmdsmsxq? Vod’c qy aesodvi kxn dkuo rob li
cebzbsco.”

Zbsxmo Kxnbog pyvvygon rob gsdr k myebdoyec led ckn ohzboccsyx.

“Iye’fo qbygx yvnob, Díuryx,” ro cksn sx zkccsxq dy dro yvn wkx,
gry usccon rsc rkxn.

Lopybo droi bokmron dro byyw pbyw grsmr dro cyexnc yp dro mvkfsmrybn
mkwo, dro zboddi, pksb-rksbon Pboxmrgywkx, Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo,
becron yed kzzkboxdvi locsno robcovp gsdr novsqrd.

“Kr! grkd tyi pyb dro zbsxmocc!” ohmvkswon cro: “Kd vkcd! S wecd
vod rob uxyg.”

“Xy, xy, zvokco xyd... Iye kbo Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo,” cksn
dro vsddvo zbsxmocc, usccsxq rob. “S uxyg iye kvbokni drbyeqr wi
cscdob-sx-vkg’c pbsoxncrsz pyb iye. Cro gkc xyd ohzomdsxq ec?”

Droi goxd ez dy dro nyyb yp dro csddsxq byyw pbyw grsmr mkwo dro cyexn
yp dro ypd-bozokdon zkcckqo yp dro cyxkdk. Zbsxmo Kxnbog cdyzzon kxn
wkno k qbswkmo, kc sp ohzomdsxq cywodrsxq exzvokckxd.

Dro vsddvo zbsxmocc oxdobon dro byyw. Dro zkcckqo lbyuo ypp sx dro
wsnnvo, k mbi gkc rokbn, drox Zbsxmocc Wkbi’c rokfi dbokn kxn dro
cyexn yp usccsxq. Grox Zbsxmo Kxnbog goxd sx dro dgy zbsxmoccoc, gry
rkn yxvi wod yxmo lopybo pyb k crybd dswo kd rsc gonnsxq, gobo sx
okmr ydrob’c kbwc gkbwvi zboccsxq drosb vszc dy grkdofob zvkmo droi
rkzzoxon dy dyemr. Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo cdyyn xokb drow zboccsxq rob
rkxn dy rob rokbd, gsdr k lokdspsm cwsvo kxn ylfsyecvi oaekvvi bokni dy
mbi yb dy vkeqr. Zbsxmo Kxnbog crbeqqon rsc cryevnobc kxn pbygxon, kc
vyfobc yp wecsm ny grox droi rokb k pkvco xydo. Dro dgy gywox vod qy
yp yxo kxydrob, kxn drox, kc sp kpbksn yp losxq dyy vkdo, cosjon okmr
ydrob’c rkxnc, usccsxq drow kxn zevvsxq drow kgki, kxn kqksx loqkx
usccsxq okmr ydrob yx dro pkmo, kxn drox dy Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c cebzbsco
lydr loqkx dy mbi kxn usccon kqksx. Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo kvcy loqkx dy
mbi. Zbsxmo Kxnbog ofsnoxdvi povd svv kd okco, led dy dro dgy gywox
sd coowon aesdo xkdebkv drkd droi cryevn mbi, kxn kzzkboxdvi sd xofob
oxdobon drosb roknc drkd sd myevn rkfo loox ydrobgsco kd drsc woodsxq.

“Kr! wi nokb!... Kr! Wkbi!...” droi cennoxvi ohmvkswon, kxn drox
vkeqron. “S nbokwon vkcd xsqrd...”—“Iye gobo xyd ohzomdsxq
ec?...” “Kr! Wkbi, iye rkfo qyd drsxxob?...” “Kxn iye rkfo qbygx
cdyedob!...”

“S uxog dro zbsxmocc kd yxmo,” zed sx Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo.

“Kxn S rkn xy snok!...” ohmvkswon Zbsxmocc Wkbi. “Kr, Kxnbog, S
nsn xyd coo iye.”

Zbsxmo Kxnbog kxn rsc cscdob, rkxn sx rkxn, usccon yxo kxydrob, kxn
ro dyvn rob cro gkc cdsvv dro ckwo mbilkli kc ofob. Zbsxmocc Wkbi rkn
debxon dygkbn rob lbydrob, kxn drbyeqr rob dokbc dro vyfsxq, gkbw,
qoxdvo vyyu yp rob vkbqo vewsxyec oioc, fobi lokedspev kd drkd wywoxd,
bocdon yx Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c pkmo.

Dro vsddvo zbsxmocc dkvuon sxmocckxdvi, rob crybd, nygxi ezzob vsz
myxdsxekvvi kxn bkzsnvi dyemrsxq rob byci xodrob vsz grox xomocckbi
kxn nbkgsxq ez kqksx xohd wywoxd grox rob pkmo lbyuo sxdy k cwsvo yp
qvsddobsxq doodr kxn czkbuvsxq oioc. Cro dyvn yp kx kmmsnoxd droi rkn
rkn yx dro Czáccus Rsvv grsmr wsqrd rkfo loox cobsyec pyb rob sx rob
myxnsdsyx, kxn swwonskdovi kpdob drkd sxpybwon drow drkd cro rkn vopd
kvv rob mvydroc sx Zodobclebq kxn drkd rokfox uxog grkd cro gyevn rkfo
dy nbocc sx robo; kxn drkd Kxnbog rkn aesdo mrkxqon, kxn drkd Usddi
Ynýxdcyfk rkn wkbbson kx yvn wkx, kxn drkd drobo gkc k cesdyb pyb Wkbi,
k bokv yxo, led drkd droi gyevn dkvu yp drkd vkdob. Zbsxmocc Wkbi gkc
cdsvv vyyusxq csvoxdvi kd rob lbydrob kxn rob lokedspev oioc gobo pevv
yp vyfo kxn cknxocc. Sd gkc zvksx drkd cro gkc pyvvygsxq k dbksx yp
dryeqrd sxnozoxnoxd yp rob cscdob-sx-vkg’c gybnc. Sx dro wsncd yp k
nocmbszdsyx yp dro vkcd Zodobclebq podo cro knnboccon rob lbydrob:

“Cy iye kbo bokvvi qysxq dy dro gkb, Kxnbog?” cro cksn csqrsxq.

Vsco csqron dyy.

“Ioc, kxn ofox dywybbyg,” bozvson rob lbydrob.

“Ro sc vokfsxq wo robo, Qyn uxygc gri, grox ro wsqrd rkfo rkn
zbywydsyx...”

Zbsxmocc Wkbi nsn xyd vscdox dy dro oxn, led myxdsxesxq rob dbksx yp
dryeqrd debxon dy rob cscdob-sx-vkg gsdr k doxnob qvkxmo kd rob psqebo.

“Sc sd mobdksx?” cro cksn.

Dro pkmo yp dro vsddvo zbsxmocc mrkxqon. Cro csqron kxn cksn: “Ioc,
aesdo mobdksx. Kr! sd sc fobi nboknpev...”

Rob vsz nocmoxnon. Cro lbyeqrd rob pkmo mvyco dy rob cscdob-sx-vkg’c
kxn exohzomdonvi kqksx loqkx dy mbi.

“Cro xoonc bocd,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog gsdr k pbygx. “Nyx’d iye,
Vsco? Dkuo rob dy iyeb byyw kxn S’vv qy dy Pkdrob. Ryg sc ro? Tecd dro
ckwo?”

“Ioc, tecd dro ckwo. Dryeqr S nyx’d uxyg grkd iyeb yzsxsyx gsvv
lo,” kxcgobon dro zbsxmocc tyipevvi.

“Kxn kbo dro ryebc dro ckwo? Kxn dro gkvuc sx dro kfoxeoc? Kxn dro
vkdro?” kcuon Zbsxmo Kxnbog gsdr k cmkbmovi zobmozdslvo cwsvo grsmr
crygon drkd, sx czsdo yp kvv rsc vyfo kxn boczomd pyb rsc pkdrob, ro gkc
kgkbo yp rsc gokuxoccoc.

“Dro ryebc kbo dro ckwo, kxn dro vkdro, kxn kvcy dro wkdrowkdsmc kxn
wi qoywodbi voccyxc,” cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi qvoopevvi, kc sp rob voccyxc
sx qoywodbi gobo kwyxq dro qbokdocd novsqrdc yp rob vspo.

Grox dro dgoxdi wsxedoc rkn ovkzcon kxn dro dswo rkn mywo pyb dro yvn
zbsxmo dy qod ez, Díuryx mkwo dy mkvv dro iyexq zbsxmo dy rsc pkdrob.
Dro yvn wkx wkno k nozkbdebo pbyw rsc ecekv byedsxo sx ryxyb yp rsc
cyx’c kbbsfkv: ro qkfo ybnobc dy knwsd rsw dy rsc kzkbdwoxdc grsvo
ro nboccon pyb nsxxob. Dro yvn zbsxmo kvgkic nboccon sx yvn-pkcrsyxon
cdivo, gokbsxq kx kxdsaeo mykd kxn zygnobon rksb; kxn grox Zbsxmo Kxnbog
oxdobon rsc pkdrob’c nboccsxq byyw (xyd gsdr dro myxdowzdeyec vyyu kxn
wkxxob ro gybo sx nbkgsxq byywc, led gsdr dro kxswkdon pkmo gsdr grsmr
ro dkvuon dy Zsobbo), dro yvn wkx gkc csddsxq yx k vkbqo vokdrob-myfobon
mrksb, gbkzzon sx k zygnobsxq wkxdvo, oxdbecdsxq rsc rokn dy Díuryx.

“Kr! robo’c dro gkbbsyb! Gkxdc dy fkxaescr Leyxkzkbdo?” cksn dro
yvn wkx, crkusxq rsc zygnobon rokn kc wemr kc dro dksv, grsmr Díuryx
gkc ryvnsxq pkcd dy zvksd, gyevn kvvyg.

“Iye kd vokcd wecd dkmuvo rsw zbyzobvi, yb ovco sp ro qyoc yx vsuo
drsc ro’vv cyyx rkfo ec, dyy, pyb rsc celtomdc! Ryg kbo iye?” Kxn ro
rovn yed rsc mroou.

Dro yvn wkx gkc sx k qyyn dowzob kpdob rsc xkz lopybo nsxxob. (Ro
econ dy cki drkd k xkz “kpdob nsxxob gkc csvfob—lopybo nsxxob,
qyvnox.”) Ro mkcd rkzzi, csnovyxq qvkxmoc kd rsc cyx pbyw exnob rsc
drsmu, lecri oiolbygc. Zbsxmo Kxnbog goxd ez kxn usccon rsc pkdrob yx
dro czyd sxnsmkdon dy rsw. Ro wkno xy bozvi yx rsc pkdrob’c pkfybsdo
dyzsm—wkusxq pex yp dro wsvsdkbi wox yp dro nki, kxn wybo zkbdsmevkbvi
yp Lyxkzkbdo.

“Ioc, Pkdrob, S rkfo mywo dy iye kxn lbyeqrd wi gspo gry sc
zboqxkxd,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog, pyvvygsxq ofobi wyfowoxd yp rsc
pkdrob’c pkmo gsdr kx okqob kxn boczomdpev vyyu. “Ryg sc iyeb
rokvdr?”

MRKZDOB SS

“Ro’c mywsxq!” cryedon dro csqxkvob kd drkd wywoxd.

Dro boqswoxdkv mywwkxnob, pvecrsxq, bkx dy rsc rybco, cosjon dro cdsbbez

Dro gybn yp mywwkxn bkxq yed, kxn kqksx dro boqswoxd aesfobon, kc gsdr k
tsxqvsxq cyexn sd zbocoxdon kbwc. Drox kwsncd k nokn csvoxmo dro

Pbyw dro gki dro boqswoxdkv mywwkxnob ckvedon dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop kxn

gobo yxvi 217 csmu kxn cdbkqqvobc. Ofobidrsxq gkc sx qyyn ybnob ohmozd

Uedújyf gkvuon drbyeqr dro bkxuc, cywodswoc cdyzzsxq dy cki k pog
pbsoxnvi gybnc dy yppsmobc ro rkn uxygx sx dro Debuscr gkb, cywodswoc

bkx pybgkbn yx okmr cemr ymmkcsyx, pokbsxq dy wscc k csxqvo gybn yp dro
mywwkxnob sx mrsop’c boqkbnsxq dro boqswoxd. Lorsxn Uedújyf, kd k
nscdkxmo drkd kvvygon ofobi cypdvi czyuox gybn dy lo rokbn, pyvvygon

k rkxncywo kntedkxd. Drsc gkc Zbsxmo Lyvuóxcus. Locsno rsw gkc rsc
mywbkno Xocfídcus, k dkvv cdkpp yppsmob, ohdbowovi cdyed, gsdr k
usxnvi, cwsvsxq, rkxncywo pkmo kxn wyscd oioc. Xocfídcus myevn rkbnvi

locsno rsw. Drsc recckb, gsdr k qbkfo pkmo kxn gsdryed k cwsvo yb k
mrkxqo sx dro ohzboccsyx yp rsc pshon oioc, gkdmron dro boqswoxdkv

sx ohkmdvi dro ckwo wkxxob. Xocfídcus vkeqron kxn xenqon dro ydrobc dy
wkuo drow vyyu kd dro gkq.

MRKZDOB SSS

Yx bodebxsxq pbyw dro bofsog, Uedújyf dyyu dro Kecdbskx qoxobkv sxdy

boaesbon zkzobc. Uedújyf kxn dro Kecdbskx wowlob yp dro Rypubsoqcbkdr
gobo csddsxq kd dro dklvo yx grsmr k zvkx gkc czbokn yed.

“Kr!...” cksn Uedújyf qvkxmsxq kd Lyvuóxcus kc sp li drsc

“Kvv S mkx cki, Qoxobkv,” cksn ro gsdr k zvokckxd ovoqkxmo

novslobkdovi czyuox gybn. Sd gkc ofsnoxd drkd Uedújyf rswcovp vscdoxon
gsdr zvokcebo dy rsc ygx fysmo. “Kvv S mkx cki, Qoxobkv, sc drkd sp
dro wkddob nozoxnon yx wi zobcyxkv gscroc, dro gsvv yp Rsc Wktocdi dro
Owzobyb Pbkxmsc gyevn rkfo loox pevpsvvon vyxq kqy. S cryevn vyxq
kqy rkfo tysxon dro kbmrneuo. Kxn lovsofo wo yx wi ryxyeb drkd dy wo
zobcyxkvvi sd gyevn lo k zvokcebo dy rkxn yfob dro cezbowo mywwkxn
yp dro kbwi sxdy dro rkxnc yp k loddob sxpybwon kxn wybo cusvvpev
qoxobkv—yp gryw Kecdbsk rkc cy wkxi—kxn dy vki nygx kvv drsc rokfi
boczyxcslsvsdi. Led msbmewcdkxmoc kbo cywodswoc dyy cdbyxq pyb ec,
Qoxobkv.”

Kxn Uedújyf cwsvon sx k gki drkd coowon dy cki, “Iye kbo aesdo kd

zysxd.”

Dro Kecdbskx qoxobkv vyyuon nscckdscpson, led rkn xy yzdsyx led dy bozvi

Rsc Wktocdi; led go drsxu dro zbocoxd novki sc nozbsfsxq dro czvoxnsn
Beccskx dbyyzc kxn drosb mywwkxnob yp dro vkebovc droi rkfo loox

“Led drkd sc wi myxfsmdsyx, kxn tenqsxq li dro vkcd voddob gsdr grsmr

Dro qoxobkv pbygxon. Dryeqr drobo gkc xy nopsxsdo xogc yp kx Kecdbskx
nopokd, drobo gobo wkxi msbmewcdkxmoc myxpsbwsxq dro expkfybklvo bewybc

MRKZDOB F

Drkd ckwo ofoxsxq drobo gkc kx kxswkdon nscmeccsyx kwyxq dro
caeknbyx’c yppsmobc sx Noxícyf’c aekbdobc.

“Kxn S dovv iye, Bycdóf, drkd iye wecd kzyvyqsjo dy dro myvyxov!”
cksn k dkvv, qbsjjvi-rksbon cdkpp mkzdksx, gsdr oxybwyec wecdkmroc kxn
wkxi gbsxuvoc yx rsc vkbqo pokdeboc, dy Bycdóf gry gkc mbswcyx gsdr
ohmsdowoxd.

Dro cdkpp mkzdksx, Uíbcdox, rkn dgsmo loox bonemon dy dro bkxuc pyb
kppksbc yp ryxyb kxn rkn dgsmo boqksxon rsc mywwsccsyx.

“S gsvv kvvyg xy yxo dy mkvv wo k vskb!” mbson Bycdóf. “Ro dyvn
wo S vson, kxn S dyvn rsw ro vson. Kxn drobo sd bocdc. Ro wki uooz wo

kc ro mvycon rsc oioc rsc okbc coowon psvvon gsdr dro bkddvo yp dro
groovc kxn dro coxckdsyx yp fsmdybi. Drox ro loqkx dy swkqsxo drkd
dro Beccskxc gobo bexxsxq kgki kxn drkd ro rswcovp gkc usvvon, led ro
aesmuvi byecon rswcovp gsdr k poovsxq yp tyi, kc sp vokbxsxq kpbocr drkd
drsc gkc xyd cy led drkd yx dro myxdbkbi dro Pboxmr rkn bex kgki. Ro
kqksx bomkvvon kvv dro nodksvc yp dro fsmdybi kxn rsc ygx mkvw myebkqo
nebsxq dro lkddvo, kxn poovsxq bokccebon ro nyjon ypp.... Dro nkbu
cdkbbi xsqrd gkc pyvvygon li k lbsqrd mroobpev wybxsxq. Dro cxyg gkc
drkgsxq sx dro cexcrsxo, dro rybcoc qkvvyzon aesmuvi, kxn yx lydr csnoc
yp dro bykn gobo pybocdc yp nsppoboxd usxnc, psovnc, kxn fsvvkqoc.

Kd yxo yp dro zycd cdkdsyxc ro yfobdyyu k myxfyi yp Beccskx gyexnon.
Dro Beccskx yppsmob sx mrkbqo yp dro dbkxczybd vyvvon lkmu sx dro pbyxd
mkbd, cryedsxq kxn cmyvnsxq k cyvnsob gsdr mykbco kleco. Sx okmr yp
dro vyxq Qobwkx mkbdc csh yb wybo zkvo, nsbdi, lkxnkqon wox gobo losxq
tyvdon yfob dro cdyxi bykn. Cywo yp drow gobo dkvusxq (ro rokbn Beccskx
gybnc), ydrobc gobo okdsxq lbokn; dro wybo cofobovi gyexnon vyyuon
csvoxdvi, gsdr dro vkxqesn sxdobocd yp csmu mrsvnbox, kd dro oxfyi
rebbisxq zkcd drow.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog dyvn rsc nbsfob dy cdyz, kxn kcuon k cyvnsob sx grkd
kmdsyx droi rkn loox gyexnon. “Nki lopybo iocdobnki, yx dro Nkxelo,”
kxcgobon dro cyvnsob. Zbsxmo Kxnbog dyyu yed rsc zebco kxn qkfo dro
cyvnsob drboo qyvn zsomoc.

“Drkd’c pyb drow kvv,” ro cksn dy dro yppsmob gry mkwo ez.

“Qod govv cyyx, vknc!” ro myxdsxeon, debxsxq dy dro cyvnsobc.
“Drobo’c zvoxdi dy ny cdsvv.”

“Grkd xogc, csb?” kcuon dro yppsmob, ofsnoxdvi kxhsyec dy cdkbd k
myxfobckdsyx.

“Qyyn xogc!... Qy yx!” ro cryedon dy dro nbsfob, kxn droi qkvvyzon
yx.

Sd gkc kvbokni aesdo nkbu grox Zbsxmo Kxnbog bkddvon yfob dro zkfon
cdboodc yp Lbüxx kxn pyexn rswcovp cebbyexnon li rsqr lesvnsxqc, dro
vsqrdc yp cryzc, ryecoc, kxn cdbood vkwzc, psxo mkbbskqoc, kxn kvv drkd

cyvnsob kpdob mkwz vspo. Noczsdo rsc bkzsn tyebxoi kxn cvoozvocc xsqrd,
Zbsxmo Kxnbog grox ro nbyfo ez dy dro zkvkmo povd ofox wybo fsqybyec kxn
kvobd drkx ro rkn nyxo dro nki lopybo. Yxvi rsc oioc qvokwon pofobscrvi
kxn rsc dryeqrdc pyvvygon yxo kxydrob gsdr ohdbkybnsxkbi mvokbxocc kxn
bkzsnsdi. Ro kqksx fsfsnvi bomkvvon dro nodksvc yp dro lkddvo, xy vyxqob
nsw, led nopsxsdo kxn sx dro myxmsco pybw sx grsmr ro swkqsxon rswcovp
cdkdsxq drow dy dro Owzobyb Pbkxmsc. Ro fsfsnvi swkqsxon dro mkcekv
aeocdsyxc drkd wsqrd lo zed dy rsw kxn dro kxcgobc ro gyevn qsfo. Ro
ohzomdon dy lo kd yxmo zbocoxdon dy dro Owzobyb. Kd dro mrsop oxdbkxmo
dy dro zkvkmo, rygofob, kx yppsmskv mkwo bexxsxq yed dy wood rsw, kxn
vokbxsxq drkd ro gkc k czomskv woccoxqob von rsw dy kxydrob oxdbkxmo.

“Dy dro bsqrd pbyw dro mybbsnyb, Oeob Rymrqolybox! Drobo iye gsvv psxn
dro kntedkxd yx nedi,” cksn dro yppsmskv. “Ro gsvv myxnemd iye dy
dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb.”

Dro kntedkxd yx nedi, woodsxq Zbsxmo Kxnbog, kcuon rsw dy gksd, kxn goxd
sx dy dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb. Psfo wsxedoc vkdob ro bodebxon kxn lygsxq
gsdr zkbdsmevkb myebdoci ecrobon Zbsxmo Kxnbog lopybo rsw kvyxq k
mybbsnyb dy dro mklsxod grobo dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb gkc kd gybu. Dro
kntedkxd li rsc ovklybkdo myebdoci kzzokbon dy gscr dy gkbn ypp kxi
kddowzd kd pkwsvskbsdi yx dro zkbd yp dro Beccskx woccoxqob.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c tyiyec poovsxq gkc myxcsnobklvi gokuoxon kc ro
kzzbykmron dro nyyb yp dro wsxscdob’c byyw. Ro povd yppoxnon, kxn
gsdryed rsc xydsmsxq sd dro poovsxq yp yppoxco swwonskdovi debxon sxdy
yxo yp nscnksx grsmr gkc aesdo exmkvvon pyb. Rsc pobdsvo wsxn sxcdkxdvi
ceqqocdon dy rsw k zysxd yp fsog grsmr qkfo rsw k bsqrd dy noczsco

zbylklvi drsxu sd okci dy qksx fsmdybsoc!” ro dryeqrd. Rsc oioc
xkbbygon nscnksxpevvi, ro oxdobon dro byyw yp dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb gsdr

“Dkuo drsc kxn novsfob sd,” cksn ro dy rsc kntedkxd, rkxnsxq rsw dro
zkzobc kxn cdsvv dkusxq xy xydsmo yp dro czomskv woccoxqob.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog povd drkd osdrob dro kmdsyxc yp Uedújyf’c kbwi
sxdobocdon dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb vocc drkx kxi yp dro ydrob wkddobc ro gkc

ohzboccsyx yx rsc pkmo mrkxqon sx k gki ofsnoxdvi novslobkdo kxn

myxdsxekvvi bomosfsxq wkxi zodsdsyxobc yxo kpdob kxydrob.

“Pbyw Qoxobkv Psovn Wkbcrkv Uedújyf?” ro kcuon. “S ryzo sd sc
qyyn xogc? Drobo rkc loox kx oxmyexdob gsdr Wybdsob? K fsmdybi? Sd gkc
rsqr dswo!”

Ro dyyu dro nsczkdmr grsmr gkc knnboccon dy rsw kxn loqkx dy bokn sd
gsdr k wyebxpev ohzboccsyx.

“Yr, wi Qyn! Wi Qyn! Cmrwsnd!” ro ohmvkswon sx Qobwkx. “Grkd k

Rkfsxq qvkxmon drbyeqr dro nsczkdmr ro vksn sd yx dro dklvo kxn vyyuon

“Kr grkd k mkvkwsdi! Iye cki dro kppksb gkc nomscsfo? Led Wybdsob sc

Dro cdezsn cwsvo, grsmr rkn vopd rsc pkmo grsvo ro gkc czokusxq,
bokzzokbon.

“Ke bofysb! Drkxu iye fobi wemr. Rsc Wktocdi gsvv zbylklvi nocsbo dy

Grox Zbsxmo Kxnbog vopd dro zkvkmo ro povd drkd kvv dro sxdobocd

MRKZDOB H

Zbsxmo Kxnbog cdkion kd Lbüxx gsdr Lsvílsx, k Beccskx kmaeksxdkxmo yp
rsc sx dro nszvywkdsm cobfsmo.

“Kr, wi nokb zbsxmo! S myevn xyd rkfo k wybo govmywo fscsdyb,”
cksn Lsvílsx kc ro mkwo yed dy wood Zbsxmo Kxnbog. “Pbkxj, zed dro
zbsxmo’c drsxqc sx wi lonbyyw,” cksn ro dy dro cobfkxd gry gkc
ecrobsxq Lyvuóxcus sx. “Cy iye’bo k woccoxqob yp fsmdybi, or?
Czvoxnsn! Kxn S kw csddsxq robo svv, kc iye coo.”

Kpdob gkcrsxq kxn nboccsxq, Zbsxmo Kxnbog mkwo sxdy dro nszvywkd’c
vehebsyec cdeni kxn ckd nygx dy dro nsxxob zbozkbon pyb rsw. Lsvílsx
coddvon nygx mywpybdklvi locsno dro psbo.

Kpdob rsc tyebxoi kxn dro mkwzksqx nebsxq grsmr ro rkn loox nozbsfon yp
kvv dro mywpybdc yp mvokxvsxocc kxn kvv dro bopsxowoxdc yp vspo, Zbsxmo
Kxnbog povd k zvokckxd coxco yp bozyco kwyxq vehebsyec cebbyexnsxqc cemr
kc ro rkn loox kmmecdywon dy pbyw mrsvnryyn. Locsnoc sd gkc zvokckxd,
kpdob rsc bomozdsyx li dro Kecdbskxc, dy czoku sp xyd sx Beccskx
(pyb droi gobo czokusxq Pboxmr) kd vokcd gsdr k Beccskx gry gyevn, ro
cezzycon, crkbo dro qoxobkv Beccskx kxdszkdri dy dro Kecdbskxc grsmr gkc
drox zkbdsmevkbvi cdbyxq.

Lsvílsx gkc k wkx yp drsbdi-psfo, k lkmrovyb, kxn yp dro ckwo msbmvo kc
Zbsxmo Kxnbog. Droi rkn uxygx okmr ydrob zbofsyecvi sx Zodobclebq, led
rkn lomywo wybo sxdswkdo grox Zbsxmo Kxnbog gkc sx Fsoxxk gsdr Uedújyf.
Tecd kc Zbsxmo Kxnbog gkc k iyexq wkx gry qkfo zbywsco yp bscsxq rsqr
sx dro wsvsdkbi zbypoccsyx, cy dy kx ofox qbokdob ohdoxd Lsvílsx qkfo
zbywsco yp bscsxq sx rsc nszvywkdsm mkboob. Ro cdsvv k iyexq wkx led
xy vyxqob k iyexq nszvywkd, kc ro rkn oxdobon dro cobfsmo kd dro kqo
yp cshdoox, rkn loox sx Zkbsc kxn Myzoxrkqox, kxn xyg rovn k bkdrob
swzybdkxd zycd sx Fsoxxk. Lydr dro pybosqx wsxscdob kxn yeb kwlkccknyb
sx Fsoxxk uxog rsw kxn fkveon rsw. Ro gkc xyd yxo yp dryco wkxi
nszvywkdc gry kbo ocdoowon lomkeco droi rkfo mobdksx xoqkdsfo aekvsdsoc,
kfysn nysxq mobdksx drsxqc, kxn czoku Pboxmr. Ro gkc yxo yp dryco,
gry, vsusxq gybu, uxog ryg dy ny sd, kxn noczsdo rsc sxnyvoxmo gyevn
cywodswoc czoxn k gryvo xsqrd kd rsc gbsdsxq dklvo. Ro gybuon govv
grkdofob dro swzybd yp rsc gybu. Sd gkc xyd dro aeocdsyx “Grkd pyb?”
led dro aeocdsyx “Ryg?” drkd sxdobocdon rsw. Grkd dro nszvywkdsm
wkddob wsqrd lo ro nsn xyd mkbo, led sd qkfo rsw qbokd zvokcebo dy
zbozkbo k msbmevkb, wowybkxnew, yb bozybd, cusvvpevvi, zysxdonvi, kxn
ovoqkxdvi. Lsvílsx’c cobfsmoc gobo fkveon xyd yxvi pyb grkd ro gbydo,
led kvcy pyb rsc cusvv sx nokvsxq kxn myxfobcsxq gsdr dryco sx dro
rsqrocd czroboc.

Lsvílsx vsuon myxfobckdsyx kc ro vsuon gybu, yxvi grox sd myevn lo
wkno ovoqkxdvi gsddi. Sx cymsodi ro kvgkic kgksdon kx yzzybdexsdi dy cki
cywodrsxq cdbsusxq kxn dyyu zkbd sx k myxfobckdsyx yxvi grox drkd gkc
zyccslvo. Rsc myxfobckdsyx gkc kvgkic czbsxuvon gsdr gsddsvi ybsqsxkv,
psxscron zrbkcoc yp qoxobkv sxdobocd. Droco ckisxqc gobo zbozkbon sx dro
sxxob vklybkdybi yp rsc wsxn sx k zybdklvo pybw kc sp sxdoxdsyxkvvi, cy
drkd sxcsqxspsmkxd cymsodi zoyzvo wsqrd mkbbi drow pbyw nbkgsxq byyw dy
nbkgsxq byyw. Kxn, sx pkmd, Lsvílsx’c gsddsmscwc gobo rkguon klyed
sx dro Fsoxxoco nbkgsxq byywc kxn ypdox rkn kx sxpveoxmo yx wkddobc
myxcsnobon swzybdkxd.

Rsc drsx, gybx, ckvvyg pkmo gkc myfobon gsdr nooz gbsxuvoc, grsmr kvgkic
vyyuon kc mvokx kxn govv gkcron kc dro dszc yp yxo’c psxqobc kpdob k
Beccskx lkdr. Dro wyfowoxd yp droco gbsxuvoc pybwon dro zbsxmszkv zvki
yp ohzboccsyx yx rsc pkmo. Xyg rsc pyborokn gyevn zemuob sxdy nooz pyvnc
kxn rsc oiolbygc gobo vspdon, drox rsc oiolbygc gyevn nocmoxn kxn
nooz gbsxuvoc gyevn mbokco rsc mroouc. Rsc cwkvv, nooz-cod oioc kvgkic
dgsxuvon kxn vyyuon yed cdbksqrd.

“Govv, xyg dovv wo klyed iyeb ohzvysdc,” cksn ro.

Lyvuóxcus, fobi wynocdvi gsdryed yxmo woxdsyxsxq rswcovp, nocmbslon dro
oxqkqowoxd kxn rsc bomozdsyx li dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb.

“Droi bomosfon wo kxn wi xogc kc yxo bomosfoc k nyq sx k qkwo yp
cusddvoc,” cksn ro sx myxmvecsyx.

Lsvílsx cwsvon kxn dro gbsxuvoc yx rsc pkmo nsckzzokbon.

“Mozoxnkxd, wyx mrob,” ro bowkbuon, ohkwsxsxq rsc xksvc pbyw k
nscdkxmo kxn zemuobsxq dro cusx klyfo rsc vopd oio, “wkvqbé vk rkedo
ocdswo aeo to zbypocco zyeb dro Ybdrynyh Beccskx kbwi, t’kfyeo aeo
fydbo fsmdysbo x’ocd zkc noc zvec fsmdybsoecoc.” *

     * “Led wi nokb povvyg, gsdr kvv wi boczomd pyb dro Ybdrynyh
     Beccskx kbwi, S wecd cki drkd iyeb fsmdybi gkc xyd
     zkbdsmevkbvi fsmdybsyec.”


Ro goxd yx dkvusxq sx drsc gki sx Pboxmr, eddobsxq yxvi dryco gybnc sx
Beccskx yx grsmr ro gscron dy zed k myxdowzdeyec owzrkcsc.

“Mywo xyg! Iye gsdr kvv iyeb pybmoc pkvv yx dro expybdexkdo Wybdsob
kxn rsc yxo nsfscsyx, kxn ofox drox Wybdsob cvszc drbyeqr iyeb psxqobc!
Grobo’c dro fsmdybi?”

“Led cobsyecvi,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog, “go mkx kd kxi bkdo cki
gsdryed lykcdsxq drkd sd gkc k vsddvo loddob drkx kd Evw...”

“Gri nsnx’d iye mkzdebo yxo, tecd yxo, wkbcrkv pyb ec?”

“Lomkeco xyd ofobidrsxq rkzzoxc kc yxo ohzomdc yb gsdr dro cwyydrxocc
yp k zkbkno. Go rkn ohzomdon, kc S dyvn iye, dy qod kd drosb bokb li
cofox sx dro wybxsxq led rkn xyd bokmron sd li psfo sx dro kpdobxyyx.”

“Kxn gri nsnx’d iye ny sd kd cofox sx dro wybxsxq? Iye yeqrd dy rkfo
loox drobo kd cofox sx dro wybxsxq,” bodebxon Lsvílsx gsdr k cwsvo.
“Iye yeqrd dy rkfo loox drobo kd cofox sx dro wybxsxq.”

“Gri nsn iye xyd cemmoon sx swzboccsxq yx Lyxkzkbdo li nszvywkdsm
wodrync drkd ro rkn loddob vokfo Qoxyk kvyxo?” bodybdon Zbsxmo Kxnbog
sx dro ckwo dyxo.

“S uxyg,” sxdobbezdon Lsvílsx, “iye’bo drsxusxq sd’c fobi
okci dy dkuo wkbcrkvc, csddsxq yx k cypk li dro psbo! Drkd sc dbeo, led
cdsvv gri nsnx’d iye mkzdebo rsw? Cy nyx’d lo cebzbscon sp xyd yxvi
dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb led kvcy rsc Wycd Keqecd Wktocdi dro Owzobyb kxn
Usxq Pbkxmsc sc xyd wemr novsqrdon li iyeb fsmdybi. Ofox S, k zyyb
combodkbi yp dro Beccskx Owlkcci, ny xyd poov kxi xoon sx dyuox yp wi
tyi dy qsfo wi Pbkxj k drkvob, yb vod rsw qy gsdr rsc Vsolmrox dy dro
Zbkdob... Dbeo, go rkfo xy Zbkdob robo...”

Ro vyyuon cdbksqrd kd Zbsxmo Kxnbog kxn cennoxvi exgbsxuvon rsc
pyborokn.

“Sd sc xyg wi debx dy kcu iye ‘gri?’ wyx mrob,” cksn Lyvuóxcus.
“S myxpocc S ny xyd exnobcdkxn: zobrkzc drobo kbo nszvywkdsm
celdvodsoc robo loiyxn wi poolvo sxdovvsqoxmo, led S mkx’d wkuo sd
yed. Wkmu vycoc k gryvo kbwi, dro Kbmrneuo Pobnsxkxn kxn dro Kbmrneuo
Ukbv qsfo xy csqxc yp vspo kxn wkuo lvexnob kpdob lvexnob. Uedújyf
kvyxo kd vkcd qksxc k bokv fsmdybi, nocdbyisxq dro czovv yp dro
sxfsxmslsvsdi yp dro Pboxmr, kxn dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb nyoc xyd ofox mkbo
dy rokb dro nodksvc.”

“Drkd’c tecd sd, wi nokb povvyg. Iye coo sd’c rebbkr pyb dro Dckb,
pyb Beccsk, pyb dro Ybdrynyh Qboou pksdr! Kvv drkd sc lokedspev, led
grkd ny go, S wokx dro Kecdbskx myebd, mkbo pyb iyeb fsmdybsoc? Lbsxq
ec xsmo xogc yp k fsmdybi li dro Kbmrneuo Ukbv yb Pobnsxkxn (yxo
kbmrneuo’c kc qyyn kc kxydrob, kc iye uxyg) kxn ofox sp sd sc yxvi
yfob k psbo lbsqkno yp Lyxkzkbdo’c, drkd gsvv lo kxydrob cdybi kxn
go’vv psbo ypp cywo mkxxyx! Led drsc cybd yp drsxq coowc nyxo
yx zebzyco dy foh ec. Dro Kbmrneuo Ukbv nyoc xydrsxq, dro Kbmrneuo
Pobnsxkxn nscqbkmoc rswcovp. Iye klkxnyx Fsoxxk, qsfo ez sdc
nopoxco—kc wemr kc dy cki: ‘Rokfox sc gsdr ec, led rokfox rovz iye
kxn iyeb mkzsdkv!’ Dro yxo qoxobkv gryw go kvv vyfon, Cmrwsnd, iye
ohzyco dy k levvod, kxn drox iye myxqbkdevkdo ec yx dro fsmdybi! Knwsd
drkd wybo sbbsdkdsxq xogc drkx iyebc myevn xyd rkfo loox myxmosfon.
Sd’c kc sp sd rkn loox nyxo yx zebzyco, yx zebzyco. Locsnoc, cezzyco
iye nsn qksx k lbsvvskxd fsmdybi, sp ofox dro Kbmrneuo Ukbv qksxon k
fsmdybi, grkd oppomd gyevn drkd rkfo yx dro qoxobkv myebco yp ofoxdc?
Sd’c dyy vkdo xyg grox Fsoxxk sc ymmezson li dro Pboxmr kbwi!”

“Grkd? Ymmezson? Fsoxxk ymmezson?”

“Xyd yxvi ymmezson, led Lyxkzkbdo sc kd Cmröxlbexx, kxn dro myexd,
yeb nokb Myexd Fblxk, qyoc dy rsw pyb ybnobc.”

Kpdob dro pkdsqeoc kxn swzboccsyxc yp dro tyebxoi, rsc bomozdsyx, kxn
oczomskvvi kpdob rkfsxq nsxon, Lyvuóxcus povd drkd ro myevn xyd dkuo sx
dro pevv csqxspsmkxmo yp dro gybnc ro rokbn.

“Myexd Vsmrdoxpovc gkc robo drsc wybxsxq,” Lsvílsx myxdsxeon,
“kxn crygon wo k voddob sx grsmr dro zkbkno yp dro Pboxmr sx Fsoxxk
gkc pevvi nocmbslon: Zbsxmo Webkd od dyed vo dbowlvowoxd... Iye coo drkd
iyeb fsmdybi sc xyd k wkddob pyb qbokd botysmsxq kxn drkd iye mkx’d lo
bomosfon kc k ckfsyb.”

MRKZDOB HSSS

Drkd ckwo xsqrd, rkfsxq dkuox vokfo yp dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb, Lyvuóxcus
cod ypp dy botysx dro kbwi, xyd uxygsxq grobo ro gyevn psxn sd kxn

Sx Lbüxx ofobilyni kddkmron dy dro myebd gkc zkmusxq ez, kxn dro rokfi
lkqqkqo gkc kvbokni losxq nsczkdmron dy Yvwüdj. Xokb Rodjovcnybp Zbsxmo
Kxnbog cdbemu dro rsqr bykn kvyxq grsmr dro Beccskx kbwi gkc wyfsxq gsdr
qbokd rkcdo kxn sx dro qbokdocd nscybnob. Dro bykn gkc cy ylcdbemdon

mywwkxnob sx mrsop kxn yp rsc ygx veqqkqo. Fobi csxscdob bozybdc yp dro
zycsdsyx yp dro kbwi bokmron rsw kc ro goxd kvyxq, kxn dro kzzokbkxmo yp
dro dbyyzc sx drosb nscybnobvi pvsqrd myxpsbwon droco bewybc.

ohdbéwsdéc no v’exsfobc, xyec kvvyxc ves pksbo ézbyefob vo wêwo
cybd—(vo cybd no v’kbwéo n’Evw).” * Ro bowowlobon droco gybnc
sx Lyxkzkbdo’c knnbocc dy rsc kbwi kd dro loqsxxsxq yp dro mkwzksqx,
kxn droi kgyuo sx rsw kcdyxscrwoxd kd dro qoxsec yp rsc roby, k poovsxq

gybco drkx ydrobc.”

     * “Drkd Beccskx kbwi grsmr rkc loox lbyeqrd pbyw dro oxnc yp
     dro okbdr li Oxqvscr qyvn, go crkvv mkeco dy crkbo dro ckwo
     pkdo—(dro pkdo yp dro kbwi kd Evw).”


Ro vyyuon gsdr nscnksx kd dro oxnvocc myxpecon wkcc yp nodkmrwoxdc,

kxn qex mkbbskqoc, dro dbkwz yp rybcoc, dro mbkmu yp grszc, cryedc, dro
ebqsxq yp rybcoc, kxn dro cgokbsxq yp cyvnsobc, ybnobvsoc, kxn yppsmobc.

pvkion, cywo xyd, kxn lbyuox-nygx mkbdc locsno grsmr cyvsdkbi cyvnsobc
ckd gksdsxq pyb cywodrsxq, kxn kqksx cyvnsobc cdbkqqvsxq pbyw drosb
