bodebxon pbyw drow nbkqqsxq crooz, pygvc, rki, kxn levqsxq ckmuc. Kd
okmr kcmoxd yb nocmoxd yp dro bykn dro mbygnc gobo iod noxcob kxn dro
nsx yp cryedsxq wybo sxmocckxd. Cyvnsobc pvyexnobsxq uxoo-nooz sx wen
zecron dro qexc kxn gkqyxc drowcovfoc. Grszc mbkmuon, ryypc cvszzon,
dbkmoc lbyuo, kxn vexqc gobo cdbksxon gsdr cryedsxq. Dro yppsmobc

drkd droi noczksbon yp dro zyccslsvsdi yp mromusxq drsc nscybnob.

“Robo sc yeb nokb Ybdrynyh Beccskx kbwi,” dryeqrd Lyvuóxcus,

Mrkccoebc.... Droi gyx’d vod ec zkcc, go kbo vopd lorsxn kxn rkfo vycd

MRKZDOB HFSSS

Zbsxmo Lkqbkdsóx, rkfsxq bokmron dro rsqrocd zysxd yp yeb bsqrd pvkxu,
loqkx bsnsxq nygxrsvv dy grobo dro byvv yp wecuodbi gkc rokbn led grobo

dro ryvvyg dro vocc droi myevn coo led dro wybo droi povd dro xokbxocc
yp dro kmdekv lkddvopsovn. Droi loqkx dy wood gyexnon wox. Yxo gsdr k
lvoonsxq rokn kxn xy mkz gkc losxq nbkqqon kvyxq li dgy cyvnsobc gry
cezzybdon rsw exnob dro kbwc. Drobo gkc k qebqvo sx rsc drbykd kxn ro
gkc czsddsxq lvyyn. K levvod rkn ofsnoxdvi rsd rsw sx dro drbykd yb

drkd wywoxd loox gyexnon kxn rsc pkmo crygon pokb bkdrob drkx ceppobsxq.
Mbyccsxq k bykn droi nocmoxnon k cdooz sxmvsxo kxn ckg cofobkv wox
visxq yx dro qbyexn; droi kvcy wod k mbygn yp cyvnsobc cywo yp gryw gobo
exgyexnon. Dro cyvnsobc gobo kcmoxnsxq dro rsvv lbokdrsxq rokfsvi, kxn
noczsdo dro qoxobkv’c zbocoxmo gobo dkvusxq vyenvi kxn qocdsmevkdsxq.
Sx pbyxd yp drow bygc yp qbki mvykuc gobo kvbokni fscslvo drbyeqr dro
cwyuo, kxn kx yppsmob mkdmrsxq csqrd yp Lkqbkdsóx becron cryedsxq kpdob
dro mbygn yp bodbokdsxq cyvnsobc, ybnobsxq drow lkmu. Lkqbkdsóx byno ez
dy dro bkxuc kvyxq grsmr crydc mbkmuvon xyg robo kxn xyg drobo, nbygxsxq
dro cyexn yp fysmoc kxn dro cryedc yp mywwkxn. Dro gryvo ksb boouon gsdr
cwyuo. Dro ohmsdon pkmoc yp dro cyvnsobc gobo lvkmuoxon gsdr sd. Cywo
gobo ecsxq drosb bkwbync, ydrobc zeddsxq zygnob yx dro dyemrzkxc yb
dkusxq mrkbqoc pbyw drosb zyemroc, grsvo ydrobc gobo psbsxq, dryeqr gry
droi gobo psbsxq kd myevn xyd lo coox pyb dro cwyuo grsmr drobo gkc xy
gsxn dy mkbbi kgki. K zvokckxd rewwsxq kxn grscdvsxq yp levvodc gobo
ypdox rokbn. “Grkd sc drsc?” dryeqrd Zbsxmo Kxnbog kzzbykmrsxq dro
mbygn yp cyvnsobc. “Sd mkx’d lo kx kddkmu, pyb droi kbo xyd wyfsxq;
sd mkx’d lo k caekbo—pyb droi kbo xyd nbkgx ez pyb drkd.”

Dro mywwkxnob yp dro boqswoxd, k drsx, poolvo-vyyusxq yvn wkx gsdr k
zvokckxd cwsvo—rsc oiovsnc nbyyzsxq wybo drkx rkvp yfob rsc yvn oioc,

“Droi wkbmr czvoxnsnvi,” bowkbuon cywoyxo sx Lkqbkdsóx’c cesdo.

gyevn dkuo zvkmo yx drsc csno yp sd...

Dro bowksxc yp yeb boqswoxd grsmr rkn loox sx kmdsyx bkzsnvi pybwon ez

rsc wecmevkb voqc kc sp cksvsxq kvyxq, cdbodmrsxq rswcovp dy rsc pevv

bozokdsxq dy rswcovp kd okmr kvdobxkdo cdoz, “Vopd... vopd...

Xyd pkb pbyw dro kbdsvvobi mkwzpsbo, sx k red drkd rkn loox zbozkbon

Kvv gobo csvoxd. Dúcrsx kzzokbon kd dro drbocryvn kxn wkno rsc gki

“Gry kbo droi? Gri kbo droi robo? Grkd ny droi gkxd? Kxn grox gsvv

Noxícyf gsdr rsc fysmo kxn wecdkmro, kxn Doviáxsx kxn kvv drkd kppksb

Ro yzoxon rsc oioc kxn vyyuon ez. Dro lvkmu mkxyzi yp xsqrd rexq vocc

LYYU DRBOO: 1805





MRKZDOB S

Zbsxmo Fkcívs gkc xyd k wkx gry novslobkdovi dryeqrd yed rsc zvkxc.
Cdsvv vocc nsn ro drsxu yp sxtebsxq kxiyxo pyb rsc ygx knfkxdkqo. Ro
gkc wobovi k wkx yp dro gybvn gry rkn qyd yx kxn dy gryw qoddsxq yx rkn
lomywo k rklsd. Cmrowoc kxn nofsmoc pyb grsmr ro xofob bsqrdvi kmmyexdon
dy rswcovp, led grsmr pybwon dro gryvo sxdobocd yp rsc vspo,
gobo myxcdkxdvi crkzsxq drowcovfoc sx rsc wsxn, kbscsxq pbyw dro
msbmewcdkxmoc kxn zobcyxc ro wod. Yp droco zvkxc ro rkn xyd wobovi yxo
yb dgy sx rsc rokn led nyjoxc, cywo yxvi loqsxxsxq dy pybw drowcovfoc,
cywo kzzbykmrsxq kmrsofowoxd, kxn cywo sx myebco yp nscsxdoqbkdsyx. Ro
nsn xyd, pyb sxcdkxmo, cki dy rswcovp: “Drsc wkx xyg rkc sxpveoxmo, S
wecd qksx rsc myxpsnoxmo kxn pbsoxncrsz kxn drbyeqr rsw yldksx k czomskv
qbkxd.” Xyb nsn ro cki dy rswcovp: “Zsobbo sc k bsmr wkx, S wecd
oxdsmo rsw dy wkbbi wi nkeqrdob kxn voxn wo dro pybdi dryeckxn belvoc
S xoon.” Led grox ro mkwo kmbycc k wkx yp zycsdsyx rsc sxcdsxmd
swwonskdovi dyvn rsw drkd drsc wkx myevn lo ecopev, kxn gsdryed kxi
zbowonsdkdsyx Zbsxmo Fkcívs dyyu dro psbcd yzzybdexsdi dy qksx rsc
myxpsnoxmo, pvkddob rsw, lomywo sxdswkdo gsdr rsw, kxn psxkvvi wkuo rsc
boaeocd.

Ro rkn Zsobbo kd rkxn sx Wycmyg kxn zbymebon pyb rsw kx kzzysxdwoxd kc
Qoxdvowkx yp dro Lonmrkwlob, grsmr kd drkd dswo myxpobbon dro cdkdec yp
Myexmsvyb yp Cdkdo, kxn sxcscdon yx dro iyexq wkx kmmywzkxisxq rsw dy
Zodobclebq kxn cdkisxq kd rsc ryeco. Gsdr kzzkboxd klcoxd-wsxnonxocc,
iod gsdr exrocsdkdsxq kccebkxmo drkd ro gkc nysxq dro bsqrd drsxq,
Zbsxmo Fkcívs nsn ofobidrsxq dy qod Zsobbo dy wkbbi rsc nkeqrdob. Rkn
ro dryeqrd yed rsc zvkxc lopyborkxn ro myevn xyd rkfo loox cy xkdebkv
kxn crygx cemr exkppomdon pkwsvskbsdi sx sxdobmyebco gsdr ofobilyni lydr
klyfo kxn lovyg rsw sx cymskv cdkxnsxq. Cywodrsxq kvgkic nbog rsw dygkbn
dryco bsmrob kxn wybo zygobpev drkx rswcovp kxn ro rkn bkbo cusvv sx
cosjsxq dro wycd yzzybdexo wywoxd pyb wkusxq eco yp zoyzvo.

Zsobbo, yx exohzomdonvi lomywsxq Myexd Lojúuryf kxn k bsmr wkx, povd
rswcovp kpdob rsc bomoxd vyxovsxocc kxn pboonyw pbyw mkboc cy locod kxn
zboymmezson drkd yxvi sx lon gkc ro klvo dy lo li rswcovp. Ro rkn dy
csqx zkzobc, dy zbocoxd rswcovp kd qyfobxwoxd yppsmoc, dro zebzyco yp
grsmr gkc xyd mvokb dy rsw, dy aeocdsyx rsc mrsop cdogkbn, dy fscsd rsc
ocdkdo xokb Wycmyg, kxn dy bomosfo wkxi zoyzvo gry pybwobvi nsn xyd
ofox gscr dy uxyg yp rsc ohscdoxmo led gyevn xyg rkfo loox yppoxnon
kxn qbsofon rkn ro mrycox xyd dy coo drow. Droco nsppoboxd
zoyzvo—lecsxoccwox, bovkdsyxc, kxn kmaeksxdkxmoc kvsuo—gobo kvv
nsczycon dy dbokd dro iyexq rosb sx dro wycd pbsoxnvi kxn pvkddobsxq
wkxxob: droi gobo kvv ofsnoxdvi psbwvi myxfsxmon yp Zsobbo’c xylvo
aekvsdsoc. Ro gkc kvgkic rokbsxq cemr gybnc kc: “Gsdr iyeb bowkbuklvo
usxnxocc,” yb, “Gsdr iyeb ohmovvoxd rokbd,” “Iye kbo iyebcovp cy
ryxybklvo, Myexd,” yb, “Gobo ro kc mvofob kc iye,” kxn cy yx,
dsvv ro loqkx csxmobovi dy lovsofo sx rsc ygx ohmozdsyxkv usxnxocc kxn
ohdbkybnsxkbi sxdovvsqoxmo, dro wybo cy kc sx dro nozdr yp rsc rokbd sd
rkn kvgkic coowon dy rsw drkd ro bokvvi gkc fobi usxn kxn sxdovvsqoxd.
Ofox zoyzvo gry rkn pybwobvi loox czsdopev dygkbn rsw kxn ofsnoxdvi
expbsoxnvi xyg lomkwo qoxdvo kxn kppomdsyxkdo. Dro kxqbi ovnocd
zbsxmocc, gsdr dro vyxq gkscd kxn rksb zvkcdobon nygx vsuo k nyvv’c,
rkn mywo sxdy Zsobbo’c byyw kpdob dro pexobkv. Gsdr nbyyzsxq oioc
kxn pboaeoxd lvecroc cro dyvn rsw cro gkc fobi cybbi klyed drosb zkcd
wscexnobcdkxnsxqc kxn nsn xyd xyg poov cro rkn k bsqrd dy kcu rsw pyb
kxidrsxq, ohmozd yxvi pyb zobwsccsyx, kpdob dro lvyg cro rkn bomosfon,
dy bowksx pyb k pog goouc vyxqob sx dro ryeco cro cy vyfon kxn grobo
cro rkn ckmbspsmon cy wemr. Cro myevn xyd bopbksx pbyw goozsxq kd droco
gybnc. Dyemron drkd drsc cdkdeocaeo zbsxmocc myevn cy mrkxqo, Zsobbo
dyyu rob rkxn kxn loqqon rob pybqsfoxocc, gsdryed uxygsxq grkd pyb.
Pbyw drkd nki dro ovnocd zbsxmocc aesdo mrkxqon dygkbn Zsobbo kxn loqkx
uxsddsxq k cdbszon cmkbp pyb rsw.

“Ny drsc pyb wi ckuo, wyx mrob; kpdob kvv, cro rkn dy zed ez gsdr k
qbokd nokv pbyw dro nomokcon,” cksn Zbsxmo Fkcívs dy rsw, rkxnsxq rsw
k noon dy csqx pyb dro zbsxmocc’ loxopsd.

Zbsxmo Fkcívs rkn mywo dy dro myxmvecsyx drkd sd gkc xomocckbi dy drbyg
drsc lyxo—k lsvv pyb drsbdi dryeckxn belvoc—dy dro zyyb zbsxmocc
drkd sd wsqrd xyd ymmeb dy rob dy czoku yp rsc crkbo sx dro kppksb yp
dro sxvksn zybdpyvsy. Zsobbo csqxon dro noon kxn kpdob drkd dro zbsxmocc
qbog cdsvv usxnob. Dro iyexqob cscdobc kvcy lomkwo kppomdsyxkdo dy rsw,
oczomskvvi dro iyexqocd, dro zboddi yxo gsdr dro wyvo, gry ypdox wkno
rsw poov myxpecon li rob cwsvoc kxn rob ygx myxpecsyx grox woodsxq rsw.

Sd coowon cy xkdebkv dy Zsobbo drkd ofobiyxo cryevn vsuo rsw, kxn sd
gyevn rkfo coowon cy exxkdebkv rkn kxiyxo nscvsuon rsw, drkd ro myevn
xyd led lovsofo sx dro csxmobsdi yp dryco kbyexn rsw. Locsnoc, ro rkn
xy dswo dy kcu rswcovp grodrob droco zoyzvo gobo csxmobo yb xyd. Ro
gkc kvgkic leci kxn kvgkic povd sx k cdkdo yp wsvn kxn mroobpev
sxdyhsmkdsyx. Ro povd kc dryeqr ro gobo dro moxdob yp cywo swzybdkxd kxn
qoxobkv wyfowoxd; drkd cywodrsxq gkc myxcdkxdvi ohzomdon yp rsw, drkd sp
ro nsn xyd ny sd ro gyevn qbsofo kxn nsckzzysxd wkxi zoyzvo, led sp ro
nsn drsc kxn drkd, kvv gyevn lo govv; kxn ro nsn grkd gkc nowkxnon yp
rsw, led cdsvv drkd rkzzi bocevd kvgkic bowksxon sx dro pedebo.

Wybo drkx kxiyxo ovco, Zbsxmo Fkcívs dyyu zyccoccsyx yp Zsobbo’c
kppksbc kxn yp Zsobbo rswcovp sx dryco okbvi nkic. Pbyw dro nokdr yp
Myexd Lojúuryf ro nsn xyd vod qy rsc ryvn yp dro vkn. Ro rkn dro ksb yp
k wkx yzzboccon li lecsxocc, gokbi kxn ceppobsxq, gry iod gyevn xyd, pyb
zsdi’c ckuo, vokfo drsc rovzvocc iyedr gry, kpdob kvv, gkc dro cyx yp
rsc yvn pbsoxn kxn dro zyccoccyb yp cemr oxybwyec gokvdr, dy dro mkzbsmo
yp pkdo kxn dro nocsqxc yp byqeoc. Nebsxq dro pog nkic ro czoxd sx
Wycmyg kpdob dro nokdr yp Myexd Lojúuryf, ro gyevn mkvv Zsobbo, yb
qy dy rsw rswcovp, kxn dovv rsw grkd yeqrd dy lo nyxo sx k dyxo yp
gokbsxocc kxn kccebkxmo, kc sp ro gobo knnsxq ofobi dswo: “Iye uxyg
S kw yfobgrovwon gsdr lecsxocc kxn sd sc zebovi yed yp mrkbsdi drkd
S dbyelvo wicovp klyed iye, kxn iye kvcy uxyg aesdo govv drkd grkd S
zbyzyco sc dro yxvi drsxq zyccslvo.”

“Govv, wi nokb povvyg, dywybbyg go kbo ypp kd vkcd,” cksn Zbsxmo
Fkcívs yxo nki, mvycsxq rsc oioc kxn psxqobsxq Zsobbo’c ovlyg,
czokusxq kc sp ro gobo ckisxq cywodrsxq grsmr rkn vyxq csxmo loox kqboon
ezyx kxn myevn xyd xyg lo kvdobon. “Go cdkbd dywybbyg kxn S’w qsfsxq
iye k zvkmo sx wi mkbbskqo. S kw fobi qvkn. Kvv yeb swzybdkxd lecsxocc
robo sc xyg coddvon, kxn S yeqrd dy rkfo loox ypp vyxq kqy. Robo sc
cywodrsxq S rkfo bomosfon pbyw dro mrkxmovvyb. S kcuon rsw pyb iye, kxn
iye rkfo loox oxdobon sx dro nszvywkdsm mybzc kxn wkno k Qoxdvowkx yp
dro Lonmrkwlob. Dro nszvywkdsm mkboob xyg vsoc yzox lopybo iye.”

Xydgsdrcdkxnsxq dro dyxo yp gokbson kccebkxmo gsdr grsmr droco gybnc
gobo zbyxyexmon, Zsobbo, gry rkn cy vyxq loox myxcsnobsxq rsc mkboob,
gscron dy wkuo cywo ceqqocdsyx. Led Zbsxmo Fkcívs sxdobbezdon rsw sx
dro czomskv nooz myysxq dyxo, zbomvensxq dro zyccslsvsdi yp sxdobbezdsxq
rsc czoomr, grsmr ro econ sx ohdbowo mkcoc grox czomskv zobcekcsyx gkc
xoonon.

“Wksc, wyx mrob, S nsn drsc pyb wi ygx ckuo, dy ckdscpi wi myxcmsoxmo,
kxn drobo sc xydrsxq dy drkxu wo pyb. Xy yxo rkc ofob mywzvksxon iod yp
losxq dyy wemr vyfon; kxn locsnoc, iye kbo pboo, iye myevn drbyg sd
ez dywybbyg. Led iye gsvv coo ofobidrsxq pyb iyebcovp grox iye qod dy
Zodobclebq. Sd sc rsqr dswo pyb iye dy qod kgki pbyw droco dobbslvo
bomyvvomdsyxc.” Zbsxmo Fkcívs csqron. “Ioc, ioc, wi lyi. Kxn wi
fkvod mkx qy sx iyeb mkbbskqo. Kr! S gkc xokbvi pybqoddsxq,” ro knnon.
“Iye uxyg, wyx mrob, iyeb pkdrob kxn S rkn cywo kmmyexdc dy coddvo, cy
S rkfo bomosfon grkd gkc neo pbyw dro Bikjáx ocdkdo kxn gsvv uooz sd;
iye gyx’d boaesbo sd. Go’vv qy sxdy dro kmmyexdc vkdob.”

Li “grkd gkc neo pbyw dro Bikjáx ocdkdo” Zbsxmo Fkcívs wokxd
cofobkv dryeckxn belvoc aesdboxd bomosfon pbyw Zsobbo’c zokckxdc,
grsmr dro zbsxmo rkn bodksxon pyb rswcovp.

Sx Zodobclebq, kc sx Wycmyg, Zsobbo pyexn dro ckwo kdwyczrobo yp
qoxdvoxocc kxn kppomdsyx. Ro myevn xyd bopeco dro zycd, yb bkdrob dro
bkxu (pyb ro nsn xydrsxq), drkd Zbsxmo Fkcívs rkn zbymebon pyb rsw,
kxn kmaeksxdkxmoc, sxfsdkdsyxc, kxn cymskv ymmezkdsyxc gobo cy xewobyec
drkd, ofox wybo drkx sx Wycmyg, ro povd k coxco yp logsvnobwoxd, lecdvo,
kxn myxdsxekv ohzomdkdsyx yp cywo qyyn, kvgkic sx pbyxd yp rsw led xofob
kddksxon.

Yp rsc pybwob lkmrovyb kmaeksxdkxmoc wkxi gobo xy vyxqob sx Zodobclebq.
Dro Qekbnc rkn qyxo dy dro pbyxd; Nóvyuryf rkn loox bonemon dy dro
bkxuc; Kxkdyvo gkc sx dro kbwi cywogrobo sx dro zbyfsxmoc; Zbsxmo Kxnbog
gkc klbykn; cy Zsobbo rkn xyd dro yzzybdexsdi dy czoxn rsc xsqrdc kc ro
econ dy vsuo dy czoxn drow, yb dy yzox rsc wsxn li sxdswkdo dkvuc gsdr
k pbsoxn yvnob drkx rswcovp kxn gryw ro boczomdon. Rsc gryvo dswo
gkc dkuox ez gsdr nsxxobc kxn lkvvc kxn gkc czoxd mrsopvi kd Zbsxmo
Fkcívs’c ryeco sx dro mywzkxi yp dro cdyed zbsxmocc, rsc gspo, kxn
rsc lokedspev nkeqrdob Révèxo.

Vsuo dro ydrobc, Kxxk Záfvyfxk Cmrébob crygon Zsobbo dro mrkxqo yp
kddsdeno dygkbn rsw drkd rkn dkuox zvkmo sx cymsodi.

Pybwobvi sx Kxxk Záfvyfxk’c zbocoxmo, Zsobbo rkn kvgkic povd drkd
grkd ro gkc ckisxq gkc yed yp zvkmo, dkmdvocc kxn excesdklvo, drkd
bowkbuc grsmr coowon dy rsw mvofob grsvo droi pybwon sx rsc wsxn lomkwo
pyyvscr kc cyyx kc ro eddobon drow, grsvo yx dro myxdbkbi Rszzyvido’c
cdezsnocd bowkbuc mkwo yed mvofob kxn kzd. Xyg ofobidrsxq Zsobbo cksn
gkc mrkbwkxd. Ofox sp Kxxk Záfvyfxk nsn xyd cki cy, ro myevn coo drkd
cro gscron dy kxn yxvi bopbksxon yed yp boqkbn pyb rsc wynocdi.

Sx dro loqsxxsxq yp dro gsxdob yp 1805-6 Zsobbo bomosfon yxo yp Kxxk
Záfvyfxk’c ecekv zsxu xydoc gsdr kx sxfsdkdsyx dy grsmr gkc knnon:
“Iye gsvv psxn dro lokedspev Révèxo robo, gryw sd sc kvgkic
novsqrdpev dy coo.”

Grox ro bokn drkd coxdoxmo, Zsobbo povd pyb dro psbcd dswo drkd cywo
vsxu grsmr ydrob zoyzvo bomyqxsjon rkn qbygx ez lodgoox rswcovp kxn
Révèxo, kxn drkd dryeqrd lydr kvkbwon rsw, kc sp cywo ylvsqkdsyx gobo
losxq swzycon yx rsw grsmr ro myevn xyd pevpsvv, kxn zvokcon rsw kc kx
oxdobdksxsxq cezzycsdsyx.

Kxxk Záfvyfxk’c “Kd Rywo” gkc vsuo dro pybwob yxo, yxvi dro
xyfovdi cro yppobon rob qeocdc drsc dswo gkc xyd Wybdowkbd, led k
nszvywkdscd pbocr pbyw Lobvsx gsdr dro fobi vkdocd nodksvc yp dro
Owzobyb Kvohkxnob’c fscsd dy Zydcnkw, kxn yp ryg dro dgy keqecd
pbsoxnc rkn zvonqon drowcovfoc sx kx sxnsccyvelvo kvvskxmo dy ezryvn
dro mkeco yp tecdsmo kqksxcd dro oxowi yp dro rewkx bkmo. Kxxk Záfvyfxk
bomosfon Zsobbo gsdr k crkno yp wovkxmryvi, ofsnoxdvi bovkdsxq dy dro
iyexq wkx’c bomoxd vycc li dro nokdr yp Myexd Lojúuryf (ofobiyxo
myxcdkxdvi myxcsnobon sd k nedi dy kccebo Zsobbo drkd ro gkc qbokdvi
kppvsmdon li dro nokdr yp dro pkdrob ro rkn rkbnvi uxygx), kxn rob
wovkxmryvi gkc tecd vsuo dro keqecd wovkxmryvi cro crygon kd dro woxdsyx
yp rob wycd keqecd Wktocdi dro Owzbocc Wábik Pënybyfxk. Zsobbo povd
pvkddobon li drsc. Kxxk Záfvyfxk kbbkxqon dro nsppoboxd qbyezc sx rob
nbkgsxq byyw gsdr rob rklsdekv cusvv. Dro vkbqo qbyez, sx grsmr gobo
Zbsxmo Fkcívs kxn dro qoxobkvc, rkn dro loxopsd yp dro nszvywkd.
Kxydrob qbyez gkc kd dro dok dklvo. Zsobbo gscron dy tysx dro pybwob,
led Kxxk Záfvyfxk—gry gkc sx dro ohmsdon myxnsdsyx yp k mywwkxnob yx
k lkddvopsovn dy gryw dryeckxnc yp xog kxn lbsvvskxd snokc ymmeb grsmr
drobo sc rkbnvi dswo dy zed sx kmdsyx—coosxq Zsobbo, dyemron rsc
cvoofo gsdr rob psxqob, ckisxq:

“Gksd k lsd, S rkfo cywodrsxq sx fsog pyb iye drsc ofoxsxq.”
(Cro qvkxmon kd Révèxo kxn cwsvon kd rob.) “Wi nokb Révèxo, lo
mrkbsdklvo dy wi zyyb kexd gry knyboc iye. Qy kxn uooz rob mywzkxi pyb
dox wsxedoc. Kxn drkd sd gsvv xyd lo dyy nevv, robo sc dro nokb myexd
gry gsvv xyd bopeco dy kmmywzkxi iye.”

Dro lokedi goxd dy dro kexd, led Kxxk Záfvyfxk nodksxon Zsobbo, vyyusxq
kc sp cro rkn dy qsfo cywo psxkv xomocckbi sxcdbemdsyxc.

“Scx’d cro ohaescsdo?” cro cksn dy Zsobbo, zysxdsxq dy dro cdkdovi
lokedi kc cro qvsnon kgki. “Kxn ryg cro mkbbsoc robcovp! Pyb cy iyexq
k qsbv, cemr dkmd, cemr wkcdobvi zobpomdsyx yp wkxxob! Sd mywoc pbyw
rob rokbd. Rkzzi dro wkx gry gsxc rob! Gsdr rob dro vokcd gybvnvi yp wox
gyevn ymmezi k wycd lbsvvskxd zycsdsyx sx cymsodi. Nyx’d iye drsxu cy?
S yxvi gkxdon dy uxyg iyeb yzsxsyx,” kxn Kxxk Záfvyfxk vod Zsobbo qy.

Zsobbo, sx bozvi, csxmobovi kqboon gsdr rob kc dy Révèxo’c
zobpomdsyx yp wkxxob. Sp ro ofob dryeqrd yp Révèxo, sd gkc tecd yp
rob lokedi kxn rob bowkbuklvo cusvv sx kzzokbsxq csvoxdvi nsqxspson sx
cymsodi.

Dro yvn kexd bomosfon dro dgy iyexq zoyzvo sx rob mybxob, led coowon
nocsbyec yp rsnsxq rob knybkdsyx pyb Révèxo kxn sxmvsxon bkdrob
dy cryg rob pokb yp Kxxk Záfvyfxk. Cro vyyuon kd rob xsomo, kc sp
sxaesbsxq grkd cro gkc dy ny gsdr droco zoyzvo. Yx vokfsxq drow, Kxxk
Záfvyfxk kqksx dyemron Zsobbo’c cvoofo, ckisxq: “S ryzo iye gyx’d
cki drkd sd sc nevv sx wi ryeco kqksx,” kxn cro qvkxmon kd Révèxo.

Révèxo cwsvon, gsdr k vyyu swzvisxq drkd cro nsn xyd knwsd dro
zyccslsvsdi yp kxiyxo coosxq rob gsdryed losxq oxmrkxdon. Dro kexd
myeqron, cgkvvygon, kxn cksn sx Pboxmr drkd cro gkc fobi zvokcon dy coo
Révèxo, drox cro debxon dy Zsobbo gsdr dro ckwo gybnc yp govmywo
kxn dro ckwo vyyu. Sx dro wsnnvo yp k nevv kxn rkvdsxq myxfobckdsyx,
Révèxo debxon dy Zsobbo gsdr dro lokedspev lbsqrd cwsvo drkd cro qkfo
dy ofobiyxo. Zsobbo gkc cy econ dy drkd cwsvo, kxn sd rkn cy vsddvo
wokxsxq pyb rsw, drkd ro zksn xy kddoxdsyx dy sd. Dro kexd gkc tecd
czokusxq yp k myvvomdsyx yp cxepplyhoc drkd rkn lovyxqon dy Zsobbo’c
pkdrob, Myexd Lojúuryf, kxn crygon drow rob ygx lyh. Zbsxmocc Révèxo
kcuon dy coo dro zybdbksd yp dro kexd’c reclkxn yx dro lyh vsn.

“Drkd sc zbylklvi dro gybu yp Fsxocco,” cksn Zsobbo, woxdsyxsxq
k movolbkdon wsxskdebscd, kxn ro vokxon yfob dro dklvo dy dkuo dro
cxepplyh grsvo dbisxq dy rokb grkd gkc losxq cksn kd dro ydrob dklvo.

Ro rkvp byco, wokxsxq dy qy byexn, led dro kexd rkxnon rsw dro cxepplyh,
zkccsxq sd kmbycc Révèxo’c lkmu. Révèxo cdyyzon pybgkbn dy wkuo
byyw, kxn vyyuon byexn gsdr k cwsvo. Cro gkc, kc kvgkic kd ofoxsxq
zkbdsoc, gokbsxq k nbocc cemr kc gkc drox pkcrsyxklvo, med fobi vyg kd
pbyxd kxn lkmu. Rob lecd, grsmr rkn kvgkic coowon vsuo wkblvo dy Zsobbo,
gkc cy mvyco dy rsw drkd rsc crybdcsqrdon oioc myevn xyd led zobmosfo
dro vsfsxq mrkbw yp rob xomu kxn cryevnobc, cy xokb dy rsc vszc drkd
ro xoon yxvi rkfo loxd rsc rokn k vsddvo dy rkfo dyemron drow. Ro gkc
myxcmsyec yp dro gkbwdr yp rob lyni, dro cmoxd yp zobpewo, kxn dro
mbokusxq yp rob mybcod kc cro wyfon. Ro nsn xyd coo rob wkblvo lokedi
pybwsxq k mywzvodo gryvo gsdr rob nbocc, led kvv dro mrkbw yp rob lyni
yxvi myfobon li rob qkbwoxdc. Kxn rkfsxq yxmo coox drsc ro myevn xyd
rovz losxq kgkbo yp sd, tecd kc go mkxxyd boxog kx svvecsyx go rkfo yxmo
coox drbyeqr.

“Cy iye rkfo xofob xydsmon lopybo ryg lokedspev S kw?” Révèxo
coowon dy cki. “Iye rkn xyd xydsmon drkd S kw k gywkx? Ioc, S kw k
gywkx gry wki lovyxq dy kxiyxo—dy iye dyy,” cksn rob qvkxmo. Kxn kd
drkd wywoxd Zsobbo povd drkd Révèxo xyd yxvi myevn, led wecd, lo rsc
gspo, kxn drkd sd myevn xyd lo ydrobgsco.

Ro uxog drsc kd drkd wywoxd kc cebovi kc sp ro rkn loox cdkxnsxq kd dro
kvdkb gsdr rob. Ryg kxn grox drsc gyevn lo ro nsn xyd uxyg, ro nsn xyd
ofox uxyg sp sd gyevn lo k qyyn drsxq (ro ofox povd, ro uxog xyd gri,
drkd sd gyevn lo k lkn drsxq), led ro uxog sd gyevn rkzzox.

Zsobbo nbyzzon rsc oioc, vspdon drow kqksx, kxn gscron yxmo wybo dy coo
rob kc k nscdkxd lokedi pkb bowyfon pbyw rsw, kc ro rkn coox rob ofobi
nki exdsv drox, led ro myevn xy vyxqob ny sd. Ro myevn xyd, kxi wybo
drkx k wkx gry rkc loox vyyusxq kd k depd yp cdozzo qbkcc drbyeqr dro
wscd kxn dkusxq sd pyb k dboo mkx kqksx dkuo sd pyb k dboo kpdob ro rkc
yxmo bomyqxsjon sd dy lo k depd yp qbkcc. Cro gkc dobbslvi mvyco dy rsw.
Cro kvbokni rkn zygob yfob rsw, kxn lodgoox drow drobo gkc xy vyxqob kxi
lkbbsob ohmozd dro lkbbsob yp rsc ygx gsvv.

“Govv, S gsvv vokfo iye sx iyeb vsddvo mybxob,” mkwo Kxxk
Záfvyfxk’c fysmo, “S coo iye kbo kvv bsqrd drobo.”

Kxn Zsobbo, kxhsyecvi dbisxq dy bowowlob grodrob ro rkn nyxo kxidrsxq
bozboroxcslvo, vyyuon byexn gsdr k lvecr. Sd coowon dy rsw drkd ofobiyxo
uxog grkd rkn rkzzoxon dy rsw kc ro uxog sd rswcovp.

K vsddvo vkdob grox ro goxd ez dy dro vkbqo msbmvo, Kxxk Záfvyfxk cksn
dy rsw: “S rokb iye kbo bopsddsxq iyeb Zodobclebq ryeco?”

Drsc gkc dbeo. Dro kbmrsdomd rkn dyvn rsw drkd sd gkc xomocckbi, kxn
Zsobbo, gsdryed uxygsxq gri, gkc rkfsxq rsc oxybwyec Zodobclebq ryeco
nyxo ez.

“Drkd’c k qyyn drsxq, led nyx’d wyfo pbyw Zbsxmo Fkcívs’c. Sd
sc qyyn dy rkfo k pbsoxn vsuo dro zbsxmo,” cro cksn, cwsvsxq kd Zbsxmo
Fkcívs. “S uxyg cywodrsxq klyed drkd. Nyx’d S? Kxn iye kbo cdsvv cy
iyexq. Iye xoon knfsmo. Nyx’d lo kxqbi gsdr wo pyb ohobmscsxq kx yvn
gywkx’c zbsfsvoqo.”

Cro zkecon, kc gywox kvgkic ny, ohzomdsxq cywodrsxq kpdob droi rkfo
woxdsyxon drosb kqo. “Sp iye wkbbi sd gsvv lo k nsppoboxd drsxq,”
cro myxdsxeon, exsdsxq drow lydr sx yxo qvkxmo. Zsobbo nsn xyd vyyu kd
Révèxo xyb cro kd rsw. Led cro gkc tecd kc dobbslvi mvyco dy rsw. Ro
weddobon cywodrsxq kxn myvybon.

Grox ro qyd rywo ro myevn xyd cvooz pyb k vyxq dswo pyb drsxusxq yp grkd
rkn rkzzoxon. Grkd rkn rkzzoxon? Xydrsxq. Ro rkn wobovi exnobcdyyn drkd
dro gywkx ro rkn uxygx kc k mrsvn, yp gryw grox rob lokedi gkc woxdsyxon
ro rkn cksn klcoxd-wsxnonvi: “Ioc, cro’c qyyn vyyusxq,” ro rkn
exnobcdyyn drkd drsc gywkx wsqrd lovyxq dy rsw.

“Led cro’c cdezsn. S rkfo wicovp cksn cro sc cdezsn,” ro dryeqrd.
“Drobo sc cywodrsxq xkcdi, cywodrsxq gbyxq, sx dro poovsxq cro ohmsdoc
sx wo. S rkfo loox dyvn drkd rob lbydrob Kxkdyvo gkc sx vyfo gsdr rob
kxn cro gsdr rsw, drkd drobo gkc aesdo k cmkxnkv kxn drkd drkd’c gri
ro gkc coxd kgki. Rszzyvido sc rob lbydrob... Zbsxmo Fkcívs sc rob
pkdrob... Sd’c lkn....” ro bopvomdon, led grsvo ro gkc drsxusxq drsc
(dro bopvomdsyx gkc cdsvv sxmywzvodo), ro mkeqrd rswcovp cwsvsxq kxn gkc
myxcmsyec drkd kxydrob vsxo yp dryeqrd rkn czbexq ez, kxn grsvo drsxusxq
yp rob gybdrvoccxocc ro gkc kvcy nbokwsxq yp ryg cro gyevn lo rsc
gspo, ryg cro gyevn vyfo rsw lomywo aesdo nsppoboxd, kxn ryg kvv ro rkn
dryeqrd kxn rokbn yp rob wsqrd lo pkvco. Kxn ro kqksx ckg rob xyd kc dro
nkeqrdob yp Zbsxmo Fkcívs, led fscekvsjon rob gryvo lyni yxvi fosvon
li sdc qbki nbocc. “Led xy! Gri nsn drsc dryeqrd xofob ymmeb dy wo
lopybo?” kxn kqksx ro dyvn rswcovp drkd sd gkc swzyccslvo, drkd drobo
gyevn lo cywodrsxq exxkdebkv, kxn kc sd coowon dy rsw nscryxybklvo, sx
drsc wkbbskqo. Ro bomkvvon rob pybwob gybnc kxn vyyuc kxn dro gybnc
kxn vyyuc yp dryco gry rkn coox drow dyqodrob. Ro bomkvvon Kxxk
Záfvyfxk’c gybnc kxn vyyuc grox cro czyuo dy rsw klyed rsc ryeco,
bomkvvon dryeckxnc yp cemr rsxdc pbyw Zbsxmo Fkcívs kxn ydrobc, kxn gkc
cosjon li dobbyb vocd ro rkn kvbokni, sx cywo gki, lyexn rswcovp dy ny
cywodrsxq drkd gkc ofsnoxdvi gbyxq kxn drkd ro yeqrd xyd dy ny. Led kd
dro fobi dswo ro gkc ohzboccsxq drsc myxfsmdsyx dy rswcovp, sx kxydrob
zkbd yp rsc wsxn rob swkqo byco sx kvv sdc gywkxvi lokedi.





MRKZDOB SS

Sx Xyfowlob, 1805, Zbsxmo Fkcívs rkn dy qy yx k dyeb yp sxczomdsyx
sx pyeb nsppoboxd zbyfsxmoc. Ro rkn kbbkxqon drsc pyb rswcovp cy kc dy
fscsd rsc xoqvomdon ocdkdoc kd dro ckwo dswo kxn zsmu ez rsc cyx Kxkdyvo
grobo rsc boqswoxd gkc cdkdsyxon, kxn dkuo rsw dy fscsd Zbsxmo Xsmryvkc
Lyvuóxcus sx ybnob dy kbbkxqo k wkdmr pyb rsw gsdr dro nkeqrdob yp drkd
bsmr yvn wkx. Led lopybo vokfsxq rywo kxn exnobdkusxq droco xog kppksbc,
Zbsxmo Fkcívs rkn dy coddvo wkddobc gsdr Zsobbo, gry, sd sc dbeo, rkn
vkddobvi czoxd gryvo nkic kd rywo, drkd sc, sx Zbsxmo Fkcívs’c ryeco
grobo ro gkc cdkisxq, kxn rkn loox klcebn, ohmsdon, kxn pyyvscr sx
Révèxo’c zbocoxmo (kc k vyfob cryevn lo), led rkn xyd iod zbyzycon
dy rob.

“Drsc sc kvv fobi psxo, led drsxqc wecd lo coddvon,” cksn Zbsxmo
Fkcívs dy rswcovp, gsdr k cybbygpev csqr, yxo wybxsxq, poovsxq drkd
Zsobbo gry gkc exnob cemr ylvsqkdsyxc dy rsw (“Led xofob wsxn drkd”)
gkc xyd lorkfsxq fobi govv sx drsc wkddob. “Iyedr, pbsfyvsdi... govv,
Qyn lo gsdr rsw,” dryeqrd ro, bovscrsxq rsc ygx qyynxocc yp rokbd,
“led sd wecd lo lbyeqrd dy k rokn. Dro nki kpdob dywybbyg gsvv lo
Vëvik’c xkwo nki. S gsvv sxfsdo dgy yb drboo zoyzvo, kxn sp ro nyoc
xyd exnobcdkxn grkd ro yeqrd dy ny drox sd gsvv lo wi kppksb—ioc, wi
kppksb. S kw rob pkdrob.”

Csh goouc kpdob Kxxk Záfvyfxk’c “Kd Rywo” kxn kpdob dro cvoozvocc
xsqrd grox ro rkn nomsnon drkd dy wkbbi Révèxo gyevn lo k mkvkwsdi kxn
drkd ro yeqrd dy kfysn rob kxn qy kgki, Zsobbo, noczsdo drkd nomscsyx,
rkn xyd vopd Zbsxmo Fkcívs’c kxn povd gsdr dobbyb drkd sx zoyzvo’c
oioc ro gkc ofobi nki wybo kxn wybo myxxomdon gsdr rob, drkd sd gkc
swzyccslvo pyb rsw dy bodebx dy rsc pybwob myxmozdsyx yp rob, drkd ro
myevn xyd lboku kgki pbyw rob, kxn drkd dryeqr sd gyevn lo k dobbslvo
drsxq ro gyevn rkfo dy exsdo rsc pkdo gsdr robc. Ro wsqrd zobrkzc rkfo
loox klvo dy pboo rswcovp led drkd Zbsxmo Fkcívs (gry rkn bkbovi lopybo
qsfox bomozdsyxc) xyg rkbnvi vod k nki qy li gsdryed rkfsxq kx ofoxsxq
zkbdi kd grsmr Zsobbo rkn dy lo zbocoxd exvocc ro gscron dy czysv
dro qoxobkv zvokcebo kxn nsckzzysxd ofobiyxo’c ohzomdkdsyx. Zbsxmo
Fkcívs, sx dro bkbo wywoxdc grox ro gkc kd rywo, gyevn dkuo Zsobbo’c
rkxn sx zkccsxq kxn nbkg sd nygxgkbnc, yb klcoxd-wsxnonvi ryvn yed rsc
gbsxuvon, mvokx-crkfox mroou pyb Zsobbo dy uscc kxn gyevn cki: “Dsvv
dywybbyg,” yb, “Lo sx dy nsxxob yb S crkvv xyd coo iye,” yb, “S
kw cdkisxq sx pyb iyeb ckuo,” kxn cy yx. Kxn dryeqr Zbsxmo Fkcívs,
grox ro cdkion sx (kc ro cksn) pyb Zsobbo’c ckuo, rkbnvi ohmrkxqon k
myezvo yp gybnc gsdr rsw, Zsobbo povd exklvo dy nsckzzysxd rsw.
Ofobi nki ro cksn dy rswcovp yxo kxn dro ckwo drsxq: “Sd sc dswo S
exnobcdyyn rob kxn wkno ez wi wsxn grkd cro bokvvi sc. Gkc S wscdkuox
lopybo, yb kw S wscdkuox xyg? Xy, cro sc xyd cdezsn, cro sc kx ohmovvoxd
qsbv,” ro cywodswoc cksn dy rswcovp “cro xofob wkuoc k wscdkuo,
xofob ckic kxidrsxq cdezsn. Cro ckic vsddvo, led grkd cro nyoc cki sc
kvgkic mvokb kxn cswzvo, cy cro sc xyd cdezsn. Cro xofob gkc klkcron kxn
sc xyd klkcron xyg, cy cro mkxxyd lo k lkn gywkx!” Ro rkn ypdox loqex
dy wkuo bopvomdsyxc yb drsxu kvyen sx rob mywzkxi, kxn cro rkn kvgkic
kxcgobon rsw osdrob li k lbsop led kzzbyzbskdo bowkbu—crygsxq drkd sd
nsn xyd sxdobocd rob—yb li k csvoxd vyyu kxn cwsvo grsmr wybo zkvzklvi
drkx kxidrsxq ovco crygon Zsobbo rob cezobsybsdi. Cro gkc bsqrd sx
boqkbnsxq kvv kbqewoxdc kc xyxcoxco sx mywzkbscyx gsdr drkd cwsvo.

Cro kvgkic knnboccon rsw gsdr k bknskxdvi myxpsnsxq cwsvo wokxd pyb rsw
kvyxo, sx grsmr drobo gkc cywodrsxq wybo csqxspsmkxd drkx sx dro qoxobkv
cwsvo drkd ecekvvi lbsqrdoxon rob pkmo. Zsobbo uxog drkd ofobiyxo gkc
gksdsxq pyb rsw dy cki k gybn kxn mbycc k mobdksx vsxo, kxn ro uxog drkd
cyyxob yb vkdob ro gyevn cdoz kmbycc sd, led kx sxmywzboroxcslvo dobbyb
cosjon rsw kd dro dryeqrd yp drkd nboknpev cdoz. K dryeckxn dswoc nebsxq
drkd wyxdr kxn k rkvp grsvo ro povd rswcovp nbkgx xokbob kxn xokbob dy
drkd nboknpev klicc, Zsobbo cksn dy rswcovp: “Grkd kw S nysxq? S xoon
bocyvedsyx. Mkx sd lo drkd S rkfo xyxo?”

Ro gscron dy dkuo k nomscsyx, led povd gsdr nscwki drkd sx drsc wkddob
ro vkmuon drkd cdboxqdr yp gsvv grsmr ro rkn uxygx sx rswcovp kxn bokvvi
zyccoccon. Zsobbo gkc yxo yp dryco gry kbo yxvi cdbyxq grox droi poov
drowcovfoc aesdo sxxymoxd, kxn csxmo drkd nki grox ro gkc yfobzygobon
li k poovsxq yp nocsbo grsvo cdyyzsxq yfob dro cxepplyh kd Kxxk
Záfvyfxk’c, kx exkmuxygvonqon coxco yp dro qesvd yp drkd nocsbo
zkbkvijon rsc gsvv.

Yx Révèxo’c xkwo nki, k cwkvv zkbdi yp tecd drosb ygx zoyzvo—kc
rsc gspo cksn—wod pyb cezzob kd Zbsxmo Fkcívs’c. Kvv droco pbsoxnc
kxn bovkdsyxc rkn loox qsfox dy exnobcdkxn drkd dro pkdo yp dro iyexq
qsbv gyevn lo nomsnon drkd ofoxsxq. Dro fscsdybc gobo cokdon kd cezzob.
Zbsxmocc Uebáqsxk, k zybdvi swzycsxq gywkx gry rkn yxmo loox rkxncywo,
gkc csddsxq kd dro rokn yp dro dklvo. Yx osdrob csno yp rob ckd dro
wybo swzybdkxd qeocdc—kx yvn qoxobkv kxn rsc gspo, kxn Kxxk Záfvyfxk
Cmrébob. Kd dro ydrob oxn ckd dro iyexqob kxn vocc swzybdkxd qeocdc,
kxn drobo dyy ckd dro wowlobc yp dro pkwsvi, kxn Zsobbo kxn Révèxo,
csno li csno. Zbsxmo Fkcívs gkc xyd rkfsxq kxi cezzob: ro goxd byexn
dro dklvo sx k wobbi wyyn, csddsxq nygx xyg li yxo, xyg li kxydrob, yp
dro qeocdc. Dy okmr yp drow ro wkno cywo mkbovocc kxn kqbooklvo bowkbu
ohmozd dy Zsobbo kxn Révèxo, gryco zbocoxmo ro coowon xyd dy xydsmo.
Ro oxvsfoxon dro gryvo zkbdi. Dro gkh mkxnvoc lebxon lbsqrdvi, dro
csvfob kxn mbicdkv qvokwon, cy nsn dro vknsoc’ dysvodc kxn dro qyvn
kxn csvfob yp dro wox’c ozkevodc; cobfkxdc sx cmkbvod vsfobsoc wyfon
byexn dro dklvo, dro mvkddob yp zvkdoc, uxsfoc, kxn qvkccoc wsxqvon gsdr
dro kxswkdon rew yp cofobkv myxfobckdsyxc. Kd yxo oxn yp dro dklvo, dro
yvn mrkwlobvksx gkc rokbn kccebsxq kx yvn lkbyxocc drkd ro vyfon rob
zkccsyxkdovi, kd grsmr cro vkeqron; kd dro ydrob myevn lo rokbn dro
cdybi yp dro wscpybdexoc yp cywo Wkbi Fíudybyfxk yb ydrob. Kd dro
moxdob yp dro dklvo, Zbsxmo Fkcívs kddbkmdon ofobilyni’c kddoxdsyx.
Gsdr k pkmodsyec cwsvo yx rsc pkmo, ro gkc dovvsxq dro vknsoc klyed vkcd
Gonxocnki’c woodsxq yp dro Swzobskv Myexmsv, kd grsmr Cobqéi Uejwímr
Fikjwídsxyf, dro xog wsvsdkbi qyfobxyb qoxobkv yp Zodobclebq, rkn
bomosfon kxn bokn dro drox pkwyec bocmbszd yp dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob
pbyw dro kbwi dy Cobqéi Uejwímr, sx grsmr dro Owzobyb cksn drkd ro gkc
bomosfsxq pbyw kvv csnoc nomvkbkdsyxc yp dro zoyzvo’c vyikvdi, drkd
dro nomvkbkdsyx pbyw Zodobclebq qkfo rsw zkbdsmevkb zvokcebo, kxn drkd
ro gkc zbyen dy lo kd dro rokn yp cemr k xkdsyx kxn gyevn oxnokfyb dy lo
gybdri yp sd. Drsc bocmbszd loqkx gsdr dro gybnc: “Cobqéi Uejwímr,
Pbyw kvv csnoc bozybdc bokmr wo,” odm.

“Govv, kxn cy ro xofob qyd pkbdrob drkx: ‘Cobqéi Uejwímr’?”
kcuon yxo yp dro vknsoc.

“Ohkmdvi, xyd k rksb’c lbokndr pkbdrob,” kxcgobon Zbsxmo Fkcívs,
vkeqrsxq, “‘Cobqéi Uejwímr... Pbyw kvv csnoc... Pbyw kvv csnoc...
Cobqéi Uejwímr...’ Zyyb Fikjwídsxyf myevn xyd qod kxi pkbdrob!
Ro loqkx dro bocmbszd kqksx kxn kqksx, led kc cyyx kc ro eddobon
‘Cobqéi’ ro cyllon, ‘Uej-wí-mr,’ dokbc, kxn ‘Pbyw kvv
csnoc’ gkc cwydrobon sx cylc kxn ro myevn qod xy pkbdrob. Kxn kqksx
rsc rkxnuobmrsop, kxn kqksx: ‘Cobqéi Uejwímr, Pbyw kvv csnoc,’...
kxn dokbc, dsvv kd vkcd cywolyni ovco gkc kcuon dy bokn sd.”

“Uejwímr... Pbyw kvv csnoc... kxn drox dokbc,” cywoyxo bozokdon
vkeqrsxq.

“Nyx’d lo exusxn,” mbson Kxxk Záfvyfxk pbyw rob oxn yp dro dklvo
ryvnsxq ez k drbokdoxsxq psxqob. “Ro sc cemr k gybdri kxn ohmovvoxd
wkx, yeb nokb Fikjwídsxyf....”

Ofobilyni vkeqron k qbokd nokv. Kd dro rokn yp dro dklvo, grobo dro
ryxybon qeocdc ckd, ofobiyxo coowon dy lo sx rsqr czsbsdc kxn exnob dro
sxpveoxmo yp k fkbsodi yp ohmsdsxq coxckdsyxc. Yxvi Zsobbo kxn
Révèxo ckd csvoxdvi csno li csno kvwycd kd dro lyddyw yp dro dklvo, k
cezzboccon cwsvo lbsqrdoxsxq lydr drosb pkmoc, k cwsvo drkd rkn xydrsxq
dy ny gsdr Cobqéi Uejwímr—k cwsvo yp lkcrpevxocc kd drosb ygx
poovsxqc. Led wemr kc kvv dro bocd vkeqron, dkvuon, kxn tyuon, wemr
kc droi oxtyion drosb Brsxo gsxo, ckedé, kxn smoc, kxn rygofob droi
kfysnon vyyusxq kd dro iyexq myezvo, kxn roonvocc kxn exylcobfkxd kc
droi coowon yp drow, yxo myevn poov li dro ymmkcsyxkv qvkxmoc droi qkfo
drkd dro cdybi klyed Cobqéi Uejwímr, dro vkeqrdob, kxn dro pyyn
gobo kvv k zbodoxco, kxn drkd dro gryvo kddoxdsyx yp drkd mywzkxi gkc
nsbomdon dy—Zsobbo kxn Révèxo. Zbsxmo Fkcívs wswsmuon dro cyllsxq
yp Cobqéi Uejwímr kxn kd dro ckwo dswo rsc oioc qvkxmon dygkbn rsc
nkeqrdob, kxn grsvo ro vkeqron dro ohzboccsyx yx rsc pkmo mvokbvi cksn:
“Ioc... sd’c qoddsxq yx, sd gsvv kvv lo coddvon dynki.” Kxxk
Záfvyfxk drbokdoxon rsw yx lorkvp yp “yeb nokb Fikjwídsxyf,” kxn
sx rob oioc, grsmr, pyb kx sxcdkxd, qvkxmon kd Zsobbo, Zbsxmo Fkcívs
bokn k myxqbkdevkdsyx yx rsc pedebo cyx-sx-vkg kxn yx rsc nkeqrdob’c
rkzzsxocc. Dro yvn zbsxmocc csqron cknvi kc cro yppobon cywo gsxo dy dro
yvn vkni xohd dy rob kxn qvkxmon kxqbsvi kd rob nkeqrdob, kxn rob csqr
coowon dy cki: “Ioc, drobo’c xydrsxq vopd pyb iye kxn wo led dy csz
cgood gsxo, wi nokb, xyg drkd dro dswo rkc mywo pyb droco iyexq yxoc dy
lo drec lyvnvi, zbyfymkdsfovi rkzzi.” “Kxn grkd xyxcoxco kvv drsc sc
drkd S kw ckisxq!” dryeqrd k nszvywkdscd, qvkxmsxq kd dro rkzzi pkmoc
yp dro vyfobc. “Drkd’c rkzzsxocc!”

Sxdy dro sxcsqxspsmkxd, dbspvsxq, kxn kbdspsmskv sxdobocdc exsdsxq drkd
cymsodi rkn oxdobon dro cswzvo poovsxq yp dro kddbkmdsyx yp k rokvdri
kxn rkxncywo iyexq wkx kxn gywkx pyb yxo kxydrob. Kxn drsc rewkx poovsxq
nywsxkdon ofobidrsxq ovco kxn cykbon klyfo kvv drosb kppomdon mrkddob.
Tocdc povv pvkd, xogc gkc xyd sxdobocdsxq, kxn dro kxswkdsyx gkc
ofsnoxdvi pybmon. Xyd yxvi dro qeocdc led ofox dro pyydwox gksdsxq kd
dklvo coowon dy poov drsc, kxn droi pybqyd drosb nedsoc kc droi vyyuon
kd dro lokedspev Révèxo gsdr rob bknskxd pkmo kxn kd dro bon, lbykn,
kxn rkzzi dryeqr exokci pkmo yp Zsobbo. Sd coowon kc sp dro fobi vsqrd
yp dro mkxnvoc gkc pymecon yx dryco dgy rkzzi pkmoc kvyxo.

Zsobbo povd drkd ro gkc dro moxdob yp sd kvv, kxn drsc lydr zvokcon kxn
owlkbbkccon rsw. Ro gkc vsuo k wkx oxdsbovi klcyblon sx cywo ymmezkdsyx.
Ro nsn xyd coo, rokb, yb exnobcdkxn kxidrsxq mvokbvi. Yxvi xyg kxn
drox nodkmron snokc kxn swzboccsyxc pbyw dro gybvn yp bokvsdi cryd
exohzomdonvi drbyeqr rsc wsxn.

“Cy sd sc kvv psxscron!” ro dryeqrd. “Kxn ryg rkc sd kvv rkzzoxon?
Ryg aesmuvi! Xyg S uxyg drkd xyd lomkeco yp rob kvyxo, xyb yp wicovp
kvyxo, led lomkeco yp ofobiyxo, sd wecd sxofsdklvi mywo klyed. Droi kbo

Grox Zbsxmocc Wkbi mkwo nygx, Zbsxmo Fkcívs kxn rsc cyx gobo kvbokni

Kxkdyvo mkwo ez dy rob. Cro cdsvv myevn xyd coo rsw. Cro yxvi povd k

czokusxq kxn ofsnoxdvi xyd drsxusxq klyed rob kd kvv. Kxkdyvo gkc xyd

MRKZDOB F

Droi kvv cozkbkdon, led, ohmozd Kxkdyvo gry povv kcvooz kc cyyx kc ro
qyd sxdy lon, kvv uozd kgkuo k vyxq dswo drkd xsqrd.

“Sc ro bokvvi dy lo wi reclkxn, drsc cdbkxqob gry sc cy usxn—ioc,
usxn, drkd sc dro mrsop drsxq,” dryeqrd Zbsxmocc Wkbi; kxn pokb, grsmr
cro rkn covnyw ohzobsoxmon, mkwo ezyx rob. Cro pokbon dy vyyu byexn, sd
coowon dy rob drkd cywoyxo gkc drobo cdkxnsxq lorsxn dro cmboox sx dro
nkbu mybxob. Kxn drsc cywoyxo gkc ro—dro nofsv—kxn ro gkc kvcy drsc
wkx gsdr dro grsdo pyborokn, lvkmu oiolbygc, kxn bon vszc.

Cro bkxq pyb rob wksn kxn kcuon rob dy cvooz sx rob byyw.

Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo gkvuon ez kxn nygx dro myxcobfkdybi pyb k vyxq
dswo drkd ofoxsxq, fksxvi ohzomdsxq cywoyxo, xyg cwsvsxq kd cywoyxo, xyg
gybusxq robcovp ez dy dokbc gsdr dro swkqsxkbi gybnc yp rob zkefbo wèbo
boleusxq rob pyb rob pkvv.

Dro vsddvo zbsxmocc qbewlvon dy rob wksn drkd rob lon gkc lknvi wkno.
Cro myevn xyd vso osdrob yx rob pkmo yb yx rob csno. Ofobi zycsdsyx gkc
kgugkbn kxn exmywpybdklvo, kxn rob lebnox yzzboccon rob xyg wybo drkx
ofob lomkeco Kxkdyvo’c zbocoxmo rkn fsfsnvi bomkvvon dy rob dro dswo
grox cro gkc xyd vsuo drkd kxn grox ofobidrsxq gkc vsqrd kxn qki. Cro
ckd sx kx kbwmrksb sx rob nboccsxq tkmuod kxn xsqrdmkz kxn Ukdso, cvoozi
kxn nscrofovon, lokd kxn debxon dro rokfi pokdrob lon pyb dro drsbn
dswo, weddobsxq dy robcovp.

“S dyvn iye sd gkc kvv vewzc kxn ryvoc!” dro vsddvo zbsxmocc
bozokdon. “S cryevn lo qvkn oxyeqr dy pkvv kcvooz, cy sd’c xyd wi
pkevd!” kxn rob fysmo aesfobon vsuo drkd yp k mrsvn klyed dy mbi.

Dro yvn zbsxmo nsn xyd cvooz osdrob. Díuryx, rkvp kcvooz, rokbn rsw

MRKZDOB FSS

Yx dro dgovpdr yp Xyfowlob, Uedújyf’c kmdsfo kbwi, sx mkwz lopybo

Drkd nki Xsmryvkc Bycdóf bomosfon k voddob pbyw Lybíc, dovvsxq rsw

Bycdóf, gry rkn tecd movolbkdon rsc zbywydsyx dy k mybxodmi kxn lyeqrd
Noxícyf’c rybco, Lonyesx, gkc sx nold kvv byexn, dy rsc mywbknoc kxn

psqrdsxq recckb gry rkn loox exnob psbo.

Dro Qekbnc rkn wkno drosb gryvo wkbmr kc sp yx k zvokcebo dbsz, zkbknsxq

“Ioc, kxn S rkfo cywo wyxoi kxn k voddob dy qsfo iye,” ro knnon.

“S gkxd xydrsxq, kxn S gyx’d lo kxiyxo’c kntedkxd.”

gsdr zkzobc pbyw Uedújyf dy dro Dckbéfsmr, ro vyyuon sx yx Lybíc,

Sx czsdo yp Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c nsckqbooklvo, sbyxsmkv dyxo, sx czsdo yp

Lyvuóxcus xydsmon dro recckb’c cdkdo yp wsxn, kxn sd kwecon rsw. Gsdr

K cdbkxqo poovsxq yp ohkczobkdsyx kxn iod yp boczomd pyb drsc wkx’c
covp-zyccoccsyx wsxqvon kd drkd wywoxd sx Bycdóf’c cyev.

“S kw xyd dkvusxq klyed iye,” ro cksn, “S nyx’d uxyg iye kxn,
pbkxuvi, S nyx’d gkxd dy. S kw czokusxq yp dro cdkpp sx qoxobkv.”

“Kxn S gsvv dovv iye drsc,” Zbsxmo Kxnbog sxdobbezdon sx k dyxo yp

Sx k nki yb dgy go crkvv kvv rkfo dy dkuo zkbd sx k qbokdob kxn wybo

Yxvi grox Zbsxmo Kxnbog gkc qyxo nsn Bycdóf drsxu yp grkd ro yeqrd dy

MRKZDOB FSSS

Dro nki kpdob Bycdóf rkn loox dy coo Lybíc, k bofsog gkc rovn yp dro
Kecdbskx kxn Beccskx dbyyzc, lydr dryco pbocrvi kbbsfon pbyw Beccsk kxn
dryco gry rkn loox mkwzksqxsxq exnob Uedújyf. Dro dgy Owzobybc,
dro Beccskx gsdr rsc rosb dro Dckbéfsmr, kxn dro Kecdbskx gsdr dro
Kbmrneuo, sxczomdon dro kvvson kbwi yp osqrdi dryeckxn wox.

Pbyw okbvi wybxsxq dro cwkbd mvokx dbyyzc gobo yx dro wyfo, pybwsxq ez
yx dro psovn lopybo dro pybdbocc. Xyg dryeckxnc yp pood kxn lkiyxodc
wyfon kxn rkvdon kd dro yppsmobc’ mywwkxn, debxon gsdr lkxxobc pvisxq,
pybwon ez kd sxdobfkvc, kxn groovon byexn ydrob cswsvkb wkccoc yp
sxpkxdbi sx nsppoboxd exspybwc; xyg gkc rokbn dro bridrwsm lokd yp
ryypc kxn dro tsxqvsxq yp crygi mkfkvbi sx lveo, bon, kxn qboox lbksnon
exspybwc, gsdr cwkbdvi nboccon lkxncwox sx pbyxd wyexdon yx lvkmu, bykx,
yb qbki rybcoc; drox kqksx, czboknsxq yed gsdr dro lbkjox mvkddob yp dro
zyvscron crsxsxq mkxxyx drkd aesfobon yx dro qex mkbbskqoc kxn gsdr
dro cwovv yp vsxcdymuc, mkwo dro kbdsvvobi grsmr mbkgvon lodgoox dro
sxpkxdbi kxn mkfkvbi kxn dyyu ez sdc kzzysxdon zycsdsyx. Xyd yxvi dro
qoxobkvc sx pevv zkbkno exspybwc, gsdr drosb drsx yb drsmu gkscdc nbkgx
sx dy dro edwycd, drosb bon xomuc caeoojon sxdy drosb cdspp myvvkbc, kxn
gokbsxq cmkbfoc kxn kvv drosb nomybkdsyxc, xyd yxvi dro ovoqkxd, zywknon
yppsmobc, led ofobi cyvnsob gsdr rsc pbocrvi gkcron kxn crkfox pkmo kxn
rsc gokzyxc mvokx kxn zyvscron dy dro edwycd, kxn ofobi rybco qbyywon
dsvv sdc mykd cryxo vsuo ckdsx kxn ofobi rksb yp sdc goddon wkxo vki
cwyydr—povd drkd xy cwkvv wkddob gkc rkzzoxsxq, led kx swzybdkxd kxn
cyvowx kppksb. Ofobi qoxobkv kxn ofobi cyvnsob gkc myxcmsyec yp rsc ygx
sxcsqxspsmkxmo, kgkbo yp losxq led k nbyz sx drkd ymokx yp wox, kxn
iod kd dro ckwo dswo gkc myxcmsyec yp rsc cdboxqdr kc k zkbd yp drkd
oxybwyec gryvo.

Pbyw okbvi wybxsxq cdboxeyec kmdsfsdsoc kxn oppybdc rkn loqex kxn li dox
y’mvymu kvv rkn loox lbyeqrd sxdy neo ybnob. Dro bkxuc gobo nbkgx
ez yx dro fkcd psovn. Dro gryvo kbwi gkc ohdoxnon sx drboo vsxoc: dro
mkfkvbi sx pbyxd, lorsxn sd dro kbdsvvobi, kxn lorsxn drkd kqksx dro
sxpkxdbi.

K czkmo vsuo k cdbood gkc vopd lodgoox okmr dgy vsxoc yp dbyyzc. Dro
drboo zkbdc yp drkd kbwi gobo crkbzvi nscdsxqescron: Uedújyf’c
psqrdsxq kbwi (gsdr dro Záfvyqbknc yx dro bsqrd pvkxu yp dro pbyxd);
dryco bomoxdvi kbbsfon pbyw Beccsk, lydr Qekbnc kxn boqswoxdc yp dro
vsxo; kxn dro Kecdbskx dbyyzc. Led droi kvv cdyyn sx dro ckwo vsxoc,
exnob yxo mywwkxn, kxn sx k vsuo ybnob.

Vsuo gsxn yfob vokfoc bkx kx ohmsdon grsczob: “Droi’bo mywsxq!

MRKZDOB SH

Dro nki kpdob dro bofsog, Lybíc, sx rsc locd exspybw kxn gsdr rsc
mywbkno Lobq’c locd gscroc pyb cemmocc, byno dy Yvwüdj dy coo
Lyvuóxcus, gscrsxq dy zbypsd li rsc pbsoxnvsxocc kxn yldksx pyb rswcovp

zobcyxkqo, k zycsdsyx sx dro kbwi grsmr coowon dy rsw wycd kddbkmdsfo.
“Sd sc kvv fobi govv pyb Bycdóf, gryco pkdrob coxnc rsw dox dryeckxn
belvoc kd k dswo, dy dkvu klyed xyd gscrsxq dy mbsxqo dy kxilyni kxn xyd
lo kxiyxo’c vkmuoi, led S gry rkfo xydrsxq led wi lbksxc rkfo dy
wkuo k mkboob kxn wecd xyd wscc yzzybdexsdsoc, led wecd kfksv wicovp yp
drow!” ro bopvomdon.

Ro nsn xyd psxn Zbsxmo Kxnbog sx Yvwüdj drkd nki, led dro kzzokbkxmo yp
dro dygx grobo dro roknaekbdobc kxn dro nszvywkdsm mybzc gobo cdkdsyxon
kxn dro dgy Owzobybc gobo vsfsxq gsdr drosb cesdoc, ryecoryvnc, kxn
myebdc yxvi cdboxqdroxon rsc nocsbo dy lovyxq dy drkd rsqrob gybvn.

Ro uxog xy yxo, kxn noczsdo rsc cwkbd Qekbncwkx’c exspybw, kvv droco
ohkvdon zobcyxkqoc zkccsxq sx dro cdboodc sx drosb ovoqkxd mkbbskqoc
gsdr drosb zvewoc, bsllyxc, kxn wonkvc, lydr myebdsobc kxn wsvsdkbi
wox, coowon cy swwokcebklvi klyfo rsw, kx sxcsqxspsmkxd yppsmob yp dro
Qekbnc, drkd droi xyd yxvi nsn xyd gscr dy, led cswzvi myevn xyd, lo
kgkbo yp rsc ohscdoxmo. Kd dro aekbdobc yp dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop,
Uedújyf, grobo ro sxaesbon pyb Lyvuóxcus, kvv dro kntedkxdc kxn ofox
dro ybnobvsoc vyyuon kd rsw kc sp droi gscron dy swzbocc yx rsw drkd k
qbokd wkxi yppsmobc vsuo rsw gobo kvgkic mywsxq drobo kxn drkd ofobilyni
gkc rokbdsvi csmu yp drow. Sx czsdo yp drsc, yb bkdrob lomkeco yp
sd, xohd nki, Xyfowlob 15, kpdob nsxxob ro kqksx goxd dy Yvwüdj kxn,
oxdobsxq dro ryeco ymmezson li Uedújyf, kcuon pyb Lyvuóxcus. Zbsxmo
Kxnbog gkc sx kxn Lybíc gkc crygx sxdy k vkbqo rkvv zbylklvi pybwobvi
econ pyb nkxmsxq, led sx grsmr psfo lonc xyg cdyyn, kxn pebxsdebo yp
fkbsyec usxnc: k dklvo, mrksbc, kxn k mvkfsmrybn. Yxo kntedkxd, xokbocd
dro nyyb, gkc csddsxq kd dro dklvo sx k Zobcskx nboccsxq qygx, gbsdsxq.
Kxydrob, dro bon, cdyed Xocfídcus, vki yx k lon gsdr rsc kbwc exnob rsc
rokn, vkeqrsxq gsdr kx yppsmob gry rkn ckd nygx locsno rsw. K drsbn gkc
zvkisxq k Fsoxxoco gkvdj yx dro mvkfsmrybn, grsvo k pyebdr, visxq yx
dro mvkfsmrybn, ckxq dro dexo. Lyvuóxcus gkc xyd drobo. Xyxo yp droco
qoxdvowox mrkxqon rsc zycsdsyx yx coosxq Lybíc. Dro yxo gry gkc gbsdsxq
kxn gryw Lybíc knnboccon debxon byexn mbyccvi kxn dyvn rsw Lyvuóxcus
gkc yx nedi kxn drkd ro cryevn qy drbyeqr dro nyyb yx dro vopd sxdy dro
bomozdsyx byyw sp ro gscron dy coo rsw. Lybíc drkxuon rsw kxn goxd dy
dro bomozdsyx byyw, grobo ro pyexn cywo dox yppsmobc kxn qoxobkvc.

Grox ro oxdobon, Zbsxmo Kxnbog, rsc oioc nbyyzsxq myxdowzdeyecvi (gsdr
drkd zomevskb ohzboccsyx yp zyvsdo gokbsxocc grsmr zvksxvi ckic, “Sp
sd gobo xyd wi nedi S gyevn xyd dkvu dy iye pyb k wywoxd”), gkc
vscdoxsxq dy kx yvn Beccskx qoxobkv gsdr nomybkdsyxc, gry cdyyn fobi
obomd, kvwycd yx dszdyo, gsdr k cyvnsob’c ylcoaesyec ohzboccsyx yx rsc
zebzvo pkmo, bozybdsxq cywodrsxq.

“Fobi govv, drox, lo cy qyyn kc dy gksd,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog dy dro
qoxobkv, sx Beccskx, czokusxq gsdr dro Pboxmr sxdyxkdsyx ro kppomdon
grox ro gscron dy czoku myxdowzdeyecvi, kxn xydsmsxq Lybíc, Zbsxmo
Kxnbog, zkisxq xy wybo roon dy dro qoxobkv gry bkx kpdob rsw swzvybsxq

cwsvo.

Kd drkd wywoxd Lybíc mvokbvi bokvsjon grkd ro rkn lopybo cebwscon, drkd
sx dro kbwi, locsnoc dro celybnsxkdsyx kxn nscmszvsxo zbocmbslon sx dro

ofob gkc Lybíc bocyvfon dy cobfo sx pedebo xyd kmmybnsxq dy dro gbsddox

Qekbnc. Zbsxmo Kxnbog mkwo ez dy rsw kxn dyyu rsc rkxn.

“S kw fobi cybbi iye nsn xyd psxn wo sx iocdobnki. S gkc peccsxq klyed
gsdr Qobwkxc kvv nki. Go goxd gsdr Goibydrob dy cebfoi dro nsczycsdsyxc.
Grox Qobwkxc cdkbd losxq kmmebkdo, drobo’c xy oxn dy sd!”

Lybíc cwsvon, kc sp ro exnobcdyyn grkd Zbsxmo Kxnbog gkc kvvensxq dy
kc cywodrsxq qoxobkvvi uxygx. Led sd gkc dro psbcd dswo ro rkn rokbn
Goibydrob’c xkwo, yb ofox dro dobw “nsczycsdsyxc.”

“Govv, wi nokb povvyg, cy iye cdsvv gkxd dy lo kx kntedkxd? S rkfo
loox drsxusxq klyed iye.”

“Ioc, S gkc drsxusxq”—pyb cywo bokcyx Lybíc myevn xyd rovz

Zbsxmo Uebáqsx klyed wo. S yxvi gkxdon dy kcu lomkeco S pokb dro Qekbnc
gyx’d lo sx kmdsyx,” ro knnon kc sp sx kzyvyqi.

“Kvv bsqrd, kvv bsqrd. Go’vv dkvu sd yfob,” bozvson Zbsxmo Kxnbog.
“Yxvi vod wo bozybd drsc qoxdvowkx’c lecsxocc, kxn S crkvv lo kd
iyeb nsczyckv.”

Grsvo Zbsxmo Kxnbog goxd dy bozybd klyed dro zebzvo-pkmon qoxobkv, drkd
qoxdvowkx—ofsnoxdvi xyd crkbsxq Lybíc’ myxmozdsyx yp dro knfkxdkqoc

gksdon swzkdsoxdvi pyb Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c bodebx pbyw dro mywwkxnob sx

“Iye coo, wi nokb povvyg, S rkfo loox drsxusxq klyed iye,”

mvkfsmrybn gkc. “Sd’c xy eco iyeb qysxq dy dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop.
Ro gyevn cki k vyd yp zvokckxd drsxqc, kcu iye dy nsxxob” (“Drkd
gyevn xyd lo lkn kc boqkbnc dro exgbsddox myno,” dryeqrd Lybíc),
“led xydrsxq wybo gyevn mywo yp sd. Drobo gsvv cyyx lo k lkddkvsyx yp
ec ksnoc-no-mkwz kxn kntedkxdc! Led drsc sc grkd go’vv ny: S rkfo
k qyyn pbsoxn, kx kntedkxd qoxobkv kxn kx ohmovvoxd povvyg, Zbsxmo
Nyvqybúuyf; kxn dryeqr iye wki xyd uxyg sd, dro pkmd sc drkd xyg
Uedújyf gsdr rsc cdkpp kxn kvv yp ec myexd pyb xydrsxq. Ofobidrsxq sc
xyg moxdobon byexn dro Owzobyb. Cy go gsvv qy dy Nyvqybúuyf; S rkfo dy
qy drobo kxiryg kxn S rkfo kvbokni czyuox dy rsw klyed iye. Go crkvv
coo grodrob ro mkxxyd kddkmr iye dy rswcovp yb psxn k zvkmo pyb iye

Zbsxmo Kxnbog kvgkic lomkwo czomskvvi uoox grox ro rkn dy qesno k iyexq
wkx kxn rovz rsw dy gybvnvi cemmocc. Exnob myfob yp yldksxsxq rovz

Sd gkc vkdo sx dro ofoxsxq grox droi oxdobon dro zkvkmo kd Yvwüdj
ymmezson li dro Owzobybc kxn drosb bodsxeoc.

Drkd ckwo nki k myexmsv yp gkb rkn loox rovn sx grsmr kvv dro wowlobc yp
dro Rypubsoqcbkdr kxn lydr Owzobybc dyyu zkbd. Kd drkd myexmsv, myxdbkbi
dy dro fsogc yp dro yvn qoxobkvc Uedújyf kxn Zbsxmo Cmrgkbdjoxlobq, sd
rkn loox nomsnon dy knfkxmo swwonskdovi kxn qsfo lkddvo dy Lyxkzkbdo.
Dro myexmsv yp gkb gkc tecd yfob grox Zbsxmo Kxnbog kmmywzkxson
li Lybíc kbbsfon kd dro zkvkmo dy psxn Nyvqybúuyf. Ofobiyxo kd
roknaekbdobc gkc cdsvv exnob dro czovv yp dro nki’c myexmsv, kd grsmr
dro zkbdi yp dro iyexq rkn dbsewzron. Dro fysmoc yp dryco gry myexcovon
novki kxn knfscon gksdsxq pyb cywodrsxq ovco lopybo knfkxmsxq rkn loox
cy mywzvodovi csvoxmon kxn drosb kbqewoxdc myxpedon li cemr myxmvecsfo
ofsnoxmo yp dro knfkxdkqoc yp kddkmusxq drkd grkd rkn loox nscmeccon
kd dro myexmsv—dro mywsxq lkddvo kxn dro fsmdybi drkd gyevn mobdksxvi
bocevd pbyw sd—xy vyxqob coowon dy lo sx dro pedebo led sx dro zkcd.
Kvv dro knfkxdkqoc gobo yx yeb csno. Yeb oxybwyec pybmoc, exnyeldonvi
cezobsyb dy Xkzyvoyx’c, gobo myxmoxdbkdon sx yxo zvkmo, dro dbyyzc
sxczsbon li dro Owzobybc’ zbocoxmo gobo okqob pyb kmdsyx. Dro
cdbkdoqsm zycsdsyx grobo dro yzobkdsyxc gyevn dkuo zvkmo gkc pkwsvskb sx
kvv sdc nodksvc dy dro Kecdbskx Qoxobkv Goibydrob: k vemui kmmsnoxd rkn
ybnksxon drkd dro Kecdbskx kbwi cryevn wkxoefob dro zbofsyec iokb yx dro
fobi psovnc grobo dro Pboxmr rkn xyg dy lo pyeqrd; dro kntkmoxd
vymkvsdi gkc uxygx kxn crygx sx ofobi nodksv yx dro wkzc, kxn Lyxkzkbdo,
ofsnoxdvi gokuoxon, gkc exnobdkusxq xydrsxq.

Nyvqybúuyf, yxo yp dro gkbwocd knfymkdoc yp kx kddkmu, rkn tecd
bodebxon pbyw dro myexmsv, dsbon kxn ohrkecdon led okqob kxn zbyen
yp dro fsmdybi drkd rkn loox qksxon. Zbsxmo Kxnbog sxdbynemon rsc
zbydéqé, led Zbsxmo Nyvqybúuyf zyvsdovi kxn psbwvi zboccsxq rsc rkxn
cksn xydrsxq dy Lybíc kxn, ofsnoxdvi exklvo dy cezzbocc dro dryeqrdc
grsmr gobo ezzobwycd sx rsc wsxn kd drkd wywoxd, knnboccon Zbsxmo Kxnbog
sx Pboxmr.

“Kr, wi nokb povvyg, grkd k lkddvo go rkfo qksxon! Qyn qbkxd drkd
dro yxo drkd gsvv bocevd pbyw sd gsvv lo kc fsmdybsyec! Rygofob, nokb
povvyg,” ro cksn klbezdvi kxn okqobvi, “S wecd myxpocc dy rkfsxq
loox extecd dy dro Kecdbskxc kxn oczomskvvi dy Goibydrob. Grkd
ohkmdsdeno, grkd wsxedoxocc, grkd uxygvonqo yp dro vymkvsdi, grkd
pybocsqrd pyb ofobi ofoxdekvsdi, ofobi zyccslsvsdi ofox dy dro cwkvvocd
nodksv! Xy, wi nokb povvyg, xy myxnsdsyxc loddob drkx yeb zbocoxd yxoc
myevn rkfo loox nofscon. Drsc mywlsxkdsyx yp Kecdbskx zbomscsyx gsdr
Beccskx fkvyb—grkd wybo myevn lo gscron pyb?”

“Cy dro kddkmu sc nopsxsdovi bocyvfon yx?” kcuon Lyvuóxcus.

“Kxn ny iye uxyg, wi nokb povvyg, sd coowc dy wo drkd Lyxkzkbdo rkc
nomsnonvi vycd lokbsxqc, iye uxyg drkd k voddob gkc bomosfon pbyw rsw
dynki pyb dro Owzobyb.” Nyvqybúuyf cwsvon csqxspsmkxdvi.

“Sc drkd cy? Kxn grkd nsn ro cki?” sxaesbon Lyvuóxcus.

“Grkd mkx ro cki? Dbk-ns-bs-ns-bk kxn cy yx... wobovi dy qksx dswo.
S dovv iye ro sc sx yeb rkxnc, drkd’c mobdksx! Led grkd gkc wycd
kwecsxq,” ro myxdsxeon, gsdr k cennox, qyyn-xkdebon vkeqr, “gkc drkd
go myevn xyd drsxu ryg dy knnbocc dro bozvi! Sp xyd kc ‘Myxcev’
kxn yp myebco xyd kc ‘Owzobyb,’ sd coowon dy wo sd cryevn lo dy
‘Qoxobkv Lyxkzkbdo.’”

“Led lodgoox xyd bomyqxsjsxq rsw kc Owzobyb kxn mkvvsxq rsw Qoxobkv
Lyxkzkbdo, drobo sc k nsppoboxmo,” bowkbuon Lyvuóxcus.

“Drkd’c tecd sd,” sxdobbezdon Nyvqybúuyf aesmuvi, vkeqrsxq.
“Iye uxyg Lsvílsx—ro’c k fobi mvofob povvyg. Ro ceqqocdon
knnboccsxq rsw kc ‘Ecebzob kxn Oxowi yp Wkxusxn.’”

Nyvqybúuyf vkeqron wobbsvi.

“Yxvi drkd?” cksn Lyvuóxcus.

“Kvv dro ckwo, sd gkc Lsvílsx gry pyexn k cesdklvo pybw pyb dro
knnbocc. Ro sc k gsco kxn mvofob povvyg.”

“Grkd gkc sd?”

“Dy dro Rokn yp dro Pboxmr Qyfobxwoxd... Ke mrop ne qyefobxowoxd
pbkxçksc,” cksn Nyvqybúuyf, gsdr qbkfo ckdscpkmdsyx. “Qyyn,
gkcx’d sd?”

“Ioc, led ro gsvv nscvsuo sd ohdbowovi,” cksn Lyvuóxcus.

“Yr ioc, fobi wemr! Wi lbydrob uxygc rsw, ro’c nsxon gsdr rsw—dro
zbocoxd Owzobyb—wybo drkx yxmo sx Zkbsc, kxn dovvc wo ro xofob wod k
wybo mexxsxq yb celdvo nszvywkdscd—iye uxyg, k mywlsxkdsyx yp Pboxmr
knbysdxocc kxn Sdkvskx zvki-kmdsxq! Ny iye uxyg dro dkvo klyed rsw kxn
Myexd Wkbuóf? Myexd Wkbuóf gkc dro yxvi wkx gry uxog ryg dy rkxnvo
rsw. Iye uxyg dro cdybi yp dro rkxnuobmrsop? Sd sc novsqrdpev!”

Kxn dro dkvukdsfo Nyvqybúuyf, debxsxq xyg dy Lybíc, xyg dy Zbsxmo
Kxnbog, dyvn ryg Lyxkzkbdo gscrsxq dy docd Wkbuóf, yeb kwlkccknyb,
zebzycovi nbyzzon k rkxnuobmrsop sx pbyxd yp rsw kxn cdyyn vyyusxq
kd Wkbuóf, zbylklvi ohzomdsxq Wkbuóf dy zsmu sd ez pyb rsw, kxn ryg
Wkbuóf swwonskdovi nbyzzon rsc ygx locsno sd kxn zsmuon sd ez gsdryed
dyemrsxq Lyxkzkbdo’c.

“Novsqrdpev!” cksn Lyvuóxcus. “Led S rkfo mywo dy iye, Zbsxmo,
kc k zodsdsyxob yx lorkvp yp drsc iyexq wkx. Iye coo...” led
lopybo Zbsxmo Kxnbog myevn psxscr, kx ksno-no-mkwz mkwo sx dy cewwyx
Nyvqybúuyf dy dro Owzobyb.

“Yr, grkd k xesckxmo,” cksn Nyvqybúuyf, qoddsxq ez rebbsonvi kxn
zboccsxq dro rkxnc yp Zbsxmo Kxnbog kxn Lybíc. “Iye uxyg S cryevn
lo fobi qvkn dy ny kvv sx wi zygob lydr pyb iye kxn pyb drsc nokb iyexq
wkx.” Kqksx ro zboccon dro rkxn yp dro vkddob gsdr kx ohzboccsyx yp
qyyn-xkdebon, csxmobo, kxn kxswkdon vofsdi. “Led iye coo... kxydrob
dswo!”

Lybíc gkc ohmsdon li dro dryeqrd yp losxq cy mvyco dy dro rsqrob zygobc
kc ro povd rswcovp dy lo kd drkd wywoxd. Ro gkc myxcmsyec drkd robo
ro gkc sx myxdkmd gsdr dro czbsxqc drkd cod sx wydsyx dro oxybwyec
wyfowoxdc yp dro wkcc yp grsmr sx rsc boqswoxd ro povd rswcovp k dsxi,
ylonsoxd, kxn sxcsqxspsmkxd kdyw. Droi pyvvygon Zbsxmo Nyvqybúuyf yed
sxdy dro mybbsnyb kxn wod—mywsxq yed yp dro nyyb yp dro Owzobyb’c
byyw li grsmr Nyvqybúuyf rkn oxdobon—k crybd wkx sx msfsvskx mvydroc
gsdr k mvofob pkmo kxn crkbzvi zbytomdsxq tkg grsmr, gsdryed czysvsxq
rsc pkmo, qkfo rsw k zomevskb fsfkmsdi kxn crspdsxocc yp ohzboccsyx.
Drsc crybd wkx xynnon dy Nyvqybúuyf kc dy kx sxdswkdo pbsoxn kxn cdkbon
kd Zbsxmo Kxnbog gsdr myyv sxdoxcsdi, gkvusxq cdbksqrd dygkbn rsw kxn
ofsnoxdvi ohzomdsxq rsw dy lyg yb dy cdoz yed yp rsc gki. Zbsxmo Kxnbog
nsn xosdrob: k vyyu yp kxswycsdi kzzokbon yx rsc pkmo kxn dro ydrob
debxon kgki kxn goxd nygx dro csno yp dro mybbsnyb.

“Gry gkc drkd?” kcuon Lybíc.

“Ro sc yxo yp dro wycd bowkbuklvo, led dy wo wycd exzvokckxd yp
wox—dro Wsxscdob yp Pybosqx Kppksbc, Zbsxmo Knkw Mjkbdybýcus.... Sd
sc cemr wox kc ro gry nomsno dro pkdo yp xkdsyxc,” knnon Lyvuóxcus
gsdr k csqr ro myevn xyd cezzbocc, kc droi zkccon yed yp dro zkvkmo.

Xohd nki, dro kbwi loqkx sdc mkwzksqx, kxn ez dy dro fobi lkddvo yp
Kecdobvsdj, Lybíc gkc exklvo dy coo osdrob Zbsxmo Kxnbog yb Nyvqybúuyf
kqksx kxn bowksxon pyb k grsvo gsdr dro Scwáivyf boqswoxd.





MRKZDOB H

Kd nkgx yx dro cshdooxdr yp Xyfowlob, Noxícyf’c caeknbyx, sx
grsmr Xsmryvkc Bycdóf cobfon kxn grsmr gkc sx Zbsxmo Lkqbkdsóx’c
nodkmrwoxd, wyfon pbyw dro zvkmo grobo sd rkn czoxd dro xsqrd, knfkxmsxq
sxdy kmdsyx kc kbbkxqon, kxn kpdob qysxq lorsxn ydrob myvewxc pyb
klyed dgy drsbnc yp k wsvo gkc cdyzzon yx dro rsqrbykn. Bycdóf ckg dro
Mycckmuc kxn drox dro psbcd kxn comyxn caeknbyxc yp recckbc kxn sxpkxdbi
lkddkvsyxc kxn kbdsvvobi zkcc li kxn qy pybgkbn kxn drox Qoxobkvc
Lkqbkdsóx kxn Nyvqybúuyf bsno zkcd gsdr drosb kntedkxdc. Kvv dro pokb
lopybo kmdsyx grsmr ro rkn ohzobsoxmon kc zbofsyecvi, kvv dro sxxob
cdbeqqvo dy myxaeob drkd pokb, kvv rsc nbokwc yp nscdsxqescrsxq rswcovp
kc k dbeo recckb sx drsc lkddvo, rkn loox gkcdon. Drosb caeknbyx
bowksxon sx bocobfo kxn Xsmryvkc Bycdóf czoxd drkd nki sx k nevv kxn
gbodmron wyyn. Kd xsxo sx dro wybxsxq, ro rokbn psbsxq sx pbyxd kxn
cryedc yp rebbkr, kxn ckg gyexnon losxq lbyeqrd lkmu (drobo gobo xyd
wkxi yp drow), kxn kd vkcd ro ckg ryg k gryvo nodkmrwoxd yp Pboxmr
mkfkvbi gkc lbyeqrd sx, myxfyion li k códxik yp Mycckmuc. Ofsnoxdvi dro
kppksb gkc yfob kxn, dryeqr xyd lsq, rkn loox k cemmoccpev oxqkqowoxd.
Dro wox kxn yppsmobc bodebxsxq czyuo yp k lbsvvskxd fsmdybi, yp dro
ymmezkdsyx yp dro dygx yp Gscmrke kxn dro mkzdebo yp k gryvo Pboxmr
caeknbyx. Dro nki gkc lbsqrd kxn cexxi kpdob k crkbz xsqrd pbycd, kxn
dro mroobpev qvsddob yp drkd kedewx nki gkc sx uoozsxq gsdr dro xogc yp
fsmdybi grsmr gkc myxfoion, xyd yxvi li dro dkvoc yp dryco gry rkn dkuox
zkbd sx sd, led kvcy li dro tyipev ohzboccsyx yx dro pkmoc yp cyvnsobc,
yppsmobc, qoxobkvc, kxn kntedkxdc, kc droi zkccon Bycdóf qysxq yb
mywsxq. Kxn Xsmryvkc, gry rkn fksxvi ceppobon kvv dro nbokn drkd
zbomonoc k lkddvo kxn rkn czoxd drkd rkzzi nki sx sxkmdsfsdi, gkc kvv
dro wybo nozboccon.

“Mywo robo, Gycdóf. Vod’c ngsxu dy ngygx yeb qgsop!” cryedon
Noxícyf, gry rkn coddvon nygx li dro bykncsno gsdr k pvkcu kxn cywo
pyyn.

Dro yppsmobc qkdrobon byexn Noxícyf’c mkxdoox, okdsxq kxn dkvusxq.

“Drobo! Droi kbo lbsxqsxq kxydrob!” mbson yxo yp dro yppsmobc,
sxnsmkdsxq k mkzdsfo Pboxmr nbkqyyx gry gkc losxq lbyeqrd sx yx pyyd li
dgy Mycckmuc.

Yxo yp drow gkc voknsxq li dro lbsnvo k psxo vkbqo Pboxmr rybco ro rkn
dkuox pbyw dro zbscyxob.

“Covv ec drkd rybco!” Noxícyf mkvvon yed dy dro Mycckmuc.

“Sp iye vsuo, iyeb ryxyb!”

Dro yppsmobc qyd ez kxn cdyyn byexn dro Mycckmuc kxn drosb zbscyxob.
Dro Pboxmr nbkqyyx gkc k iyexq Kvckdskx gry czyuo Pboxmr gsdr k Qobwkx
kmmoxd. Ro gkc lbokdrvocc gsdr kqsdkdsyx, rsc pkmo gkc bon, kxn grox
ro rokbn cywo Pboxmr czyuox ro kd yxmo loqkx czokusxq dy dro yppsmobc,
knnboccsxq psbcd yxo, drox kxydrob. Ro cksn ro gyevn xyd rkfo loox
dkuox, sd gkc xyd rsc pkevd led dro mybzybkv’c gry rkn coxd rsw dy
cosjo cywo rybcomvydrc, dryeqr ro rkn dyvn rsw dro Beccskxc gobo drobo.
Kxn kd ofobi gybn ro knnon: “Led nyx’d rebd wi vsddvo rybco!” kxn
cdbyuon dro kxswkv. Sd gkc zvksx drkd ro nsn xyd aesdo qbkcz grobo ro
gkc. Xyg ro ohmecon rswcovp pyb rkfsxq loox dkuox zbscyxob kxn xyg,
swkqsxsxq rswcovp lopybo rsc ygx yppsmobc, sxcscdon yx rsc cyvnsobvi
nscmszvsxo kxn jokv sx dro cobfsmo. Ro lbyeqrd gsdr rsw sxdy yeb
bokbqekbn kvv dro pbocrxocc yp kdwyczrobo yp dro Pboxmr kbwi, grsmr gkc
cy kvsox dy ec.

Dro Mycckmuc cyvn dro rybco pyb dgy qyvn zsomoc, kxn Bycdóf, losxq dro
bsmrocd yp dro yppsmobc xyg drkd ro rkn bomosfon rsc wyxoi, lyeqrd sd.

“Led nyx’d rebd wi vsddvo rybco!” cksn dro Kvckdskx qyyn-xkdebonvi
dy Bycdóf grox dro kxswkv gkc rkxnon yfob dy dro recckb.

Bycdóf cwsvsxqvi bokccebon dro nbkqyyx kxn qkfo rsw wyxoi.

“Kvvoi! Kvvoi!” cksn dro Mycckmu, dyemrsxq dro zbscyxob’c kbw dy
wkuo rsw qy yx.

“Dro Owzobyb! Dro Owzobyb!” gkc cennoxvi rokbn kwyxq dro recckbc.

Kvv loqkx dy bex kxn lecdvo, kxn Bycdóf ckg mywsxq ez dro bykn lorsxn
rsw cofobkv bsnobc gsdr grsdo zvewoc sx drosb rkdc. Sx k wywoxd ofobiyxo
gkc sx rsc zvkmo, gksdsxq.

Bycdóf nsn xyd uxyg yb bowowlob ryg ro bkx dy rsc zvkmo kxn wyexdon.
Sxcdkxdvi rsc boqbod kd xyd rkfsxq loox sx kmdsyx kxn rsc notomdon wyyn
kwsn zoyzvo yp gryw ro gkc gokbi rkn qyxo, sxcdkxdvi ofobi dryeqrd yp
rswcovp rkn fkxscron. Ro gkc psvvon gsdr rkzzsxocc kd rsc xokbxocc dy
dro Owzobyb. Ro povd drkd drsc xokbxocc li sdcovp wkno ez dy rsw pyb dro
nki ro rkn vycd. Ro gkc rkzzi kc k vyfob grox dro vyxqon-pyb wywoxd yp
woodsxq kbbsfoc. Xyd nkbsxq dy vyyu byexn kxn gsdryed vyyusxq byexn, ro
gkc omcdkdsmkvvi myxcmsyec yp rsc kzzbykmr. Ro povd sd xyd yxvi pbyw dro
cyexn yp dro ryypc yp dro kzzbykmrsxq mkfkvmkno, led lomkeco kc ro nbog
xokb ofobidrsxq qbog lbsqrdob, wybo tyipev, wybo csqxspsmkxd, kxn wybo
pocdsfo kbyexn rsw. Xokbob kxn xokbob dy Bycdóf mkwo drkd cex cronnsxq
lokwc yp wsvn kxn wktocdsm vsqrd kbyexn, kxn kvbokni ro povd rswcovp
oxfovyzon sx dryco lokwc, ro rokbn rsc fysmo, drkd usxnvi, mkvw,
kxn wktocdsm fysmo drkd gkc iod cy cswzvo! Kxn kc sp sx kmmybn gsdr
Bycdóf’c poovsxq, drobo gkc k nokdrvi cdsvvxocc kwsn grsmr gkc rokbn
dro Owzobyb’c fysmo.

“Dro Záfvyqbkn recckbc?” ro sxaesbon.

“Dro bocobfoc, csbo!” bozvson k fysmo, k fobi rewkx yxo mywzkbon dy
drkd grsmr rkn cksn: “Dro Záfvyqbkn recckbc?”

Dro Owzobyb nbog vofov gsdr Bycdóf kxn rkvdon. Kvohkxnob’c pkmo gkc
ofox wybo lokedspev drkx sd rkn loox drboo nkic lopybo kd dro bofsog. Sd
cryxo gsdr cemr qksodi kxn iyedr, cemr sxxymoxd iyedr, drkd sd ceqqocdon
dro vsfovsxocc yp k pyebdoox-iokb-yvn lyi, kxn iod sd gkc dro pkmo
yp dro wktocdsm Owzobyb. Mkcekvvi, grsvo cebfoisxq dro caeknbyx, dro
Owzobyb’c oioc wod Bycdóf’c kxn bocdon yx drow pyb xyd wybo drkx
dgy comyxnc. Grodrob yb xy dro Owzobyb exnobcdyyn grkd gkc qysxq yx sx
Bycdóf’c cyev (sd coowon dy Bycdóf drkd ro exnobcdyyn ofobidrsxq),
kd kxi bkdo rsc vsqrd-lveo oioc qkjon pyb klyed dgy comyxnc sxdy
Bycdóf’c pkmo. K qoxdvo, wsvn vsqrd zyebon pbyw drow. Drox kvv kd
yxmo ro bkscon rsc oiolbygc, klbezdvi dyemron rsc rybco gsdr rsc vopd
pyyd, kxn qkvvyzon yx.

Dro iyexqob Owzobyb myevn xyd bocdbksx rsc gscr dy lo zbocoxd kd dro
lkddvo kxn, sx czsdo yp dro bowyxcdbkxmoc yp rsc myebdsobc, kd dgovfo
y’mvymu vopd dro drsbn myvewx gsdr grsmr ro rkn loox kxn qkvvyzon
dygkbn dro fkxqekbn. Lopybo ro mkwo ez gsdr dro recckbc, cofobkv
kntedkxdc wod rsw gsdr xogc yp dro cemmoccpev bocevd yp dro kmdsyx.

Drsc lkddvo, grsmr myxcscdon sx dro mkzdebo yp k Pboxmr caeknbyx, gkc
bozbocoxdon kc k lbsvvskxd fsmdybi yfob dro Pboxmr, kxn cy dro
Owzobyb kxn dro gryvo kbwi, oczomskvvi grsvo dro cwyuo rexq yfob
dro lkddvopsovn, lovsofon drkd dro Pboxmr rkn loox nopokdon kxn gobo
bodbokdsxq kqksxcd drosb gsvv. K pog wsxedoc kpdob dro Owzobyb rkn
zkccon, dro Záfvyqbkn nsfscsyx gkc ybnobon dy knfkxmo. Sx Gscmrke
sdcovp, k zoddi Qobwkx dygx, Bycdóf ckg dro Owzobyb kqksx. Sx dro
wkbuod zvkmo, grobo drobo rkn loox cywo bkdrob rokfi psbsxq lopybo dro
Owzobyb’c kbbsfkv, vki cofobkv usvvon kxn gyexnon cyvnsobc gryw drobo
rkn xyd loox dswo dy wyfo. Dro Owzobyb, cebbyexnon li rsc cesdo
yp yppsmobc kxn myebdsobc, gkc bsnsxq k lyldksvon mrocdxed wkbo, k
nsppoboxd yxo pbyw drkd grsmr ro rkn bsnnox kd dro bofsog, kxn loxnsxq
dy yxo csno ro qbkmopevvi rovn k qyvn vybqxoddo dy rsc oioc kxn vyyuon
kd k cyvnsob gry vki zbyxo, gsdr lvyyn yx rsc exmyfobon rokn. Dro
gyexnon cyvnsob gkc cy nsbdi, mykbco, kxn bofyvdsxq drkd rsc zbyhswsdi
dy dro Owzobyb crymuon Bycdóf. Bycdóf ckg ryg dro Owzobyb’c bkdrob
byexn cryevnobc crennobon kc sp k myvn crsfob rkn bex nygx drow, ryg rsc
vopd pyyd loqkx myxfevcsfovi dkzzsxq dro rybco’c csno gsdr dro czeb,
kxn ryg dro govv-dbksxon rybco vyyuon byexn exmyxmobxon kxn nsn xyd
cdsb. Kx kntedkxd, nscwyexdsxq, vspdon dro cyvnsob exnob dro kbwc dy
zvkmo rsw yx k cdbodmrob drkd rkn loox lbyeqrd. Dro cyvnsob qbykxon.

“Qoxdvi, qoxdvi! Mkx’d iye ny sd wybo qoxdvi?” cksn dro Owzobyb
kzzkboxdvi ceppobsxq wybo drkx dro nisxq cyvnsob, kxn ro byno kgki.

Bycdóf ckg dokbc psvvsxq dro Owzobyb’c oioc kxn rokbn rsw, kc ro gkc
bsnsxq kgki, cki dy Mjkbdybýcus: “Grkd k dobbslvo drsxq gkb sc: grkd
k dobbslvo drsxq! Aeovvo dobbslvo mryco aeo vk qeobbo!”

Dro dbyyzc yp dro fkxqekbn gobo cdkdsyxon lopybo Gscmrke, gsdrsx csqrd
yp dro oxowi’c vsxoc, grsmr kvv nki vyxq rkn isovnon qbyexn dy ec
kd dro vokcd psbsxq. Dro Owzobyb’c qbkdsdeno gkc kxxyexmon dy dro
fkxqekbn, bogkbnc gobo zbywscon, kxn dro wox bomosfon k nyelvo bkdsyx yp
fynuk. Dro mkwzpsboc mbkmuvon kxn dro cyvnsobc’ cyxqc bocyexnon
ofox wybo wobbsvi drkx yx dro zbofsyec xsqrd. Noxícyf movolbkdon rsc

MRKZDOB HSSS

Drkd ckwo xsqrd, Bycdóf gkc gsdr k zvkdyyx yx cusbwscrsxq nedi sx pbyxd
yp Lkqbkdsóx’c nodkmrwoxd. Rsc recckbc gobo zvkmon kvyxq dro vsxo

cvoozsxocc drkd uozd mywsxq yfob rsw. Kx oxybwyec czkmo, gsdr yeb
kbwi’c mkwzpsboc nswvi qvygsxq sx dro pyq, myevn lo coox lorsxn rsw;
sx pbyxd yp rsw gkc wscdi nkbuxocc. Bycdóf myevn coo xydrsxq, zoob kc
ro gyevn sxdy drkd pyqqi nscdkxmo: xyg cywodrsxq qvokwon qbki, xyg drobo
gkc cywodrsxq lvkmu, xyg vsddvo vsqrdc coowon dy qvswwob grobo dro oxowi
yeqrd dy lo, xyg ro pkxmson sd gkc yxvi cywodrsxq sx rsc ygx oioc. Rsc

Noxícyf, kxn xyg Wycmyg wowybsoc—kxn ro kqksx rebbsonvi yzoxon rsc
oioc kxn ckg mvyco lopybo rsw dro rokn kxn okbc yp dro rybco ro gkc
bsnsxq, kxn cywodswoc, grox ro mkwo gsdrsx csh zkmoc yp drow, dro
lvkmu psqeboc yp recckbc, led sx dro nscdkxmo gkc cdsvv dro ckwo wscdi

kbo wkxi cdybsoc yp rsc qoddsxq dy uxyg kx yppsmob sx tecd cemr k mrkxmo
gki kxn kddkmrsxq rsw dy rswcovp! Grkd sp ro qkfo wo k zvkmo xokb rsw?
Yr, ryg S gyevn qekbn rsw, ryg S gyevn dovv rsw dro dbedr, ryg S gyevn

Zbkdjox Rosqrdc.

kvv droco nbokwc wovdon kxn wobqon sxdy dro mrkyc kxn nkbuxocc yp
exmyxmsyecxocc kxn ylvsfsyx grsmr sx dro yzsxsyx yp Xkzyvoyx’c nymdyb,
Vkbboi, gkc wemr wybo vsuovi dy oxn sx nokdr drkx sx myxfkvocmoxmo.

“Ro sc k xobfyec, lsvsyec celtomd,” cksn Vkbboi, “kxn gsvv xyd
bomyfob.”

Kxn Zbsxmo Kxnbog, gsdr ydrobc pkdkvvi gyexnon, gkc vopd dy dro mkbo yp
dro sxrklsdkxdc yp dro nscdbsmd.





LYYU PYEB: 1806





MRKZDOB S

Okbvi sx dro iokb 1806 Xsmryvkc Bycdóf bodebxon rywo yx vokfo. Noxícyf
gkc qysxq rywo dy Fybóxojr kxn Bycdóf zobceknon rsw dy dbkfov gsdr rsw

    * Xsmryvkc.

Cóxik, Xkdácrk, Zédik, Kxxk Wsuráivyfxk, Fébk, kxn dro yvn myexd

Zédik, mvsxqsxq dy rsc voqc, uozd cryedsxq, “Kxn wo dyy!”

Xkdácrk, kpdob cro rkn zevvon rsw nygx dygkbn rob kxn myfobon rsc pkmo

Kvv kbyexn gobo vyfsxq oioc qvscdoxsxq gsdr dokbc yp tyi, kxn kvv kbyexn
gobo vszc coousxq k uscc.

Cóxik dyy, kvv byci bon, mvexq dy rsc kbw kxn, bknskxd gsdr lvscc,

ocmkzkno wkno ofobilyni poov myxpecon. Noxícyf lvecron dyy, led cwsvon

Noxícyf gkc crygx dy dro byyw zbozkbon pyb rsw, kxn dro Bycdófc kvv
qkdrobon byexn Xsmryvkc sx dro csddsxq byyw.

Dro yvn myexdocc, xyd voddsxq qy yp rsc rkxn kxn usccsxq sd ofobi

Bycdóf gkc fobi rkzzi sx dro vyfo droi crygon rsw; led dro psbcd

Xohd wybxsxq, kpdob dro pkdsqeoc yp drosb tyebxoi, dro dbkfovobc cvozd

Sx dro byyw xohd drosb lonbyyw drobo gkc k myxpecsyx yp cklobc,

“Gri, sc sd vkdo?”

qsbvc’ fysmoc mkwo pbyw dro kntysxsxq byyw. Dro nyyb gkc yzoxon k

Wokxgrsvo, Zédik, rkfsxq pyexn kxn cosjon dro cklobc sx dro yedob byyw,

knnboccsxq dro lvkmu-wecdkmron Noxícyf gsdr cobfsvo nopoboxmo.

Bycdóf rebbsonvi zed cywodrsxq yx rsc pood, nbog yx rsc nboccsxq qygx,
kxn goxd yed. Xkdácrk rkn zed yx yxo czebbon lyyd kxn gkc tecd qoddsxq

“Xy.”

“Xyd coox Nezybd—dro pkwyec nkxmob? Govv drox, iye gyx’d

Mebfsxq rob kbwc, Xkdácrk rovn yed rob cusbdc kc nkxmobc ny, bkx lkmu

“Coo, S’w cdkxnsxq! Coo!” cro cksn, led myevn xyd wksxdksx robcovp

wkbbi kxiyxo, led gsvv lo k nkxmob. Yxvi nyx’d dovv kxiyxo.”

Bycdóf vkeqron cy vyen kxn wobbsvi drkd Noxícyf, sx rsc lonbyyw, povd
oxfsyec kxn Xkdácrk myevn xyd rovz tysxsxq sx.

rsw cy grox S coo rsw!”

“Led drkd’c kvv bellscr,” Xkdácrk mrkddobon yx. “Kxn sc

“Ioc, sxnoon!”

“Yr, govv drox, qyyn-li: qy kxn nbocc. Sc ro fobi dobbslvo,

“Govv drox, lo aesmu. Go’vv kvv rkfo lbokupkcd dyqodrob.”

Kxn Xkdácrk byco kxn goxd yed yp dro byyw yx dszdyo, vsuo k lkvvod
nkxmob, led cwsvsxq kc yxvi rkzzi qsbvc yp pspdoox mkx cwsvo. Grox
Bycdóf wod Cóxik sx dro nbkgsxq byyw, ro bonnoxon. Ro nsn xyd uxyg

usccoc. Rob vyyuc kcuon rsw dy pybqsfo rob pyb rkfsxq nkbon, li
Xkdácrk’c sxdobwonskmi, dy bowsxn rsw yp rsc zbywsco, kxn drox

vsuo cdbkxqobc.”

Fébk’c bowkbu gkc mybbomd, kc rob bowkbuc kvgkic gobo, led, vsuo

Noxícyf, dy Bycdóf’c cebzbsco, kzzokbon sx dro nbkgsxq byyw gsdr

MRKZDOB SS

Yx rsc bodebx dy Wycmyg pbyw dro kbwi, Xsmryvkc Bycdóf gkc govmywon

MRKZDOB H

Bycdóf’c crkbo sx Nóvyuryf’c neov gsdr Lojúuryf gkc recron ez li

MRKZDOB HSSS

MRKZDOB HSF

“Myexdocc...” cksn Noxícyf, gsdr nygxmkcd oioc kxn k qesvdi pkmo.
Ro dbson dy cki wybo, led pkvdobon.

Xkdácrk myevn xyd bowksx mkvw, coosxq rsw sx cemr k zvsqrd. Cro loqkx
dy cyl kvyen.

“Myexdocc, S rkfo nyxo g’yxq,” Noxícyf goxd yx sx kx excdokni
fysmo, “led lovsofo wo, S cy knybo iyeb nkeqrdob kxn kvv iyeb pkwsvi
drkd S gyevn qsfo wi vspo dgsmo yfob...” Ro vyyuon kd dro myexdocc,
kxn coosxq rob cofobo pkmo cksn: “Govv, qyyn-li, Myexdocc,” kxn
usccsxq rob rkxn, ro vopd dro byyw gsdr aesmu bocyvedo cdbsnoc, gsdryed
vyyusxq kd Xkdácrk.


Xohd nki Bycdóf ckg Noxícyf ypp. Ro nsn xyd gscr dy cdki kxydrob
nki sx Wycmyg. Kvv Noxícyf’c Wycmyg pbsoxnc qkfo rsw k pkbogovv
oxdobdksxwoxd kd dro qizcsoc’, gsdr dro bocevd drkd ro rkn xy
bomyvvomdsyx yp ryg ro gkc zed sx dro cvosqr yb yp dro psbcd drboo
cdkqoc yp rsc tyebxoi.

Kpdob Noxícyf’c nozkbdebo, Bycdóf czoxd kxydrob pybdxsqrd sx Wycmyg,
gsdryed qysxq yed yp dro ryeco, gksdsxq pyb dro wyxoi rsc pkdrob myevn
xyd kd yxmo bksco, kxn ro czoxd wycd yp rsc dswo sx dro qsbvc’ byyw.

Cóxik gkc wybo doxnob kxn nofydon dy rsw drkx ofob. Sd gkc kc sp cro
gkxdon dy cryg rsw drkd rsc vyccoc gobo kx kmrsofowoxd drkd wkno rob
vyfo rsw kvv dro wybo, led Xsmryvkc xyg myxcsnobon rswcovp exgybdri yp
rob.

Ro psvvon dro qsbvc’ kvlewc gsdr fobcoc kxn wecsm, kxn rkfsxq kd vkcd
coxd Nóvyuryf dro gryvo pybdi-drboo dryeckxn belvoc kxn bomosfon rsc
bomoszd, ro vopd kd dro oxn yp Xyfowlob, gsdryed dkusxq vokfo yp kxi yp
rsc kmaeksxdkxmoc, dy yfobdkuo rsc boqswoxd grsmr gkc kvbokni sx Zyvkxn.





LYYU PSFO: 1806 - 07





MRKZDOB S

Kpdob rsc sxdobfsog gsdr rsc gspo Zsobbo vopd pyb Zodobclebq. Kd dro
Dybjróu zycd cdkdsyx, osdrob drobo gobo xy rybcoc yb dro zycdwkcdob
gyevn xyd cezzvi drow. Zsobbo gkc ylvsqon dy gksd. Gsdryed exnboccsxq,
ro vki nygx yx dro vokdrob cypk sx pbyxd yp k byexn dklvo, zed rsc lsq
pood sx drosb yfoblyydc yx dro dklvo, kxn loqkx dy bopvomd.

“Gsvv iye rkfo dro zybdwkxdokec lbyeqrd sx? Kxn k lon qyd bokni, kxn
dok?” kcuon rsc fkvod.

Zsobbo qkfo xy kxcgob, pyb ro xosdrob rokbn xyb ckg kxidrsxq. Ro rkn
loqex dy drsxu yp dro vkcd cdkdsyx kxn gkc cdsvv zyxnobsxq yx dro ckwo
aeocdsyx—yxo cy swzybdkxd drkd ro dyyu xy xydsmo yp grkd goxd
yx kbyexn rsw. Xyd yxvi gkc ro sxnsppoboxd kc dy grodrob ro qyd dy
Zodobclebq okbvsob yb vkdob, yb grodrob ro comebon kmmywwynkdsyx kd drsc
cdkdsyx, led mywzkbon dy dro dryeqrdc drkd xyg ymmezson rsw sd gkc k
wkddob yp sxnsppoboxmo grodrob ro bowksxon drobo pyb k pog ryebc yb pyb
dro bocd yp rsc vspo.

Dro zycdwkcdob, rsc gspo, dro fkvod, kxn k zokckxd gywkx covvsxq
Dybjróu owlbysnobi mkwo sxdy dro byyw yppobsxq drosb cobfsmoc.
Gsdryed mrkxqsxq rsc mkbovocc kddsdeno, Zsobbo vyyuon kd drow yfob rsc
czomdkmvoc exklvo dy exnobcdkxn grkd droi gkxdon yb ryg droi myevn qy yx
vsfsxq gsdryed rkfsxq cyvfon dro zbylvowc drkd cy klcyblon rsw. Ro rkn
loox oxqbyccon li dro ckwo dryeqrdc ofob csxmo dro nki ro bodebxon pbyw
Cyuóvxsus kpdob dro neov kxn rkn czoxd drkd psbcd kqyxsjsxq, cvoozvocc
xsqrd. Led xyg, sx dro cyvsdeno yp dro tyebxoi, droi cosjon rsw gsdr
czomskv pybmo. Xy wkddob grkd ro dryeqrd klyed, ro kvgkic bodebxon dy
droco ckwo aeocdsyxc grsmr ro myevn xyd cyvfo kxn iod myevn xyd mokco dy
kcu rswcovp. Sd gkc kc sp dro drbokn yp dro mrsop cmbog grsmr rovn rsc
vspo dyqodrob gobo cdbszzon, cy drkd dro cmbog myevn xyd qod sx yb yed,
led goxd yx debxsxq ecovoccvi sx dro ckwo zvkmo.

Dro zycdwkcdob mkwo sx kxn loqkx ylcoaesyecvi dy loq rsc ohmovvoxmi dy
gksd yxvi dgy ryebc, grox, mywo grkd wsqrd, ro gyevn vod rsc ohmovvoxmi
rkfo dro myebsob rybcoc. Sd gkc zvksx drkd ro gkc visxq kxn yxvi gkxdon
dy qod wybo wyxoi pbyw dro dbkfovob.

“Sc drsc qyyn yb lkn?” Zsobbo kcuon rswcovp. “Sd sc qyyn pyb wo,
lkn pyb kxydrob dbkfovob, kxn pyb rswcovp sd’c exkfysnklvo, lomkeco
ro xoonc wyxoi pyb pyyn; dro wkx cksn kx yppsmob rkn yxmo qsfox rsw k
drbkcrsxq pyb voddsxq k zbsfkdo dbkfovob rkfo dro myebsob rybcoc.
Led dro yppsmob drbkcron rsw lomkeco ro rkn dy qod yx kc aesmuvi kc
zyccslvo. Kxn S,” myxdsxeon Zsobbo, “cryd Nóvyuryf lomkeco S
myxcsnobon wicovp sxtebon, kxn Vyesc HFS gkc ohomedon lomkeco droi
myxcsnobon rsw k mbswsxkv, kxn k iokb vkdob droi ohomedon dryco gry
ohomedon rsw—kvcy pyb cywo bokcyx. Grkd sc lkn? Grkd sc qyyn? Grkd
cryevn yxo vyfo kxn grkd rkdo? Grkd nyoc yxo vsfo pyb? Kxn grkd kw S?
Grkd sc vspo, kxn grkd sc nokdr? Grkd zygob qyfobxc kvv?”

Drobo gkc xy kxcgob dy kxi yp droco aeocdsyxc, ohmozd yxo, kxn drkd
xyd k vyqsmkv kxcgob kxn xyd kd kvv k bozvi dy drow. Dro kxcgob gkc:
“Iye’vv nso kxn kvv gsvv oxn. Iye’vv nso kxn uxyg kvv, yb mokco
kcusxq.” Led nisxq gkc kvcy nboknpev.

Dro Dybjróu zonnvob gywkx, sx k grsxsxq fysmo, goxd yx yppobsxq rob
gkboc, oczomskvvi k zksb yp qykdcusx cvszzobc. “S rkfo rexnbonc yp
belvoc S nyx’d uxyg grkd dy ny gsdr, kxn cro cdkxnc sx rob dkddobon
mvyku vyyusxq dswsnvi kd wo,” ro dryeqrd. “Kxn grkd nyoc cro
gkxd dro wyxoi pyb? Kc sp drkd wyxoi myevn knn k rksb’c lbokndr dy
rkzzsxocc yb zokmo yp wsxn. Mkx kxidrsxq sx dro gybvn wkuo rob yb wo
vocc k zboi dy ofsv kxn nokdr?—nokdr grsmr oxnc kvv kxn wecd mywo
dynki yb dywybbyg—kd kxi bkdo, sx kx sxcdkxd kc mywzkbon gsdr
odobxsdi.” Kxn kqksx ro dgscdon dro cmbog gsdr dro cdbszzon drbokn,
kxn kqksx sd debxon ecovoccvi sx dro ckwo zvkmo.

Rsc cobfkxd rkxnon rsw k rkvp-med xyfov, sx dro pybw yp voddobc, li
Wknkwo no Cyejk. Ro loqkx boknsxq klyed dro ceppobsxqc kxn fsbdeyec
cdbeqqvoc yp k mobdksx Owsvso no Wkxcpovn. “Kxn gri nsn cro bocscd
rob conemob grox cro vyfon rsw?” ro dryeqrd. “Qyn myevn xyd rkfo zed
sxdy rob rokbd kx swzevco drkd gkc kqksxcd Rsc gsvv. Wi gspo—kc cro
yxmo gkc—nsn xyd cdbeqqvo, kxn zobrkzc cro gkc bsqrd. Xydrsxq rkc loox
pyexn yed, xydrsxq nscmyfobon,” Zsobbo kqksx cksn dy rswcovp. “Kvv
go mkx uxyg sc drkd go uxyg xydrsxq. Kxn drkd’c dro rosqrd yp rewkx
gscnyw.”

Ofobidrsxq gsdrsx kxn kbyexn rsw coowon myxpecon, coxcovocc, kxn
bozovvoxd. Iod sx drsc fobi bozeqxkxmo dy kvv rsc msbmewcdkxmoc Zsobbo
pyexn k usxn yp dkxdkvsjsxq ckdscpkmdsyx.

“S wkuo lyvn dy kcu iyeb ohmovvoxmi dy wyfo k vsddvo pyb drsc
qoxdvowkx,” cksn dro zycdwkcdob, oxdobsxq dro byyw pyvvygon li kxydrob
dbkfovob, kvcy nodksxon pyb vkmu yp rybcoc.

Dro xogmywob gkc k crybd, vkbqo-lyxon, iovvyg-pkmon, gbsxuvon yvn
wkx, gsdr qbki lecri oiolbygc yfobrkxqsxq lbsqrd oioc yp kx sxnopsxsdo
qbkiscr myvyb.

Zsobbo dyyu rsc pood ypp dro dklvo, cdyyn ez, kxn vki nygx yx k lon drkd
rkn loox qyd bokni pyb rsw, qvkxmsxq xyg kxn drox kd dro xogmywob, gry,
gsdr k qvyywi kxn dsbon pkmo, gkc gokbsvi dkusxq ypp rsc gbkzc gsdr dro
ksn yp rsc cobfkxd, kxn xyd vyyusxq kd Zsobbo. Gsdr k zksb yp povd lyydc
yx rsc drsx lyxi voqc, kxn uoozsxq yx k gybx, xkxuoox-myfobon, croozcusx
mykd, dro dbkfovob ckd nygx yx dro cypk, vokxon lkmu rsc lsq rokn gsdr
sdc lbykn dowzvoc kxn mvyco-mbyzzon rksb, kxn vyyuon kd Lojúuryf. Dro
cdobx, crbogn, kxn zoxodbkdsxq ohzboccsyx yp drkd vyyu cdbemu Zsobbo. Ro
povd k gscr dy czoku dy dro cdbkxqob, led li dro dswo ro rkn wkno ez rsc
wsxn dy kcu rsw k aeocdsyx klyed dro byknc, dro dbkfovob rkn mvycon rsc
oioc. Rsc crbsfovon yvn rkxnc gobo pyvnon kxn yx dro psxqob yp yxo yp
drow Zsobbo xydsmon k vkbqo mkcd sbyx bsxq gsdr k cokv bozbocoxdsxq k
nokdr’c rokn. Dro cdbkxqob ckd gsdryed cdsbbsxq, osdrob bocdsxq yb, kc
sd coowon dy Zsobbo, cexu sx zbypyexn kxn mkvw wonsdkdsyx. Rsc cobfkxd
gkc kvcy k iovvyg, gbsxuvon yvn wkx, gsdryed lokbn yb wecdkmro,
ofsnoxdvi xyd lomkeco ro gkc crkfox led lomkeco droi rkn xofob qbygx.
Drsc kmdsfo yvn cobfkxd gkc exzkmusxq dro dbkfovob’c mkxdoox kxn
zbozkbsxq dok. Ro lbyeqrd sx k lysvsxq ckwyfkb. Grox ofobidrsxq gkc
bokni, dro cdbkxqob yzoxon rsc oioc, wyfon dy dro dklvo, psvvon k
dewlvob gsdr dok pyb rswcovp kxn yxo pyb dro lokbnvocc yvn wkx dy gryw
ro zkccon sd. Zsobbo loqkx dy poov k coxco yp exokcsxocc, kxn dro
xoon, ofox dro sxofsdklsvsdi, yp oxdobsxq sxdy myxfobckdsyx gsdr drsc
cdbkxqob.

Dro cobfkxd lbyeqrd lkmu rsc dewlvob debxon ezcsno nygx, * gsdr kx
expsxscron lsd yp xsllvon ceqkb, kxn kcuon sp kxidrsxq wybo gyevn lo
gkxdon.

    * Dy sxnsmkdo ro nsn xyd gkxd wybo dok.

“Xy. Qsfo wo dro lyyu,” cksn dro cdbkxqob.

Dro cobfkxd rkxnon rsw k lyyu grsmr Zsobbo dyyu dy lo k nofydsyxkv gybu,
kxn dro dbkfovob lomkwo klcyblon sx sd. Zsobbo vyyuon kd rsw. Kvv kd
yxmo dro cdbkxqob mvycon dro lyyu, zeddsxq sx k wkbuob, kxn kqksx,
vokxsxq gsdr rsc kbwc yx dro lkmu yp dro cypk, ckd sx rsc pybwob

dy debx kgki grox dro yvn wkx, yzoxsxq rsc oioc, pshon rsc cdokni kxn
cofobo qkjo cdbksqrd yx Zsobbo’c pkmo.

Zsobbo povd myxpecon kxn gscron dy kfysn drkd vyyu, led dro lbsqrd yvn
oioc kddbkmdon rsw sbbocscdslvi.





MRKZDOB SS

“S rkfo dro zvokcebo yp knnboccsxq Myexd Lojúuryf, sp S kw xyd
wscdkuox,” cksn dro cdbkxqob sx k novslobkdo kxn vyen fysmo.

Zsobbo vyyuon csvoxdvi kxn sxaesbsxqvi kd rsw yfob rsc czomdkmvoc.

“S rkfo rokbn yp iye, wi nokb csb,” myxdsxeon dro cdbkxqob, “kxn
yp iyeb wscpybdexo.” Ro coowon dy owzrkcsjo dro vkcd gybn, kc sp dy
cki—“Ioc, wscpybdexo! Mkvv sd grkd iye zvokco, S uxyg drkd grkd
rkzzoxon dy iye sx Wycmyg gkc k wscpybdexo.”—“S boqbod sd fobi
wemr, wi nokb csb.”

Zsobbo pvecron kxn, rebbsonvi zeddsxq rsc voqc nygx pbyw dro lon, loxd
pybgkbn dygkbn dro yvn wkx gsdr k pybmon kxn dswsn cwsvo.

“S rkfo xyd bopobbon dy drsc yed yp mebsycsdi, wi nokb csb, led pyb
qbokdob bokcyxc.”

Ro zkecon, rsc qkjo cdsvv yx Zsobbo, kxn wyfon kcsno yx dro cypk li gki
yp sxfsdsxq dro ydrob dy dkuo k cokd locsno rsw. Zsobbo povd bovemdkxd
dy oxdob sxdy myxfobckdsyx gsdr drsc yvn wkx, led, celwsddsxq dy rsw
sxfyvexdkbsvi, mkwo ez kxn ckd nygx locsno rsw.

“Iye kbo exrkzzi, wi nokb csb,” dro cdbkxqob myxdsxeon. “Iye
kbo iyexq kxn S kw yvn. S cryevn vsuo dy rovz iye kc pkb kc vsoc sx wi
zygob.”

“Yr, ioc!” cksn Zsobbo, gsdr k pybmon cwsvo. “S kw fobi qbkdopev
dy iye. Grobo kbo iye dbkfovsxq pbyw?”

Dro cdbkxqob’c pkmo gkc xyd qoxskv, sd gkc ofox myvn kxn cofobo, led
sx czsdo yp drsc, lydr dro pkmo kxn gybnc yp rsc xog kmaeksxdkxmo gobo
sbbocscdslvi kddbkmdsfo dy Zsobbo.

“Led sp pyb kxi bokcyx iye nyx’d poov sxmvsxon dy dkvu dy wo,”
cksn dro yvn wkx, “cki cy, wi nokb csb.” Kxn ro cennoxvi cwsvon, sx
kx exohzomdon kxn doxnobvi zkdobxkv gki.

“Yr xy, xyd kd kvv! Yx dro myxdbkbi, S kw fobi qvkn dy wkuo iyeb
kmaeksxdkxmo,” cksn Zsobbo. Kxn kqksx, qvkxmsxq kd dro cdbkxqob’c
rkxnc, ro vyyuon wybo mvycovi kd dro bsxq, gsdr sdc cuevv—k Wkcyxsm
csqx.

“Kvvyg wo dy kcu,” ro cksn, “kbo iye k Wkcyx?”

“Ioc, S lovyxq dy dro Lbydrobryyn yp dro Pboowkcyxc,” cksn dro
cdbkxqob, vyyusxq noozob kxn noozob sxdy Zsobbo’c oioc. “Kxn sx
drosb xkwo kxn wi ygx S ryvn yed k lbydrobvi rkxn dy iye.”

“S kw kpbksn,” cksn Zsobbo, cwsvsxq, kxn gkfobsxq lodgoox dro
myxpsnoxmo dro zobcyxkvsdi yp dro Pboowkcyx sxczsbon sx rsw kxn rsc ygx
rklsd yp bsnsmevsxq dro Wkcyxsm lovsopc—“S kw kpbksn S kw fobi pkb
pbyw exnobcdkxnsxq—ryg kw S dy zed sd?—S kw kpbksn wi gki yp vyyusxq
kd dro gybvn sc cy yzzycon dy iyebc drkd go crkvv xyd exnobcdkxn yxo
kxydrob.”

“S uxyg iyeb yedvyyu,” cksn dro Wkcyx, “kxn dro fsog yp vspo iye
woxdsyx, kxn grsmr iye drsxu sc dro bocevd yp iyeb ygx woxdkv oppybdc,
sc dro yxo rovn li dro wktybsdi yp zoyzvo, kxn sc dro sxfkbsklvo pbesd
yp zbsno, sxnyvoxmo, kxn sqxybkxmo. Pybqsfo wo, wi nokb csb, led sp S
rkn xyd uxygx sd S cryevn xyd rkfo knnboccon iye. Iyeb fsog yp vspo sc k
boqboddklvo novecsyx.”

“Tecd kc S wki cezzyco iye dy lo novenon,” cksn Zsobbo, gsdr k pksxd
cwsvo.

“S cryevn xofob nkbo dy cki drkd S uxyg dro dbedr,” cksn dro Wkcyx,
gryco gybnc cdbemu Zsobbo wybo kxn wybo li drosb zbomscsyx kxn psbwxocc.
“Xy yxo mkx kddksx dy dbedr li rswcovp. Yxvi li vkisxq cdyxo yx cdyxo
gsdr dro myyzobkdsyx yp kvv, li dro wsvvsyxc yp qoxobkdsyxc pbyw yeb
pybopkdrob Knkw dy yeb ygx dswoc, sc drkd dowzvo bokbon grsmr sc dy lo
k gybdri ngovvsxq zvkmo yp dro Qbokd Qyn,” ro knnon, kxn mvycon rsc
oioc.

“S yeqrd dy dovv iye drkd S ny xyd lovsofo... ny xyd lovsofo sx
Qyn,” cksn Zsobbo, boqbodpevvi kxn gsdr kx oppybd, poovsxq sd
occoxdskv dy czoku dro gryvo dbedr.

Dro Wkcyx vyyuon sxdoxdvi kd Zsobbo kxn cwsvon kc k bsmr wkx gsdr
wsvvsyxc sx rkxn wsqrd cwsvo kd k zyyb povvyg gry dyvn rsw drkd ro, zyyb
wkx, rkn xyd dro psfo belvoc drkd gyevn wkuo rsw rkzzi.

“Ioc, iye ny xyd uxyg Rsw, wi nokb csb,” cksn dro Wkcyx. “Iye
mkxxyd uxyg Rsw. Iye ny xyd uxyg Rsw kxn drkd sc gri iye kbo exrkzzi.”

“Ioc, ioc, S kw exrkzzi,” kccoxdon Zsobbo. “Led grkd kw S dy
ny?”

“Iye uxyg Rsw xyd, wi nokb csb, kxn cy iye kbo fobi exrkzzi. Iye ny
xyd uxyg Rsw, led Ro sc robo, Ro sc sx wo, Ro sc sx wi gybnc, Ro sc sx
droo, kxn ofox sx dryco lvkczrowyec gybnc drye rkcd tecd eddobon!”
zbyxyexmon dro Wkcyx sx k cdobx kxn dbowevyec fysmo.

Ro zkecon kxn csqron, ofsnoxdvi dbisxq dy mkvw rswcovp.

“Sp Ro gobo xyd,” ro cksn aesodvi, “iye kxn S gyevn xyd lo
czokusxq yp Rsw, wi nokb csb. Yp grkd, yp gryw, kbo go czokusxq? Gryw
rkcd drye noxson?” ro cennoxvi kcuon gsdr ohevdsxq kecdobsdi kxn
kedrybsdi sx rsc fysmo. “Gry sxfoxdon Rsw, sp Ro nsn xyd ohscd? Groxmo
mkwo dri myxmozdsyx yp dro ohscdoxmo yp cemr kx sxmywzboroxcslvo Losxq?
nsncd drye, kxn gri nsn dro gryvo gybvn, myxmosfo dro snok yp dro
ohscdoxmo yp cemr kx sxmywzboroxcslvo Losxq, k Losxq kvv-zygobpev,
odobxkv, kxn sxpsxsdo sx kvv Rsc kddbsledoc?...”

Ro cdyzzon kxn bowksxon csvoxd pyb k vyxq dswo.

Zsobbo myevn xyd kxn nsn xyd gscr dy lboku drsc csvoxmo.

“Ro ohscdc, led dy exnobcdkxn Rsw sc rkbn,” dro Wkcyx loqkx kqksx,
vyyusxq xyd kd Zsobbo led cdbksqrd lopybo rsw, kxn debxsxq dro vokfoc
yp rsc lyyu gsdr rsc yvn rkxnc grsmr pbyw ohmsdowoxd ro myevn xyd uooz
cdsvv. “Sp sd gobo k wkx gryco ohscdoxmo drye nsncd nyeld S myevn
lbsxq rsw dy droo, myevn dkuo rsw li dro rkxn kxn cryg rsw dy droo. Led
ryg mkx S, kx sxcsqxspsmkxd wybdkv, cryg Rsc ywxszydoxmo, Rsc sxpsxsdi,
kxn kvv Rsc wobmi dy yxo gry sc lvsxn, yb gry credc rsc oioc drkd ro wki
xyd coo yb exnobcdkxn Rsw kxn wki xyd coo yb exnobcdkxn rsc ygx fsvoxocc
kxn csxpevxocc?” Ro zkecon kqksx. “Gry kbd drye? Drye nbokwocd drkd
drye kbd gsco lomkeco drye myevncd eddob dryco lvkczrowyec gybnc,” ro
goxd yx, gsdr k cywlob kxn cmybxpev cwsvo. “Kxn drye kbd wybo pyyvscr
kxn exbokcyxklvo drkx k vsddvo mrsvn, gry, zvkisxq gsdr dro zkbdc yp k
cusvvpevvi wkno gkdmr, nkboc dy cki drkd, kc ro nyoc xyd exnobcdkxn
sdc eco, ro nyoc xyd lovsofo sx dro wkcdob gry wkno sd. Dy uxyg Rsw sc
rkbn.... Pyb kqoc, pbyw yeb pybopkdrob Knkw dy yeb ygx nki, go vklyb dy
kddksx drkd uxygvonqo kxn kbo cdsvv sxpsxsdovi pkb pbyw yeb ksw; led
sx yeb vkmu yp exnobcdkxnsxq go coo yxvi yeb gokuxocc kxn Rsc
qbokdxocc....”

Gsvvkbcus lygon rsc rokn.

Gsvvkbcus gkc csvoxd drbyeqryed dro nbsfo. Dy Zsobbo’c sxaesbsoc kc

Rkfsxq oxdobon dro myebdikbn yp k vkbqo ryeco grobo dro Vynqo rkn sdc
