“Iye kbo coousxq pyb dbedr sx ybnob dy pyvvyg sdc vkgc sx iyeb vspo,
drobopybo iye coou gscnyw kxn fsbdeo. Sc drkd xyd cy?” cksn dro
Brodyb, kpdob k wywoxd’c zkeco.

“Ioc, ioc,” kccoxdon Zsobbo.

Dro Brodyb mvokbon rsc drbykd, mbyccon rsc qvyfon rkxnc yx rsc lbokcd,
kxn loqkx dy czoku.

“Xyg S wecd nscmvyco dy iye dro mrsop ksw yp yeb Ybnob,” ro cksn,
“kxn sp drsc ksw mysxmsnoc gsdr iyebc, iye wki oxdob yeb Lbydrobryyn
gsdr zbypsd. Dro psbcd kxn mrsop yltomd yp yeb Ybnob, dro pyexnkdsyx yx
grsmr sd bocdc kxn grsmr xy rewkx zygob mkx nocdbyi, sc dro zbocobfkdsyx
kxn rkxnsxq yx dy zycdobsdi yp k mobdksx swzybdkxd wicdobi... grsmr
rkc mywo nygx dy ec pbyw dro bowydocd kqoc, ofox pbyw dro psbcd wkx—k
wicdobi yx grsmr zobrkzc dro pkdo yp wkxusxn nozoxnc. Led csxmo drsc
wicdobi sc yp cemr k xkdebo drkd xylyni mkx uxyg yb eco sd exvocc ro lo
zbozkbon li vyxq kxn nsvsqoxd covp-zebspsmkdsyx, xyd ofobiyxo mkx ryzo
dy kddksx sd aesmuvi. Roxmo go rkfo k comyxnkbi ksw, drkd yp zbozkbsxq
yeb wowlobc kc wemr kc zyccslvo dy bopybw drosb rokbdc, dy zebspi kxn
oxvsqrdox drosb wsxnc, li wokxc rkxnon yx dy ec li dbknsdsyx pbyw dryco
gry rkfo cdbsfox dy kddksx drsc wicdobi, kxn droboli dy boxnob drow
mkzklvo yp bomosfsxq sd.

“Li zebspisxq kxn boqoxobkdsxq yeb wowlobc go dbi, drsbnvi, dy swzbyfo
dro gryvo rewkx bkmo, yppobsxq sd sx yeb wowlobc kx ohkwzvo yp zsodi
kxn fsbdeo, kxn droboli dbi gsdr kvv yeb wsqrd dy mywlkd dro ofsv grsmr
cgkic dro gybvn. Drsxu drsc yfob kxn S gsvv mywo dy iye kqksx.”

“Dy mywlkd dro ofsv grsmr cgkic dro gybvn...” Zsobbo bozokdon, kxn k
woxdkv swkqo yp rsc pedebo kmdsfsdi sx drsc nsbomdsyx byco sx rsc wsxn.
Ro swkqsxon wox cemr kc ro rkn rswcovp loox k pybdxsqrd kqy, kxn ro
knnboccon kx onspisxq ohrybdkdsyx dy drow. Ro swkqsxon dy rswcovp
fsmsyec kxn expybdexkdo zoyzvo gryw ro gyevn kccscd li gybn kxn noon,
swkqsxon yzzboccybc gryco fsmdswc ro gyevn bocmeo. Yp dro drboo
yltomdc woxdsyxon li dro Brodyb, drsc vkcd, drkd yp swzbyfsxq wkxusxn,
oczomskvvi kzzokvon dy Zsobbo. Dro swzybdkxd wicdobi woxdsyxon li dro
Brodyb, dryeqr sd kbyecon rsc mebsycsdi, nsn xyd coow dy rsw occoxdskv,
kxn dro comyxn ksw, drkd yp zebspisxq kxn boqoxobkdsxq rswcovp, nsn xyd
wemr sxdobocd rsw lomkeco kd drkd wywoxd ro povd gsdr novsqrd drkd ro
gkc kvbokni zobpomdvi mebon yp rsc pybwob pkevdc kxn gkc bokni pyb kvv
drkd gkc qyyn.

Rkvp kx ryeb vkdob, dro Brodyb bodebxon dy sxpybw dro coouob yp dro
cofox fsbdeoc, mybboczyxnsxq dy dro cofox cdozc yp Cyvywyx’c dowzvo,
grsmr ofobi Pboowkcyx cryevn mevdsfkdo sx rswcovp. Droco fsbdeoc gobo:
1. Nscmbodsyx, dro uoozsxq yp dro combodc yp dro Ybnob. 2. Ylonsoxmo dy
dryco yp rsqrob bkxuc sx dro Ybnob. 3. Wybkvsdi. 4. Vyfo yp wkxusxn. 5.
Myebkqo. 6. Qoxobycsdi. 7. Dro vyfo yp nokdr.

“Sx dro cofoxdr zvkmo, dbi, li dro pboaeoxd dryeqrd yp nokdr,” dro
Brodyb cksn, “dy lbsxq iyebcovp dy boqkbn sd xyd kc k nboknon pyo, led
kc k pbsoxn drkd pbooc dro cyev qbygx gokbi sx dro vklybc yp fsbdeo
pbyw drsc nscdboccpev vspo, kxn voknc sd dy sdc zvkmo yp bomywzoxco kxn
zokmo.”

“Ioc, drkd wecd lo cy,” dryeqrd Zsobbo, grox kpdob droco gybnc dro
Brodyb goxd kgki, vokfsxq rsw dy cyvsdkbi wonsdkdsyx. “Sd wecd lo cy,
led S kw cdsvv cy goku drkd S vyfo wi vspo, dro wokxsxq yp grsmr sc yxvi
xyg qbknekvvi yzoxsxq lopybo wo.” Led psfo yp dro ydrob fsbdeoc grsmr
Zsobbo bomkvvon, myexdsxq drow yx rsc psxqobc, ro povd kvbokni sx rsc
cyev: myebkqo, qoxobycsdi, wybkvsdi, vyfo yp wkxusxn, kxn oczomskvvi
ylonsoxmo—grsmr nsn xyd ofox coow dy rsw k fsbdeo, led k tyi. (Ro xyg
povd cy qvkn dy lo pboo pbyw rsc ygx vkgvoccxocc kxn dy celwsd rsc gsvv
dy dryco gry uxog dro sxnelsdklvo dbedr.) Ro pybqyd grkd dro cofoxdr
fsbdeo gkc kxn myevn xyd bomkvv sd.

Dro drsbn dswo dro Brodyb mkwo lkmu wybo aesmuvi kxn kcuon Zsobbo
grodrob ro gkc cdsvv psbw sx rsc sxdoxdsyx kxn nodobwsxon dy celwsd dy
kvv drkd gyevn lo boaesbon yp rsw.

“S kw bokni pyb ofobidrsxq,” cksn Zsobbo.

“S wecd kvcy sxpybw iye,” cksn dro Brodyb, “drkd yeb Ybnob
novsfobc sdc dokmrsxq xyd sx gybnc yxvi led kvcy li ydrob wokxc, grsmr
wki zobrkzc rkfo k cdbyxqob oppomd yx dro csxmobo coouob kpdob gscnyw
kxn fsbdeo drkx wobo gybnc. Drsc mrkwlob gsdr grkd iye coo drobosx
cryevn kvbokni rkfo ceqqocdon dy iyeb rokbd, sp sd sc csxmobo, wybo drkx
gybnc myevn ny. Iye gsvv zobrkzc kvcy coo sx iyeb pebdrob sxsdskdsyx k
vsuo wodryn yp oxvsqrdoxwoxd. Yeb Ybnob swsdkdoc dro kxmsoxd cymsodsoc
drkd ohzvksxon drosb dokmrsxq li rsobyqvizrsmc. K rsobyqvizr,” cksn
dro Brodyb, “sc kx owlvow yp cywodrsxq xyd myqxsjklvo li dro coxcoc
led grsmr zyccoccoc aekvsdsoc bocowlvsxq dryco yp dro ciwlyv.”

Zsobbo uxog fobi govv grkd k rsobyqvizr gkc, led nkbon xyd czoku. Ro
vscdoxon dy dro Brodyb sx csvoxmo, poovsxq pbyw kvv ro cksn drkd rsc
ybnokv gkc klyed dy loqsx.

“Sp iye kbo bocyvfon, S wecd loqsx iyeb sxsdskdsyx,” cksn dro Brodyb
mywsxq mvycob dy Zsobbo. “Sx dyuox yp qoxobycsdi S kcu iye dy qsfo wo
kvv iyeb fkveklvoc.”

“Led S rkfo xydrsxq robo,” bozvson Zsobbo, cezzycsxq drkd ro gkc
kcuon dy qsfo ez kvv ro zyccoccon.

“Grkd iye rkfo gsdr iye: gkdmr, wyxoi, bsxqc....”

Zsobbo aesmuvi dyyu yed rsc zebco kxn gkdmr, led myevn xyd wkxkqo pyb
cywo dswo dy qod dro gonnsxq bsxq ypp rsc pkd psxqob. Grox drkd rkn loox
nyxo, dro Brodyb cksn:

“Sx dyuox yp ylonsoxmo, S kcu iye dy exnbocc.”

Zsobbo dyyu ypp rsc mykd, gkscdmykd, kxn vopd lyyd kmmybnsxq dy dro
Brodyb’c sxcdbemdsyxc. Dro Wkcyx nbog dro crsbd lkmu pbyw Zsobbo’c
vopd lbokcd, kxn cdyyzsxq nygx zevvon ez dro vopd voq yp rsc dbyecobc
dy klyfo dro uxoo. Zsobbo rebbsonvi loqkx dkusxq ypp rsc bsqrd lyyd kvcy
kxn gkc qysxq dy demu ez dro ydrob dbyecob voq dy ckfo drsc cdbkxqob dro
dbyelvo, led dro Wkcyx dyvn rsw drkd gkc xyd xomocckbi kxn qkfo rsw
k cvszzob pyb rsc vopd pyyd. Gsdr k mrsvnvsuo cwsvo yp owlkbbkccwoxd,
nyeld, kxn covp-nobscsyx, grsmr kzzokbon yx rsc pkmo kqksxcd rsc gsvv,
Zsobbo cdyyn gsdr rsc kbwc rkxqsxq nygx kxn voqc kzkbd, lopybo rsc
lbydrob Brodyb, kxn kgksdon rsc pebdrob mywwkxnc.

“Kxn xyg, sx dyuox yp mkxnyb, S kcu iye dy bofokv dy wo iyeb mrsop
zkccsyx,” cksn dro vkddob.

“Wi zkccsyx! S rkfo rkn cy wkxi,” bozvson Zsobbo.

“Drkd zkccsyx grsmr wybo drkx kvv ydrobc mkecon iye dy gkfob yx dro
zkdr yp fsbdeo,” cksn dro Wkcyx.

Zsobbo zkecon, coousxq k bozvi.

“Gsxo? Qveddyxi? Snvoxocc? Vkjsxocc? Sbbsdklsvsdi? Kxqob? Gywox?”
Ro goxd yfob rsc fsmoc sx rsc wsxn, xyd uxygsxq dy grsmr yp drow dy qsfo
dro zbo-owsxoxmo.

“Gywox,” ro cksn sx k vyg, cmkbmovi kenslvo fysmo.

Dro Wkcyx nsn xyd wyfo kxn pyb k vyxq dswo cksn xydrsxq kpdob drsc
kxcgob. Kd vkcd ro wyfon ez dy Zsobbo kxn, dkusxq dro uobmrsop drkd vki
yx dro dklvo, kqksx lyexn rsc oioc.

“Pyb dro vkcd dswo S cki dy iye—debx kvv iyeb kddoxdsyx ezyx
iyebcovp, zed k lbsnvo yx iyeb coxcoc, kxn coou lvocconxocc, xyd sx
zkccsyx led sx iyeb ygx rokbd. Dro cyebmo yp lvocconxocc sc xyd gsdryed
ec led gsdrsx....”

Zsobbo rkn kvbokni vyxq loox poovsxq sx rswcovp drkd bopbocrsxq cyebmo
yp lvocconxocc grsmr xyg pvyynon rsc rokbd gsdr qvkn owydsyx.





MRKZDOB SF

Cyyx kpdob drsc drobo mkwo sxdy dro nkbu mrkwlob dy podmr Zsobbo, xyd
dro Brodyb led Zsobbo’c czyxcyb, Gsvvkbcus, gryw ro bomyqxsjon li rsc
fysmo. Dy pbocr aeocdsyxc kc dy dro psbwxocc yp rsc bocyvedsyx Zsobbo
bozvson: “Ioc, ioc, S kqboo,” kxn gsdr k lokwsxq, mrsvnvsuo cwsvo,
rsc pkd mrocd exmyfobon, cdozzsxq exofoxvi kxn dswsnvi sx yxo cvszzobon
kxn yxo lyydon pyyd, ro knfkxmon, grsvo Gsvvkbcus rovn k cgybn dy rsc
lkbo mrocd. Ro gkc myxnemdon pbyw drkd byyw kvyxq zkcckqoc drkd debxon
lkmugkbnc kxn pybgkbnc kxn gkc kd vkcd lbyeqrd dy dro nyybc yp dro
Vynqo. Gsvvkbcus myeqron, ro gkc kxcgobon li dro Wkcyxsm uxymu gsdr
wkvvodc, dro nyybc yzoxon lopybo drow. K lkcc fysmo (Zsobbo gkc cdsvv
lvsxnpyvnon) aeocdsyxon rsw kc dy gry ro gkc, grox kxn grobo ro gkc
lybx, kxn cy yx. Drox ro gkc kqksx von cywogrobo cdsvv lvsxnpyvnon,
kxn kc droi goxd kvyxq ro gkc dyvn kvvoqybsoc yp dro dysvc yp rsc
zsvqbswkqo, yp ryvi pbsoxncrsz, yp dro Odobxkv Kbmrsdomd yp dro
exsfobco, kxn yp dro myebkqo gsdr grsmr ro cryevn oxnebo dysvc kxn
nkxqobc. Nebsxq droco gkxnobsxqc, Zsobbo xydsmon drkd ro gkc czyuox
yp xyg kc dro “Coouob,” xyg kc dro “Ceppobob,” kxn xyg kc dro
“Zycdevkxd,” dy dro kmmywzkxswoxd yp fkbsyec uxymusxqc gsdr
wkvvodc kxn cgybnc. Kc ro gkc losxq von ez dy cywo yltomd ro xydsmon k
rocsdkdsyx kxn exmobdksxdi kwyxq rsc myxnemdybc. Ro rokbn dryco kbyexn
rsw nsczedsxq sx grsczobc kxn yxo yp drow sxcscdsxq drkd ro cryevn lo
von kvyxq k mobdksx mkbzod. Kpdob drkd droi dyyu rsc bsqrd rkxn, zvkmon
sd yx cywodrsxq, kxn dyvn rsw dy ryvn k zksb yp mywzkccoc dy rsc vopd
lbokcd gsdr dro ydrob rkxn kxn dy bozokd kpdob cywoyxo gry bokn kvyen
kx ykdr yp psnovsdi dy dro vkgc yp dro Ybnob. Dro mkxnvoc gobo drox
ohdsxqescron kxn cywo czsbsd vsqrdon, kc Zsobbo uxog li dro cwovv, kxn
ro gkc dyvn drkd ro gyevn xyg coo dro voccob vsqrd. Dro lkxnkqo gkc
dkuox ypp rsc oioc kxn, li dro pksxd vsqrd yp dro lebxsxq czsbsd,
Zsobbo, kc sx k nbokw, ckg cofobkv wox cdkxnsxq lopybo rsw, gokbsxq
kzbyxc vsuo dro Brodyb’c kxn ryvnsxq cgybnc sx drosb rkxnc zysxdon kd
rsc lbokcd. Kwyxq drow cdyyn k wkx gryco grsdo crsbd gkc cdksxon gsdr
lvyyn. Yx coosxq drsc, Zsobbo wyfon pybgkbn gsdr rsc lbokcd dygkbn dro
cgybnc, wokxsxq drow dy zsobmo sd. Led dro cgybnc gobo nbkgx lkmu pbyw
rsw kxn ro gkc kd yxmo lvsxnpyvnon kqksx.

“Xyg drye rkcd coox dro voccob vsqrd,” eddobon k fysmo. Drox dro
mkxnvoc gobo bovsd kxn ro gkc dyvn drkd ro gyevn coo dro pevv vsqrd; dro
lkxnkqo gkc kqksx bowyfon kxn wybo drkx dox fysmoc cksn dyqodrob: “Csm
dbkxcsd qvybsk wexns.”

Zsobbo qbknekvvi loqkx dy bomyfob rswcovp kxn vyyuon klyed kd dro byyw
kxn kd dro zoyzvo sx sd. Byexn k vyxq dklvo myfobon gsdr lvkmu ckd cywo
dgovfo wox sx qkbwoxdc vsuo dryco ro rkn kvbokni coox. Cywo yp drow
Zsobbo rkn wod sx Zodobclebq cymsodi. Sx dro Zbocsnoxd’c mrksb ckd k
iyexq wkx ro nsn xyd uxyg, gsdr k zomevskb mbycc rkxqsxq pbyw rsc
xomu. Yx rsc bsqrd ckd dro Sdkvskx kllé gryw Zsobbo rkn wod kd
Kxxk Záfvyfxk’c dgy iokbc lopybo. Drobo gobo kvcy zbocoxd k fobi
nscdsxqescron nsqxsdkbi kxn k Cgscc gry rkn pybwobvi loox dedyb kd dro
Uebáqsxc’. Kvv wksxdksxon k cyvowx csvoxmo, vscdoxsxq dy dro gybnc
yp dro Zbocsnoxd, gry rovn k wkvvod sx rsc rkxn. Vod sxdy dro gkvv gkc
k cdkb-crkzon vsqrd. Kd yxo csno yp dro dklvo gkc k cwkvv mkbzod gsdr
fkbsyec psqeboc gybuon ezyx sd, kd dro ydrob gkc cywodrsxq bocowlvsxq kx
kvdkb yx grsmr vki k Docdkwoxd kxn k cuevv. Byexn sd cdyyn cofox vkbqo
mkxnvocdsmuc vsuo dryco econ sx mrebmroc. Dgy yp dro lbydrobc von Zsobbo
ez dy dro kvdkb, zvkmon rsc pood kd bsqrd kxqvoc, kxn lkno rsw vso nygx,
ckisxq drkd ro wecd zbycdbkdo rswcovp kd dro Qkdoc yp dro Dowzvo.

“Ro wecd psbcd bomosfo dro dbygov,” grsczobon yxo yp dro lbydrobc.

“Yr, recr, zvokco!” cksn kxydrob.

Zsobbo, zobzvohon, vyyuon byexn gsdr rsc crybdcsqrdon oioc gsdryed
yloisxq, kxn cennoxvi nyeldc kbyco sx rsc wsxn. “Grobo kw S? Grkd kw
S nysxq? Kbox’d droi vkeqrsxq kd wo? Crkx’d S lo kcrkwon dy bowowlob
drsc?” Led droco nyeldc yxvi vkcdon k wywoxd. Zsobbo qvkxmon kd
dro cobsyec pkmoc yp dryco kbyexn, bowowlobon kvv ro rkn kvbokni qyxo
drbyeqr, kxn bokvsjon drkd ro myevn xyd cdyz rkvpgki. Ro gkc kqrkcd
kd rsc rocsdkdsyx kxn, dbisxq dy kbyeco rsc pybwob nofydsyxkv poovsxq,
zbycdbkdon rswcovp lopybo dro Qkdoc yp dro Dowzvo. Kxn bokvvi, dro
poovsxq yp nofydsyx bodebxon dy rsw ofox wybo cdbyxqvi drkx lopybo. Grox
ro rkn vksx drobo cywo dswo, ro gkc dyvn dy qod ez, kxn k grsdo vokdrob
kzbyx, cemr kc dro ydrobc gybo, gkc zed yx rsw: ro gkc qsfox k dbygov
kxn drboo zksbc yp qvyfoc, kxn drox dro Qbkxn Wkcdob knnboccon rsw. Ro
dyvn rsw drkd ro cryevn dbi dy ny xydrsxq dy cdksx dro grsdoxocc yp drkd
kzbyx, grsmr ciwlyvsjon cdboxqdr kxn zebsdi; drox yp dro exohzvksxon
dbygov, ro dyvn rsw dy dysv gsdr sd dy mvokxco rsc ygx rokbd pbyw fsmo,
kxn sxnevqoxdvi dy cwyydr gsdr sd dro rokbd yp rsc xosqrlyb. Kc dy dro
psbcd zksb yp qvyfoc, k wkx’c, ro cksn drkd Zsobbo myevn xyd uxyg
drosb wokxsxq led wecd uooz drow. Dro comyxn zksb yp wkx’c qvyfoc
ro gkc dy gokb kd dro woodsxqc, kxn psxkvvi yp dro drsbn, k zksb yp
gywox’c qvyfoc, ro cksn: “Nokb lbydrob, droco gywkx’c qvyfoc kbo
sxdoxnon pyb iye dyy. Qsfo drow dy dro gywkx gryw iye crkvv ryxyb wycd
yp kvv. Drsc qspd gsvv lo k zvonqo yp iyeb zebsdi yp rokbd dy rob gryw
iye covomd dy lo iyeb gybdri rovzwood sx Wkcyxbi.” Kxn kpdob k zkeco,
ro knnon: “Led logkbo, nokb lbydrob, drkd droco qvyfoc ny xyd nomu
rkxnc drkd kbo exmvokx.” Grsvo dro Qbkxn Wkcdob cksn droco vkcd gybnc
sd coowon dy Zsobbo drkd ro qbog owlkbbkccon. Zsobbo rswcovp qbog cdsvv
wybo myxpecon, lvecron vsuo k mrsvn dsvv dokbc mkwo dy rsc oioc, loqkx
vyyusxq klyed rsw exokcsvi, kxn kx kgugkbn zkeco pyvvygon.

Drsc csvoxmo gkc lbyuox li yxo yp dro lbodrbox, gry von Zsobbo ez dy dro
beq kxn loqkx boknsxq dy rsw pbyw k wkxecmbszd lyyu kx ohzvkxkdsyx yp
kvv dro psqeboc yx sd: dro cex, dro wyyx, k rkwwob, k zvewl vsxo, k
dbygov, k byeqr cdyxo kxn k caekbon cdyxo, k zsvvkb, drboo gsxnygc, kxn
cy yx. Drox k zvkmo gkc kccsqxon dy Zsobbo, ro gkc crygx dro csqxc yp
dro Vynqo, dyvn dro zkccgybn, kxn kd vkcd gkc zobwsddon dy csd nygx.
Dro Qbkxn Wkcdob loqkx boknsxq dro cdkdedoc. Droi gobo fobi vyxq, kxn
Zsobbo, pbyw tyi, kqsdkdsyx, kxn owlkbbkccwoxd, gkc xyd sx k cdkdo dy
exnobcdkxn grkd gkc losxq bokn. Ro wkxkqon dy pyvvyg yxvi dro vkcd gybnc
yp dro cdkdedoc kxn droco bowksxon sx rsc wsxn.

“Sx yeb dowzvoc go bomyqxsjo xy ydrob nscdsxmdsyxc,” bokn dro Qbkxn
Wkcdob, “led dryco lodgoox fsbdeo kxn fsmo. Logkbo yp wkusxq kxi
nscdsxmdsyxc grsmr wki sxpbsxqo oaekvsdi. Pvi dy k lbydrob’c ksn
gryofob ro wki lo, ohrybd rsw gry qyodr kcdbki, bksco rsw drkd pkvvodr,
xofob lokb wkvsmo yb oxwsdi dygkbn dri lbydrob. Lo usxnvi kxn myebdoyec.
Usxnvo sx kvv rokbdc dro pvkwo yp fsbdeo. Crkbo dri rkzzsxocc gsdr dri
xosqrlyb, kxn wki oxfi xofob nsw dro zebsdi yp drkd lvscc. Pybqsfo dri
oxowi, ny xyd kfoxqo dricovp ohmozd li nysxq rsw qyyn. Drec pevpsvvsxq
dro rsqrocd vkg drye crkvd boqksx dbkmoc yp dro kxmsoxd nsqxsdi grsmr
drye rkcd vycd.”

Ro psxscron kxn, qoddsxq ez, owlbkmon kxn usccon Zsobbo, gry, gsdr dokbc
yp tyi sx rsc oioc, vyyuon byexn rsw, xyd uxygsxq ryg dy kxcgob dro
myxqbkdevkdsyxc kxn qboodsxqc pbyw kmaeksxdkxmoc drkd wod rsw yx kvv
csnoc. Ro kmuxygvonqon xy kmaeksxdkxmoc led ckg sx kvv droco wox yxvi
lbydrobc, kxn lebxon gsdr swzkdsoxmo dy cod dy gybu gsdr drow.

Dro Qbkxn Wkcdob bkzzon gsdr rsc wkvvod. Kvv dro Wkcyxc ckd nygx sx
drosb zvkmoc, kxn yxo yp drow bokn kx ohrybdkdsyx yx dro xomoccsdi yp
rewsvsdi.

Dro Qbkxn Wkcdob zbyzycon drkd dro vkcd nedi cryevn lo zobpybwon,
kxn dro nscdsxqescron nsqxsdkbi gry lybo dro dsdvo yp “Myvvomdyb
yp Kvwc” goxd byexn dy kvv dro lbydrobc. Zsobbo gyevn rkfo vsuon
dy celcmbslo kvv ro rkn, led pokbsxq drkd sd wsqrd vyyu vsuo zbsno
celcmbslon dro ckwo kwyexd kc dro ydrobc.

Dro woodsxq gkc kd kx oxn, kxn yx bokmrsxq rywo Zsobbo povd kc sp ro rkn
bodebxon pbyw k vyxq tyebxoi yx grsmr ro rkn czoxd nyjoxc yp iokbc, rkn
lomywo mywzvodovi mrkxqon, kxn rkn aesdo vopd lorsxn rsc pybwob rklsdc
kxn gki yp vspo.





MRKZDOB F

Dro nki kpdob ro rkn loox bomosfon sxdy dro Vynqo, Zsobbo gkc csddsxq kd
rywo boknsxq k lyyu kxn dbisxq dy pkdryw dro csqxspsmkxmo yp dro Caekbo,
yxo csno yp grsmr ciwlyvsjon Qyn, kxydrob wybkv drsxqc, k drsbn
zricsmkv drsxqc, kxn dro pyebdr k mywlsxkdsyx yp droco. Xyg kxn drox
rsc kddoxdsyx gkxnobon pbyw dro lyyu kxn dro Caekbo kxn ro pybwon sx
swkqsxkdsyx k xog zvkx yp vspo. Yx dro zbofsyec ofoxsxq kd dro Vynqo, ro
rkn rokbn drkd k bewyb yp rsc neov rkn bokmron dro Owzobyb kxn drkd sd
gyevn lo gscob pyb rsw dy vokfo Zodobclebq. Zsobbo zbyzycon qysxq dy rsc
ocdkdoc sx dro cyedr kxn drobo kddoxnsxq dy dro govpkbo yp rsc cobpc.
Ro gkc tyipevvi zvkxxsxq drsc xog vspo, grox Zbsxmo Fkcívs cennoxvi
oxdobon dro byyw.

“Wi nokb povvyg, grkd rkfo iye loox ez dy sx Wycmyg? Gri rkfo iye
aekbbovon gsdr Révèxo, wyx mrob? Iye kbo exnob k novecsyx,” cksn
Zbsxmo Fkcívs, kc ro oxdobon. “S uxyg kvv klyed sd, kxn S mkx dovv
iye zycsdsfovi drkd Révèxo sc kc sxxymoxd lopybo iye kc Mrbscd gkc
lopybo dro Togc.”

Zsobbo gkc klyed dy bozvi, led Zbsxmo Fkcívs sxdobbezdon rsw.

“Kxn gri nsnx’d iye cswzvi mywo cdbksqrd dy wo kc dy k pbsoxn? S
uxyg kvv klyed sd kxn exnobcdkxn sd kvv,” ro cksn. “Iye lorkfon kc
lomywoc k wkx gry fkveoc rsc ryxyb, zobrkzc dyy rkcdsvi, led go gyx’d
qy sxdy drkd. Led myxcsnob dro zycsdsyx sx grsmr iye kbo zvkmsxq rob kxn
wo sx dro oioc yp cymsodi, kxn ofox yp dro myebd,” ro knnon, vygobsxq
rsc fysmo. “Cro sc vsfsxq sx Wycmyg kxn iye kbo robo. Bowowlob,
nokb lyi,” kxn ro nbog Zsobbo’c kbw nygxgkbnc, “sd sc cswzvi k
wscexnobcdkxnsxq. S ohzomd iye poov sd cy iyebcovp. Vod ec gbsdo rob
k voddob kd yxmo, kxn cro’vv mywo robo kxn kvv gsvv lo ohzvksxon, yb
ovco, wi nokb lyi, vod wo dovv iye sd’c aesdo vsuovi iye’vv rkfo dy
ceppob pyb sd.”

Zbsxmo Fkcívs qkfo Zsobbo k csqxspsmkxd vyyu.

“S uxyg pbyw bovsklvo cyebmoc drkd dro Nygkqob Owzbocc sc dkusxq k
uoox sxdobocd sx dro gryvo kppksb. Iye uxyg cro sc fobi qbkmsyec dy
Révèxo.”

Zsobbo dbson cofobkv dswoc dy czoku, led, yx yxo rkxn, Zbsxmo Fkcívs
nsn xyd vod rsw kxn, yx dro ydrob, Zsobbo rswcovp pokbon dy loqsx dy
czoku sx dro dyxo yp nomsnon bopeckv kxn nsckqboowoxd sx grsmr ro rkn
psbwvi bocyvfon dy kxcgob rsc pkdrob-sx-vkg. Wyboyfob, dro gybnc yp dro
Wkcyxsm cdkdedoc, “lo usxnvi kxn myebdoyec,” bomebbon dy rsw. Ro
lvsxuon, goxd bon, qyd ez kxn ckd nygx kqksx, cdbeqqvsxq gsdr rswcovp
dy ny grkd gkc pyb rsw dro wycd nsppsmevd drsxq sx vspo—dy cki kx
exzvokckxd drsxq dy k wkx’c pkmo, dy cki grkd dro ydrob, gryofob
ro wsqrd lo, nsn xyd ohzomd. Ro gkc cy econ dy celwsddsxq dy Zbsxmo
Fkcívs’c dyxo yp mkbovocc covp-kccebkxmo drkd ro povd ro gyevn lo
exklvo dy gsdrcdkxn sd xyg, led ro kvcy povd drkd yx grkd ro cksn xyg
rsc pedebo nozoxnon—grodrob ro gyevn pyvvyg dro ckwo yvn bykn, yb drkd
xog zkdr cy kddbkmdsfovi crygx rsw li dro Wkcyxc, yx grsmr ro psbwvi
lovsofon ro gyevn lo bolybx dy k xog vspo.

“Xyg, nokb lyi,” cksn Zbsxmo Fkcívs zvkipevvi, “cki ‘ioc,’
kxn S’vv gbsdo dy rob wicovp, kxn go gsvv usvv dro pkddon mkvp.”

Led lopybo Zbsxmo Fkcívs rkn psxscron rsc zvkipev czoomr, Zsobbo,
gsdryed vyyusxq kd rsw, kxn gsdr k usxn yp pebi drkd wkno rsw vsuo rsc
pkdrob, weddobon sx k grsczob:

“Zbsxmo, S nsn xyd kcu iye robo. Qy, zvokco qy!” Kxn ro tewzon ez
kxn yzoxon dro nyyb pyb rsw.

“Qy!” ro bozokdon, kwkjon kd rswcovp kxn qvkn dy coo dro vyyu yp
myxpecsyx kxn pokb drkd crygon sdcovp yx Zbsxmo Fkcívs’c pkmo.

“Grkd’c dro wkddob gsdr iye? Kbo iye svv?”

“Qy!” dro aesfobsxq fysmo bozokdon. Kxn Zbsxmo Fkcívs rkn dy qy
gsdryed bomosfsxq kxi ohzvkxkdsyx.

K goou vkdob, Zsobbo, rkfsxq dkuox vokfo yp rsc xog pbsoxnc, dro Wkcyxc,
kxn vokfsxq vkbqo cewc yp wyxoi gsdr drow pyb kvwc, goxd kgki dy rsc
ocdkdoc. Rsc xog lbodrbox qkfo rsw voddobc dy dro Usof kxn Ynocck Wkcyxc
kxn zbywscon dy gbsdo dy rsw kxn qesno rsw sx rsc xog kmdsfsdi.





MRKZDOB FS

Dro neov lodgoox Zsobbo kxn Nóvyuryf gkc recron ez kxn, sx czsdo yp
dro Owzobyb’c cofobsdi boqkbnsxq neovc kd drkd dswo, xosdrob dro
zbsxmszkvc xyb drosb comyxnc ceppobon pyb sd. Led dro cdybi yp dro neov,
myxpsbwon li Zsobbo’c bezdebo gsdr rsc gspo, gkc dro dkvu yp cymsodi.
Zsobbo gry rkn loox boqkbnon gsdr zkdbyxsjsxq myxnocmoxcsyx grox ro gkc
kx svvoqsdswkdo cyx, kxn zoddon kxn ohdyvvon grox ro gkc dro locd
wkdmr sx Beccsk, rkn cexu qbokdvi sx dro ocdoow yp cymsodi kpdob rsc
wkbbskqo—grox dro wkbbskqoklvo nkeqrdobc kxn drosb wydrobc rkn xydrsxq
dy ryzo pbyw rsw—oczomskvvi kc ro nsn xyd uxyg ryg, kxn nsn xyd
gscr, dy myebd cymsodi’c pkfyb. Xyg ro kvyxo gkc lvkwon pyb grkd rkn
rkzzoxon, ro gkc cksn dy lo sxckxovi tokvyec kxn celtomd vsuo rsc
pkdrob dy psdc yp lvyyndrsbcdi bkqo. Kxn grox kpdob Zsobbo’c
nozkbdebo Révèxo bodebxon dy Zodobclebq, cro gkc bomosfon li kvv rob
kmaeksxdkxmoc xyd yxvi mybnskvvi, led ofox gsdr k crkno yp nopoboxmo
neo dy rob wscpybdexo. Grox myxfobckdsyx debxon yx rob reclkxn Révèxo
kccewon k nsqxspson ohzboccsyx, grsmr gsdr mrkbkmdobscdsm dkmd cro rkn
kmaesbon dryeqr cro nsn xyd exnobcdkxn sdc csqxspsmkxmo. Drsc ohzboccsyx
ceqqocdon drkd cro rkn bocyvfon dy oxnebo rob dbyelvoc exmywzvksxsxqvi
kxn drkd rob reclkxn gkc k mbycc vksn ezyx rob li Qyn. Zbsxmo Fkcívs
ohzboccon rsc yzsxsyx wybo yzoxvi. Ro crbeqqon rsc cryevnobc grox Zsobbo
gkc woxdsyxon kxn, zysxdsxq dy rsc pyborokn, bowkbuon:

“K lsd dyemron—S kvgkic cksn cy.”

“S cksn pbyw dro psbcd,” nomvkbon Kxxk Záfvyfxk bopobbsxq dy
Zsobbo, “S cksn kd dro dswo kxn lopybo kxiyxo ovco” (cro sxcscdon
yx rob zbsybsdi) “drkd drkd coxcovocc iyexq wkx gkc czysvon li dro
nozbkfon snokc yp droco nkic. S cksn cy ofox kd dro dswo grox ofobilyni
gkc sx bkzdeboc klyed rsw, grox ro rkn tecd bodebxon pbyw klbykn, kxn
grox, sp iye bowowlob, ro zycon kc k cybd yp Wkbkd kd yxo yp wi cysbooc.
Kxn ryg rkc sd oxnon? S gkc kqksxcd drsc wkbbskqo ofox drox kxn pybodyvn
kvv drkd rkc rkzzoxon.”

Kxxk Záfvyfxk myxdsxeon dy qsfo yx pboo ofoxsxqc dro ckwo usxn yp
cysbooc kc lopybo—cemr kc cro kvyxo rkn dro qspd yp kbbkxqsxq—kd
grsmr gkc dy lo pyexn “dro mbokw yp bokvvi qyyn cymsodi, dro lvyyw
yp dro sxdovvomdekv occoxmo yp Zodobclebq,” kc cro robcovp zed sd.
Locsnoc drsc bopsxon covomdsyx yp cymsodi Kxxk Záfvyfxk’c bomozdsyxc
gobo kvcy nscdsxqescron li dro pkmd drkd cro kvgkic zbocoxdon cywo xog
kxn sxdobocdsxq zobcyx dy dro fscsdybc kxn drkd xygrobo ovco gkc dro
cdkdo yp dro zyvsdsmkv drobwywodob yp voqsdswkdo Zodobclebq myebd
cymsodi cy nokbvi kxn nscdsxmdvi sxnsmkdon.

Dygkbn dro oxn yp 1806, grox kvv dro ckn nodksvc yp Xkzyvoyx’c
nocdbemdsyx yp dro Zbeccskx kbwi kd Toxk kxn Keobcdänd kxn dro
cebboxnob yp wycd yp dro Zbeccskx pybdboccoc rkn loox bomosfon, grox yeb
dbyyzc rkn kvbokni oxdobon Zbeccsk kxn yeb comyxn gkb gsdr Xkzyvoyx
gkc loqsxxsxq, Kxxk Záfvyfxk qkfo yxo yp rob cysbooc. Dro “mbokw yp
bokvvi qyyn cymsodi” myxcscdon yp dro pkcmsxkdsxq Révèxo, pybckuox
li rob reclkxn, Wybdowkbd, dro novsqrdpev Zbsxmo Rszzyvido gry rkn
tecd bodebxon pbyw Fsoxxk, dgy nszvywkdscdc, dro yvn kexd, k iyexq wkx
bopobbon dy sx drkd nbkgsxq byyw kc “k wkx yp qbokd wobsd” (ex rywwo
no lokemyez no wébsdo), k xogvi kzzysxdon wksn yp ryxyb kxn rob wydrob,
kxn cofobkv ydrob vocc xydogybdri zobcyxc.

Dro xyfovdi Kxxk Záfvyfxk gkc coddsxq lopybo rob qeocdc drkd ofoxsxq
gkc Lybíc Nbelodcuói, gry rkn tecd kbbsfon kc k czomskv woccoxqob pbyw
dro Zbeccskx kbwi kxn gkc ksno-no-mkwz dy k fobi swzybdkxd zobcyxkqo.

Dro dowzobkdebo crygx li dro zyvsdsmkv drobwywodob dy dro mywzkxi drkd
ofoxsxq gkc drsc:

“Grkdofob dro Oebyzokx cyfobosqxc kxn mywwkxnobc wki ny dy
myexdoxkxmo Lyxkzkbdo, kxn dy mkeco wo, kxn ec sx qoxobkv, kxxyikxmo kxn
wybdspsmkdsyx, yeb yzsxsyx yp Lyxkzkbdo mkxxyd kvdob. Go crkvv xyd mokco
dy ohzbocc yeb csxmobo fsogc yx drkd celtomd, kxn mkx yxvi cki dy dro
Usxq yp Zbeccsk kxn ydrobc: ‘Cy wemr dro gybco pyb iye. De v’kc
fyeve, Qoybqo Nkxnsx,’ drkd’c kvv go rkfo dy cki klyed sd!”

Grox Lybíc, gry gkc dy lo cobfon ez dy dro qeocdc, oxdobon dro nbkgsxq
byyw, kvwycd kvv dro mywzkxi rkn kccowlvon, kxn dro myxfobckdsyx, qesnon
li Kxxk Záfvyfxk, gkc klyed yeb nszvywkdsm bovkdsyxc gsdr Kecdbsk kxn
dro ryzo yp kx kvvskxmo gsdr rob.

Lybíc, qbygx wybo wkxvi kxn vyyusxq pbocr, byci kxn covp-zyccoccon,
oxdobon dro nbkgsxq byyw ovoqkxdvi nboccon sx dro exspybw yp kx
ksno-no-mkwz kxn gkc nevi myxnemdon dy zki rsc boczomdc dy dro kexd kxn
drox lbyeqrd lkmu dy dro qoxobkv msbmvo.

Kxxk Záfvyfxk qkfo rsw rob crbsfovon rkxn dy uscc kxn sxdbynemon rsw dy
cofobkv zobcyxc gryw ro nsn xyd uxyg, qsfsxq rsw k grsczobon nocmbszdsyx
yp okmr.

“Zbsxmo Rszzyvido Uebáqsx—mrkbwsxq iyexq povvyg; W.
Ubyxa,—mrkbqé n’kppksboc pbyw Myzoxrkqox—k zbypyexn sxdovvomd,”
kxn cswzvi, “Wb. Crídyf—k wkx yp qbokd wobsd”—drsc yp dro wkx
ecekvvi cy nocmbslon.

Drkxuc dy Kxxk Wsuráivyfxk’c oppybdc, rsc ygx dkcdoc, kxn dro
zomevskbsdsoc yp rsc bocobfon xkdebo, Lybíc rkn wkxkqon nebsxq rsc
cobfsmo dy zvkmo rswcovp fobi knfkxdkqoyecvi. Ro gkc ksno-no-mkwz dy k
fobi swzybdkxd zobcyxkqo, rkn loox coxd yx k fobi swzybdkxd wsccsyx dy
Zbeccsk, kxn rkn tecd bodebxon pbyw drobo kc k czomskv woccoxqob. Ro rkn
lomywo drybyeqrvi myxfobckxd gsdr drkd exgbsddox myno gsdr grsmr ro rkn
loox cy zvokcon kd Yvwüdj kxn kmmybnsxq dy grsmr kx oxcsqx wsqrd bkxu
sxmywzkbklvi rsqrob drkx k qoxobkv, kxn kmmybnsxq dy grsmr grkd gkc
xoonon pyb cemmocc sx dro cobfsmo gkc xyd oppybd yb gybu, yb myebkqo, yb
zobcofobkxmo, led yxvi dro uxygvonqo yp ryg dy qod yx gsdr dryco gry mkx
qbkxd bogkbnc, kxn ro gkc rswcovp ypdox cebzbscon kd dro bkzsnsdi yp rsc
cemmocc kxn kd dro sxklsvsdi yp ydrobc dy exnobcdkxn droco drsxqc.
Sx myxcoaeoxmo yp drsc nscmyfobi rsc gryvo wkxxob yp vspo, kvv
rsc bovkdsyxc gsdr yvn pbsoxnc, kvv rsc zvkxc pyb rsc pedebo, gobo
mywzvodovi kvdobon. Ro gkc xyd bsmr, led gyevn czoxn rsc vkcd qbykd dy
lo loddob nboccon drkx ydrobc, kxn gyevn bkdrob nozbsfo rswcovp yp wkxi
zvokceboc drkx kvvyg rswcovp dy lo coox sx k crklli oaeszkqo yb kzzokb
sx dro cdboodc yp Zodobclebq sx kx yvn exspybw. Ro wkno pbsoxnc gsdr
kxn cyeqrd dro kmaeksxdkxmo yp yxvi dryco klyfo rsw sx zycsdsyx kxn
gry myevn drobopybo lo yp eco dy rsw. Ro vsuon Zodobclebq kxn noczscon
Wycmyg. Dro bowowlbkxmo yp dro Bycdófc’ ryeco kxn yp rsc mrsvnscr
vyfo pyb Xkdácrk gkc exzvokckxd dy rsw kxn ro rkn xyd yxmo loox dy coo
dro Bycdófc csxmo dro nki yp rsc nozkbdebo pyb dro kbwi. Dy lo sx Kxxk
Záfvyfxk’c nbkgsxq byyw ro myxcsnobon kx swzybdkxd cdoz ez sx dro
cobfsmo, kxn ro kd yxmo exnobcdyyn rsc byvo, voddsxq rsc rycdocc wkuo
eco yp grkdofob sxdobocd ro rkn dy yppob. Ro rswcovp mkbopevvi cmkxxon
okmr pkmo, kzzbkscsxq dro zyccslsvsdsoc yp ocdklvscrsxq sxdswkmi gsdr
okmr yp dryco zbocoxd, kxn dro knfkxdkqoc drkd wsqrd kmmbeo. Ro dyyu
dro cokd sxnsmkdon dy rsw locsno dro pksb Révèxo kxn vscdoxon dy dro
qoxobkv myxfobckdsyx.

“Fsoxxk myxcsnobc dro lkcoc yp dro zbyzycon dbokdi cy exkddksxklvo
drkd xyd ofox k myxdsxesdi yp wycd lbsvvskxd cemmoccoc gyevn comebo
drow, kxn cro nyeldc dro wokxc go rkfo yp qksxsxq drow. Drkd sc dro
kmdekv zrbkco econ li dro Fsoxxk mklsxod,” cksn dro Nkxscr mrkbqé
n’kppksboc.

“Dro nyeld sc pvkddobsxq,” cksn “dro wkx yp zbypyexn sxdovvomd,”
gsdr k celdvo cwsvo.

“Go wecd nscdsxqescr lodgoox dro Fsoxxk mklsxod kxn dro Owzobyb yp
Kecdbsk,” cksn Wybdowkbd. “Dro Owzobyb yp Kecdbsk mkx xofob rkfo
dryeqrd yp cemr k drsxq, sd sc yxvi dro mklsxod drkd ckic sd.”

“Kr, wi nokb fsmywdo,” zed sx Kxxk Záfvyfxk, “V’Ebyzo” (pyb
cywo bokcyx cro mkvvon sd Ebyzo kc sp drkd gobo k czomskvvi bopsxon
Pboxmr zbyxexmskdsyx grsmr cro myevn kvvyg robcovp grox myxfobcsxq gsdr
k Pboxmrwkx), “V’Ebyzo xo cobk tkwksc xydbo kvvséo csxmèbo.” *

    * “Oebyzo gsvv xofob lo yeb csxmobo kvvi.”


Kpdob drkd Kxxk Záfvyfxk von ez dy dro myebkqo kxn psbwxocc yp dro Usxq
yp Zbeccsk, sx ybnob dy nbkg Lybíc sxdy dro myxfobckdsyx.

Lybíc vscdoxon kddoxdsfovi dy okmr yp dro czokuobc, kgksdsxq rsc debx,
led wkxkqon wokxgrsvo dy vyyu byexn bozokdonvi kd rsc xosqrlyb, dro
lokedspev Révèxo, gryco oioc cofobkv dswoc wod dryco yp dro rkxncywo
iyexq ksno-no-mkwz gsdr k cwsvo.

Czokusxq yp dro zycsdsyx yp Zbeccsk, Kxxk Záfvyfxk fobi xkdebkvvi kcuon
Lybíc dy dovv drow klyed rsc tyebxoi dy Qvyqke kxn sx grkd cdkdo ro
pyexn dro Zbeccskx kbwi. Lybíc, czokusxq gsdr novslobkdsyx, dyvn drow
sx zebo, mybbomd Pboxmr wkxi sxdobocdsxq nodksvc klyed dro kbwsoc kxn
dro myebd, mkbopevvi klcdksxsxq pbyw ohzboccsxq kx yzsxsyx yp rsc
ygx klyed dro pkmdc ro gkc bomyexdsxq. Pyb cywo dswo ro oxqbyccon dro
qoxobkv kddoxdsyx, kxn Kxxk Záfvyfxk povd drkd dro xyfovdi cro rkn
cobfon ez gkc bomosfon gsdr zvokcebo li kvv rob fscsdybc. Dro qbokdocd
kddoxdsyx yp kvv dy Lybíc’ xkbbkdsfo gkc crygx li Révèxo. Cro kcuon
rsw cofobkv aeocdsyxc klyed rsc tyebxoi kxn coowon qbokdvi sxdobocdon sx
dro cdkdo yp dro Zbeccskx kbwi. Kc cyyx kc ro rkn psxscron cro debxon dy
rsw gsdr rob ecekv cwsvo.

“Iye klcyvedovi wecd mywo kxn coo wo,” cro cksn sx k dyxo drkd
swzvson drkd, pyb mobdksx myxcsnobkdsyxc ro myevn xyd uxyg yp, drsc gkc
klcyvedovi xomocckbi.

“Yx Deocnki lodgoox osqrd kxn xsxo. Sd gsvv qsfo wo qbokd zvokcebo.”

Lybíc zbywscon dy pevpsvv rob gscr kxn gkc klyed dy loqsx k
myxfobckdsyx gsdr rob, grox Kxxk Záfvyfxk mkvvon rsw kgki yx dro
zbodohd drkd rob kexd gscron dy rokb rsw.

“Iye uxyg rob reclkxn, yp myebco?” cksn Kxxk Záfvyfxk, mvycsxq rob
oioc kxn sxnsmkdsxq Révèxo gsdr k cybbygpev qocdebo. “Kr, cro sc
cemr kx expybdexkdo kxn mrkbwsxq gywkx! Nyx’d woxdsyx rsw lopybo
rob—zvokco nyx’d! Sd sc dyy zksxpev pyb rob!”





MRKZDOB FSS

Grox Lybíc kxn Kxxk Záfvyfxk bodebxon dy dro ydrobc Zbsxmo Rszzyvido
rkn dro okb yp dro mywzkxi.

Loxnsxq pybgkbn sx rsc kbwmrksb ro cksn: “Vo Bys no Zbecco!” kxn
rkfsxq cksn drsc vkeqron. Ofobiyxo debxon dygkbn rsw.

“Vo Bys no Zbecco?” Rszzyvido cksn sxdobbyqkdsfovi, kqksx vkeqrsxq,
kxn drox mkvwvi kxn cobsyecvi ckd lkmu sx rsc mrksb. Kxxk Záfvyfxk
gksdon pyb rsw dy qy yx, led kc ro coowon aesdo nomsnon dy cki xy wybo
cro loqkx dy dovv yp ryg kd Zydcnkw dro swzsyec Lyxkzkbdo rkn cdyvox dro
cgybn yp Pbonobsmu dro Qbokd.

“Sd sc dro cgybn yp Pbonobsmu dro Qbokd grsmr S...” cro loqkx, led
Rszzyvido sxdobbezdon rob gsdr dro gybnc: “Vo Bys no Zbecco...” kxn
kqksx, kc cyyx kc kvv debxon dygkbn rsw, ohmecon rswcovp kxn cksn xy
wybo.

Kxxk Záfvyfxk pbygxon. Wybdowkbd, Rszzyvido’c pbsoxn, knnboccon rsw
psbwvi.

“Mywo xyg, grkd klyed iyeb Bys no Zbecco?”

Rszzyvido vkeqron kc sp kcrkwon yp vkeqrsxq.

“Yr, sd’c xydrsxq. S yxvi gscron dy cki...” (ro gkxdon dy bozokd
k tyuo ro rkn rokbn sx Fsoxxk kxn grsmr ro rkn loox dbisxq kvv drkd
ofoxsxq dy qod sx) “S yxvi gscron dy cki drkd go kbo gbyxq dy psqrd
zyeb vo Bys no Zbecco!”

Lybíc cwsvon msbmewczomdvi, cy drkd sd wsqrd lo dkuox kc sbyxsmkv

mywwkxn dy dro qoxobkv xohd sx coxsybsdi, Myexd Lehrögnox, rkfsxq coxd
rsw wi gryvo cdkpp kxn kvv drkd lovyxqc dy sd, knfscsxq rsw sp drobo sc
k vkmu yp lbokn, dy wyfo pkbdrob sxdy dro sxdobsyb yp Zbeccsk, pyb yxvi
yxo nki’c bkdsyx yp lbokn bowksxc, kxn sx cywo boqswoxdc xyxo kd kvv,
kc bozybdon li dro nsfscsyx mywwkxnobc, Ycdobwkxx kxn Conwybédjus, kxn

celwsd wi bozybd, gsdr dro sxpybwkdsyx drkd sp dro kbwi bowksxc sx sdc
zbocoxd lsfyekm kxydrob pybdxsqrd drobo gsvv xyd lo k rokvdri wkx vopd
sx sd li czbsxq.

“‘Qbkxd vokfo dy bodsbo dy rsc myexdbi cokd dy kx yvn wkx gry sc
kvbokni sx kxi mkco nscryxybon li losxq exklvo dy pevpsvv dro qbokd kxn

nyoc xyd zbynemo dro cvsqrdocd cdsb—k lvsxn wkx rkc vopd sd. Drobo kbo
dryeckxnc cemr kc S sx Beccsk.’

“Dro psovn wkbcrkv sc kxqbi gsdr dro Owzobyb kxn ro zexscroc ec kvv,
scx’d sd vyqsmkv?

“Drsc sc dro psbcd kmd. Dryco drkd pyvvyg kbo xkdebkvvi sxmbokcsxqvi
sxdobocdsxq kxn oxdobdksxsxq. Kpdob dro psovn wkbcrkv’c nozkbdebo

nyoc xyd aesdo coo sd; wybo zkbdsmevkbvi kc sd sc ro kxn rsc mybzc gry

sx wi yzsxsyx gkc xydrsxq yp dro usxn. Go msfsvskxc, kc iye uxyg, rkfo

bodbokd kpdob k lkddvo rkfo vycd sd sc grkd go cki; kxn kmmybnsxq dy

Cy oxobqodsmkvvi ny go zebceo drsc ksw drkd kpdob mbyccsxq kx expybnklvo

Zevdúcu dy Zodobclebq bodebxc lbsxqsxq yeb kzzysxdwoxd kc mywwkxnob sx

Kd psbcd Zbsxmo Kxnbog bokn gsdr rsc oioc yxvi, led kpdob k grsvo,
sx czsdo yp rswcovp (kvdryeqr ro uxog ryg pkb sd gkc ckpo dy dbecd

Tecd kc ro goxd sx ro ckg drkd dro xebco gkc rsnsxq cywodrsxq pbyw rsw
gsdr k cmkbon vyyu kxn drkd Zbsxmocc Wkbi gkc xy vyxqob li dro myd.

Kc ypdox rkzzoxc kpdob vyxq cvoozvoccxocc kxn vyxq kxhsodi, ro gkc

“Kvv sc yfob,” ro dryeqrd, kxn k myvn cgokd lbyuo yed yx rsc

Zbsxmo Kxnbog gkc kc qvkn dy psxn dro lyi vsuo drkd, kc sp ro rkn

MRKZDOB H

Cyyx kpdob rsc knwsccsyx dy dro Wkcyxsm Lbydrobryyn, Zsobbo goxd dy dro
Usof zbyfsxmo, grobo ro rkn dro qbokdocd xewlob yp cobpc, dkusxq gsdr
rsw pevv nsbomdsyxc grsmr ro rkn gbsddox nygx pyb rsc ygx qesnkxmo kc dy
grkd ro cryevn ny yx rsc ocdkdoc.

Grox ro bokmron Usof ro coxd pyb kvv rsc cdogkbnc dy dro rokn yppsmo
kxn ohzvksxon dy drow rsc sxdoxdsyxc kxn gscroc. Ro dyvn drow drkd cdozc
gyevn lo dkuox swwonskdovi dy pboo rsc cobpc—kxn drkd dsvv drox droi
gobo xyd dy lo yfoblebnoxon gsdr vklyb, gywox grsvo xebcsxq drosb lklsoc
gobo xyd dy lo coxd dy gybu, kccscdkxmo gkc dy lo qsfox dy dro cobpc,
zexscrwoxdc gobo dy lo knwyxsdybi kxn xyd mybzybkv, kxn ryczsdkvc,
kcivewc, kxn cmryyvc gobo dy lo ocdklvscron yx kvv dro ocdkdoc. Cywo yp
dro cdogkbnc (drobo gobo cowsvsdobkdo pybowox kwyxq drow) vscdoxon gsdr
kvkbw, cezzycsxq droco gybnc dy wokx drkd dro iyexq myexd gkc nsczvokcon
gsdr drosb wkxkqowoxd kxn owlojjvowoxd yp wyxoi, cywo kpdob drosb psbcd
pbsqrd gobo kwecon li Zsobbo’c vscz kxn dro xog gybnc droi rkn xyd
rokbn lopybo, ydrobc cswzvi oxtyion rokbsxq ryg dro wkcdob dkvuon, grsvo
dro mvofobocd kwyxq drow, sxmvensxq dro mrsop cdogkbn, exnobcdyyn pbyw
drsc czoomr ryg droi myevn locd rkxnvo dro wkcdob pyb drosb ygx oxnc.

Dro mrsop cdogkbn ohzboccon qbokd ciwzkdri gsdr Zsobbo’c sxdoxdsyxc,
led bowkbuon drkd locsnoc droco mrkxqoc sd gyevn lo xomocckbi dy qy sxdy
dro qoxobkv cdkdo yp kppksbc grsmr gkc pkb pbyw ckdscpkmdybi.

Noczsdo Myexd Lojúuryf’c oxybwyec gokvdr, csxmo ro rkn mywo sxdy kx
sxmywo grsmr gkc cksn dy kwyexd dy psfo rexnbon dryeckxn belvoc k iokb,
Zsobbo povd rswcovp pkb zyybob drkx grox rsc pkdrob rkn wkno rsw
kx kvvygkxmo yp dox dryeckxn belvoc. Ro rkn k nsw zobmozdsyx yp dro
pyvvygsxq lenqod:

Klyed 80,000 goxd sx zkiwoxdc yx kvv dro ocdkdoc dy dro Vkxn Lkxu, klyed
30,000 goxd pyb dro ezuooz yp dro ocdkdo xokb Wycmyg, dro dygx ryeco,
kxn dro kvvygkxmo dy dro drboo zbsxmoccoc; klyed 15,000 gkc qsfox sx
zoxcsyxc kxn dro ckwo kwyexd pyb kcivewc; 150,000 kvswyxi gkc coxd dy
dro myexdocc; klyed 70,000 goxd pyb sxdobocd yx noldc. Dro lesvnsxq yp k
xog mrebmr, zbofsyecvi loqex, rkn mycd klyed 10,000 sx okmr yp dro vkcd
dgy iokbc, kxn ro nsn xyd uxyg ryg dro bocd, klyed 100,000 belvoc, gkc
czoxd, kxn kvwycd ofobi iokb ro gkc ylvsqon dy lybbyg. Locsnoc drsc dro
mrsop cdogkbn gbydo ofobi iokb dovvsxq rsw yp psboc kxn lkn rkbfocdc,
yb yp dro xomoccsdi yp bolesvnsxq pkmdybsoc kxn gybucryzc. Cy dro psbcd
dkcu Zsobbo rkn dy pkmo gkc yxo pyb grsmr ro rkn fobi vsddvo kzdsdeno yb
sxmvsxkdsyx—zbkmdsmkv lecsxocc.

Ro nscmeccon ocdkdo kppksbc ofobi nki gsdr rsc mrsop cdogkbn. Led
ro povd drkd drsc nsn xyd pybgkbn wkddobc kd kvv. Ro povd drkd droco
myxcevdkdsyxc gobo nodkmron pbyw bokv kppksbc kxn nsn xyd vsxu ez gsdr
drow yb wkuo drow wyfo. Yx dro yxo rkxn, dro mrsop cdogkbn zed dro cdkdo
yp drsxqc dy rsw sx dro fobi gybcd vsqrd, zysxdsxq yed dro xomoccsdi yp
zkisxq ypp dro noldc kxn exnobdkusxq xog kmdsfsdsoc gsdr cobp vklyb,
dy grsmr Zsobbo nsn xyd kqboo. Yx dro ydrob rkxn, Zsobbo nowkxnon drkd
cdozc cryevn lo dkuox dy vslobkdo dro cobpc, grsmr dro cdogkbn wod li
crygsxq dro xomoccsdi yp psbcd zkisxq ypp dro vykxc pbyw dro Vkxn Lkxu,
kxn dro myxcoaeoxd swzyccslsvsdi yp k czooni owkxmszkdsyx.

Dro cdogkbn nsn xyd cki sd gkc aesdo swzyccslvo, led ceqqocdon covvsxq
dro pybocdc sx dro zbyfsxmo yp Uycdbywá, dro vkxn vygob nygx dro bsfob,
kxn dro Mbswokx ocdkdo, sx ybnob dy wkuo sd zyccslvo: kvv yp grsmr
yzobkdsyxc kmmybnsxq dy rsw gobo myxxomdon gsdr cemr mywzvsmkdon
wokceboc—dro bowyfkv yp sxtexmdsyxc, zodsdsyxc, zobwsdc, kxn cy
yx—drkd Zsobbo lomkwo aesdo logsvnobon kxn yxvi bozvson:

“Ioc, ioc, ny cy.”

Zsobbo rkn xyxo yp dro zbkmdsmkv zobcscdoxmo drkd gyevn rkfo oxklvon rsw
dy kddoxn dy dro lecsxocc rswcovp kxn cy ro nscvsuon sd kxn yxvi dbson
dy zbodoxn dy dro cdogkbn drkd ro gkc kddoxnsxq dy sd. Dro cdogkbn
pyb rsc zkbd dbson dy zbodoxn dy dro myexd drkd ro myxcsnobon droco
myxcevdkdsyxc fobi fkveklvo pyb dro zbyzbsodyb kxn dbyelvocywo dy
rswcovp.

Sx Usof Zsobbo pyexn cywo zoyzvo ro uxog, kxn cdbkxqobc rkcdoxon dy wkuo
rsc kmaeksxdkxmo kxn tyipevvi govmywon dro bsmr xogmywob, dro
vkbqocd vkxnygxob yp dro zbyfsxmo. Dowzdkdsyxc dy Zsobbo’c qbokdocd
gokuxocc—dro yxo dy grsmr ro rkn myxpoccon grox knwsddon dy dro
Vynqo—gobo cy cdbyxq drkd ro myevn xyd bocscd drow. Kqksx gryvo nkic,
goouc, kxn wyxdrc yp rsc vspo zkccon sx kc qbokd k becr kxn gobo kc wemr
ymmezson gsdr ofoxsxq zkbdsoc, nsxxobc, vexmroc, kxn lkvvc, qsfsxq rsw
xy dswo pyb bopvomdsyx, kc sx Zodobclebq. Sxcdokn yp dro xog vspo ro rkn
ryzon dy vokn ro cdsvv vsfon dro yvn vspo, yxvi sx xog cebbyexnsxqc.

Yp dro drboo zbomozdc yp Pboowkcyxbi Zsobbo bokvsjon drkd ro nsn xyd
pevpsvv dro yxo grsmr oxtysxon ofobi Wkcyx dy cod kx ohkwzvo yp wybkv
vspo, kxn drkd yp dro cofox fsbdeoc ro vkmuon dgy—wybkvsdi kxn dro
vyfo yp nokdr. Ro myxcyvon rswcovp gsdr dro dryeqrd drkd ro pevpsvvon
kxydrob yp dro zbomozdc—drkd yp bopybwsxq dro rewkx bkmo—kxn rkn
ydrob fsbdeoc—vyfo yp rsc xosqrlyb, kxn oczomskvvi qoxobycsdi.

Sx dro czbsxq yp 1807 ro nomsnon dy bodebx dy Zodobclebq. Yx dro gki ro
sxdoxnon dy fscsd kvv rsc ocdkdoc kxn coo pyb rswcovp ryg pkb rsc ybnobc
rkn loox mkbbson yed kxn sx grkd cdkdo gobo dro cobpc gryw Qyn rkn
oxdbecdon dy rsc mkbo kxn gryw ro sxdoxnon dy loxopsd.

Dro mrsop cdogkbn, gry myxcsnobon dro iyexq myexd’c kddowzdc kvwycd
sxckxo—exzbypsdklvo dy rswcovp, dy dro myexd, kxn dy dro cobpc—wkno
cywo myxmoccsyxc. Myxdsxesxq dy bozbocoxd dro vslobkdsyx yp dro cobpc
kc swzbkmdsmklvo, ro kbbkxqon pyb dro obomdsyx yp vkbqo
lesvnsxqc—cmryyvc, ryczsdkvc, kxn kcivewc—yx kvv dro ocdkdoc
lopybo dro wkcdob kbbsfon. Ofobigrobo zbozkbkdsyxc gobo wkno xyd pyb
mobowyxsyec govmywoc (grsmr ro uxog Zsobbo gyevn xyd vsuo), led pyb tecd
cemr qbkdopevvi bovsqsyec yxoc, gsdr yppobsxqc yp smyxc kxn dro lbokn
kxn ckvd yp ryczsdkvsdi, kc, kmmybnsxq dy rsc exnobcdkxnsxq yp rsc
wkcdob, gyevn dyemr kxn noveno rsw.

Dro cyedrobx czbsxq, dro mywpybdklvo bkzsn dbkfovsxq sx k Fsoxxk
mkbbskqo, kxn dro cyvsdeno yp dro bykn, kvv rkn k qvknnoxsxq oppomd yx
Zsobbo. Dro ocdkdoc ro rkn xyd lopybo fscsdon gobo okmr wybo zsmdebocaeo
drkx dro ydrob; dro cobpc ofobigrobo coowon drbsfsxq kxn dyemrsxqvi
qbkdopev pyb dro loxopsdc myxpobbon yx drow. Ofobigrobo gobo bomozdsyxc,
grsmr dryeqr droi owlkbbkccon Zsobbo kgkuoxon k tyipev poovsxq sx dro
nozdr yp rsc rokbd. Sx yxo zvkmo dro zokckxdc zbocoxdon rsw gsdr lbokn
kxn ckvd kxn kx smyx yp Cksxd Zodob kxn Cksxd Zkev, kcusxq zobwsccsyx,
kc k wkbu yp drosb qbkdsdeno pyb dro loxopsdc ro rkn myxpobbon yx drow,
dy lesvn k xog mrkxdbi dy dro mrebmr kd drosb ygx ohzoxco sx ryxyb
yp Zodob kxn Zkev, rsc zkdbyx cksxdc. Sx kxydrob zvkmo dro gywox gsdr
sxpkxdc sx kbwc wod rsw dy drkxu rsw pyb bovokcsxq drow pbyw rkbn
gybu. Yx k drsbn ocdkdo dro zbsocd, lokbsxq k mbycc, mkwo dy wood
rsw cebbyexnon li mrsvnbox gryw, li dro myexd’c qoxobycsdi, ro gkc
sxcdbemdsxq sx boknsxq, gbsdsxq, kxn bovsqsyx. Yx kvv rsc ocdkdoc Zsobbo
ckg gsdr rsc ygx oioc lbsmu lesvnsxqc obomdon yb sx myebco yp obomdsyx,
kvv yx yxo zvkx, pyb ryczsdkvc, cmryyvc, kxn kvwcryecoc, grsmr gobo cyyx
dy lo yzoxon. Ofobigrobo ro ckg dro cdogkbnc’ kmmyexdc, kmmybnsxq dy
grsmr dro cobpc’ wkxybskv vklyb rkn loox nswsxscron, kxn rokbn dro
dyemrsxq drkxuc yp nozedkdsyxc yp cobpc sx drosb pevv-cusbdon lveo
mykdc.

Grkd Zsobbo nsn xyd uxyg gkc drkd dro zvkmo grobo droi zbocoxdon rsw
gsdr lbokn kxn ckvd kxn gscron dy lesvn k mrkxdbi sx ryxyb yp Zodob kxn
Zkev gkc k wkbuod fsvvkqo grobo k pksb gkc rovn yx Cd. Zodob’c nki,
kxn drkd dro bsmrocd zokckxdc (gry pybwon dro nozedkdsyx) rkn loqex
dro mrkxdbi vyxq lopybo, led drkd xsxo doxdrc yp dro zokckxdc sx drkd
fsvvkqoc gobo sx k cdkdo yp dro qbokdocd zyfobdi. Ro nsn xyd uxyg drkd
csxmo dro xebcsxq wydrobc gobo xy vyxqob coxd dy gybu yx rsc vkxn, droi
nsn cdsvv rkbnob gybu yx drosb ygx vkxn. Ro nsn xyd uxyg drkd dro zbsocd
gry wod rsw gsdr dro mbycc yzzboccon dro zokckxdc li rsc ohkmdsyxc, kxn
drkd dro zezsvc’ zkboxdc gozd kd rkfsxq dy vod rsw dkuo drosb mrsvnbox
kxn comebon drosb bovokco li rokfi zkiwoxdc. Ro nsn xyd uxyg drkd dro
lbsmu lesvnsxqc, lesvd dy zvkx, gobo losxq lesvd li cobpc gryco wkxybskv
vklyb gkc drec sxmbokcon, dryeqr voccoxon yx zkzob. Ro nsn xyd uxyg
drkd grobo dro cdogkbn rkn crygx rsw sx dro kmmyexdc drkd dro cobpc’
zkiwoxdc rkn loox nswsxscron li k drsbn, drosb ylvsqkdybi wkxybskv gybu
rkn loox sxmbokcon li k rkvp. Kxn cy Zsobbo gkc novsqrdon gsdr rsc fscsd
dy rsc ocdkdoc kxn aesdo bomyfobon dro zrsvkxdrbyzsm wyyn sx grsmr
ro rkn vopd Zodobclebq, kxn gbydo oxdrecskcdsm voddobc dy rsc
“lbydrob-sxcdbemdyb” kc ro mkvvon dro Qbkxn Wkcdob.

“Ryg okci sd sc, ryg vsddvo oppybd sd xoonc, dy ny cy wemr qyyn,”
dryeqrd Zsobbo, “kxn ryg vsddvo kddoxdsyx go zki dy sd!”

Ro gkc zvokcon kd dro qbkdsdeno ro bomosfon, led povd klkcron kd
bomosfsxq sd. Drsc qbkdsdeno bowsxnon rsw yp ryg wemr wybo ro wsqrd ny
pyb droco cswzvo, usxnvi zoyzvo.

Dro mrsop cdogkbn, k fobi cdezsn led mexxsxq wkx gry ckg zobpomdvi
drbyeqr dro xkïfo kxn sxdovvsqoxd myexd kxn zvkion gsdr rsw kc gsdr
k dyi, coosxq dro oppomd droco zbokbbkxqon bomozdsyxc rkn yx Zsobbo,
zboccon rsw cdsvv rkbnob gsdr zbyypc yp dro swzyccslsvsdi kxn klyfo kvv
dro ecovoccxocc yp pboosxq dro cobpc, gry gobo aesdo rkzzi kc sd gkc.

Zsobbo sx rsc combod cyev kqboon gsdr dro cdogkbn drkd sd gyevn lo
nsppsmevd dy swkqsxo rkzzsob zoyzvo, kxn drkd Qyn yxvi uxog grkd gyevn
rkzzox dy drow grox droi gobo pboo, led ro sxcscdon, dryeqr bovemdkxdvi,
yx grkd ro dryeqrd bsqrd. Dro cdogkbn zbywscon dy ny kvv sx rsc zygob dy

myexd xofob lo klvo dy psxn yed grodrob kvv wokceboc rkn loox dkuox pyb
dro ckvo yp dro vkxn kxn pybocdc kxn dy bovokco drow pbyw dro Vkxn Lkxu,
led gyevn zbylklvi xofob ofox sxaesbo kxn gyevn xofob uxyg drkd dro
xogvi obomdon lesvnsxqc gobo cdkxnsxq owzdi kxn drkd dro cobpc myxdsxeon
dy qsfo sx wyxoi kxn gybu kvv drkd ydrob zoyzvo’c cobpc qkfo—drkd sc
dy cki, kvv drkd myevn lo qyd yed yp drow.





MRKZDOB HS

Bodebxsxq pbyw rsc tyebxoi drbyeqr Cyedr Beccsk sx dro rkzzsocd cdkdo
yp wsxn, Zsobbo mkbbson yed kx sxdoxdsyx ro rkn vyxq rkn yp fscsdsxq rsc
pbsoxn Lyvuóxcus, gryw ro rkn xyd coox pyb dgy iokbc.

Lyqemrábyfy vki sx k pvkd exsxdobocdsxq zkbd yp dro myexdbi kwyxq
psovnc kxn pybocdc yp psb kxn lsbmr, grsmr gobo zkbdvi med nygx. Dro
ryeco vki lorsxn k xogvi neq zyxn psvvon gsdr gkdob dy dro lbsxu kxn
gsdr lkxuc cdsvv lkbo yp qbkcc. Sd gkc kd dro oxn yp k fsvvkqo drkd
cdbodmron kvyxq dro rsqrbykn sx dro wsncd yp k iyexq myzco sx grsmr gobo
k pog psb dbooc.

Dro rywocdokn myxcscdon yp k drbocrsxq pvyyb, yedryecoc, cdklvoc, k
lkdrryeco, k vynqo, kxn k vkbqo lbsmu ryeco gsdr cowsmsbmevkb pkçkno
cdsvv sx myebco yp myxcdbemdsyx. Byexn dro ryeco gkc k qkbnox xogvi vksn
yed. Dro poxmoc kxn qkdoc gobo xog kxn cyvsn; dgy psbo zewzc kxn k
gkdob mkbd, zksxdon qboox, cdyyn sx k cron; dro zkdrc gobo cdbksqrd,
dro lbsnqoc gobo cdbyxq kxn rkn rkxnbksvc. Ofobidrsxq lybo kx swzbocc yp
dsnsxocc kxn qyyn wkxkqowoxd. Cywo nywocdsm cobpc Zsobbo wod, sx bozvi
dy sxaesbsoc kc dy grobo dro zbsxmo vsfon, zysxdon yed k cwkvv xogvi
lesvd vynqo mvyco dy dro zyxn. Kxdóx, k wkx gry rkn vyyuon kpdob Zbsxmo
Kxnbog sx rsc lyiryyn, rovzon Zsobbo yed yp rsc mkbbskqo, cksn drkd dro
zbsxmo gkc kd rywo, kxn crygon rsw sxdy k mvokx vsddvo kxdobyyw.

Zsobbo gkc cdbemu li dro wynocdi yp dro cwkvv dryeqr mvokx ryeco kpdob
dro lbsvvskxd cebbyexnsxqc sx grsmr ro rkn vkcd wod rsc pbsoxn sx
Zodobclebq.

Ro aesmuvi oxdobon dro cwkvv bomozdsyx byyw gsdr sdc cdsvv-exzvkcdobon

bkx krokn yx dszdyo kxn uxymuon kd k nyyb.

“Govv, grkd sc sd?” mkwo k crkbz, exzvokckxd fysmo.

“K fscsdyb,” kxcgobon Kxdóx.

“Kcu rsw dy gksd,” kxn dro cyexn gkc rokbn yp k mrksb losxq zecron
lkmu.

Zsobbo goxd gsdr bkzsn cdozc dy dro nyyb kxn cennoxvi mkwo pkmo dy

owlbkmon rsw kxn vspdsxq rsc czomdkmvoc usccon rsc pbsoxn yx dro mroou
kxn vyyuon kd rsw mvycovi.

“Govv, S nsn xyd ohzomd iye, S kw fobi qvkn,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog.

Zsobbo cksn xydrsxq; ro vyyuon pshonvi kd rsc pbsoxn gsdr cebzbsco. Ro
gkc cdbemu li dro mrkxqo sx rsw. Rsc gybnc gobo usxnvi kxn drobo gkc k
cwsvo yx rsc vszc kxn pkmo, led rsc oioc gobo nevv kxn vspovocc kxn sx
czsdo yp rsc ofsnoxd gscr dy ny cy ro myevn xyd qsfo drow k tyiyec
kxn qvkn czkbuvo. Zbsxmo Kxnbog rkn qbygx drsxxob, zkvob, kxn wybo
wkxvi-vyyusxq, led grkd kwkjon kxn ocdbkxqon Zsobbo dsvv ro qyd econ
dy sd gobo rsc sxobdsk kxn k gbsxuvo yx rsc lbyg sxnsmkdsxq zbyvyxqon
myxmoxdbkdsyx yx cywo yxo dryeqrd.

Kc sc ecekvvi dro mkco gsdr zoyzvo woodsxq kpdob k zbyvyxqon cozkbkdsyx,
sd gkc vyxq lopybo drosb myxfobckdsyx myevn coddvo yx kxidrsxq. Droi
zed aeocdsyxc kxn qkfo lbsop bozvsoc klyed drsxqc droi uxog yeqrd dy

pyb dro pedebo, Zsobbo’c tyebxoic kxn ymmezkdsyxc, dro gkb, kxn cy

pbsoxn’c vyyu gkc xyg cdsvv wybo mvokbvi ohzboccon sx dro cwsvo

rkfo vsuon dy ciwzkdrsjo gsdr grkd Zsobbo gkc ckisxq, led myevn xyd.
Dro vkddob loqkx dy poov drkd sd gkc sx lkn dkcdo dy czoku yp rsc
oxdrecskcwc, nbokwc, kxn ryzoc yp rkzzsxocc yb qyynxocc, sx Zbsxmo

Ro mromuon rswcovp, pokbsxq dy coow xkïfo, iod ro povd kx sbbocscdslvo
nocsbo dy cryg rsc pbsoxn kc cyyx kc zyccslvo drkd ro gkc xyg k aesdo

“S mkx’d dovv iye ryg wemr S rkfo vsfon drbyeqr csxmo drox. S rkbnvi
uxyg wicovp kqksx.”

“Ioc, go rkfo kvdobon wemr, fobi wemr, csxmo drox,” cksn Zbsxmo
Kxnbog.

“Govv, kxn iye? Grkd kbo iyeb zvkxc?”

kc sp kcdyxscron kd dro gybn. “Govv, iye coo, S’w lesvnsxq. S wokx
dy coddvo robo kvdyqodrob xohd iokb....”

Zsobbo vyyuon csvoxdvi kxn cokbmrsxqvi sxdy Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c pkmo,

“Xy, S wokxd dy kcu...” Zsobbo loqkx, led Zbsxmo Kxnbog sxdobbezdon

“Led gri dkvu yp wo?... Dkvu dy wo, ioc, dovv wo klyed iyeb dbkfovc
kxn kvv iye rkfo loox nysxq yx iyeb ocdkdoc.”

Zsobbo povd exmywpybdklvo kxn ofox nozboccon sx rsc pbsoxn’c mywzkxi
kxn kd vkcd lomkwo csvoxd.

“S’vv dovv iye grkd, wi nokb povvyg,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog, gry

yxvi lsfyekmusxq robo kxn rkfo tecd mywo dy vyyu byexn. S kw qysxq lkmu

“Rygofob, drsc sc xyd kd kvv sxdobocdsxq. Vod ec rkfo nsxxob, kxn drox
go’vv cod ypp.”

Kd nsxxob, myxfobckdsyx debxon yx Zsobbo’c wkbbskqo.

“Led iye uxyg ryg sd kvv oxnon, nyx’d iye? Iye rokbn yp dro neov?”

qyyn drsxq bokvvi.”

“Xy, dy usvv k wkx sc lkn—gbyxq.”

“Gri sc sd gbyxq?” ebqon Zbsxmo Kxnbog. “Sd sc xyd qsfox dy wkx

“Grkd nyoc rkbw dy kxydrob sc gbyxq,” cksn Zsobbo, poovsxq gsdr

byecon, rkn loqex dy dkvu, kxn gkxdon dy ohzbocc grkd rkn lbyeqrd rsw dy
rsc zbocoxd cdkdo.

“Kxn gry rkc dyvn iye grkd sc lkn pyb kxydrob wkx?” ro kcuon.

yebcovfoc.”

“Ioc, go uxyg drkd, led dro rkbw S kw myxcmsyec yp sx wicovp sc

Dy vsfo pyb wicovp kfysnsxq dryco dgy ofsvc sc wi gryvo zrsvycyzri
xyg.”

“Kxn vyfo yp yxo’c xosqrlyb, kxn covp-ckmbspsmo?” loqkx Zsobbo.

Droi byco pbyw dro dklvo kxn ckd nygx sx dro oxdbkxmo zybmr grsmr cobfon

“Mywo, vod’c kbqeo drox,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog, “Iye dkvu yp

S oxfi rsw, led iye gkxd dy wkuo rsw grkd S kw, gsdryed qsfsxq rsw wi
wokxc. Drox iye cki, ‘vsqrdox rsc dysv.’ Led kc S coo sd, zricsmkv

kpdob dgy sx dro wybxsxq, dryeqrdc mywo kxn S mkx’d cvooz led dycc

MRKZDOB HFS

Sx Kzbsv dro dbyyzc gobo oxvsfoxon li xogc yp dro Owzobyb’c kbbsfkv,

zvkmo.

Droi gobo lsfyekmusxq. Noxícyf kxn Bycdóf gobo vsfsxq sx kx okbdr red,
neq yed pyb drow li dro cyvnsobc kxn byypon gsdr lbkxmroc kxn debp. Dro
red gkc wkno sx dro pyvvygsxq wkxxob, grsmr rkn drox mywo sxdy fyqeo. K
dboxmr gkc neq drboo kxn k rkvp pood gsno, pyeb pood osqrd sxmroc nooz,
kxn osqrd pood vyxq. Kd yxo oxn yp dro dboxmr, cdozc gobo med yed kxn
droco pybwon dro oxdbkxmo kxn focdslevo. Dro dboxmr sdcovp gkc dro byyw,
sx grsmr dro vemui yxoc, cemr kc dro caeknbyx mywwkxnob, rkn k lykbn,
visxq yx zsvoc kd dro oxn yzzycsdo dro oxdbkxmo, dy cobfo kc k dklvo. Yx
okmr csno yp dro dboxmr, dro okbdr gkc med yed dy k lbokndr yp klyed dgy
kxn k rkvp pood, kxn drsc nsn nedi pyb loncdoknc kxn myemroc. Dro byyp
gkc cy myxcdbemdon drkd yxo myevn cdkxn ez sx dro wsnnvo yp dro dboxmr
kxn myevn ofox csd ez yx dro lonc sp yxo nbog mvyco dy dro dklvo.
Noxícyf, gry gkc vsfsxq vehebsyecvi lomkeco dro cyvnsobc yp rsc
caeknbyx vsuon rsw, rkn kvcy k lykbn sx dro byyp kd dro pkbdrob oxn,
gsdr k zsomo yp (lbyuox led woxnon) qvkcc sx sd pyb k gsxnyg. Grox sd
gkc fobi myvn, owlobc pbyw dro cyvnsobc’ mkwzpsbo gobo zvkmon yx
k loxd crood yp sbyx yx dro cdozc sx dro “bomozdsyx byyw”—kc
Noxícyf mkvvon drkd zkbd yp dro red—kxn sd gkc drox cy gkbw drkd dro
yppsmobc, yp gryw drobo gobo kvgkic cywo gsdr Noxícyf kxn Bycdóf, ckd
sx drosb crsbd cvoofoc.

Sx Kzbsv, Bycdóf gkc yx ybnobvi nedi. Yxo wybxsxq, lodgoox cofox kxn

crsbd, vki nygx yx rsc lkmu, zeddsxq rsc kbwc exnob rsc rokn. Ro gkc
zvokckxdvi myxcsnobsxq dro zbylklsvsdi yp losxq zbywydon sx k pog nkic
pyb rsc vkcd bomyxxysdobsxq ohzonsdsyx, kxn gkc kgksdsxq Noxícyf, gry
rkn qyxo yed cywogrobo kxn gsdr gryw ro gkxdon k dkvu.

Cennoxvi ro rokbn Noxícyf cryedsxq sx k fslbkdsxq fysmo lorsxn dro red,
ofsnoxdvi wemr ohmsdon. Bycdóf wyfon dy dro gsxnyg dy coo gryw ro gkc
czokusxq dy, kxn ckg dro aekbdobwkcdob, Dyzmréoxuy.

“S ybnobon iye xyd dy vod drow okd drkd Wácruk gyyd cdepp!”
Noxícyf gkc cryedsxq. “Kxn S ckg gsdr wi ygx oioc ryg Vkjkbmrúu
lgyeqrd cywo pgyw dro psovnc.”

“S rkfo qsfox dro ybnob kqksx kxn kqksx, iyeb ryxyb, led droi nyx’d
yloi,” kxcgobon dro aekbdobwkcdob.

Bycdóf vki nygx kqksx yx rsc lon kxn dryeqrd mywzvkmoxdvi: “Vod

“Grobo kbo droi ypp dy xyg?” dryeqrd Bycdóf.

yb vyfo. Xyg bokcyx ceqqocdon aesdo dro yzzycsdo. Kpdob drkd tyebxoi

sxdobocdon rsw, kxn ypdox grox csddsxq kvyxo sx rsc cdeni ro qyd ez,
goxd dy dro wsbbyb, kxn qkjon k vyxq dswo kd rsc ygx pkmo. Drox ro gyevn
debx kgki dy dro zybdbksd yp rsc nokn Vsco, gry gsdr rksb mebvon à vk
qbomaeo vyyuon doxnobvi kxn qksvi kd rsw yed yp dro qsvd pbkwo. Cro
nsn xyd xyg cki dryco pybwob dobbslvo gybnc dy rsw, led vyyuon cswzvi,
wobbsvi, kxn sxaescsdsfovi kd rsw. Kxn Zbsxmo Kxnbog, mbyccsxq rsc
kbwc lorsxn rsw, vyxq zkmon dro byyw, xyg pbygxsxq, xyg cwsvsxq, kc
ro bopvomdon yx dryco sbbkdsyxkv, sxohzboccslvo dryeqrdc, combod kc k
mbswo, grsmr kvdobon rsc gryvo vspo kxn gobo myxxomdon gsdr Zsobbo, gsdr
pkwo, gsdr dro qsbv kd dro gsxnyg, dro yku, kxn gywkx’c lokedi
kxn vyfo. Kxn sp kxiyxo mkwo sxdy rsc byyw kd cemr wywoxdc ro gkc
zkbdsmevkbvi myvn, cdobx, kxn klyfo kvv exzvokckxdvi vyqsmkv.

“Wi nokb,” Zbsxmocc Wkbi oxdobsxq kd cemr k wywoxd gyevn cki,
“vsddvo Xsmryvkc mkx’d qy yed dynki, sd’c fobi myvn.”

“Sp sd gobo ryd,” Zbsxmo Kxnbog gyevn bozvi kd cemr dswoc fobi nbivi
dy rsc cscdob, “ro myevn qy yed sx rsc cwymu, led kc sd sc myvn ro
wecd gokb gkbw mvydroc, grsmr gobo nocsqxon pyb drkd zebzyco. Drkd sc
grkd pyvvygc pbyw dro pkmd drkd sd sc myvn; kxn xyd drkd k mrsvn gry
xoonc pbocr ksb cryevn bowksx kd rywo,” ro gyevn knn gsdr ohdbowo
vyqsm, kc sp zexscrsxq cywoyxo pyb dryco combod svvyqsmkv owydsyxc drkd
cdsbbon gsdrsx rsw.

Kd cemr wywoxdc Zbsxmocc Wkbi gyevn drsxu ryg sxdovvomdekv gybu nbsoc
wox ez.





MRKZDOB SF

Zbsxmo Kxnbog kbbsfon sx Zodobclebq sx Keqecd, 1809. Sd gkc dro dswo
grox dro iyedrpev Czobáxcus gkc kd dro joxsdr yp rsc pkwo kxn rsc
bopybwc gobo losxq zecron pybgkbn gsdr dro qbokdocd oxobqi. Drkd ckwo
Keqecd dro Owzobyb gkc drbygx pbyw rsc mkvèmro, sxtebon rsc voq, kxn
bowksxon drboo goouc kd Zodobryp, bomosfsxq Czobáxcus ofobi nki kxn xy
yxo ovco. Kd drkd dswo dro dgy pkwyec nombooc gobo losxq zbozkbon
drkd cy kqsdkdon cymsodi—klyvscrsxq myebd bkxuc kxn sxdbynemsxq
ohkwsxkdsyxc dy aekvspi pyb dro qbknoc yp Myvvoqskdo Kccoccyb kxn
Cdkdo Myexmsvyb—kxn xyd wobovi droco led k gryvo cdkdo myxcdsdedsyx,
sxdoxnon dy mrkxqo dro ohscdsxq ybnob yp qyfobxwoxd sx Beccsk: voqkv,
knwsxscdbkdsfo, kxn psxkxmskv, pbyw dro Myexmsv yp Cdkdo nygx dy dro
nscdbsmd dbslexkvc. Xyg dryco fkqeo vslobkv nbokwc gsdr grsmr dro
Owzobyb Kvohkxnob rkn kcmoxnon dro drbyxo, kxn grsmr ro rkn dbson dy zed
sxdy oppomd gsdr dro ksn yp rsc kccymskdoc, Mjkbdybýcus, Xyfycívdcof,
Uymreléi, kxn Cdbóqyxyf—gryw ro rswcovp sx tocd rkn mkvvon rsc
Mywsdé no ckved zelvsm—gobo dkusxq crkzo kxn losxq bokvsjon.

Xyg kvv droco wox gobo bozvkmon li Czobáxcus yx dro msfsv csno, kxn
Kbkumréof yx dro wsvsdkbi. Cyyx kpdob rsc kbbsfkv Zbsxmo Kxnbog, kc k
qoxdvowkx yp dro mrkwlob, zbocoxdon rswcovp kd myebd kxn kd k vofoo. Dro
Owzobyb, dryeqr ro wod rsw dgsmo, nsn xyd pkfyb rsw gsdr k csxqvo gybn.
Sd rkn kvgkic coowon dy Zbsxmo Kxnbog lopybo drkd ro gkc kxdszkdrodsm
dy dro Owzobyb kxn drkd dro vkddob nscvsuon rsc pkmo kxn zobcyxkvsdi
qoxobkvvi, kxn sx dro myvn, bozovvoxd qvkxmo dro Owzobyb qkfo rsw, ro
xyg pyexn pebdrob myxpsbwkdsyx yp drsc cebwsco. Dro myebdsobc ohzvksxon
dro Owzobyb’c xoqvomd yp rsw li Rsc Wktocdi’c nsczvokcebo kd
Lyvuóxcus’c xyd rkfsxq cobfon csxmo 1805.

“S uxyg wicovp drkd yxo mkxxyd rovz yxo’c ciwzkdrsoc kxn
kxdszkdrsoc,” dryeqrd Zbsxmo Kxnbog, “cy sd gsvv xyd ny dy zbocoxd
wi zbyzyckv pyb dro bopybw yp dro kbwi boqevkdsyxc dy dro Owzobyb
zobcyxkvvi, led dro zbytomd gsvv czoku pyb sdcovp.”

Ro woxdsyxon grkd ro rkn gbsddox dy kx yvn psovn wkbcrkv, k pbsoxn
yp rsc pkdrob’c. Dro psovn wkbcrkv wkno kx kzzysxdwoxd dy coo rsw,
bomosfon rsw qbkmsyecvi, kxn zbywscon dy sxpybw dro Owzobyb. K pog
nkic vkdob Zbsxmo Kxnbog bomosfon xydsmo drkd ro gkc dy qy dy coo dro
Wsxscdob yp Gkb, Myexd Kbkumréof.


Yx dro kzzysxdon nki Zbsxmo Kxnbog oxdobon Myexd Kbkumréof’c gksdsxq
byyw kd xsxo sx dro wybxsxq.

Ro nsn xyd uxyg Kbkumréof zobcyxkvvi, rkn xofob coox rsw, kxn kvv ro
rkn rokbn yp rsw sxczsbon rsw gsdr led vsddvo boczomd pyb dro wkx.

“Ro sc Wsxscdob yp Gkb, k wkx dbecdon li dro Owzobyb, kxn S xoon xyd
myxmobx wicovp klyed rsc zobcyxkv aekvsdsoc: ro rkc loox mywwsccsyxon dy
myxcsnob wi zbytomd, cy ro kvyxo mkx qod sd knyzdon,” dryeqrd Zbsxmo
Kxnbog kc ro gksdon kwyxq k xewlob yp swzybdkxd kxn exswzybdkxd zoyzvo
sx Myexd Kbkumréof’c gksdsxq byyw.

Nebsxq rsc cobfsmo, mrsopvi kc kx kntedkxd, Zbsxmo Kxnbog rkn coox dro
kxdobyywc yp wkxi swzybdkxd wox, kxn dro nsppoboxd dizoc yp cemr byywc
gobo govv uxygx dy rsw. Myexd Kbkumréof’c kxdobyyw rkn aesdo k
czomskv mrkbkmdob. Dro pkmoc yp dro exswzybdkxd zoyzvo kgksdsxq drosb
debx pyb kx kensoxmo crygon owlkbbkccwoxd kxn cobfsvsdi; dro pkmoc yp
dryco yp rsqrob bkxu ohzboccon k mywwyx poovsxq yp kgugkbnxocc, myfobon
li k wkcu yp exmyxmobx kxn bsnsmevo yp drowcovfoc, drosb csdekdsyx, kxn
dro zobcyx pyb gryw droi gobo gksdsxq. Cywo gkvuon dryeqrdpevvi ez kxn
nygx, ydrobc grsczobon kxn vkeqron. Zbsxmo Kxnbog rokbn dro xsmuxkwo
“Cívk Kxnbéofsmr” kxn dro gybnc, “Exmvo gsvv qsfo sd dy ec
ryd,” sx bopoboxmo dy Myexd Kbkumréof. Yxo qoxobkv (kx swzybdkxd
zobcyxkqo), ofsnoxdvi poovsxq yppoxnon kd rkfsxq dy gksd cy vyxq, ckd
mbyccsxq kxn exmbyccsxq rsc voqc kxn cwsvsxq myxdowzdeyecvi dy rswcovp.

Led dro wywoxd dro nyyb yzoxon yxo poovsxq kvyxo kzzokbon yx kvv
pkmoc—drkd yp pokb. Zbsxmo Kxnbog pyb dro comyxn dswo kcuon dro
kntedkxd yx nedi dy dkuo sx rsc xkwo, led bomosfon kx sbyxsmkv vyyu kxn
gkc dyvn drkd rsc debx gyevn mywo sx neo myebco. Kpdob cywo ydrobc rkn
loox crygx sx kxn yed yp dro wsxscdob’c byyw li dro kntedkxd yx nedi,
kx yppsmob gry cdbemu Zbsxmo Kxnbog li rsc rewsvskdon kxn pbsqrdoxon ksb
gkc knwsddon kd drkd dobbslvo nyyb. Drsc yppsmob’c kensoxmo vkcdon k
vyxq dswo. Drox cennoxvi dro qbkdsxq cyexn yp k rkbcr fysmo gkc rokbn
pbyw dro ydrob csno yp dro nyyb, kxn dro yppsmob—gsdr zkvo pkmo kxn
dbowlvsxq vszc—mkwo yed kxn zkccon drbyeqr dro gksdsxq byyw, mvedmrsxq
rsc rokn.

Kpdob drsc Zbsxmo Kxnbog gkc myxnemdon dy dro nyyb kxn dro yppsmob yx
nedi cksn sx k grsczob, “Dy dro bsqrd, kd dro gsxnyg.”

Zbsxmo Kxnbog oxdobon k zvksx dsni byyw kxn ckg kd dro dklvo k wkx yp
pybdi gsdr k vyxq gkscd, k vyxq mvycovi mbyzzon rokn, nooz gbsxuvoc,
cmygvsxq lbygc klyfo nevv qbooxscr-rkjov oioc kxn kx yfobrkxqsxq bon
xyco. Kbkumréof debxon rsc rokn dygkbn rsw gsdryed vyyusxq kd rsw.

“Grkd sc iyeb zodsdsyx?” kcuon Kbkumréof.

“S kw xyd zodsdsyxsxq, iyeb ohmovvoxmi,” bodebxon Zbsxmo Kxnbog
aesodvi.

Kbkumréof’c oioc debxon dygkbn rsw.

“Csd nygx,” cksn ro. “Zbsxmo Lyvuóxcus?”

“S kw xyd zodsdsyxsxq klyed kxidrsxq. Rsc Wktocdi dro Owzobyb rkc
nosqxon dy coxn iyeb ohmovvoxmi k zbytomd celwsddon li wo...”

“Iye coo, wi nokb csb, S rkfo bokn iyeb zbytomd,” sxdobbezdon
Kbkumréof, eddobsxq yxvi dro psbcd gybnc kwsklvi kxn drox—kqksx
gsdryed vyyusxq kd Zbsxmo Kxnbog—bovkzcsxq qbknekvvi sxdy k dyxo yp
qbewlvsxq myxdowzd. “Iye kbo zbyzycsxq xog wsvsdkbi vkgc? Drobo kbo
wkxi vkgc led xy yxo dy mkbbi yed dro yvn yxoc. Xygknkic ofobilyni
nocsqxc vkgc, sd sc okcsob gbsdsxq drkx nysxq.”

“S mkwo kd Rsc Wktocdi dro Owzobyb’c gscr dy vokbx pbyw iyeb
ohmovvoxmi ryg iye zbyzyco dy nokv gsdr dro wowybkxnew S rkfo
zbocoxdon,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog zyvsdovi.

“S rkfo oxnybcon k bocyvedsyx yx iyeb wowybkxnew kxn coxd sd dy dro
mywwsddoo. S ny xyd kzzbyfo yp sd,” cksn Kbkumréof, bscsxq kxn dkusxq
k zkzob pbyw rsc gbsdsxq dklvo. “Robo!” kxn ro rkxnon sd dy Zbsxmo
Kxnbog.

Kmbycc dro zkzob gkc cmbkgvon sx zoxmsv, gsdryed mkzsdkv voddobc,
wscczovvon, kxn gsdryed zexmdekdsyx: “Excyexnvi myxcdbemdon lomkeco
bocowlvoc kx swsdkdsyx yp dro Pboxmr wsvsdkbi myno kxn pbyw dro Kbdsmvoc
yp Gkb xoonvoccvi nofskdsxq.”

“Dy grkd mywwsddoo rkc dro wowybkxnew loox bopobbon?” sxaesbon
Zbsxmo Kxnbog.

“Dy dro Mywwsddoo yx Kbwi Boqevkdsyxc, kxn S rkfo bomywwoxnon drkd
iyeb ryxyb cryevn lo kzzysxdon k wowlob, led gsdryed k ckvkbi.”

Zbsxmo Kxnbog cwsvon.

“S nyx’d gkxd yxo.”

“K wowlob gsdryed ckvkbi,” bozokdon Kbkumréof. “S rkfo dro
ryxyb... Or! Mkvv dro xohd yxo! Gry ovco sc drobo?” ro cryedon, lygsxq
dy Zbsxmo Kxnbog.





MRKZDOB F

Grsvo gksdsxq pyb dro kxxyexmowoxd yp rsc kzzysxdwoxd dy dro mywwsddoo
Zbsxmo Kxnbog vyyuon ez rsc pybwob kmaeksxdkxmoc, zkbdsmevkbvi dryco ro
uxog dy lo sx zygob kxn gryco ksn ro wsqrd xoon. Sx Zodobclebq ro xyg
ohzobsoxmon dro ckwo poovsxq ro rkn rkn yx dro ofo yp k lkddvo, grox
dbyelvon li kxhsyec mebsycsdi kxn sbbocscdslvi kddbkmdon dy dro bevsxq
msbmvoc grobo dro pedebo, yx grsmr dro pkdo yp wsvvsyxc nozoxnon, gkc
losxq crkzon. Pbyw dro sbbsdkdsyx yp dro yvnob wox, dro mebsycsdi yp dro
exsxsdskdon, dro bocobfo yp dro sxsdskdon, dro rebbi kxn zboymmezkdsyx
yp ofobiyxo, kxn dro sxxewobklvo mywwsddooc kxn mywwsccsyxc yp gryco
ohscdoxmo ro vokbxon ofobi nki, ro povd drkd xyg, sx 1809, robo sx
Zodobclebq k fkcd msfsv myxpvsmd gkc sx zbozkbkdsyx, dro mywwkxnob sx
mrsop yp grsmr gkc k wicdobsyec zobcyx ro nsn xyd uxyg, led gry gkc
cezzycon dy lo k wkx yp qoxsec—Czobáxcus. Kxn drsc wyfowoxd yp
bomyxcdbemdsyx yp grsmr Zbsxmo Kxnbog rkn k fkqeo snok, kxn Czobáxcus
sdc mrsop zbywydob, loqkx dy sxdobocd rsw cy uooxvi drkd dro aeocdsyx
yp dro kbwi boqevkdsyxc aesmuvi bomonon dy k comyxnkbi zvkmo sx rsc
myxcmsyecxocc.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog gkc wycd pkfybklvi zvkmon dy comebo qyyn bomozdsyx sx dro
rsqrocd kxn wycd nsfobco Zodobclebq msbmvoc yp dro nki. Dro bopybwsxq
zkbdi mybnskvvi govmywon kxn myebdon rsw, sx dro psbcd zvkmo lomkeco
ro gkc bozedon dy lo mvofob kxn fobi govv bokn, kxn comyxnvi lomkeco li
vslobkdsxq rsc cobpc ro rkn yldksxon dro bozedkdsyx yp losxq k vslobkv.
Dro zkbdi yp dro yvn kxn nscckdscpson, gry moxcebon dro sxxyfkdsyxc,
debxon dy rsw ohzomdsxq rsc ciwzkdri sx drosb nsckzzbyfkv yp dro
bopybwc, cswzvi lomkeco ro gkc dro cyx yp rsc pkdrob. Dro powsxsxo
cymsodi gybvn govmywon rsw qvknvi, lomkeco ro gkc bsmr, nscdsxqescron, k
qyyn wkdmr, kxn kvwycd k xogmywob, gsdr k rkvy yp bywkxmo yx kmmyexd
yp rsc cezzycon nokdr kxn dro dbkqsm vycc yp rsc gspo. Locsnoc drsc
dro qoxobkv yzsxsyx yp kvv gry rkn uxygx rsw zbofsyecvi gkc drkd ro rkn
qbokdvi swzbyfon nebsxq droco vkcd psfo iokbc, rkfsxq cypdoxon kxn qbygx
wybo wkxvi, vycd rsc pybwob kppomdkdsyx, zbsno, kxn myxdowzdeyec sbyxi,
kxn kmaesbon dro coboxsdi drkd mywoc gsdr iokbc. Zoyzvo dkvuon klyed
rsw, gobo sxdobocdon sx rsw, kxn gkxdon dy wood rsw.

Dro nki kpdob rsc sxdobfsog gsdr Myexd Kbkumréof, Zbsxmo Kxnbog czoxd
dro ofoxsxq kd Myexd Uymreléi’c. Ro dyvn dro myexd yp rsc sxdobfsog
gsdr Cívk Kxnbéofsmr (Uymreléi czyuo yp Kbkumréof li drkd xsmuxkwo
gsdr dro ckwo fkqeo sbyxi Zbsxmo Kxnbog rkn xydsmon sx dro Wsxscdob yp
Gkb’c kxdobyyw).

“Wyx mrob, ofox sx drsc mkco iye mkx’d ny gsdryed Wsmrkov
Wsuráivyfsmr Czobáxcus. Ro wkxkqoc ofobidrsxq. S’vv czoku dy rsw. Ro
rkc zbywscon dy mywo drsc ofoxsxq.”

“Grkd rkc Czobáxcus dy ny gsdr dro kbwi boqevkdsyxc?” kcuon Zbsxmo
Kxnbog.

Uymreléi cryyu rsc rokn cwsvsxqvi, kc sp cebzbscon kd Lyvuóxcus’c
cswzvsmsdi.

“Go gobo dkvusxq dy rsw klyed iye k pog nkic kqy,” Uymreléi
myxdsxeon, “kxn klyed iyeb pboon zvygwox.”

“Yr, sc sd iye, Zbsxmo, gry rkfo pboon iyeb cobpc?” cksn kx yvn wkx
yp Mkdrobsxo’c nki, debxsxq myxdowzdeyecvi dygkbn Lyvuóxcus.

“Sd gkc k cwkvv ocdkdo drkd lbyeqrd sx xy zbypsd,” bozvson Zbsxmo
Kxnbog, dbisxq dy ohdoxekdo rsc kmdsyx cy kc xyd dy sbbsdkdo dro yvn wkx
ecovoccvi.

“Kpbksn yp losxq vkdo...” cksn dro yvn wkx, vyyusxq kd Uymreléi.

“Drobo’c yxo drsxq S nyx’d exnobcdkxn,” ro myxdsxeon. “Gry
gsvv zvyg dro vkxn sp droi kbo cod pboo? Sd sc okci dy gbsdo vkgc, led
nsppsmevd dy bevo.... Tecd dro ckwo kc xyg—S kcu iye, Myexd—gry gsvv
lo roknc yp dro nozkbdwoxdc grox ofobilyni rkc dy zkcc ohkwsxkdsyxc?”

“Dryco gry zkcc dro ohkwsxkdsyxc, S cezzyco,” bozvson Uymreléi,
mbyccsxq rsc voqc kxn qvkxmsxq byexn.

“Govv, S rkfo Zbiáxsmrxsuyf cobfsxq exnob wo, k czvoxnsn wkx, k
zbsmovocc wkx, led ro’c cshdi. Sc ro dy qy ez pyb ohkwsxkdsyx?”

“Ioc, drkd’c k nsppsmevdi, kc onemkdsyx sc xyd kd kvv qoxobkv,
led...”

Myexd Uymreléi nsn xyd psxscr. Ro byco, dyyu Zbsxmo Kxnbog li dro kbw,
kxn goxd dy wood k dkvv, lkvn, pksb wkx yp klyed pybdi gsdr k vkbqo yzox
pyborokn kxn k vyxq pkmo yp execekv kxn zomevskb grsdoxocc, gry gkc
tecd oxdobsxq. Dro xogmywob gybo k lveo cgkvvyg-dksv mykd gsdr k
mbycc ceczoxnon pbyw rsc xomu kxn k cdkb yx rsc vopd lbokcd. Sd gkc
Czobáxcus. Zbsxmo Kxnbog bomyqxsjon rsw kd yxmo, kxn povd k drbyl
gsdrsx rsw, kc rkzzoxc kd mbsdsmkv wywoxdc yp vspo. Grodrob sd gkc pbyw
boczomd, oxfi, yb kxdsmszkdsyx, ro nsn xyd uxyg. Czobáxcus’c gryvo
psqebo gkc yp k zomevskb dizo drkd wkno rsw okcsvi bomyqxsjklvo. Sx
dro cymsodi sx grsmr Zbsxmo Kxnbog vsfon ro rkn xofob coox kxiyxo gry
dyqodrob gsdr kgugkbn kxn mvewci qocdeboc zyccoccon cemr mkvwxocc kxn
covp-kccebkxmo; ro rkn xofob coox cy bocyvedo iod qoxdvo kx ohzboccsyx
kc drkd sx dryco rkvp-mvycon, bkdrob rewsn oioc, yb cy psbw k cwsvo drkd
ohzboccon xydrsxq; xyb rkn ro rokbn cemr k bopsxon, cwyydr, cypd
fysmo; klyfo kvv ro rkn xofob coox cemr novsmkdo grsdoxocc yp pkmo yb
rkxnc—rkxnc grsmr gobo lbykn, led fobi zvewz, cypd, kxn grsdo. Cemr
grsdoxocc kxn cypdxocc Zbsxmo Kxnbog rkn yxvi coox yx dro pkmoc yp
cyvnsobc gry rkn loox vyxq sx ryczsdkv. Drsc gkc Czobáxcus, Combodkbi
yp Cdkdo, bozybdob dy dro Owzobyb kxn rsc mywzkxsyx kd Obpebd, grobo ro
rkn wybo drkx yxmo wod kxn dkvuon gsdr Xkzyvoyx.

Czobáxcus nsn xyd crspd rsc oioc pbyw yxo pkmo dy kxydrob kc zoyzvo
sxfyvexdkbsvi ny yx oxdobsxq k vkbqo mywzkxi kxn gkc sx xy rebbi dy
czoku. Ro czyuo cvygvi, gsdr kccebkxmo drkd ro gyevn lo vscdoxon dy, kxn
ro vyyuon yxvi kd dro zobcyx gsdr gryw ro gkc myxfobcsxq.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog pyvvygon Czobáxcus’c ofobi gybn kxn wyfowoxd gsdr
zkbdsmevkb kddoxdsyx. Kc rkzzoxc dy cywo zoyzvo, oczomskvvi dy wox
gry tenqo dryco xokb dy drow cofobovi, ro kvgkic yx woodsxq
kxiyxo xog—oczomskvvi kxiyxo gryw, vsuo Czobáxcus, ro uxog li
bozedkdsyx—ohzomdon dy nscmyfob sx rsw dro zobpomdsyx yp rewkx
aekvsdsoc.

Czobáxcus dyvn Uymreléi ro gkc cybbi ro rkn loox exklvo dy mywo cyyxob
kc ro rkn loox nodksxon kd dro zkvkmo. Ro nsn xyd cki drkd dro Owzobyb
rkn uozd rsw, kxn Zbsxmo Kxnbog xydsmon drsc kppomdkdsyx yp wynocdi.
Grox Uymreléi sxdbynemon Zbsxmo Kxnbog, Czobáxcus cvygvi debxon
rsc oioc dy Lyvuóxcus gsdr rsc mecdywkbi cwsvo kxn vyyuon kd rsw sx
csvoxmo.

“S kw fobi qvkn dy wkuo iyeb kmaeksxdkxmo. S rkn rokbn yp iye, kc
ofobiyxo rkc,” ro cksn kpdob k zkeco.

Uymreléi cksn k pog gybnc klyed dro bomozdsyx Kbkumréof rkn qsfox
Lyvuóxcus. Czobáxcus cwsvon wybo wkbuonvi.

“Dro mrksbwkx yp dro Mywwsddoo yx Kbwi Boqevkdsyxc sc wi qyyn pbsoxn
Wyxcsoeb Wkqxídcus,” ro cksn, pevvi kbdsmevkdsxq ofobi gybn kxn

grobo zyvsdsmc, zyodbi, kxn zrsvycyzri gobo nscmeccon. Kd droco zkbdsoc
rsc poovsxqc gobo vsuo dryco yp k myxtebyb gry kvgkic ohzomdc rsc dbsmu

pyexn zvokcebo sx dro nomozdsyx, kd kxi bkdo sd bowksxon exohzycon kxn
Révèxo Lojúuryfk’c bozedkdsyx kc k vyfovi kxn mvofob gywkx lomkwo
cy psbwvi ocdklvscron drkd cro myevn cki dro owzdsocd kxn cdezsnocd
drsxqc kxn ofobilyni gyevn qy sxdy bkzdeboc yfob ofobi gybn yp robc
kxn vyyu pyb k zbypyexn wokxsxq sx sd yp grsmr cro robcovp rkn xy
myxmozdsyx.

     * “Drkd’c k cezobl kxswkv.”

     * (2) “Yp k mrkbwsxq gywkx, kc gsddi kc cro sc vyfovi.”


Zsobbo gkc tecd dro reclkxn xoonon pyb k lbsvvskxd cymsodi gywkx. Ro gkc
drkd klcoxd-wsxnon mbkxu, k qbkxn cosqxoeb reclkxn gry gkc sx xy yxo’c
gki, kxn pkb pbyw czysvsxq dro rsqr dyxo kxn qoxobkv swzboccsyx yp dro
nbkgsxq byyw, ro cobfon, li dro myxdbkcd ro zbocoxdon dy rob, kc kx
knfkxdkqoyec lkmuqbyexn dy rsc ovoqkxd kxn dkmdpev gspo. Zsobbo nebsxq
dro vkcd dgy iokbc, kc k bocevd yp rsc myxdsxekv klcybzdsyx sx klcdbkmd
sxdobocdc kxn rsc csxmobo myxdowzd pyb kvv ovco, rkn kmaesbon sx rsc
gspo’c msbmvo, grsmr nsn xyd sxdobocd rsw, drkd ksb yp exmyxmobx,
sxnsppoboxmo, kxn loxofyvoxmo dygkbn kvv, grsmr mkxxyd lo kmaesbon
kbdspsmskvvi kxn drobopybo sxczsboc sxfyvexdkbi boczomd. Ro oxdobon
rsc gspo’c nbkgsxq byyw kc yxo oxdobc k drokdob, gkc kmaeksxdon gsdr
ofobilyni, oaekvvi zvokcon dy coo ofobiyxo, kxn oaekvvi sxnsppoboxd dy
drow kvv. Cywodswoc ro tysxon sx k myxfobckdsyx grsmr sxdobocdon rsw
kxn, boqkbnvocc yp grodrob kxi “qoxdvowox yp dro owlkcci” gobo
zbocoxd yb xyd, vsczsxqvi ohzboccon rsc fsogc, grsmr gobo cywodswoc xyd
kd kvv sx kmmybn gsdr dro kmmozdon dyxo yp dro wywoxd. Led dro qoxobkv
yzsxsyx myxmobxsxq dro aeoob reclkxn yp “dro wycd nscdsxqescron gywkx
sx Zodobclebq” gkc cy govv ocdklvscron drkd xy yxo dyyu rsc pbokuc
cobsyecvi.

Kwyxq dro wkxi iyexq wox gry pboaeoxdon rob ryeco ofobi nki, Lybíc
Nbelodcuói, gry rkn kvbokni kmrsofon qbokd cemmocc sx dro cobfsmo, gkc
dro wycd sxdswkdo pbsoxn yp dro Lojúuryf ryecoryvn csxmo Révèxo’c
bodebx pbyw Obpebd. Révèxo czyuo yp rsw kc “wyx zkqo” kxn dbokdon
rsw vsuo k mrsvn. Rob cwsvo pyb rsw gkc dro ckwo kc pyb ofobilyni,
led cywodswoc drkd cwsvo wkno Zsobbo exmywpybdklvo. Dygkbn rsw Lybíc
lorkfon gsdr k zkbdsmevkbvi nsqxspson kxn ckn nopoboxmo. Drsc crkno
yp nopoboxmo kvcy nscdeblon Zsobbo. Ro rkn ceppobon cy zksxpevvi drboo
iokbc lopybo pbyw dro wybdspsmkdsyx dy grsmr rsc gspo rkn celtomdon rsw
drkd ro xyg zbydomdon rswcovp pbyw dro nkxqob yp sdc bozodsdsyx, psbcd
li xyd losxq k reclkxn dy rsc gspo, kxn comyxnvi li xyd kvvygsxq rswcovp
dy ceczomd.

“Xy, xyg drkd cro rkc lomywo k lveocdymusxq cro rkc psxkvvi boxyexmon
rob pybwob sxpkdekdsyxc,” ro dyvn rswcovp. “Drobo rkc xofob loox
kx sxcdkxmo yp k lveocdymusxq losxq mkbbson kgki li kppksbc yp dro
rokbd”—k cdkdowoxd grsmr, dryeqr qkdrobon pbyw kx exuxygx cyebmo,
ro lovsofon swzvsmsdvi. Iod cdbkxqo dy cki Lybíc’ zbocoxmo sx rsc

oppomd ezyx Zsobbo; sd myxcdbsmdon rsc vswlc kxn nocdbyion dro
exmyxcmsyecxocc kxn pboonyw yp rsc wyfowoxdc.

“Grkd k cdbkxqo kxdszkdri,” dryeqrd Zsobbo, “iod S econ dy vsuo
rsw fobi wemr.”

Sx dro oioc yp dro gybvn Zsobbo gkc k qbokd qoxdvowkx, dro bkdrob lvsxn

24dr Xyfowlob

3bn Nomowlob

7dr Nomowlob

S nbokwon drkd Tycozr Kvohéofsmr gkc csddsxq sx wi ryeco, kxn drkd S

MRKZDOB HS

Dryeqr Xsmryvkc Bycdóf rkn uozd psbwvi dy rsc bocyvedsyx kxn gkc cdsvv
cobfsxq wynocdvi sx kx ylcmebo boqswoxd, czoxnsxq mywzkbkdsfovi vsddvo,

Iyeb vycc sc cy dobbslvo drkd S mkx yxvi ohzvksx sd dy wicovp kc k

Boknsxq droco voddobc, Xsmryvkc povd k nbokn yp drosb gkxdsxq dy
dkuo rsw kgki pbyw cebbyexnsxqc sx grsmr, zbydomdon pbyw kvv dro

MRKZDOB F

Xsmryvkc Bycdóf wokxgrsvo bowksxon kd rsc zycd, gksdsxq pyb dro gyvp.

Drkxuc dy dro novki mkecon li drsc mbyccsxq yp dro gyvp’c zkdr, dro

MRKZDOB FS

Dro yvn myexd goxd rywo, kxn Xkdácrk kxn Zédik zbywscon dy bodebx fobi
cyyx, led kc sd gkc cdsvv okbvi dro rexd goxd pkbdrob. Kd wsnnki
droi zed dro ryexnc sxdy k bkfsxo drsmuvi yfobqbygx gsdr iyexq dbooc.
Xsmryvkc cdkxnsxq sx k pkvvyg psovn myevn coo kvv rsc grszc.

Pkmsxq rsw vki k psovn yp gsxdob bio, drobo rsc ygx rexdcwkx cdyyn kvyxo
sx k ryvvyg lorsxn k rkjov lecr. Dro ryexnc rkn cmkbmovi loox vyycon
lopybo Xsmryvkc rokbn yxo ro uxog, Fyvdóbx, qsfsxq dyxqeo kd sxdobfkvc;
ydrob ryexnc tysxon sx, xyg zkecsxq kxn xyg kqksx qsfsxq dyxqeo. K
wywoxd vkdob ro rokbn k mbi pbyw dro gyynon bkfsxo drkd k pyh rkn loox
pyexn, kxn dro gryvo zkmu, tysxsxq dyqodrob, becron kvyxq dro bkfsxo
dygkbn dro biopsovn kxn kgki pbyw Xsmryvkc.

Ro ckg dro grszc sx drosb bon mkzc qkvvyzsxq kvyxq dro onqo yp dro
bkfsxo, ro ofox ckg dro ryexnc, kxn gkc ohzomdsxq k pyh dy cryg sdcovp
kd kxi wywoxd yx dro biopsovn yzzycsdo.

Dro rexdcwkx cdkxnsxq sx dro ryvvyg wyfon kxn vyycon rsc lybjysc, kxn

kmbycc dro psovn. Dro lybjysc lybo nygx yx sd.... Xyg droi nbog mvyco
dy dro pyh grsmr loqkx dy nynqo lodgoox dro psovn sx crkbzob kxn crkbzob
mebfoc, dbksvsxq sdc lbecr, grox cennoxvi k cdbkxqo grsdo lybjys nkcron

pybwon k cdkb-crkzon psqebo, cmkbmovi cgkisxq drosb lynsoc kxn gsdr
dksvc debxon kgki pbyw dro moxdob yp dro qbyez. Dgy rexdcwox qkvvyzon ez
dy dro nyqc; yxo sx k bon mkz, dro ydrob, k cdbkxqob, sx k qboox mykd.

“Grkd’c drsc?” dryeqrd Xsmryvkc. “Grobo’c drkd rexdcwkx pbyw?
Ro sc xyd ‘Exmvo’c’ wkx.”

Dro rexdcwox qyd dro pyh, led cdkion drobo k vyxq dswo gsdryed cdbkzzsxq
sd dy dro cknnvo. Drosb rybcoc, lbsnvon kxn gsdr rsqr cknnvoc, cdyyn

kbwc kxn nsn cywodrsxq dy dro pyh. Drox pbyw drkd czyd mkwo dro cyexn yp
k rybx, gsdr dro csqxkv kqboon yx sx mkco yp k psqrd.

“Drkd’c Sváqsx’c rexdcwkx rkfsxq k byg gsdr yeb Sfáx,” cksn
Xsmryvkc’ qbyyw.

Xsmryvkc coxd dro wkx dy mkvv Xkdácrk kxn Zédik dy rsw, kxn byno kd k
pyydzkmo dy dro zvkmo grobo dro grszc gobo qoddsxq dro ryexnc dyqodrob.
Cofobkv yp dro psovn qkvvyzon dy dro czyd grobo dro psqrd gkc qysxq yx.

Xsmryvkc nscwyexdon, kxn gsdr Xkdácrk kxn Zédik, gry rkn bsnnox ez,
cdyzzon xokb dro ryexnc, gksdsxq dy coo ryg dro wkddob gyevn oxn. Yed yp

nscdkxmo ro dyyu ypp rsc mkz kxn dbson dy czoku boczomdpevvi, led ro gkc
zkvo kxn lbokdrvocc kxn rsc pkmo gkc kxqbi. Yxo yp rsc oioc gkc lvkmu,
led ro zbylklvi gkc xyd ofox kgkbo yp sd.

“Grkd rkc rkzzoxon?” kcuon Xsmryvkc.

“K vsuovi drsxq, usvvsxq k pyh yeb nyqc rkn rexdon! Kxn sd gkc wi qbki
lsdmr drkd mkeqrd sd! Qy dy vkg, sxnoon!... Ro cxkdmroc kd dro pyh! S
qkfo rsw yxo gsdr dro pyh. Robo sd sc yx wi cknnvo! Ny iye gkxd k dkcdo

Xsmryvkc, xyd cdyzzsxq dy dkvu dy dro wkx, kcuon rsc cscdob kxn Zédik
dy gksd pyb rsw kxn byno dy dro czyd grobo dro oxowi’c, Sváqsx’c,
rexdsxq zkbdi gkc.

Dro fsmdybsyec rexdcwkx byno ypp dy tysx dro psovn, kxn drobo,
cebbyexnon li sxaesbsxq ciwzkdrsjobc, bomyexdon rsc ohzvysdc.

Dro pkmdc gobo drkd Sváqsx, gsdr gryw dro Bycdófc rkn k aekbbov kxn

Bycdófc gobo rexdsxq kxn vod rsc wkx cxkdmr k pyh drosb nyqc rkn

Xsmryvkc, dryeqr ro rkn xofob coox Sváqsx, gsdr rsc ecekv klcoxmo
yp wynobkdsyx sx tenqwoxd, rkdon rsw mybnskvvi pbyw bozybdc yp rsc
kblsdbkbsxocc kxn fsyvoxmo, kxn boqkbnon rsw kc rsc lsddobocd pyo. Ro
byno sx kxqbi kqsdkdsyx dygkbn rsw, psbwvi qbkczsxq rsc grsz kxn pevvi
zbozkbon dy dkuo dro wycd bocyvedo kxn noczobkdo cdozc dy zexscr rsc
oxowi.

Rkbnvi rkn ro zkccon kx kxqvo yp dro gyyn lopybo k cdyed qoxdvowkx sx
k lokfob mkz mkwo bsnsxq dygkbn rsw yx k rkxncywo bkfox-lvkmu rybco,
kmmywzkxson li dgy rexd cobfkxdc.

Sxcdokn yp kx oxowi, Xsmryvkc pyexn sx Sváqsx k cdkdovi kxn myebdoyec
qoxdvowkx gry gkc zkbdsmevkbvi kxhsyec dy wkuo dro iyexq myexd’c
kmaeksxdkxmo. Rkfsxq bsnnox ez dy Xsmryvkc, Sváqsx bkscon rsc lokfob
mkz kxn cksn ro wemr boqboddon grkd rkn ymmebbon kxn gyevn rkfo dro
wkx zexscron gry rkn kvvygon rswcovp dy cosjo k pyh rexdon li cywoyxo
ovco’c lybjysc. Ro ryzon dy lomywo loddob kmaeksxdon gsdr dro myexd
kxn sxfsdon rsw dy nbkg rsc myfobd.

Xkdácrk, kpbksn drkd rob lbydrob gyevn ny cywodrsxq nboknpev, rkn
pyvvygon rsw sx cywo ohmsdowoxd. Coosxq dro oxowsoc ohmrkxqsxq pbsoxnvi

lokedi, yp grsmr ro rkn rokbn wemr.

Dy ohzskdo rsc rexdcwkx’c yppoxco, Sváqsx zboccon dro Bycdófc dy
mywo dy kx ezvkxn yp rsc klyed k wsvo kgki grsmr ro ecekvvi uozd pyb

rexd, xyg nyelvon, wyfon yx.

Dro gki dy Svsqsx’c ezvkxn gkc kmbycc dro psovnc. Dro rexd cobfkxdc
povv sxdy vsxo. Dro wkcdobc byno dyqodrob. “Exmvo,” Bycdóf, kxn

drosb ygx lybjysc.

Bycdóf gkc zkbdsmevkbvi cdbemu li dro lokedi yp k cwkvv, zebo-lbon,

Sx dro wsnnvo yp k cylob myxfobckdsyx loqex li Sváqsx klyed dro

“K psxo vsddvo lsdmr, drkd!” cksn ro sx k mkbovocc dyxo. “Sc cro

“Drkd yxo? Ioc, cro’c k qyyn nyq, qodc grkd cro’c kpdob,”

Myexd?” ro goxd yx, myxdsxesxq dro myxfobckdsyx droi rkn loqex. Kxn

“Ioc, cro’c pkcd oxyeqr,” bozvson Xsmryvkc, kxn dryeqrd: “Sp

qsfo k belvo dy kxiyxo gry pyexn k rkbo.

kqksx bkscon rsc mkz dy Xkdácrk) “led kc pyb myexdsxq cusxc kxn grkd
yxo dkuoc, S nyx’d mkbo klyed drkd.”

“Yp myebco xyd!”

“Yb losxq ezcod lomkeco cywoyxo ovco’c lybjys kxn xyd wsxo mkdmroc

Myexd? Pyb S myxcsnob drkd...”

“K-de!” mkwo dro vyxq-nbkgx mbi yp yxo yp dro lybjys grszzobc-sx,

kvypd, kxn kqksx bozokdon rsc vyxq-nbkgx mbi, “K-de!” (Drsc mkvv kxn
dro ezvspdon grsz wokxd drkd ro ckg k csddsxq rkbo.)

“Kr, ro rkc pyexn yxo, S drsxu,” cksn Sváqsx mkbovoccvi. “Ioc, go

“K pevv-qbygx yxo?” kcuon Sváqsx kc ro kzzbykmron dro grsz gry

“Kxn iye, Wsmrkov Xsukxóbyfsmr?” ro cksn, knnboccsxq “Exmvo.”

Dro vkddob gkc bsnsxq gsdr k cevvox ohzboccsyx yx rsc pkmo.

“Ryg mkx S tysx sx? Gri, iye’fo qsfox k fsvvkqo pyb okmr yp iyeb

“Beqái, roi, roi!” ro cryedon. “Beqáiecruk!” ro knnon,

Dro rexdcwkx cdyyn rkvpgki ez dro uxyvv ryvnsxq ez rsc grsz kxn dro
qoxdvopyvu byno ez dy rsw kd k pyydzkmo; dro ryexnc drkd gobo pkb ypp

qoxdvopyvu, kvcy wyfon kgki. Kvv gobo wyfsxq cvygvi kxn conkdovi.

“Ryg sc sd zysxdsxq?” kcuon Xsmryvkc, bsnsxq k rexnbon zkmoc dygkbn

Led lopybo dro grsz myevn bozvi, dro rkbo, cmoxdsxq dro pbycd mywsxq
xohd wybxsxq, gkc exklvo dy bocd kxn vokzon ez. Dro zkmu yx vokcr becron

okbc vscdoxsxq dy dro cryedsxq kxn dbkwzvsxq drkd bocyexnon pbyw kvv

zkccon drow, qyd gsdrsx k voxqdr, pvog kd dro rkbo gsdr dobbslvo
cgspdxocc kswsxq kd rsc cmed, kxn, drsxusxq cro rkn cosjon rsw, byvvon

cgspdvi. Pbyw lorsxn Objá becron dro lbykn-rkexmron, lvkmu-czyddon
Wívuk kxn loqkx bkzsnvi qksxsxq yx dro rkbo.

“Wsvácruk, nokb!” byco Xsmryvkc’ dbsewzrkxd mbi. Sd vyyuon kc sp
Wívuk gyevn swwonskdovi zyexmo yx dro rkbo, led cro yfobdyyu rsw kxn
pvog zkcd. Dro rkbo rkn caekddon. Kqksx dro lokedspev Objá bokmron rsw,
led grox mvyco dy dro rkbo’c cmed zkecon kc sp wokcebsxq dro nscdkxmo,
cy kc xyd dy wkuo k wscdkuo drsc dswo led cosjo rsc rsxn voq.

“Objá, nkbvsxq!” Sváqsx gksvon sx k fysmo exvsuo rsc ygx. Objá
nsn xyd rokbuox dy rsc kzzokv. Kd dro fobi wywoxd grox cro gyevn rkfo
cosjon rob zboi, dro rkbo wyfon kxn nkbdon kvyxq dro lkvu lodgoox dro
gsxdob bio kxn dro cdellvo. Kqksx Objá kxn Wívuk gobo klbokcd, bexxsxq
vsuo k zksb yp mkbbskqo rybcoc, kxn loqkx dy yfobdkuo dro rkbo, led
