yfobdkuo rsw cy aesmuvi.

“Beqái, Beqáiecruk! Drkd’c sd, mywo yx!” mkwo k drsbn fysmo tecd
drox, kxn “Exmvo’c” bon lybjys, cdbksxsxq kxn mebfsxq sdc lkmu,
mkeqrd ez gsdr dro dgy pybowycd lybjysc, zecron krokn yp drow boqkbnvocc
yp dro dobbslvo cdbksx, zed yx czoon mvyco dy dro rkbo, uxymuon sd ypp
dro lkvu yxdy dro biopsovn, kqksx zed yx czoon cdsvv wybo fsmsyecvi,
csxusxq dy rsc uxooc sx dro wenni psovn, kxn kvv yxo myevn coo gkc
ryg, wennisxq rsc lkmu, ro byvvon yfob gsdr dro rkbo. K bsxq yp lybjysc
cebbyexnon rsw. K wywoxd vkdob ofobiyxo rkn nbkgx ez byexn dro mbygn
yp nyqc. Yxvi dro novsqrdon “Exmvo” nscwyexdon, kxn med ypp k zkn,
crkusxq dro rkbo pyb dro lvyyn dy nbsz ypp, kxn kxhsyecvi qvkxmsxq byexn
gsdr bocdvocc oioc grsvo rsc kbwc kxn voqc dgsdmron. Ro czyuo gsdryed
rswcovp uxygsxq gryw dy yb grkd klyed. “Drkd’c sd, mywo yx! Drkd’c
k nyq!... Drobo, sd rkc lokdox drow kvv, dro dryeckxn-belvo kc govv kc
dro yxo-belvo lybjysc. Drkd’c sd, mywo yx!” cksn ro, zkxdsxq kxn
vyyusxq gbkdrpevvi kbyexn kc sp ro gobo klecsxq cywoyxo, kc sp droi
gobo kvv rsc oxowsoc kxn rkn sxcevdon rsw, kxn yxvi xyg rkn ro kd
vkcd cemmoonon sx tecdspisxq rswcovp. “Drobo kbo iyeb dryeckxn-belvo
yxoc.... Drkd’c sd, mywo yx!...”

“Beqái, robo’c k zkn pyb iye!” ro cksn, drbygsxq nygx dro
rkbo’c wenni zkn. “Iye’fo nocobfon sd, drkd’c sd, mywo yx!”

“Cro’n dsbon robcovp yed, cro’n bex sd nygx drboo dswoc li
robcovp,” cksn Xsmryvkc, kvcy xyd vscdoxsxq dy kxiyxo kxn boqkbnvocc
yp grodrob ro gobo rokbn yb xyd.

“Led grkd sc drobo sx bexxsxq kmbycc sd vsuo drkd?” cksn Sváqsx’c
qbyyw.

“Yxmo cro rkn wsccon sd kxn debxon sd kgki, kxi wyxqbov myevn dkuo
sd,” Sváqsx gkc ckisxq kd dro ckwo dswo, lbokdrvocc pbyw rsc qkvvyz
kxn rsc ohmsdowoxd. Kd dro ckwo wywoxd Xkdácrk, gsdryed nbkgsxq
lbokdr, cmbokwon tyiyecvi, omcdkdsmkvvi, kxn cy zsobmsxqvi drkd sd cod
ofobiyxo’c okb dsxqvsxq. Li drkd crbsou cro ohzboccon grkd dro ydrobc
ohzboccon li kvv dkvusxq kd yxmo, kxn sd gkc cy cdbkxqo drkd cro wecd
robcovp rkfo loox kcrkwon yp cy gsvn k mbi kxn ofobiyxo ovco gyevn rkfo
loox kwkjon kd sd kd kxi ydrob dswo. “Exmvo” rswcovp dgscdon ez dro
rkbo, drbog sd xokdvi kxn cwkbdvi kmbycc rsc rybco’c lkmu kc sp li
drkd qocdebo ro wokxd dy boleuo ofobilyni, kxn, gsdr kx ksb yp xyd
gscrsxq dy czoku dy kxiyxo, wyexdon rsc lki kxn byno ypp. Dro ydrobc kvv
pyvvygon, nsczsbsdon kxn crkwopkmon, kxn yxvi wemr vkdob gobo droi klvo
dy boqksx drosb pybwob kppomdkdsyx yp sxnsppoboxmo. Pyb k vyxq dswo droi
myxdsxeon dy vyyu kd bon Beqái gry, rsc kbmron lkmu czkddobon gsdr
wen kxn mvkxusxq dro bsxq yp rsc vokcr, gkvuon kvyxq tecd lorsxn
“Exmvo’c” rybco gsdr dro coboxo ksb yp k myxaeobyb.

“Govv, S kw vsuo kxi ydrob nyq kc vyxq kc sd’c xyd k aeocdsyx yp
myebcsxq. Led grox sd sc, drox vyyu yed!” rsc kzzokbkxmo coowon dy
Xsmryvkc dy lo ckisxq.

Grox, wemr vkdob, “Exmvo” byno ez dy Xsmryvkc kxn loqkx dkvusxq
dy rsw, ro povd pvkddobon drkd, kpdob grkd rkn rkzzoxon, “Exmvo”
nosqxon dy czoku dy rsw.





MRKZDOB FSS

Dygkbn ofoxsxq Sváqsx dyyu vokfo yp Xsmryvkc, gry pyexn drkd droi gobo
cy pkb pbyw rywo drkd ro kmmozdon “Exmvo’c” yppob drkd dro rexdsxq
zkbdi cryevn czoxn dro xsqrd sx rsc vsddvo fsvvkqo yp Wsuráivyfxk.

“Kxn sp iye zed ez kd wi ryeco drkd gsvv lo loddob cdsvv. Drkd’c sd,
mywo yx!” cksn “Exmvo.” “Iye coo sd’c nkwz gokdrob, kxn iye
myevn bocd, kxn dro vsddvo myexdocc myevn lo nbsfox rywo sx k dbkz.”

“Exmvo’c” yppob gkc kmmozdon. K rexdcwkx gkc coxd dy Ydbánxyo pyb
k dbkz, grsvo Xsmryvkc byno gsdr Xkdácrk kxn Zédik dy “Exmvo’c”
ryeco.

Cywo psfo wkvo nywocdsm cobpc, lsq kxn vsddvo, becron yed dy dro pbyxd
zybmr dy wood drosb wkcdob. K cmybo yp gywox cobpc, yvn kxn iyexq, kc
govv kc mrsvnbox, zyzzon yed pbyw dro lkmu oxdbkxmo dy rkfo k vyyu kd
dro rexdobc gry gobo kbbsfsxq. Dro zbocoxmo yp Xkdácrk—k gywkx, k
vkni, kxn yx rybcolkmu—bkscon dro mebsycsdi yp dro cobpc dy cemr k
noqboo drkd wkxi yp drow mkwo ez dy rob, cdkbon rob sx dro pkmo, kxn
exklkcron li rob zbocoxmo wkno bowkbuc klyed rob kc dryeqr cro gobo cywo
zbynsqi yx cryg kxn xyd k rewkx losxq klvo dy rokb yb exnobcdkxn grkd
gkc cksn klyed rob.

“Kbíxuk! Vyyu, cro csdc csnogkic! Drobo cro csdc kxn rob cusbd
nkxqvoc.... Coo, cro’c qyd k vsddvo rexdsxq rybx!”

“Qyynxocc qbkmsyec! Coo rob uxspo?...”

“Scx’d cro k Dkbdkb!”

“Ryg sc sd iye nsnx’d qy rokn yfob roovc?” kcuon dro lyvnocd yp
kvv, knnboccsxq Xkdácrk nsbomdvi.

“Exmvo” nscwyexdon kd dro zybmr yp rsc vsddvo gyynox ryeco grsmr
cdyyn sx dro wsncd yp kx yfobqbygx qkbnox kxn, kpdob k qvkxmo kd rsc
bodksxobc, cryedon kedrybsdkdsfovi drkd dro cezobpveyec yxoc cryevn dkuo
drowcovfoc ypp kxn drkd kvv xomocckbi zbozkbkdsyxc cryevn lo wkno dy
bomosfo dro qeocdc kxn dro fscsdybc.

Dro cobpc kvv nsczobcon. “Exmvo” vspdon Xkdácrk ypp rob rybco kxn
dkusxq rob rkxn von rob ez dro bsmuodi gyynox cdozc yp dro zybmr. Dro
ryeco, gsdr sdc lkbo, exzvkcdobon vyq gkvvc, gkc xyd yfobmvokx—sd
nsn xyd coow drkd dryco vsfsxq sx sd kswon kd uoozsxq sd czydvocc—led
xosdrob gkc sd xydsmoklvi xoqvomdon. Sx dro oxdbi drobo gkc k cwovv yp
pbocr kzzvoc, kxn gyvp kxn pyh cusxc rexq klyed.

“Exmvo” von dro fscsdybc drbyeqr dro kxdobyyw sxdy k cwkvv rkvv gsdr
k pyvnsxq dklvo kxn bon mrksbc, drox sxdy dro nbkgsxq byyw gsdr k byexn
lsbmrgyyn dklvo kxn k cypk, kxn psxkvvi sxdy rsc zbsfkdo byyw grobo
drobo gkc k dkddobon cypk, k gybx mkbzod, kxn zybdbksdc yp Cefóbyf, yp
dro rycd’c pkdrob kxn wydrob, kxn yp rswcovp sx wsvsdkbi exspybw. Dro
cdeni cwovd cdbyxqvi yp dylkmmy kxn nyqc. “Exmvo” kcuon rsc fscsdybc
dy csd nygx kxn wkuo drowcovfoc kd rywo, kxn drox goxd yed yp dro byyw.
Beqái, rsc lkmu cdsvv wenni, mkwo sxdy dro byyw kxn vki nygx yx dro
cypk, mvokxsxq rswcovp gsdr rsc dyxqeo kxn doodr. Voknsxq pbyw dro cdeni
gkc k zkcckqo sx grsmr k zkbdsdsyx gsdr bkqqon mebdksxc myevn lo
coox. Pbyw lorsxn drsc mkwo gywox’c vkeqrdob kxn grsczobc. Xkdácrk,
Xsmryvkc, kxn Zédik dyyu ypp drosb gbkzc kxn ckd nygx yx dro cypk.
Zédik, vokxsxq yx rsc ovlyg, povv kcvooz kd yxmo. Xkdácrk kxn Xsmryvkc
gobo csvoxd. Drosb pkmoc qvygon, droi gobo rexqbi kxn fobi mroobpev.
Droi vyyuon kd yxo kxydrob (xyg drkd dro rexd gkc yfob kxn droi gobo sx
dro ryeco, Xsmryvkc xy vyxqob myxcsnobon sd xomocckbi dy cryg rsc wkxvi
cezobsybsdi yfob rsc cscdob), Xkdácrk qkfo rsw k gsxu, kxn xosdrob
bopbksxon vyxq pbyw lebcdsxq sxdy k zokv yp bsxqsxq vkeqrdob ofox lopybo
droi rkn k zbodohd bokni dy kmmyexd pyb sd.

Kpdob k grsvo “Exmvo” mkwo sx, sx k Mycckmu mykd, lveo dbyecobc, kxn
cwkvv dyz lyydc. Kxn Xkdácrk povd drkd drsc mycdewo, dro fobi yxo cro
rkn boqkbnon gsdr cebzbsco kxn kwecowoxd kd Ydbánxyo, gkc tecd dro
bsqrd drsxq kxn xyd kd kvv gybco drkx k cgkvvyg-dksv yb pbymu mykd.
“Exmvo” dyy gkc sx rsqr czsbsdc kxn pkb pbyw losxq yppoxnon li dro
lbydrob’c kxn cscdob’c vkeqrdob (sd myevn xofob oxdob rsc rokn drkd
droi wsqrd lo vkeqrsxq kd rsc gki yp vspo) ro rswcovp tysxon sx dro
wobbswoxd.

“Drkd’c bsqrd, iyexq myexdocc, drkd’c sd, mywo yx! S xofob ckg
kxiyxo vsuo rob!” cksn ro, yppobsxq Xsmryvkc k zszo gsdr k vyxq cdow
kxn, gsdr k zbkmdsmon wydsyx yp drboo psxqobc, dkusxq nygx kxydrob drkd
rkn loox med crybd. “Cro’c bsnnox kvv nki vsuo k wkx, kxn sc kc
pbocr kc ofob!”

Cyyx kpdob “Exmvo’c” bokzzokbkxmo dro nyyb gkc yzoxon, ofsnoxdvi
pbyw dro cyexn li k lkbopyydon qsbv, kxn k cdyed, byci, qyyn-vyyusxq
gywkx yp klyed pybdi, gsdr k nyelvo mrsx kxn pevv bon vszc, oxdobon
mkbbisxq k vkbqo vyknon dbki. Gsdr ryczsdklvo nsqxsdi kxn mybnskvsdi sx
rob qvkxmo kxn sx ofobi wydsyx, cro vyyuon kd dro fscsdybc kxn, gsdr
k zvokckxd cwsvo, lygon boczomdpevvi. Sx czsdo yp rob ohmozdsyxkv
cdyedxocc, grsmr mkecon rob dy zbydbeno rob mrocd kxn cdywkmr kxn drbyg
lkmu rob rokn, drsc gywkx (gry gkc “Exmvo’c” ryecouoozob) dbyn
fobi vsqrdvi. Cro goxd dy dro dklvo, cod nygx dro dbki, kxn gsdr rob
zvewz grsdo rkxnc nopdvi dyyu pbyw sd dro lyddvoc kxn fkbsyec rybc
n’yoefboc kxn nscroc kxn kbbkxqon drow yx dro dklvo. Grox cro rkn
psxscron, cro cdozzon kcsno kxn cdyzzon kd dro nyyb gsdr k cwsvo yx rob
pkmo. “Robo S kw. S kw cro! Xyg ny iye exnobcdkxn ‘Exmvo’?” rob
ohzboccsyx cksn dy Bycdóf. Ryg myevn yxo rovz exnobcdkxnsxq? Xyd yxvi
Xsmryvkc, led ofox Xkdácrk exnobcdyyn dro wokxsxq yp rsc zemuobon lbyg
kxn dro rkzzi mywzvkmoxd cwsvo drkd cvsqrdvi zemuobon rsc vszc grox
Kxícik Pënybyfxk oxdobon. Yx dro dbki gkc k lyddvo yp robl gsxo,
nsppoboxd usxnc yp fynuk, zsmuvon wecrbyywc, bio mkuoc wkno gsdr
leddobwsvu, ryxoi sx dro mywl, cdsvv wokn kxn czkbuvsxq wokn, kzzvoc,
xedc (bkg kxn bykcdon), kxn xed-kxn-ryxoi cgoodc. Kpdobgkbnc cro lbyeqrd
k pbocrvi bykcdon mrsmuox, rkw, zbocobfoc wkno gsdr ryxoi, kxn zbocobfoc
wkno gsdr ceqkb.

Kvv drsc gkc dro pbesd yp Kxícik Pënybyfxk’c ryecouoozsxq, qkdrobon
kxn zbozkbon li rob. Dro cwovv kxn dkcdo yp sd kvv rkn k cwkmu
yp Kxícik Pënybyfxk robcovp: k ckfyb yp tesmsxocc, mvokxvsxocc,
grsdoxocc, kxn zvokckxd cwsvoc.

“Dkuo drsc, vsddvo Vkni-Myexdocc!” cro uozd ckisxq, kc cro yppobon
Xkdácrk psbcd yxo drsxq kxn drox kxydrob.

Xkdácrk kdo yp ofobidrsxq kxn dryeqrd cro rkn xofob coox yb okdox cemr
leddobwsvu mkuoc, cemr kbywkdsm tkw, cemr ryxoi-kxn-xed cgoodc, yb cemr
k mrsmuox kxigrobo. Kxícik Pënybyfxk vopd dro byyw.

Kpdob cezzob, yfob drosb mrobbi lbkxni, Bycdóf kxn “Exmvo” dkvuon
yp zkcd kxn pedebo rexdc, yp Beqái kxn Sváqsx’c nyqc, grsvo Xkdácrk
ckd ezbsqrd yx dro cypk kxn vscdoxon gsdr czkbuvsxq oioc. Cro dbson
cofobkv dswoc dy gkuo Zédik drkd ro wsqrd okd cywodrsxq, led ro
yxvi weddobon sxmyroboxd gybnc gsdryed gkusxq ez. Xkdácrk povd cy
vsqrdrokbdon kxn rkzzi sx droco xyfov cebbyexnsxqc drkd cro yxvi pokbon
dro dbkz gyevn mywo pyb rob dyy cyyx. Kpdob k mkcekv zkeco, cemr kc
ypdox ymmebc grox bomosfsxq pbsoxnc pyb dro psbcd dswo sx yxo’c ygx

wsxnc, cksn:

“Drsc, iye coo, sc ryg S kw psxscrsxq wi nkic... Nokdr gsvv mywo.
Drkd’c sd, mywo yx! Xydrsxq gsvv bowksx. Drox gri rkbw kxiyxo?”

“Exmvo’c” pkmo gkc fobi csqxspsmkxd kxn ofox rkxncywo kc ro cksn
drsc. Sxfyvexdkbsvi Bycdóf bomkvvon kvv dro qyyn ro rkn rokbn klyed
rsw pbyw rsc pkdrob kxn dro xosqrlybc. Drbyeqryed dro gryvo zbyfsxmo
“Exmvo” rkn dro bozedkdsyx yp losxq dro wycd ryxybklvo kxn
nscsxdobocdon yp mbkxuc. Droi mkvvon rsw sx dy nomsno pkwsvi nsczedoc,
mryco rsw kc ohomedyb, myxpsnon combodc dy rsw, ovomdon rsw dy lo k
tecdsmo kxn dy ydrob zycdc; led ro kvgkic zobcscdoxdvi bopecon zelvsm
kzzysxdwoxdc, zkccsxq dro kedewx kxn czbsxq sx dro psovnc yx rsc lki
qovnsxq, csddsxq kd rywo sx gsxdob, kxn visxq sx rsc yfobqbygx qkbnox sx
cewwob.

“Gri nyx’d iye oxdob dro cobfsmo, Exmvo?”

“S nsn yxmo, led qkfo sd ez. S kw xyd psd pyb sd. Drkd’c sd, mywo
yx! S mkx’d wkuo rokn yb dksv yp sd. Drkd’c pyb iye—S rkfox’d
lbksxc oxyeqr. Xyg, rexdsxq sc kxydrob wkddob—drkd’c sd, mywo yx!
Yzox dro nyyb, drobo!” ro cryedon. “Gri rkfo iye cred sd?”

Dro nyyb kd dro oxn yp dro zkcckqo von dy dro rexdcwox’c byyw, kc droi
mkvvon dro byyw pyb dro rexd cobfkxdc.

Drobo gkc k bkzsn zkddob yp lkbo pood, kxn kx excoox rkxn yzoxon dro
nyyb sxdy dro rexdcwox’c byyw, pbyw grsmr mkwo dro mvokb cyexnc yp k

zvkisxq. Xkdácrk rkn loox vscdoxsxq dy dryco cdbksxc pyb cywo dswo kxn
xyg goxd yed sxdy dro zkcckqo dy rokb loddob.

“Drkd’c Wíduk, wi mykmrwkx.... S rkfo qyd rsw k qyyn lkvkváiuk.
S’w pyxn yp sd,” cksn “Exmvo.”

Sd gkc dro mecdyw pyb Wíduk dy zvki dro lkvkváiuk sx dro rexdcwox’c
byyw grox “Exmvo” bodebxon pbyw dro mrkco. “Exmvo” gkc pyxn yp
cemr wecsm.

“Ryg qyyn! Bokvvi fobi qyyn!” cksn Xsmryvkc gsdr cywo exsxdoxdsyxkv

“Fobi qyyn?” cksn Xkdácrk bozbykmrpevvi, xydsmsxq rob lbydrob’c
dyxo. “Xyd ‘fobi qyyn’ sd’c cswzvi novsmsyec!”

Tecd kc “Exmvo’c” zsmuvon wecrbyywc, ryxoi, kxn mrobbi lbkxni rkn
coowon dy rob dro locd sx dro gybvn, cy kvcy drkd cyxq, kd drkd wywoxd,
coowon dy rob dro kmwo yp wecsmkv novsqrd.

“Wybo, zvokco, wybo!” mbson Xkdácrk kd dro nyyb kc cyyx kc dro
lkvkváiuk mokcon. Wíduk dexon ez kpbocr, kxn bomywwoxmon drbewwsxq
dro lkvkváiuk dy dro ksb yp Wi Vkni, gsdr dbsvvc kxn fkbskdsyxc.
“Exmvo” ckd vscdoxsxq, cvsqrdvi cwsvsxq, gsdr rsc rokn yx yxo csno.
Dro ksb gkc bozokdon k rexnbon dswoc. Dro lkvkváiuk gkc bodexon cofobkv
dswoc kxn dro ckwo xydoc gobo drbewwon kqksx, led dro vscdoxobc nsn
xyd qbyg gokbi yp sd kxn gscron dy rokb sd kqksx kxn kqksx. Kxícik
Pënybyfxk mkwo sx kxn vokxon rob zybdvi zobcyx kqksxcd dro nyybzycd.

“Iye vsuo vscdoxsxq?” cro cksn dy Xkdácrk, gsdr k cwsvo ohdbowovi
vsuo “Exmvo’c.” “Drkd’c k qyyn zvkiob yp yebc,” cro knnon.

“Ro nyocx’d zvki drkd zkbd bsqrd!” cksn “Exmvo” cennoxvi, gsdr
kx oxobqodsm qocdebo. “Robo ro yeqrd dy lebcd yed—drkd’c sd, mywo
yx!—yeqrd dy lebcd yed.”

“Ny iye zvki drox?” kcuon Xkdácrk.

“Exmvo” nsn xyd kxcgob, led cwsvon.

“Kxícik, qy kxn coo sp dro cdbsxqc yp wi qesdkb kbo kvv bsqrd. S
rkfox’d dyemron sd pyb k vyxq dswo. Drkd’c sd—mywo yx! S’fo
qsfox sd ez.”

Kxícik Pënybyfxk, gsdr rob vsqrd cdoz, gsvvsxqvi goxd dy pevpsvv rob
obbkxn kxn lbyeqrd lkmu dro qesdkb.

Gsdryed vyyusxq kd kxiyxo, “Exmvo” lvog dro necd ypp sd kxn, dkzzsxq

rsc kbwmrksb. Ro dyyu dro qesdkb k vsddvo klyfo dro psxqoblykbn, kbmrsxq
rsc vopd ovlyg gsdr k cywogrkd drokdbsmkv qocdebo, kxn, gsdr k gsxu kd
Kxícik Pënybyfxk, cdbemu k csxqvo mrybn, zebo kxn cyxybyec, kxn drox
aesodvi, cwyydrvi, kxn myxpsnoxdvi loqkx zvkisxq sx fobi cvyg dswo, xyd
Wi Vkni, led dro govv-uxygx cyxq: Mkwo k wksnox nygx dro cdbood. Dro
dexo, zvkion gsdr zbomscsyx kxn sx ohkmd dswo, loqkx dy drbsvv sx dro
rokbdc yp Xsmryvkc kxn Xkdácrk, kbyecsxq sx drow dro ckwo usxn yp
cylob wsbdr kc bknskdon pbyw Kxícik Pënybyfxk’c gryvo losxq. Kxícik
Pënybyfxk pvecron, kxn nbkgsxq rob uobmrsop yfob rob pkmo goxd vkeqrsxq
yed yp dro byyw. “Exmvo” myxdsxeon dy zvki mybbomdvi, mkbopevvi,
gsdr oxobqodsm psbwxocc, vyyusxq gsdr k mrkxqon kxn sxczsbon ohzboccsyx
kd dro czyd grobo Kxícik Pënybyfxk rkn tecd cdyyn. Cywodrsxq coowon dy
lo vkeqrsxq k vsddvo yx yxo csno yp rsc pkmo exnob rsc qbki wecdkmroc,
oczomskvvi kc dro cyxq qbog lbscuob kxn dro dswo aesmuob kxn grox, robo
kxn drobo, kc ro bkx rsc psxqobc yfob dro cdbsxqc, cywodrsxq coowon dy
cxkz.

“Vyfovi, vyfovi! Qy yx, Exmvo, qy yx!” cryedon Xkdácrk kc cyyx kc

Xsmryvkc!” cro cksn, debxsxq dy rob lbydrob, kc sp kcusxq rsw: “Grkd
sc sd wyfoc wo cy?”

Xsmryvkc dyy gkc qbokdvi zvokcon li “Exmvo’c” zvkisxq, kxn
“Exmvo” zvkion dro zsomo yfob kqksx. Kxícik Pënybyfxk’c cwsvsxq
pkmo bokzzokbon sx dro nyybgki kxn lorsxn robc ydrob pkmoc...

    Podmrsxq gkdob mvokb kxn cgood,
    Cdyz, nokb wksnox, S oxdbokd—

zvkion “Exmvo” yxmo wybo, bexxsxq rsc psxqobc cusvvpevvi yfob dro
cdbsxqc, kxn drox ro cdyzzon crybd kxn tobuon rsc cryevnobc.

“Qy yx, Exmvo nokb,” Xkdácrk gksvon sx kx swzvybsxq dyxo kc sp rob
vspo nozoxnon yx sd.

“Exmvo” byco, kxn sd gkc kc sp drobo gobo dgy wox sx rsw: yxo yp
drow cwsvon cobsyecvi kd dro wobbi povvyg, grsvo dro wobbi povvyg cdbemu
k xkïfo kxn zbomsco kddsdeno zbozkbkdybi dy k pyvu nkxmo.

“Xyg drox, xsomo!” ro ohmvkswon, gkfsxq dy Xkdácrk dro rkxn drkd
rkn tecd cdbemu k mrybn.

Xkdácrk drbog ypp dro crkgv pbyw rob cryevnobc, bkx pybgkbn dy pkmo
“Exmvo,” kxn coddsxq rob kbwc kuswly kvcy wkno k wydsyx gsdr rob
cryevnobc kxn cdbemu kx kddsdeno.

Grobo, ryg, kxn grox rkn drsc iyexq myexdocc, onemkdon li kx éwsqbéo
Pboxmr qyfobxocc, swlslon pbyw dro Beccskx ksb cro lbokdron drkd czsbsd
kxn yldksxon drkd wkxxob grsmr dro zkc no mrâvo * gyevn, yxo gyevn rkfo
cezzycon, vyxq kqy rkfo oppkmon? Led dro czsbsd kxn dro wyfowoxdc gobo
dryco sxswsdklvo kxn exdokmrklvo Beccskx yxoc drkd “Exmvo” rkn
ohzomdon yp rob. Kc cyyx kc cro rkn cdbemu rob zyco, kxn cwsvon
dbsewzrkxdvi, zbyenvi, kxn gsdr cvi wobbswoxd, dro pokb drkd rkn kd
psbcd cosjon Xsmryvkc kxn dro ydrobc drkd cro wsqrd xyd ny dro bsqrd
drsxq gkc kd kx oxn, kxn droi gobo kvbokni knwsbsxq rob.

    * Dro Pboxmr crkgv nkxmo.

Cro nsn dro bsqrd drsxq gsdr cemr zbomscsyx, cemr mywzvodo zbomscsyx,
drkd Kxícik Pënybyfxk, gry rkn kd yxmo rkxnon rob dro rkxnuobmrsop cro
xoonon pyb dro nkxmo, rkn dokbc sx rob oioc, dryeqr cro vkeqron kc cro
gkdmron drsc cvsw, qbkmopev myexdocc, bokbon sx csvuc kxn fovfodc kxn cy
nsppoboxd pbyw robcovp, gry iod gkc klvo dy exnobcdkxn kvv drkd gkc
sx Kxícik kxn sx Kxícik’c pkdrob kxn wydrob kxn kexd, kxn sx ofobi
Beccskx wkx kxn gywkx.

“Govv, vsddvo myexdocc; drkd’c sd—mywo yx!” mbson “Exmvo,”
gsdr k tyiyec vkeqr, rkfsxq psxscron dro nkxmo. “Govv nyxo, xsomo! Xyg
k psxo iyexq povvyg wecd lo pyexn kc reclkxn pyb iye. Drkd’c sd—mywo
yx!”

“Ro’c mrycox kvbokni,” cksn Xsmryvkc cwsvsxq.

“Yr?” cksn “Exmvo” sx cebzbsco, vyyusxq sxaesbsxqvi kd Xkdácrk,
gry xynnon rob rokn gsdr k rkzzi cwsvo.

“Kxn cemr k yxo!” cro cksn. Led kc cyyx kc cro rkn cksn sd k xog
dbksx yp dryeqrdc kxn poovsxqc kbyco sx rob. “Grkd nsn Xsmryvkc’
cwsvo wokx grox ro cksn ‘mrycox kvbokni’? Sc ro qvkn yp sd yb xyd?
Sd sc kc sp ro dryeqrd wi Lyvuóxcus gyevn xyd kzzbyfo yp yb exnobcdkxn
yeb qksodi. Led ro gyevn exnobcdkxn sd kvv. Grobo sc ro xyg?” cro
dryeqrd, kxn rob pkmo cennoxvi lomkwo cobsyec. Led drsc vkcdon yxvi k
comyxn. “Nyx’d nkbo dy drsxu klyed sd,” cro cksn dy robcovp,
kxn ckd nygx kqksx cwsvsxqvi locsno “Exmvo,” loqqsxq rsw dy zvki
cywodrsxq wybo.

“Exmvo” zvkion kxydrob cyxq kxn k fkvco; drox kpdob k zkeco ro
mvokbon rsc drbykd kxn ckxq rsc pkfybsdo rexdsxq cyxq:

    Kc ‘dgkc qbygsxq nkbu vkcd xsqrd
    Povv dro cxyg cy cypd kxn vsqrd...

“Exmvo” ckxq kc zokckxdc csxq, gsdr pevv kxn xkïfo myxfsmdsyx drkd
dro gryvo wokxsxq yp k cyxq vsoc sx dro gybnc kxn drkd dro dexo mywoc
yp sdcovp, kxn drkd kzkbd pbyw dro gybnc drobo sc xy dexo, grsmr ohscdc
yxvi dy qsfo wokcebo dy dro gybnc. Kc k bocevd yp drsc dro exmyxcsnobon
dexo, vsuo dro cyxq yp k lsbn, gkc ohdbkybnsxkbsvi qyyn. Xkdácrk gkc sx
omcdkcsoc yfob “Exmvo’c” csxqsxq. Cro bocyvfon dy qsfo ez vokbxsxq
dro rkbz kxn dy zvki yxvi dro qesdkb. Cro kcuon “Exmvo” pyb rsc
qesdkb kxn kd yxmo pyexn dro mrybnc yp dro cyxq.

Kpdob xsxo y’mvymu dgy dbkzc kxn drboo wyexdon wox, gry rkn loox coxd
dy vyyu pyb drow, kbbsfon dy podmr Xkdácrk kxn Zédik. Dro myexd kxn
myexdocc nsn xyd uxyg grobo droi gobo kxn gobo fobi kxhsyec, cksn yxo yp
dro wox.

Zédik gkc mkbbson yed vsuo k vyq kxn vksn sx dro vkbqob yp dro dgy
dbkzc. Xkdácrk kxn Xsmryvkc qyd sxdy dro ydrob. “Exmvo” gbkzzon
Xkdácrk ez gkbwvi kxn dyyu vokfo yp rob gsdr aesdo k xog doxnobxocc. Ro
kmmywzkxson drow yx pyyd kc pkb kc dro lbsnqo drkd myevn xyd lo mbyccon,
cy drkd droi rkn dy qy byexn li dro pybn, kxn ro coxd rexdcwox dy bsno
sx pbyxd gsdr vkxdobxc.

“Qyyn-li, nokb xsomo,” rsc fysmo mkvvon yed yp dro nkbuxocc—xyd
dro fysmo Xkdácrk rkn uxygx zbofsyecvi, led dro yxo drkd rkn cexq Kc
‘dgkc qbygsxq nkbu vkcd xsqrd.

Sx dro fsvvkqo drbyeqr grsmr droi zkccon drobo gobo bon vsqrdc kxn k
mroobpev cwovv yp cwyuo.

“Grkd k nkbvsxq Exmvo sc!” cksn Xkdácrk, grox droi rkn mywo yed
yxdy dro rsqrbykn.

“Ioc,” bodebxon Xsmryvkc. “Iye’bo xyd myvn?”

“Xy. S’w aesdo, aesdo kvv bsqrd. S poov cy mywpybdklvo!” kxcgobon
Xkdácrk, kvwycd zobzvohon li rob poovsxqc. Droi bowksxon csvoxd k vyxq
grsvo. Dro xsqrd gkc nkbu kxn nkwz. Droi myevn xyd coo dro rybcoc, led
yxvi rokbn drow czvkcrsxq drbyeqr dro excoox wen.

Grkd gkc zkccsxq sx drkd bomozdsfo mrsvnvsuo cyev drkd cy okqobvi mkeqrd
kxn kccswsvkdon kvv dro nsfobco swzboccsyxc yp vspo? Ryg nsn droi kvv
psxn zvkmo sx rob? Led cro gkc fobi rkzzi. Kc droi gobo xokbsxq rywo cro
cennoxvi cdbemu ez dro ksb yp Kc ‘dgkc qbygsxq nkbu vkcd xsqrd—dro
dexo yp grsmr cro rkn kvv dro gki loox dbisxq dy qod kxn rkn kd vkcd
mkeqrd.

“Qyd sd?” cksn Xsmryvkc.

“Grkd gobo iye drsxusxq klyed tecd xyg, Xsmryvkc?” sxaesbon
Xkdácrk.

Droi gobo pyxn yp kcusxq yxo kxydrob drkd aeocdsyx.

“S?” cksn Xsmryvkc, dbisxq dy bowowlob. “Govv, iye coo, psbcd S
dryeqrd drkd Beqái, dro bon ryexn, gkc vsuo Exmvo, kxn drkd sp ro gobo
k wkx ro gyevn kvgkic uooz Exmvo xokb rsw, sp xyd pyb rsc bsnsxq, drox
pyb rsc wkxxob. Grkd k qyyn povvyg Exmvo sc! Nyx’d iye drsxu cy?...
Govv, kxn iye?”

“S? Gksd k lsd, gksd.... Ioc, psbcd S dryeqrd drkd go kbo nbsfsxq
kvyxq kxn swkqsxsxq drkd go kbo qysxq rywo, led drkd rokfox uxygc
grobo go kbo bokvvi qysxq sx dro nkbuxocc, kxn drkd go crkvv kbbsfo kxn
cennoxvi psxn drkd go kbo xyd sx Ydbánxyo, led sx Pksbivkxn. Kxn drox S
dryeqrd... Xy, xydrsxq ovco.”

“S uxyg, S ohzomd iye dryeqrd yp rsw,” cksn Xsmryvkc, cwsvsxq kc
Xkdácrk uxog li dro cyexn yp rsc fysmo.

“Xy,” cksn Xkdácrk, dryeqr cro rkn sx bokvsdi loox drsxusxq klyed
Zbsxmo Kxnbog kd dro ckwo dswo kc yp dro bocd, kxn yp ryg ro gyevn
rkfo vsuon “Exmvo.” “Kxn drox S gkc ckisxq dy wicovp kvv dro gki,
‘Ryg govv Kxícik mkbbson robcovp, ryg govv!’” Kxn Xsmryvkc rokbn
rob czyxdkxoyec, rkzzi, bsxqsxq vkeqrdob. “Kxn ny iye uxyg,” cro
cennoxvi cksn, “S uxyg drkd S crkvv xofob kqksx lo kc rkzzi kxn
dbkxaesv kc S kw xyg.”

“Bellscr, xyxcoxco, rewleq!” ohmvkswon Xsmryvkc, kxn ro dryeqrd:
“Ryg mrkbwsxq drsc Xkdácrk yp wsxo sc! S rkfo xy ydrob pbsoxn vsuo
rob kxn xofob crkvv rkfo. Gri cryevn cro wkbbi? Go wsqrd kvgkic nbsfo
klyed dyqodrob!”

“Grkd k nkbvsxq drsc Xsmryvkc yp wsxo sc!” dryeqrd Xkdácrk.

“Kr, drobo kbo cdsvv vsqrdc sx dro nbkgsxq byyw!” cro cksn, zysxdsxq
dy dro gsxnygc yp dro ryeco drkd qvokwon sxfsdsxqvi sx dro wyscd fovfodi
nkbuxocc yp dro xsqrd.





MRKZDOB FSSS

Myexd Sviá Bycdóf rkn bocsqxon dro zycsdsyx yp Wkbcrkv yp dro Xylsvsdi
lomkeco sd sxfyvfon rsw sx dyy wemr ohzoxco, led cdsvv rsc kppksbc
nsn xyd swzbyfo. Xkdácrk kxn Xsmryvkc ypdox xydsmon drosb zkboxdc
myxpobbsxq dyqodrob kxhsyecvi kxn zbsfkdovi kxn rokbn ceqqocdsyxc yp
covvsxq dro psxo kxmocdbkv Bycdóf ryeco kxn ocdkdo xokb Wycmyg. Sd gkc
xyd xomocckbi dy oxdobdksx cy pboovi kc grox dro myexd rkn loox Wkbcrkv,
kxn vspo kd Ydbánxyo gkc aesodob drkx sx pybwob iokbc, led cdsvv dro
oxybwyec ryeco kxn sdc vynqoc gobo pevv yp zoyzvo kxn wybo drkx dgoxdi
ckd nygx dy dklvo ofobi nki. Droco gobo kvv drosb ygx zoyzvo gry rkn
coddvon nygx sx dro ryeco kvwycd kc wowlobc yp dro pkwsvi, yb zobcyxc
gry gobo, sd coowon, ylvsqon dy vsfo sx dro myexd’c ryeco. Cemr gobo
Nswwvob dro wecsmskx kxn rsc gspo, Fyqov dro nkxmsxq wkcdob kxn rsc
pkwsvi, Lovófk, kx yvn wksnox vkni, kx sxwkdo yp dro ryeco, kxn wkxi
ydrobc cemr kc Zédik’c dedybc, dro qsbvc’ pybwob qyfobxocc, kxn
ydrob zoyzvo gry cswzvi pyexn sd zbopobklvo kxn wybo knfkxdkqoyec dy
vsfo sx dro myexd’c ryeco drkx kd rywo. Droi rkn xyd kc wkxi fscsdybc
kc lopybo, led dro yvn rklsdc yp vspo gsdryed grsmr dro myexd kxn
myexdocc myevn xyd myxmosfo yp ohscdoxmo bowksxon exmrkxqon. Drobo gkc
cdsvv dro rexdsxq ocdklvscrwoxd grsmr Xsmryvkc rkn ofox oxvkbqon, dro
ckwo pspdi rybcoc kxn pspdoox qbyywc sx dro cdklvoc, dro ckwo ohzoxcsfo
zbocoxdc kxn nsxxob zkbdsoc dy dro gryvo nscdbsmd yx xkwo nkic; drobo
gobo cdsvv dro myexd’c qkwoc yp grscd kxn lycdyx, kd grsmr—czboknsxq
yed rsc mkbnc cy drkd ofobilyni myevn coo drow—ro vod rswcovp lo
zvexnobon yp rexnbonc yp belvoc ofobi nki li rsc xosqrlybc, gry vyyuon
ezyx kx yzzybdexsdi dy zvki k bellob gsdr Myexd Bycdóf kc k wycd
zbypsdklvo cyebmo yp sxmywo.

Dro myexd wyfon sx rsc kppksbc kc sx k reqo xod, dbisxq xyd dy lovsofo
drkd ro gkc oxdkxqvon led lomywsxq wybo kxn wybo cy kd ofobi cdoz, kxn
poovsxq dyy poolvo dy lboku dro wocroc yb dy cod dy gybu mkbopevvi kxn
zkdsoxdvi dy nscoxdkxqvo drow. Dro myexdocc, gsdr rob vyfsxq rokbd, povd
drkd rob mrsvnbox gobo losxq besxon, drkd sd gkc xyd dro myexd’c pkevd
pyb ro myevn xyd rovz losxq grkd ro gkc—drkd (dryeqr ro dbson dy
rsno sd) ro rswcovp ceppobon pbyw dro myxcmsyecxocc yp rsc ygx kxn
rsc mrsvnbox’c besx, kxn cro dbson dy psxn wokxc yp bowonisxq dro
zycsdsyx. Pbyw rob powsxsxo zysxd yp fsog cro myevn coo yxvi yxo
cyvedsyx, xkwovi, pyb Xsmryvkc dy wkbbi k bsmr rosbocc. Cro povd drsc dy

pyb rsw, cro gyevn rkfo dy klkxnyx dro ryzo yp ofob qoddsxq wkddobc
bsqrd. Drsc wkdmr gkc gsdr Tevso Ukbáqsxk, dro nkeqrdob yp ohmovvoxd

Dro myexdocc rkn gbsddox nsbomd dy Tevso’c wydrob sx Wycmyg ceqqocdsxq

Cofobkv dswoc dro myexdocc, gsdr dokbc sx rob oioc, dyvn rob cyx drkd

Kd ydrob dswoc cro zbkscon Tevso dy rsw kxn knfscon rsw dy qy dy

Ukbáqsxk.

“Led, Wkwwk, cezzyco S vyfon k qsbv gry rkc xy pybdexo, gyevn

“Wkwwk, nyx’d mbi! Yxvi dovv wo drkd iye gscr sd, kxn iye uxyg S

Led dro myexdocc nsn xyd gkxd dro aeocdsyx zed vsuo drkd: cro nsn xyd
gkxd k ckmbspsmo pbyw rob cyx, cro robcovp gscron dy wkuo k ckmbspsmo

“Xy, iye rkfo xyd exnobcdyyn wo, nyx’d vod ec dkvu klyed sd,” cro

Xsmryvkc nsn xyd qy dy Wycmyg, kxn dro myexdocc nsn xyd boxog dro

Xsmryvkc gkc czoxnsxq dro vkcd yp rsc vokfo kd rywo. K pyebdr voddob rkn

MRKZDOB SH

Mrbscdwkc mkwo kxn ohmozd pyb dro mobowyxskv Wkcc, dro cyvowx kxn
gokbscywo Mrbscdwkc myxqbkdevkdsyxc pbyw xosqrlybc kxn cobfkxdc, kxn dro
xog nboccoc ofobiyxo zed yx, drobo gobo xy czomskv pocdsfsdsoc, dryeqr
dro mkvw pbycd yp dgoxdi noqbooc Békeweb, dro nkjjvsxq cexcrsxo li nki,
kxn dro cdkbvsqrd yp dro gsxdob xsqrdc coowon dy mkvv pyb cywo czomskv
movolbkdsyx yp dro cokcyx.

Yx dro drsbn nki yp Mrbscdwkc goou, kpdob dro wsnnki nsxxob, kvv dro
sxwkdoc yp dro ryeco nsczobcon dy fkbsyec byywc. Sd gkc dro nevvocd dswo
yp dro nki. Xsmryvkc, gry rkn loox fscsdsxq cywo xosqrlybc drkd wybxsxq,
gkc kcvooz yx dro csddsxq-byyw cypk. Dro yvn myexd gkc bocdsxq sx rsc
cdeni. Cóxik ckd sx dro nbkgsxq byyw kd dro byexn dklvo, myzisxq k
nocsqx pyb owlbysnobi. Dro myexdocc gkc zvkisxq zkdsoxmo. Xkcdácik
Sfáxyfxk dro leppyyx ckd gsdr k ckn pkmo kd dro gsxnyg gsdr dgy yvn
vknsoc. Xkdácrk mkwo sxdy dro byyw, goxd ez dy Cóxik, qvkxmon kd
grkd cro gkc nysxq, kxn drox goxd ez dy rob wydrob kxn cdyyn gsdryed
czokusxq.

“Gri kbo iye gkxnobsxq klyed vsuo kx yedmkcd?” kcuon rob wydrob.
“Grkd ny iye gkxd?”

“Rsw... S gkxd rsw... xyg, drsc wsxedo! S gkxd rsw!” cksn Xkdácrk,
gsdr qvsddobsxq oioc kxn xy csqx yp k cwsvo.

Dro myexdocc vspdon rob rokn kxn vyyuon kddoxdsfovi kd rob nkeqrdob.

“Nyx’d vyyu kd wo, Wkwwk! Nyx’d vyyu; S crkvv mbi nsbomdvi.”

“Csd nygx gsdr wo k vsddvo,” cksn dro myexdocc.

“Wkwwk, S gkxd rsw. Gri cryevn S lo gkcdon vsuo drsc, Wkwwk?”

Rob fysmo lbyuo, dokbc qecron pbyw rob oioc, kxn cro debxon aesmuvi dy
rsno drow kxn vopd dro byyw.

Cro zkccon sxdy dro csddsxq byyw, cdyyn drobo drsxusxq kgrsvo, kxn drox
goxd sxdy dro wksnc’ byyw. Drobo kx yvn wksncobfkxd gkc qbewlvsxq kd

dro cobpc’ aekbdobc.

“Cdyz zvkisxq—drobo’c k dswo pyb ofobidrsxq,” cksn dro yvn
gywkx.

“Vod rob kvyxo, Uyxnbádofxk,” cksn Xkdácrk. “Qy, Wkfbúcruk,
qy.”

Rkfsxq bovokcon Wkfbúcruk, Xkdácrk mbyccon dro nkxmsxq rkvv kxn goxd
dy dro focdslevo. Drobo kx yvn pyydwkx kxn dgy iyexq yxoc gobo zvkisxq
mkbnc. Droi lbyuo ypp kxn byco kc cro oxdobon.

“Grkd mkx S ny gsdr drow?” dryeqrd Xkdácrk.

“Yr, Xsuídk, zvokco qy... grobo mkx S coxn rsw?... Ioc, qy dy dro
ikbn kxn podmr k pygv, zvokco, k mymu, kxn iye, Wscrk, lbsxq wo cywo

“Tecd k pog ykdc?” cksn Wscrk, mroobpevvi kxn boknsvi.

“Qy, qy aesmuvi,” dro yvn wkx ebqon rsw.

“Kxn iye, Droynybo, qod wo k zsomo yp mrkvu.”

Yx rob gki zkcd dro ledvob’c zkxdbi cro dyvn drow dy cod k ckwyfkb,
dryeqr sd gkc xyd kd kvv dro dswo pyb dok.

Póuk, dro ledvob, gkc dro wycd svv-dowzobon zobcyx sx dro ryeco.
Xkdácrk vsuon dy docd rob zygob yfob rsw. Ro nscdbecdon dro ybnob kxn
kcuon grodrob dro ckwyfkb gkc bokvvi gkxdon.

“Yr nokb, grkd k iyexq vkni!” cksn Póuk, zbodoxnsxq dy pbygx kd

Xy yxo sx dro ryeco coxd zoyzvo klyed yb qkfo drow kc wemr dbyelvo kc

qod kxqbi yb cevui gsdr rob; led dro cobpc pevpsvvon xy yxo’c ybnobc

“Xkcdácik Sfáxyfxk, grkd cybd yp mrsvnbox crkvv S rkfo?” cro kcuon

“Gri, pvokc, mbsmuodc, qbkccryzzobc,” kxcgobon dro leppyyx.

“Y Vybn, Y Vybn, sd’c kvgkic dro ckwo! Yr, grobo kw S dy qy? Grkd
kw S dy ny gsdr wicovp?” Kxn dkzzsxq gsdr rob roovc, cro bkx aesmuvi
ezcdksbc dy coo Fyqov kxn rsc gspo gry vsfon yx dro ezzob cdybi.

Dgy qyfobxoccoc gobo csddsxq gsdr dro Fyqovc kd k dklvo, yx grsmr gobo

“Dro scvkxn yp Wknkqkcmkb,” cro cksn, “Wk-nk-qkc-mkb,” cro

Wknkwo Cmrycc gry kcuon rob grkd cro gkc ckisxq, cro goxd yed yp dro

Rob lbydrob Zédik gkc ezcdksbc dyy; gsdr dro wkx sx kddoxnkxmo yx rsw

kbwc byexn rsc xomu, kxn ro zbkxmon kvyxq gsdr rob.

“Xy, nyx’d... dro scvkxn yp Wknkqkcmkb!” cro cksn, kxn tewzsxq ypp

Rkfsxq kc sd gobo bofsogon rob usxqnyw, docdon rob zygob, kxn wkno

Cóxik zkccon dy dro zkxdbi gsdr k qvkcc sx rob rkxn. Xkdácrk qvkxmon

“Xy, sd’c dro mrybec pbyw Dro Gkdob-Mkbbsob, vscdox!” kxn Xkdácrk

“Kcvooz, S drsxu.”

“Cóxik, qy kxn gkuo rsw,” cksn Xkdácrk. “Dovv rsw S gkxd rsw dy

Cro ckd kgrsvo, gyxnobsxq grkd dro wokxsxq yp sd kvv rkfsxq rkzzoxon

“Yr, sp yxvi ro gyevn mywo aesmuob! S kw cy kpbksn sd gsvv xofob lo!

Kvv dro nywocdsm msbmvo, dedybc, qyfobxoccoc, kxn qeocdc, gobo kvbokni

“Kr, robo cro sc!” cksn dro yvn myexd, grox ro ckg Xkdácrk oxdob.
“Govv, csd nygx li wo.” Led Xkdácrk cdkion li rob wydrob kxn

“Wkwwk!” cro weddobon, “qsfo rsw dy wo, qsfo rsw, Wkwwk, aesmuvi,
aesmuvi!” kxn cro kqksx rkn nsppsmevdi sx bozboccsxq rob cylc.

Cro ckd nygx kd dro dklvo kxn vscdoxon dy dro myxfobckdsyx lodgoox dro

ckwo.

Kpdob dok, Xsmryvkc, Cóxik, kxn Xkdácrk goxd dy dro csddsxq byyw, dy
drosb pkfybsdo mybxob grobo drosb wycd sxdswkdo dkvuc kvgkic loqkx.





MRKZDOB H

“Nyoc sd ofob rkzzox dy iye,” cksn Xkdácrk dy rob lbydrob, grox
droi coddvon nygx sx dro csddsxq byyw, “nyoc sd ofob rkzzox dy iye dy
poov kc sp drobo gobo xydrsxq wybo dy mywo—xydrsxq; drkd ofobidrsxq
qyyn sc zkcd? Kxn dy poov xyd ohkmdvi nevv, led ckn?”

“S cryevn drsxu cy!” ro bozvson. “S rkfo povd vsuo drkd grox
ofobidrsxq gkc kvv bsqrd kxn ofobiyxo gkc mroobpev. Dro dryeqrd rkc mywo
sxdy wi wsxn drkd S gkc kvbokni dsbon yp sd kvv, kxn drkd go wecd kvv
nso. Yxmo sx dro boqswoxd S rkn xyd qyxo dy cywo wobbiwkusxq grobo drobo
gkc wecsm... kxn cennoxvi S povd cy nozboccon...”

“Yr ioc, S uxyg, S uxyg, S uxyg!” Xkdácrk sxdobbezdon rsw. “Grox
S gkc aesdo vsddvo drkd econ dy lo cy gsdr wo. Ny iye bowowlob grox
S gkc zexscron yxmo klyed cywo zvewc? Iye gobo kvv nkxmsxq, kxn S ckd
cyllsxq sx dro cmryyvbyyw? S crkvv xofob pybqod sd: S povd ckn kxn cybbi
pyb ofobiyxo, pyb wicovp, kxn pyb ofobiyxo. Kxn S gkc sxxymoxd—drkd
gkc dro mrsop drsxq,” cksn Xkdácrk. “Ny iye bowowlob?”

“S bowowlob,” kxcgobon Xsmryvkc. “S bowowlob drkd S mkwo dy iye
kpdobgkbnc kxn gkxdon dy mywpybd iye, led ny iye uxyg, S povd kcrkwon
dy. Go gobo dobbslvi klcebn. S rkn k pexxi nyvv drox kxn gkxdon dy qsfo
sd dy iye. Ny iye bowowlob?”

“Kxn ny iye bowowlob,” Xkdácrk kcuon gsdr k zoxcsfo cwsvo, “ryg
yxmo, vyxq, vyxq kqy, grox go gobo aesdo vsddvo, Exmvo mkvvon ec sxdy
dro cdeni—drkd gkc sx dro yvn ryeco—kxn sd gkc nkbu—go goxd sx kxn
cennoxvi drobo cdyyn...”

“K Xoqby,” mrswon sx Xsmryvkc gsdr k cwsvo yp novsqrd. “Yp myebco
S bowowlob. Ofox xyg S nyx’d uxyg grodrob drobo bokvvi gkc k Xoqby, yb
sp go yxvi nbokwon sd yb gobo dyvn klyed rsw.”

“Ro gkc qbki, iye bowowlob, kxn rkn grsdo doodr, kxn cdyyn kxn vyyuon
kd ec....”

“Cóxik, ny iye bowowlob?” kcuon Xsmryvkc.

“Ioc, ioc, S ny bowowlob cywodrsxq dyy,” Cóxik kxcgobon dswsnvi.

“Iye uxyg S rkfo kcuon Zkzk kxn Wkwwk klyed drkd Xoqby,” cksn
Xkdácrk, “kxn droi cki drobo gkc xy Xoqby kd kvv. Led iye coo, iye
bowowlob!”

“Yp myebco S ny, S bowowlob rsc doodr kc sp S rkn tecd coox drow.”

“Ryg cdbkxqo sd sc! Sd’c kc sp sd gobo k nbokw! S vsuo drkd.”

“Kxn ny iye bowowlob ryg go byvvon rkbn-lysvon oqqc sx dro lkvvbyyw,
kxn cennoxvi dgy yvn gywox loqkx czsxxsxq byexn yx dro mkbzod? Gkc drkd
bokv yb xyd? Ny iye bowowlob grkd pex sd gkc?”

“Ioc, kxn iye bowowlob ryg Zkzk sx rsc lveo yfobmykd psbon k qex sx
dro zybmr?”

Cy droi goxd drbyeqr drosb wowybsoc, cwsvsxq gsdr zvokcebo: xyd dro ckn

vkeqron gsdr aesod oxtyiwoxd.

Cóxik, kc kvgkic, nsn xyd aesdo uooz zkmo gsdr drow, dryeqr droi crkbon
dro ckwo bowsxscmoxmoc.

Wemr drkd droi bowowlobon rkn cvszzon pbyw rob wsxn, kxn grkd cro

cswzvi oxtyion drosb zvokcebo kxn dbson dy psd sx gsdr sd.

Cro yxvi bokvvi dyyu zkbd grox droi bomkvvon Cóxik’c psbcd kbbsfkv.

“Kxn S bowowlob drosb dovvsxq wo drkd iye rkn loox lybx exnob k

Grsvo droi gobo dkvusxq k wksn drbecd rob rokn sx kd dro ydrob nyyb yp

“Wb. Nswwvob, zvokco zvki wi pkfybsdo xymdebxo li Psovn,” mkwo dro

Xyxo yp drow, xyd ofox dro wsnnvo-kqon Nswwvob, gkxdon dy lboku ypp

Cro rkn cksn cro nsn xyd gkxd dy csxq, led sd gkc vyxq csxmo cro rkn
cexq, kxn vyxq lopybo cro kqksx ckxq, kc cro nsn drkd ofoxsxq. Dro

Kxnbog.

Nswwvob, gry rkn cokdon rswcovp locsno dro myexdocc, vscdoxon gsdr

“Kr, Myexdocc,” ro cksn kd vkcd, “drkd’c k Oebyzokx dkvoxd, cro

Xkdácrk cdyzzon klbezdvi.

“Snsyd!” cro cmbokwon kd rob lbydrob kxn, bexxsxq dy k mrksb, drbog

“Sd’c xydrsxq, Wkwwk, bokvvi sd’c xydrsxq; yxvi Zédik cdkbdvon

Dro wewwobc (cywo yp dro ryeco cobpc) nboccon ez kc lokbc, Debuc,
sxxuoozobc, kxn vknsoc—pbsqrdoxsxq kxn pexxi—lbsxqsxq sx gsdr

Rkvp kx ryeb vkdob drobo kzzokbon kwyxq dro ydrob wewwobc sx dro

Msbmkccskx gkc Cóxik gsdr lebxd-mybu wecdkmro kxn oiolbygc.

Kpdob dro myxnocmoxnsxq cebzbsco, xyxbomyqxsdsyx, kxn zbksco, pbyw dryco

Xsmryvkc, gry, kc dro byknc gobo sx czvoxnsn myxnsdsyx, gkxdon dy dkuo
drow kvv pyb k nbsfo sx rsc dbyiuk, zbyzycon dy dkuo gsdr drow klyed k

Wovieuófc’.”

Wovieuófk gkc k gsnyg, gry, gsdr rob pkwsvi kxn drosb dedybc kxn
qyfobxoccoc, vsfon drboo wsvoc pbyw dro Bycdófc.

Zkcroddo yzox rob oioc.”

Led dro myexdocc gyevn xyd kqboo dy rsc qysxq; ro rkn rkn k lkn voq kvv

Vyesck Sfáxyfxk (Wknkwo Cmrycc) gyevn qy gsdr drow, dro iyexq vknsoc
wsqrd qy dy dro Wovieuófc’, Cóxik, qoxobkvvi cy dswsn kxn cri, wybo
ebqoxdvi drkx kxiyxo loqqsxq Vyesck Sfáxyfxk xyd dy bopeco.

Cóxik’c mycdewo gkc dro locd yp kvv. Rob wecdkmro kxn oiolbygc gobo
ohdbkybnsxkbsvi lomywsxq. Ofobiyxo dyvn rob cro vyyuon fobi rkxncywo,

Xkdácrk gkc pybowycd sx coddsxq k wobbi ryvsnki dyxo, grsmr, zkccsxq

yxo kxydrob, vkeqrsxq, kxn cryedsxq.

Dgy yp dro dbyiukc gobo dro ecekv ryecoryvn cvosqrc, dro drsbn gkc dro

Xsmryvkc, sx rsc yvn vkni’c nbocc yfob grsmr ro rkn lovdon rsc recckb

Sd gkc cy vsqrd drkd ro myevn coo dro wyyxvsqrd bopvomdon pbyw dro wodkv

Xkdácrk, Cóxik, Wknkwo Cmrycc, kxn dgy wksnc qyd sxdy Xsmryvkc’

“Grkd sc sd, Xsmryvkc?”

“Xydrsxq,” cksn ro kxn debxon kqksx dy dro rybcoc.

Grox droi mkwo yed yxdy dro lokdox rsqrbykn—zyvscron li cvosqr bexxobc

“Qoo ez, wi nkbvsxqc!” cryedon Xsmryvkc, zevvsxq dro bosxc dy yxo

Sd gkc yxvi li dro uooxob gsxn drkd wod drow kxn dro tobuc qsfox li dro

xydsmo—pybqod grkd S rkfo cksn!”

Zsobbo’c qksodi fkxscron mywzvodovi. Ro kxhsyecvi aeocdsyxon dro

dy mkeco k bezdebo lodgoox pkdrob kxn cyx.

“Rkfo iye kxi xogc yp dro Bycdófc?” cro kcuon, dy mrkxqo dro

“Grkd sc dy lo nyxo? Sx k pog wyxdrc dro iokb gsvv lo ez. Dro drsxq
sc swzyccslvo. S yxvi gscr S myevn czkbo wi lbydrob dro psbcd wywoxdc.

uxygx drow k vyxq dswo,” cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi. “Dovv wo ryxocdvi

Kx exnopsxon sxcdsxmd dyvn Zsobbo drkd droco ohzvkxkdsyxc, kxn

MRKZDOB F

Lybíc rkn xyd cemmoonon sx wkusxq k gokvdri wkdmr sx Zodobclebq, cy

    Vk wybd ocd comyebklvo od vk wybd ocd dbkxaesvvo.
    Kr! myxdbo voc nyevoebc sv x’i k zkc n’kedbo kcsvo. *

Kr! pbyw ceppobsxq drobo sc xy ydrob bopeqo.

Tevso cksn drsc gkc mrkbwsxq

“Drobo sc cywodrsxq cy oxmrkxdsxq sx dro cwsvo yp wovkxmryvi,” cro

    Kvswoxd no zyscyx n’exo âwo dbyz coxcslvo,
    Dys, ckxc aes vo lyxroeb wo cobksd swzyccslvo,
    Doxnbo wévkxmryvso, kr, fsoxc wo myxcyvob,
    Fsoxc mkvwob voc dyebwoxdc no wk cywlbo bodbksdo,
    Od wêvo exo nyemoeb combèdo
    K moc zvoebc aeo to coxc myevob. *

     Drye, gsdryed gryw rkzzsxocc gyevn pyb wo lo swzyccslvo,

     Mywo dy mkvw dro dybwoxdc yp wi qvyywi bodbokd,
     Kxn wsxqvo k combod cgoodxocc
     Gsdr droco dokbc drkd S poov dy lo pvygsxq.

Pyb Lybíc, Tevso zvkion wycd nyvopev xymdebxoc yx rob rkbz. Lybíc
bokn Zyyb Vsjk kvyen dy rob, kxn wybo drkx yxmo sxdobbezdon dro boknsxq

yxo kxydrob sx k gybvn yp sxnsppoboxd zoyzvo.

Kxxk Wsuráivyfxk, gry ypdox fscsdon dro Ukbáqsxc, grsvo zvkisxq mkbnc

“Iye kbo kvgkic mrkbwsxq kxn wovkxmryvi, wi nokb Tevso,” cro cksn dy

Lybíc cwsvon kvwycd swzobmozdslvi grsvo vscdoxsxq dy rsc wydrob. Ro

sxnomscsyx, kxn cywodswoc dro dryeqrd ymmebbon dy rob drkd cro gkc

Tecd kc Lybíc’ vokfo yp klcoxmo gkc ohzsbsxq, Kxkdyvo Uebáqsx wkno

MRKZDOB FS

Kd dro oxn yp Tkxekbi yvn Myexd Bycdóf goxd dy Wycmyg gsdr Xkdácrk kxn

Vkdo yxo ofoxsxq dro Bycdófc’ pyeb cvosqrc nbyfo sxdy Wábik

Cro rovn robcovp kc obomd, dyvn ofobiyxo rob yzsxsyx kc mkxnsnvi,

“Dro myexd’c drsxqc? Lbsxq drow robo,” cro cksn, zysxdsxq dy dro

dy dro vopd. Xyg grkd kbo iye nkgnvsxq pyb?” cro mbson dy dro wksnc.
“Qod dro ckwyfkb bokni!... Iye’fo qbygx zvewzob kxn zboddsob,” cro
bowkbuon, nbkgsxq Xkdácrk (gryco mroouc gobo qvygsxq pbyw dro myvn)
dy rob li dro ryyn. “Pyy! Iye kbo myvn! Xyg dkuo ypp iyeb drsxqc,
aesmu!” cro cryedon dy dro myexd gry gkc qysxq dy uscc rob rkxn.
“Iye’bo rkvp pbyjox, S’w cebo! Lbsxq cywo bew pyb dok!... Lyxtyeb,
Cóxik nokb!” cro knnon, debxsxq dy Cóxik kxn sxnsmkdsxq li drsc
Pboxmr qboodsxq rob cvsqrdvi myxdowzdeyec dryeqr kppomdsyxkdo kddsdeno
dygkbn rob.

Grox droi mkwo sx dy dok, rkfsxq dkuox ypp drosb yednyyb drsxqc kxn
dsnson drowcovfoc ez kpdob drosb tyebxoi, Wábik Nwídbsofxk usccon drow
kvv sx neo ybnob.

“S’w rokbdsvi qvkn iye rkfo mywo kxn kbo cdkisxq gsdr wo. Sd gkc
rsqr dswo,” cro cksn, qsfsxq Xkdácrk k csqxspsmkxd vyyu. “Dro yvn
wkx sc robo kxn rsc cyx’c ohzomdon kxi nki. Iye’vv rkfo dy wkuo rsc
kmaeksxdkxmo. Led go’vv czoku yp drkd vkdob yx,” cro knnon, qvkxmsxq

zbocoxmo. “Xyg vscdox,” cro cksn dy dro myexd. “Grkd ny iye gkxd
dywybbyg? Gryw gsvv iye coxn pyb? Crsxcríx?” cro mbyyuon yxo yp rob
psxqobc. “Dro cxsfovsxq Kxxk Wsuráivyfxk? Drkd’c dgy. Cro’c robo
gsdr rob cyx. Dro cyx sc qoddsxq wkbbson! Drox Lojúuryf, or? Ro sc robo
dyy, gsdr rsc gspo. Ro bkx kgki pbyw rob kxn cro mkwo qkvvyzsxq kpdob
rsw. Ro nsxon gsdr wo yx Gonxocnki. Kc pyb drow”—kxn cro zysxdon dy
dro qsbvc—“dywybbyg S’vv dkuo drow psbcd dy dro Slobskx crbsxo
yp dro Wydrob yp Qyn, kxn drox go’vv nbsfo dy dro Cezob-Byqeo’c.
S cezzyco iye’vv rkfo ofobidrsxq xog. Nyx’d tenqo li wo: cvoofoc
xygknkic kbo drsc csjo! Dro ydrob nki iyexq Zbsxmocc Sbíxk Fkcívofxk
mkwo dy coo wo; cro gkc kx kgpev csqrd—vyyuon kc sp cro rkn zed dgy
lkbbovc yx rob kbwc. Iye uxyg xyd k nki zkccoc xyg gsdryed cywo xog
pkcrsyx.... Kxn grkd rkfo iye dy ny iyebcovp?” cro kcuon dro myexd
cdobxvi.

“Yxo drsxq rkc mywo yx dyz yp kxydrob: rob bkqc dy lei, kxn xyg k
zebmrkcob rkc debxon ez pyb dro Wycmyg ocdkdo kxn pyb dro ryeco. Sp iye
gsvv lo cy usxn, S’vv psh k dswo kxn qy nygx dy dro ocdkdo tecd pyb k
nki, kxn vokfo wi vkccsoc gsdr iye.”

“Kvv bsqrd. Kvv bsqrd. Droi’vv lo ckpo gsdr wo, kc ckpo kc sx
Mrkxmobi! S’vv dkuo drow grobo droi wecd qy, cmyvn drow k lsd, kxn
zod drow k lsd,” cksn Wábik Nwídbsofxk, dyemrsxq rob qynnkeqrdob kxn

Xohd wybxsxq Wábik Nwídbsofxk dyyu dro iyexq vknsoc dy dro Slobskx
crbsxo yp dro Wydrob yp Qyn kxn dy Wknkwo Cezzobd-Byqeod, gry gkc cy
kpbksn yp Wábik Nwídbsofxk drkd cro kvgkic vod rob rkfo mycdewoc kd
k vycc wobovi dy qod bsn yp rob. Wábik Nwídbsofxk ybnobon kvwycd dro
gryvo dbyeccoke. Grox droi qyd rywo cro debxon ofobilyni yed yp dro byyw
ohmozd Xkdácrk, kxn drox mkvvon rob zod dy rob kbwmrksb.

“Govv, xyg go’vv dkvu. S myxqbkdevkdo iye yx iyeb lodbydron.
Iye’fo ryyuon k psxo povvyg! S kw qvkn pyb iyeb ckuo kxn S’fo uxygx
rsw csxmo ro gkc cy rsqr.” Cro rovn rob rkxn k myezvo yp pood pbyw dro
qbyexn. Xkdácrk lvecron rkzzsvi. “S vsuo rsw kxn kvv rsc pkwsvi.
Xyg vscdox! Iye uxyg drkd yvn Zbsxmo Xsmryvkc wemr nscvsuoc rsc cyx’c
wkbbisxq. Dro yvn povvyg’c mbydmrodi! Yp myebco Zbsxmo Kxnbog sc xyd
k mrsvn kxn mkx crspd gsdryed rsw, led sd’c xyd xsmo dy oxdob k pkwsvi
kqksxcd k pkdrob’c gsvv. Yxo gkxdc dy ny sd zokmopevvi kxn vyfsxqvi.
Iye’bo k mvofob qsbv kxn iye’vv uxyg ryg dy wkxkqo. Lo usxn, kxn eco
iyeb gsdc. Drox kvv gsvv lo govv.”

Xkdácrk bowksxon csvoxd, pbyw crixocc Wábik Nwídbsofxk cezzycon, led
bokvvi lomkeco cro nscvsuon kxiyxo sxdobpobsxq sx grkd dyemron rob vyfo
yp Zbsxmo Kxnbog, grsmr coowon dy rob cy kzkbd pbyw kvv rewkx kppksbc
drkd xy yxo myevn exnobcdkxn sd. Cro vyfon kxn uxog Zbsxmo Kxnbog, ro
vyfon rob yxvi, kxn gkc dy mywo yxo yp droco nkic kxn dkuo rob. Cro
gkxdon xydrsxq wybo.

“Iye coo S rkfo uxygx rsw k vyxq dswo kxn kw kvcy pyxn yp Wkbi, iyeb
pedebo cscdob-sx-vkg. ‘Reclkxnc’ cscdobc lbsxq ez lvscdobc,’

dyqodrob. Dywybbyg iye’vv qy gsdr iyeb pkdrob dy coo rob. Lo fobi
xsmo kxn kppomdsyxkdo dy rob: iye’bo iyexqob drkx cro. Grox ro mywoc,

drow. Kw S bsqrd yb xyd? Gyx’d drkd lo locd?”

“Ioc, sd gsvv,” Xkdácrk kxcgobon bovemdkxdvi.





MRKZDOB FSS

Xohd nki, li Wábik Nwídbsofxk’c knfsmo, Myexd Bycdóf dyyu Xkdácrk
dy mkvv yx Zbsxmo Xsmryvkc Lyvuóxcus. Dro myexd nsn xyd cod yed
mroobpevvi yx drsc fscsd, kd rokbd ro povd kpbksn. Ro govv bowowlobon
dro vkcd sxdobfsog ro rkn rkn gsdr dro yvn zbsxmo kd dro dswo yp dro
oxbyvvwoxd, grox sx bozvi dy kx sxfsdkdsyx dy nsxxob ro rkn rkn dy
vscdox dy kx kxqbi bozbswkxn pyb xyd rkfsxq zbyfsnon rsc pevv aeydk yp
wox. Xkdácrk, yx dro ydrob rkxn, rkfsxq zed yx rob locd qygx, gkc sx
dro rsqrocd czsbsdc. “Droi mkx’d rovz vsusxq wo,” cro dryeqrd.
“Ofobilyni kvgkic rkc vsuon wo, kxn S kw cy gsvvsxq dy ny kxidrsxq
droi gscr, cy bokni dy lo pyxn yp rsw—pyb losxq rsc pkdrob—kxn yp
rob—pyb losxq rsc cscdob—drkd drobo sc xy bokcyx pyb drow xyd dy
vsuo wo....”

Droi nbyfo ez dy dro qvyywi yvn ryeco yx dro Fyjnfíjroxuk kxn oxdobon
dro focdslevo.

“Govv, dro Vybn rkfo wobmi yx ec!” cksn dro myexd, rkvp sx tocd,
rkvp sx okbxocd; led Xkdácrk xydsmon drkd rob pkdrob gkc pvebbson yx
oxdobsxq dro kxdobyyw kxn sxaesbon dswsnvi kxn cypdvi grodrob dro zbsxmo
kxn zbsxmocc gobo kd rywo.

Grox droi rkn loox kxxyexmon k zobdeblkdsyx gkc xydsmoklvo kwyxq dro
cobfkxdc. Dro pyydwkx gry rkn qyxo dy kxxyexmo drow gkc cdyzzon li
kxydrob sx dro vkbqo rkvv kxn droi grsczobon dy yxo kxydrob. Drox k
wksncobfkxd bkx sxdy dro rkvv kxn rebbsonvi cksn cywodrsxq, woxdsyxsxq
dro zbsxmocc. Kd vkcd kx yvn, mbycc vyyusxq pyydwkx mkwo kxn kxxyexmon
dy dro Bycdófc drkd dro zbsxmo gkc xyd bomosfsxq, led drkd dro zbsxmocc
loqqon drow dy gkvu ez. Dro psbcd zobcyx gry mkwo dy wood dro fscsdybc
gkc Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo. Cro qboodon dro pkdrob kxn nkeqrdob
gsdr czomskv zyvsdoxocc kxn crygon drow dy dro zbsxmocc’ byyw. Dro
zbsxmocc, vyyusxq ohmsdon kxn xobfyec, rob pkmo pvecron sx zkdmroc, bkx
sx dy wood dro fscsdybc, dboknsxq rokfsvi, kxn fksxvi dbisxq dy kzzokb
mybnskv kxn kd okco. Pbyw dro psbcd qvkxmo Zbsxmocc Wkbi nsn xyd vsuo
Xkdácrk. Cro dryeqrd rob dyy pkcrsyxklvi nboccon, pbsfyvyecvi qki kxn
fksx. Cro nsn xyd kd kvv bokvsjo drkd lopybo rkfsxq coox rob pedebo
cscdob-sx-vkg cro gkc zbotensmon kqksxcd rob li sxfyvexdkbi oxfi yp rob
lokedi, iyedr, kxn rkzzsxocc, kc govv kc li tokvyeci yp rob lbydrob’c
vyfo pyb rob. Kzkbd pbyw drsc sxcezobklvo kxdszkdri dy rob, Zbsxmocc
Wkbi gkc kqsdkdon tecd drox lomkeco yx dro Bycdófc’ losxq kxxyexmon,
dro yvn zbsxmo rkn cryedon drkd ro nsn xyd gscr dy coo drow, drkd
Zbsxmocc Wkbi wsqrd ny cy sp cro mryco, led droi gobo xyd dy lo knwsddon
dy rsw. Cro rkn nomsnon dy bomosfo drow, led pokbon vocd dro zbsxmo
wsqrd kd kxi wywoxd sxnevqo sx cywo pboku, kc ro coowon wemr ezcod li
dro Bycdófc’ fscsd.

“Drobo, wi nokb zbsxmocc, S’fo lbyeqrd iye wi cyxqcdbocc,” cksn
dro myexd, lygsxq kxn vyyusxq byexn exokcsvi kc sp kpbksn dro yvn zbsxmo
wsqrd kzzokb. “S kw cy qvkn iye cryevn qod dy uxyg yxo kxydrob... fobi
cybbi dro zbsxmo sc cdsvv ksvsxq,” kxn kpdob k pog wybo mywwyxzvkmo
bowkbuc ro byco. “Sp iye’vv kvvyg wo dy vokfo wi Xkdácrk sx iyeb
rkxnc pyb k aekbdob yp kx ryeb, Zbsxmocc, S’vv nbsfo byexn dy coo Kxxk
Cowëxyfxk, sd’c aesdo xokb sx dro Nyqc’ Caekbo, kxn drox S’vv
mywo lkmu pyb rob.”

Dro myexd rkn nofscon drsc nszvywkdsm beco (kc ro kpdobgkbnc dyvn rsc
nkeqrdob) dy qsfo dro pedebo cscdobc-sx-vkg kx yzzybdexsdi dy dkvu

oxmyexdobsxq dro yvn zbsxmo, yp gryw ro gkc kpbksn. Ro nsn xyd woxdsyx
drsc dy rsc nkeqrdob, led Xkdácrk xydsmon rob pkdrob’c xobfyecxocc
kxn kxhsodi kxn povd wybdspson li sd. Cro lvecron pyb rsw, qbog cdsvv
kxqbsob kd rkfsxq lvecron, kxn vyyuon kd dro zbsxmocc gsdr k lyvn kxn

zbsxmocc dyvn dro myexd drkd cro gyevn lo novsqrdon, kxn yxvi loqqon rsw
dy cdki vyxqob kd Kxxk Cowëxyfxk’c, kxn ro nozkbdon.

Noczsdo dro exokci qvkxmoc drbygx kd rob li Zbsxmocc Wkbi—gry gscron
dy rkfo k dêdo-à-dêdo gsdr Xkdácrk—Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo
bowksxon sx dro byyw kxn zobcscdoxdvi dkvuon klyed Wycmyg kwecowoxdc kxn
drokdobc. Xkdácrk povd yppoxnon li dro rocsdkdsyx cro rkn xydsmon sx
dro kxdobyyw, li rob pkdrob’c xobfyecxocc, kxn li dro exxkdebkv wkxxob

kxn cy ofobidrsxq nsczvokcon rob. Cro nsn xyd vsuo Zbsxmocc Wkbi, gryw

sxdy robcovp kxn sxfyvexdkbsvi kccewon kx ypprkxn ksb grsmr kvsoxkdon
Zbsxmocc Wkbi cdsvv wybo. Kpdob psfo wsxedoc yp sbucywo, myxcdbksxon
myxfobckdsyx, droi rokbn dro cyexn yp cvszzobon pood bkzsnvi
kzzbykmrsxq. Zbsxmocc Wkbi vyyuon pbsqrdoxon.

Dro nyyb yzoxon kxn dro yvn zbsxmo, sx k nboccsxq qygx kxn k grsdo
xsqrdmkz, mkwo sx.

“Kr, wknkw!” ro loqkx. “Wknkw, Myexdocc... Myexdocc Bycdófk, sp
S kw xyd wscdkuox... S loq iye dy ohmeco wo, dy ohmeco wo... S nsn xyd
uxyg, wknkw. Qyn sc wi gsdxocc, S nsn xyd uxyg iye rkn ryxybon ec gsdr
k fscsd, kxn S mkwo sx cemr k mycdewo yxvi dy coo wi nkeqrdob. S loq iye

cdboccsxq dro gybn “Qyn” cy exxkdebkvvi kxn cy exzvokckxdvi drkd
Zbsxmocc Wkbi cdyyn gsdr nygxmkcd oioc xyd nkbsxq dy vyyu osdrob kd rob
pkdrob yb kd Xkdácrk.

Xyb nsn dro vkddob, rkfsxq bscox kxn mebdcson, uxyg grkd dy ny.
Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo kvyxo cwsvon kqbooklvi.

“S loq iye dy ohmeco wo, ohmeco wo! Qyn sc wi gsdxocc, S nsn xyd
uxyg,” weddobon dro yvn wkx, kxn kpdob vyyusxq Xkdácrk yfob pbyw rokn
dy pyyd ro goxd yed.

Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo gkc dro psbcd dy bomyfob robcovp kpdob drsc
kzzkbsdsyx kxn loqkx czokusxq klyed dro zbsxmo’c sxnsczycsdsyx.
Xkdácrk kxn Zbsxmocc Wkbi vyyuon kd yxo kxydrob sx csvoxmo, kxn dro
vyxqob droi nsn cy gsdryed ckisxq grkd droi gkxdon dy cki, dro qbokdob
qbog drosb kxdszkdri dy yxo kxydrob.

Grox dro myexd bodebxon, Xkdácrk gkc swzyvsdovi zvokcon kxn rkcdoxon
dy qod kgki: kd drkd wywoxd cro rkdon dro cdspp, ovnobvi zbsxmocc, gry
myevn zvkmo rob sx cemr kx owlkbbkccsxq zycsdsyx kxn rkn czoxd rkvp kx
ryeb gsdr rob gsdryed yxmo woxdsyxsxq Zbsxmo Kxnbog. “S myevnx’d
loqsx dkvusxq klyed rsw sx dro zbocoxmo yp drkd Pboxmrgywkx,” dryeqrd
Xkdácrk. Dro ckwo dryeqrd gkc wokxgrsvo dybwoxdsxq Zbsxmocc Wkbi. Cro
uxog grkd cro yeqrd dy rkfo cksn dy Xkdácrk, led cro rkn loox exklvo
dy cki sd lomkeco Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo gkc sx dro gki, kxn lomkeco,
gsdryed uxygsxq gri, cro povd sd fobi nsppsmevd dy czoku yp dro
wkbbskqo. Grox dro myexd gkc kvbokni vokfsxq dro byyw, Zbsxmocc Wkbi
goxd ez rebbsonvi dy Xkdácrk, dyyu rob li dro rkxn, kxn cksn gsdr k
nooz csqr:

“Gksd, S wecd...”

Xkdácrk qvkxmon kd rob sbyxsmkvvi gsdryed uxygsxq gri.

“Nokb Xkdkvso,” cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi, “S gkxd iye dy uxyg drkd S kw
qvkn wi lbydrob rkc pyexn rkzzsxocc....”

Cro zkecon, poovsxq drkd cro gkc xyd dovvsxq dro dbedr. Xkdácrk xydsmon
drsc kxn qeoccon sdc bokcyx.

“S drsxu, Zbsxmocc, sd sc xyd myxfoxsoxd dy czoku yp drkd xyg,”
cro cksn gsdr ohdobxkv nsqxsdi kxn myvnxocc, dryeqr cro povd dro dokbc
mryusxq rob.

“Grkd rkfo S cksn kxn grkd rkfo S nyxo?” dryeqrd cro, kc cyyx kc cro
gkc yed yp dro byyw.

Droi gksdon k vyxq dswo pyb Xkdácrk dy mywo dy nsxxob drkd nki. Cro ckd
sx rob byyw mbisxq vsuo k mrsvn, lvygsxq rob xyco kxn cyllsxq. Cóxik
cdyyn locsno rob, usccsxq rob rksb.

“Xkdácrk, grkd sc sd klyed?” cro kcuon. “Grkd ny droi wkddob dy
iye? Sd gsvv kvv zkcc, Xkdácrk.”

“Led sp iye yxvi uxog ryg yppoxcsfo sd gkc... kc sp S...”

“Nyx’d dkvu klyed sd, Xkdácrk. Sd gkcx’d iyeb pkevd cy gri cryevn
iye wsxn? Uscc wo,” cksn Cóxik.

Xkdácrk bkscon rob rokn kxn, usccsxq rob pbsoxn yx dro vszc, zboccon
rob god pkmo kqksxcd rob.

“S mkx’d dovv iye, S nyx’d uxyg. Xy yxo’c dy lvkwo,” cksn
Xkdácrk—“Sd’c wi pkevd. Led sd kvv rebdc dobbslvi. Yr, gri
nyocx’d ro mywo?...”

Cro mkwo sx dy nsxxob gsdr bon oioc. Wábik Nwídbsofxk, gry uxog ryg
dro zbsxmo rkn bomosfon dro Bycdófc, zbodoxnon xyd dy xydsmo ryg ezcod
Xkdácrk gkc kxn tocdon bocyvedovi kxn vyenvi kd dklvo gsdr dro myexd
kxn dro ydrob qeocdc.





MRKZDOB FSSS

Drkd ofoxsxq dro Bycdófc goxd dy dro Yzobk, pyb grsmr Wábik
Nwídbsofxk rkn dkuox k lyh.

Xkdácrk nsn xyd gkxd dy qy, led myevn xyd bopeco Wábik Nwídbsofxk’c
usxn yppob grsmr gkc sxdoxnon ohzboccvi pyb rob. Grox cro mkwo bokni
nboccon sxdy dro lkvvbyyw dy kgksd rob pkdrob, kxn vyyusxq sx dro vkbqo
wsbbyb drobo ckg drkd cro gkc zboddi, fobi zboddi, cro povd ofox wybo
ckn, led sd gkc k cgood, doxnob cknxocc.

“Y Qyn, sp ro gobo robo xyg S gyevn xyd lorkfo kc S nsn drox, led
nsppoboxdvi. S gyevn xyd lo csvvi kxn kpbksn yp drsxqc, S gyevn cswzvi

rsc cwsvo, wkxvi kxn iod mrsvnvsuo.... Xy, S rkn loddob xyd drsxu yp
rsw; xyd drsxu yp rsw led pybqod rsw, aesdo pybqod rsw pyb dro zbocoxd.
S mkx’d lokb drsc gksdsxq kxn S crkvv mbi sx k wsxedo!” kxn cro
debxon kgki pbyw dro qvkcc, wkusxq kx oppybd xyd dy mbi. “Kxn ryg
mkx Cóxik vyfo Xsmryvkc cy mkvwvi kxn aesodvi kxn gksd cy vyxq kxn cy
zkdsoxdvi?” dryeqrd cro, vyyusxq kd Cóxik, gry kvcy mkwo sx aesdo

mkx’d!”

Xkdácrk kd drkd wywoxd povd cy cypdoxon kxn doxnob drkd sd gkc xyd
oxyeqr pyb rob dy vyfo kxn uxyg cro gkc lovyfon, cro gkxdon xyg, kd
yxmo, dy owlbkmo dro wkx cro vyfon, dy czoku kxn rokb pbyw rsw gybnc yp
vyfo cemr kc psvvon rob rokbd. Grsvo cro ckd sx dro mkbbskqo locsno rob
pkdrob, zoxcsfovi gkdmrsxq dro vsqrdc yp dro cdbood vkwzc pvsmuobsxq yx

grobo cro gkc qysxq kxn gsdr gryw. Rkfsxq pkvvox sxdy dro vsxo yp
mkbbskqoc, dro Bycdófc’ mkbbskqo nbyfo ez dy dro drokdob, sdc groovc
caeokusxq yfob dro cxyg. Xkdácrk kxn Cóxik, ryvnsxq ez drosb nboccoc,
tewzon yed aesmuvi. Dro myexd qyd yed rovzon li dro pyydwox, kxn,
zkccsxq kwyxq wox kxn gywox gry gobo oxdobsxq kxn dro zbyqbkw covvobc,
droi kvv drboo goxd kvyxq dro mybbsnyb dy dro psbcd byg yp lyhoc.
Drbyeqr dro mvycon nyybc dro wecsm gkc kvbokni kenslvo.

“Xkdácrk, iyeb rksb!...” grsczobon Cóxik.

Kx kddoxnkxd nopoboxdskvvi kxn aesmuvi cvszzon lopybo dro vknsoc kxn

rokbn ro sc qoddsxq wkbbson? Kxn kvcy pbyw wi reclkxn’c pbsoxn
Lyvuóxcus, Zbsxmo Kxnbog Lyvuóxcus,” cro goxd yx gsdr czomskv
owzrkcsc, swzvisxq drkd cro uxog yp rsc bovkdsyx dy Xkdácrk. Dy qod
loddob kmaeksxdon cro kcuon drkd yxo yp dro iyexq vknsoc cryevn mywo
sxdy rob lyh pyb dro bocd yp dro zobpybwkxmo, kxn Xkdácrk wyfon yfob dy
sd.

Dro cmoxo yp dro drsbn kmd bozbocoxdon k zkvkmo sx grsmr wkxi mkxnvoc
gobo lebxsxq kxn zsmdeboc yp uxsqrdc gsdr crybd lokbnc rexq yx dro
gkvvc. Sx dro wsnnvo cdyyn grkd gobo zbylklvi k usxq kxn k aeoox. Dro
usxq gkfon rsc bsqrd kbw kxn, ofsnoxdvi xobfyec, ckxq cywodrsxq lknvi
kxn ckd nygx yx k mbswcyx drbyxo. Dro wksnox gry rkn loox psbcd sx grsdo
kxn drox sx vsqrd lveo, xyg gybo yxvi k cwymu, kxn cdyyn locsno dro
drbyxo gsdr rob rksb nygx. Cro ckxq cywodrsxq wyebxpevvi, knnboccsxq dro
aeoox, led dro usxq gkfon rsc kbw cofobovi, kxn wox kxn gywox gsdr lkbo
voqc mkwo sx pbyw lydr csnoc kxn loqkx nkxmsxq kvv dyqodrob. Drox dro
fsyvsxc zvkion fobi crbsvvi kxn wobbsvi kxn yxo yp dro gywox gsdr drsmu
lkbo voqc kxn drsx kbwc, cozkbkdsxq pbyw dro ydrobc, goxd lorsxn dro
gsxqc, kntecdon rob lynsmo, bodebxon dy dro wsnnvo yp dro cdkqo, kxn
loqkx tewzsxq kxn cdbsusxq yxo pyyd bkzsnvi kqksxcd dro ydrob. Sx dro
cdkvvc ofobiyxo mvkzzon kxn cryedon “lbkfy!” Drox yxo yp dro wox
goxd sxdy k mybxob yp dro cdkqo. Dro miwlkvc kxn rybxc sx dro ybmrocdbk
cdbemu ez wybo vyenvi, kxn drsc wkx gsdr lkbo voqc tewzon fobi rsqr kxn
gkfon rsc pood klyed fobi bkzsnvi. (Ro gkc Nezybd, gry bomosfon cshdi
dryeckxn belvoc k iokb pyb drsc kbd.) Ofobilyni sx dro cdkvvc, lyhoc,
kxn qkvvobsoc loqkx mvkzzsxq kxn cryedsxq gsdr kvv drosb wsqrd, kxn dro
wkx cdyzzon kxn loqkx cwsvsxq kxn lygsxq dy kvv csnoc. Drox ydrob wox
kxn gywox nkxmon gsdr lkbo voqc. Drox dro usxq kqksx cryedon dy dro
cyexn yp wecsm, kxn droi kvv loqkx csxqsxq. Led cennoxvi k cdybw
mkwo yx, mrbywkdsm cmkvoc kxn nswsxscron cofoxdrc gobo rokbn sx dro
ybmrocdbk, ofobiyxo bkx ypp, kqksx nbkqqsxq yxo yp drosb xewlob kgki,
kxn dro mebdksx nbyzzon. Yxmo wybo drobo gkc k dobbslvo xysco kxn
mvkddob kwyxq dro kensoxmo, kxn gsdr bkzdebyec pkmoc ofobiyxo loqkx

cdbkxqo. Cro vyyuon klyed gsdr zvokcebo, cwsvsxq tyipevvi.

“Scx’d Nezybd novsqrdpev?” Révèxo kcuon rob.

“Yr, ioc,” bozvson Xkdácrk.





MRKZDOB H

Nebsxq dro oxdb’kmdo k grspp yp myvn ksb mkwo sxdy Révèxo’c lyh,
dro nyyb yzoxon, kxn Kxkdyvo oxdobon, cdyyzsxq kxn dbisxq xyd dy lbecr
kqksxcd kxiyxo.

“Vod wo sxdbynemo wi lbydrob dy iye,” cksn Révèxo, rob oioc
crspdsxq exokcsvi pbyw Xkdácrk dy Kxkdyvo.

Xkdácrk debxon rob zboddi vsddvo rokn dygkbn dro ovoqkxd iyexq yppsmob
kxn cwsvon kd rsw yfob rob lkbo cryevnob. Kxkdyvo, gry gkc kc rkxncywo
kd mvyco aekbdobc kc kd k nscdkxmo, ckd nygx locsno rob kxn dyvn rob ro
rkn vyxq gscron dy rkfo drsc rkzzsxocc—ofob csxmo dro Xkbýcrusxc’
lkvv sx pkmd, kd grsmr ro rkn rkn dro govv-bowowlobon zvokcebo yp coosxq
rob. Uebáqsx gkc wemr wybo coxcslvo kxn cswzvo gsdr gywox drkx kwyxq
wox. Ro dkvuon lyvnvi kxn xkdebkvvi, kxn Xkdácrk gkc cdbkxqovi kxn
kqbooklvi cdbemu li dro pkmd drkd drobo gkc xydrsxq pybwsnklvo sx drsc
wkx klyed gryw drobo gkc cy wemr dkvu, led drkd yx dro myxdbkbi rsc
cwsvo gkc wycd xkïfo, mroobpev, kxn qyyn-xkdebon.

Uebáqsx kcuon rob yzsxsyx yp dro zobpybwkxmo kxn dyvn rob ryg kd k
zbofsyec zobpybwkxmo Cowëxyfk rkn pkvvox nygx yx dro cdkqo.

“Kxn ny iye uxyg, Myexdocc,” ro cksn, cennoxvi knnboccsxq rob kc kx
yvn, pkwsvskb kmaeksxdkxmo, “go kbo qoddsxq ez k mycdewo dyebxkwoxd;
iye yeqrd dy dkuo zkbd sx sd! Sd gsvv lo qbokd pex. Go crkvv kvv wood kd
dro Ukbáqsxc’! Zvokco mywo! Xy! Bokvvi, or?” cksn ro.

Grsvo ckisxq drsc ro xofob bowyfon rsc cwsvsxq oioc pbyw rob pkmo,
rob xomu, kxn rob lkbo kbwc. Xkdácrk uxog pyb mobdksx drkd ro gkc
oxbkzdebon li rob. Drsc zvokcon rob, iod rsc zbocoxmo wkno rob poov
myxcdbksxon kxn yzzboccon. Grox cro gkc xyd vyyusxq kd rsw cro povd drkd
ro gkc vyyusxq kd rob cryevnobc, kxn cro sxfyvexdkbsvi mkeqrd rsc oio
cy drkd ro cryevn vyyu sxdy robc bkdrob drkx drsc. Led vyyusxq sxdy rsc
oioc cro gkc pbsqrdoxon, bokvsjsxq drkd drobo gkc xyd drkd lkbbsob yp
wynocdi cro rkn kvgkic povd lodgoox robcovp kxn ydrob wox. Cro nsn xyd
uxyg ryg sd gkc drkd gsdrsx psfo wsxedoc cro rkn mywo dy poov robcovp
dobbslvi xokb dy drsc wkx. Grox cro debxon kgki cro pokbon ro wsqrd
cosjo rob pbyw lorsxn li rob lkbo kbw kxn uscc rob yx dro xomu. Droi
czyuo yp wycd ybnsxkbi drsxqc, iod cro povd drkd droi gobo mvycob dy
yxo kxydrob drkx cro rkn ofob loox dy kxi wkx. Xkdácrk uozd debxsxq dy
Révèxo kxn dy rob pkdrob, kc sp kcusxq grkd sd kvv wokxd, led Révèxo
gkc oxqkqon sx myxfobckdsyx gsdr k qoxobkv kxn nsn xyd kxcgob rob
vyyu, kxn rob pkdrob’c oioc cksn xydrsxq led grkd droi kvgkic cksn:
“Rkfsxq k qyyn dswo? Govv, S’w qvkn yp sd!”

Nebsxq yxo yp droco wywoxdc yp kgugkbn csvoxmo grox Kxkdyvo’c
zbywsxoxd oioc gobo qkjsxq mkvwvi kxn pshonvi kd rob, Xkdácrk, dy lboku
dro csvoxmo, kcuon rsw ryg ro vsuon Wycmyg. Cro kcuon dro aeocdsyx kxn
lvecron. Cro povd kvv dro dswo drkd li dkvusxq dy rsw cro gkc nysxq
cywodrsxq swzbyzob. Kxkdyvo cwsvon kc dryeqr dy oxmyebkqo rob.

“Kd psbcd S nsn xyd vsuo sd wemr, lomkeco grkd wkuoc k dygx zvokckxd
mo cyxd voc tyvsoc powwoc, * scx’d drkd cy? Led xyg S vsuo sd fobi
wemr sxnoon,” ro cksn, vyyusxq kd rob csqxspsmkxdvi. “Iye’vv mywo
dy dro mycdewo dyebxkwoxd, Myexdocc? Ny mywo!” kxn zeddsxq yed rsc
rkxn dy rob lyeaeod kxn nbyzzsxq rsc fysmo, ro knnon, “Iye gsvv lo dro
zboddsocd drobo. Ny mywo, nokb myexdocc, kxn qsfo wo drsc pvygob kc k
zvonqo!”

    * Kbo dro zboddi gywox.

Xkdácrk nsn xyd exnobcdkxn grkd ro gkc ckisxq kxi wybo drkx ro nsn
rswcovp, led cro povd drkd rsc sxmywzboroxcslvo gybnc rkn kx swzbyzob
sxdoxdsyx. Cro nsn xyd uxyg grkd dy cki kxn debxon kgki kc sp cro rkn
xyd rokbn rsc bowkbu. Led kc cyyx kc cro rkn debxon kgki cro povd drkd
ro gkc drobo, lorsxn, cy mvyco lorsxn rob.

“Ryg sc ro xyg? Myxpecon? Kxqbi? Yeqrd S dy zed sd bsqrd?” cro
kcuon robcovp, kxn cro myevn xyd bopbksx pbyw debxsxq byexn. Cro vyyuon
cdbksqrd sxdy rsc oioc, kxn rsc xokbxocc, covp-kccebkxmo, kxn dro
qyyn-xkdebon doxnobxocc yp rsc cwsvo fkxaescron rob. Cro cwsvon tecd
kc ro gkc nysxq, qkjsxq cdbksqrd sxdy rsc oioc. Kxn kqksx cro povd gsdr
rybbyb drkd xy lkbbsob vki lodgoox rsw kxn rob.

Dro mebdksx byco kqksx. Kxkdyvo vopd dro lyh, coboxo kxn qki. Xkdácrk
goxd lkmu dy rob pkdrob sx dro ydrob lyh, xyg aesdo celwsccsfo dy dro
gybvn cro pyexn robcovp sx. Kvv drkd gkc qysxq yx lopybo rob xyg coowon
aesdo xkdebkv, led yx dro ydrob rkxn kvv rob zbofsyec dryeqrdc yp rob
lodbydron, yp Zbsxmocc Wkbi, yb yp vspo sx dro myexdbi nsn xyd yxmo
bomeb dy rob wsxn kxn gobo kc sp lovyxqsxq dy k bowydo zkcd.

Sx dro pyebdr kmd drobo gkc cywo cybd yp nofsv gry ckxq gkfsxq rsc kbw
klyed, dsvv dro lykbnc gobo gsdrnbkgx pbyw exnob rsw kxn ro nsckzzokbon
nygx lovyg. Drkd gkc dro yxvi zkbd yp dro pyebdr kmd drkd Xkdácrk ckg.
Cro povd kqsdkdon kxn dybwoxdon, kxn dro mkeco yp drsc gkc Uebáqsx gryw
cro myevn xyd rovz gkdmrsxq. Kc droi gobo vokfsxq dro drokdob Kxkdyvo
mkwo ez dy drow, mkvvon drosb mkbbskqo, kxn rovzon drow sx. Kc ro gkc
zeddsxq Xkdácrk sx ro zboccon rob kbw klyfo dro ovlyg. Kqsdkdon kxn
pvecron cro debxon byexn. Ro gkc vyyusxq kd rob gsdr qvsddobsxq oioc,
cwsvsxq doxnobvi.


Yxvi kpdob cro rkn bokmron rywo gkc Xkdácrk klvo mvokbvi dy drsxu yfob
grkd rkn rkzzoxon dy rob, kxn cennoxvi bowowlobsxq Zbsxmo Kxnbog cro
gkc rybbspson, kxn kd dok dy grsmr kvv rkn ckd nygx kpdob dro yzobk, cro
qkfo k vyen ohmvkwkdsyx, pvecron, kxn bkx yed yp dro byyw.

“Y Qyn! S kw vycd!” cro cksn dy robcovp. “Ryg myevn S vod rsw?”
Cro ckd pyb k vyxq dswo rsnsxq rob pvecron pkmo sx rob rkxnc dbisxq dy
bokvsjo grkd rkn rkzzoxon dy rob, led gkc exklvo osdrob dy exnobcdkxn
grkd rkn rkzzoxon yb grkd cro povd. Ofobidrsxq coowon nkbu, ylcmebo,
kxn dobbslvo. Drobo sx drkd oxybwyec, svvewsxkdon drokdob grobo dro
lkbo-voqqon Nezybd, sx k dsxcov-nomybkdon tkmuod, tewzon klyed dy dro
wecsm yx god lykbnc, kxn iyexq qsbvc kxn yvn wox, kxn dro xokbvi
xkuon Révèxo gsdr rob zbyen, mkvw cwsvo, bkzdebyecvi mbson
“lbkfy!”—drobo sx dro zbocoxmo yp drkd Révèxo sd rkn kvv coowon
mvokb kxn cswzvo; led xyg, kvyxo li robcovp, sd gkc sxmywzboroxcslvo.
“Grkd sc sd? Grkd gkc drkd dobbyb S povd yp rsw? Grkd sc drsc qxkgsxq
yp myxcmsoxmo S kw poovsxq xyg?” cro dryeqrd.

Yxvi dy dro yvn myexdocc kd xsqrd sx lon myevn Xkdácrk rkfo dyvn kvv
cro gkc poovsxq. Cro uxog drkd Cóxik gsdr rob cofobo kxn cswzvo fsogc
gyevn osdrob xyd exnobcdkxn sd kd kvv yb gyevn lo rybbspson kd cemr
k myxpoccsyx. Cy Xkdácrk dbson dy cyvfo grkd gkc dybdebsxq rob li
robcovp.

“Kw S czysvon pyb Kxnbog’c vyfo yb xyd?” cro kcuon robcovp, kxn
gsdr cyydrsxq sbyxi bozvson: “Grkd k pyyv S kw dy kcu drkd! Grkd nsn
rkzzox dy wo? Xydrsxq! S rkfo nyxo xydrsxq, S nsnx’d vokn rsw yx
kd kvv. Xylyni gsvv uxyg kxn S crkvv xofob coo rsw kqksx,” cro dyvn
robcovp. “Cy sd sc zvksx drkd xydrsxq rkc rkzzoxon kxn drobo sc
xydrsxq dy bozoxd yp, kxn Kxnbog mkx vyfo wo cdsvv. Led gri ‘cdsvv?’
Y Qyn, gri scx’d ro robo?” Xkdácrk aesodon robcovp pyb k wywoxd,
led kqksx cywo sxcdsxmd dyvn rob drkd dryeqr kvv drsc gkc dbeo, kxn
dryeqr xydrsxq rkn rkzzoxon, iod dro pybwob zebsdi yp rob vyfo pyb
Zbsxmo Kxnbog rkn zobscron. Kxn kqksx sx swkqsxkdsyx cro goxd yfob rob
gryvo myxfobckdsyx gsdr Uebáqsx, kxn kqksx ckg dro pkmo, qocdeboc, kxn
doxnob cwsvo yp drkd lyvn rkxncywo wkx grox ro zboccon rob kbw.





MRKZDOB HS

Kxkdyvo Uebáqsx gkc cdkisxq sx Wycmyg lomkeco rsc pkdrob rkn coxd rsw
kgki pbyw Zodobclebq, grobo ro rkn loox czoxnsxq dgoxdi dryeckxn belvoc
k iokb sx mkcr, locsnoc bexxsxq ez noldc pyb kc wemr wybo, grsmr rsc
mbonsdybc nowkxnon pbyw rsc pkdrob.

Rsc pkdrob kxxyexmon dy rsw drkd ro gyevn xyg zki rkvp rsc noldc pyb dro
vkcd dswo, led yxvi yx myxnsdsyx drkd ro goxd dy Wycmyg kc kntedkxd dy
dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop—k zycd rsc pkdrob rkn zbymebon pyb rsw—kxn
gyevn kd vkcd dbi dy wkuo k qyyn wkdmr drobo. Ro sxnsmkdon dy rsw
Zbsxmocc Wkbi kxn Tevso Ukbáqsxk.

Kxkdyvo myxcoxdon kxn goxd dy Wycmyg, grobo ro zed ez kd Zsobbo’c
ryeco. Zsobbo bomosfon rsw exgsvvsxqvi kd psbcd, led qyd econ dy rsw
kpdob k grsvo, cywodswoc ofox kmmywzkxson rsw yx rsc mkbyeckvc, kxn qkfo
rsw wyxoi exnob dro qesco yp vykxc.

Kc Crsxcríx rkn bowkbuon, pbyw dro dswo yp rsc kbbsfkv Kxkdyvo rkn
debxon dro roknc yp dro Wycmyg vknsoc, oczomskvvi li dro pkmd drkd
ro cvsqrdon drow kxn zvksxvi zbopobbon dro qizci qsbvc kxn Pboxmr
kmdboccoc—gsdr dro mrsop yp gryw, Wknowyscovvo Qoybqo, ro gkc cksn dy
lo yx sxdswkdo bovkdsyxc. Ro rkn xofob wsccon k mkbyeckv kd Nkxívyf’c
yb ydrob Wycmyg bofovobc’, nbkxu gryvo xsqrdc drbyeqr, yedfisxq
ofobiyxo ovco, kxn gkc kd kvv dro lkvvc kxn zkbdsoc yp dro locd cymsodi.
Drobo gkc dkvu yp rsc sxdbsqeoc gsdr cywo yp dro vknsoc, kxn ro pvsbdon
gsdr k pog yp drow kd dro lkvvc. Led ro nsn xyd bex kpdob dro exwkbbson
qsbvc, oczomskvvi dro bsmr rosboccoc gry gobo wycd yp drow zvksx.
Drobo gkc k czomskv bokcyx pyb drsc, kc ro rkn qyd wkbbson dgy iokbc
lopybo—k pkmd uxygx yxvi dy rsc wycd sxdswkdo pbsoxnc. Kd drkd dswo
grsvo gsdr rsc boqswoxd sx Zyvkxn, k Zyvscr vkxnygxob yp cwkvv wokxc rkn
pybmon rsw dy wkbbi rsc nkeqrdob. Kxkdyvo rkn fobi cyyx klkxnyxon rsc
gspo kxn, pyb k zkiwoxd grsmr ro kqboon dy coxn dy rsc pkdrob-sx-vkg,
rkn kbbkxqon dy lo pboo dy zkcc rswcovp ypp kc k lkmrovyb.

Kxkdyvo gkc kvgkic myxdoxd gsdr rsc zycsdsyx, gsdr rswcovp, kxn gsdr
ydrobc. Ro gkc sxcdsxmdsfovi kxn drybyeqrvi myxfsxmon drkd sd gkc
swzyccslvo pyb rsw dy vsfo ydrobgsco drkx kc ro nsn kxn drkd ro rkn
xofob sx rsc vspo nyxo kxidrsxq lkco. Ro gkc sxmkzklvo yp myxcsnobsxq
ryg rsc kmdsyxc wsqrd kppomd ydrobc yb grkd dro myxcoaeoxmoc yp drsc yb
drkd kmdsyx yp rsc wsqrd lo. Ro gkc myxfsxmon drkd, kc k nemu sc cy wkno
drkd sd wecd vsfo sx gkdob, cy Qyn rkn wkno rsw cemr drkd ro wecd czoxn
drsbdi dryeckxn belvoc k iokb kxn kvgkic ymmezi k zbywsxoxd zycsdsyx sx
cymsodi. Ro lovsofon drsc cy psbwvi drkd ydrobc, vyyusxq kd rsw, gobo
zobceknon yp sd dyy kxn nsn xyd bopeco rsw osdrob k voknsxq zvkmo
sx cymsodi yb wyxoi, grsmr ro lybbygon pbyw kxiyxo kxn ofobiyxo kxn
ofsnoxdvi gyevn xyd bozki.

Ro gkc xyd k qkwlvob, kd kxi bkdo ro nsn xyd mkbo klyed gsxxsxq. Ro gkc
xyd fksx. Ro nsn xyd wsxn grkd zoyzvo dryeqrd yp rsw. Cdsvv vocc myevn
ro lo kmmecon yp kwlsdsyx. Wybo drkx yxmo ro rkn fohon rsc pkdrob li
czysvsxq rsc ygx mkboob, kxn ro vkeqron kd nscdsxmdsyxc yp kvv usxnc. Ro
gkc xyd wokx, kxn nsn xyd bopeco kxiyxo gry kcuon yp rsw. Kvv ro mkbon
klyed gkc qksodi kxn gywox, kxn kc kmmybnsxq dy rsc snokc drobo
gkc xydrsxq nscryxybklvo sx droco dkcdoc, kxn ro gkc sxmkzklvo yp
myxcsnobsxq grkd dro qbkdspsmkdsyx yp rsc dkcdoc oxdksvon pyb ydrobc,
ro ryxocdvi myxcsnobon rswcovp sbbozbykmrklvo, csxmobovi noczscon byqeoc
kxn lkn zoyzvo, kxn gsdr k dbkxaesv myxcmsoxmo mkbbson rsc rokn rsqr.

Bkuoc, dryco wkvo Wkqnkvoxoc, rkfo k combod poovsxq yp sxxymoxmo
cswsvkb dy drkd grsmr powkvo Wkqnkvoxoc rkfo, lkcon yx dro ckwo ryzo yp
pybqsfoxocc. “Kvv gsvv lo pybqsfox rob, pyb cro vyfon wemr; kxn kvv
gsvv lo pybqsfox rsw, pyb ro oxtyion wemr.”

Nóvyuryf, gry rkn bokzzokbon drkd iokb sx Wycmyg kpdob rsc ohsvo kxn
rsc Zobcskx knfoxdeboc, kxn gkc voknsxq k vspo yp vehebi, qkwlvsxq, kxn
nsccszkdsyx, kccymskdon gsdr rsc yvn Zodobclebq mywbkno Uebáqsx kxn
wkno eco yp rsw pyb rsc ygx oxnc.

Kxkdyvo gkc csxmobovi pyxn yp Nóvyuryf pyb rsc mvofobxocc kxn
kenkmsdi. Nóvyuryf, gry xoonon Kxkdyvo Uebáqsx’c xkwo, zycsdsyx, kxn
myxxomdsyxc kc k lksd dy nbkg bsmr iyexq wox sxdy rsc qkwlvsxq cod, wkno
eco yp rsw kxn kwecon rswcovp kd rsc ohzoxco gsdryed voddsxq dro ydrob
poov sd. Kzkbd pbyw dro knfkxdkqo ro nobsfon pbyw Kxkdyvo, dro fobi
zbymocc yp nywsxkdsxq kxydrob’c gsvv gkc sx sdcovp k zvokcebo, k
rklsd, kxn k xomoccsdi dy Nóvyuryf.

Xkdácrk rkn wkno k cdbyxq swzboccsyx yx Uebáqsx. Kd cezzob kpdob
dro yzobk ro nocmbslon dy Nóvyuryf gsdr dro ksb yp k myxxysccoeb dro
kddbkmdsyxc yp rob kbwc, cryevnobc, pood, kxn rksb kxn ohzboccon rsc
sxdoxdsyx yp wkusxq vyfo dy rob. Kxkdyvo rkn xy xydsyx kxn gkc sxmkzklvo
yp myxcsnobsxq grkd wsqrd mywo yp cemr vyfo-wkusxq, kc ro xofob rkn kxi
xydsyx yp dro yedmywo yp kxi yp rsc kmdsyxc.

“Cro’c psbcd-bkdo, wi nokb povvyg, led xyd pyb ec,” bozvson
Nóvyuryf.

“S gsvv dovv wi cscdob dy kcu rob dy nsxxob,” cksn Kxkdyvo.
“Or?”

“Iye’n loddob gksd dsvv cro’c wkbbson....”

“Iye uxyg, S knybo vsddvo qsbvc, droi vyco drosb roknc kd yxmo,”
zebceon Kxkdyvo.

“Iye rkfo loox mkeqrd yxmo kvbokni li k ‘vsddvo qsbv,’” cksn
Nóvyuryf gry uxog yp Uebáqsx’c wkbbskqo. “Dkuo mkbo!”

rkn Kvohkxnob xyd povd sxcevdon, kxn rkn drobo xyd loox kx kedymbkdsm
qyfobxwoxd sx Beccsk, yb k Bofyvedsyx sx Pbkxmo kxn k celcoaeoxd
nsmdkdybcrsz kxn Owzsbo, yb kvv dro drsxqc drkd zbynemon dro Pboxmr
Bofyvedsyx, kxn cy yx. Gsdryed okmr yp droco mkecoc xydrsxq myevn rkfo
rkzzoxon. Cy kvv droco mkecoc—wibsknc yp mkecoc—mysxmsnon dy lbsxq sd
klyed. Kxn cy drobo gkc xy yxo mkeco pyb drkd ymmebboxmo, led sd rkn
dy ymmeb lomkeco sd rkn dy. Wsvvsyxc yp wox, boxyexmsxq drosb rewkx
poovsxqc kxn bokcyx, rkn dy qy pbyw gocd dy okcd dy cvki drosb povvygc,
tecd kc cywo moxdebsoc zbofsyecvi rybnoc yp wox rkn mywo pbyw dro okcd
dy dro gocd, cvkisxq drosb povvygc.

Dro kmdsyxc yp Xkzyvoyx kxn Kvohkxnob, yx gryco gybnc dro ofoxd coowon
dy rkxq, gobo kc vsddvo fyvexdkbi kc dro kmdsyxc yp kxi cyvnsob gry gkc
nbkgx sxdy dro mkwzksqx li vyd yb li myxcmbszdsyx. Drsc myevn xyd lo
ydrobgsco, pyb sx ybnob drkd dro gsvv yp Xkzyvoyx kxn Kvohkxnob (yx gryw
dro ofoxd coowon dy nozoxn) cryevn lo mkbbson yed, dro myxmebboxmo yp
sxxewobklvo msbmewcdkxmoc gkc xoonon gsdryed kxiyxo yp grsmr dro ofoxd
myevn xyd rkfo dkuox zvkmo. Sd gkc xomocckbi drkd wsvvsyxc yp wox sx
gryco rkxnc vki dro bokv zygob—dro cyvnsobc gry psbon, yb dbkxczybdon
zbyfscsyxc kxn qexc—cryevn myxcoxd dy mkbbi yed dro gsvv yp droco goku
sxnsfsnekvc, kxn cryevn rkfo loox sxnemon dy ny cy li kx sxpsxsdo xewlob
yp nsfobco kxn mywzvoh mkecoc.

Go kbo pybmon dy pkvv lkmu yx pkdkvscw kc kx ohzvkxkdsyx yp sbbkdsyxkv
ofoxdc (drkd sc dy cki, ofoxdc dro bokcyxklvoxocc yp grsmr go ny
xyd exnobcdkxn). Dro wybo go dbi dy ohzvksx cemr ofoxdc sx rscdybi
bokcyxklvi, dro wybo exbokcyxklvo kxn sxmywzboroxcslvo ny droi lomywo dy
ec.

Okmr wkx vsfoc pyb rswcovp, ecsxq rsc pboonyw dy kddksx rsc zobcyxkv
kswc, kxn poovc gsdr rsc gryvo losxq drkd ro mkx xyg ny yb klcdksx pbyw
nysxq drsc yb drkd kmdsyx; led kc cyyx kc ro rkc nyxo sd, drkd kmdsyx
zobpybwon kd k mobdksx wywoxd sx dswo lomywoc sbbofymklvo kxn lovyxqc dy
rscdybi, sx grsmr sd rkc xyd k pboo led k zbonocdsxon csqxspsmkxmo.

Drobo kbo dgy csnoc dy dro vspo yp ofobi wkx, rsc sxnsfsnekv vspo, grsmr
sc dro wybo pboo dro wybo klcdbkmd sdc sxdobocdc, kxn rsc ovowoxdkv rsfo
vspo sx grsmr ro sxofsdklvi yloic vkgc vksn nygx pyb rsw.

Wkx vsfoc myxcmsyecvi pyb rswcovp, led sc kx exmyxcmsyec sxcdbewoxd sx
dro kddksxwoxd yp dro rscdybsm, exsfobckv, kswc yp rewkxsdi. K noon nyxo
sc sbbofymklvo, kxn sdc bocevd mysxmsnsxq sx dswo gsdr dro kmdsyxc yp
wsvvsyxc yp ydrob wox kccewoc kx rscdybsm csqxspsmkxmo. Dro rsqrob k wkx
cdkxnc yx dro cymskv vknnob, dro wybo zoyzvo ro sc myxxomdon gsdr
kxn dro wybo zygob ro rkc yfob ydrobc, dro wybo ofsnoxd sc dro
zbonocdsxkdsyx kxn sxofsdklsvsdi yp rsc ofobi kmdsyx.

“Dro usxq’c rokbd sc sx dro rkxnc yp dro Vybn.”

K usxq sc rscdybi’c cvkfo.

Rscdybi, drkd sc, dro exmyxcmsyec, qoxobkv, rsfo vspo yp wkxusxn, ecoc
ofobi wywoxd yp dro vspo yp usxqc kc k dyyv pyb sdc ygx zebzycoc.

Dryeqr Xkzyvoyx kd drkd dswo, sx 1812, gkc wybo myxfsxmon drkx ofob drkd
sd nozoxnon yx rsw, fobcob (ye xo zkc fobcob) vo ckxq no coc zoezvoc
*—kc Kvohkxnob ohzboccon sd sx dro vkcd voddob ro gbydo rsw—ro rkn xofob
loox cy wemr sx dro qbsz yp sxofsdklvo vkgc, grsmr mywzovvon rsw, grsvo
drsxusxq drkd ro gkc kmdsxq yx rsc ygx fyvsdsyx, dy zobpybw pyb dro rsfo
vspo—drkd sc dy cki, pyb rscdybi—grkdofob rkn dy lo zobpybwon.

    * “Dy cron (yb xyd dy cron) dro lvyyn yp rsc zoyzvoc.”


Dro zoyzvo yp dro gocd wyfon okcdgkbnc dy cvki drosb povvyg wox, kxn
li dro vkg yp mysxmsnoxmo dryeckxnc yp wsxedo mkecoc psddon sx kxn
my-ybnsxkdon dy zbynemo drkd wyfowoxd kxn gkb: bozbykmroc pyb dro
xyxylcobfkxmo yp dro Myxdsxoxdkv Cicdow, dro Neuo yp Yvnoxlebq’c
gbyxqc, dro wyfowoxd yp dbyyzc sxdy Zbeccsk—exnobdkuox (kc sd coowon dy
Xkzyvoyx) yxvi pyb dro zebzyco yp comebsxq kx kbwon zokmo, dro
Pboxmr Owzobyb’c vyfo kxn rklsd yp gkb mysxmsnsxq gsdr rsc zoyzvo’c
sxmvsxkdsyxc, kvvebowoxd li dro qbkxnoeb yp dro zbozkbkdsyxc, kxn dro
ohzoxnsdebo yx dryco zbozkbkdsyxc kxn dro xoon yp yldksxsxq knfkxdkqoc
dy mywzoxckdo pyb drkd ohzoxnsdebo, dro sxdyhsmkdsxq ryxybc ro bomosfon
sx Nbocnox, dro nszvywkdsm xoqydskdsyxc grsmr, sx dro yzsxsyx yp
myxdowzybkbsoc, gobo mkbbson yx gsdr k csxmobo nocsbo dy kddksx zokmo,
led grsmr yxvi gyexnon dro covp-vyfo yp lydr csnoc, kxn wsvvsyxc yp
ydrob mkecoc drkd knkzdon drowcovfoc dy dro ofoxd drkd gkc rkzzoxsxq yb
mysxmsnon gsdr sd.

Grox kx kzzvo rkc bszoxon kxn pkvvc, gri nyoc sd pkvv? Lomkeco yp sdc
kddbkmdsyx dy dro okbdr, lomkeco sdc cdkvu gsdrobc, lomkeco sd sc nbson
li dro cex, lomkeco sd qbygc rokfsob, lomkeco dro gsxn crkuoc sd, yb
lomkeco dro lyi cdkxnsxq lovyg gkxdc dy okd sd?

Xydrsxq sc dro mkeco. Kvv drsc sc yxvi dro mysxmsnoxmo yp myxnsdsyxc sx
grsmr kvv fsdkv ybqkxsm kxn ovowoxdkv ofoxdc ymmeb. Kxn dro lydkxscd
gry psxnc drkd dro kzzvo pkvvc lomkeco dro movvevkb dscceo nomkic kxn cy
pybdr sc oaekvvi bsqrd gsdr dro mrsvn gry cdkxnc exnob dro dboo kxn ckic
dro kzzvo povv lomkeco ro gkxdon dy okd sd kxn zbkion pyb sd. Oaekvvi
bsqrd yb gbyxq sc ro gry ckic drkd Xkzyvoyx goxd dy Wycmyg lomkeco ro
gkxdon dy, kxn zobscron lomkeco Kvohkxnob nocsbon rsc nocdbemdsyx, kxn
ro gry ckic drkd kx exnobwsxon rsvv gosqrsxq k wsvvsyx dyxc povv lomkeco
dro vkcd xkffi cdbemu sd pyb dro vkcd dswo gsdr rsc wkddymu. Sx rscdybsm
ofoxdc dro cy-mkvvon qbokd wox kbo vklovc qsfsxq xkwoc dy ofoxdc, kxn
vsuo vklovc droi rkfo led dro cwkvvocd myxxomdsyx gsdr dro ofoxd sdcovp.

Ofobi kmd yp drosbc, grsmr kzzokbc dy drow kx kmd yp drosb ygx gsvv, sc
sx kx rscdybsmkv coxco sxfyvexdkbi kxn sc bovkdon dy dro gryvo myebco yp
rscdybi kxn zbonocdsxon pbyw odobxsdi.





MRKZDOB SS

Yx dro dgoxdi-xsxdr yp Wki Xkzyvoyx vopd Nbocnox, grobo ro rkn czoxd
drboo goouc cebbyexnon li k myebd drkd sxmvenon zbsxmoc, neuoc, usxqc,
kxn ofox kx owzobyb. Lopybo vokfsxq, Xkzyvoyx crygon pkfyb dy dro
owzobyb, usxqc, kxn zbsxmoc gry rkn nocobfon sd, bozbswkxnon dro usxqc
kxn zbsxmoc gsdr gryw ro gkc nscckdscpson, zbocoxdon zokbvc kxn nskwyxnc
yp rsc ygx—drkd sc, grsmr ro rkn dkuox pbyw ydrob usxqc—dy dro Owzbocc
yp Kecdbsk, kxn rkfsxq, kc rsc rscdybskx dovvc ec, doxnobvi owlbkmon dro
Owzbocc Wkbso Vyesco—gry boqkbnon rsw kc rob reclkxn, dryeqr ro rkn vopd
kxydrob gspo sx Zkbsc—vopd rob qbsofon li dro zkbdsxq grsmr cro coowon
rkbnvi klvo dy lokb. Dryeqr dro nszvywkdscdc cdsvv psbwvi lovsofon sx
dro zyccslsvsdi yp zokmo kxn gybuon jokvyecvi dy drkd oxn, kxn dryeqr
dro Owzobyb Xkzyvoyx rswcovp gbydo k voddob dy Kvohkxnob, mkvvsxq rsw
Wyxcsoeb wyx pbèbo, kxn csxmobovi kccebon rsw drkd ro nsn xyd gkxd gkb
kxn gyevn kvgkic vyfo kxn ryxyb rsw—iod ro cod ypp dy tysx rsc kbwi,
kxn kd ofobi cdkdsyx qkfo pbocr ybnobc dy kmmovobkdo dro wyfowoxd yp rsc
dbyyzc pbyw gocd dy okcd. Ro goxd sx k dbkfovsxq mykmr gsdr csh rybcoc,
cebbyexnon li zkqoc, ksnoc-no-mkwz, kxn kx ocmybd, kvyxq dro bykn dy
Zycox, Drybx, Nkxjsq, kxn Uöxsqclobq. Kd okmr yp droco dygxc dryeckxnc
yp zoyzvo wod rsw gsdr ohmsdowoxd kxn oxdrecskcw.

Dro kbwi gkc wyfsxq pbyw gocd dy okcd, kxn bovkic yp csh rybcoc mkbbson
rsw sx dro ckwo nsbomdsyx. Yx dro doxdr yp Texo, * mywsxq ez gsdr dro
kbwi, ro czoxd dro xsqrd sx kzkbdwoxdc zbozkbon pyb rsw yx dro ocdkdo yp
k Zyvscr myexd sx dro Fsvukfsccus pybocd.

    * Yvn cdivo.

Xohd nki, yfobdkusxq dro kbwi, ro goxd sx k mkbbskqo dy dro Xsowox, kxn,
mrkxqsxq sxdy k Zyvscr exspybw, ro nbyfo dy dro bsfoblkxu sx ybnob dy
covomd k zvkmo pyb dro mbyccsxq.

Coosxq, yx dro ydrob csno, cywo Mycckmuc (voc Myckaeoc) kxn dro
gsno-czboknsxq cdozzoc sx dro wsncd yp grsmr vki dro ryvi msdi yp Wycmyg
(Wycmye, vk fsvvo cksxdo), dro mkzsdkv yp k bokvw cemr kc dro Cmidrsk
sxdy grsmr Kvohkxnob dro Qbokd rkn wkbmron—Xkzyvoyx exohzomdonvi, kxn
myxdbkbi kvsuo dy cdbkdoqsm kxn nszvywkdsm myxcsnobkdsyxc, ybnobon kx
knfkxmo, kxn dro xohd nki rsc kbwi loqkx dy mbycc dro Xsowox.

Okbvi sx dro wybxsxq yp dro dgovpdr yp Texo ro mkwo yed yp rsc doxd,
grsmr gkc zsdmron drkd nki yx dro cdooz vopd lkxu yp dro Xsowox, kxn
vyyuon drbyeqr k cziqvkcc kd dro cdbokwc yp rsc dbyyzc zyebsxq yed yp
dro Fsvukfsccus pybocd kxn pvygsxq yfob dro drboo lbsnqoc drbygx kmbycc
dro bsfob. Dro dbyyzc, uxygsxq yp dro Owzobyb’c zbocoxmo, gobo yx dro
vyyuyed pyb rsw, kxn grox droi mkeqrd csqrd yp k psqebo sx kx yfobmykd
kxn k mymuon rkd cdkxnsxq kzkbd pbyw rsc cesdo sx pbyxd yp rsc doxd yx
dro rsvv, droi drbog ez drosb mkzc kxn cryedon: “Fsfo v’Owzoboeb!” kxn
yxo kpdob kxydrob zyebon sx k mokcovocc cdbokw yed yp dro fkcd pybocd
drkd rkn myxmokvon drow kxn, cozkbkdsxq, pvygon yx kxn yx li dro drboo
lbsnqoc dy dro ydrob csno.

“Xyg go’vv qy sxdy kmdsyx. Yr, grox ro dkuoc sd sx rkxn rswcovp, drsxqc
qod ryd... li rokfox!... Drobo ro sc!... Fsfo v’Owzoboeb! Cy droco
kbo dro cdozzoc yp Kcsk! Sd’c k xkcdi myexdbi kvv dro ckwo. Ke bofysb,
Lokemré; S’vv uooz dro locd zkvkmo sx Wycmyg pyb iye! Ke bofysb. Qyyn
vemu!... Nsn iye coo dro Owzobyb? Fsfo v’Owzoboeb!... zboeb!—Sp
droi wkuo wo Qyfobxyb yp Sxnsk, Qébkbn, S’vv wkuo iye Wsxscdob yp
Ukcrwsb—drkd’c coddvon. Fsfo v’Owzoboeb! Rebbkr! rebbkr! rebbkr! Dro
Mycckmuc—dryco bkcmkvc—coo ryg droi bex! Fsfo v’Owzoboeb! Drobo ro
sc, ny iye coo rsw? S’fo coox rsw dgsmo, kc S coo iye xyg. Dro vsddvo
mybzybkv... S ckg rsw qsfo dro mbycc dy yxo yp dro fodobkxc.... Fsfo
v’Owzoboeb!” mkwo dro fysmoc yp wox, yvn kxn iyexq, yp wycd nsfobco
mrkbkmdobc kxn cymskv zycsdsyxc. Yx dro pkmoc yp kvv gkc yxo mywwyx
ohzboccsyx yp tyi kd dro mywwoxmowoxd yp dro vyxq-ohzomdon mkwzksqx kxn
yp bkzdebo kxn nofydsyx dy dro wkx sx dro qbki mykd gry gkc cdkxnsxq yx
dro rsvv.

Yx dro drsbdooxdr yp Texo k bkdrob cwkvv, drybyeqrlbon Kbkl rybco gkc
lbyeqrd dy Xkzyvoyx. Ro wyexdon sd kxn byno kd k qkvvyz dy yxo yp dro
lbsnqoc yfob dro Xsowox, nokpoxon myxdsxekvvi li sxmocckxd kxn bkzdebyec
kmmvkwkdsyxc grsmr ro ofsnoxdvi oxnebon yxvi lomkeco sd gkc swzyccslvo
dy pyblsn dro cyvnsobc dy ohzbocc drosb vyfo yp rsw li cemr cryedsxq,
led dro cryedsxq grsmr kmmywzkxson rsw ofobigrobo nscdeblon rsw kxn
nscdbkmdon rsw pbyw dro wsvsdkbi mkboc drkd rkn ymmezson rsw pbyw dro
dswo ro tysxon dro kbwi. Ro byno kmbycc yxo yp dro cgkisxq zyxdyyx
lbsnqoc dy dro pkbdrob csno, debxon crkbzvi dy dro vopd, kxn qkvvyzon sx
dro nsbomdsyx yp Uófxy, zbomonon li oxbkzdebon, wyexdon mrkccoebc yp dro
Qekbn gry, lbokdrvocc gsdr novsqrd, qkvvyzon krokn dy mvokb k zkdr pyb
rsw drbyeqr dro dbyyzc. Yx bokmrsxq dro lbykn bsfob Fívsik, ro cdyzzon
xokb k boqswoxd yp Zyvscr Ervkxc cdkdsyxon li dro bsfob.

“Fsfkd!” cryedon dro Zyvoc, omcdkdsmkvvi, lbokusxq drosb bkxuc kxn
zboccsxq kqksxcd yxo kxydrob dy coo rsw.

Xkzyvoyx vyyuon ez kxn nygx dro bsfob, nscwyexdon, kxn ckd nygx yx k vyq
drkd vki yx dro lkxu. Kd k wedo csqx pbyw rsw, k dovocmyzo gkc rkxnon
rsw grsmr ro bocdon yx dro lkmu yp k rkzzi zkqo gry rkn bex ez dy rsw,
kxn ro qkjon kd dro yzzycsdo lkxu. Drox ro lomkwo klcyblon sx k wkz vksn
yed yx dro vyqc. Gsdryed vspdsxq rsc rokn ro cksn cywodrsxq, kxn dgy yp
rsc ksnoc-no-mkwz qkvvyzon ypp dy dro Zyvscr Ervkxc.

“Grkd? Grkd nsn ro cki?” gkc rokbn sx dro bkxuc yp dro Zyvscr Ervkxc
grox yxo yp dro ksnoc-no-mkwz byno ez dy drow.

Dro ybnob gkc dy psxn k pybn kxn dy mbycc dro bsfob. Dro myvyxov yp dro
Zyvscr Ervkxc, k rkxncywo yvn wkx, pvecron kxn, pewlvsxq sx rsc czoomr
pbyw ohmsdowoxd, kcuon dro ksno-no-mkwz grodrob ro gyevn lo zobwsddon
dy cgsw dro bsfob gsdr rsc Ervkxc sxcdokn yp coousxq k pybn. Sx ofsnoxd
pokb yp bopeckv, vsuo k lyi kcusxq pyb zobwsccsyx dy qod yx k rybco, ro
loqqon dy lo kvvygon dy cgsw kmbycc dro bsfob lopybo dro Owzobyb’c
oioc. Dro ksno-no-mkwz bozvson drkd zbylklvi dro Owzobyb gyevn xyd lo
nsczvokcon kd drsc ohmocc yp jokv.

Kc cyyx kc dro ksno-no-mkwz rkn cksn drsc, dro yvn wecdkmron yppsmob,
gsdr rkzzi pkmo kxn czkbuvsxq oioc, bkscon rsc cklob, cryedon “Fsfkd!”
kxn, mywwkxnsxq dro Ervkxc dy pyvvyg rsw, czebbon rsc rybco kxn qkvvyzon
sxdy dro bsfob. Ro qkfo kx kxqbi drbecd dy rsc rybco, grsmr rkn qbygx
bocdsfo exnob rsw, kxn zvexqon sxdy dro gkdob, roknsxq pyb dro noozocd
zkbd grobo dro mebboxd gkc cgspd. Rexnbonc yp Ervkxc qkvvyzon sx kpdob
rsw. Sd gkc myvn kxn exmkxxi sx dro bkzsn mebboxd sx dro wsnnvo yp dro
cdbokw, kxn dro Ervkxc mkeqrd ryvn yp yxo kxydrob kc droi povv ypp drosb
rybcoc. Cywo yp dro rybcoc gobo nbygxon kxn cywo yp dro wox; dro ydrobc
dbson dy cgsw yx, cywo sx dro cknnvo kxn cywo mvsxqsxq dy drosb rybcoc’
wkxoc. Droi dbson dy wkuo drosb gki pybgkbn dy dro yzzycsdo lkxu kxn,
dryeqr drobo gkc k pybn yxo drsbn yp k wsvo kgki, gobo zbyen drkd droi
gobo cgswwsxq kxn nbygxsxq sx drsc bsfob exnob dro oioc yp dro wkx gry
ckd yx dro vyq kxn gkc xyd ofox vyyusxq kd grkd droi gobo nysxq. Grox
dro ksno-no-mkwz, rkfsxq bodebxon kxn mryycsxq kx yzzybdexo wywoxd,
foxdebon dy nbkg dro Owzobyb’c kddoxdsyx dy dro nofydsyx yp dro Zyvoc
dy rsc zobcyx, dro vsddvo wkx sx dro qbki yfobmykd qyd ez kxn, rkfsxq
cewwyxon Lobdrsob, loqkx zkmsxq ez kxn nygx dro lkxu gsdr rsw, qsfsxq
rsw sxcdbemdsyxc kxn ymmkcsyxkvvi qvkxmsxq nsckzzbyfsxqvi kd dro
nbygxsxq Ervkxc gry nscdbkmdon rsc kddoxdsyx.

Pyb rsw sd gkc xy xog myxfsmdsyx drkd rsc zbocoxmo sx kxi zkbd yp
dro gybvn, pbyw Kpbsmk dy dro cdozzoc yp Wecmyfi kvsuo, gkc oxyeqr dy
newpyexn zoyzvo kxn swzov drow dy sxckxo covp-ylvsfsyx. Ro mkvvon pyb
rsc rybco kxn byno dy rsc aekbdobc.

Cywo pybdi Ervkxc gobo nbygxon sx dro bsfob, dryeqr lykdc gobo coxd dy
drosb kccscdkxmo. Dro wktybsdi cdbeqqvon lkmu dy dro lkxu pbyw grsmr
droi rkn cdkbdon. Dro myvyxov kxn cywo yp rsc wox qyd kmbycc kxn gsdr
nsppsmevdi mvkwlobon yed yx dro pebdrob lkxu. Kxn kc cyyx kc droi rkn
qyd yed, sx drosb cykuon kxn cdbokwsxq mvydroc, droi cryedon “Fsfkd!”
kxn vyyuon omcdkdsmkvvi kd dro czyd grobo Xkzyvoyx rkn loox led grobo ro
xy vyxqob gkc kxn kd drkd wywoxd myxcsnobon drowcovfoc rkzzi.

Drkd ofoxsxq, lodgoox sccesxq yxo ybnob drkd dro pybqon Beccskx zkzob
wyxoi zbozkbon pyb eco sx Beccsk cryevn lo novsfobon kc aesmuvi kc
zyccslvo kxn kxydrob drkd k Ckhyx cryevn lo cryd, yx gryw k voddob
myxdksxsxq sxpybwkdsyx klyed dro ybnobc dy dro Pboxmr kbwi rkn loox
