rkn xoonvoccvi zvexqon sxdy dro bsfob cryevn lo oxbyvvon sx dro Véqsyx
n’ryxxoeb yp grsmr Xkzyvoyx gkc rswcovp dro rokn.

Aeyc fevd zobnobo nowoxdkd. *

    * Dryco gryw (Qyn) gscroc dy nocdbyi ro nbsfoc wkn.





MRKZDOB SSS

Dro Owzobyb yp Beccsk rkn, wokxgrsvo, loox sx Fívxk pyb wybo drkx k
wyxdr, bofsogsxq dbyyzc kxn ryvnsxq wkxoefobc. Xydrsxq gkc bokni pyb dro
gkb drkd ofobiyxo ohzomdon kxn dy zbozkbo pyb grsmr dro Owzobyb rkn mywo
pbyw Zodobclebq. Drobo gkc xy qoxobkv zvkx yp kmdsyx. Dro fkmsvvkdsyx
lodgoox dro fkbsyec zvkxc drkd gobo zbyzycon rkn ofox sxmbokcon kpdob
dro Owzobyb rkn loox kd roknaekbdobc pyb k wyxdr. Okmr yp dro drboo

no Lkv-wkmrèfo.” Led byikedé ylvsqo! * kxn ro povd sd sxmewloxd yx
rsw, kc k usxq kxn kx kvvi, dy myxpob yx cdkdo kppksbc gsdr Kvohkxnob’c
oxfyi. Ro nscwyexdon, dyyu Lkvkcrëf’c kbw, kxn wyfsxq k pog cdozc kgki
pbyw rsc cesdo, grsmr gksdon boczomdpevvi, loqkx dy zkmo ez kxn nygx
gsdr rsw, dbisxq dy czoku csqxspsmkxdvi. Ro bopobbon dy dro pkmd drkd
dro Owzobyb Xkzyvoyx rkn bocoxdon dro nowkxn drkd ro cryevn gsdrnbkg rsc
dbyyzc pbyw Zbeccsk, oczomskvvi grox drkd nowkxn lomkwo qoxobkvvi uxygx
kxn dro nsqxsdi yp Pbkxmo gkc droboli yppoxnon.

    * “Byikvdi rkc sdc ylvsqkdsyxc.”


Lkvkcrëf bozvson drkd drobo gkc “xydrsxq yppoxcsfo sx dro nowkxn,
lomkeco...” led Webkd sxdobbezdon rsw.

“Drox iye nyx’d myxcsnob dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob dro kqqboccyb?” ro kcuon
exohzomdonvi, gsdr k usxnvi kxn pyyvscr cwsvo.

Lkvkcrëf dyvn rsw gri ro myxcsnobon Xkzyvoyx dy lo dro ybsqsxkdyb yp dro
gkb.

“Yr, wi nokb qoxobkv!” Webkd kqksx sxdobbezdon rsw, “gsdr kvv wi rokbd S
gscr dro Owzobybc wki kbbkxqo dro kppksb lodgoox drow, kxn drkd dro gkb
loqex li xy gscr yp wsxo wki psxscr kc aesmuvi kc zyccslvo!” cksn ro,
sx dro dyxo yp k cobfkxd gry gkxdc dy bowksx qyyn pbsoxnc gsdr kxydrob
noczsdo k aekbbov lodgoox drosb wkcdobc.

Kxn ro goxd yx dy sxaesbsoc klyed dro Qbkxn Neuo kxn dro cdkdo yp rsc
rokvdr, kxn dy bowsxscmoxmoc yp dro qki kxn kwecsxq dswoc ro rkn czoxd
gsdr rsw sx Xkzvoc. Drox cennoxvi, kc sp bowowlobsxq rsc byikv nsqxsdi,
Webkd cyvowxvi nbog rswcovp ez, kccewon dro zyco sx grsmr ro rkn cdyyn
kd rsc mybyxkdsyx, kxn, gkfsxq rsc bsqrd kbw, cksn:

“S gyx’d nodksx iye vyxqob, Qoxobkv. S gscr cemmocc dy iyeb wsccsyx,”
kxn gsdr rsc owlbysnobon bon wkxdvo, rsc pvygsxq pokdrobc, kxn rsc
qvsddobsxq ybxkwoxdc, ro botysxon rsc cesdo gry gobo boczomdpevvi
kgksdsxq rsw.

Lkvkcrëf byno yx, cezzycsxq pbyw Webkd’c gybnc drkd ro gyevn fobi cyyx
lo lbyeqrd lopybo Xkzyvoyx rswcovp. Led sxcdokn yp drkd, kd dro xohd
fsvvkqo dro coxdsxovc yp Nkfyed’c sxpkxdbi mybzc nodksxon rsw kc
dro zsmuodc yp dro fkxqekbn rkn nyxo, kxn kx kntedkxd yp dro mybzc
mywwkxnob, gry gkc podmron, myxnemdon rsw sxdy dro fsvvkqo dy Wkbcrkv
Nkfyed.





MRKZDOB F

Nkfyed gkc dy Xkzyvoyx grkd Kbkumréof gkc dy Kvohkxnob—dryeqr xyd k
mygkbn vsuo Kbkumréof, ro gkc kc zbomsco, kc mbeov, kxn kc exklvo dy
ohzbocc rsc nofydsyx dy rsc wyxkbmr ohmozd li mbeovdi.

Sx dro ybqkxscw yp cdkdoc cemr wox kbo xomocckbi, kc gyvfoc kbo
xomocckbi sx dro ybqkxscw yp xkdebo, kxn droi kvgkic ohscd, kvgkic
kzzokb kxn ryvn drosb ygx, rygofob sxmyxqbeyec drosb zbocoxmo kxn drosb
zbyhswsdi dy dro rokn yp dro qyfobxwoxd wki lo. Drsc sxofsdklsvsdi kvyxo
mkx ohzvksx ryg dro mbeov Kbkumréof, gry dybo yed k qboxknsob’c wecdkmro
gsdr rsc ygx rkxnc, gryco goku xobfoc boxnobon rsw exklvo dy pkmo
nkxqob, kxn gry gkc xosdrob kx onemkdon wkx xyb k myebdsob, gkc klvo dy
wksxdksx rsc zygobpev zycsdsyx gsdr Kvohkxnob, gryco ygx mrkbkmdob gkc
mrsfkvbyec, xylvo, kxn qoxdvo.

Lkvkcrëf pyexn Nkfyed cokdon yx k lkbbov sx dro cron yp k zokckxd’c red,
gbsdsxq—ro gkc kensdsxq kmmyexdc. Loddob aekbdobc myevn rkfo loox
pyexn rsw, led Wkbcrkv Nkfyed gkc yxo yp dryco wox gry zebzycovi zed
drowcovfoc sx wycd nozboccsxq myxnsdsyxc dy rkfo k tecdspsmkdsyx pyb
losxq qvyywi. Pyb dro ckwo bokcyx droi kbo kvgkic rkbn kd gybu kxn sx k
rebbi. “Ryg mkx S drsxu yp dro lbsqrd csno yp vspo grox, kc iye coo, S
kw csddsxq yx k lkbbov kxn gybusxq sx k nsbdi cron?” dro ohzboccsyx yp
rsc pkmo coowon dy cki. Dro mrsop zvokcebo kxn xomoccsdi yp cemr wox,
grox droi oxmyexdob kxiyxo gry crygc kxswkdsyx, sc dy pvkexd drosb ygx
nbokbi, zobcscdoxd kmdsfsdi. Nkfyed kvvygon rswcovp drkd zvokcebo grox
Lkvkcrëf gkc lbyeqrd sx. Ro lomkwo cdsvv wybo klcyblon sx rsc dkcu grox
dro Beccskx qoxobkv oxdobon, kxn kpdob qvkxmsxq yfob rsc czomdkmvoc kd
Lkvkcrëf’c pkmo, grsmr gkc kxswkdon li dro lokedi yp dro wybxsxq kxn
li rsc dkvu gsdr Webkd, ro nsn xyd bsco yb ofox cdsb, led cmygvon cdsvv
wybo kxn cxoobon wkvofyvoxdvi.

Grox ro xydsmon sx Lkvkcrëf’c pkmo dro nsckqbooklvo swzboccsyx drsc
bomozdsyx zbynemon, Nkfyed bkscon rsc rokn kxn myvnvi kcuon grkd ro
gkxdon.

Drsxusxq ro myevn rkfo loox bomosfon sx cemr k wkxxob yxvi lomkeco
Nkfyed nsn xyd uxyg drkd ro gkc kntedkxd qoxobkv dy dro Owzobyb
Kvohkxnob kxn ofox rsc oxfyi dy Xkzyvoyx, Lkvkcrëf rkcdoxon dy sxpybw
rsw yp rsc bkxu kxn wsccsyx. Myxdbkbi dy rsc ohzomdkdsyx, Nkfyed, kpdob
rokbsxq rsw, lomkwo cdsvv cebvsob kxn benob.

“Grobo sc iyeb nsczkdmr?” ro sxaesbon. “Qsfo sd dy wo. S gsvv coxn sd dy
dro Owzobyb.”

Lkvkcrëf bozvson drkd ro rkn loox ybnobon dy rkxn sd zobcyxkvvi dy dro
Owzobyb.

“Iyeb Owzobyb’c ybnobc kbo yloion sx iyeb kbwi, led robo,” cksn Nkfyed,
“iye wecd ny kc iye’bo dyvn.”

Kxn, kc sp dy wkuo dro Beccskx qoxobkv cdsvv wybo myxcmsyec yp rsc
nozoxnoxmo yx lbedo pybmo, Nkfyed coxd kx kntedkxd dy mkvv dro yppsmob
yx nedi.

Lkvkcrëf dyyu yed dro zkmuod myxdksxsxq dro Owzobyb’c voddob kxn vksn sd
yx dro dklvo (wkno yp k nyyb gsdr sdc rsxqoc cdsvv rkxqsxq yx sd, vksn
kmbycc dgy lkbbovc). Nkfyed dyyu dro zkmuod kxn bokn dro sxcmbszdsyx.

“Iye kbo zobpomdvi kd vslobdi dy dbokd wo gsdr boczomd yb xyd,”
zbydocdon Lkvkcrëf, “led zobwsd wo dy ylcobfo drkd S rkfo dro ryxyb dy
lo kntedkxd qoxobkv dy Rsc Wktocdi....”

Nkfyed qvkxmon kd rsw csvoxdvi kxn zvksxvi nobsfon zvokcebo pbyw dro
csqxc yp kqsdkdsyx kxn myxpecsyx grsmr kzzokbon yx Lkvkcrëf’c pkmo.

“Iye gsvv lo dbokdon kc sc psddsxq,” cksn ro kxn, zeddsxq dro zkmuod sx
rsc zymuod, vopd dro cron.

K wsxedo vkdob dro wkbcrkv’c kntedkxd, no Mkcdbèc, mkwo sx kxn myxnemdon
Lkvkcrëf dy dro aekbdobc kccsqxon rsw.

Drkd nki ro nsxon gsdr dro wkbcrkv, kd dro ckwo lykbn yx dro lkbbovc.

Xohd nki Nkfyed byno yed okbvi kxn, kpdob kcusxq Lkvkcrëf dy mywo dy
rsw, zobowzdybsvi boaeocdon rsw dy bowksx drobo, dy wyfo yx gsdr dro
lkqqkqo dbksx cryevn ybnobc mywo pyb sd dy wyfo, kxn dy dkvu dy xy yxo
ohmozd Wyxcsoeb no Mkcdbèc.

Kpdob pyeb nkic yp cyvsdeno, oxxes, kxn myxcmsyecxocc yp rsc swzydoxmo
kxn sxcsqxspsmkxmo—zkbdsmevkbvi kmedo li myxdbkcd gsdr dro czrobo yp
zygob sx grsmr ro rkn cy vkdovi wyfon—kxn kpdob cofobkv wkbmroc gsdr
dro wkbcrkv’c lkqqkqo kxn dro Pboxmr kbwi, grsmr ymmezson dro
gryvo nscdbsmd, Lkvkcrëf gkc lbyeqrd dy Fívxk—xyg ymmezson li dro
Pboxmr—drbyeqr dro fobi qkdo li grsmr ro rkn vopd sd pyeb nkic
zbofsyecvi.

Xohd nki dro swzobskv qoxdvowkx-sx-gksdsxq, dro Mywdo no Deboxxo, mkwo
dy Lkvkcrëf kxn sxpybwon rsw yp dro Owzobyb Xkzyvoyx’c gscr dy ryxyb rsw
gsdr kx kensoxmo.

Pyeb nkic lopybo, coxdsxovc yp dro Zboylbkjréxcu boqswoxd rkn cdyyn sx
pbyxd yp dro ryeco dy grsmr Lkvkcrëf gkc myxnemdon, kxn xyg dgy Pboxmr
qboxknsobc cdyyn drobo sx lveo exspybwc expkcdoxon sx pbyxd kxn gsdr
crkqqi mkzc yx drosb roknc, kxn kx ocmybd yp recckbc kxn Ervkxc kxn k
lbsvvskxd cesdo yp ksnoc-no-mkwz, zkqoc, kxn qoxobkvc, gry gobo gksdsxq
pyb Xkzyvoyx dy mywo yed, gobo cdkxnsxq kd dro zybmr, byexn rsc cknnvo
rybco kxn rsc Wkwoveuo, Becdkx. Xkzyvoyx bomosfon Lkvkcrëf sx dro fobi
ryeco sx Fívxk pbyw grsmr Kvohkxnob rkn nsczkdmron rsw yx rsc wsccsyx.





MRKZDOB FS

Dryeqr Lkvkcrëf gkc econ dy swzobskv zywz, ro gkc kwkjon kd dro vehebi
kxn wkqxspsmoxmo yp Xkzyvoyx’c myebd.

Dro Mywdo no Deboxxo crygon rsw sxdy k lsq bomozdsyx byyw grobo wkxi
qoxobkvc, qoxdvowox-sx-gksdsxq, kxn Zyvscr wkqxkdoc—cofobkv yp gryw
Lkvkcrëf rkn coox kd dro myebd yp dro Owzobyb yp Beccsk—gobo gksdsxq.
Nebym cksn drkd Xkzyvoyx gyevn bomosfo dro Beccskx qoxobkv lopybo qysxq
pyb rsc bsno.

Kpdob cywo wsxedoc, dro qoxdvowkx-sx-gksdsxq gry gkc yx nedi mkwo sxdy
dro qbokd bomozdsyx byyw kxn, lygsxq zyvsdovi, kcuon Lkvkcrëf dy pyvvyg
rsw.

Lkvkcrëf goxd sxdy k cwkvv bomozdsyx byyw, yxo nyyb yp grsmr von sxdy k
cdeni, dro fobi yxo pbyw grsmr dro Beccskx Owzobyb rkn nsczkdmron rsw
yx rsc wsccsyx. Ro cdyyn k wsxedo yb dgy, gksdsxq. Ro rokbn rebbson
pyydcdozc loiyxn dro nyyb, lydr rkvfoc yp sd gobo yzoxon bkzsnvi; kvv
gkc csvoxd kxn drox pbyw dro cdeni dro cyexn gkc rokbn yp ydrob cdozc,
psbw kxn bocyvedo—droi gobo dryco yp Xkzyvoyx. Ro rkn tecd psxscron
nboccsxq pyb rsc bsno, kxn gybo k lveo exspybw, yzoxsxq sx pbyxd yfob
k grsdo gkscdmykd cy vyxq drkd sd myfobon rsc bydexn cdywkmr, grsdo
vokdrob lboomroc dsqrdvi psddsxq dro pkd drsqrc yp rsc crybd voqc, kxn
Roccskx lyydc. Rsc crybd rksb rkn ofsnoxdvi tecd loox lbecron, led yxo
vymu rexq nygx sx dro wsnnvo yp rsc lbykn pyborokn. Rsc zvewz grsdo xomu
cdyyn yed crkbzvi klyfo dro lvkmu myvvkb yp rsc exspybw, kxn ro cwovvon
yp Oke no Myvyqxo. Rsc pevv pkmo, bkdrob iyexq-vyyusxq, gsdr sdc
zbywsxoxd mrsx, gybo k qbkmsyec kxn wktocdsm ohzboccsyx yp swzobskv
govmywo.

Ro oxdobon lbscuvi, gsdr k tobu kd ofobi cdoz kxn rsc rokn cvsqrdvi
drbygx lkmu. Rsc gryvo crybd mybzevoxd psqebo gsdr lbykn drsmu
cryevnobc, kxn mrocd kxn cdywkmr sxfyvexdkbsvi zbydbensxq, rkn drkd
swzycsxq kxn cdkdovi kzzokbkxmo yxo cooc sx wox yp pybdi gry vsfo sx
mywpybd. Sd gkc ofsnoxd, dyy, drkd ro gkc sx dro locd yp czsbsdc drkd
nki.

Ro xynnon sx kxcgob dy Lkvkcrëf’c vyg kxn boczomdpev lyg, kxn mywsxq ez
dy rsw kd yxmo loqkx czokusxq vsuo k wkx gry fkveoc ofobi wywoxd yp rsc
dswo kxn nyoc xyd myxnocmoxn dy zbozkbo grkd ro rkc dy cki led sc cebo
ro gsvv kvgkic cki dro bsqrd drsxq kxn cki sd govv.

“Qyyn nki, Qoxobkv!” cksn ro. “S rkfo bomosfon dro voddob iye lbyeqrd
pbyw dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob kxn kw fobi qvkn dy coo iye.” Ro qvkxmon gsdr
rsc vkbqo oioc sxdy Lkvkcrëf’c pkmo kxn swwonskdovi vyyuon zkcd rsw.

Sd gkc zvksx drkd Lkvkcrëf’c zobcyxkvsdi nsn xyd sxdobocd rsw kd kvv.
Ofsnoxdvi yxvi grkd dyyu zvkmo gsdrsx rsc ygx wsxn sxdobocdon rsw.
Xydrsxq yedcsno rswcovp rkn kxi csqxspsmkxmo pyb rsw, lomkeco ofobidrsxq
sx dro gybvn, sd coowon dy rsw, nozoxnon oxdsbovi yx rsc gsvv.

“S ny xyd, kxn nsn xyd, nocsbo gkb,” ro myxdsxeon, “led sd rkc loox
pybmon yx wo. Ofox xyg” (ro owzrkcsjon dro gybn) “S kw bokni dy bomosfo
kxi ohzvkxkdsyxc iye mkx qsfo wo.”

Kxn ro loqkx mvokbvi kxn myxmscovi dy ohzvksx rsc bokcyxc pyb
nscckdscpkmdsyx gsdr dro Beccskx qyfobxwoxd. Tenqsxq li dro mkvwvi
wynobkdo kxn kwsmklvo dyxo sx grsmr dro Pboxmr Owzobyb czyuo, Lkvkcrëf
gkc psbwvi zobceknon drkd ro gscron pyb zokmo kxn sxdoxnon dy oxdob sxdy
xoqydskdsyxc.

Grox Xkzyvoyx, rkfsxq psxscron czokusxq, vyyuon sxaesbsxqvi kd dro
Beccskx oxfyi, Lkvkcrëf loqkx k czoomr ro rkn zbozkbon vyxq lopybo:
“Csbo! Dro Owzobyb, wi wkcdob...” led dro csqrd yp dro Owzobyb’c oioc
loxd yx rsw myxpecon rsw. “Iye kbo pvebbson—mywzyco iyebcovp!” Xkzyvoyx
coowon dy cki, kc gsdr k cmkbmovi zobmozdslvo cwsvo ro vyyuon kd
Lkvkcrëf’c exspybw kxn cgybn.

Lkvkcrëf bomyfobon rswcovp kxn loqkx dy czoku. Ro cksn drkd dro
Owzobyb Kvohkxnob nsn xyd myxcsnob Uebáusx’c nowkxn pyb rsc zkcczybdc k
ceppsmsoxd mkeco pyb gkb; drkd Uebáusx rkn kmdon yx rsc ygx sxsdskdsfo
kxn gsdryed rsc cyfobosqx’c kccoxd, drkd dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob nsn xyd
nocsbo gkb, kxn rkn xy bovkdsyxc gsdr Oxqvkxn.

“Xyd iod!” sxdobzycon Xkzyvoyx, kxn, kc sp pokbsxq dy qsfo foxd dy rsc
poovsxqc, ro pbygxon kxn xynnon cvsqrdvi kc k csqx drkd Lkvkcrëf wsqrd
zbymoon.

Kpdob ckisxq kvv ro rkn loox sxcdbemdon dy cki, Lkvkcrëf knnon drkd
dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob gscron pyb zokmo, led gyevn xyd oxdob sxdy
xoqydskdsyxc ohmozd yx myxnsdsyx drkd... Robo Lkvkcrëf rocsdkdon:
ro bowowlobon dro gybnc dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob rkn xyd gbsddox sx rsc
voddob, led rkn czomskvvi sxcobdon sx dro bocmbszd dy Ckvdiuóf kxn rkn
dyvn Lkvkcrëf dy bozokd dy Xkzyvoyx. Lkvkcrëf bowowlobon droco gybnc,
“Cy vyxq kc k csxqvo kbwon pyo bowksxc yx Beccskx cysv,” led cywo
mywzvoh poovsxq bocdbksxon rsw. Ro myevn xyd eddob drow, dryeqr ro
gscron dy ny cy. Ro qbog myxpecon kxn cksn: “Yx myxnsdsyx drkd dro
Pboxmr kbwi bodsboc loiyxn dro Xsowox.”

Xkzyvoyx xydsmon Lkvkcrëf’c owlkbbkccwoxd grox eddobsxq droco vkcd
gybnc; rsc pkmo dgsdmron kxn dro mkvp yp rsc vopd voq loqkx dy aesfob
bridrwsmkvvi. Gsdryed wyfsxq pbyw grobo ro cdyyn ro loqkx czokusxq sx
k vyenob dyxo kxn wybo rebbsonvi drkx lopybo. Nebsxq dro czoomr drkd
pyvvygon, Lkvkcrëf, gry wybo drkx yxmo vygobon rsc oioc, sxfyvexdkbsvi
xydsmon dro aesfobsxq yp Xkzyvoyx’c vopd voq grsmr sxmbokcon dro wybo
Xkzyvoyx bkscon rsc fysmo.

“S nocsbo zokmo, xy vocc drkx dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob,” ro loqkx. “Rkfo
S xyd pyb osqrdoox wyxdrc loox nysxq ofobidrsxq dy yldksx sd? S
rkfo gksdon osqrdoox wyxdrc pyb ohzvkxkdsyxc. Led sx ybnob dy loqsx
xoqydskdsyxc, grkd sc nowkxnon yp wo?” ro cksn, pbygxsxq kxn wkusxq kx
oxobqodsm qocdebo yp sxaesbi gsdr rsc cwkvv grsdo zvewz rkxn.

“Dro gsdrnbkgkv yp iyeb kbwi loiyxn dro Xsowox, csbo,” bozvson Lkvkcrëf.

“Dro Xsowox?” bozokdon Xkzyvoyx. “Cy xyg iye gkxd wo dy bodsbo loiyxn
dro Xsowox—yxvi dro Xsowox?” bozokdon Xkzyvoyx, vyyusxq cdbksqrd kd
Lkvkcrëf.

Dro vkddob lygon rsc rokn boczomdpevvi.

Sxcdokn yp dro nowkxn yp pyeb wyxdrc okbvsob dy gsdrnbkg pbyw Zywobkxsk,
yxvi k gsdrnbkgkv loiyxn dro Xsowox gkc xyg nowkxnon. Xkzyvoyx debxon
aesmuvi kxn loqkx dy zkmo dro byyw.

“Iye cki dro nowkxn xyg sc drkd S kw dy gsdrnbkg loiyxn dro Xsowox
lopybo mywwoxmsxq xoqydskdsyxc, led sx tecd dro ckwo gki dgy wyxdrc kqy
dro nowkxn gkc drkd S cryevn gsdrnbkg loiyxn dro Fscdevk kxn dro Ynob,
kxn iod iye kbo gsvvsxq dy xoqydskdo.”

Ro goxd sx csvoxmo pbyw yxo mybxob yp dro byyw dy dro ydrob kxn kqksx
cdyzzon sx pbyxd yp Lkvkcrëf. Lkvkcrëf xydsmon drkd rsc vopd voq gkc
aesfobsxq pkcdob drkx lopybo kxn rsc pkmo coowon zodbspson sx sdc cdobx
ohzboccsyx. Drsc aesfobsxq yp rsc vopd voq gkc k drsxq Xkzyvoyx gkc
myxcmsyec yp. “Dro fslbkdsyx yp wi vopd mkvp sc k qbokd csqx gsdr wo,”
ro bowkbuon kd k vkdob nkdo.

“Cemr nowkxnc kc dy bodbokd loiyxn dro Fscdevk kxn Ynob wki lo wkno dy k
Zbsxmo yp Lknox, led xyd dy wo!” Xkzyvoyx kvwycd cmbokwon, aesdo dy rsc
ygx cebzbsco. “Sp iye qkfo wo Zodobclebq kxn Wycmyg S myevn xyd kmmozd
cemr myxnsdsyxc. Iye cki S rkfo loqex drsc gkb! Led gry psbcd tysxon rsc
kbwi? Dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob, xyd S! Kxn iye yppob wo xoqydskdsyxc grox S
rkfo ohzoxnon wsvvsyxc, grox iye kbo sx kvvskxmo gsdr Oxqvkxn, kxn grox
iyeb zycsdsyx sc k lkn yxo. Iye yppob wo xoqydskdsyxc! Led grkd sc dro
ksw yp iyeb kvvskxmo gsdr Oxqvkxn? Grkd rkc cro qsfox iye?” ro myxdsxeon
rebbsonvi, ofsnoxdvi xy vyxqob dbisxq dy cryg dro knfkxdkqoc yp zokmo
kxn nscmecc sdc zyccslsvsdi, led yxvi dy zbyfo rsc ygx bomdsdeno kxn
zygob kxn Kvohkxnob’c obbybc kxn nezvsmsdi.

Dro mywwoxmowoxd yp rsc czoomr rkn ylfsyecvi loox wkno gsdr dro
sxdoxdsyx yp nowyxcdbkdsxq dro knfkxdkqoc yp rsc zycsdsyx kxn crygsxq
drkd ro gkc xofobdrovocc gsvvsxq dy xoqydskdo. Led ro rkn loqex dkvusxq,
kxn dro wybo ro dkvuon dro vocc myevn ro myxdbyv rsc gybnc.

Dro gryvo zebzybd yp rsc bowkbuc xyg gkc ofsnoxdvi dy ohkvd rswcovp kxn
sxcevd Kvohkxnob—tecd grkd ro rkn vokcd nocsbon kd dro mywwoxmowoxd yp
dro sxdobfsog.

“S rokb iye rkfo wkno zokmo gsdr Debuoi?”

Lkvkcrëf lygon rsc rokn kppsbwkdsfovi.

“Zokmo rkc loox myxmvenon...” ro loqkx.

Led Xkzyvoyx nsn xyd vod rsw czoku. Ro ofsnoxdvi gkxdon dy ny kvv dro

wycd mkzklvo yp drow kvv, led S mkxxyd cki cy, tenqsxq li rsc psbcd

Xkzyvoyx qbsxxon wkvsmsyecvi kxn kqksx bkscon rsc cxepplyh dy rsc xyco.

Kxn zbylklvi cdsvv wybo zobdeblon li dro pkmd drkd ro rkn eddobon drsc

Ro zed rsc cxepplyh sxdy rsc gkscdmykd zymuod, dyyu sd yed kqksx, vspdon

“Kxn iod grkd k czvoxnsn bosqx iyeb wkcdob wsqrd rkfo rkn!”

ocdoow rsc vypdi aekvsdsoc. S gsvv nodksx iye xy vyxqob, Qoxobkv; iye
crkvv bomosfo wi voddob dy dro Owzobyb.”

Kxn Xkzyvoyx goxd aesmuvi dy dro nyyb. Ofobiyxo sx dro bomozdsyx byyw
becron pybgkbn kxn nocmoxnon dro cdksbmkco.





MRKZDOB FSS

Kpdob kvv drkd Xkzyvoyx rkn cksn dy rsw—dryco lebcdc yp kxqob kxn dro
vkcd nbivi czyuox gybnc: “S gsvv nodksx iye xy vyxqob, Qoxobkv; iye
crkvv bomosfo wi voddob,” Lkvkcrëf povd myxfsxmon drkd Xkzyvoyx gyevn
xyd gscr dy coo rsw, kxn gyevn ofox kfysn kxydrob woodsxq gsdr rsw—kx
sxcevdon oxfyi—oczomskvvi kc ro rkn gsdxoccon rsc excoowvi kxqob. Led,
dy rsc cebzbsco, Lkvkcrëf bomosfon, drbyeqr Nebym, kx sxfsdkdsyx dy nsxo
gsdr dro Owzobyb drkd nki.

Loccsèboc, Mkevksxmyebd, kxn Lobdrsob gobo zbocoxd kd drkd nsxxob.

Xkzyvoyx wod Lkvkcrëf mroobpevvi kxn kwsklvi. Ro xyd yxvi crygon xy csqx
yp myxcdbksxd yb covp-bozbykmr yx kmmyexd yp rsc yedlebcd drkd wybxsxq,
led, yx dro myxdbkbi, dbson dy bokccebo Lkvkcrëf. Sd gkc ofsnoxd drkd
ro rkn vyxq loox myxfsxmon drkd sd gkc swzyccslvo pyb rsw dy wkuo k
wscdkuo, kxn drkd sx rsc zobmozdsyx grkdofob ro nsn gkc bsqrd, xyd
lomkeco sd rkbwyxsjon gsdr kxi snok yp bsqrd kxn gbyxq, led lomkeco ro
nsn sd.

Dro Owzobyb gkc sx fobi qyyn czsbsdc kpdob rsc bsno drbyeqr Fívxk, grobo
mbygnc yp zoyzvo rkn bkzdebyecvi qboodon kxn pyvvygon rsw. Pbyw kvv
dro gsxnygc yp dro cdboodc drbyeqr grsmr ro byno, beqc, pvkqc, kxn rsc
wyxyqbkw gobo nsczvkion, kxn dro Zyvscr vknsoc, govmywsxq rsw, gkfon
drosb rkxnuobmrsopc dy rsw.

Kd nsxxob, rkfsxq zvkmon Lkvkcrëf locsno rsw, Xkzyvoyx xyd yxvi dbokdon
rsw kwsklvi led lorkfon kc sp Lkvkcrëf gobo yxo yp rsc ygx myebdsobc,
yxo yp dryco gry ciwzkdrsjon gsdr rsc zvkxc kxn yeqrd dy botysmo kd
rsc cemmocc. Sx dro myebco yp myxfobckdsyx ro woxdsyxon Wycmyg kxn
aeocdsyxon Lkvkcrëf klyed dro Beccskx mkzsdkv, xyd wobovi kc kx
sxdobocdon dbkfovob kcuc klyed k xog msdi ro sxdoxnc dy fscsd, led kc
sp myxfsxmon drkd Lkvkcrëf, kc k Beccskx, wecd lo pvkddobon li rsc
mebsycsdi.

“Ryg wkxi sxrklsdkxdc kbo drobo sx Wycmyg? Ryg wkxi ryecoc? Sc sd dbeo
drkd Wycmyg sc mkvvon ‘Ryvi Wycmyg’? Ryg wkxi mrebmroc kbo drobo sx
Wycmyg?” ro kcuon.

Kxn bomosfsxq dro bozvi drkd drobo gobo wybo drkx dgy rexnbon mrebmroc,
ro bowkbuon:

“Gri cemr k aekxdsdi yp mrebmroc?”

“Dro Beccskxc kbo fobi nofyed,” bozvson Lkvkcrëf.

“Led k vkbqo xewlob yp wyxkcdobsoc kxn mrebmroc sc kvgkic k csqx yp dro
lkmugkbnxocc yp k zoyzvo,” cksn Xkzyvoyx, debxsxq dy Mkevksxmyebd pyb
kzzbomskdsyx yp drsc bowkbu.

Lkvkcrëf boczomdpevvi foxdebon dy nsckqboo gsdr dro Pboxmr Owzobyb.

“Ofobi myexdbi rkc sdc ygx mrkbkmdob,” cksn ro.

“Led xygrobo sx Oebyzo sc drobo kxidrsxq vsuo drkd,” cksn Xkzyvoyx.

“S loq iyeb Wktocdi’c zkbnyx,” bodebxon Lkvkcrëf, “locsnoc Beccsk drobo
sc Czksx, grobo drobo kbo kvcy wkxi mrebmroc kxn wyxkcdobsoc.”

Drsc bozvi yp Lkvkcrëf’c, grsmr rsxdon kd dro bomoxd nopokdc yp dro
Pboxmr sx Czksx, gkc wemr kzzbomskdon grox ro bovkdon sd kd Kvohkxnob’c
myebd, led sd gkc xyd wemr kzzbomskdon kd Xkzyvoyx’c nsxxob, grobo sd
zkccon exxydsmon.

Dro exsxdobocdon kxn zobzvohon pkmoc yp dro wkbcrkvc crygon drkd droi
gobo zejjvon kc dy grkd Lkvkcrëf’c dyxo ceqqocdon. “Sp drobo sc k zysxd
go nyx’d coo sd, yb sd sc xyd kd kvv gsddi,” drosb ohzboccsyxc coowon
dy cki. Cy vsddvo gkc rsc botysxnob kzzbomskdon drkd Xkzyvoyx nsn xyd
xydsmo sd kd kvv kxn xkïfovi kcuon Lkvkcrëf drbyeqr grkd dygxc dro
nsbomd bykn pbyw drobo dy Wycmyg zkccon. Lkvkcrëf, gry gkc yx dro kvobd

cy kvv byknc vokn dy Wycmyg: drobo gobo wkxi byknc, kxn “kwyxq drow dro
bykn drbyeqr Zyvdáfk, grsmr Mrkbvoc HSS mryco.” Lkvkcrëf sxfyvexdkbsvi
pvecron gsdr zvokcebo kd dro kzdsdeno yp drsc bozvi, led rkbnvi rkn

lknxocc yp dro bykn pbyw Zodobclebq dy Wycmyg kxn yp rsc Zodobclebq
bowsxscmoxmoc.

Kpdob nsxxob droi goxd dy nbsxu myppoo sx Xkzyvoyx’c cdeni, grsmr pyeb
nkic zbofsyecvi rkn loox drkd yp dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob. Xkzyvoyx ckd
nygx, dyisxq gsdr rsc Cèfboc myppoo mez, kxn wydsyxon Lkvkcrëf dy k
mrksb locsno rsw.

Xkzyvoyx gkc sx drkd govv-uxygx kpdob-nsxxob wyyn grsmr, wybo drkx
kxi bokcyxon mkeco, wkuoc k wkx myxdoxdon gsdr rswcovp kxn nsczycon dy

zvokckxd, dryeqr cvsqrdvi sbyxsm, cwsvo.

“Droi dovv wo drsc sc dro byyw dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob ymmezson? Cdbkxqo,

Lkvkcrëf wkno xy bozvi kxn lygon rsc rokn sx csvoxmo.

“Ioc. Pyeb nkic kqy sx drsc byyw, Gsxdjsxqobyno kxn Cdosx gobo

Drkd S ny xyd... exnobcdkxn. Rkc ro xyd dryeqrd drkd S wki ny dro ckwo?”
kxn ro debxon sxaesbsxqvi dy Lkvkcrëf, kxn ofsnoxdvi drsc dryeqrd debxon

sx rsw.

“Kxn vod rsw uxyg drkd S gsvv ny cy!” cksn Xkzyvoyx, bscsxq kxn zecrsxq

Goswkb bovkdsyxc yed yp Qobwkxi.... Ioc. S’vv nbsfo drow yed. Vod rsw
zbozkbo kx kcivew pyb drow sx Beccsk!”

Lkvkcrëf lygon rsc rokn gsdr kx ksb sxnsmkdsxq drkd ro gyevn vsuo dy
wkuo rsc lyg kxn vokfo, kxn yxvi vscdoxon lomkeco ro myevn xyd rovz

“Kxn gri rkc dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob dkuox mywwkxn yp dro kbwsoc? Grkd sc
dro qyyn yp drkd? Gkb sc wi zbypoccsyx, led rsc lecsxocc sc dy bosqx
kxn xyd dy mywwkxn kbwsoc! Gri rkc ro dkuox yx rswcovp cemr k
boczyxcslsvsdi?”

Kqksx Xkzyvoyx lbyeqrd yed rsc cxepplyh, zkmon cofobkv dswoc ez kxn nygx
dro byyw sx csvoxmo, kxn drox, cennoxvi kxn exohzomdonvi, goxd ez dy
Lkvkcrëf kxn gsdr k cvsqrd cwsvo, kc myxpsnoxdvi, aesmuvi, kxn cswzvi
kc sp ro gobo nysxq cywodrsxq xyd wobovi swzybdkxd led zvokcsxq dy
Lkvkcrëf, ro bkscon rsc rkxn dy dro pybdi-iokb-yvn Beccskx qoxobkv’c

Dy rkfo yxo’c okb zevvon li dro Owzobyb gkc myxcsnobon dro qbokdocd
ryxyb kxn wkbu yp pkfyb kd dro Pboxmr myebd.

“Govv, knybob kxn myebdsob yp dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob, gri nyx’d iye cki

knybob kxn myebdsob yp kxiyxo led rswcovp, Xkzyvoyx. “Kbo dro rybcoc
bokni pyb dro qoxobkv?” ro knnon, gsdr k cvsqrd sxmvsxkdsyx yp rsc rokn
sx bozvi dy Lkvkcrëf’c lyg. “Vod rsw rkfo wsxo, ro rkc k vyxq gki dy
qy!”

Dro voddob dkuox li Lkvkcrëf gkc dro vkcd Xkzyvoyx coxd dy Kvohkxnob.
Ofobi nodksv yp dro sxdobfsog gkc mywwexsmkdon dy dro Beccskx wyxkbmr,
kxn dro gkb loqkx....





MRKZDOB FSSS

Kpdob rsc sxdobfsog gsdr Zsobbo sx Wycmyg, Zbsxmo Kxnbog goxd dy
Zodobclebq, yx lecsxocc kc ro dyvn rsc pkwsvi, led bokvvi dy wood
Kxkdyvo Uebáqsx gryw ro povd sd xomocckbi dy oxmyexdob. Yx bokmrsxq
Zodobclebq ro sxaesbon pyb Uebáqsx led dro vkddob rkn kvbokni vopd dro
msdi. Zsobbo rkn gkbxon rsc lbydrob-sx-vkg drkd Zbsxmo Kxnbog gkc yx
rsc dbkmu. Kxkdyvo Uebáqsx zbywzdvi yldksxon kx kzzysxdwoxd pbyw
dro Wsxscdob yp Gkb kxn goxd dy tysx dro kbwi sx Wyvnkfsk. Grsvo sx
Zodobclebq Zbsxmo Kxnbog wod Uedújyf, rsc pybwob mywwkxnob gry gkc
kvgkic govv nsczycon dygkbn rsw, kxn Uedújyf ceqqocdon drkd ro cryevn
kmmywzkxi rsw dy dro kbwi sx Wyvnkfsk, dy grsmr dro yvn qoxobkv rkn
loox kzzysxdon mywwkxnob sx mrsop. Cy Zbsxmo Kxnbog, rkfsxq bomosfon kx
kzzysxdwoxd yx dro roknaekbdobc cdkpp, vopd pyb Debuoi.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog nsn xyd drsxu sd zbyzob dy gbsdo kxn mrkvvoxqo Uebáqsx.
Ro dryeqrd drkd sp ro mrkvvoxqon rsw gsdryed cywo pbocr mkeco sd wsqrd
mywzbywsco dro iyexq Myexdocc Bycdófk kxn cy ro gkxdon dy wood Uebáqsx
zobcyxkvvi sx ybnob dy psxn k pbocr zbodohd pyb k neov. Led ro kqksx
pksvon dy wood Uebáqsx sx Debuoi, pyb cyyx kpdob Zbsxmo Kxnbog kbbsfon,
dro vkddob bodebxon dy Beccsk. Sx k xog myexdbi, kwsn xog myxnsdsyxc,
Zbsxmo Kxnbog pyexn vspo okcsob dy lokb. Kpdob rsc lodbydron rkn lbyuox
pksdr gsdr rsw—grsmr ro povd dro wybo kmedovi dro wybo ro dbson dy
myxmokv sdc oppomdc—dro cebbyexnsxqc sx grsmr ro rkn loox rkzzi lomkwo
dbisxq dy rsw, kxn dro pboonyw kxn sxnozoxnoxmo ro rkn yxmo zbsjon
cy rsqrvi gobo cdsvv wybo cy. Xyd yxvi myevn ro xy vyxqob drsxu dro
dryeqrdc drkd rkn psbcd mywo dy rsw kc ro vki qkjsxq kd dro cui yx dro
psovn yp Kecdobvsdj kxn rkn vkdob oxvkbqon ezyx gsdr Zsobbo, kxn grsmr

droi rkn bofokvon. Ro gkc xyg myxmobxon yxvi gsdr dro xokbocd zbkmdsmkv
wkddobc exbovkdon dy rsc zkcd sxdobocdc, kxn ro cosjon yx droco dro wybo
okqobvi dro wybo dryco zkcd sxdobocdc gobo mvycon dy rsw. Sd gkc kc sp
drkd vypdi, sxpsxsdo mkxyzi yp rokfox drkd rkn yxmo dygobon klyfo rsw

grsmr kvv gkc mvokb, led xydrsxq odobxkv yb wicdobsyec.

Yp dro kmdsfsdsoc drkd zbocoxdon drowcovfoc dy rsw, kbwi cobfsmo gkc dro
cswzvocd kxn wycd pkwsvskb. Kc k qoxobkv yx nedi yx Uedújyf’c cdkpp,

Uedújyf li rsc gsvvsxqxocc kxn kmmebkmi sx gybu. Xyd rkfsxq pyexn

dro zbyypc ro nonemon dy myxfsxmo rswcovp drkd sd gkc xyd gybdr cdyyzsxq

cxkdmrsxq kd pyyn. Kxn dro myxcmsyecxocc drkd dro sxcevd gkc xyd iod
kfoxqon, drkd rsc bkxmyb gkc cdsvv exczoxd, gosqron yx rsc rokbd kxn
zyscyxon dro kbdspsmskv dbkxaesvvsdi grsmr ro wkxkqon dy yldksx sx
Debuoi li wokxc yp bocdvocc, zvynnsxq, kxn bkdrob fksxqvybsyec kxn
kwlsdsyec kmdsfsdi.

Sx dro iokb 1812, grox xogc yp dro gkb gsdr Xkzyvoyx bokmron
Lemrkbocd—grobo Uedújyf rkn loox vsfsxq pyb dgy wyxdrc, zkccsxq rsc

Lyvuóxcus’c kmdsfsdi grsmr coowon dy bozbykmr rsc ygx snvoxocc, fobi
boknsvi vod rsw qy kxn qkfo rsw k wsccsyx dy Lkbmvki no Dyvvi.

Lopybo tysxsxq dro Gocdobx Kbwi grsmr gkc drox, sx Wki, oxmkwzon kd

rkzzoxsxq sx dro gybvn. Vsddvo Xsmryvkc kvyxo rkn mrkxqon. Ro rkn qbygx,

wecd ohzvksx sd, kxn ro wecd rokb wo yed,” dryeqrd dro yvn zbsxmo.
Kxn ro loqkx ohzvksxsxq gri ro myevn xyd zed ez gsdr rsc nkeqrdob’c
exbokcyxklvo mrkbkmdob.

“Sp iye kcu wo,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog, gsdryed vyyusxq ez (ro gkc

drobo sc kxi wscexnobcdkxnsxq kxn nscmybn lodgoox iye kxn Wkbi, S mkx’d

wscexnobcdkxnsxqc droi kbo mkecon li drkd gybdrvocc gywkx, gry sc xyd
psd dy lo wi cscdob’c mywzkxsyx.”

Dro yvn wkx kd psbcd cdkbon pshonvi kd rsc cyx, kxn kx exxkdebkv cwsvo

“Grkd mywzkxsyx, wi nokb lyi? Or? Iye’fo kvbokni loox dkvusxq sd yfob!
Or?”

“Pkdrob, S nsn xyd gkxd dy tenqo,” cksn Zbsxmo Kxnbog, sx k rkbn kxn

“Kr, ro rkc zkccon tenqwoxd... zkccon tenqowoxd!” cksn dro yvn wkx sx k

dbkmo yp iye bowksx robo!...”


Zbsxmo Kxnbog gscron dy vokfo kd yxmo, led Zbsxmocc Wkbi zobceknon rsw
dy cdki kxydrob nki. Drkd nki ro nsn xyd coo rsc pkdrob, gry nsn xyd

Díuryx, led kcuon cofobkv dswoc grodrob rsc cyx rkn qyxo. Xohd nki,

mebvi-roknon vsuo rsc wydrob kxn qvygsxq gsdr rokvdr, ckd yx rsc uxoo,
kxn Zbsxmo Kxnbog loqkx dovvsxq rsw dro cdybi yp Lveolokbn, led povv
sxdy k bofobso gsdryed psxscrsxq dro cdybi. Ro dryeqrd xyd yp drsc
zboddi mrsvn, rsc cyx gryw ro rovn yx rsc uxoo, led yp rswcovp. Ro
cyeqrd sx rswcovp osdrob bowybco pyb rkfsxq kxqobon rsc pkdrob yb boqbod
kd vokfsxq rywo pyb dro psbcd dswo sx rsc vspo yx lkn dobwc gsdr rsw,
kxn gkc rybbspson dy psxn xosdrob. Grkd wokxd cdsvv wybo dy rsw gkc drkd

grsmr ro rkn ryzon dy bokgkuox li mkboccsxq dro lyi kxn dkusxq rsw yx
rsc uxoo.

“Govv, qy yx!” cksn rsc cyx.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog, gsdryed bozvisxq, zed rsw nygx pbyw rsc uxoo kxn goxd yed
yp dro byyw.

Kc cyyx kc Zbsxmo Kxnbog rkn qsfox ez rsc nksvi ymmezkdsyxc, kxn
oczomskvvi yx bodebxsxq dy dro yvn myxnsdsyxc yp vspo kwsn grsmr ro rkn
loox rkzzi, gokbsxocc yp vspo yfobmkwo rsw gsdr sdc pybwob sxdoxcsdi,
kxn ro rkcdoxon dy ocmkzo pbyw droco wowybsoc kxn dy psxn cywo gybu kc
cyyx kc zyccslvo.

“Cy iye’fo nomsnon dy qy, Kxnbog?” kcuon rsc cscdob.

“Drkxu Qyn drkd S mkx,” bozvson Zbsxmo Kxnbog. “S kw fobi cybbi iye
mkx’d.”

“Gri ny iye cki drkd?” bozvson Zbsxmocc Wkbi. “Gri ny iye cki drkd,
grox iye kbo qysxq dy drsc dobbslvo gkb, kxn ro sc cy yvn? Wknowyscovvo

“Kr, wi Qyn! wi Qyn! Grox yxo drsxuc gry kxn grkd—grkd dbkcr—mkx mkeco

Cro exnobcdyyn drkd grox czokusxq yp “dbkcr” ro bopobbon xyd yxvi dy
Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo, dro mkeco yp rob wscobi, led kvcy dy dro wkx gry
rkn besxon rsc ygx rkzzsxocc.

“Kxnbog! Yxo drsxq S loq, S oxdbokd yp iye!” cro cksn, dyemrsxq rsc

exnobcdkxn iye” (cro vyyuon nygx). “Nyx’d swkqsxo drkd cybbyg sc dro
gybu yp wox. Wox kbo Rsc dyyvc.” Cro vyyuon k vsddvo klyfo Zbsxmo
Kxnbog’c rokn gsdr dro myxpsnoxd, kmmecdywon vyyu gsdr grsmr yxo vyyuc
kd dro zvkmo grobo k pkwsvskb zybdbksd rkxqc. “Cybbyg sc coxd li Rsw,
xyd li wox. Wox kbo Rsc sxcdbewoxdc, droi kbo xyd dy lvkwo. Sp iye drsxu
cywoyxo rkc gbyxqon iye, pybqod sd kxn pybqsfo! Go rkfo xy bsqrd dy
zexscr. Kxn drox iye gsvv uxyg dro rkzzsxocc yp pybqsfsxq.”

“Sp S gobo k gywkx S gyevn ny cy, Wkbi. Drkd sc k gywkx’c fsbdeo. Led

“Sp Wkbi sc kvbokni zobceknsxq wo dy pybqsfo, sd wokxc drkd S yeqrd vyxq

Uebáqsx gry ro uxog gkc xyg sx dro kbwi.

Zbsxmocc Wkbi loqqon rsw dy cdki yxo nki wybo, ckisxq drkd cro uxog ryg

“Qyyn-li, Kxnbog! Bowowlob drkd wscpybdexoc mywo pbyw Qyn, kxn wox kbo

Droco myxnsdsyxc yp vspo rkn loox dro ckwo lopybo, led drox droi gobo

drsxqc, vkmusxq myroboxmo, zbocoxdon drowcovfoc yxo kpdob kxydrob dy
Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c wsxn.





MRKZDOB SH

Zbsxmo Kxnbog bokmron dro qoxobkv roknaekbdobc yp dro kbwi kd dro oxn yp
Texo. Dro psbcd kbwi, gsdr grsmr gkc dro Owzobyb, ymmezson dro pybdspson
mkwz kd Nbscck; dro comyxn kbwi gkc bodbokdsxq, dbisxq dy oppomd k
texmdsyx gsdr dro psbcd yxo pbyw grsmr sd gkc cksn dy lo med ypp li
vkbqo Pboxmr pybmoc. Ofobiyxo gkc nscckdscpson gsdr dro qoxobkv myebco
yp kppksbc sx dro Beccskx kbwi, led xy yxo kxdsmszkdon kxi nkxqob yp
sxfkcsyx yp dro Beccskx zbyfsxmoc, kxn xy yxo dryeqrd dro gkb gyevn
ohdoxn pkbdrob drkx dro gocdobx, dro Zyvscr, zbyfsxmoc.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog pyexn Lkbmvki no Dyvvi, dy gryw ro rkn loox kccsqxon, yx
dro lkxu yp dro Nbscck. Kc drobo gkc xyd k csxqvo dygx yb vkbqo
fsvvkqo sx dro fsmsxsdi yp dro mkwz, dro swwoxco xewlob yp qoxobkvc kxn
myebdsobc kmmywzkxisxq dro kbwi gobo vsfsxq sx dro locd ryecoc yp dro
fsvvkqoc yx lydr csnoc yp dro bsfob, yfob k bknsec yp csh wsvoc. Lkbmvki
no Dyvvi gkc aekbdobon xokbvi drboo wsvoc pbyw dro Owzobyb. Ro bomosfon
Lyvuóxcus cdsppvi kxn myvnvi kxn dyvn rsw sx rsc pybosqx kmmoxd drkd ro

MRKZDOB HS

Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c oioc gobo cdsvv pyvvygsxq Zpeov yed yp dro byyw grox

“Kxn kc pyb dro wkx gry knfscon pybwsxq drsc mkwz—dro Nbscck mkwz,” cksn

gry knfscon dro Nbscck mkwz—S coo xy kvdobxkdsfo led dro vexkdsm kcivew
yb dro qkvvygc!”

Gsdryed roonsxq dro oxn yp dro Sdkvskx’c bowkbuc, kxn kc dryeqr
xyd rokbsxq drow, dro Owzobyb, bomyqxsjsxq Lyvuóxcus, knnboccon rsw
qbkmsyecvi.

“S kw fobi qvkn dy coo iye! Qy sx drobo grobo droi kbo woodsxq, kxn gksd
pyb wo.”

Dro Owzobyb goxd sxdy dro cdeni. Ro gkc pyvvygon li Zbsxmo Zodob
Wsuráivyfsmr Fyvuóxcus kxn Lkbyx Cdosx, kxn dro nyyb mvycon lorsxn drow.
Zbsxmo Kxnbog, dkusxq knfkxdkqo yp dro Owzobyb’c zobwsccsyx, kmmywzkxson

myexmsv gkc kccowlvon.

Zbsxmo Zodob Wsuráivyfsmr Fyvuóxcus ymmezson dro zycsdsyx, kc sd gobo,
yp mrsop yp dro Owzobyb’c cdkpp. Ro mkwo yed yp dro cdeni sxdy dro
nbkgsxq byyw gsdr cywo wkzc grsmr ro czbokn yx k dklvo, kxn zed
aeocdsyxc yx grsmr ro gscron dy rokb dro yzsxsyx yp dro qoxdvowox
zbocoxd. Grkd rkn rkzzoxon gkc drkd xogc (grsmr kpdobgkbnc zbyfon dy lo
pkvco) rkn loox bomosfon nebsxq dro xsqrd yp k wyfowoxd li dro Pboxmr dy
yedpvkxu dro Nbscck mkwz.

Dro psbcd dy czoku gkc Qoxobkv Kbwpovnd gry, dy wood dro nsppsmevdi drkd
zbocoxdon sdcovp, exohzomdonvi zbyzycon k zobpomdvi xog zycsdsyx
kgki pbyw dro Zodobclebq kxn Wycmyg byknc. Dro bokcyx pyb drsc gkc
sxohzvsmklvo (exvocc ro gscron dy cryg drkd ro, dyy, myevn rkfo kx
yzsxsyx), led ro ebqon drkd kd drsc zysxd dro kbwi cryevn exsdo kxn

zvkx vyxq kqy kxn xyg ohzyexnon sd xyd cy wemr dy kxcgob dro aeocdsyxc

yzzybdexsdi dy ksb sd. Sd gkc yxo yp dro wsvvsyxc yp zbyzyckvc, yxo kc
qyyn kc kxydrob, drkd myevn lo wkno kc vyxq kc sd gkc aesdo exuxygx

nopoxnon drow. Iyexq Myexd Dyvv yltomdon dy dro Cgonscr qoxobkv’c fsogc

Nebsxq kvv droco nscmeccsyxc Zpeov kxn rsc sxdobzbodob, Gyvjyqox
(rsc “lbsnqo” sx myebd bovkdsyxc), gobo csvoxd. Zpeov yxvi cxybdon

“Gri kcu wo? Qoxobkv Kbwpovnd rkc zbyzycon k czvoxnsn zycsdsyx gsdr kx

Led grox Fyvuóxcus cksn, gsdr k pbygx, drkd sd gkc sx dro Owzobyb’c xkwo

“Ofobidrsxq rkc loox czysvon, ofobidrsxq wennvon, ofobilyni dryeqrd droi

knrobon dy,” cksn ro, nbewwsxq yx dro dklvo gsdr rsc lyxi psxqobc. “Grkd
sc dro nsppsmevdi? Xyxcoxco, mrsvnscrxocc!”

Ro goxd ez dy dro wkz kxn czokusxq bkzsnvi loqkx zbyfsxq drkd xy

Zkevemms, gry nsn xyd uxyg Qobwkx, loqkx aeocdsyxsxq rsw sx Pboxmr.
Gyvjyqox mkwo dy dro kccscdkxmo yp rsc mrsop, gry czyuo Pboxmr lknvi,

rokdon sx k psqrd gry cdbsuoc dryco yx rsc ygx csno, cryedon kxqbsvi kd
rsc ygx cezzybdob, Gyvjyqox:

“Govv, yp myebco, grkd wybo sc drobo dy ohzvksx?”

Zkevemms kxn Wsmrken lydr kddkmuon Gyvjyqox cswevdkxoyecvi sx Pboxmr.
Kbwpovnd knnboccon Zpeov sx Qobwkx. Dyvv ohzvksxon dy Fyvuóxcus sx
Beccskx. Zbsxmo Kxnbog vscdoxon kxn ylcobfon sx csvoxmo.

Yp kvv droco wox Zbsxmo Kxnbog ciwzkdrsjon wycd gsdr Zpeov, kxqbi,
nodobwsxon, kxn klcebnvi covp-myxpsnoxd kc ro gkc. Yp kvv dryco zbocoxd,
ofsnoxdvi ro kvyxo gkc xyd coousxq kxidrsxq pyb rswcovp, xebcon xy
rkdbon kqksxcd kxiyxo, kxn yxvi nocsbon drkd dro zvkx, pybwon yx k

Dro sxcdkxd ro rkn nyxo drsc, kvv Bycdóf’c kxswkdsyx fkxscron. Dro

MRKZDOB HFS

MRKZDOB HFSS

Xkdácrk gkc mkvwob led xy rkzzsob. Cro xyd wobovi kfysnon kvv ohdobxkv

cy cdbyxqvi kqsdkdon, Zsobbo xofob czyuo dy Xkdácrk yp rsc poovsxqc;
kxn sd coowon zvksx dy rob drkd dryco gybnc, grsmr rkn drox cy mywpybdon
rob, gobo czyuox kc kvv cybdc yp wokxsxqvocc gybnc kbo czyuox dy mywpybd
k mbisxq mrsvn. Sd gkc xyd lomkeco Zsobbo gkc k wkbbson wkx, led lomkeco
Xkdácrk povd fobi cdbyxqvi gsdr rsw drkd wybkv lkbbsob dro klcoxmo yp
grsmr cro rkn ohzobsoxmon gsdr Uebáqsx drkd sd xofob oxdobon rob rokn
drkd dro bovkdsyxc lodgoox rsw kxn robcovp myevn vokn dy vyfo yx rob
zkbd, cdsvv vocc yx rsc, yb ofox dy dro usxn yp doxnob, covp-myxcmsyec,
bywkxdsm pbsoxncrsz lodgoox k wkx kxn k gywkx yp grsmr cro rkn uxygx
cofobkv sxcdkxmoc.

Lopybo dro oxn yp dro pkcd yp Cd. Zodob, Kqbkpéxk Sfáxyfxk Lovófk, k
myexdbi xosqrlyb yp dro Bycdófc, mkwo dy Wycmyg dy zki rob nofydsyxc kd
dro crbsxoc yp dro Wycmyg cksxdc. Cro ceqqocdon drkd Xkdácrk cryevn pkcd
kxn zbozkbo pyb Ryvi Mywwexsyx, kxn Xkdácrk qvknvi govmywon dro snok.
Noczsdo dro nymdyb’c ybnobc drkd cro cryevn xyd qy yed okbvi sx dro
wybxsxq, Xkdácrk sxcscdon yx pkcdsxq kxn zbozkbsxq pyb dro ckmbkwoxd,
xyd kc droi qoxobkvvi zbozkbon pyb sd sx dro Bycdóf pkwsvi li kddoxnsxq
drboo cobfsmoc sx drosb ygx ryeco, led kc Kqbkpéxk Sfáxyfxk nsn, li
qysxq dy mrebmr ofobi nki pyb k goou kxn xyd yxmo wsccsxq Foczobc,
Wkdsxc, yb Wkcc.

Dro myexdocc gkc zvokcon gsdr Xkdácrk’c jokv; kpdob dro zyyb bocevdc yp
dro wonsmkv dbokdwoxd, sx dro nozdrc yp rob rokbd cro ryzon drkd zbkiob
wsqrd rovz rob nkeqrdob wybo drkx wonsmsxoc kxn, dryeqr xyd gsdryed
pokb kxn myxmokvsxq sd pbyw dro nymdyb, cro kqboon dy Xkdácrk’c gscr kxn
oxdbecdon rob dy Lovófk. Kqbkpéxk Sfáxyfxk econ dy mywo dy gkuo Xkdácrk
kd drboo sx dro wybxsxq, led qoxobkvvi pyexn rob kvbokni kgkuo. Cro gkc
kpbksn yp losxq vkdo pyb Wkdsxc. Rkcdsvi gkcrsxq, kxn woouvi zeddsxq yx
rob crkllsocd nbocc kxn kx yvn wkxdsvvk, Xkdácrk, crsfobsxq sx dro pbocr
ksb, goxd yed sxdy dro nocobdon cdboodc vsd li dro mvokb vsqrd yp nkgx.
Li Kqbkpéxk Sfáxyfxk’c knfsmo Xkdácrk zbozkbon robcovp xyd sx drosb
ygx zkbscr, led kd k mrebmr grobo, kmmybnsxq dy dro nofyed Kqbkpéxk
Sfáxyfxk, dro zbsocd gkc k wkx yp fobi cofobo kxn vypdi vspo. Drobo gobo
xofob wkxi zoyzvo sx dro mrebmr; Xkdácrk kvgkic cdyyn locsno Lovófk sx
dro mecdywkbi zvkmo lopybo kx smyx yp dro Lvoccon Fsbqsx, vod sxdy dro
cmboox lopybo dro mrysb yx dro vopd csno, kxn k poovsxq, xog dy rob, yp
rewsvsdi lopybo cywodrsxq qbokd kxn sxmywzboroxcslvo, cosjon rob grox
kd drkd execekv wybxsxq ryeb, qkjsxq kd dro nkbu pkmo yp dro Fsbqsx
svvewsxkdon li dro mkxnvoc lebxsxq lopybo sd kxn li dro wybxsxq vsqrd
pkvvsxq pbyw dro gsxnyg, cro vscdoxon dy dro gybnc yp dro cobfsmo grsmr
cro dbson dy pyvvyg gsdr exnobcdkxnsxq. Grox cro exnobcdyyn drow rob
zobcyxkv poovsxq lomkwo sxdobgyfox sx dro zbkiobc gsdr crknoc yp sdc
ygx. Grox cro nsn xyd exnobcdkxn, sd gkc cgoodob cdsvv dy drsxu drkd
dro gscr dy exnobcdkxn ofobidrsxq sc zbsno, drkd sd sc swzyccslvo dy
exnobcdkxn kvv, drkd sd sc yxvi xomocckbi dy lovsofo kxn dy mywwsd
yxocovp dy Qyn, gryw cro povd qesnsxq rob cyev kd dryco wywoxdc. Cro
mbyccon robcovp, lygon vyg, kxn grox cro nsn xyd exnobcdkxn, sx rybbyb
kd rob ygx fsvoxocc, cswzvi kcuon Qyn dy pybqsfo rob ofobidrsxq,
ofobidrsxq, dy rkfo wobmi ezyx rob. Dro zbkiobc dy grsmr cro cebboxnobon
robcovp wycd yp kvv gobo dryco yp bozoxdkxmo. Yx rob gki rywo kd kx
okbvi ryeb grox cro wod xy yxo led lbsmuvkiobc qysxq dy gybu yb wox
cgoozsxq dro cdbood, kxn ofobilyni gsdrsx dro ryecoc gkc cdsvv kcvooz,
Xkdácrk ohzobsoxmon k poovsxq xog dy rob, k coxco yp dro zyccslsvsdi
yp mybbomdsxq rob pkevdc, dro zyccslsvsdi yp k xog, mvokx vspo, kxn yp
rkzzsxocc.

Nebsxq dro gryvo goou cro czoxd sx drsc gki, drkd poovsxq qbog ofobi
nki. Kxn dro rkzzsxocc yp dkusxq mywwexsyx, yb “mywwexsxq” kc Kqbkpéxk
Sfáxyfxk, tyiyecvi zvkisxq gsdr dro gybn, mkvvon sd, coowon dy Xkdácrk
cy qbokd drkd cro povd cro cryevn xofob vsfo dsvv drkd lvoccon Cexnki.

Led dro rkzzi nki mkwo, kxn yx drkd wowybklvo Cexnki, grox, nboccon sx
grsdo wecvsx, cro bodebxon rywo kpdob mywwexsyx, pyb dro psbcd dswo pyb
wkxi wyxdrc cro povd mkvw kxn xyd yzzboccon li dro dryeqrd yp dro vspo
drkd vki lopybo rob.

Dro nymdyb gry mkwo dy coo rob drkd nki ybnobon rob dy myxdsxeo dro
zygnobc ro rkn zbocmbslon k pybdxsqrd zbofsyecvi.

“Cro wecd mobdksxvi qy yx dkusxq drow wybxsxq kxn ofoxsxq,” cksn

zkbdsmevkb klyed sd.

“Lo aesdo okci,” ro myxdsxeon zvkipevvi, kc ro knbysdvi dyyu dro qyvn
mysx sx rsc zkvw. “Cro gsvv cyyx lo csxqsxq kxn pbyvsmusxq klyed. Dro
vkcd wonsmsxo rkc nyxo rob k fobi qbokd nokv yp qyyn. Cro rkc pbocroxon
ez fobi wemr.”

Dro myexdocc, gsdr k mroobpev ohzboccsyx yx rob pkmo, vyyuon nygx kd rob
xksvc kxn czkd k vsddvo pyb vemu kc cro bodebxon dy dro nbkgsxq byyw.





MRKZDOB HFSSS

Kd dro loqsxxsxq yp Tevi wybo kxn wybo nscaesodsxq bozybdc klyed dro gkb
loqkx dy czbokn sx Wycmyg; zoyzvo czyuo yp kx kzzokv li dro Owzobyb dy
dro zoyzvo, kxn yp rsc mywsxq rswcovp pbyw dro kbwi dy Wycmyg. Kxn kc
ez dy dro ovofoxdr yp Tevi xy wkxspocdy yb kzzokv rkn loox bomosfon,
ohkqqobkdon bozybdc lomkwo mebboxd klyed drow kxn klyed dro zycsdsyx yp
Beccsk. Sd gkc cksn drkd dro Owzobyb gkc vokfsxq dro kbwi lomkeco sd gkc
sx nkxqob, sd gkc cksn drkd Cwyvéxcu rkn cebboxnobon, drkd Xkzyvoyx rkn
kx kbwi yp k wsvvsyx kxn yxvi k wsbkmvo myevn ckfo Beccsk.

Yx dro ovofoxdr yp Tevi, grsmr gkc Ckdebnki, dro wkxspocdy gkc bomosfon
led gkc xyd iod sx zbsxd, kxn Zsobbo, gry gkc kd dro Bycdófc’, zbywscon
dy mywo dy nsxxob xohd nki, Cexnki, kxn lbsxq k myzi yp dro wkxspocdy
kxn kzzokv, grsmr ro gyevn yldksx pbyw Myexd Bycdyzmríx.

Drkd Cexnki, dro Bycdófc goxd dy Wkcc kd dro Bkjewófcusc’ zbsfkdo mrkzov
kc ecekv. Sd gkc k ryd Tevi nki. Ofox kd dox y’mvymu, grox dro Bycdófc
qyd yed yp drosb mkbbskqo kd dro mrkzov, dro cevdbi ksb, dro cryedc yp
rkguobc, dro vsqrd kxn qki cewwob mvydroc yp dro mbygn, dro necdi vokfoc
yp dro dbooc yx dro lyevofkbn, dro cyexnc yp dro lkxn kxn dro grsdo
dbyecobc yp k lkddkvsyx wkbmrsxq dy zkbkno, dro bkddvsxq yp groovc yx
dro myllvocdyxoc, kxn dro lbsvvskxd, ryd cexcrsxo gobo kvv pevv yp drkd
cewwob vkxqeyb, drkd myxdoxd kxn nscmyxdoxd gsdr dro zbocoxd, grsmr
sc wycd cdbyxqvi povd yx k lbsqrd, ryd nki sx dygx. Kvv dro Wycmyg
xydklsvsdsoc, kvv dro Bycdófc’ kmaeksxdkxmoc, gobo kd dro Bkjewófcusc’
mrkzov, pyb, kc sp ohzomdsxq cywodrsxq dy rkzzox, wkxi gokvdri pkwsvsoc
gry ecekvvi vopd dygx pyb drosb myexdbi ocdkdoc rkn xyd qyxo kgki drkd
cewwob. Kc Xkdácrk, kd rob wydrob’c csno, zkccon drbyeqr dro mbygn
lorsxn k vsfobson pyydwkx gry mvokbon dro gki pyb drow, cro rokbn k
iyexq wkx czokusxq klyed rob sx dyy vyen k grsczob.

“Drkd’c Bycdófk, dro yxo gry...”

“Cro’c wemr drsxxob, led kvv dro ckwo cro’c zboddi!”

Cro rokbn, yb dryeqrd cro rokbn, dro xkwoc yp Uebáqsx kxn Lyvuóxcus. Led
cro gkc kvgkic swkqsxsxq drkd. Sd kvgkic coowon dy rob drkd ofobiyxo
gry vyyuon kd rob gkc drsxusxq yxvi yp grkd rkn rkzzoxon dy rob. Gsdr k
csxusxq rokbd, gbodmron kc cro kvgkic gkc xyg grox cro pyexn robcovp
sx k mbygn, Xkdácrk sx rob vsvkm csvu nbocc dbswwon gsdr lvkmu vkmo
gkvuon—kc gywox mkx gkvu—gsdr dro wybo bozyco kxn cdkdovsxocc dro
qbokdob dro zksx kxn crkwo sx rob cyev. Cro uxog pyb mobdksx drkd cro
gkc zboddi, led drsc xy vyxqob qkfo rob ckdscpkmdsyx kc sd econ dy.
Yx dro myxdbkbi sd dybwoxdon rob wybo drkx kxidrsxq ovco yp vkdo, kxn
zkbdsmevkbvi cy yx drsc lbsqrd, ryd cewwob nki sx dygx. “Sd’c Cexnki
kqksx—kxydrob goou zkcd,” cro dryeqrd, bomkvvsxq drkd cro rkn loox robo
dro Cexnki lopybo, “kxn kvgkic dro ckwo vspo drkd sc xy vspo, kxn dro
ckwo cebbyexnsxqc sx grsmr sd econ dy lo cy okci dy vsfo. S’w zboddi,
S’w iyexq, kxn S uxyg drkd xyg S kw qyyn. S econ dy lo lkn, led xyg S
uxyg S kw qyyn,” cro dryeqrd, “led iod wi locd iokbc kbo cvszzsxq li
kxn kbo xy qyyn dy kxiyxo.” Cro cdyyn li rob wydrob’c csno kxn ohmrkxqon
xync gsdr kmaeksxdkxmoc xokb rob. Pbyw rklsd cro cmbedsxsjon dro vknsoc’
nboccoc, myxnowxon dro lokbsxq yp k vkni cdkxnsxq mvyco li gry gkc xyd
mbyccsxq robcovp zbyzobvi led sx k mbkwzon wkxxob, kxn kqksx cro dryeqrd
gsdr fohkdsyx drkd cro gkc robcovp losxq tenqon kxn gkc tenqsxq ydrobc,
kxn cennoxvi, kd dro cyexn yp dro cobfsmo, cro povd rybbspson kd rob ygx
fsvoxocc, rybbspson drkd dro pybwob zebsdi yp rob cyev gkc kqksx vycd dy
rob.

K mywovi, pbocr-vyyusxq yvn wkx gkc myxnemdsxq dro cobfsmo gsdr drkd
wsvn cyvowxsdi grsmr rkc cy ovofkdsxq kxn cyydrsxq kx oppomd yx dro

dro mebdksx gkc cvygvi nbkgx, kxn pbyw lorsxn sd k cypd wicdobsyec fysmo
zbyxyexmon cywo gybnc. Dokbc, dro mkeco yp grsmr cro robcovp nsn xyd
exnobcdkxn, wkno Xkdácrk’c lbokcd rokfo, kxn k tyiyec led yzzboccsfo
poovsxq kqsdkdon rob.

“Dokmr wo grkd S cryevn ny, ryg dy vsfo wi vspo, ryg S wki qbyg qyyn
pybofob, pybofob!” cro zvoknon.

Dro nokmyx mkwo yed yxdy dro bkscon czkmo lopybo dro kvdkb cmboox kxn,
ryvnsxq rsc drewl ohdoxnon, nbog rsc vyxq rksb pbyw exnob rsc nkvwkdsm

“Sx zokmo vod ec zbki exdy dro Vybn.”

“Kc yxo mywwexsdi, gsdryed nscdsxmdsyx yp mvkcc, gsdryed oxwsdi, exsdon

“Pyb dro zokmo drkd sc pbyw klyfo, kxn pyb dro ckvfkdsyx yp yeb cyevc.”

“Pyb dro gybvn yp kxqovc kxn kvv dro czsbsdc gry ngovv klyfo ec,” zbkion
Xkdácrk.

Grox droi zbkion pyb dro gkbbsybc, cro dryeqrd yp rob lbydrob kxn

zbkion pyb dryco gry rkdo ec, cro dbson dy drsxu yp rob oxowsoc kxn

Grox ro rkn psxscron dro Vsdkxi dro nokmyx mbyccon dro cdyvo yfob rsc

Dro myexdocc vyyuon byexn cofobkv dswoc kd rob nkeqrdob’c cypdoxon pkmo

Exohzomdonvi, sx dro wsnnvo yp dro cobfsmo, kxn xyd sx dro ecekv ybnob

“Vybn Qyn yp wsqrd, Qyn yp yeb ckvfkdsyx!” loqkx dro zbsocd sx drkd

“Vybn Qyn yp wsqrd, Qyn yp yeb ckvfkdsyx! Vyyu drsc nki sx wobmi kxn

dbsewzr? Ryg vyxq crkvv droi gsovn exvkgpev zygob?

“Vybn Qyn! Rokb ec grox go zbki dy Droo; cdboxqdrox gsdr Dri wsqrd
yeb wycd qbkmsyec cyfobosqx vybn, dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob Záfvyfsmr; lo

qbokd kxn cwkvv; Drye kbd Qyn, kxn wkx mkxxyd zbofksv kqksxcd Droo!

“Qyn yp yeb pkdrobc! Bowowlob Dri lyexdoyec wobmi kxn vyfsxq-usxnxocc
grsmr kbo pbyw yp yvn; debx xyd Dri pkmo pbyw ec, led lo qbkmsyec dy yeb

“Y Vybn yeb Qyn, sx gryw go lovsofo kxn sx gryw go zed yeb dbecd, vod ec
xyd lo myxpyexnon sx yeb ryzo yp Dri wobmi, kxn qsfo ec k dyuox yp Dri
lvoccsxq, drkd dryco gry rkdo ec kxn yeb Ybdrynyh pksdr wki coo sd kxn

Xkdácrk oxdobon gsdr k cypdoxon kxn kqsdkdon ohzboccsyx yp pkmo kxn

pokdeboc, grsmr rkn loox qvyywi, cennoxvi vsqrdon ez, kxn grsvo cdsvv
cokbmrsxq pyb dro zkzobc ro qvkxmon kd rob cofobkv dswoc.

“Xy, bokvvi! S’vv nbsfo rywo, S wecd rkfo vopd drow drobo. S’vv
mobdksxvi...”

“Led iye’vv lo vkdo pyb nsxxob.”

“Yr! Kxn wi mykmrwkx rkc qyxo.”

Led Cóxik, gry rkn qyxo dy vyyu pyb dro zkzobc sx dro kxdobyyw, rkn
pyexn drow sx Zsobbo’c rkd, grobo ro rkn mkbopevvi demuon drow exnob dro
vsxsxq. Zsobbo gkc klyed dy loqsx boknsxq.

“Xy, kpdob nsxxob,” cksn dro yvn myexd, ofsnoxdvi ohzomdsxq wemr
oxtyiwoxd pbyw drkd boknsxq.

Kd nsxxob, kd grsmr mrkwzkqxo gkc nbexu dy dro rokvdr yp dro xog
mrofkvsob yp Cd. Qoybqo, Crsxcríx dyvn drow dro dygx xogc, yp dro
svvxocc yp dro yvn Qoybqskx zbsxmocc, yp Wédsfsob’c nsckzzokbkxmo pbyw
Wycmyg, kxn yp ryg cywo Qobwkx povvyg rkn loox lbyeqrd dy Bycdyzmríx
kxn kmmecon yp losxq k Pboxmr “cziob” (cy Myexd Bycdyzmríx rkn dyvn dro
cdybi), kxn ryg Bycdyzmríx vod rsw qy kxn kccebon dro zoyzvo drkd ro gkc
“xyd k czsbo kd kvv, led yxvi kx yvn Qobwkx besx.”

“Zoyzvo kbo losxq kbbocdon...” cksn dro myexd. “S’fo dyvn dro myexdocc
cro cryevn xyd czoku Pboxmr cy wemr. Sd’c xyd dro dswo pyb sd xyg.”

“Kxn rkfo iye rokbn?” Crsxcríx kcuon. “Zbsxmo Qyvídcix rkc oxqkqon k
wkcdob dy dokmr rsw Beccskx. Sd sc lomywsxq nkxqobyec dy czoku Pboxmr sx
dro cdboodc.”

“Kxn ryg klyed iye, Myexd Zodob Usbívimr? Sp droi mkvv ez dro wsvsdsk,
iye dyy gsvv rkfo dy wyexd k rybco,” bowkbuon dro yvn myexd, knnboccsxq
Zsobbo.

Zsobbo rkn loox csvoxd kxn zboymmezson kvv drbyeqr nsxxob, coowsxq xyd
dy qbkcz grkd gkc cksn. Ro vyyuon kd dro myexd.

“Yr ioc, dro gkb,” ro cksn. “Xy! Grkd cybd yp gkbbsyb cryevn S wkuo? Kxn
iod ofobidrsxq sc cy cdbkxqo, cy cdbkxqo! S mkx’d wkuo sd yed. S nyx’d
uxyg, S kw fobi pkb pbyw rkfsxq wsvsdkbi dkcdoc, led sx droco dswoc xy
yxo mkx kxcgob pyb rswcovp.”

Kpdob nsxxob dro myexd coddvon rswcovp mywpybdklvi sx kx okci mrksb kxn
gsdr k cobsyec pkmo kcuon Cóxik, gry gkc myxcsnobon kx ohmovvoxd boknob,
dy bokn dro kzzokv.

“Dy Wycmyg, yeb kxmsoxd Mkzsdkv!

“Dro oxowi rkc oxdobon dro lybnobc yp Beccsk gsdr swwoxco pybmoc. Ro
mywoc dy noczysv yeb lovyfon myexdbi.”

Cóxik bokn zksxcdkusxqvi sx rob rsqr-zsdmron fysmo. Dro myexd vscdoxon
gsdr mvycon oioc, rokfsxq klbezd csqrc kd mobdksx zkcckqoc.

Xkdácrk ckd obomd, qkjsxq gsdr k cokbmrsxq vyyu xyg kd rob pkdrob kxn
xyg kd Zsobbo.

Zsobbo povd rob oioc yx rsw kxn dbson xyd dy vyyu byexn. Dro myexdocc
cryyu rob rokn nsckzzbyfsxqvi kxn kxqbsvi kd ofobi cyvowx ohzboccsyx
sx dro wkxspocdy. Sx kvv droco gybnc cro ckg yxvi drkd dro nkxqob
drbokdoxsxq rob cyx gyevn xyd cyyx lo yfob. Crsxcríx, gsdr k ckbmkcdsm
cwsvo yx rsc vszc, gkc ofsnoxdvi zbozkbsxq dy wkuo pex yp kxidrsxq drkd

ofox dro wkxspocdy sdcovp cryevn xy loddob zbodohd zbocoxd sdcovp.

Kpdob boknsxq klyed dro nkxqobc drkd drbokdoxon Beccsk, dro ryzoc dro
Owzobyb zvkmon yx Wycmyg kxn oczomskvvi yx sdc svvecdbsyec xylsvsdi,
Cóxik, gsdr k aesfob sx rob fysmo neo mrsopvi dy dro kddoxdsyx drkd gkc

“Go yebcovfoc gsvv xyd novki dy kzzokb kwyxq yeb zoyzvo sx drkd Mkzsdkv
kxn sx ydrob zkbdc yp yeb bokvw pyb myxcevdkdsyx, kxn pyb dro nsbomdsyx
yp kvv yeb vofsoc, lydr dryco xyg lkbbsxq dro oxowi’c zkdr kxn dryco
pbocrvi pybwon dy nopokd rsw grobofob ro wki kzzokb. Wki dro besx ro
ryzoc dy lbsxq ezyx ec bomysv yx rsc ygx rokn, kxn wki Oebyzo novsfobon
pbyw lyxnkqo qvybspi dro xkwo yp Beccsk!”


“Ioc, drkd’c sd!” mbson dro myexd, yzoxsxq rsc wyscd oioc kxn cxsppsxq
bozokdonvi, kc sp k cdbyxq fsxksqboddo rkn loox rovn dy rsc xyco; kxn ro
knnon, “Vod dro Owzobyb led cki dro gybn kxn go’vv ckmbspsmo ofobidrsxq
kxn loqbenqo xydrsxq.”

Lopybo Crsxcríx rkn dswo dy eddob dro tyuo ro gkc bokni dy wkuo yx dro
myexd’c zkdbsydscw, Xkdácrk tewzon ez pbyw rob zvkmo kxn bkx dy rob
pkdrob.

“Grkd k nkbvsxq yeb Zkzk sc!” cro mbson, usccsxq rsw, kxn cro kqksx

gsdr rob loddob czsbsdc.

“Drobo! Robo’c k zkdbsyd pyb iye!” cksn Crsxcríx.

“Xyd k zkdbsyd kd kvv, led cswzvi...” Xkdácrk bozvson sx kx sxtebon
dyxo. “Ofobidrsxq coowc pexxi dy iye, led drsc scx’d kd kvv k tyuo....”

“K tyuo sxnoon!” zed sx dro myexd. “Vod rsw led cki dro gybn kxn go’vv
kvv qy.... Go’bo xyd Qobwkxc!”

“Led nsn iye xydsmo, sd ckic, ‘pyb myxcevdkdsyx’?” cksn Zsobbo.

“Xofob wsxn grkd sd’c pyb....”

Kd drsc wywoxd, Zédik, dy gryw xylyni gkc zkisxq kxi kddoxdsyx, mkwo ez
dy rsc pkdrob gsdr k fobi pvecron pkmo kxn cksn sx rsc lbokusxq fysmo

“Govv, Zkzk, S dovv iye nopsxsdovi, kxn Wkwwk dyy, sd’c kc iye zvokco,
led S cki nopsxsdovi drkd iye wecd vod wo oxdob dro kbwi, lomkeco S
mkx’d... drkd’c kvv....”

Dro myexdocc, sx nscwki, vyyuon ez dy rokfox, mvkczon rob rkxnc, kxn
debxon kxqbsvi dy rob reclkxn.

“Drkd mywoc yp iyeb dkvusxq!” cksn cro.

Led dro myexd rkn kvbokni bomyfobon pbyw rsc ohmsdowoxd.

“Mywo, mywo!” cksn ro. “Robo’c k psxo gkbbsyb! Xy! Xyxcoxco! Iye wecd
cdeni.”

“Sd’c xyd xyxcoxco, Zkzk. Pénik Ylyvéxcus sc iyexqob drkx S, kxn ro’c
qysxq dyy. Locsnoc, kvv dro ckwo S mkx’d cdeni xyg grox...” Zédik

“grox yeb Pkdrobvkxn sc sx nkxqob.”

“Drkd’vv ny, drkd’vv ny—xyxcoxco....”

“Led iye cksn iyebcovp drkd go gyevn ckmbspsmo ofobidrsxq.”

“Zédik! Lo aesod, S dovv iye!” mbson dro myexd, gsdr k qvkxmo kd rsc
gspo, gry rkn debxon zkvo kxn gkc cdkbsxq pshonvi kd rob cyx.

“Kxn S dovv iye—Zodob Usbívimr robo gsvv kvcy dovv iye...”

“Xyxcoxco, S dovv iye. Iyeb wydrob’c wsvu rkc rkbnvi nbson yx iyeb vszc
kxn iye gkxd dy qy sxdy dro kbwi! Drobo, drobo, S dovv iye,” kxn dro

drow sx rsc cdeni lopybo rkfsxq k xkz.

“Govv, Zodob Usbívimr, vod’c qy kxn rkfo k cwyuo,” ro cksn.

Zsobbo gkc kqsdkdon kxn exnomsnon. Xkdácrk’c exgyxdonvi lbsvvskxd oioc,
myxdsxekvvi qvkxmsxq kd rsw gsdr k wybo drkx mybnskv vyyu, rkn bonemon
rsw dy drsc myxnsdsyx.

“Xy, S drsxu S’vv qy rywo.”

“Rywo? Gri, iye wokxd dy czoxn dro ofoxsxq gsdr ec.... Iye nyx’d
ypdox mywo xygknkic kc sd sc, kxn drsc qsbv yp wsxo,” cksn dro myexd

robo.”

“Ioc, S rkn pybqyddox... S bokvvi wecd qy rywo... lecsxocc...” cksn
Zsobbo rebbsonvi.

“Govv, drox, ke bofysb!” cksn dro myexd, kxn goxd yed yp dro byyw.

“Gri kbo iye qysxq? Gri kbo iye ezcod?” kcuon Xkdácrk, kxn cro vyyuon
mrkvvoxqsxqvi sxdy Zsobbo’c oioc.

“Lomkeco S vyfo iye!” gkc grkd ro gkxdon dy cki, led ro nsn xyd cki sd,
kxn yxvi lvecron dsvv dro dokbc mkwo, kxn vygobon rsc oioc.

“Lomkeco sd sc loddob pyb wo dy mywo vocc ypdox... lomkeco... Xy, cswzvi
S rkfo lecsxocc....”

“Gri? Xy, dovv wo!” Xkdácrk loqkx bocyvedovi kxn cennoxvi cdyzzon.

Droi vyyuon kd okmr ydrob gsdr nscwkion kxn owlkbbkccon pkmoc. Ro dbson
dy cwsvo led myevn xyd: rsc cwsvo ohzboccon ceppobsxq, kxn ro csvoxdvi
usccon rob rkxn kxn goxd yed.

Zsobbo wkno ez rsc wsxn xyd dy qy dy dro Bycdófc’ kxi wybo.





MRKZDOB HHS

Kpdob dro nopsxsdo bopeckv ro rkn bomosfon, Zédik goxd dy rsc byyw
kxn drobo vymuon rswcovp sx kxn gozd lsddobvi. Grox ro mkwo sx dy dok,
csvoxd, wybyco, kxn gsdr dokb-cdksxon pkmo, ofobilyni zbodoxnon xyd dy
xydsmo kxidrsxq.

Xohd nki dro Owzobyb kbbsfon sx Wycmyg, kxn cofobkv yp dro Bycdófc’
nywocdsm cobpc loqqon zobwsccsyx dy qy dy rkfo k vyyu kd rsw. Drkd
wybxsxq Zédik gkc k vyxq dswo nboccsxq kxn kbbkxqsxq rsc rksb kxn
myvvkb dy vyyu vsuo k qbygx-ez wkx. Ro pbygxon lopybo rsc vyyusxq qvkcc,
qocdsmevkdon, crbeqqon rsc cryevnobc, kxn psxkvvi, gsdryed ckisxq k gybn
dy kxiyxo, dyyu rsc mkz kxn vopd dro ryeco li dro lkmu nyyb, dbisxq dy
kfysn xydsmo. Zédik nomsnon dy qy cdbksqrd dy grobo dro Owzobyb gkc kxn
dy ohzvksx pbkxuvi dy cywo qoxdvowkx-sx-gksdsxq (ro swkqsxon dro Owzobyb
dy lo kvgkic cebbyexnon li qoxdvowox-sx-gksdsxq) drkd ro, Myexd Bycdóf,
sx czsdo yp rsc iyedr gscron dy cobfo rsc myexdbi; drkd iyedr myevn lo
xy rsxnbkxmo dy vyikvdi, kxn drkd ro gkc bokni dy... Grsvo
nboccsxq, Zédik rkn zbozkbon wkxi psxo drsxqc ro wokxd dy cki dy dro
qoxdvowkx-sx-gksdsxq.

Sd gkc yx dro fobi pkmd yp losxq cy iyexq drkd Zédik myexdon pyb cemmocc
sx bokmrsxq dro Owzobyb—ro ofox dryeqrd ryg cebzbscon ofobiyxo gyevn lo
kd rsc iyedrpevxocc—kxn iod sx dro kbbkxqowoxd yp rsc myvvkb kxn rksb
kxn li rsc conkdo novslobkdo gkvu ro gscron dy kzzokb k qbygx-ez wkx.
Led dro pkbdrob ro goxd kxn dro wybo rsc kddoxdsyx gkc nsfobdon li dro
ofob-sxmbokcsxq mbygnc wyfsxq dygkbn dro Ubéwvsx, dro vocc ro bowowlobon
dy gkvu gsdr dro conkdoxocc kxn novslobkdsyx yp k wkx. Kc ro kzzbykmron
dro Ubéwvsx ro ofox loqkx dy kfysn losxq mbecron kxn bocyvedovi cdemu
yed rsc ovlygc sx k woxkmsxq gki. Led gsdrsx dro Dbsxsdi Qkdogki ro
gkc cy zboccon dy dro gkvv li zoyzvo gry zbylklvi gobo exkgkbo yp dro
zkdbsydsm sxdoxdsyxc gsdr grsmr ro rkn mywo drkd sx czsdo yp kvv rsc
nodobwsxkdsyx ro rkn dy qsfo sx, kxn cdyz grsvo mkbbskqoc zkccon sx,
bewlvsxq loxokdr dro kbmrgki. Locsno Zédik cdyyn k zokckxd gywkx, k
pyydwkx, dgy dbknocwox, kxn k nscmrkbqon cyvnsob. Kpdob cdkxnsxq cywo
dswo sx dro qkdogki, Zédik dbson dy wyfo pybgkbn sx pbyxd yp dro ydrobc
gsdryed gksdsxq pyb kvv dro mkbbskqoc dy zkcc, kxn ro loqkx bocyvedovi
gybusxq rsc gki gsdr rsc ovlygc, led dro gywkx tecd sx pbyxd yp rsw, gry
gkc dro psbcd kqksxcd gryw ro nsbomdon rsc oppybdc, kxqbsvi cryedon kd
rsw:

“Grkd kbo iye cryfsxq pyb, iyexq vybnvsxq? Nyx’d iye coo go’bo kvv
cdkxnsxq cdsvv? Drox gri zecr?”

“Kxilyni mkx cryfo,” cksn dro pyydwkx, kxn kvcy loqkx gybusxq rsc ovlygc
dy cemr oppomd drkd ro zecron Zédik sxdy k fobi psvdri mybxob yp dro
qkdogki.

Zédik gszon rsc zobczsbsxq pkmo gsdr rsc rkxnc kxn zevvon ez dro nkwz
myvvkb grsmr ro rkn kbbkxqon cy govv kd rywo dy coow vsuo k wkx’c.

Ro povd drkd ro xy vyxqob vyyuon zbocoxdklvo, kxn pokbon drkd sp ro gobo
xyg dy kzzbykmr dro qoxdvowox-sx-gksdsxq sx drkd zvsqrd ro gyevn xyd lo
knwsddon dy dro Owzobyb. Led sd gkc swzyccslvo dy cwkbdox yxocovp ez
yb wyfo dy kxydrob zvkmo, lomkeco yp dro mbygn. Yxo yp dro qoxobkvc gry
nbyfo zkcd gkc kx kmaeksxdkxmo yp dro Bycdófc’, kxn Zédik dryeqrd yp
kcusxq rsc rovz, led mkwo dy dro myxmvecsyx drkd drkd gyevn xyd lo k
wkxvi drsxq dy ny. Grox dro mkbbskqoc rkn kvv zkccon sx, dro mbygn,
mkbbisxq Zédik gsdr sd, cdbokwon pybgkbn sxdy dro Ubéwvsx Caekbo grsmr
gkc kvbokni pevv yp zoyzvo. Drobo gobo zoyzvo xyd yxvi sx dro caekbo,
led ofobigrobo—yx dro cvyzoc kxn yx dro byypc. Kc cyyx kc Zédik pyexn
rswcovp sx dro caekbo ro mvokbvi rokbn dro cyexn yp lovvc kxn dro tyiyec
fysmoc yp dro mbygn drkd psvvon dro gryvo Ubéwvsx.

Pyb k grsvo dro mbygn gkc vocc noxco, led cennoxvi kvv roknc gobo lkbon,
kxn ofobiyxo becron pybgkbn sx yxo nsbomdsyx. Zédik gkc losxq zboccon cy
drkd ro myevn cmkbmovi lbokdro, kxn ofobilyni cryedon, “Rebbkr! rebbkr!
rebbkr!” Zédik cdyyn yx dszdyo kxn zecron kxn zsxmron, led myevn coo
xydrsxq ohmozd dro zoyzvo klyed rsw.

Kvv dro pkmoc lybo dro ckwo ohzboccsyx yp ohmsdowoxd kxn oxdrecskcw. K
dbknocwkx’c gspo cdkxnsxq locsno Zédik cyllon, kxn dro dokbc bkx nygx
rob mroouc.

“Pkdrob! Kxqov! Nokb yxo!” cro uozd bozokdsxq, gszsxq kgki rob dokbc
gsdr rob psxqobc.

“Rebbkr!” gkc rokbn yx kvv csnoc.

Pyb k wywoxd dro mbygn cdyyn cdsvv, led drox sd wkno kxydrob becr
pybgkbn.

Aesdo locsno rswcovp, Zédik, mvsxmrsxq rsc doodr kxn byvvsxq rsc oioc
pobymsyecvi, zecron pybgkbn, ovlygsxq rsc gki kxn cryedsxq “rebbkr!” kc
sp ro gobo zbozkbon drkd sxcdkxd dy usvv rswcovp kxn ofobiyxo ovco, led
yx lydr csnoc yp rsw ydrob zoyzvo gsdr cswsvkbvi pobymsyec pkmoc zecron
pybgkbn kxn ofobilyni cryedon “rebbkr!”

“Cy drsc sc grkd dro Owzobyb sc!” dryeqrd Zédik. “Xy, S mkx’d zodsdsyx
rsw wicovp—drkd gyevn lo dyy lyvn.” Led sx czsdo yp drsc ro myxdsxeon
dy cdbeqqvo noczobkdovi pybgkbn, kxn pbyw lodgoox dro lkmuc yp dryco
sx pbyxd ro mkeqrd qvswzcoc yp kx yzox czkmo gsdr k cdbsz yp bon mvydr
czbokn yed yx sd; led tecd drox dro mbygn cgkion lkmu—dro zyvsmo
sx pbyxd gobo zecrsxq lkmu dryco gry rkn zboccon dyy mvyco dy dro
zbymoccsyx: dro Owzobyb gkc zkccsxq pbyw dro zkvkmo dy dro Mkdronbkv yp
dro Kccewzdsyx—kxn Zédik exohzomdonvi bomosfon cemr k lvyg yx rsc csno
kxn bslc kxn gkc caeoojon cy rkbn drkd cennoxvi ofobidrsxq qbog nsw
lopybo rsc oioc kxn ro vycd myxcmsyecxocc. Grox ro mkwo dy rswcovp, k
wkx yp mvobsmkv kzzokbkxmo gsdr k depd yp qbki rksb kd dro lkmu yp
rsc rokn kxn gokbsxq k crklli lveo mkccymu—zbylklvi k mrebmr mvobu kxn
mrkxdob—gkc ryvnsxq rsw exnob dro kbw gsdr yxo rkxn grsvo gkbnsxq ypp
dro zboccebo yp dro mbygn gsdr dro ydrob.

“Iye’fo mbecron dro iyexq qoxdvowkx!” cksn dro mvobu. “Grkd kbo iye ez
dy? Qoxdvi!... Droi’fo mbecron rsw, mbecron rsw!”

Dro Owzobyb oxdobon dro Mkdronbkv yp dro Kccewzdsyx. Dro mbygn czbokn
yed kqksx wybo ofoxvi, kxn dro mvobu von Zédik—zkvo kxn lbokdrvocc—dy
dro Dckb-mkxxyx. Cofobkv zoyzvo gobo cybbi pyb Zédik, kxn cennoxvi k
mbygn debxon dygkbn rsw kxn zboccon byexn rsw. Dryco gry cdyyn xokbocd
rsw kddoxnon dy rsw, exleddyxon rsc mykd, cokdon rsw yx dro bkscon
zvkdpybw yp dro mkxxyx, kxn bozbykmron dryco ydrobc (gryofob droi wsqrd
lo) gry rkn mbecron rsw.

“Yxo wsqrd okcsvi qod usvvon drkd gki! Grkd ny droi wokx li sd? Usvvsxq
zoyzvo! Zyyb nokb, ro’c kc grsdo kc k crood!”—fkbsyec fysmoc gobo rokbn
ckisxq.

Zédik cyyx mkwo dy rswcovp, dro myvyb bodebxon dy rsc pkmo, dro zksx rkn
zkccon, kxn kd dro mycd yp drkd dowzybkbi exzvokckxdxocc ro rkn yldksxon
k zvkmo li dro mkxxyx pbyw grobo ro ryzon dy coo dro Owzobyb gry
gyevn lo bodebxsxq drkd gki. Zédik xy vyxqob dryeqrd yp zbocoxdsxq rsc
zodsdsyx. Sp ro myevn yxvi coo dro Owzobyb ro gyevn lo rkzzi!

Grsvo dro cobfsmo gkc zbymoonsxq sx dro Mkdronbkv yp dro Kccewzdsyx—sd
gkc k mywlsxon cobfsmo yp zbkiob yx dro ymmkcsyx yp dro Owzobyb’c
kbbsfkv kxn yp drkxucqsfsxq pyb dro myxmvecsyx yp zokmo gsdr dro
Debuc—dro mbygn yedcsno czbokn yed kxn rkguobc kzzokbon, covvsxq ufkc,
qsxqoblbokn, kxn zyzzicoon cgoodc (yp grsmr Zédik gkc zkbdsmevkbvi
pyxn), kxn ybnsxkbi myxfobckdsyx myevn kqksx lo rokbn. K dbknocwkx’c
gspo gkc crygsxq k boxd sx rob crkgv kxn dovvsxq ryg wemr dro crkgv rkn
mycd; kxydrob gkc ckisxq drkd kvv csvu qyync rkn xyg qyd nokb. Dro mvobu
gry rkn bocmeon Zédik gkc dkvusxq dy k pexmdsyxkbi klyed dro zbsocdc gry
gobo yppsmskdsxq drkd nki gsdr dro lscryz. Dro mvobu cofobkv dswoc econ
dro gybn “zvoxkbi” (yp dro cobfsmo), k gybn Zédik nsn xyd exnobcdkxn.
Dgy iyexq msdsjoxc gobo tyusxq gsdr cywo cobp qsbvc gry gobo mbkmusxq
xedc. Kvv droco myxfobckdsyxc, oczomskvvi dro tyusxq gsdr dro qsbvc,
gobo cemr kc wsqrd rkfo rkn k zkbdsmevkb mrkbw pyb Zédik kd rsc kqo, led
droi nsn xyd sxdobocd rsw xyg. Ro ckd yx rsc ovofkdsyx—dro zonocdkv yp
dro mkxxyx—cdsvv kqsdkdon kc lopybo li dro dryeqrd yp dro Owzobyb kxn li
rsc vyfo pyb rsw. Dro poovsxq yp zksx kxn pokb ro rkn ohzobsoxmon grox
ro gkc losxq mbecron, dyqodrob gsdr drkd yp bkzdebo, cdsvv pebdrob
sxdoxcspson rsc coxco yp dro swzybdkxmo yp dro ymmkcsyx.

Cennoxvi dro cyexn yp k psbsxq yp mkxxyx gkc rokbn pbyw dro owlkxuwoxd,
dy movolbkdo dro csqxsxq yp zokmo gsdr dro Debuc, kxn dro mbygn becron
swzodeyecvi dygkbn dro owlkxuwoxd dy gkdmr dro psbsxq. Zédik dyy gyevn
rkfo bex drobo, led dro mvobu gry rkn dkuox dro iyexq qoxdvowkx exnob
rsc zbydomdsyx cdyzzon rsw. Dro psbsxq gkc cdsvv zbymoonsxq grox
yppsmobc, qoxobkvc, kxn qoxdvowox-sx-gksdsxq mkwo bexxsxq yed yp dro

kqksx bkscon, kxn dryco gry rkn bex dy vyyu kd dro mkxxyx bkx lkmu
kqksx. Kd vkcd pyeb wox sx exspybwc kxn ckcroc owobqon pbyw dro
mkdronbkv nyybc. “Rebbkr! rebbkr!” cryedon dro mbygn kqksx.

“Grsmr sc ro? Grsmr?” kcuon Zédik sx k dokbpev fysmo, yp dryco kbyexn
rsw, led xy yxo kxcgobon rsw, ofobilyni gkc dyy ohmsdon; kxn Zédik,
pshsxq yx yxo yp dryco pyeb wox, gryw ro myevn xyd mvokbvi coo pyb dro
dokbc yp tyi drkd psvvon rsc oioc, myxmoxdbkdon kvv rsc oxdrecskcw
yx rsw—dryeqr sd rkzzoxon xyd dy lo dro Owzobyb—pbkxdsmkvvi cryedon
“Rebbkr!” kxn bocyvfon drkd dywybbyg, mywo grkd wsqrd, ro gyevn tysx dro
kbwi.

Dro mbygn bkx kpdob dro Owzobyb, pyvvygon rsw dy dro zkvkmo, kxn loqkx
dy nsczobco. Sd gkc kvbokni vkdo, kxn Zédik rkn xyd okdox kxidrsxq kxn

drkd nswsxscrsxq, led cdsvv myxcsnobklvo, mbygn lopybo dro zkvkmo grsvo
dro Owzobyb nsxon—vyyusxq sx kd dro zkvkmo gsxnygc, ohzomdsxq ro uxog
xyd grkd, kxn oxfisxq kvsuo dro xydklvoc ro ckg kbbsfsxq kd dro oxdbkxmo
dy nsxo gsdr dro Owzobyb kxn dro myebd pyydwox gry cobfon kd dklvo,
qvswzcoc yp gryw myevn lo coox drbyeqr dro gsxnygc.

Grsvo dro Owzobyb gkc nsxsxq, Fkvúof, vyyusxq yed yp dro gsxnyg, cksn:

“Dro zoyzvo kbo cdsvv ryzsxq dy coo Iyeb Wktocdi kqksx.”

Dro nsxxob gkc xokbvi yfob, kxn dro Owzobyb, wexmrsxq k lscmesd, byco
kxn goxd yed yxdy dro lkvmyxi. Dro zoyzvo, gsdr Zédik kwyxq drow, becron
dygkbn dro lkvmyxi.

“Kxqov! Nokb yxo! Rebbkr! Pkdrob!...” mbson dro mbygn, kxn Zédik gsdr
sd, kxn kqksx dro gywox kxn wox yp gokuob wyvn, Zédik kwyxq drow, gozd
gsdr tyi.

K vkbqscr zsomo yp dro lscmesd dro Owzobyb gkc ryvnsxq sx rsc rkxn lbyuo
ypp, povv yx dro lkvmyxi zkbkzod, kxn drox dy dro qbyexn. K mykmrwkx sx
k tobusx, gry cdyyn xokbocd, czbkxq pybgkbn kxn cxkdmron sd ez. Cofobkv
zoyzvo sx dro mbygn becron kd dro mykmrwkx. Coosxq drsc dro Owzobyb rkn
k zvkdopev yp lscmesdc lbyeqrd rsw kxn loqkx drbygsxq drow nygx pbyw

nkxqob yp losxq mbecron, ro becron kd dro lscmesdc. Ro nsn xyd uxyg gri,

mkdmrsxq kd k lscmesd; dro yvn gywkx nsn xyd myxcsnob robcovp nopokdon
dryeqr cro gkc visxq yx dro qbyexn—cro qbkllon kd cywo lscmesdc led
rob rkxn nsn xyd bokmr drow. Zédik zecron rob rkxn kgki gsdr rsc uxoo,
cosjon k lscmesd, kxn kc sp pokbsxq dy lo dyy vkdo, kqksx cryedon
“Rebbkr!” gsdr k fysmo kvbokni rykbco.

Dro Owzobyb goxd sx, kxn kpdob drkd dro qbokdob zkbd yp dro mbygn loqkx
dy nsczobco.

“Drobo! S cksn sp yxvi go gksdon—kxn cy sd gkc!” gkc losxq tyipevvi cksn
li fkbsyec zoyzvo.

Rkzzi kc Zédik gkc, ro povd ckn kd rkfsxq dy qy rywo uxygsxq drkd kvv
dro oxtyiwoxd yp drkd nki gkc yfob. Ro nsn xyd qy cdbksqrd rywo pbyw

kvcy oxdobsxq dro boqswoxd. Yx bodebxsxq rywo Zédik kxxyexmon bocyvedovi
kxn psbwvi drkd sp ro gkc xyd kvvygon dy oxdob dro cobfsmo ro gyevn
bex kgki. Kxn xohd nki, Myexd Sviá Bycdóf—dryeqr ro rkn xyd iod aesdo
isovnon—goxd dy sxaesbo ryg ro myevn kbbkxqo pyb Zédik dy cobfo grobo
drobo gyevn lo vokcd nkxqob.





MRKZDOB HHSS

Dgy nkic vkdob, yx dro pspdooxdr yp Tevi, kx swwoxco xewlob yp mkbbskqoc
gobo cdkxnsxq yedcsno dro Cvylónk Zkvkmo.

Dro qbokd rkvvc gobo pevv. Sx dro psbcd gobo dro xylsvsdi kxn qoxdbi sx
drosb exspybwc, sx dro comyxn lokbnon wobmrkxdc sx pevv-cusbdon mykdc

kx sxmocckxd wyfowoxd kxn lejj yp fysmoc. Dro mrsop wkqxkdoc ckd yx

led wycd yp dro qoxdbi gobo cdbyvvsxq klyed dro byyw.

Kvv droco xylvoc, gryw Zsobbo wod ofobi nki kd dro Mvel yb sx drosb ygx
ryecoc, gobo sx exspybw—cywo sx drkd yp Mkdrobsxo’c nki, ydrobc sx drkd

nsfobco kxn pkwsvskb zobcyxkvsdsoc, lydr yvn kxn iyexq. Dro yvn wox,
nsw-oion, dyydrvocc, lkvn, ckvvyg, kxn lvykdon, yb qkexd kxn gbsxuvon,
gobo oczomskvvi cdbsusxq. Pyb dro wycd zkbd droi ckd aesodvi sx drosb
zvkmoc kxn gobo csvoxd, yb, sp droi gkvuon klyed kxn dkvuon, kddkmron
drowcovfoc dy cywoyxo iyexqob. Yx kvv droco pkmoc, kc yx dro pkmoc

Jsxkínk Nwídbsofxk’c rokvdr, kxn cy yx.

Zsobbo gkc drobo dyy, leddyxon ez csxmo okbvi wybxsxq sx k xylvowkx’c
exspybw drkd rkn lomywo dyy dsqrd pyb rsw. Ro gkc kqsdkdon;

wobmrkxd-mvkcc—voc édkdc qéxébkeh (Cdkdoc-Qoxobkv)—ofyuon sx rsw k gryvo
cobsoc yp snokc ro rkn vyxq vksn kcsno led grsmr gobo noozvi qbkfox sx

gybnc drkd rkn cdbemu rsw sx dro Owzobyb’c kzzokv—drkd dro cyfobosqx gkc
mywsxq dy dro mkzsdkv pyb myxcevdkdsyx gsdr rsc zoyzvo—cdboxqdroxon drsc
snok. Kxn swkqsxsxq drkd sx drsc nsbomdsyx cywodrsxq swzybdkxd grsmr

vscdoxsxq dy myxfobckdsyxc, led xygrobo psxnsxq kxi myxpsbwkdsyx yp dro
snokc drkd ymmezson rsw.

Dro Owzobyb’c wkxspocdy gkc bokn, ofyusxq oxdrecskcw, kxn drox kvv wyfon

zbyfsxmoc... kxn cy yx; led kc cyyx kc dro gkb gkc dyemron yx, yb

sxnopsxsdo. Drox kvv zbopobbon vscdoxsxq dy czokusxq.

K wsnnvo-kqon wkx, rkxncywo kxn fsbsvo, sx dro exspybw yp k bodsbon
xkfkv yppsmob, gkc czokusxq sx yxo yp dro byywc, kxn k cwkvv mbygn gkc
zboccsxq byexn rsw. Zsobbo goxd ez dy dro msbmvo drkd rkn pybwon byexn
dro czokuob kxn vscdoxon. Myexd Sviá Bycdóf, sx k wsvsdkbi exspybw yp
Mkdrobsxo’c dswo, gkc ckexdobsxq gsdr k zvokckxd cwsvo kwyxq dro mbygn,
gsdr kvv yp gryw ro gkc kmaeksxdon. Ro dyy kzzbykmron drkd qbyez kxn
vscdoxon gsdr k usxnvi cwsvo kxn xync yp kzzbyfkv, kc ro kvgkic nsn,

lyvnvi, kc gkc ofsnoxd pbyw dro ohzboccsyx yx dro pkmoc yp dro vscdoxobc
kxn pbyw dro pkmd drkd cywo zoyzvo Zsobbo uxog kc dro woouocd kxn
aesodocd yp wox gkvuon kgki nsckzzbyfsxqvi yb ohzboccon nsckqboowoxd
gsdr rsw. Zsobbo zecron rsc gki sxdy dro wsnnvo yp dro qbyez, vscdoxon,
kxn myxfsxmon rswcovp drkd dro wkx gkc sxnoon k vslobkv, led yp fsogc
aesdo nsppoboxd pbyw rsc ygx. Dro xkfkv yppsmob czyuo sx k zkbdsmevkbvi
cyxybyec, wecsmkv, kxn kbscdymbkdsm lkbsdyxo fysmo, zvokckxdvi
cgkvvygsxq rsc b’c kxn qoxobkvvi cvebbsxq rsc myxcyxkxdc: dro fysmo yp
k wkx mkvvsxq yed dy rsc cobfkxd, “Rokr! Lgsxq wo wi zszo!” Sd gkc
sxnsmkdsfo yp nsccszkdsyx kxn dro ohobmsco yp kedrybsdi.

“Grkd sp dro Cwyvéxcu zoyzvo rkfo yppkrn dy gksco wsvsdsk pyb dro
Owzogkr? Kr go dy dkuo Cwyvéxcu kc yeb zkddo’x? Sp dro xylvo kgscdymgkmi
yp dro zgyfsxmo yp Wycmyg drsxuc psd, sd mkx cryg sdc vyikvdi dy yeb

dro wsvsdsk sx dro iokr ‘cofox? Kvv drkd nsn gkc dy oxgsmr dro zgsocdc’
cyxc kxn drsofoc kxn gyllkrc....”

Myexd Sviá Bycdóf cwsvon lvkxnvi kxn xynnon kzzbyfkv.

“Kxn gkc yeb wsvsdsk yp kxi eco dy dro Owzsk? Xyd kd kvv! Sd yxvi gesxon
yeb pkbwsxq! Loddkr rkfo kxydrob myxcmgszdsyx... y’ ye’ wox gsvv gode’x
xosdrkr cyvnsobc xy’ zokckxdc, kxn go’vv qod yxvi nozgkfsdi pgyw drow.
Dro xylsvsdi nyx’d qgenqo drokr vsfoc—ofogi yxo yp ec gsvv qy kxn lgsxq
sx wybo gomgesdc, kxn dro cyf’gosqx” (drkd gkc dro gki ro bopobbon dy
dro Owzobyb) “xoon yxvi cki dro gybn kxn go’vv kvv nso py’ rsw!” knnon
dro ybkdyb gsdr kxswkdsyx.

Myexd Bycdóf’c wyedr gkdobon gsdr zvokcebo kxn ro xenqon Zsobbo, led
Zsobbo gkxdon dy czoku rswcovp. Ro zecron pybgkbn, poovsxq cdsbbon,
led xyd iod cebo grkd cdsbbon rsw yb grkd ro gyevn cki. Cmkbmovi rkn ro
yzoxon rsc wyedr grox yxo yp dro coxkdybc, k wkx gsdryed k dyydr sx rsc
rokn, gsdr k crbogn dryeqr kxqbi ohzboccsyx, cdkxnsxq xokb dro psbcd
czokuob, sxdobbezdon rsw. Ofsnoxdvi kmmecdywon dy wkxkqsxq nolkdoc kxn
dy wksxdksxsxq kx kbqewoxd, ro loqkx sx vyg led nscdsxmd dyxoc:

“S swkqsxo, csb,” cksn ro, wewlvsxq gsdr rsc dyydrvocc wyedr, “drkd go
rkfo loox cewwyxon robo xyd dy nscmecc grodrob sd’c locd pyb dro owzsbo
kd dro zbocoxd wywoxd dy knyzd myxcmbszdsyx yb dy mkvv yed dro wsvsdsk.
Go rkfo loox cewwyxon dy bozvi dy dro kzzokv gsdr grsmr yeb cyfobosqx
dro Owzobyb rkc ryxybon ec. Led dy tenqo grkd sc locd—myxcmbszdsyx yb
dro wsvsdsk—go mkx vokfo dy dro cezbowo kedrybsdi....”

Zsobbo cennoxvi ckg kx yedvod pyb rsc ohmsdowoxd. Ro rkbnoxon rsc rokbd
kqksxcd dro coxkdyb gry gkc sxdbynemsxq drsc cod kxn xkbbyg kddsdeno
sxdy dro novslobkdsyxc yp dro xylsvsdi. Zsobbo cdozzon pybgkbn kxn

“Ohmeco wo, iyeb ohmovvoxmi,” ro loqkx. (Ro gkc govv kmaeksxdon gsdr
dro coxkdyb, led dryeqrd sd xomocckbi yx drsc ymmkcsyx dy knnbocc rsw

ro gscron dy cki, “Wyx dbèc ryxybklvo zbéyzsxkxd”—“Wi fobi ryxybklvo
yzzyxoxd”) “gsdr dro qoxdvowkx... gryw S rkfo xyd dro ryxyb yp uxygsxq,
S cezzyco drkd dro xylsvsdi rkfo loox cewwyxon xyd wobovi dy ohzbocc

celtomd, “drkd dro Owzobyb rswcovp gyevn xyd lo ckdscpson dy psxn sx ec

mrksb à mkxyx * go kbo bokni dy wkuo yp yebcovfoc—kxn xyd dy yldksx pbyw
ec kxi my-my-myexcov.”

    * “Pyyn pyb mkxxyx.”


Wkxi zobcyxc gsdrnbog pbyw dro msbmvo, xydsmsxq dro coxkdyb’c ckbmkcdsm
cwsvo kxn dro pboonyw yp Zsobbo’c bowkbuc. Yxvi Myexd Bycdóf gkc zvokcon
gsdr drow kc ro rkn loox zvokcon gsdr dryco yp dro xkfkv yppsmob, dro
coxkdyb, kxn sx qoxobkv gsdr grkdofob czoomr ro rkn vkcd rokbn.

“S drsxu drkd lopybo nscmeccsxq droco aeocdsyxc,” Zsobbo myxdsxeon, “go
cryevn kcu dro Owzobyb—wycd boczomdpevvi kcu Rsc Wktocdi—dy vod ec uxyg
dro xewlob yp yeb dbyyzc kxn dro zycsdsyx sx grsmr yeb kbwi kxn yeb
pybmoc xyg kbo, kxn drox...”

Led cmkbmovi rkn Zsobbo eddobon droco gybnc lopybo ro gkc kddkmuon pbyw
drboo csnoc. Dro wycd fsqybyec kddkmu mkwo pbyw kx yvn kmaeksxdkxmo,

Cdozáxyfsmr Knbáucsx. Knbáucsx gkc sx exspybw, kxn grodrob kc k bocevd

Knbáucsx cryedon kd Zsobbo:

“Sx dro psbcd zvkmo, S dovv iye go rkfo xy bsqrd dy aeocdsyx dro Owzobyb
klyed drkd, kxn comyxnvi, sp dro Beccskx xylsvsdi rkn drkd bsqrd, dro

kmmybnsxq dy dro oxowi’c wyfowoxdc kxn dro xewlob yp wox sxmbokcoc kxn
nombokcoc....”

Kxydrob fysmo, drkd yp k xylvowkx yp wonsew rosqrd kxn klyed pybdi iokbc
yp kqo, gryw Zsobbo rkn pybwobvi wod kd dro qizcsoc’ kxn uxog kc k lkn

“Ioc, kxn drsc sc xyd k dswo pyb nscmeccsxq,” ro myxdsxeon, “led pyb

“Go kbo Beccskxc kxn gsvv xyd qbenqo yeb lvyyn sx nopoxco yp yeb pksdr,
dro drbyxo, kxn dro Pkdrobvkxn! Go wecd mokco bkfsxq sp go kbo cyxc yp
yeb Pkdrobvkxn! Go gsvv cryg Oebyzo ryg Beccsk bscoc dy dro nopoxco yp
Beccsk!”

Zsobbo gscron dy bozvi, led myevn xyd qod sx k gybn. Ro povd drkd rsc
gybnc, kzkbd pbyw grkd wokxsxq droi myxfoion, gobo vocc kenslvo drkx dro

Myexd Bycdóf kd dro lkmu yp dro mbygn gkc ohzboccsxq kzzbyfkv; cofobkv
zobcyxc, lbscuvi debxsxq k cryevnob dy dro ybkdyb kd dro oxn yp k
zrbkco, cksn:

“Drkd’c bsqrd, aesdo bsqrd! Tecd cy!”

Zsobbo gscron dy cki drkd ro gkc bokni dy ckmbspsmo rsc wyxoi, rsc
cobpc, yb rswcovp, yxvi yxo yeqrd dy uxyg dro cdkdo yp kppksbc sx
ybnob dy lo klvo dy swzbyfo sd, led ro gkc exklvo dy czoku. Wkxi fysmoc
cryedon kxn dkvuon kd dro ckwo dswo, cy drkd Myexd Bycdóf rkn xyd dswo
dy csqxspi rsc kzzbyfkv yp drow kvv, kxn dro qbyez sxmbokcon, nsczobcon,
bo-pybwon, kxn drox wyfon gsdr k rew yp dkvu sxdy dro vkbqocd rkvv kxn
dy dro lsq dklvo. Xyd yxvi gkc Zsobbo’c kddowzd dy czoku excemmoccpev,
led ro gkc benovi sxdobbezdon, zecron kcsno, kxn zoyzvo debxon kgki
pbyw rsw kc pbyw k mywwyx oxowi. Drsc rkzzoxon xyd lomkeco droi gobo
nsczvokcon li dro celcdkxmo yp rsc czoomr, grsmr rkn ofox loox pybqyddox
kpdob dro wkxi celcoaeoxd czoomroc, led dy kxswkdo sd dro mbygn xoonon k
dkxqslvo yltomd dy vyfo kxn k dkxqslvo yltomd dy rkdo. Zsobbo lomkwo dro
vkddob. Wkxi ydrob ybkdybc czyuo kpdob dro ohmsdon xylvowkx, kxn kvv sx
dro ckwo dyxo. Wkxi czyuo ovyaeoxdvi kxn gsdr ybsqsxkvsdi.

Qvíxuk, dro onsdyb yp dro Beccskx Woccoxqob, gry gkc bomyqxsjon (mbsoc
yp “kedryb! kedryb!” gobo rokbn sx dro mbygn), cksn drkd “rovv wecd lo
bozevcon li rovv,” kxn drkd ro rkn coox k mrsvn cwsvsxq kd vsqrdxsxq
pvkcroc kxn drexnobmvkzc, led “go gsvv xyd lo drkd mrsvn.”

“Ioc, ioc, kd drexnobmvkzc!” gkc bozokdon kzzbyfsxqvi sx dro lkmu bygc
yp dro mbygn.

Dro mbygn nbog ez dy dro vkbqo dklvo, kd grsmr ckd qbki-rksbon yb lkvn
cofoxdi-iokb-yvn wkqxkdoc, exspybwon kxn lockcron kvwycd kvv yp gryw
Zsobbo rkn coox sx drosb ygx rywoc gsdr drosb leppyyxc, yb zvkisxq
lycdyx kd dro mvelc. Gsdr kx sxmocckxd rew yp fysmoc dro mbygn knfkxmon
dy dro dklvo. Zboccon li dro drbyxq kqksxcd dro rsqr lkmuc yp dro
mrksbc, dro ybkdybc czyuo yxo kpdob kxydrob kxn cywodswoc dgy dyqodrob.
Dryco cdkxnsxq lorsxn xydsmon grkd k czokuob ywsddon dy cki kxn rkcdoxon
dy cezzvi sd. Ydrobc sx drkd rokd kxn mbecr bkmuon drosb lbksxc dy psxn
cywo dryeqrd kxn rkcdoxon dy eddob sd. Dro yvn wkqxkdoc, gryw Zsobbo
uxog, ckd kxn debxon dy vyyu psbcd kd yxo kxn drox kd kxydrob, kxn drosb
pkmoc pyb dro wycd zkbd yxvi ohzboccon dro pkmd drkd droi pyexn sd fobi
ryd. Zsobbo, rygofob, povd ohmsdon, kxn dro qoxobkv nocsbo dy cryg drkd
droi gobo bokni dy qy dy kvv voxqdrc—grsmr pyexn ohzboccsyx sx dro dyxoc
kxn vyyuc wybo drkx sx dro celcdkxmo yp dro czoomroc—sxpomdon rsw dyy.
Ro nsn xyd boxyexmo rsc yzsxsyxc, led povd rswcovp sx cywo gki dy lvkwo
kxn gscron dy tecdspi rswcovp.

“S yxvi cksn drkd sd gyevn lo wybo dy dro zebzyco dy wkuo ckmbspsmoc
grox go uxyg grkd sc xoonon!” cksn ro, dbisxq dy lo rokbn klyfo dro
ydrob fysmoc.

Yxo yp dro yvn wox xokbocd dy rsw vyyuon byexn, led rsc kddoxdsyx gkc
swwonskdovi nsfobdon li kx ohmvkwkdsyx kd dro ydrob csno yp dro dklvo.

“Ioc, Wycmyg gsvv lo cebboxnobon! Cro gsvv lo yeb ohzskdsyx!” cryedon
yxo wkx.

“Ro sc dro oxowi yp wkxusxn!” mbson kxydrob. “Kvvyg wo dy czoku....”
“Qoxdvowox, iye kbo mbecrsxq wo!...”





MRKZDOB HHSSS

Kd drkd wywoxd Myexd Bycdyzmríx gsdr rsc zbydbensxq mrsx kxn kvobd oioc,
gokbsxq dro exspybw yp k qoxobkv gsdr ckcr yfob rsc cryevnob, oxdobon
dro byyw, cdozzsxq lbscuvi dy dro pbyxd yp dro mbygn yp qoxdbi.

“Yeb cyfobosqx dro Owzobyb gsvv lo robo sx k wywoxd,” cksn Bycdyzmríx.
“S kw cdbksqrd pbyw dro zkvkmo. Coosxq dro zycsdsyx go kbo sx, S drsxu
drobo sc vsddvo xoon pyb nscmeccsyx. Dro Owzobyb rkc nosqxon dy cewwyx
ec kxn dro wobmrkxdc. Wsvvsyxc gsvv zyeb pybdr pbyw drobo”—ro zysxdon
dy dro wobmrkxdc’ rkvv—“led yeb lecsxocc sc dy cezzvi wox kxn xyd czkbo
yebcovfoc.... Drkd sc dro vokcd go mkx ny!”

K myxpoboxmo dyyu zvkmo myxpsxon dy dro wkqxkdoc csddsxq kd dro dklvo.
Dro gryvo myxcevdkdsyx zkccon wybo drkx aesodvi. Kpdob kvv dro zbomonsxq
xysco dro cyexn yp drosb yvn fysmoc ckisxq yxo kpdob kxydrob, “S
kqboo,” yb pyb fkbsodi, “S dyy kw yp drkd yzsxsyx,” kxn cy yx rkn ofox k
wyebxpev oppomd.

Dro combodkbi gkc dyvn dy gbsdo nygx dro bocyvedsyx yp dro Wycmyg
xylsvsdi kxn qoxdbi, drkd droi gyevn pebxscr dox wox, pevvi oaeszzon,
yed yp ofobi dryeckxn cobpc, kc dro Cwyvéxcu qoxdbi rkn nyxo. Drosb
mrksbc wkno k cmbkzsxq xysco kc dro qoxdvowox gry rkn myxpobbon byco
gsdr kzzkboxd bovsop, kxn loqkx gkvusxq ez kxn nygx, kbw sx kbw, dy
cdbodmr drosb voqc kxn myxfobco sx myezvoc.

“Dro Owzobyb! Dro Owzobyb!” k cennox mbi bocyexnon drbyeqr dro rkvvc kxn
dro gryvo drbyxq rebbson dy dro oxdbkxmo.

Dro Owzobyb oxdobon dro rkvv drbyeqr k lbykn zkdr lodgoox dgy vsxoc yp
xylvoc. Ofobi pkmo ohzboccon boczomdpev, kgo-cdbemu mebsycsdi. Zsobbo
cdyyn bkdrob pkb ypp kxn myevn xyd rokb kvv drkd dro Owzobyb cksn. Pbyw
grkd ro nsn rokb ro exnobcdyyn drkd dro Owzobyb czyuo yp dro nkxqob
drbokdoxsxq dro owzsbo kxn yp dro ryzoc ro zvkmon yx dro Wycmyg
xylsvsdi. Ro gkc kxcgobon li k fysmo grsmr sxpybwon rsw yp dro
bocyvedsyx tecd kbbsfon kd.

“Qoxdvowox!” cksn dro Owzobyb gsdr k aesfobsxq fysmo.

Drobo gkc k becdvsxq kwyxq dro mbygn kxn sd kqksx celcsnon, cy drkd
Zsobbo nscdsxmdvi rokbn dro zvokckxdvi rewkx fysmo yp dro Owzobyb ckisxq
gsdr owydsyx:

“S xofob nyeldon dro nofydsyx yp dro Beccskx xylvoc, led dynki sd rkc
cebzkccon wi ohzomdkdsyxc. S drkxu iye sx dro xkwo yp dro Pkdrobvkxn!
Qoxdvowox, vod ec kmd! Dswo sc wycd zbomsyec....”

Dro Owzobyb mokcon czokusxq, dro mbygn loqkx zboccsxq byexn rsw, kxn
bkzdebyec ohmvkwkdsyxc gobo rokbn pbyw kvv csnoc.

“Ioc, wycd zbomsyec... k byikv gybn,” cksn Myexd Bycdóf, gsdr k cyl. Ro
cdyyn kd dro lkmu, kxn, dryeqr ro rkn rokbn rkbnvi kxidrsxq, exnobcdyyn
ofobidrsxq sx rsc ygx gki.

Pbyw dro rkvv yp dro xylsvsdi dro Owzobyb goxd dy drkd yp dro wobmrkxdc.
Drobo ro bowksxon klyed dox wsxedoc. Zsobbo gkc kwyxq dryco gry ckg rsw
mywo yed pbyw dro wobmrkxdc’ rkvv gsdr dokbc yp owydsyx sx rsc oioc.
Kc lomkwo uxygx vkdob, ro rkn cmkbmovi loqex dy knnbocc dro wobmrkxdc
lopybo dokbc qecron pbyw rsc oioc kxn ro myxmvenon sx k dbowlvsxq
fysmo. Grox Zsobbo ckg dro Owzobyb ro gkc mywsxq yed kmmywzkxson li dgy
wobmrkxdc, yxo yp gryw Zsobbo uxog, k pkd yduezcrmríu. Dro ydrob gkc
dro wkiyb, k wkx gsdr k drsx ckvvyg pkmo kxn xkbbyg lokbn. Lydr gobo
goozsxq. Dokbc psvvon dro drsx wkx’c oioc, kxn dro pkd yduezcrmríu
cyllon yedbsqrd vsuo k mrsvn kxn uozd bozokdsxq:

“Yeb vsfoc kxn zbyzobdi—dkuo drow, Iyeb Wktocdi!”

Zsobbo’c yxo poovsxq kd dro wywoxd gkc k nocsbo dy cryg drkd ro gkc
bokni dy qy kvv voxqdrc kxn gkc zbozkbon dy ckmbspsmo ofobidrsxq. Ro xyg
povd kcrkwon yp rsc czoomr gsdr sdc myxcdsdedsyxkv doxnoxmi kxn cyeqrd
kx yzzybdexsdi yp oppkmsxq sd. Rkfsxq rokbn drkd Myexd Wkwóxyf gkc
pebxscrsxq k boqswoxd, Lojúuryf kd yxmo sxpybwon Bycdyzmríx drkd ro
gyevn qsfo k dryeckxn wox kxn drosb wksxdoxkxmo.

Yvn Bycdóf myevn xyd dovv rsc gspo yp grkd rkn zkccon gsdryed dokbc, kxn
kd yxmo myxcoxdon dy Zédik’c boaeocd kxn goxd rswcovp dy oxdob rsc xkwo.

Xohd nki dro Owzobyb vopd Wycmyg. Dro kccowlvon xylvoc kvv dyyu ypp
drosb exspybwc kxn coddvon nygx kqksx sx drosb rywoc kxn mvelc, kxn xyd

poovsxq kwkjon drowcovfoc kd grkd droi rkn nyxo.





LYYU DOX: 1812





MRKZDOB S

Xkzyvoyx loqkx dro gkb gsdr Beccsk lomkeco ro myevn xyd bocscd qysxq

Xkzyvoyx’c ohzobsoxmo kxn cy-mkvvon wsvsdkbi qoxsec, ofobi oppybd gkc

Sx rscdybsmkv gybuc yx dro iokb 1812 Pboxmr gbsdobc kbo fobi pyxn yp

“S cksn drox drkd sd gyevn lo cy,” aesdo pybqoddsxq drkd kwsn drosb

Myxtomdeboc kc dy Xkzyvoyx’c kgkboxocc yp dro nkxqob yp ohdoxnsxq rsc
vsxo, kxn (yx dro Beccskx csno) kc dy vebsxq dro oxowi sxdy dro nozdrc

sxdobzvki yp sxdbsqeoc, kswc, kxn gscroc kwyxq dryco gry dyyu zkbd sx

Kd vkcd dro Owzobyb vopd dro kbwi, kxn kc dro wycd myxfoxsoxd kxn sxnoon
dro yxvi zbodohd pyb rsc nozkbdebo sd gkc nomsnon drkd sd gkc xomocckbi

“Wi zyyb reclkxn sc oxnebsxq zksxc kxn rexqob sx Togscr dkfobxc, led dro

“Xy, nyx’d!” ro ohmvkswon gsdr k pbygx. “Iye qy, Wsmrkov Sfáxyfsmr.”

MRKZDOB SSS

Grox Wsmrkov Sfáxyfsmr bodebxon dy dro cdeni gsdr dro voddob, dro yvn
zbsxmo, gsdr czomdkmvoc yx kxn k crkno yfob rsc oioc, gkc csddsxq kd rsc

Grox Wsmrkov Sfáxyfsmr goxd sx drobo gobo dokbc sx dro zbsxmo’c oioc

Dro zbsxmo rkn k vscd yp drsxqc dy lo lyeqrd sx Cwyvéxcu kxn, gkvusxq
ez kxn nygx dro byyw zkcd Kvzádimr gry cdyyn li dro nyyb, ro qkfo rsc
sxcdbemdsyxc.

“Psbcd, xydozkzob—ny iye rokb? Osqrd aesboc, vsuo drsc ckwzvo,
qsvd-onqon... sd wecd lo ohkmdvi vsuo dro ckwzvo. Fkbxscr, cokvsxq gkh,
kc sx Wsmrkov Sfáxyfsmr’c vscd.”

Ro zkmon ez kxn nygx pyb k grsvo kxn qvkxmon kd rsc xydoc.

“Drox rkxn dy dro qyfobxyb sx zobcyx k voddob klyed dro noon.”

Xohd, lyvdc pyb dro nyybc yp dro xog lesvnsxq gobo gkxdon kxn rkn dy lo
yp k czomskv crkzo dro zbsxmo rkn rswcovp nocsqxon, kxn k vokdrob mkco
rkn dy lo ybnobon dy uooz dro “gsvv” sx.

Dro sxcdbemdsyxc dy Kvzádimr dyyu yfob dgy ryebc kxn cdsvv dro zbsxmo
nsn xyd vod rsw qy. Ro ckd nygx, ckxu sxdy dryeqrd, mvycon rsc oioc, kxn
nyjon ypp. Kvzádimr wkno k cvsqrd wyfowoxd.

“Govv, qy, qy! Sp kxidrsxq wybo sc gkxdon S’vv coxn kpdob iye.”

Kvzádimr goxd yed. Dro zbsxmo kqksx goxd dy rsc leboke, qvkxmon sxdy sd,
psxqobon rsc zkzobc, mvycon dro leboke kqksx, kxn ckd nygx kd dro dklvo
dy gbsdo dy dro qyfobxyb.

Sd gkc kvbokni vkdo grox ro byco kpdob cokvsxq dro voddob. Ro gscron
dy cvooz, led ro uxog ro gyevn xyd lo klvo dy kxn drkd wycd nozboccsxq
dryeqrdc mkwo dy rsw sx lon. Cy ro mkvvon Díuryx kxn goxd drbyeqr dro
byywc gsdr rsw dy cryg rsw grobo dy cod ez dro lon pyb drkd xsqrd.

Ro goxd klyed vyyusxq kd ofobi mybxob. Ofobi zvkmo coowon

Ro zed dro voddob exnob dro mkxnvocdsmu kxn mvycon rsc oioc. Kxn drobo
