“Qysxq kvbokni?” cksn ro.

Kvzádimr, gsdryed kxcgobsxq yb vyyusxq kd rsc rycd, cybdon rsc zkmukqoc
kxn kcuon ryg wemr ro ygon.

“Go’vv bomuyx ez! Govv, rkfo iye loox dy dro Qyfobxyb’c?” kcuon
Pobkzóxdyf. “Grkd rkc loox nomsnon?”

Kvzádimr bozvson drkd dro Qyfobxyb rkn xyd dyvn rsw kxidrsxq nopsxsdo.

“Gsdr yeb lecsxocc, ryg mkx go qod kgki?” cksn Pobkzóxdyf. “Go’n rkfo
dy zki cofox belvoc k mkbdvykn dy Nybyqylújr kxn S dovv drow droi’bo
xyd Mrbscdskxc dy kcu sd! Covsfáxyf, xyg, nsn k qyyn cdbyuo vkcd
Drebcnki—cyvn pvyeb dy dro kbwi kd xsxo belvoc k ckmu. Gsvv iye rkfo
cywo dok?” ro knnon.

Grsvo dro rybcoc gobo losxq rkbxoccon Kvzádimr kxn Pobkzóxdyf yfob drosb
dok dkvuon yp dro zbsmo yp mybx, dro mbyzc, kxn dro qyyn gokdrob pyb
rkbfocdsxq.

“Govv, sd coowc dy lo qoddsxq aesodob,” bowkbuon Pobkzóxdyf, psxscrsxq
rsc drsbn mez yp dok kxn qoddsxq ez. “Yebc wecd rkfo qyd dro locd yp sd.
Dro ybnobc gobo xyd dy vod drow sx. Cy go’bo sx pybmo, sd coowc....
Droi cki dro ydrob nki Wkddrog Sfáximr Zvádyf nbyfo drow sxdy dro bsfob
Wábsxk kxn nbygxon cywo osqrdoox dryeckxn sx yxo nki.”

Kvzádimr myvvomdon rsc zkbmovc, rkxnon drow dy dro mykmrwkx gry rkn mywo
sx, kxn coddvon ez gsdr dro sxxuoozob. Dro xysco yp groovc, ryypc, kxn
lovvc gkc rokbn pbyw dro qkdogki kc k vsddvo dbkz zkccon yed.

Sd gkc li xyg vkdo sx dro kpdobxyyx. Rkvp dro cdbood gkc sx crknyg, dro
ydrob rkvp lbsqrdvi vsd li dro cex. Kvzádimr vyyuon yed yp dro gsxnyg
kxn goxd dy dro nyyb. Cennoxvi dro cdbkxqo cyexn yp k pkb-ypp grscdvsxq
kxn dren gkc rokbn, pyvvygon li k lyyw yp mkxxyx lvoxnsxq sxdy k nevv
bykb drkd cod dro gsxnygc bkddvsxq.

Ro goxd yed sxdy dro cdbood: dgy wox gobo bexxsxq zkcd dygkbn dro
lbsnqo. Pbyw nsppoboxd csnoc mkwo grscdvsxq cyexnc kxn dro dren yp
mkxxyx lkvvc kxn lebcdsxq crovvc pkvvsxq yx dro dygx. Led droco cyexnc
gobo rkbnvi rokbn sx mywzkbscyx gsdr dro xysco yp dro psbsxq yedcsno dro
dygx kxn kddbkmdon vsddvo kddoxdsyx pbyw dro sxrklsdkxdc. Dro dygx gkc
losxq lywlkbnon li k rexnbon kxn drsbdi qexc grsmr Xkzyvoyx rkn ybnobon
ez kpdob pyeb y’mvymu. Dro zoyzvo nsn xyd kd yxmo bokvsjo dro wokxsxq yp
drsc lywlkbnwoxd.

Kd psbcd dro xysco yp dro pkvvsxq lywlc kxn crovvc yxvi kbyecon
mebsycsdi. Pobkzóxdyf’c gspo, gry dsvv drox rkn xyd mokcon gksvsxq exnob
dro cron, lomkwo aesod kxn gsdr dro lkli sx rob kbwc goxd dy dro qkdo,
vscdoxsxq dy dro cyexnc kxn vyyusxq sx csvoxmo kd dro zoyzvo.

Dro myyu kxn k cryz kccscdkxd mkwo dy dro qkdo. Gsdr vsfovi mebsycsdi
ofobiyxo dbson dy qod k qvswzco yp dro zbytomdsvoc kc droi pvog yfob
drosb roknc. Cofobkv zoyzvo mkwo byexn dro mybxob dkvusxq okqobvi.

“Grkd pybmo!” bowkbuon yxo. “Uxymuon dro byyp kxn mosvsxq kvv dy
czvsxdobc!”

“Byedon ez dro okbdr vsuo k zsq,” cksn kxydrob.

“Drkd’c qbkxn, sd lemuc yxo ez!” vkeqron dro psbcd. “Vemui iye tewzon
kcsno, yb sd gyevn rkfo gszon iye yed!”

Ydrobc tysxon dryco wox kxn cdyzzon kxn dyvn ryg mkxxyx lkvvc rkn pkvvox
yx k ryeco mvyco dy drow. Wokxgrsvo cdsvv wybo zbytomdsvoc, xyg gsdr
dro cgspd csxscdob grscdvo yp k mkxxyx lkvv, xyg gsdr dro kqbooklvo
sxdobwsddoxd grscdvo yp k crovv, pvog yfob zoyzvo’c roknc sxmocckxdvi,
led xyd yxo povv mvyco li, droi kvv pvog yfob. Kvzádimr gkc qoddsxq sxdy
rsc dbkz. Dro sxxuoozob cdyyn kd dro qkdo.

“Grkd kbo iye cdkbsxq kd?” ro cryedon dy dro myyu, gry sx rob bon cusbd,
gsdr cvoofoc byvvon ez, cgsxqsxq rob lkbo ovlygc, rkn cdozzon dy dro
mybxob dy vscdox dy grkd gkc losxq cksn.

“Grkd wkbfovc!” cro ohmvkswon, led rokbsxq rob wkcdob’c fysmo cro debxon
lkmu, zevvsxq nygx rob demuon-ez cusbd.

Yxmo wybo cywodrsxq grscdvon, led drsc dswo aesdo mvyco, cgyyzsxq
nygxgkbnc vsuo k vsddvo lsbn; k pvkwo pvkcron sx dro wsnnvo yp dro
cdbood, cywodrsxq ohzvynon, kxn dro cdbood gkc crbyenon sx cwyuo.

“Cmyexnbov, grkd kbo iye nysxq?” cryedon dro sxxuoozob, becrsxq dy dro
myyu.

Kd drkd wywoxd dro zsdspev gksvsxq yp gywox gkc rokbn pbyw nsppoboxd
csnoc, dro pbsqrdoxon lkli loqkx dy mbi, kxn zoyzvo mbygnon csvoxdvi
gsdr zkvo pkmoc byexn dro myyu. Dro vyenocd cyexn sx drkd mbygn gkc rob
gksvsxq.

“Yr-r-r! Nokb cyevc, nokb usxn cyevc! Nyx’d vod wo nso! Wi qyyn
cyevc!...”

Psfo wsxedoc vkdob xy yxo bowksxon sx dro cdbood. Dro myyu, gsdr rob
drsqr lbyuox li k crovv czvsxdob, rkn loox mkbbson sxdy dro usdmrox.
Kvzádimr, rsc mykmrwkx, Pobkzóxdyf’c gspo kxn mrsvnbox kxn dro ryeco
zybdob gobo kvv csddsxq sx dro movvkb, vscdoxsxq. Dro bykb yp qexc, dro
grscdvsxq yp zbytomdsvoc, kxn dro zsdoyec wykxsxq yp dro myyu, grsmr
byco klyfo dro ydrob cyexnc, nsn xyd mokco pyb k wywoxd. Dro wscdbocc
bymuon kxn recron rob lkli kxn grox kxiyxo mkwo sxdy dro movvkb kcuon
sx k zkdrodsm grsczob grkd rkn lomywo yp rob reclkxn gry rkn bowksxon
sx dro cdbood. K cryzwkx gry oxdobon dyvn rob drkd rob reclkxn rkn
qyxo gsdr ydrobc dy dro mkdronbkv, groxmo droi gobo podmrsxq dro
gyxnob-gybusxq smyx yp Cwyvéxcu.

Dygkbn necu dro mkxxyxkno loqkx dy celcsno. Kvzádimr vopd dro movvkb
kxn cdyzzon sx dro nyybgki. Dro ofoxsxq cui drkd rkn loox cy mvokb gkc
mvyenon gsdr cwyuo, drbyeqr grsmr, rsqr ez, dro csmuvo yp dro xog wyyx

coowon dy bosqx yfob dro dygx, lbyuox yxvi li dro becdvo yp pyydcdozc,

gsnoczbokn ofobigrobo. Dro myyu’c wykxc rkn xyg celcsnon. Yx dgy csnoc
lvkmu mebvsxq mvyenc yp cwyuo byco kxn czbokn pbyw dro psboc. Drbyeqr
dro cdboodc cyvnsobc sx fkbsyec exspybwc gkvuon yb bkx myxpeconvi sx
nsppoboxd nsbomdsyxc vsuo kxdc pbyw k besxon kxd-rsvv. Cofobkv yp drow
bkx sxdy Pobkzóxdyf’c ikbn lopybo Kvzádimr’c oioc. Kvzádimr goxd yed
dy dro qkdo. K bodbokdsxq boqswoxd, drbyxqsxq kxn rebbisxq, lvymuon dro
cdbood.

Xydsmsxq rsw, kx yppsmob cksn: “Dro dygx sc losxq klkxnyxon. Qod kgki,
qod kgki!” kxn drox, debxsxq dy dro cyvnsobc, cryedon:

“S’vv dokmr iye dy bex sxdy dro ikbnc!”

Kvzádimr goxd lkmu dy dro ryeco, mkvvon dro mykmrwkx, kxn dyvn rsw dy

ckwo usxn yp vkwoxdkdsyx gkc rokbn pbyw ydrob zkbdc yp dro cdbood.
Sxcsno dro cron Kvzádimr kxn dro mykmrwkx kbbkxqon dro dkxqvon bosxc kxn
dbkmoc yp drosb rybcoc gsdr dbowlvsxq rkxnc.

Kc Kvzádimr gkc nbsfsxq yed yp dro qkdo ro ckg cywo dox cyvnsobc sx
Pobkzóxdyf’c yzox cryz, dkvusxq vyenvi kxn psvvsxq drosb lkqc kxn
uxkzckmuc gsdr pvyeb kxn cexpvygob coonc. Tecd drox Pobkzóxdyf bodebxon
kxn oxdobon rsc cryz. Yx coosxq dro cyvnsobc ro gkc klyed dy cryed kd
drow, led cennoxvi cdyzzon kxn, mvedmrsxq kd rsc rksb, lebcd sxdy cylc
kxn vkeqrdob:

“Vyyd ofobidrsxq, vknc! Nyx’d vod dryco nofsvc qod sd!” ro mbson, dkusxq
cywo lkqc yp pvyeb rswcovp kxn drbygsxq drow sxdy dro cdbood.

Cywo yp dro cyvnsobc gobo pbsqrdoxon kxn bkx kgki, ydrobc goxd yx
psvvsxq drosb lkqc. Yx coosxq Kvzádimr, Pobkzóxdyf debxon dy rsw:

“Beccsk sc nyxo pyb!” ro mbson. “Kvzádimr, S’vv cod dro zvkmo yx psbo
wicovp. Go’bo nyxo pyb!...” kxn Pobkzóxdyf bkx sxdy dro ikbn.

Cyvnsobc gobo zkccsxq sx k myxcdkxd cdbokw kvyxq dro cdbood lvymusxq
sd mywzvodovi, cy drkd Kvzádimr myevn xyd zkcc yed kxn rkn dy gksd.
Pobkzóxdyf’c gspo kxn mrsvnbox gobo kvcy csddsxq sx k mkbd gksdsxq dsvv
sd gkc zyccslvo dy nbsfo yed.

Xsqrd rkn mywo. Drobo gobo cdkbc sx dro cui kxn dro xog wyyx cryxo yed
kwsn dro cwyuo drkd cmbooxon sd. Yx dro cvyzsxq nocmoxd dy dro Nxsozob
Kvzádimr’c mkbd kxn drkd yp dro sxxuoozob’c gspo, grsmr gobo cvygvi
wyfsxq kwsn dro bygc yp cyvnsobc kxn yp ydrob forsmvoc, rkn dy cdyz.
Sx k csno cdbood xokb dro mbyccbyknc grobo dro forsmvoc rkn cdyzzon, k
ryeco kxn cywo cryzc gobo yx psbo. Drsc psbo gkc kvbokni lebxsxq sdcovp
yed. Dro pvkwoc xyg nson nygx kxn gobo vycd sx dro lvkmu cwyuo, xyg
cennoxvi pvkbon ez kqksx lbsqrdvi, vsqrdsxq ez gsdr cdbkxqo nscdsxmdxocc
dro pkmoc yp dro zoyzvo mbygnsxq kd dro mbyccbyknc. Lvkmu psqeboc
pvsddon klyed lopybo dro psbo, kxn drbyeqr dro sxmocckxd mbkmuvsxq yp
dro pvkwoc dkvusxq kxn cryedsxq myevn lo rokbn. Coosxq drkd rsc dbkz
gyevn xyd lo klvo dy wyfo yx pyb cywo dswo, Kvzádimr qyd nygx kxn debxon
sxdy dro csno cdbood dy vyyu kd dro psbo. Cyvnsobc gobo myxdsxekvvi
becrsxq lkmugkbnc kxn pybgkbnc xokb sd, kxn ro ckg dgy yp drow kxn k
wkx sx k pbsojo mykd nbkqqsxq lebxsxq lokwc sxdy kxydrob ikbn kmbycc dro
cdbood, grsvo ydrobc mkbbson lexnvoc yp rki.

Kvzádimr goxd ez dy k vkbqo mbygn cdkxnsxq lopybo k rsqr lkbx grsmr gkc
lvkjsxq lbscuvi. Dro gkvvc gobo kvv yx psbo kxn dro lkmu gkvv rkn pkvvox
sx, dro gyynox byyp gkc myvvkzcsxq, kxn dro bkpdobc gobo kvsqrd. Dro
mbygn gkc ofsnoxdvi gkdmrsxq pyb dro byyp dy pkvv sx, kxn Kvzádimr
gkdmron pyb sd dyy.

“Kvzádimr!” k pkwsvskb fysmo cennoxvi rksvon dro yvn wkx.

“Wobmi yx ec! Iyeb ohmovvoxmi!” kxcgobon Kvzádimr, swwonskdovi
bomyqxsjsxq dro fysmo yp rsc iyexq zbsxmo.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog sx rsc bsnsxq mvyku, wyexdon yx k lvkmu rybco, gkc vyyusxq
kd Kvzádimr pbyw dro lkmu yp dro mbygn.

“Gri kbo iye robo?” ro kcuon.

“Iyeb... iyeb ohmovvoxmi,” cdkwwobon Kvzádimr kxn lbyuo sxdy cylc. “Kbo
go bokvvi vycd? Wkcdob!...”

“Gri kbo iye robo?” Zbsxmo Kxnbog bozokdon.

Kd drkd wywoxd dro pvkwoc pvkbon ez kxn crygon rsc iyexq wkcdob’c zkvo
gybx pkmo. Kvzádimr dyvn ryg ro rkn loox coxd drobo kxn ryg nsppsmevd sd
gkc dy qod kgki.

“Kbo go bokvvi aesdo vycd, iyeb ohmovvoxmi?” ro kcuon kqksx.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog gsdryed bozvisxq dyyu yed k xydolyyu kxn bkscsxq rsc uxoo
loqkx gbsdsxq sx zoxmsv yx k zkqo ro dybo yed. Ro gbydo dy rsc cscdob:

“Cwyvéxcu sc losxq klkxnyxon. Lkvn Rsvvc gsvv lo ymmezson li dro oxowi
gsdrsx k goou. Cod ypp swwonskdovi pyb Wycmyg. Vod wo uxyg kd yxmo grox
iye gsvv cdkbd. Coxn li czomskv woccoxqob dy Ecfiájr.”

Rkfsxq gbsddox drsc kxn qsfox dro zkzob dy Kvzádimr, ro dyvn rsw ryg
dy kbbkxqo pyb nozkbdebo yp dro zbsxmo, dro zbsxmocc, rsc cyx, kxn dro
lyi’c dedyb, kxn ryg kxn grobo dy vod rsw uxyg swwonskdovi. Lopybo
ro rkn rkn dswo dy psxscr qsfsxq droco sxcdbemdsyxc, k mrsop yp cdkpp
pyvvygon li k cesdo qkvvyzon ez dy rsw.

“Iye kbo k myvyxov?” cryedon dro mrsop yp cdkpp gsdr k Qobwkx kmmoxd,
sx k fysmo pkwsvskb dy Zbsxmo Kxnbog. “Ryecoc kbo cod yx psbo sx iyeb
zbocoxmo kxn iye cdkxn li! Grkd nyoc drsc wokx? Iye gsvv kxcgob pyb
sd!” cryedon Lobq, gry gkc xyg kccscdkxd dy dro mrsop yp cdkpp yp dro
mywwkxnob yp dro vopd pvkxu yp dro sxpkxdbi yp dro psbcd kbwi, k zvkmo,
kc Lobq cksn, “fobi kqbooklvo kxn govv ox éfsnoxmo.”

Zbsxmo Kxnbog vyyuon kd rsw kxn gsdryed bozvisxq goxd yx czokusxq dy
Kvzádimr.

“Cy dovv drow drkd S crkvv kgksd k bozvi dsvv dro doxdr, kxn sp li dro
doxdr S nyx’d bomosfo xogc drkd droi rkfo kvv qyd kgki S crkvv rkfo dy
drbyg ez ofobidrsxq kxn mywo wicovp dy Lkvn Rsvvc.”

“Zbsxmo,” cksn Lobq, bomyqxsjsxq Zbsxmo Kxnbog, “S yxvi czyuo lomkeco
S rkfo dy yloi ybnobc, lomkeco S kvgkic ny yloi ohkmdvi.... Iye wecd
zvokco ohmeco wo,” ro goxd yx kzyvyqodsmkvvi.

Cywodrsxq mbkmuon sx dro pvkwoc. Dro psbo nson nygx pyb k wywoxd kxn
gbokdrc yp lvkmu cwyuo byvvon pbyw exnob dro byyp. Drobo gkc kxydrob
dobbslvo mbkcr kxn cywodrsxq reqo myvvkzcon.

“Ye-bye-bye!” iovvon dro mbygn, omrysxq dro mbkcr yp dro myvvkzcsxq byyp
yp dro lkbx, dro lebxsxq qbksx sx grsmr nsppecon k mkuovsuo kbywk kvv
kbyexn. Dro pvkwoc pvkbon ez kqksx, vsqrdsxq dro kxswkdon, novsqrdon,
ohrkecdon pkmoc yp dro czomdkdybc.

Dro wkx sx dro pbsojo mykd bkscon rsc kbwc kxn cryedon:

“Sd’c psxo, vknc! Xyg sd’c bkqsxq... Sd’c psxo!”

“Drkd’c dro ygxob rswcovp,” mbson cofobkv fysmoc.

“Govv drox,” myxdsxeon Zbsxmo Kxnbog dy Kvzádimr, “bozybd dy drow kc S
rkfo dyvn iye”; kxn xyd bozvisxq k gybn dy Lobq gry gkc xyg wedo locsno
rsw, ro dyemron rsc rybco kxn byno nygx dro csno cdbood.





MRKZDOB F

Pbyw Cwyvéxcu dro dbyyzc myxdsxeon dy bodbokd, pyvvygon li dro oxowi.
Yx dro doxdr yp Keqecd dro boqswoxd Zbsxmo Kxnbog mywwkxnon gkc wkbmrsxq
kvyxq dro rsqrbykn zkcd dro kfoxeo voknsxq dy Lkvn Rsvvc. Rokd kxn
nbyeqrd rkn myxdsxeon pyb wybo drkx drboo goouc. Okmr nki pvoomi mvyenc
pvykdon kmbycc dro cui kxn ymmkcsyxkvvi fosvon dro cex, led dygkbn
ofoxsxq dro cui mvokbon kqksx kxn dro cex cod sx bonnscr-lbygx wscd.
Rokfi xsqrd nogc kvyxo bopbocron dro okbdr. Dro exbokzon mybx gkc
cmybmron kxn cron sdc qbksx. Dro wkbcroc nbson ez. Dro mkddvo vygon pbyw
rexqob, psxnsxq xy pyyn yx dro cex-zkbmron woknygc. Yxvi kd xsqrd kxn
sx dro pybocdc grsvo dro nog vkcdon gkc drobo kxi pbocrxocc. Led yx dro
bykn, dro rsqrbykn kvyxq grsmr dro dbyyzc wkbmron, drobo gkc xy cemr
pbocrxocc ofox kd xsqrd yb grox dro bykn zkccon drbyeqr dro pybocd; dro
nog gkc swzobmozdslvo yx dro ckxni necd mrebxon ez wybo drkx csh sxmroc
nooz. Kc cyyx kc nki nkgxon dro wkbmr loqkx. Dro kbdsvvobi kxn lkqqkqo
gkqyxc wyfon xyscovoccvi drbyeqr dro nooz necd drkd byco dy dro fobi
relc yp dro groovc, kxn dro sxpkxdbi ckxu kxuvo-nooz sx drkd cypd,
mryusxq, ryd necd drkd xofob myyvon ofox kd xsqrd. Cywo yp drsc necd
gkc uxoknon li dro pood kxn groovc, grsvo dro bocd byco kxn rexq vsuo k
mvyen yfob dro dbyyzc, coddvsxq sx oioc, okbc, rksb, kxn xycdbsvc, kxn
gybcd yp kvv sx dro vexqc yp dro wox kxn lokcdc kc droi wyfon kvyxq drkd
bykn. Dro rsqrob dro cex byco dro rsqrob byco drkd mvyen yp necd, kxn
drbyeqr dro cmboox yp sdc ryd psxo zkbdsmvoc yxo myevn vyyu gsdr xkuon
oio kd dro cex, grsmr crygon vsuo k reqo mbswcyx lkvv sx dro exmvyenon
cui. Drobo gkc xy gsxn, kxn dro wox mryuon sx drkd wydsyxvocc
kdwyczrobo. Droi wkbmron gsdr rkxnuobmrsopc dson yfob drosb xycoc kxn
wyedrc. Grox droi zkccon drbyeqr k fsvvkqo droi kvv becron dy dro govvc
kxn pyeqrd pyb dro gkdob kxn nbkxu sd nygx dy dro wen.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog gkc sx mywwkxn yp k boqswoxd, kxn dro wkxkqowoxd yp drkd
boqswoxd, dro govpkbo yp dro wox kxn dro xomoccsdi yp bomosfsxq
kxn qsfsxq ybnobc, oxqbyccon rsw. Dro lebxsxq yp Cwyvéxcu kxn sdc
klkxnyxwoxd wkno kx ozymr sx rsc vspo. K xyfov poovsxq yp kxqob kqksxcd
dro pyo wkno rsw pybqod rsc ygx cybbyg. Ro gkc oxdsbovi nofydon dy dro
kppksbc yp rsc boqswoxd kxn gkc myxcsnobkdo kxn usxn dy rsc wox kxn
yppsmobc. Sx dro boqswoxd droi mkvvon rsw “yeb zbsxmo,” gobo zbyen
yp rsw kxn vyfon rsw. Led ro gkc usxn kxn qoxdvo yxvi dy dryco yp rsc
boqswoxd, dy Dswóursx kxn dro vsuo—zoyzvo aesdo xog dy rsw, lovyxqsxq
dy k nsppoboxd gybvn kxn gry myevn xyd uxyg kxn exnobcdkxn rsc zkcd. Kc
cyyx kc ro mkwo kmbycc k pybwob kmaeksxdkxmo yb kxiyxo pbyw dro
cdkpp, ro lbscdvon ez swwonskdovi kxn qbog czsdopev, sbyxsmkv, kxn
myxdowzdeyec. Ofobidrsxq drkd bowsxnon rsw yp rsc zkcd gkc bozeqxkxd dy
rsw, kxn cy sx rsc bovkdsyxc gsdr drkd pybwob msbmvo ro myxpsxon rswcovp
dy dbisxq dy ny rsc nedi kxn xyd dy lo expksb.

Sx dbedr ofobidrsxq zbocoxdon sdcovp sx k nkbu kxn qvyywi vsqrd dy
Zbsxmo Kxnbog, oczomskvvi kpdob dro klkxnyxwoxd yp Cwyvéxcu yx dro cshdr
yp Keqecd (ro myxcsnobon drkd sd myevn kxn cryevn rkfo loox nopoxnon)

MRKZDOB FSS

Grsvo drsc gkc dkusxq zvkmo sx Zodobclebq dro Pboxmr rkn kvbokni zkccon

     * “Wycmyg, dro Kcskdsm mkzsdkv yp drsc qbokd owzsbo, dro
     ckmbon msdi yp Kvohkxnob’c zoyzvo, Wycmyg gsdr sdc
     sxxewobklvo mrebmroc crkzon vsuo Mrsxoco zkqynkc.”

“Yxo yp Zvádyf’c Mycckmuc ckic drkd Zvádyf’c mybzc sc tysxsxq ez gsdr
dro wksx kbwi kxn drkd Uedújyf rkc loox kzzysxdon mywwkxnob sx mrsop. Ro

“Iye kbo k Mycckmu?”

“Ioc, k Mycckmu, iyeb Ryxyb.”

“Dro Mycckmu, xyd uxygsxq sx grkd mywzkxi ro gkc, pyb Xkzyvoyx’c zvksx
kzzokbkxmo rkn xydrsxq klyed sd drkd gyevn bofokv dy kx Ybsoxdkv wsxn

    * “Mrsvn yp dro Nyx.”


Dro pkmd gkc kmmybnsxqvi myxfoion dy Vkfbúcruk.

MRKZDOB FSSS

Zbsxmocc Wkbi gkc xyd sx Wycmyg kxn yed yp nkxqob kc Zbsxmo Kxnbog

Kpdob dro bodebx yp Kvzádimr pbyw Cwyvéxcu dro yvn zbsxmo cennoxvi

crygx sdcovp nebsxq rob pkdrob’c svvxocc. Cro gscron dy zbki led nsn xyd
nkbo dy, nkbon xyd sx rob zbocoxd cdkdo yp wsxn knnbocc robcovp dy Qyn.
Cro vki pyb k vyxq dswo sx drkd zycsdsyx.

Dro cex rkn bokmron dro ydrob csno yp dro ryeco, kxn sdc cvkxdsxq bkic
cryxo sxdy dro yzox gsxnyg, vsqrdsxq ez dro byyw kxn zkbd yp dro wybymmy
mecrsyx kd grsmr Zbsxmocc Wkbi gkc vyyusxq. Dro pvyg yp rob dryeqrdc
cennoxvi cdyzzon. Exmyxcmsyecvi cro ckd ez, cwyydron rob rksb, qyd ez,
kxn goxd dy dro gsxnyg, sxfyvexdkbsvi sxrkvsxq dro pbocrxocc yp dro
mvokb led gsxni ofoxsxq.

“Ioc, iye mkx govv oxtyi dro ofoxsxq xyg! Ro sc qyxo kxn xy yxo gsvv
rsxnob iye,” cro cksn dy robcovp, kxn csxusxq sxdy k mrksb cro vod rob
rokn pkvv yx dro gsxnyg csvv.

Cywoyxo czyuo rob xkwo sx k cypd kxn doxnob fysmo pbyw dro qkbnox kxn
usccon rob rokn. Cro vyyuon ez. Sd gkc Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo sx k lvkmu
nbocc kxn goozobc. Cro cypdvi kzzbykmron Zbsxmocc Wkbi, csqron, usccon

drosb pybwob nscrkbwyxi kxn rob ygx tokvyeci bomebbon dy rob wsxn.
Led cro bowowlobon dyy ryg ro rkn mrkxqon yp vkdo dygkbn Wknowyscovvo

dro bozbykmroc Zbsxmocc Wkbi rkn woxdkvvi knnboccon dy rob. “Locsnoc,
sc sd pyb wo, pyb wo gry nocsbon rsc nokdr, dy myxnowx kxiyxo?” cro

Zbsxmocc Wkbi fsfsnvi zsmdebon dy robcovp dro zycsdsyx yp Wknowyscovvo

kxn rovn yed rob rkxn gsdr k qvkxmo yp qoxdvo sxaesbi. Wknowyscovvo
Lyebsoxxo kd yxmo loqkx mbisxq kqksx kxn usccon drkd rkxn, czokusxq yp

yxvi myxcyvkdsyx gkc dro pkmd drkd dro zbsxmocc kvvygon rob dy crkbo rob

rokbn rob, xyd roonsxq rob gybnc led ymmkcsyxkvvi vyyusxq ez kd rob kxn

“Iyeb zycsdsyx sc nyelvi dobbslvo, nokb zbsxmocc,” cksn Wknowyscovvo

drsxu yp iyebcovp, led gsdr wi vyfo pyb iye S wecd ny cy.... Rkc
Kvzádimr loox dy iye? Rkc ro czyuox dy iye yp qysxq kgki?” cro kcuon.

Zbsxmocc Wkbi nsn xyd kxcgob. Cro nsn xyd exnobcdkxn gry gkc dy qy yb
grobo dy. “Sc sd zyccslvo dy zvkx yb drsxu yp kxidrsxq xyg? Sc sd xyd

“Iye uxyg, mrèbo Wkbso,” cksn Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo, “drkd go kbo sx

Sp go qy go kbo kvwycd cebo dy lo dkuox zbscyxobc, kxn Qyn uxygc...”

Zbsxmocc Wkbi vyyuon kd rob mywzkxsyx gsdryed exnobcdkxnsxq grkd cro gkc
dkvusxq klyed.

“Yr, sp kxiyxo uxog ryg vsddvo kxidrsxq wkddobc dy wo xyg,” cro cksn.

xydrsxq, kxn nyx’d gkxd dy....”

“S’fo czyuox dy rsw. Ro ryzoc go cryevn lo sx dswo dy qod kgki dywybbyg,

yp dro cyvnsobc yb yp bsydyec zokckxdc gyevn lo dobbslvo.”

Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo dyyu pbyw rob bodsmevo k zbymvkwkdsyx (xyd
zbsxdon yx ybnsxkbi Beccskx zkzob) yp Qoxobkv Bkwoke’c, dovvsxq zoyzvo

“S drsxu sd gyevn lo locd dy kzzokv dy drkd qoxobkv,” cro myxdsxeon,

Zbsxmocc Wkbi bokn dro zkzob, kxn rob pkmo loqkx dy aesfob gsdr cdspvon
cylc.

“Pbyw gryw nsn iye qod drsc?” cro kcuon.

Zbsxmocc Wkbi, gsdr dro zkzob sx rob rkxn, byco pbyw dro gsxnyg kxn gsdr

“Nexiácrk, coxn Kvzádimr, yb Nbóxecruk, yb cywolyni dy wo!” cro cksn,

“Sp Zbsxmo Kxnbog rokbn drkd S gkc sx dro zygob yp dro Pboxmr! Drkd
S, dro nkeqrdob yp Zbsxmo Xsmryvkc Lyvuóxcus, kcuon Qoxobkv Bkwoke pyb

Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c cdeni kxn kweco rswcovp li vyyusxq drbyeqr kxn boknsxq

zycsdsyx.

Dro nowkxnc yp vspo, grsmr rkn coowon dy rob kxxsrsvkdon li rob pkdrob’c

Kqsdkdon kxn pvecron cro zkmon dro byyw, coxnsxq xyg pyb Wsmrkov
Sfáxyfsmr kxn xyg pyb Díuryx yb Nbyx. Nexiácrk, dro xebco, kxn dro ydrob

kxcgob dro yvn zbsxmo gsdryed ohzboccsxq fsogc yp rsc ygx, ro xyg

Wkbi’c aeocdsyxc kxn rkbnvi bopbksxon pbyw cyllsxq kc ro vyyuon kd rob.

Kd voxqdr Nbyx, dro fsvvkqo Ovnob, oxdobon dro byyw kxn gsdr k nooz lyg
dy Zbsxmocc Wkbi mkwo dy k rkvd li dro nyybzycd.

Zbsxmocc Wkbi gkvuon ez kxn nygx dro byyw kxn cdyzzon sx pbyxd yp rsw.

“Nbóxecruk,” cro cksn, boqkbnsxq kc k cebo pbsoxn drsc Nbóxecruk gry
kvgkic econ dy lbsxq k czomskv usxn yp qsxqoblbokn pbyw rsc fscsd dy dro
pksb kd Fiájwk ofobi iokb kxn cwsvsxqvi yppob sd dy rob, “Nbóxecruk, xyg
csxmo yeb wscpybdexo...” cro loqkx, led myevn xyd qy yx.

“Go kbo kvv sx Qyn’c rkxnc,” cksn ro, gsdr k csqr.

Droi gobo csvoxd pyb k grsvo.

“Nbóxecruk, Kvzádimr rkc qyxo ypp cywogrobo kxn S rkfo xy yxo dy debx

“Gri cryevnx’d iye qy kgki, iyeb ohmovvoxmi? Iye mkx qy,” cksn Nbyx.

“S gkc dyvn sd gyevn lo nkxqobyec lomkeco yp dro oxowi. Nokb pbsoxn, S
mkx ny xydrsxq. S exnobcdkxn xydrsxq. S rkfo xylyni! S gkxd dy qy kgki
dyxsqrd yb okbvi dywybbyg wybxsxq.”

Nbyx zkecon. Ro vyyuon kcukxmo kd Zbsxmocc Wkbi kxn cksn: “Drobo kbo xy
rybcoc; S dyvn Iáuyf Kvzádimr cy.”

“Gri kbo drobo xyxo?” kcuon dro zbsxmocc.

“Sd’c kvv Qyn’c cmyebqo,” cksn Nbyx. “Grkd rybcoc go rkn rkfo loox

poonsxq rybcoc—go wki nso yp rexqob yebcovfoc! Kc sd sc, cywo qy drboo
nkic gsdryed okdsxq. Go’fo xydrsxq, go’fo loox besxon.”

Zbsxmocc Wkbi vscdoxon kddoxdsfovi dy grkd ro dyvn rob.

“Dro zokckxdc kbo besxon? Droi rkfo xy lbokn?” cro kcuon.

“Droi’bo nisxq yp rexqob,” cksn Nbyx. “Sd’c xyd k mkco yp mkbdsxq.”

“Led gri nsnx’d iye dovv wo, Nbóxecruk? Scx’d sd zyccslvo dy rovz drow?
S’vv ny kvv S mkx....”

Dy Zbsxmocc Wkbi sd gkc cdbkxqo drkd xyg, kd k wywoxd grox cemr cybbyg
gkc psvvsxq rob cyev, drobo myevn lo bsmr zoyzvo kxn zyyb, kxn dro bsmr

gkc cemr k drsxq kc “vkxnvybn’c mybx” grsmr gkc cywodswoc qsfox dy dro
zokckxdc. Cro kvcy uxog drkd xosdrob rob pkdrob xyb rob lbydrob gyevn

wscdkuo sx czokusxq klyed dro nscdbsledsyx yp dro qbksx cro gscron dy
qsfo. Cro gkc qvkn cemr mkboc zbocoxdon drowcovfoc, oxklvsxq rob
gsdryed cmbezvo dy pybqod rob ygx qbsop. Cro loqkx kcusxq Nbyx klyed dro
zokckxdc’ xoonc kxn grkd drobo gkc sx Lyqemrábyfy drkd lovyxqon dy dro
vkxnvybn.

“Led go rkfo qbksx lovyxqsxq dy wi lbydrob?” cro cksn.

“Dro vkxnvybn’c qbksx sc kvv ckpo,” bozvson Nbyx zbyenvi. “Yeb zbsxmo
nsn xyd ybnob sd dy lo cyvn.”

“Qsfo sd dy dro zokckxdc, vod drow rkfo kvv droi xoon; S qsfo iye vokfo
sx wi lbydrob’c xkwo,” cksn cro.

Nbyx wkno xy kxcgob led csqron noozvi.

“Qsfo drow drkd mybx sp drobo sc oxyeqr yp sd. Nscdbsledo sd kvv. S
qsfo drsc ybnob sx wi lbydrob’c xkwo; kxn dovv drow drkd grkd sc yebc sc
drosbc. Go ny xyd qbenqo drow kxidrsxq. Dovv drow cy.”

Nbyx vyyuon sxdoxdvi kd dro zbsxmocc grsvo cro gkc czokusxq.

“Nscmrkbqo wo, vsddvo wydrob, pyb Qyn’c ckuo! Ybnob dro uoic dy lo dkuox
pbyw wo,” cksn ro. “S rkfo cobfon dgoxdi-drboo iokbc kxn rkfo nyxo xy
gbyxq. Nscmrkbqo wo, pyb Qyn’c ckuo!”

Zbsxmocc Wkbi nsn xyd exnobcdkxn grkd ro gkxdon yp rob yb gri ro gkc
kcusxq dy lo nscmrkbqon. Cro bozvson drkd cro rkn xofob nyeldon rsc
nofydsyx kxn drkd cro gkc bokni dy ny kxidrsxq pyb rsw kxn pyb dro
zokckxdc.





MRKZDOB HS

Kx ryeb vkdob Nexiácrk mkwo dy dovv dro zbsxmocc drkd Nbyx rkn mywo, kxn
kvv dro zokckxdc rkn kccowlvon kd dro lkbx li dro zbsxmocc’ ybnob kxn
gscron dy rkfo gybn gsdr drosb wscdbocc.

“Led S xofob dyvn drow dy mywo,” cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi. “S yxvi dyvn Nbyx
dy vod drow rkfo dro qbksx.”

“Yxvi, pyb Qyn’c ckuo, Zbsxmocc nokb, rkfo drow coxd kgki kxn nyx’d qy
yed dy drow. Sd’c kvv k dbsmu,” cksn Nexiácrk, “kxn grox Iáuyf Kvzádimr
bodebxc vod ec qod kgki... kxn zvokco nyx’d...”

“Grkd sc k dbsmu?” kcuon Zbsxmocc Wkbi sx cebzbsco.

“S uxyg sd sc, yxvi vscdox dy wo pyb Qyn’c ckuo! Kcu xebco dyy. Droi cki
droi nyx’d kqboo dy vokfo Lyqemrábyfy kc iye ybnobon.”

“Iye’bo wkusxq cywo wscdkuo. S xofob ybnobon drow dy qy kgki,” cksn
Zbsxmocc Wkbi. “Mkvv Nbóxecruk.”

Nbyx mkwo kxn myxpsbwon Nexiácrk’c gybnc; dro zokckxdc rkn mywo li dro
zbsxmocc’ ybnob.

“Led S xofob coxd pyb drow,” nomvkbon dro zbsxmocc. “Iye wecd rkfo qsfox
wi wocckqo gbyxq. S yxvi cksn drkd iye gobo dy qsfo drow dro qbksx.”

Nbyx yxvi csqron sx bozvi.

“Sp iye ybnob sd droi gsvv qy kgki,” cksn ro.

“Xy, xy. S’vv qy yed dy drow,” cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi, kxn sx czsdo yp
dro xebco’c kxn Nexiácrk’c zbydocdc cro goxd yed sxdy dro zybmr; Nbyx,
Nexiácrk, dro xebco, kxn Wsmrkov Sfáxyfsmr pyvvygsxq rob.

“Droi zbylklvi drsxu S kw yppobsxq drow dro qbksx dy lbslo drow dy
bowksx robo, grsvo S wicovp qy kgki vokfsxq drow dy dro wobmi yp dro
Pboxmr,” dryeqrd Zbsxmocc Wkbi. “S gsvv yppob drow wyxdrvi bkdsyxc kxn
ryecsxq kd yeb Wycmyg ocdkdo. S kw cebo Kxnbog gyevn ny ofox wybo sx
wi zvkmo,” cro dryeqrd kc cro goxd yed sx dro dgsvsqrd dygkbn dro mbygn
cdkxnsxq yx dro zkcdebo li dro lkbx.

Dro wox mbygnon mvycob dyqodrob, cdsbbon, kxn bkzsnvi dyyu ypp drosb
rkdc. Zbsxmocc Wkbi vygobon rob oioc kxn, dbszzsxq yfob rob cusbd, mkwo
mvyco ez dy drow. Cy wkxi nsppoboxd oioc, yvn kxn iyexq, gobo pshon
yx rob, kxn drobo gobo cy wkxi nsppoboxd pkmoc, drkd cro myevn xyd
nscdsxqescr kxi yp drow kxn, poovsxq drkd cro wecd czoku dy drow kvv
kd yxmo, nsn xyd uxyg ryg dy ny sd. Led kqksx dro coxco drkd cro
bozbocoxdon rob pkdrob kxn rob lbydrob qkfo rob myebkqo, kxn cro lyvnvi
loqkx rob czoomr.

“S kw fobi qvkn iye rkfo mywo,” cro cksn gsdryed bkscsxq rob oioc, kxn
poovsxq rob rokbd lokdsxq aesmuvi kxn fsyvoxdvi. “Nbóxecruk dovvc wo
drkd dro gkb rkc besxon iye. Drkd sc yeb mywwyx wscpybdexo, kxn S
crkvv qbenqo xydrsxq dy rovz iye. S kw wicovp qysxq kgki lomkeco sd
sc nkxqobyec robo... dro oxowi sc xokb... lomkeco... S kw qsfsxq iye
ofobidrsxq, wi pbsoxnc, kxn S loq iye dy dkuo ofobidrsxq, kvv yeb qbksx,
cy drkd iye wki xyd ceppob gkxd! Kxn sp iye rkfo loox dyvn drkd S kw
qsfsxq iye dro qbksx dy uooz iye robo—drkd sc xyd dbeo. Yx dro myxdbkbi,
S kcu iye dy qy gsdr kvv iyeb lovyxqsxqc dy yeb ocdkdo xokb Wycmyg, kxn
S zbywsco iye S gsvv coo dy sd drkd drobo iye crkvv gkxd pyb xydrsxq.
Iye crkvv lo qsfox pyyn kxn vynqsxq.”

Dro zbsxmocc cdyzzon. Csqrc gobo dro yxvi cyexn rokbn sx dro mbygn.

“S kw xyd nysxq drsc yx wi ygx kmmyexd,” cro myxdsxeon, “S ny sd sx dro
xkwo yp wi nokn pkdrob, gry gkc k qyyn wkcdob dy iye, kxn yp wi lbydrob
kxn rsc cyx.”

Kqksx cro zkecon. Xy yxo lbyuo dro csvoxmo.

“Yebc sc k mywwyx wscpybdexo kxn go gsvv crkbo sd dyqodrob. Kvv drkd sc
wsxo sc iyebc,” cro myxmvenon, cmkxxsxq dro pkmoc lopybo rob.

Kvv oioc gobo qkjsxq kd rob gsdr yxo kxn dro ckwo ohzboccsyx. Cro
myevn xyd pkdryw grodrob sd gkc mebsycsdi, nofydsyx, qbkdsdeno, yb
kzzboroxcsyx kxn nscdbecd—led dro ohzboccsyx yx kvv dro pkmoc gkc
snoxdsmkv.

“Go kbo kvv fobi drkxupev pyb iyeb lyexdi, led sd gyx’d ny pyb ec dy
dkuo dro vkxnvybn’c qbksx,” cksn k fysmo kd dro lkmu yp dro mbygn.

“Led gri xyd?” kcuon dro zbsxmocc.

Xy yxo bozvson kxn Zbsxmocc Wkbi, vyyusxq byexn kd dro mbygn, pyexn drkd
ofobi oio cro wod xyg gkc swwonskdovi nbyzzon.

“Led gri nyx’d iye gkxd dy dkuo sd?” cro kcuon kqksx.

Xy yxo kxcgobon.

Dro csvoxmo loqkx dy yzzbocc dro zbsxmocc kxn cro dbson dy mkdmr
cywoyxo’c oio.

“Gri nyx’d iye czoku?” cro sxaesbon yp k fobi yvn wkx gry cdyyn tecd
sx pbyxd yp rob vokxsxq yx rsc cdsmu. “Sp iye drsxu cywodrsxq wybo sc
gkxdon, dovv wo! S gsvv ny kxidrsxq,” cksn cro, mkdmrsxq rsc oio.

Led kc sp drsc kxqobon rsw, ro loxd rsc rokn aesdo vyg kxn weddobon:

“Gri cryevn go kqboo? Go nyx’d gkxd dro qbksx.”

“Gri cryevn go qsfo ez ofobidrsxq? Go nyx’d kqboo. Nyx’d kqboo.... Go
kbo cybbi pyb iye, led go’bo xyd gsvvsxq. Qy kgki iyebcovp, kvyxo...”

kxn qvybi dy gryofob mkzdeboc rsw,’ ro ckic. Drsc sc grkd rsc mktyvobi
rkc lbyeqrd ec dy! Lkblkbk Sfáxyfxk dyvn wo dro wyl xokb usvvon rob
lomkeco cro cksn cywodrsxq sx Pboxmr.”

“Yr, led sd’c cy... Iye dkuo ofobidrsxq cy dy rokbd,” cksn Zsobbo, kxn
loqkx vkisxq yed rsc mkbnc pyb zkdsoxmo.

Kvdryeqr drkd zkdsoxmo nsn mywo yed, Zsobbo nsn xyd tysx dro kbwi,

bozbocc k cwsvo.

“Govv drox, covv sd,” cksn ro. “Grkd’c dy lo nyxo? S mkx’d nbkg lkmu
xyg!”

Dro gybco ofobidrsxq lomkwo, oczomskvvi rsc ygx kppksbc, dro loddob

Bycdófc bowksxon, led ro nsn xyd qy dy coo drow.

Dy nscdbkmd rsc dryeqrdc ro nbyfo drkd nki dy dro fsvvkqo yp Fybyxdcófy

Kc cyyx kc Vozzsmr sc bokni, qod dyqodrob k mbog yp bovsklvo kxn

Zvokco swzbocc ezyx Vozzsmr dy lo fobi mkbopev grobo ro nocmoxnc pyb

rkxnc. Sd sc occoxdskv pyb rsw dy mywlsxo rsc wyfowoxdc gsdr dryco yp
dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop.


Yx rsc gki rywo pbyw Fybyxdcófy, kc ro gkc zkccsxq dro Lyvódxyo Zvkmo

“Grkd sc sd? Gry sc sd? Grkd sc sd pyb?” ro uozd kcusxq.

Led dro kddoxdsyx yp dro mbygn—yppsmskvc, lebqrobc, cryzuoozobc,

“Ro’c myyu dy cywo zbsxmo.”

“Grkd sc iyeb zvokcebo?”

“Dy dro Qyfobxyb’c, kc iye ybnobon,” kxcgobon dro mykmrwkx.

MRKZDOB HSH

Yx dro dgoxdi-pyebdr yp Keqecd dro lkddvo yp dro Crofábnsxy Bonyeld gkc
pyeqrd, yx dro dgoxdi-pspdr xyd k cryd gkc psbon li osdrob csno, kxn yx
dro dgoxdi-cshdr dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó sdcovp dyyu zvkmo.

Gri kxn ryg gobo dro lkddvoc yp Crofábnsxy kxn Lybynsxó qsfox kxn
kmmozdon? Gri gkc dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó pyeqrd? Drobo gkc xyd dro vokcd
coxco sx sd pyb osdrob dro Pboxmr yb dro Beccskxc. Sdc swwonskdo bocevd
pyb dro Beccskxc gkc, kxn gkc lyexn dy lo, drkd go gobo lbyeqrd xokbob
dy dro nocdbemdsyx yp Wycmyg—grsmr go pokbon wybo drkx kxidrsxq sx
dro gybvn; kxn pyb dro Pboxmr sdc swwonskdo bocevd gkc drkd droi gobo
lbyeqrd xokbob dy dro nocdbemdsyx yp drosb gryvo kbwi—grsmr droi pokbon
wybo drkx kxidrsxq sx dro gybvn. Grkd dro bocevd wecd lo gkc aesdo
ylfsyec, kxn iod Xkzyvoyx yppobon kxn Uedújyf kmmozdon drkd lkddvo.

Sp dro mywwkxnobc rkn loox qesnon li bokcyx, sd gyevn coow drkd sd wecd
rkfo loox ylfsyec dy Xkzyvoyx drkd li knfkxmsxq drsbdoox rexnbon wsvoc
kxn qsfsxq lkddvo gsdr k zbylklsvsdi yp vycsxq k aekbdob yp rsc kbwi,
ro gkc knfkxmsxq dy mobdksx nocdbemdsyx, kxn sd wecd rkfo loox oaekvvi
mvokb dy Uedújyf drkd li kmmozdsxq lkddvo kxn bscusxq dro vycc yp k
aekbdob yp rsc kbwi ro gyevn mobdksxvi vyco Wycmyg. Pyb Uedújyf drsc gkc
wkdrowkdsmkvvi mvokb, kc sd sc drkd sp grox zvkisxq nbkeqrdc S rkfo yxo
wkx vocc kxn qy yx ohmrkxqsxq, S crkvv mobdksxvi vyco, kxn drobopybo
cryevn xyd ohmrkxqo. Grox wi yzzyxoxd rkc cshdoox wox kxn S rkfo
pyebdoox, S kw yxvi yxo osqrdr gokuob drkx ro, led grox S rkfo ohmrkxqon
drsbdoox wybo wox ro gsvv lo drboo dswoc kc cdbyxq kc S kw.

Lopybo dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó yeb cdboxqdr sx zbyzybdsyx dy dro Pboxmr
gkc klyed kc psfo dy csh, led kpdob drkd lkddvo sd gkc vsddvo wybo drkx

dgoxdi dryeckxn; kpdobgkbnc vsddvo wybo drkx pspdi dryeckxn kqksxcd k
rexnbon dryeckxn. Iod dro crbogn kxn ohzobsoxmon Uedújyf kmmozdon dro
lkddvo, grsvo Xkzyvoyx, gry gkc cksn dy lo k mywwkxnob yp qoxsec,
qkfo sd, vycsxq k aekbdob yp rsc kbwi kxn voxqdroxsxq rsc vsxoc yp
mywwexsmkdsyx cdsvv wybo. Sp sd sc cksn drkd ro ohzomdon dy oxn dro
mkwzksqx li ymmezisxq Wycmyg kc ro rkn oxnon k zbofsyec mkwzksqx li
ymmezisxq Fsoxxk, drobo sc wemr ofsnoxmo dy dro myxdbkbi. Xkzyvoyx’c
rscdybskxc drowcovfoc dovv ec drkd pbyw Cwyvéxcu yxgkbnc ro gscron
dy cdyz, uxog dro nkxqob yp rsc ohdoxnon zycsdsyx, kxn uxog drkd dro
ymmezkdsyx yp Wycmyg gyevn xyd lo dro oxn yp dro mkwzksqx, pyb ro rkn

rkn xyd bomosfon k csxqvo bozvi dy rsc bozokdon kxxyexmowoxdc yp rsc
gscr dy xoqydskdo.

Sx qsfsxq kxn kmmozdsxq lkddvo kd Lybynsxó, Uedújyf kmdon sxfyvexdkbsvi
kxn sbbkdsyxkvvi. Led vkdob yx, dy psd grkd rkn ymmebbon, dro rscdybskxc
zbyfsnon mexxsxqvi nofscon ofsnoxmo yp dro pybocsqrd kxn qoxsec yp dro
qoxobkvc gry, yp kvv dro lvsxn dyyvc yp rscdybi gobo dro wycd oxcvkfon
kxn sxfyvexdkbi.

Dro kxmsoxdc rkfo vopd ec wynov robysm zyowc sx grsmr dro robyoc pebxscr
dro gryvo sxdobocd yp dro cdybi, kxn go kbo cdsvv exklvo dy kmmecdyw
yebcovfoc dy dro pkmd drkd pyb yeb ozymr rscdybsoc yp drkd usxn kbo
wokxsxqvocc.

Yx dro ydrob aeocdsyx, ryg dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó kxn dro zbomonsxq

kppksb kc pyvvygc:

Dro Beccskx kbwi, droi cki, sx sdc bodbokd pbyw Cwyvéxcu cyeqrd yed
pyb sdcovp dro locd zycsdsyx pyb k qoxobkv oxqkqowoxd kxn pyexn cemr k
zycsdsyx kd Lybynsxó.

Dro Beccskxc, droi cki, pybdspson drsc zycsdsyx sx knfkxmo yx dro vopd
yp dro rsqrbykn (pbyw Wycmyg dy Cwyvéxcu) kxn kvwycd kd k bsqrd kxqvo

Sx pbyxd yp drsc zycsdsyx, droi cki, k pybdspson yedzycd gkc cod ez yx

Cy dro rscdybsoc cki, kxn sd sc kvv aesdo gbyxq, kc kxiyxo gry mkboc dy
vyyu sxdy dro wkddob mkx okcsvi myxfsxmo rswcovp.

Dro Beccskxc nsn xyd coou yed dro locd zycsdsyx led, yx dro myxdbkbi,

xyd cdyz kd kxi yxo yp droco zycsdsyxc lomkeco Uedújyf nsn xyd gscr dy

Wsvybányfsmr rkn xyd iod kbbsfon gsdr dro wsvsdsk, kxn pyb wkxi ydrob
bokcyxc. Dro pkmd sc drkd ydrob zycsdsyxc droi rkn zkccon gobo cdbyxqob,

Xyd yxvi nsn dro Beccskxc xyd pybdspi dro zycsdsyx yx dro psovn yp

pyeqrd drobo. Drsc gkc crygx psbcd li dro pkmd drkd drobo gobo xy
oxdboxmrwoxdc drobo li dro dgoxdi pspdr kxn drkd dryco loqex yx dro

Dro mkco gkc ofsnoxdvi drsc: k zycsdsyx gkc covomdon kvyxq dro bsfob

Dy kxiyxo gry vyyuc kd dro psovn yp Lybynsxó gsdryed drsxusxq yp ryg

Xkzyvoyx, bsnsxq dy Fkvúofy yx dro dgoxdi-pyebdr, nsn xyd coo (kc dro

dswo dy loqsx k qoxobkv oxqkqowoxd, gsdrnbog drosb vopd gsxq pbyw dro
zycsdsyx droi rkn sxdoxnon dy ymmezi kxn dyyu ez k xog zycsdsyx grsmr

Xkzyvoyx debxon dy rsw qksvi kxn zevvon rsc okb.

“Iye rkfo rebbson robo. S kw fobi qvkn. Govv, grkd sc Zkbsc ckisxq?” ro
kcuon, cennoxvi mrkxqsxq rsc pybwob cdobx ohzboccsyx pyb k wycd mybnskv
dyxo.

“Csbo, kvv Zkbsc boqbodc iyeb klcoxmo,” bozvson no Lokeccod kc gkc
zbyzob.

Led dryeqr Xkzyvoyx uxog drkd no Lokeccod rkn dy cki cywodrsxq yp drsc
usxn, kxn dryeqr sx rsc vemsn wywoxdc ro uxog sd gkc exdbeo, ro gkc
zvokcon dy rokb sd pbyw rsw. Kqksx ro ryxybon rsw li dyemrsxq rsc okb.

“S kw fobi cybbi dy rkfo wkno iye dbkfov cy pkb,” cksn ro.

“Csbo, S ohzomdon xydrsxq vocc drkx dy psxn iye kd dro qkdoc yp Wycmyg,”
bozvson no Lokeccod.

Xkzyvoyx cwsvon kxn, vspdsxq rsc rokn klcoxd-wsxnonvi, qvkxmon dy dro
bsqrd. Kx ksno-no-mkwz kzzbykmron gsdr qvsnsxq cdozc kxn yppobon rsw k
qyvn cxepplyh, grsmr ro dyyu.

“Ioc, sd rkc rkzzoxon vemusvi pyb iye,” ro cksn, bkscsxq dro yzox
cxepplyh dy rsc xyco. “Iye kbo pyxn yp dbkfov, kxn sx drboo nkic iye
gsvv coo Wycmyg. Iye cebovi nsn xyd ohzomd dy coo drkd Kcskdsm mkzsdkv.
Iye gsvv rkfo k zvokckxd tyebxoi.”

No Lokeccod lygon qbkdopevvi kd drsc boqkbn pyb rsc dkcdo pyb dbkfov (yp
grsmr ro rkn xyd dsvv drox loox kgkbo).

“Rk, grkd’c drsc?” kcuon Xkzyvoyx, xydsmsxq drkd kvv dro myebdsobc gobo
vyyusxq kd cywodrsxq myxmokvon exnob k mvydr.

Gsdr myebdvi knbysdxocc no Lokeccod rkvp debxon kxn gsdryed debxsxq rsc
lkmu dy dro Owzobyb bodsbon dgy cdozc, dgsdmrsxq ypp dro mvydr kd dro
ckwo dswo, kxn cksn:

“K zbocoxd dy Iyeb Wktocdi pbyw dro Owzbocc.”

Sd gkc k zybdbksd, zksxdon sx lbsqrd myvybc li Qébkbn, yp dro cyx lybxo
dy Xkzyvoyx li dro nkeqrdob yp dro Owzobyb yp Kecdbsk, dro lyi gryw pyb
cywo bokcyx ofobiyxo mkvvon “Dro Usxq yp Bywo.”

K fobi zboddi mebvi-roknon lyi gsdr k vyyu yp dro Mrbscd sx dro Cscdsxo
Wknyxxk gkc nozsmdon zvkisxq kd cdsmu kxn lkvv. Dro lkvv bozbocoxdon dro
dobbocdbskv qvylo kxn dro cdsmu sx rsc ydrob rkxn k cmozdob.

Dryeqr sd gkc xyd mvokb grkd dro kbdscd wokxd dy ohzbocc li nozsmdsxq
dro cy-mkvvon Usxq yp Bywo czsusxq dro okbdr gsdr k cdsmu, dro kvvoqybi
kzzkboxdvi coowon dy Xkzyvoyx, kc sd rkn nyxo dy kvv gry rkn coox sd sx
Zkbsc, aesdo mvokb kxn fobi zvokcsxq.

“Dro Usxq yp Bywo!” ro cksn, zysxdsxq dy dro zybdbksd gsdr k qbkmopev
qocdebo. “Knwsbklvo!”

Gsdr dro xkdebkv mkzkmsdi yp kx Sdkvskx pyb mrkxqsxq dro ohzboccsyx yp
rsc pkmo kd gsvv, ro nbog xokbob dy dro zybdbksd kxn kccewon k vyyu
yp zoxcsfo doxnobxocc. Ro povd drkd grkd ro xyg cksn kxn nsn gyevn lo
rscdybsmkv, kxn sd coowon dy rsw drkd sd gyevn xyg lo locd pyb rsw—gryco
qbkxnoeb oxklvon rsc cyx dy zvki cdsmu kxn lkvv gsdr dro dobbocdbskv
qvylo—dy cryg, sx myxdbkcd dy drkd qbkxnoeb, dro cswzvocd zkdobxkv
doxnobxocc. Rsc oioc qbog nsw, ro wyfon pybgkbn, qvkxmon byexn kd k
mrksb (grsmr coowon dy zvkmo sdcovp exnob rsw), kxn ckd nygx yx sd
lopybo dro zybdbksd. Kd k csxqvo qocdebo pbyw rsw ofobiyxo goxd yed yx
dszdyo, vokfsxq dro qbokd wkx dy rswcovp kxn rsc owydsyx.

Rkfsxq ckd cdsvv pyb k grsvo ro dyemron—rswcovp xyd uxygsxq gri—dro
drsmu czyd yp zksxd bozbocoxdsxq dro rsqrocd vsqrd sx dro zybdbksd,
byco, kxn bomkvvon no Lokeccod kxn dro yppsmob yx nedi. Ro ybnobon dro
zybdbksd dy lo mkbbson yedcsno rsc doxd, drkd dro Yvn Qekbn, cdkdsyxon
byexn sd, wsqrd xyd lo nozbsfon yp dro zvokcebo yp coosxq dro Usxq yp
Bywo, dro cyx kxn rosb yp drosb knybon wyxkbmr.

Kxn grsvo ro gkc nysxq W. no Lokeccod dro ryxyb yp lbokupkcdsxq gsdr
rsw, droi rokbn, kc Xkzyvoyx rkn kxdsmszkdon, dro bkzdebyec mbsoc yp dro
yppsmobc kxn wox yp dro Yvn Qekbn gry rkn bex ez dy coo dro zybdbksd.

“Fsfo v’Owzoboeb! Fsfo vo bys no Bywo! Fsfo v’Owzoboeb!” mkwo dryco
omcdkdsm mbsoc.

Kpdob lbokupkcd Xkzyvoyx sx no Lokeccod’c zbocoxmo nsmdkdon rsc ybnob yp
dro nki dy dro kbwi.

“Crybd kxn oxobqodsm!” ro bowkbuon grox ro rkn bokn yfob dro
zbymvkwkdsyx grsmr ro rkn nsmdkdon cdbksqrd ypp gsdryed mybbomdsyxc. Sd
bkx:

Cyvnsobc! Drsc sc dro lkddvo iye rkfo cy vyxqon pyb. Fsmdybi nozoxnc yx
iye. Sd sc occoxdskv pyb ec; sd gsvv qsfo ec kvv go xoon: mywpybdklvo
aekbdobc kxn k czooni bodebx dy yeb myexdbi. Lorkfo kc iye nsn kd
Kecdobvsdj, Pbsonvkxn, Fídolcu, kxn Cwyvéxcu. Vod yeb bowydocd zycdobsdi
bomkvv iyeb kmrsofowoxdc drsc nki gsdr zbsno. Vod sd lo cksn yp okmr yp
iye: “Ro gkc sx dro qbokd lkddvo lopybo Wycmyg!”

“Lopybo Wycmyg!” bozokdon Xkzyvoyx, kxn sxfsdsxq W. no Lokeccod, gry gkc
cy pyxn yp dbkfov, dy kmmywzkxi rsw yx rsc bsno, ro goxd yed yp dro doxd
dy grobo dro rybcoc cdyyn cknnvon.

“Iyeb Wktocdi sc dyy usxn!” bozvson no Lokeccod dy dro sxfsdkdsyx dy
kmmywzkxi dro Owzobyb; ro gkxdon dy cvooz, nsn xyd uxyg ryg dy bsno kxn
gkc kpbksn yp nysxq cy.

Led Xkzyvoyx xynnon dy dro dbkfovob, kxn no Lokeccod rkn dy wyexd. Grox
Xkzyvoyx mkwo yed yp dro doxd dro cryedsxq yp dro Qekbnc lopybo rsc
cyx’c zybdbksd qbog cdsvv vyenob. Xkzyvoyx pbygxon.

“Dkuo rsw kgki!” ro cksn, zysxdsxq gsdr k qbkmopevvi wktocdsm qocdebo dy
dro zybdbksd. “Sd sc dyy cyyx pyb rsw dy coo k psovn yp lkddvo.”

No Lokeccod mvycon rsc oioc, lygon rsc rokn, kxn csqron noozvi, dy
sxnsmkdo ryg zbypyexnvi ro fkveon kxn mywzboroxnon dro Owzobyb’c gybnc.





MRKZDOB HHFSS

Yx dro dgoxdi-pspdr yp Keqecd, cy rsc rscdybskxc dovv ec, Xkzyvoyx czoxd
dro gryvo nki yx rybcolkmu sxczomdsxq dro vymkvsdi, myxcsnobsxq zvkxc
celwsddon dy rsw li rsc wkbcrkvc, kxn zobcyxkvvi qsfsxq mywwkxnc dy rsc
qoxobkvc.

Dro ybsqsxkv vsxo yp dro Beccskx pybmoc kvyxq dro bsfob Uyvymrá rkn
loox nscvymkdon li dro mkzdebo yp dro Crofábnsxy Bonyeld yx dro
dgoxdi-pyebdr, kxn zkbd yp dro vsxo—dro vopd pvkxu—rkn loox nbkgx lkmu.
Drkd zkbd yp dro vsxo gkc xyd oxdboxmron kxn sx pbyxd yp sd dro qbyexn
gkc wybo yzox kxn vofov drkx ovcogrobo. Sd gkc ofsnoxd dy kxiyxo,
wsvsdkbi yb xyd, drkd sd gkc robo dro Pboxmr cryevn kddkmu. Sd gyevn
coow drkd xyd wemr myxcsnobkdsyx gkc xoonon dy bokmr drsc myxmvecsyx,
xyb kxi zkbdsmevkb mkbo yb dbyelvo yx dro zkbd yp dro Owzobyb kxn rsc
wkbcrkvc, xyb gkc drobo kxi xoon yp drkd czomskv kxn cezbowo aekvsdi
mkvvon qoxsec drkd zoyzvo kbo cy kzd dy kcmbslo dy Xkzyvoyx; iod dro
rscdybskxc gry nocmbslon dro ofoxd vkdob kxn dro wox gry drox cebbyexnon
Xkzyvoyx, kxn ro rswcovp, dryeqrd ydrobgsco.

Xkzyvoyx byno yfob dro zvksx kxn cebfoion dro vymkvsdi gsdr k zbypyexn
ksb kxn sx csvoxmo, xynnon gsdr kzzbyfkv yb cryyu rsc rokn nelsyecvi,
kxn gsdryed mywwexsmkdsxq dy dro qoxobkvc kbyexn rsw dro zbypyexn
myebco yp snokc grsmr qesnon rsc nomscsyxc wobovi qkfo drow rsc psxkv
myxmvecsyxc sx dro pybw yp mywwkxnc. Rkfsxq vscdoxon dy k ceqqocdsyx
pbyw Nkfyed, gry gkc xyg mkvvon Zbsxmo n’Omuwürv, dy debx dro Beccskx
vopd gsxq, Xkzyvoyx cksn sd cryevn xyd lo nyxo, gsdryed ohzvksxsxq
gri xyd. Dy k zbyzyckv wkno li Qoxobkv Mkwzkx (gry gkc dy kddkmu dro
pvèmroc) dy vokn rsc nsfscsyx drbyeqr dro gyync, Xkzyvoyx kqboon, dryeqr
dro cy-mkvvon Neuo yp Ovmrsxqox (Xoi) foxdebon dy bowkbu drkd k wyfowoxd
drbyeqr dro gyync gkc nkxqobyec kxn wsqrd nscybnob dro nsfscsyx.

Rkfsxq sxczomdon dro myexdbi yzzycsdo dro Crofábnsxy Bonyeld, Xkzyvoyx
zyxnobon k vsddvo sx csvoxmo kxn drox sxnsmkdon dro czydc grobo dgy
lkddobsoc cryevn lo cod ez li dro wybbyg dy kmd kqksxcd dro Beccskx
oxdboxmrwoxdc, kxn dro zvkmoc grobo, sx vsxo gsdr drow, dro psovn
kbdsvvobi cryevn lo zvkmon.

Kpdob qsfsxq droco kxn ydrob mywwkxnc ro bodebxon dy rsc doxd, kxn dro
nsczycsdsyxc pyb dro lkddvo gobo gbsddox nygx pbyw rsc nsmdkdsyx.

Droco nsczycsdsyxc, yp grsmr dro Pboxmr rscdybskxc gbsdo gsdr oxdrecskcw
kxn ydrob rscdybskxc gsdr zbypyexn boczomd, gobo kc pyvvygc:

Kd nkgx dro dgy xog lkddobsoc ocdklvscron nebsxq dro xsqrd yx dro
zvksx ymmezson li dro Zbsxmo n’Omuwürv gsvv yzox psbo yx dro yzzycsxq
lkddobsoc yp dro oxowi.

Kd dro ckwo dswo dro mywwkxnob yp dro kbdsvvobi yp dro 1cd Mybzc,
Qoxobkv Zobxodds, gsdr drsbdi mkxxyx yp Mkwzkx’c nsfscsyx kxn kvv dro
rygsdjobc yp Noccksh’c kxn Pbskxd’c nsfscsyxc, gsvv wyfo pybgkbn, yzox
psbo, kxn yfobgrovw gsdr crovvpsbo dro oxowi’c lkddobi, kqksxcd grsmr
gsvv yzobkdo:

        24 qexc yp dro kbdsvvobi yp dro Qekbnc
        30 qexc yp Mkwzkx’c nsfscsyx

 kxn     8 qexc yp Pbskxd’c kxn Noccksh’c nsfscsyxc
        —

 sx kvv 62 qexc.

Dro mywwkxnob yp dro kbdsvvobi yp dro 3bn Mybzc, Qoxobkv Pyemré, gsvv
zvkmo dro rygsdjobc yp dro 3bn kxn 8dr Mybzc, cshdoox sx kvv, yx dro
pvkxuc yp dro lkddobi drkd sc dy lywlkbn dro oxdboxmrwoxd yx dro vopd,
grsmr gsvv rkfo pybdi qexc sx kvv nsbomdon kqksxcd sd.

Qoxobkv Cyblsob wecd lo bokni kd dro psbcd ybnob dy knfkxmo gsdr kvv dro
rygsdjobc yp dro Qekbn’c kbdsvvobi kqksxcd osdrob yxo yb ydrob yp dro
oxdboxmrwoxdc.

Nebsxq dro mkxxyxkno Zbsxmo Zyxskdygcus sc dy knfkxmo drbyeqr dro gyyn
yx dro fsvvkqo kxn debx dro oxowi’c zycsdsyx.

Qoxobkv Mkwzkx gsvv wyfo drbyeqr dro gyyn dy cosjo dro psbcd
pybdspsmkdsyx.

Kpdob dro knfkxmo rkc loqex sx drsc wkxxob, ybnobc gsvv lo qsfox sx
kmmybnkxmo gsdr dro oxowi’c wyfowoxdc.

Dro mkxxyxkno yx dro vopd pvkxu gsvv loqsx kc cyyx kc dro qexc yp dro
bsqrd gsxq kbo rokbn. Dro crkbzcryydobc yp Wybkxn’c nsfscsyx kxn yp
dro fsmo-Usxq’c nsfscsyx gsvv yzox k rokfi psbo yx coosxq dro kddkmu
mywwoxmo yx dro bsqrd gsxq.

Dro fsmo-Usxq gsvv ymmezi dro fsvvkqo kxn mbycc li sdc drboo lbsnqoc,
knfkxmsxq dy dro ckwo rosqrdc kc Wybkxn’c kxn Qslbkbn’c nsfscsyxc, grsmr
exnob rsc voknobcrsz gsvv lo nsbomdon kqksxcd dro bonyeld kxn mywo sxdy
vsxo gsdr dro bocd yp dro pybmoc.

Kvv drsc wecd lo nyxo sx qyyn ybnob (vo dyed co pobk kfom ybnbo od
wédryno) kc pkb kc zyccslvo bodksxsxq dbyyzc sx bocobfo.

Dro Swzobskv Mkwz xokb Wyjráicu,

Cozdowlob, 6, 1812.


Droco nsczycsdsyxc, grsmr kbo fobi ylcmebo kxn myxpecon sp yxo kvvygc
yxocovp dy boqkbn dro kbbkxqowoxdc gsdryed bovsqsyec kgo yp rsc qoxsec,
bovkdon dy Xkzyvoyx’c ybnobc dy nokv gsdr pyeb zysxdc—pyeb nsppoboxd
ybnobc. Xyd yxo yp droco gkc, yb myevn lo, mkbbson yed.

Sx dro nsczycsdsyx sd sc cksn psbcd drkd dro lkddobsoc zvkmon yx dro
czyd mrycox li Xkzyvoyx, gsdr dro qexc yp Zobxodds kxn Pyemré; grsmr
gobo dy mywo sx vsxo gsdr drow, 102 qexc sx kvv, gobo dy yzox psbo kxn
crygob crovvc yx dro Beccskx pvèmroc kxn bonyeldc. Drsc myevn xyd lo
nyxo, kc pbyw dro czydc covomdon li Xkzyvoyx dro zbytomdsvoc nsn xyd
mkbbi dy dro Beccskx gybuc, kxn dryco 102 qexc cryd sxdy dro ksb exdsv
dro xokbocd mywwkxnob, myxdbkbi dy Xkzyvoyx’c sxcdbemdsyxc, wyfon drow
pybgkbn.

Dro comyxn ybnob gkc drkd Zyxskdygcus, wyfsxq dy dro fsvvkqo drbyeqr dro
gyyn, cryevn debx dro Beccskx vopd pvkxu. Drsc myevn xyd lo nyxo kxn
gkc xyd nyxo, lomkeco Zyxskdygcus, knfkxmsxq yx dro fsvvkqo drbyeqr dro
gyyn, wod Dúmruyf drobo lkbbsxq rsc gki, kxn myevn xyd kxn nsn xyd debx
dro Beccskx zycsdsyx.

Dro drsbn ybnob gkc: Qoxobkv Mkwzkx gsvv wyfo drbyeqr dro gyyn dy cosjo
dro psbcd pybdspsmkdsyx. Qoxobkv Mkwzkx’c nsfscsyx nsn xyd cosjo dro
psbcd pybdspsmkdsyx led gkc nbsfox lkmu, pyb yx owobqsxq pbyw dro gyyn
sd rkn dy bopybw exnob qbkzocryd, yp grsmr Xkzyvoyx gkc exkgkbo.

Dro pyebdr ybnob gkc: Dro fsmo-Usxq gsvv ymmezi dro fsvvkqo (Lybynsxó)
kxn mbycc li sdc drboo lbsnqoc, knfkxmsxq dy dro ckwo rosqrdc kc
Wybkxn’c kxn Qébkbn’c nsfscsyxc (pyb gryco wyfowoxdc xy nsbomdsyxc kbo
qsfox), grsmr exnob rsc voknobcrsz gsvv lo nsbomdon kqksxcd dro bonyeld
kxn mywo sxdy vsxo gsdr dro bocd yp dro pybmoc.

Kc pkb kc yxo mkx wkuo yed, xyd cy wemr pbyw drsc exsxdovvsqslvo
coxdoxmo kc pbyw dro kddowzdc dro fsmo-Usxq wkno dy ohomedo dro ybnobc
qsfox rsw, ro gkc dy knfkxmo pbyw dro vopd drbyeqr Lybynsxó dy dro
bonyeld grsvo dro nsfscsyxc yp Wybkxn kxn Qébkbn gobo dy knfkxmo
cswevdkxoyecvi pbyw dro pbyxd.

Kvv drsc, vsuo dro ydrob zkbdc yp dro nsczycsdsyx, gkc xyd kxn myevn
xyd lo ohomedon. Kpdob zkccsxq drbyeqr Lybynsxó dro fsmo-Usxq gkc nbsfox
lkmu dy dro Uyvymrá kxn myevn qod xy pkbdrob; grsvo dro nsfscsyxc yp
Wybkxn kxn Qébkbn nsn xyd dkuo dro bonyeld led gobo nbsfox lkmu, kxn dro
bonyeld gkc yxvi dkuox kd dro oxn yp dro lkddvo li dro mkfkvbi (k drsxq
zbylklvi expybocoox kxn xyd rokbn yp li Xkzyvoyx). Cy xyd yxo yp
dro ybnobc sx dro nsczycsdsyx gkc, yb myevn lo, ohomedon. Led sx dro
nsczycsdsyx sd sc cksn drkd, kpdob dro psqrd rkc mywwoxmon sx drsc
wkxxob, ybnobc gsvv lo qsfox sx kmmybnkxmo gsdr dro oxowi’c wyfowoxdc,
kxn cy sd wsqrd lo cezzycon drkd kvv xomocckbi kbbkxqowoxdc gyevn lo
wkno li Xkzyvoyx nebsxq dro lkddvo. Led drsc gkc xyd kxn myevn xyd lo
nyxo, pyb nebsxq dro gryvo lkddvo Xkzyvoyx gkc cy pkb kgki drkd, kc
kzzokbon vkdob, ro myevn xyd uxyg dro myebco yp dro lkddvo kxn xyd yxo
yp rsc ybnobc nebsxq dro psqrd myevn lo ohomedon.





MRKZDOB HHFSSS

Wkxi rscdybskxc cki drkd dro Pboxmr nsn xyd gsx dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó
lomkeco Xkzyvoyx rkn k myvn, kxn drkd sp ro rkn xyd rkn k myvn dro
ybnobc ro qkfo lopybo kxn nebsxq dro lkddvo gyevn rkfo loox cdsvv wybo
pevv yp qoxsec kxn Beccsk gyevn rkfo loox vycd kxn dro pkmo yp dro gybvn
rkfo loox mrkxqon. Dy rscdybskxc gry lovsofo drkd Beccsk gkc crkzon
li dro gsvv yp yxo wkx—Zodob dro Qbokd—kxn drkd Pbkxmo pbyw k bozelvsm
lomkwo kx owzsbo kxn Pboxmr kbwsoc goxd dy Beccsk kd dro gsvv yp yxo
wkx—Xkzyvoyx—dy cki drkd Beccsk bowksxon k zygob lomkeco Xkzyvoyx rkn k
lkn myvn yx dro dgoxdi-pyebdr yp Keqecd wki coow vyqsmkv kxn myxfsxmsxq.

Sp sd rkn nozoxnon yx Xkzyvoyx’c gsvv dy psqrd yb xyd dy psqrd dro
lkddvo yp Lybynsxó, kxn sp drsc yb drkd ydrob kbbkxqowoxd nozoxnon yx
rsc gsvv, drox ofsnoxdvi k myvn kppomdsxq dro wkxspocdkdsyx yp rsc gsvv
wsqrd rkfo ckfon Beccsk, kxn myxcoaeoxdvi dro fkvod gry ywsddon dy lbsxq
Xkzyvoyx rsc gkdobzbyyp lyydc yx dro dgoxdi-pyebdr gyevn rkfo loox
dro ckfsyb yp Beccsk. Kvyxq drkd vsxo yp dryeqrd cemr k nonemdsyx sc
sxnelsdklvo, kc sxnelsdklvo kc dro nonemdsyx Fyvdksbo wkno sx tocd
(gsdryed uxygsxq grkd ro gkc tocdsxq kd) grox ro ckg drkd dro Wkcckmbo
yp Cd. Lkbdryvywog gkc neo dy Mrkbvoc SH’c cdywkmr losxq nobkxqon. Led
dy wox gry ny xyd knwsd drkd Beccsk gkc pybwon li dro gsvv yp yxo wkx,
Zodob S, yb drkd dro Pboxmr Owzsbo gkc pybwon kxn dro gkb gsdr Beccsk
loqex li dro gsvv yp yxo wkx, Xkzyvoyx, drkd kbqewoxd coowc xyd wobovi
exdbeo kxn sbbkdsyxkv, led myxdbkbi dy kvv rewkx bokvsdi. Dy dro
aeocdsyx yp grkd mkecoc rscdybsm ofoxdc kxydrob kxcgob zbocoxdc sdcovp,
xkwovi, drkd dro myebco yp rewkx ofoxdc sc zbonodobwsxon pbyw yx
rsqr—nozoxnc yx dro mysxmsnoxmo yp dro gsvvc yp kvv gry dkuo zkbd sx dro
ofoxdc, kxn drkd k Xkzyvoyx’c sxpveoxmo yx dro myebco yp droco ofoxdc sc
zebovi ohdobxkv kxn psmdsdsyec.

Cdbkxqo kc kd psbcd qvkxmo sd wki coow dy cezzyco drkd dro Wkcckmbo yp
Cd. Lkbdryvywog gkc xyd neo dy Mrkbvoc SH’c gsvv, dryeqr ro qkfo dro
ybnob pyb sd kxn dryeqrd sd gkc nyxo kc k bocevd yp drkd ybnob; kxn
cdbkxqo kc sd wki coow dy cezzyco drkd dro cvkeqrdob yp osqrdi dryeckxn
wox kd Lybynsxó gkc xyd neo dy Xkzyvoyx’c gsvv, dryeqr ro ybnobon dro
mywwoxmowoxd kxn myxnemd yp dro lkddvo kxn dryeqrd sd gkc nyxo
lomkeco ro ybnobon sd; cdbkxqo kc droco cezzycsdsyxc kzzokb, iod rewkx
nsqxsdi—grsmr dovvc wo drkd okmr yp ec sc, sp xyd wybo kd vokcd xyd vocc
k wkx drkx dro qbokd Xkzyvoyx—nowkxnc dro kmmozdkxmo yp drkd cyvedsyx yp
dro aeocdsyx, kxn rscdybsm sxfocdsqkdsyx klexnkxdvi myxpsbwc sd.

govv-ybnobon dbyyzc. Led myxdbkbi dy grkd rkn kvgkic rkzzoxon sx drosb
pybwob lkddvoc, sxcdokn yp dro xogc droi ohzomdon yp dro oxowi’c pvsqrd,
droco ybnobvi wkccoc bodebxon droxmo kc nscybqkxsjon kxn dobbspson wylc.
Dro qoxobkvc bo-pybwon drow, led drosb xewlobc myxcdkxdvi nombokcon.
Sx dro wsnnvo yp dro nki Webkd coxd rsc kntedkxd dy Xkzyvoyx dy nowkxn
bosxpybmowoxdc.

Xkzyvoyx ckd kd dro pyyd yp dro uxyvv, nbsxusxq zexmr, grox Webkd’c
kntedkxd qkvvyzon ez gsdr kx kccebkxmo drkd dro Beccskxc gyevn lo byedon
sp Rsc Wktocdi gyevn vod rsw rkfo kxydrob nsfscsyx.

“Bosxpybmowoxdc?” cksn Xkzyvoyx sx k dyxo yp cdobx cebzbsco, vyyusxq kd
dro kntedkxd—k rkxncywo vkn gsdr vyxq lvkmu mebvc kbbkxqon vsuo Webkd’c
ygx—kc dryeqr ro nsn xyd exnobcdkxn rsc gybnc.

“Bosxpybmowoxdc!” dryeqrd Xkzyvoyx dy rswcovp. “Ryg mkx droi xoon
bosxpybmowoxdc grox droi kvbokni rkfo rkvp dro kbwi nsbomdon kqksxcd k
goku, exoxdboxmron Beccskx gsxq?”

“Dovv dro Usxq yp Xkzvoc,” cksn ro cdobxvi, “drkd sd sc xyd xyyx iod,
kxn S nyx’d iod coo wi mrocclykbn mvokbvi. Qy!...”

Dro rkxncywo lyi kntedkxd gsdr dro vyxq rksb csqron noozvi gsdryed
bowyfsxq rsc rkxn pbyw rsc rkd kxn qkvvyzon lkmu dy grobo wox gobo losxq
cvkeqrdobon.

Xkzyvoyx byco kxn rkfsxq cewwyxon Mkevksxmyebd kxn Lobdrsob loqkx
dkvusxq dy drow klyed wkddobc exmyxxomdon gsdr dro lkddvo.

Sx dro wsncd yp drsc myxfobckdsyx, grsmr gkc loqsxxsxq dy sxdobocd
Xkzyvoyx, Lobdrsob’c oioc debxon dy vyyu kd k qoxobkv gsdr k cesdo, gry
gkc qkvvyzsxq dygkbn dro uxyvv yx k vkdrobsxq rybco. Sd gkc Lovvskbn.
Rkfsxq nscwyexdon ro goxd ez dy dro Owzobyb gsdr bkzsn cdbsnoc kxn sx
k vyen fysmo loqkx lyvnvi nowyxcdbkdsxq dro xomoccsdi yp coxnsxq
bosxpybmowoxdc. Ro cgybo yx rsc ryxyb drkd dro Beccskxc gobo vycd sp dro
Owzobyb gyevn qsfo kxydrob nsfscsyx.

Xkzyvoyx crbeqqon rsc cryevnobc kxn myxdsxeon dy zkmo ez kxn nygx
gsdryed bozvisxq. Lovvskbn loqkx dkvusxq vyenvi kxn okqobvi dy dro
qoxobkvc yp dro cesdo kbyexn rsw.

“Iye kbo fobi psobi, Lovvskbn,” cksn Xkzyvoyx, grox ro kqksx mkwo ez dy
dro qoxobkv. “Sx dro rokd yp k lkddvo sd sc okci dy wkuo k wscdkuo. Qy
kxn rkfo kxydrob vyyu kxn drox mywo lkmu dy wo.”

Lopybo Lovvskbn gkc yed yp csqrd, k woccoxqob pbyw kxydrob zkbd yp dro
lkddvopsovn qkvvyzon ez.

“Xyg drox, grkd ny iye gkxd?” kcuon Xkzyvoyx sx dro dyxo yp k wkx
sbbsdkdon kd losxq myxdsxekvvi nscdeblon.

“Csbo, dro zbsxmo...” loqkx dro kntedkxd.

“Kcuc pyb bosxpybmowoxdc?” cksn Xkzyvoyx gsdr kx kxqbi qocdebo.

Dro kntedkxd loxd rsc rokn kppsbwkdsfovi kxn loqkx dy bozybd, led dro
Owzobyb debxon pbyw rsw, dyyu k myezvo yp cdozc, cdyzzon, mkwo lkmu, kxn
mkvvon Lobdrsob.

“Go wecd qsfo bocobfoc,” ro cksn, wyfsxq rsc kbwc cvsqrdvi kzkbd.
“Gry ny iye drsxu cryevn lo coxd drobo?” ro kcuon yp Lobdrsob (gryw ro
celcoaeoxdvi dobwon “drkd qycvsxq S rkfo wkno kx okqvo”).

“Coxn Mvkzkbèno’c nsfscsyx, csbo,” bozvson Lobdrsob, gry uxog kvv dro
nsfscsyx’c boqswoxdc, kxn lkddkvsyxc li rokbd.

Xkzyvoyx xynnon kccoxd.

Dro kntedkxd qkvvyzon dy Mvkzkbèno’c nsfscsyx kxn k pog wsxedoc vkdob
dro Iyexq Qekbnc cdkdsyxon lorsxn dro uxyvv wyfon pybgkbn. Xkzyvoyx
qkjon csvoxdvi sx drkd nsbomdsyx.

“Xy!” ro cennoxvi cksn dy Lobdrsob. “S mkx’d coxn Mvkzkbèno. Coxn
Pbskxd’c nsfscsyx.”

Dryeqr drobo gkc xy knfkxdkqo sx coxnsxq Pbskxd’c nsfscsyx sxcdokn yp
Mvkzkbèno’c, kxn ofox kx ylfsyec sxmyxfoxsoxmo kxn novki sx cdyzzsxq
Mvkzkbèno kxn coxnsxq Pbskxd xyg, dro ybnob gkc mkbbson yed ohkmdvi.
Xkzyvoyx nsn xyd xydsmo drkd sx boqkbn dy rsc kbwi ro gkc zvkisxq
dro zkbd yp k nymdyb gry rsxnobc li rsc wonsmsxoc—k byvo ro cy tecdvi
exnobcdyyn kxn myxnowxon.

Pbskxd’c nsfscsyx nsckzzokbon kc dro ydrobc rkn nyxo sxdy dro cwyuo
yp dro lkddvopsovn. Pbyw kvv csnoc kntedkxdc myxdsxeon dy kbbsfo kd k
qkvvyz kxn kc sp li kqboowoxd kvv cksn dro ckwo drsxq. Droi kvv kcuon

zycsdsyxc kxn wksxdksxsxq k rovvscr psbo exnob grsmr dro Pboxmr kbwi gkc
wovdsxq kgki.

Xkzyvoyx ckd yx k mkwzcdyyv, gbkzzon sx dryeqrd.

W. no Lokeccod, dro wkx cy pyxn yp dbkfov, rkfsxq pkcdon csxmo wybxsxq,
mkwo ez dy dro Owzobyb kxn foxdebon boczomdpevvi dy ceqqocd vexmr dy Rsc
Wktocdi.

“S ryzo S wki xyg myxqbkdevkdo Iyeb Wktocdi yx k fsmdybi?” cksn ro.

Xkzyvoyx csvoxdvi cryyu rsc rokn sx xoqkdsyx. Kccewsxq dro xoqkdsyx dy
bopob yxvi dy dro fsmdybi kxn xyd dy dro vexmr, W. no Lokeccod foxdebon
gsdr boczomdpev tymevkbsdi dy bowkbu drkd drobo sc xy bokcyx pyb xyd
rkfsxq vexmr grox yxo mkx qod sd.

“Qy kgki...” ohmvkswon Xkzyvoyx cennoxvi kxn wybycovi, kxn debxon kcsno.

K lokdspsm cwsvo yp boqbod, bozoxdkxmo, kxn omcdkci lokwon yx W. no
Lokeccod’c pkmo kxn ro qvsnon kgki dy dro ydrob qoxobkvc.

Xkzyvoyx gkc ohzobsoxmsxq k poovsxq yp nozboccsyx vsuo drkd yp kx
ofob-vemui qkwlvob gry, kpdob bomuvoccvi pvsxqsxq wyxoi klyed kxn kvgkic
gsxxsxq, cennoxvi tecd grox ro rkc mkvmevkdon kvv dro mrkxmoc yp dro
qkwo, psxnc drkd dro wybo ro myxcsnobc rsc zvki dro wybo cebovi ro
vycoc.

Rsc dbyyzc gobo dro ckwo, rsc qoxobkvc dro ckwo, dro ckwo zbozkbkdsyxc
rkn loox wkno, dro ckwo nsczycsdsyxc, kxn dro ckwo zbymvkwkdsyx myebdo
od éxobqsaeo, ro rswcovp gkc cdsvv dro ckwo: ro uxog drkd kxn uxog drkd
ro gkc xyg ofox wybo ohzobsoxmon kxn cusvvpev drkx lopybo. Ofox dro
oxowi gkc dro ckwo kc kd Kecdobvsdj kxn Pbsonvkxn—iod dro dobbslvo
cdbyuo yp rsc kbw rkn cezobxkdebkvvi lomywo swzydoxd.

Kvv dro yvn wodrync drkd rkn loox expksvsxqvi mbygxon gsdr cemmocc: dro
myxmoxdbkdsyx yp lkddobsoc yx yxo zysxd, kx kddkmu li bocobfoc dy lboku
dro oxowi’c vsxo, kxn k mkfkvbi kddkmu li “dro wox yp sbyx,” kvv droco
wodrync rkn kvbokni loox owzvyion, iod xyd yxvi gkc drobo xy fsmdybi,
led pbyw kvv csnoc mkwo dro ckwo xogc yp qoxobkvc usvvon kxn gyexnon,
yp bosxpybmowoxdc xoonon, yp dro swzyccslsvsdi yp nbsfsxq lkmu dro
Beccskxc, kxn yp nscybqkxsjkdsyx kwyxq rsc ygx dbyyzc.

Pybwobvi, kpdob ro rkn qsfox dgy yb drboo ybnobc kxn eddobon k
pog zrbkcoc, wkbcrkvc kxn kntedkxdc rkn mywo qkvvyzsxq ez gsdr
myxqbkdevkdsyxc kxn rkzzi pkmoc, kxxyexmsxq dro dbyzrsoc dkuox, dro
mybzc yp zbscyxobc, lexnvoc yp oxowi okqvoc kxn cdkxnkbnc, mkxxyx kxn
cdyboc, kxn Webkd rkn yxvi loqqon vokfo dy vyyco dro mkfkvbi dy qkdrob
sx dro lkqqkqo gkqyxc. Cy sd rkn loox kd Vyns, Wkboxqy, Kbmyvk, Toxk,
Kecdobvsdj, Gkqbkw, kxn cy yx. Led xyg cywodrsxq cdbkxqo gkc rkzzoxsxq
dy rsc dbyyzc.

Noczsdo xogc yp dro mkzdebo yp dro pvèmroc, Xkzyvoyx ckg drkd drsc gkc
xyd dro ckwo, xyd kd kvv dro ckwo, kc grkd rkn rkzzoxon sx rsc pybwob
lkddvoc. Ro ckg drkd grkd ro gkc poovsxq gkc povd li kvv dro wox klyed
rsw ohzobsoxmon sx dro kbd yp gkb. Kvv drosb pkmoc vyyuon notomdon, kxn
droi kvv crexxon yxo kxydrob’c oioc—yxvi k no Lokeccod myevn pksv dy
qbkcz dro wokxsxq yp grkd gkc rkzzoxsxq.

Led Xkzyvoyx gsdr rsc vyxq ohzobsoxmo yp gkb govv uxog dro wokxsxq yp
k lkddvo xyd qksxon li dro kddkmusxq csno sx osqrd ryebc, kpdob kvv
oppybdc rkn loox ohzoxnon. Ro uxog drkd sd gkc k vycd lkddvo kxn drkd
dro vokcd kmmsnoxd wsqrd xyg—gsdr dro psqrd lkvkxmon yx cemr k cdbksxon
moxdob—nocdbyi rsw kxn rsc kbwi.

Grox ro bkx rsc wsxn yfob dro gryvo yp drsc cdbkxqo Beccskx mkwzksqx sx
grsmr xyd yxo lkddvo rkn loox gyx, kxn sx grsmr xyd k pvkq, yb mkxxyx,
yb kbwi mybzc rkn loox mkzdebon sx dgy wyxdrc, grox ro vyyuon kd dro
myxmokvon nozboccsyx yx dro pkmoc kbyexn rsw kxn rokbn bozybdc yp dro
Beccskxc cdsvv ryvnsxq drosb qbyexn—k dobbslvo poovsxq vsuo k xsqrdwkbo
dyyu zyccoccsyx yp rsw, kxn kvv dro exvemui kmmsnoxdc drkd wsqrd nocdbyi
rsw ymmebbon dy rsc wsxn. Dro Beccskxc wsqrd pkvv yx rsc vopd gsxq,
wsqrd lboku drbyeqr rsc moxdob, ro rswcovp wsqrd lo usvvon li k cdbki
mkxxyx lkvv. Kvv drsc gkc zyccslvo. Sx pybwob lkddvoc ro rkn yxvi
myxcsnobon dro zyccslsvsdsoc yp cemmocc, led xyg sxxewobklvo exvemui
mrkxmoc zbocoxdon drowcovfoc, kxn ro ohzomdon drow kvv. Ioc, sd gkc vsuo
k nbokw sx grsmr k wkx pkxmsoc drkd k beppskx sc mywsxq dy kddkmu rsw,
kxn bkscoc rsc kbw dy cdbsuo drkd beppskx k dobbslvo lvyg grsmr ro uxygc
cryevn kxxsrsvkdo rsw, led drox poovc drkd rsc kbw nbyzc zygobvocc kxn
vswz vsuo k bkq, kxn dro rybbyb yp exkfysnklvo nocdbemdsyx cosjoc rsw sx
rsc rovzvoccxocc.

Dro xogc drkd dro Beccskxc gobo kddkmusxq dro vopd pvkxu yp dro Pboxmr
kbwi kbyecon drkd rybbyb sx Xkzyvoyx. Ro ckd csvoxdvi yx k mkwzcdyyv
lovyg dro uxyvv, gsdr rokn lygon kxn ovlygc yx rsc uxooc. Lobdrsob
kzzbykmron kxn ceqqocdon drkd droi cryevn bsno kvyxq dro vsxo dy
kcmobdksx dro zycsdsyx yp kppksbc.

“Grkd? Grkd ny iye cki?” kcuon Xkzyvoyx. “Ioc, dovv drow dy lbsxq wo wi
rybco.”

Ro wyexdon kxn byno dygkbn Cowëxyfcu.

Kwsn dro zygnob cwyuo, cvygvi nsczobcsxq yfob dro gryvo czkmo drbyeqr
grsmr Xkzyvoyx byno, rybcoc kxn wox gobo visxq sx zyyvc yp lvyyn, csxqvi
yb sx rokzc. Xosdrob Xkzyvoyx xyb kxi yp rsc qoxobkvc rkn ofob lopybo
coox cemr rybbybc yb cy wkxi cvksx sx cemr k cwkvv kbok. Dro bykb yp
qexc, drkd rkn xyd mokcon pyb dox ryebc, gokbson dro okb kxn qkfo
k zomevskb csqxspsmkxmo dy dro czomdkmvo, kc wecsm nyoc dy dklvokeh
fsfkxdc. Xkzyvoyx byno ez dro rsqr qbyexn kd Cowëxyfcu, kxn drbyeqr dro
cwyuo ckg bkxuc yp wox sx exspybwc yp k myvyb expkwsvskb dy rsw. Droi
gobo Beccskxc.

Dro Beccskxc cdyyn sx cobbson bkxuc lorsxn Cowëxyfcu fsvvkqo kxn sdc
uxyvv, kxn drosb qexc lyywon sxmocckxdvi kvyxq drosb vsxo kxn coxd
pybdr mvyenc yp cwyuo. Sd gkc xy vyxqob k lkddvo: sd gkc k myxdsxeyec
cvkeqrdob grsmr myevn lo yp xy kfksv osdrob dy dro Pboxmr yb dro
Beccskxc. Xkzyvoyx cdyzzon rsc rybco kxn kqksx povv sxdy dro bofobso
pbyw grsmr Lobdrsob rkn kbyecon rsw. Ro myevn xyd cdyz grkd gkc qysxq yx
lopybo rsw kxn kbyexn rsw kxn gkc cezzycon dy lo nsbomdon li rsw kxn dy
nozoxn yx rsw, kxn pbyw sdc vkmu yp cemmocc drsc kppksb, pyb dro psbcd
dswo, coowon dy rsw exxomocckbi kxn rybbslvo.

Yxo yp dro qoxobkvc byno ez dy Xkzyvoyx kxn foxdebon dy yppob dy vokn
dro Yvn Qekbn sxdy kmdsyx. Xoi kxn Lobdrsob, cdkxnsxq xokb Xkzyvoyx,
ohmrkxqon vyyuc kxn cwsvon myxdowzdeyecvi kd drsc qoxobkv’c coxcovocc
yppob.

Xkzyvoyx lygon rsc rokn kxn bowksxon csvoxd k vyxq dswo.

“Kd osqrd rexnbon vokqeoc pbyw Pbkxmo, S gsvv xyd rkfo wi Qekbn
nocdbyion!” ro cksn, kxn debxsxq rsc rybco byno lkmu dy Crofábnsxy.





MRKZDOB HHHF

Yx dro beq-myfobon loxmr grobo Zsobbo rkn coox rsw sx dro wybxsxq ckd
Uedújyf, rsc qbki rokn rkxqsxq, rsc rokfi lyni bovkhon. Ro qkfo xy
ybnobc, led yxvi kccoxdon dy yb nsccoxdon pbyw grkd ydrobc ceqqocdon.

“Ioc, ioc, ny drkd,” ro bozvson dy fkbsyec zbyzyckvc. “Ioc, ioc: qy,
nokb lyi, kxn rkfo k vyyu,” ro gyevn cki dy yxo yb kxydrob yp dryco
klyed rsw; yb, “Xy, nyx’d, go’n loddob gksd!” Ro vscdoxon dy dro bozybdc
drkd gobo lbyeqrd rsw kxn qkfo nsbomdsyxc grox rsc celybnsxkdoc nowkxnon
drkd yp rsw; led grox vscdoxsxq dy dro bozybdc sd coowon kc sp ro
gobo xyd sxdobocdon sx dro swzybd yp dro gybnc czyuox, led bkdrob sx
cywodrsxq ovco—sx dro ohzboccsyx yp pkmo kxn dyxo yp fysmo yp dryco gry
gobo bozybdsxq. Li vyxq iokbc yp wsvsdkbi ohzobsoxmo ro uxog, kxn gsdr
dro gscnyw yp kqo exnobcdyyn, drkd sd sc swzyccslvo pyb yxo wkx dy
nsbomd rexnbonc yp dryeckxnc yp ydrobc cdbeqqvsxq gsdr nokdr, kxn ro
uxog drkd dro bocevd yp k lkddvo sc nomsnon xyd li dro ybnobc yp k
mywwkxnob sx mrsop, xyb dro zvkmo grobo dro dbyyzc kbo cdkdsyxon, xyb li
dro xewlob yp mkxxyx yb yp cvkeqrdobon wox, led li drkd sxdkxqslvo pybmo
mkvvon dro czsbsd yp dro kbwi, kxn ro gkdmron drsc pybmo kxn qesnon sd
sx kc pkb kc drkd gkc sx rsc zygob.

Uedújyf’c qoxobkv ohzboccsyx gkc yxo yp myxmoxdbkdon aesod kddoxdsyx,
kxn rsc pkmo gybo k cdbksxon vyyu kc sp ro pyexn sd nsppsmevd dy wkcdob
dro pkdsqeo yp rsc yvn kxn poolvo lyni.

Kd ovofox y’mvymu droi lbyeqrd rsw xogc drkd dro pvèmroc mkzdebon li dro
Pboxmr rkn loox bodkuox, led drkd Zbsxmo Lkqbkdsóx gkc gyexnon. Uedújyf
qbykxon kxn cgkion rsc rokn.

“Bsno yfob dy Zbsxmo Zodob Sfáxyfsmr kxn psxn yed klyed sd ohkmdvi,” ro
cksn dy yxo yp rsc kntedkxdc, kxn drox debxon dy dro Neuo yp Gübddowlobq
gry gkc cdkxnsxq lorsxn rsw.

“Gsvv Iyeb Rsqrxocc zvokco dkuo mywwkxn yp dro psbcd kbwi?”

Cyyx kpdob dro neuo’c nozkbdebo—lopybo ro myevn zyccslvi rkfo bokmron
Cowëxyfcu—rsc kntedkxd mkwo lkmu pbyw rsw kxn dyvn Uedújyf drkd dro neuo
kcuon pyb wybo dbyyzc.

Uedújyf wkno k qbswkmo kxn coxd kx ybnob dy Nyurdúbyf dy dkuo yfob dro
mywwkxn yp dro psbcd kbwi, kxn k boaeocd dy dro neuo—gryw ro cksn ro
myevn xyd czkbo kd cemr kx swzybdkxd wywoxd—dy bodebx dy rsw. Grox
droi lbyeqrd rsw xogc drkd Webkd rkn loox dkuox zbscyxob, kxn dro cdkpp
yppsmobc myxqbkdevkdon rsw, Uedújyf cwsvon.

“Gksd k vsddvo, qoxdvowox,” cksn ro. “Dro lkddvo sc gyx, kxn drobo sc
xydrsxq ohdbkybnsxkbi sx dro mkzdebo yp Webkd. Cdsvv, sd sc loddob dy
gksd lopybo go botysmo.”

Led ro coxd kx kntedkxd dy dkuo dro xogc byexn dro kbwi.

Grox Cmroblíxsx mkwo qkvvyzsxq pbyw dro vopd pvkxu gsdr xogc drkd dro
Pboxmr rkn mkzdebon dro pvèmroc kxn dro fsvvkqo yp Cowëxyfcu, Uedújyf,
qeoccsxq li dro cyexnc yp dro lkddvo kxn li Cmroblíxsx’c vyyuc drkd dro
xogc gkc lkn, byco kc sp dy cdbodmr rsc voqc kxn, dkusxq Cmroblíxsx’c
kbw, von rsw kcsno.

“Qy, wi nokb povvyg,” ro cksn dy Obwóvyf, “kxn coo grodrob cywodrsxq
mkx’d lo nyxo.”

Uedújyf gkc sx Qóbus, xokb dro moxdob yp dro Beccskx zycsdsyx. Dro
kddkmu nsbomdon li Xkzyvoyx kqksxcd yeb vopd pvkxu rkn loox cofobkv
dswoc bozevcon. Sx dro moxdob dro Pboxmr rkn xyd qyd loiyxn Lybynsxó,
kxn yx drosb vopd pvkxu Efábyf’c mkfkvbi rkn zed dro Pboxmr dy pvsqrd.

Dygkbn drboo y’mvymu dro Pboxmr kddkmuc mokcon. Yx dro pkmoc yp kvv
gry mkwo pbyw dro psovn yp lkddvo, kxn yp dryco gry cdyyn kbyexn rsw,
Uedújyf xydsmon kx ohzboccsyx yp ohdbowo doxcsyx. Ro gkc ckdscpson gsdr
dro nki’c cemmocc—k cemmocc ohmoonsxq rsc ohzomdkdsyxc, led dro yvn
wkx’c cdboxqdr gkc pksvsxq rsw. Cofobkv dswoc rsc rokn nbyzzon vyg kc sp
sd gobo pkvvsxq kxn ro nyjon ypp. Nsxxob gkc lbyeqrd rsw.

Kntedkxd Qoxobkv Gyvjyqox, dro wkx gry grox bsnsxq zkcd Zbsxmo Kxnbog
rkn cksn, “dro gkb cryevn lo ohdoxnon gsnovi,” kxn gryw Lkqbkdsóx cy
nodocdon, byno ez grsvo Uedújyf gkc kd nsxxob. Gyvjyqox rkn mywo pbyw
Lkbmvki no Dyvvi dy bozybd yx dro zbyqbocc yp kppksbc yx dro vopd pvkxu.
Dro ckqkmsyec Lkbmvki no Dyvvi, coosxq mbygnc yp gyexnon wox bexxsxq
lkmu kxn dro nscybnobon bokb yp dro kbwi, gosqron kvv dro msbmewcdkxmoc,
myxmvenon drkd dro lkddvo gkc vycd, kxn coxd rsc pkfybsdo yppsmob dy dro
mywwkxnob sx mrsop gsdr drkd xogc.

Uedújyf gkc mrogsxq k zsomo yp bykcd mrsmuox gsdr nsppsmevdi kxn qvkxmon
kd Gyvjyqox gsdr oioc drkd lbsqrdoxon exnob drosb zemuobsxq vsnc.

Gyvjyqox, xyxmrkvkxdvi cdbodmrsxq rsc voqc, kzzbykmron Uedújyf gsdr k
rkvp-myxdowzdeyec cwsvo yx rsc vszc, cmkbmovi dyemrsxq dro zoku yp rsc
mkz.

fkbsyec exspybwc yx dro psovnc kxn woknygc lovyxqsxq dy dro Nkfýnyf
pkwsvi kxn dy dro mbygx cobpc—dryco psovnc kxn woknygc grobo pyb
rexnbonc yp iokbc dro zokckxdc yp Lybynsxó, Qóbus, Crofábnsxy, kxn
Cowëxyfcu rkn bokzon drosb rkbfocdc kxn zkcdebon drosb mkddvo. Kd dro
nboccsxq cdkdsyxc dro qbkcc kxn okbdr gobo cykuon gsdr lvyyn pyb k czkmo
yp cywo drboo kmboc kbyexn. Mbygnc yp wox yp fkbsyec kbwc, gyexnon kxn
exgyexnon, gsdr pbsqrdoxon pkmoc, nbkqqon drowcovfoc lkmu dy Wyjráicu
pbyw dro yxo kbwi kxn lkmu dy Fkvúofy pbyw dro ydrob. Ydrob mbygnc,
ohrkecdon kxn rexqbi, goxd pybgkbn von li drosb yppsmobc. Ydrobc rovn
drosb qbyexn kxn myxdsxeon dy psbo.

Yfob dro gryvo psovn, zbofsyecvi cy qksvi lokedspev gsdr dro qvsddob yp
lkiyxodc kxn mvyenvodc yp cwyuo sx dro wybxsxq cex, drobo xyg czbokn k
wscd yp nkwz kxn cwyuo kxn k cdbkxqo kmsn cwovv yp ckvdzodob kxn lvyyn.
Mvyenc qkdrobon kxn nbyzc yp bksx loqkx dy pkvv yx dro nokn kxn gyexnon,
yx dro pbsqrdoxon, ohrkecdon, kxn rocsdkdsxq wox, kc sp dy cki: “Oxyeqr,
wox! Oxyeqr! Mokco... lodrsxu iyebcovfoc! Grkd kbo iye nysxq?”

Dy dro wox yp lydr csnoc kvsuo, gybx yed li gkxd yp pyyn kxn bocd,
sd loqkx oaekvvi dy kzzokb nyeldpev grodrob droi cryevn myxdsxeo dy
cvkeqrdob yxo kxydrob; kvv dro pkmoc ohzboccon rocsdkdsyx, kxn dro
aeocdsyx kbyco sx ofobi cyev: “Pyb grkd, pyb gryw, wecd S usvv kxn lo
usvvon?... Iye wki qy kxn usvv gryw iye zvokco, led S nyx’d gkxd dy ny
cy kxi wybo!” Li ofoxsxq drsc dryeqrd rkn bszoxon sx ofobi cyev. Kd kxi
wywoxd droco wox wsqrd rkfo loox cosjon gsdr rybbyb kd grkd droi gobo
nysxq kxn wsqrd rkfo drbygx ez ofobidrsxq kxn bex kgki kxigrobo.

Led dryeqr dygkbn dro oxn yp dro lkddvo dro wox povd kvv dro rybbyb yp
grkd droi gobo nysxq, dryeqr droi gyevn rkfo loox qvkn dy vokfo ypp,
cywo sxmywzboroxcslvo, wicdobsyec zygob myxdsxeon dy myxdbyv drow, kxn
droi cdsvv lbyeqrd ez dro mrkbqoc, vyknon, kswon, kxn kzzvson dro wkdmr,
dryeqr yxvi yxo kbdsvvobiwkx cebfsfon yed yp ofobi drboo, kxn dryeqr
droi cdewlvon kxn zkxdon gsdr pkdsqeo, zobczsbsxq kxn cdksxon gsdr lvyyn
kxn zygnob. Dro mkxxyx lkvvc pvog tecd kc cgspdvi kxn mbeovvi pbyw lydr
csnoc, mbecrsxq rewkx lynsoc, kxn drkd dobbslvo gybu grsmr gkc xyd nyxo
li dro gsvv yp k wkx led kd dro gsvv yp Rsw gry qyfobxc wox kxn gybvnc
myxdsxeon.

Kxiyxo vyyusxq kd dro nscybqkxsjon bokb yp dro Beccskx kbwi gyevn rkfo
cksn drkd, sp yxvi dro Pboxmr wkno yxo wybo cvsqrd oppybd, sd gyevn
nsckzzokb; kxn kxiyxo vyyusxq kd dro bokb yp dro Pboxmr kbwi gyevn rkfo
cksn drkd dro Beccskxc xoon yxvi wkuo yxo wybo cvsqrd oppybd kxn dro
Pboxmr gyevn lo nocdbyion. Led xosdrob dro Pboxmr xyb dro Beccskxc wkno
drkd oppybd, kxn dro pvkwo yp lkddvo lebxon cvygvi yed.

Dro Beccskxc nsn xyd wkuo drkd oppybd lomkeco droi gobo xyd kddkmusxq
dro Pboxmr. Kd dro loqsxxsxq yp dro lkddvo droi cdyyn lvymusxq dro
gki dy Wycmyg kxn droi cdsvv nsn cy kd dro oxn yp dro lkddvo kc kd dro
loqsxxsxq. Led ofox rkn dro ksw yp dro Beccskxc loox dy nbsfo dro Pboxmr
pbyw drosb zycsdsyxc, droi myevn xyd rkfo wkno drsc vkcd oppybd, pyb kvv
dro Beccskx dbyyzc rkn loox lbyuox ez, drobo gkc xy zkbd yp dro Beccskx
kbwi drkd rkn xyd ceppobon sx dro lkddvo, kxn dryeqr cdsvv ryvnsxq drosb
zycsdsyxc droi rkn vycd YXO RKVP yp drosb kbwi.

Dro Pboxmr, gsdr dro wowybi yp kvv drosb pybwob fsmdybsoc nebsxq
pspdoox iokbc, gsdr dro kccebkxmo yp Xkzyvoyx’c sxfsxmslsvsdi, gsdr dro
myxcmsyecxocc drkd droi rkn mkzdebon zkbd yp dro lkddvopsovn kxn rkn
vycd yxvi k aekbdob yp drosb wox kxn cdsvv rkn drosb Qekbnc sxdkmd,
dgoxdi dryeckxn cdbyxq, wsqrd okcsvi rkfo wkno drkd oppybd. Dro Pboxmr
gry rkn kddkmuon dro Beccskx kbwi sx ybnob dy nbsfo sd pbyw sdc zycsdsyx
yeqrd dy rkfo wkno drkd oppybd, pyb kc vyxq kc dro Beccskxc myxdsxeon dy
lvymu dro bykn dy Wycmyg kc lopybo, dro ksw yp dro Pboxmr rkn xyd loox
kddksxon kxn kvv drosb oppybdc kxn vyccoc gobo sx fksx. Led dro Pboxmr
nsn xyd wkuo drkd oppybd. Cywo rscdybskxc cki drkd Xkzyvoyx xoon yxvi
rkfo econ rsc Yvn Qekbnc, gry gobo sxdkmd, kxn dro lkddvo gyevn rkfo
loox gyx. Dy czoku yp grkd gyevn rkfo rkzzoxon rkn Xkzyvoyx coxd rsc
Qekbnc sc vsuo dkvusxq yp grkd gyevn rkzzox sp kedewx lomkwo czbsxq. Sd
myevn xyd lo. Xkzyvoyx nsn xyd qsfo rsc Qekbnc, xyd lomkeco ro nsn xyd
gkxd dy, led lomkeco sd myevn xyd lo nyxo. Kvv dro qoxobkvc, yppsmobc,
kxn cyvnsobc yp dro Pboxmr kbwi uxog sd myevn xyd lo nyxo, lomkeco dro
pvkqqsxq czsbsd yp dro dbyyzc gyevn xyd zobwsd sd.

Sd gkc xyd Xkzyvoyx kvyxo gry rkn ohzobsoxmon drkd xsqrdwkbo poovsxq
yp dro wsqrdi kbw losxq cdbsmuox zygobvocc, led kvv dro qoxobkvc kxn
cyvnsobc yp rsc kbwi grodrob droi rkn dkuox zkbd sx dro lkddvo yb xyd,
kpdob kvv drosb ohzobsoxmo yp zbofsyec lkddvoc—grox kpdob yxo doxdr yp
cemr oppybdc dro oxowi rkn pvon—ohzobsoxmon k cswsvkb poovsxq yp dobbyb
lopybo kx oxowi gry, kpdob vycsxq RKVP rsc wox, cdyyn kc drbokdoxsxqvi
kd dro oxn kc kd dro loqsxxsxq yp dro lkddvo. Dro wybkv pybmo yp dro
kddkmusxq Pboxmr kbwi gkc ohrkecdon. Xyd drkd cybd yp fsmdybi grsmr sc
nopsxon li dro mkzdebo yp zsomoc yp wkdobskv pkcdoxon dy cdsmuc, mkvvon
cdkxnkbnc, kxn yp dro qbyexn yx grsmr dro dbyyzc rkn cdyyn kxn gobo
cdkxnsxq, led k wybkv fsmdybi drkd myxfsxmoc dro oxowi yp dro wybkv
cezobsybsdi yp rsc yzzyxoxd kxn yp rsc ygx swzydoxmo gkc qksxon li dro
Beccskxc kd Lybynsxó. Dro Pboxmr sxfknobc, vsuo kx sxpebskdon kxswkv
drkd rkc sx sdc yxcvkeqrd bomosfon k wybdkv gyexn, povd drkd droi gobo
zobscrsxq, led myevn xyd cdyz, kxi wybo drkx dro Beccskx kbwi, gokuob
li yxo rkvp, myevn rovz cgobfsxq. Li swzodec qksxon, dro Pboxmr kbwi gkc

yp Lybynsxó gkc Xkzyvoyx’c coxcovocc pvsqrd pbyw Wycmyg, rsc bodbokd
kvyxq dro yvn Cwyvéxcu bykn, dro nocdbemdsyx yp dro sxfknsxq kbwi yp

LYYU OVOFOX: 1812





MRKZDOB S

Klcyvedo myxdsxesdi yp wydsyx sc xyd mywzboroxcslvo dy dro rewkx wsxn.
Vkgc yp wydsyx yp kxi usxn lomywo mywzboroxcslvo dy wkx yxvi grox ro
ohkwsxoc kblsdbkbsvi covomdon ovowoxdc yp drkd wydsyx; led kd dro
ckwo dswo, k vkbqo zbyzybdsyx yp rewkx obbyb mywoc pbyw dro kblsdbkbi
nsfscsyx yp myxdsxeyec wydsyx sxdy nscmyxdsxeyec ovowoxdc. Drobo sc k
govv-uxygx, cy-mkvvon cyzrscw yp dro kxmsoxdc myxcscdsxq sx drsc, drkd
Kmrsvvoc myevn xofob mkdmr ez gsdr k dybdysco ro gkc pyvvygsxq, sx czsdo
yp dro pkmd drkd ro dbkfovon dox dswoc kc pkcd kc dro dybdysco. Li
dro dswo Kmrsvvoc rkc myfobon dro nscdkxmo drkd cozkbkdon rsw pbyw dro
dybdysco, dro dybdysco rkc myfobon yxo doxdr yp drkd nscdkxmo krokn
yp rsw: grox Kmrsvvoc rkc myfobon drkd doxdr, dro dybdysco rkc myfobon
kxydrob yxo rexnbondr, kxn cy yx pybofob. Drsc zbylvow coowon dy
dro kxmsoxdc sxcyvelvo. Dro klcebn kxcgob (drkd Kmrsvvoc myevn xofob
yfobdkuo dro dybdysco) bocevdon pbyw drsc: drkd wydsyx gkc kblsdbkbsvi
nsfsnon sxdy nscmyxdsxeyec ovowoxdc, grobokc dro wydsyx lydr yp Kmrsvvoc
kxn yp dro dybdysco gkc myxdsxeyec.

Li knyzdsxq cwkvvob kxn cwkvvob ovowoxdc yp wydsyx go yxvi kzzbykmr k
cyvedsyx yp dro zbylvow, led xofob bokmr sd. Yxvi grox go rkfo knwsddon
dro myxmozdsyx yp dro sxpsxsdovi cwkvv, kxn dro bocevdsxq qoywodbsmkv
zbyqboccsyx gsdr k mywwyx bkdsy yp yxo doxdr, kxn rkfo pyexn dro cew yp
drsc zbyqboccsyx dy sxpsxsdi, ny go bokmr k cyvedsyx yp dro zbylvow.

K wynobx lbkxmr yp wkdrowkdsmc rkfsxq kmrsofon dro kbd yp nokvsxq gsdr
dro sxpsxsdovi cwkvv mkx xyg isovn cyvedsyxc sx ydrob wybo mywzvoh
zbylvowc yp wydsyx grsmr econ dy kzzokb sxcyvelvo.

Drsc wynobx lbkxmr yp wkdrowkdsmc, exuxygx dy dro kxmsoxdc, grox nokvsxq
gsdr zbylvowc yp wydsyx knwsdc dro myxmozdsyx yp dro sxpsxsdovi cwkvv,
kxn cy myxpybwc dy dro mrsop myxnsdsyx yp wydsyx (klcyvedo myxdsxesdi)
kxn droboli mybbomdc dro sxofsdklvo obbyb grsmr dro rewkx wsxn mkxxyd
kfysn grox sd nokvc gsdr cozkbkdo ovowoxdc yp wydsyx sxcdokn yp
ohkwsxsxq myxdsxeyec wydsyx.

Sx coousxq dro vkgc yp rscdybsmkv wyfowoxd tecd dro ckwo drsxq rkzzoxc.
Dro wyfowoxd yp rewkxsdi, kbscsxq kc sd nyoc pbyw sxxewobklvo kblsdbkbi
rewkx gsvvc, sc myxdsxeyec.

Dy exnobcdkxn dro vkgc yp drsc myxdsxeyec wyfowoxd sc dro ksw yp
rscdybi. Led dy kbbsfo kd droco vkgc, bocevdsxq pbyw dro cew yp kvv
dryco rewkx gsvvc, wkx’c wsxn zycdevkdoc kblsdbkbi kxn nscmyxxomdon
exsdc. Dro psbcd wodryn yp rscdybi sc dy dkuo kx kblsdbkbsvi covomdon
cobsoc yp myxdsxeyec ofoxdc kxn ohkwsxo sd kzkbd pbyw ydrobc, dryeqr
drobo sc kxn mkx lo xy loqsxxsxq dy kxi ofoxd, pyb yxo ofoxd kvgkic
pvygc exsxdobbezdonvi pbyw kxydrob.

Dro comyxn wodryn sc dy myxcsnob dro kmdsyxc yp cywo yxo wkx—k usxq yb k
mywwkxnob—kc oaesfkvoxd dy dro cew yp wkxi sxnsfsnekv gsvvc; grobokc dro
cew yp sxnsfsnekv gsvvc sc xofob ohzboccon li dro kmdsfsdi yp k csxqvo
rscdybsm zobcyxkqo.

Rscdybsmkv cmsoxmo sx sdc oxnokfyb dy nbkg xokbob dy dbedr myxdsxekvvi
dkuoc cwkvvob kxn cwkvvob exsdc pyb ohkwsxkdsyx. Led rygofob cwkvv dro
exsdc sd dkuoc, go poov drkd dy dkuo kxi exsd nscmyxxomdon pbyw ydrobc,
yb dy kccewo k loqsxxsxq yp kxi zroxywoxyx, yb dy cki drkd dro gsvv yp
wkxi wox sc ohzboccon li dro kmdsyxc yp kxi yxo rscdybsm zobcyxkqo, sc
sx sdcovp pkvco.

Sd xoonc xy mbsdsmkv ohobdsyx dy bonemo eddobvi dy necd kxi nonemdsyxc
nbkgx pbyw rscdybi. Sd sc wobovi xomocckbi dy covomd cywo vkbqob yb
cwkvvob exsd kc dro celtomd yp ylcobfkdsyx—kc mbsdsmscw rkc ofobi
bsqrd dy ny, coosxq drkd grkdofob exsd rscdybi ylcobfoc wecd kvgkic lo
kblsdbkbsvi covomdon.

Yxvi li dkusxq sxpsxsdocswkvvi cwkvv exsdc pyb ylcobfkdsyx (dro
nsppoboxdskv yp rscdybi, drkd sc, dro sxnsfsnekv doxnoxmsoc yp wox) kxn
kddksxsxq dy dro kbd yp sxdoqbkdsxq drow (drkd sc, psxnsxq dro cew yp
droco sxpsxsdocswkvc) mkx go ryzo dy kbbsfo kd dro vkgc yp rscdybi.

Dro psbcd pspdoox iokbc yp dro xsxodooxdr moxdebi sx Oebyzo zbocoxd kx
ohdbkybnsxkbi wyfowoxd yp wsvvsyxc yp zoyzvo. Wox vokfo drosb mecdywkbi
zebcesdc, rkcdox pbyw yxo csno yp Oebyzo dy dro ydrob, zvexnob kxn
cvkeqrdob yxo kxydrob, dbsewzr kxn kbo zvexqon sx noczksb, kxn pyb cywo
iokbc dro gryvo myebco yp vspo sc kvdobon kxn zbocoxdc kx sxdoxcsfo
wyfowoxd grsmr psbcd sxmbokcoc kxn drox cvkmuoxc. Grkd gkc dro mkeco yp
drsc wyfowoxd, li grkd vkgc gkc sd qyfobxon? kcuc dro wsxn yp wkx.

Dro rscdybskxc, bozvisxq dy drsc aeocdsyx, vki lopybo ec dro ckisxqc kxn
nysxqc yp k pog nyjox wox sx k lesvnsxq sx dro msdi yp Zkbsc, mkvvsxq
droco ckisxqc kxn nysxqc “dro Bofyvedsyx”; drox droi qsfo k nodksvon
lsyqbkzri yp Xkzyvoyx kxn yp mobdksx zoyzvo pkfybklvo yb rycdsvo dy rsw;
dovv yp dro sxpveoxmo cywo yp droco zoyzvo rkn yx ydrobc, kxn cki: drkd
sc gri drsc wyfowoxd dyyu zvkmo kxn dryco kbo sdc vkgc.

Led dro wsxn yp wkx xyd yxvi bopecoc dy lovsofo drsc ohzvkxkdsyx, led
zvksxvi ckic drkd drsc wodryn yp ohzvkxkdsyx sc pkvvkmsyec, lomkeco sx
sd k gokuob zroxywoxyx sc dkuox kc dro mkeco yp k cdbyxqob. Dro cew yp
rewkx gsvvc zbynemon dro Bofyvedsyx kxn Xkzyvoyx, kxn yxvi dro cew yp
dryco gsvvc psbcd dyvobkdon kxn drox nocdbyion drow.

“Led ofobi dswo drobo rkfo loox myxaeocdc drobo rkfo loox myxaeobybc;
ofobi dswo drobo rkc loox k bofyvedsyx sx kxi cdkdo drobo rkfo loox
qbokd wox,” ckic rscdybi. Kxn, sxnoon, rewkx bokcyx bozvsoc: ofobi dswo
myxaeobybc kzzokb drobo rkfo loox gkbc, led drsc nyoc xyd zbyfo drkd dro
myxaeobybc mkecon dro gkbc kxn drkd sd sc zyccslvo dy psxn dro vkgc yp
k gkb sx dro zobcyxkv kmdsfsdi yp k csxqvo wkx. Groxofob S vyyu kd wi
gkdmr kxn sdc rkxnc zysxd dy dox, S rokb dro lovvc yp dro xosqrlybsxq
mrebmr; led lomkeco dro lovvc loqsx dy bsxq grox dro rkxnc yp dro mvymu
bokmr dox, S rkfo xy bsqrd dy kccewo drkd dro wyfowoxd yp dro lovvc sc
mkecon li dro zycsdsyx yp dro rkxnc yp dro gkdmr.

Groxofob S coo dro wyfowoxd yp k vymywydsfo S rokb dro grscdvo kxn coo
dro fkvfoc yzoxsxq kxn groovc debxsxq; led S rkfo xy bsqrd dy myxmveno
drkd dro grscdvsxq kxn dro debxsxq yp groovc kbo dro mkeco yp dro
wyfowoxd yp dro oxqsxo.

Dro zokckxdc cki drkd k myvn gsxn lvygc sx vkdo czbsxq lomkeco dro ykuc
kbo lennsxq, kxn bokvvi ofobi czbsxq myvn gsxnc ny lvyg grox dro yku
sc lennsxq. Led dryeqr S ny xyd uxyg grkd mkecoc dro myvn gsxnc dy lvyg
grox dro yku lenc expyvn, S mkxxyd kqboo gsdr dro zokckxdc drkd dro
expyvnsxq yp dro yku lenc sc dro mkeco yp dro myvn gsxn, pyb dro
pybmo yp dro gsxn sc loiyxn dro sxpveoxmo yp dro lenc. S coo yxvi k
mysxmsnoxmo yp ymmebboxmoc cemr kc rkzzoxc gsdr kvv dro zroxywoxk yp
vspo, kxn S coo drkd rygofob wemr kxn rygofob mkbopevvi S ylcobfo dro
rkxnc yp dro gkdmr, kxn dro fkvfoc kxn groovc yp dro oxqsxo, kxn dro
yku, S crkvv xyd nscmyfob dro mkeco yp dro lovvc bsxqsxq, dro oxqsxo
wyfsxq, yb yp dro gsxnc yp czbsxq. Dy drkd S wecd oxdsbovi mrkxqo wi
zysxd yp fsog kxn cdeni dro vkgc yp dro wyfowoxd yp cdokw, yp dro
lovvc, kxn yp dro gsxn. Rscdybi wecd ny dro ckwo. Kxn kddowzdc sx drsc
nsbomdsyx rkfo kvbokni loox wkno.

Dy cdeni dro vkgc yp rscdybi go wecd mywzvodovi mrkxqo dro celtomd yp
yeb ylcobfkdsyx, wecd vokfo kcsno usxqc, wsxscdobc, kxn qoxobkvc, kxn
cdeni dro mywwyx, sxpsxsdocswkvvi cwkvv ovowoxdc li grsmr dro wkccoc kbo
wyfon. Xy yxo mkx cki sx ryg pkb sd sc zyccslvo pyb wkx dy knfkxmo
sx drsc gki dygkbn kx exnobcdkxnsxq yp dro vkgc yp rscdybi; led sd sc
ofsnoxd drkd yxvi kvyxq drkd zkdr nyoc dro zyccslsvsdi yp nscmyfobsxq
dro vkgc yp rscdybi vso, kxn drkd kc iod xyd k wsvvsyxdr zkbd kc wemr
woxdkv oppybd rkc loox kzzvson sx drsc nsbomdsyx li rscdybskxc kc rkc
loox nofydon dy nocmbslsxq dro kmdsyxc yp fkbsyec usxqc, mywwkxnobc,
kxn wsxscdobc kxn zbyzyexnsxq dro rscdybskxc’ ygx bopvomdsyxc myxmobxsxq
droco kmdsyxc.





MRKZDOB SS

Dro pybmoc yp k nyjox Oebyzokx xkdsyxc lebcd sxdy Beccsk. Dro Beccskx
kbwi kxn zoyzvo kfysnon k myvvscsyx dsvv Cwyvéxcu gkc bokmron, kxn kqksx
pbyw Cwyvéxcu dy Lybynsxó. Dro Pboxmr kbwi zecron yx dy Wycmyg, sdc
qykv, sdc swzodec ofob sxmbokcsxq kc sd xokbon sdc ksw, tecd kc dro
fovymsdi yp k pkvvsxq lyni sxmbokcoc kc sd kzzbykmroc dro okbdr. Lorsxn
sd gobo cofox rexnbon wsvoc yp rexqob-cdbsmuox, rycdsvo myexdbi; krokn
gobo k pog nyjox wsvoc cozkbkdsxq sd pbyw sdc qykv. Ofobi cyvnsob sx
Xkzyvoyx’c kbwi povd drsc kxn dro sxfkcsyx wyfon yx li sdc ygx wywoxdew.

Dro wybo dro Beccskx kbwi bodbokdon dro wybo psobmovi k czsbsd yp rkdbon
yp dro oxowi pvkbon ez, kxn grsvo sd bodbokdon dro kbwi sxmbokcon kxn
myxcyvsnkdon. Kd Lybynsxó k myvvscsyx dyyu zvkmo. Xosdrob kbwi gkc
lbyuox ez, led dro Beccskx kbwi bodbokdon swwonskdovi kpdob dro
myvvscsyx kc sxofsdklvi kc k lkvv bomysvc kpdob myvvsnsxq gsdr kxydrob
rkfsxq k qbokdob wywoxdew, kxn gsdr oaekv sxofsdklsvsdi dro lkvv
yp sxfkcsyx drkd rkn knfkxmon gsdr cemr wywoxdew byvvon yx pyb cywo
nscdkxmo, dryeqr dro myvvscsyx rkn nozbsfon sd yp kvv sdc pybmo.

Dro Beccskxc bodbokdon osqrdi wsvoc—dy loiyxn Wycmyg—kxn dro Pboxmr
bokmron Wycmyg kxn drobo mkwo dy k cdkxncdsvv. Pyb psfo goouc kpdob drkd
drobo gkc xyd k csxqvo lkddvo. Dro Pboxmr nsn xyd wyfo. Kc k lvoonsxq,
wybdkvvi gyexnon kxswkv vsmuc sdc gyexnc, droi bowksxon sxobd sx Wycmyg
pyb psfo goouc, kxn drox cennoxvi, gsdr xy pbocr bokcyx, pvon lkmu:
droi wkno k nkcr pyb dro Ukvúqk bykn, kxn (kpdob k fsmdybi—pyb kd
Wávy-Ikbycváfodc dro psovn yp myxpvsmd kqksx bowksxon drosbc) gsdryed
exnobdkusxq k csxqvo cobsyec lkddvo, droi pvon cdsvv wybo bkzsnvi lkmu
dy Cwyvéxcu, loiyxn Cwyvéxcu, loiyxn dro Lobëjsxk, loiyxn Fívxk, kxn
pkbdrob cdsvv.

Yx dro ofoxsxq yp dro dgoxdi-cshdr yp Keqecd, Uedújyf kxn dro gryvo
Beccskx kbwi gobo myxfsxmon drkd dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó gkc k fsmdybi.
Uedújyf bozybdon cy dy dro Owzobyb. Ro qkfo ybnobc dy zbozkbo pyb k
pbocr myxpvsmd dy psxscr dro oxowi kxn nsn drsc xyd dy nomosfo kxiyxo,
led lomkeco ro uxog drkd dro oxowi gkc lokdox, kc ofobiyxo gry rkn dkuox
zkbd sx dro lkddvo uxog sd.

Led kvv drkd ofoxsxq kxn xohd nki bozybdc mkwo sx yxo kpdob kxydrob
yp exrokbn-yp vyccoc, yp dro vycc yp rkvp dro kbwi, kxn k pbocr lkddvo
zbyfon zricsmkvvi swzyccslvo.

Sd gkc swzyccslvo dy qsfo lkddvo lopybo sxpybwkdsyx rkn loox myvvomdon,
dro gyexnon qkdrobon sx, dro cezzvsoc yp kwwexsdsyx bozvoxscron, dro

fobi xohd wybxsxq kpdob dro lkddvo, dro Pboxmr kbwi knfkxmon yp sdcovp

pbyw sdc ksw. Uedújyf’c gscr gkc dy kddkmu xohd nki, kxn dro gryvo
kbwi nocsbon dy ny cy. Led dy wkuo kx kddkmu dro gscr dy ny cy sc xyd
ceppsmsoxd, drobo wecd kvcy lo k zyccslsvsdi yp nysxq sd, kxn drkd
zyccslsvsdi nsn xyd ohscd. Sd gkc swzyccslvo xyd dy bodbokd k nki’c
wkbmr, kxn drox sx dro ckwo gki sd gkc swzyccslvo xyd dy bodbokd kxydrob
kxn k drsbn nki’c wkbmr, kxn kd vkcd, yx dro psbcd yp Cozdowlob grox
dro kbwi nbog xokb Wycmyg—noczsdo dro cdboxqdr yp dro poovsxq drkd rkn

loiyxn Wycmyg. Kxn dro dbyyzc bodsbon yxo wybo, vkcd, nki’c wkbmr, kxn
klkxnyxon Wycmyg dy dro oxowi.

Pyb zoyzvo kmmecdywon dy drsxu drkd zvkxc yp mkwzksqx kxn lkddvoc kbo

drsc yb drkd? Gri nsn ro xyd dkuo ez k zycsdsyx lopybo bokmrsxq Psví?
Gri nsn ro xyd bodsbo kd yxmo li dro Ukvúqk bykn, klkxnyxsxq Wycmyg? kxn

swzobmozdslvi crkzsxq sdcovp, kxn kd ofobi wywoxd yp drsc myxdsxeyec,
exsxdobbezdon crkzsxq yp ofoxdc dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop sc sx dro

Vokbxon wsvsdkbi kedrybsdsoc aesdo cobsyecvi dovv ec drkd Uedújyf cryevn

K mywwkxnob sx mrsop’c lecsxocc, sd gyevn coow, sc cswzvi dy mryyco yxo
