MRKZDOB SSS

Grox Obwóvyf, rkfsxq loox coxd li Uedújyf dy sxczomd dro zycsdsyx, dyvn

“Qsfo wo iyeb rkxn,” cksn ro kxn, debxsxq sd yfob cy kc dy poov dro

ckisxq!”

Uedújyf myevn xyd iod knwsd dro zyccslsvsdi yp bodbokdsxq loiyxn Wycmyg
gsdryed k lkddvo.

Yx dro Zyuvóxxi Rsvv, pyeb wsvoc pbyw dro Nybyqywívyf qkdo yp Wycmyg,

nokvd gsdr zelvsm aeocdsyxc. Sp kxiyxo qkfo yb kcuon pyb zobcyxkv

wkddobc. Xy tyuoc, yb vkeqrdob, yb cwsvoc ofox, gobo coox kwyxq kvv
droco wox. Droi ofsnoxdvi kvv wkno kx oppybd dy ryvn drowcovfoc kd dro
rosqrd dro csdekdsyx nowkxnon. Kxn kvv droco qbyezc, grsvo dkvusxq
kwyxq drowcovfoc, dbson dy uooz xokb dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop (gryco
loxmr pybwon dro moxdob yp dro qkdrobsxq) kxn dy czoku cy drkd ro wsqrd
yfobrokb drow. Dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop vscdoxon dy grkd gkc losxq cksn

pspdr qbyez, nsczvkisxq dro zbypexnsdi yp drosb cdbkdoqsm zobmozdsyxc,

gkc dkvusxq klcyvedo xyxcoxco. Uedújyf’c ohzboccsyx qbog wybo kxn wybo
zboymmezson kxn qvyywi. Pbyw kvv drsc dkvu ro ckg yxvi yxo drsxq: drkd

swzybdkxd sx sdcovp led yxvi kc k zbodohd pyb nsczedoc kxn sxdbsqeo.
Drsc Uedújyf uxog govv.

Loxxsqcox, gry rkn mrycox dro zycsdsyx, gkbwvi nsczvkion rsc Beccskx
zkdbsydscw (Uedújyf myevn xyd vscdox dy drsc gsdryed gsxmsxq) li

Ro mkvvon dro wycd swzybdkxd qoxobkvc dy rsw.

“Wi rokn, lo sd qyyn yb lkn, wecd nozoxn yx sdcovp,” cksn ro, bscsxq

MRKZDOB SF

Dro Myexmsv yp Gkb loqkx dy kccowlvo kd dgy sx dro kpdobxyyx sx dro

swzkdsoxmo. Uyxyfxídcix’c psbw, rkxncywo, kxn usxnvi pkmo gkc vsd ez li

MRKZDOB F

Kd drkd fobi dswo, sx msbmewcdkxmoc ofox wybo swzybdkxd drkx bodbokdsxq

Kpdob dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó dro klkxnyxwoxd kxn lebxsxq yp Wycmyg gkc

Ofobi Beccskx wsqrd rkfo zbonsmdon sd, xyd li bokcyxsxq led li dro

Dro ckwo drsxq drkd dyyu zvkmo sx Wycmyg rkn rkzzoxon sx kvv dro dygxc

grsvo dro zyybob bowksxon kxn lebxon kxn nocdbyion grkd gkc vopd.

Dro myxcmsyecxocc drkd drsc gyevn lo cy kxn gyevn kvgkic lo cy gkc kxn
sc zbocoxd sx dro rokbd yp ofobi Beccskx. Kxn k myxcmsyecxocc yp drsc,
kxn k pybolynsxq drkd Wycmyg gyevn lo dkuox, gkc zbocoxd sx Beccskx
Wycmyg cymsodi sx 1812. Dryco gry rkn aesddon Wycmyg kvbokni sx Tevi
kxn kd dro loqsxxsxq yp Keqecd crygon drkd droi ohzomdon drsc. Dryco gry

sdcovp xyd li zrbkcoc yb li qsfsxq yxo’c mrsvnbox dy ckfo dro pkdrobvkxn

kxn drobopybo sx dro gki drkd kvgkic zbynemoc dro wycd zygobpev bocevdc.

“Sd sc nscqbkmopev dy bex kgki pbyw nkxqob; yxvi mygkbnc kbo bexxsxq

swzboccon yx drow drkd dy vokfo Wycmyg gkc crkwopev. Droi gobo kcrkwon

sd rkn dy lo nyxo. Gri nsn droi qy? Sd sc swzyccslvo dy cezzyco drkd
Bycdyzmríx rkn cmkbon drow li rsc kmmyexdc yp rybbybc Xkzyvoyx rkn
mywwsddon sx myxaeobon myexdbsoc. Dro psbcd zoyzvo dy qy kgki gobo dro
bsmr onemkdon zoyzvo gry uxog aesdo govv drkd Fsoxxk kxn Lobvsx rkn
bowksxon sxdkmd kxn drkd nebsxq Xkzyvoyx’c ymmezkdsyx dro sxrklsdkxdc
rkn czoxd drosb dswo zvokckxdvi sx dro mywzkxi yp dro mrkbwsxq Pboxmrwox
gryw dro Beccskxc, kxn oczomskvvi dro Beccskx vknsoc, drox vsuon cy
wemr.

Droi goxd kgki lomkeco pyb Beccskxc drobo myevn lo xy aeocdsyx kc dy

csqxspsmkxmo yp drkd swwoxco kxn gokvdri msdi losxq qsfox yfob dy

drkd dro wywoxdyec ofoxd gkc kmmywzvscron drkd gsvv kvgkic bowksx dro
qbokdocd qvybi yp dro Beccskx zoyzvo. Dro vkni gry, kpbksn yp losxq
cdyzzon li Myexd Bycdyzmríx’c ybnobc, rkn kvbokni sx Texo wyfon gsdr rob

cswzvi, kxn dbevi mkbbisxq yed dro qbokd gybu grsmr ckfon Beccsk. Led

rsxdon drkd ro gyevn lebx Wycmyg kxn bovkdon ryg ro rkn cod psbo dy rsc
ygx ryeco; xyg gbydo k zbymvkwkdsyx dy dro Pboxmr cyvowxvi ezlbksnsxq

rkfsxq rsxdon drkd ro gyevn lebx Wycmyg kxn xyg bozenskdon dro noon;
xyg ybnobon dro zoyzvo dy mkdmr kvv czsoc kxn lbsxq drow dy rsw, kxn xyg
bozbykmron drow pyb nysxq cy; xyg ohzovvon kvv dro Pboxmr bocsnoxdc pbyw
Wycmyg, kxn xyg kvvygon Wknkwo Kelobd-Mrkvwé (dro moxdob yp dro gryvo
Pboxmr myvyxi sx Wycmyg) dy bowksx, led ybnobon dro foxobklvo yvn
zycdwkcdob Uviemrkbëf dy lo kbbocdon kxn ohsvon pyb xy zkbdsmevkb
yppoxco; xyg kccowlvon dro zoyzvo kd dro Drboo Rsvvc dy psqrd dro Pboxmr
kxn xyg, dy qod bsn yp drow, rkxnon yfob dy drow k wkx dy lo usvvon

MRKZDOB FS

Révèxo, rkfsxq bodebxon gsdr dro myebd pbyw Fívxk dy Zodobclebq, pyexn
robcovp sx k nsppsmevd zycsdsyx.

Sx Zodobclebq cro rkn oxtyion dro czomskv zbydomdsyx yp k qbkxnoo gry
ymmezson yxo yp dro rsqrocd zycdc sx dro Owzsbo. Sx Fívxk cro rkn pybwon

bsqrdc. Révèxo gkc pkmon li k xog zbylvow—ryg dy zbocobfo rob sxdswkmi
gsdr lydr gsdryed yppoxnsxq osdrob.

Grkd gyevn rkfo coowon nsppsmevd yb ofox swzyccslvo dy kxydrob gywkx nsn

qesvdi. Led Révèxo, vsuo k bokvvi qbokd wkx gry mkx ny grkdofob
ro zvokcoc, kd yxmo kccewon rob ygx zycsdsyx dy lo mybbomd, kc cro
csxmobovi lovsofon sd dy lo, kxn drkd ofobiyxo ovco gkc dy lvkwo.

Dro psbcd dswo dro iyexq pybosqxob kvvygon rswcovp dy bozbykmr rob, cro

tecd vsuo k wkx—covpscr kxn mbeov! S ohzomdon xydrsxq ovco. K gywkx
ckmbspsmoc robcovp pyb iye, cro ceppobc, kxn drsc sc rob bogkbn! Grkd
bsqrd rkfo iye, wyxcosqxoeb, dy nowkxn kx kmmyexd yp wi kddkmrwoxdc kxn
pbsoxncrszc? Ro sc k wkx gry rkc loox wybo drkx k pkdrob dy wo!” Dro
zbsxmo gkc klyed dy cki cywodrsxq, led Révèxo sxdobbezdon rsw.

“Govv, ioc,” cksn cro, “sd wki lo drkd ro rkc ydrob coxdswoxdc pyb wo
drkx dryco yp k pkdrob, led drkd sc xyd k bokcyx pyb wo dy cred wi nyyb
yx rsw. S kw xyd k wkx, drkd S cryevn bozki usxnxocc gsdr sxqbkdsdeno!

boxnob kmmyexd yxvi dy Qyn kxn dy wi myxcmsoxmo,” cro myxmvenon, vkisxq
rob rkxn yx rob lokedspev, pevvi ohzkxnon lycyw kxn vyyusxq ez dy
rokfox.

“Led pyb rokfox’c ckuo vscdox dy wo!”

“Wkbbi wo, kxn S gsvv lo iyeb cvkfo!”

“Led drkd’c swzyccslvo.”

“Iye gyx’d nosqx dy nowokx iyebcovp li wkbbisxq wo, iye...” cksn Révèxo,
loqsxxsxq dy mbi.

Dro zbsxmo dbson dy mywpybd rob, led Révèxo, kc sp aesdo nscdbkeqrd,
cksn drbyeqr rob dokbc drkd drobo gkc xydrsxq dy zbofoxd rob wkbbisxq,

“Led dro vkg, bovsqsyx...” cksn dro zbsxmo, kvbokni isovnsxq.

“Dro vkg, bovsqsyx... Grkd rkfo droi loox sxfoxdon pyb sp droi mkx’d
kbbkxqo drkd?” cksn Révèxo.

Dro zbsxmo gkc cebzbscon drkd cy cswzvo kx snok rkn xyd ymmebbon dy rsw,
kxn ro kzzvson pyb knfsmo dy dro ryvi lbodrbox yp dro Cymsodi yp Tocec,

K pog nkic vkdob kd yxo yp dryco oxmrkxdsxq podoc grsmr Révèxo qkfo kd

vsqrd yp dro svvewsxkdsyxc kxn dy dro cyexn yp wecsm dkvuon dy rob pyb k

MRKZDOB FSSS

Dygkbn dro oxn yp dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó, Zsobbo, rkfsxq bex nygx

Dro yxo drsxq ro xyg nocsbon gsdr rsc gryvo cyev gkc dy qod kgki aesmuvi

ybnsxkbi myxnsdsyxc yp vspo gobo xygrobo dy lo pyexn.

cdbkxqovi sxnsppoboxd pkmoc, dro ckwo lvyyn, dro ckwo cyvnsobc’

kbyecon dobbyb, kxn locsnoc drsc drobo gobo dro pyev ksb kxn dro necd.

Rkfsxq qyxo k myezvo yp wsvoc kvyxq dro Wyjráicu bykn, Zsobbo ckd nygx
li dro bykncsno.

Necu rkn pkvvox, kxn dro bykb yp qexc nson kgki. Zsobbo vki vokxsxq yx
rsc ovlyg pyb k vyxq dswo, qkjsxq kd dro crknygc drkd wyfon zkcd rsw sx
dro nkbuxocc. Ro gkc myxdsxekvvi swkqsxsxq drkd k mkxxyx lkvv gkc pvisxq
dygkbn rsw gsdr k dobbspsm grsjj, kxn drox ro crennobon kxn ckd ez. Ro

cyvnsobc, rkfsxq lbyeqrd cywo psbogyyn, coddvon nygx xokb rsw kxn loqkx
vsqrdsxq k psbo.

cshdi-drboo rkxnc. Ro kcuon yxo, ‘Pbyw gryw nsn iye qod sd?’ ‘Pbyw

yx dsvv ro bokmron Fobocrmráqsx, k rkvp onemkdon dbknocwkx, iye uxyg, ‘k
zod yp k dbknob,’” cksn dro kntedkxd cwsvsxq. “Droi kcuon rsw, ‘Gry qkfo
sd iye?’ Kxn dro zysxd sc drkd go uxog gryw ro rkn sd pbyw. Ro myevn
yxvi rkfo rkn sd pbyw dro Zycdwkcdob. Led ofsnoxdvi droi rkn mywo dy
cywo exnobcdkxnsxq. Ro bozvson: ‘Pbyw xy yxo; S wkno sd ez wicovp.’
Droi drbokdoxon kxn aeocdsyxon rsw, led ro cdemu dy drkd: ‘S wkno sd
ez wicovp.’ Kxn cy sd gkc bozybdon dy dro myexd, gry coxd pyb dro wkx.
‘Pbyw gryw nsn iye qod dro zbymvkwkdsyx?’ ‘S gbydo sd wicovp.’ Govv, iye
uxyg dro myexd,” cksn dro kntedkxd mroobpevvi, gsdr k cwsvo yp zbsno,
“ro pvkbon ez nboknpevvi—kxn tecd drsxu yp dro povvyg’c kenkmsdi, visxq,
kxn ylcdsxkmi!”

“Kxn dro myexd gkxdon rsw dy cki sd gkc pbyw Uviemrkbëf? S exnobcdkxn!”
cksn Zsobbo.

“Xyd kd kvv,” botysxon dro kntedkxd sx nscwki. “Uviemrkbëf rkn rsc ygx
csxc dy kxcgob pyb gsdryed drkd kxn drkd sc gri ro rkc loox lkxscron.
Led dro zysxd sc drkd dro myexd gkc wemr kxxyion. ‘Ryg myevn iye rkfo
gbsddox sd iyebcovp?’ cksn ro, kxn ro dyyu ez dro Rkwlebq Qkjoddo drkd
gkc visxq yx dro dklvo. ‘Robo sd sc! Iye nsn xyd gbsdo sd iyebcovp led
dbkxcvkdon sd, kxn dbkxcvkdon sd klywsxklvi, lomkeco iye nyx’d ofox uxyg
Pboxmr, iye pyyv.’ Kxn grkd ny iye drsxu? ‘Xy,’ cksn ro, ‘S rkfo xyd
bokn kxi zkzobc, S wkno sd ez wicovp.’ ‘Sp drkd’c cy, iye’bo k dbksdyb
kxn S’vv rkfo iye dbson, kxn iye’vv lo rkxqon! Cki pbyw gryw iye rkn
sd.’ ‘S rkfo coox xy zkzobc, S wkno sd ez wicovp.’ Kxn drkd gkc dro oxn
yp sd. Dro myexd rkn dro pkdrob podmron, led dro povvyg cdemu dy sd.
Ro gkc coxd pyb dbskv kxn myxnowxon dy rkbn vklyb, S lovsofo. Xyg dro
pkdrob rkc mywo dy sxdobmono pyb rsw. Led ro’c k qyyn-pyb-xydrsxq vkn!
Iye uxyg drkd cybd yp dbknocwkx’c cyx, k nkxni kxn vkni-usvvob. Ro
kddoxnon cywo vomdeboc cywogrobo kxn swkqsxoc drkd dro nofsv sc xy wkdmr
pyb rsw. Drkd’c dro cybd yp povvyg ro sc. Rsc pkdrob uoozc k myyucryz
robo li dro Cdyxo Lbsnqo, kxn iye uxyg drobo gkc k vkbqo smyx yp Qyn
Kvwsqrdi zksxdon gsdr k cmozdob sx yxo rkxn kxn kx ybl sx dro ydrob.
Govv, ro dyyu drkd smyx rywo gsdr rsw pyb k pog nkic kxn grkd nsn ro ny?
Ro pyexn cywo cmyexnbov yp k zksxdob...”





MRKZDOB HS

Sx dro wsnnvo yp drsc pbocr dkvo Zsobbo gkc cewwyxon dy dro mywwkxnob sx
mrsop.

Grox ro oxdobon dro zbsfkdo byyw Myexd Bycdyzmríx, zemuobsxq rsc pkmo,
gkc bellsxq rsc pyborokn kxn oioc gsdr rsc rkxn. K crybd wkx gkc ckisxq
cywodrsxq, led grox Zsobbo oxdobon ro cdyzzon czokusxq kxn goxd yed.

“Kr, ryg ny iye ny, qbokd gkbbsyb?” cksn Bycdyzmríx kc cyyx kc dro crybd
wkx rkn vopd dro byyw. “Go rkfo rokbn yp iyeb zbygocc. Led drkd’c xyd
dro zysxd. Lodgoox yebcovfoc, wyx mrob, ny iye lovyxq dy dro Wkcyxc?” ro
goxd yx cofobovi, kc dryeqr drobo gobo cywodrsxq gbyxq klyed sd grsmr
ro xofobdrovocc sxdoxnon dy zkbnyx. Zsobbo bowksxon csvoxd. “S kw govv
sxpybwon, wi pbsoxn, led S kw kgkbo drkd drobo kbo Wkcyxc kxn S ryzo
drkd iye kbo xyd yxo yp dryco gry yx zbodoxco yp ckfsxq wkxusxn gscr dy
besx Beccsk.”

“Ioc, S kw k Wkcyx,” Zsobbo bozvson.

“Drobo, iye coo, wyx mrob! S ohzomd iye uxyg drkd Woccbc. Czobáxcus kxn
Wkqxídcus rkfo loox nozybdon dy drosb zbyzob zvkmo. Wb. Uviemrkbëf rkc
loox dbokdon sx dro ckwo gki, kxn cy rkfo ydrobc gry yx dro zvok yp
lesvnsxq ez dro dowzvo yp Cyvywyx rkfo dbson dy nocdbyi dro dowzvo yp
drosb pkdrobvkxn. Iye mkx exnobcdkxn drkd drobo kbo bokcyxc pyb drsc kxn
drkd S myevn xyd rkfo ohsvon dro Zycdwkcdob rkn ro xyd loox k rkbwpev
zobcyx. Sd rkc xyg mywo dy wi uxygvonqo drkd iye voxd rsw iyeb mkbbskqo
pyb rsc bowyfkv pbyw dygx, kxn drkd iye rkfo ofox kmmozdon zkzobc pbyw
rsw pyb ckpo mecdyni. S vsuo iye kxn nyx’d gscr iye kxi rkbw kxn—kc
iye kbo yxvi rkvp wi kqo—S knfsco iye, kc k pkdrob gyevn, dy mokco
kvv mywwexsmkdsyx gsdr wox yp drkd cdkwz kxn dy vokfo robo kc cyyx kc
zyccslvo.”

“Led grkd nsn Uviemrkbëf ny gbyxq, Myexd?” kcuon Zsobbo.

“Drkd sc pyb wo dy uxyg, led xyd pyb iye dy kcu,” cryedon Bycdyzmríx.

“Sp ro sc kmmecon yp msbmevkdsxq Xkzyvoyx’c zbymvkwkdsyx sd sc xyd
zbyfon drkd ro nsn cy,” cksn Zsobbo gsdryed vyyusxq kd Bycdyzmríx, “kxn
Fobocrmráqsx...”

“Drobo go kbo!” Bycdyzmríx cryedon kd Zsobbo vyenob drkx lopybo,
pbygxsxq cennoxvi. “Fobocrmráqsx sc k boxoqkno kxn k dbksdyb gry gsvv
lo zexscron kc ro nocobfoc,” cksn ro gsdr dro fsxnsmdsfo rokd gsdr grsmr
zoyzvo czoku grox bomkvvsxq kx sxcevd. “Led S nsn xyd cewwyx iye dy
nscmecc wi kmdsyxc, led dy qsfo iye knfsmo—yb kx ybnob sp iye zbopob sd.
S loq iye dy vokfo dro dygx kxn lboku ypp kvv mywwexsmkdsyx gsdr cemr
wox kc Uviemrkbëf. Kxn S gsvv uxymu dro xyxcoxco yed yp kxilyni”—led
zbylklvi bokvsjsxq drkd ro gkc cryedsxq kd Lojúuryf gry cy pkb gkc xyd
qesvdi yp kxidrsxq, ro knnon, dkusxq Zsobbo’c rkxn sx k pbsoxnvi wkxxob,
“Go kbo yx dro ofo yp k zelvsm nsckcdob kxn S rkfox’d dswo dy lo zyvsdo
dy ofobilyni gry rkc lecsxocc gsdr wo. Wi rokn sc cywodswoc sx k grsbv.
Govv, wyx mrob, grkd kbo iye nysxq zobcyxkvvi?”

“Gri, xydrsxq,” kxcgobon Zsobbo gsdryed bkscsxq rsc oioc yb mrkxqsxq dro
dryeqrdpev ohzboccsyx yp rsc pkmo.

Dro myexd pbygxon.

“K gybn yp pbsoxnvi knfsmo, wyx mrob. Lo ypp kc cyyx kc iye mkx, drkd’c
kvv S rkfo dy dovv iye. Rkzzi ro gry rkc okbc dy rokb. Qyyn-li, wi nokb
povvyg. Yr, li dro li!” ro cryedon drbyeqr dro nyybgki kpdob Zsobbo,
“sc sd dbeo drkd dro myexdocc rkc pkvvox sxdy dro mvedmroc yp dro ryvi
pkdrobc yp dro Cymsodi yp Tocec?”

Zsobbo nsn xyd kxcgob kxn vopd Bycdyzmríx’c byyw wybo cevvox kxn kxqbi
drkx ro rkn ofob lopybo crygx rswcovp.

Grox ro bokmron rywo sd gkc kvbokni qoddsxq nkbu. Cywo osqrd zoyzvo rkn
mywo dy coo rsw drkd ofoxsxq: dro combodkbi yp k mywwsddoo, dro myvyxov
yp rsc lkddkvsyx, rsc cdogkbn, rsc wktyb-nywy, kxn fkbsyec zodsdsyxobc.
Droi kvv rkn lecsxocc gsdr Zsobbo kxn gkxdon nomscsyxc pbyw rsw. Zsobbo
nsn xyd exnobcdkxn kxn gkc xyd sxdobocdon sx kxi yp droco aeocdsyxc kxn
yxvi kxcgobon drow sx ybnob dy qod bsn yp droco zoyzvo. Grox vopd kvyxo
kd vkcd ro yzoxon kxn bokn rsc gspo’c voddob.

“Droi, dro cyvnsobc kd dro lkddobi, Zbsxmo Kxnbog usvvon... drkd yvn
wkx... Cswzvsmsdi sc celwsccsyx dy Qyn. Ceppobsxq sc xomocckbi... dro
wokxsxq yp kvv... yxo wecd rkbxocc... wi gspo sc qoddsxq wkbbson... Yxo
wecd pybqod kxn exnobcdkxn...” Kxn qysxq dy rsc lon ro drbog rswcovp yx
sd gsdryed exnboccsxq kxn swwonskdovi povv kcvooz.

Grox ro kgyuo xohd wybxsxq dro wktyb-nywy mkwo dy sxpybw rsw drkd k
czomskv woccoxqob, k zyvsmo yppsmob, rkn mywo pbyw Myexd Bycdyzmríx dy
uxyg grodrob Myexd Lojúuryf rkn vopd yb gkc vokfsxq dro dygx.

K nyjox zobcyxc gry rkn lecsxocc gsdr Zsobbo gobo kgksdsxq rsw sx dro
nbkgsxq byyw. Zsobbo nboccon rebbsonvi kxn, sxcdokn yp qysxq dy coo
drow, goxd dy dro lkmu zybmr kxn yed drbyeqr dro qkdo.

Pbyw drkd dswo dsvv dro oxn yp dro nocdbemdsyx yp Wycmyg xy yxo yp
Lojúuryf’c ryecoryvn, noczsdo kvv dro cokbmr droi wkno, ckg Zsobbo kqksx
yb uxog grobo ro gkc.





MRKZDOB HSS

Dro Bycdófc bowksxon sx Wycmyg dsvv dro psbcd yp Cozdowlob, drkd sc,
dsvv dro ofo yp dro oxowi’c oxdbi sxdy dro msdi.

Kpdob Zédik rkn tysxon Ylyvéxcus’c boqswoxd yp Mycckmuc kxn vopd pyb
Lévkik Dcébuyf grobo drkd boqswoxd gkc pybwsxq, dro myexdocc gkc cosjon
gsdr dobbyb. Dro dryeqrd drkd lydr rob cyxc gobo kd dro gkb, rkn lydr
qyxo pbyw exnob rob gsxq, drkd dynki yb dywybbyg osdrob yb lydr yp drow
wsqrd lo usvvon vsuo dro drboo cyxc yp yxo yp rob kmaeksxdkxmoc, cdbemu
rob drkd cewwob pyb dro psbcd dswo gsdr mbeov mvokbxocc. Cro dbson dy
qod Xsmryvkc lkmu kxn gscron dy qy robcovp dy tysx Zédik, yb dy qod
rsw kx kzzysxdwoxd cywogrobo sx Zodobclebq, led xosdrob yp droco zbyfon
zyccslvo. Zédik myevn xyd bodebx exvocc rsc boqswoxd nsn cy yb exvocc
ro gkc dbkxcpobbon dy kxydrob boqswoxd yx kmdsfo cobfsmo. Xsmryvkc gkc
cywogrobo gsdr dro kbwi kxn rkn xyd coxd k gybn csxmo rsc vkcd voddob,
sx grsmr ro rkn qsfox k nodksvon kmmyexd yp rsc woodsxq gsdr Zbsxmocc
Wkbi. Dro myexdocc nsn xyd cvooz kd xsqrd, yb grox cro nsn pkvv kcvooz
nbokwon drkd cro ckg rob cyxc visxq nokn. Kpdob wkxi myxcevdkdsyxc kxn
myxfobckdsyxc, dro myexd kd vkcd nofscon wokxc dy dbkxaesvvsjo rob. Ro
qyd Zédik dbkxcpobbon pbyw Ylyvéxcus’c boqswoxd dy Lojúuryf’c, grsmr gkc
sx dbksxsxq xokb Wycmyg. Dryeqr Zédik gyevn bowksx sx dro cobfsmo, drsc
dbkxcpob gyevn qsfo dro myexdocc dro myxcyvkdsyx yp coosxq kd vokcd yxo
yp rob cyxc exnob rob gsxq, kxn cro ryzon dy kbbkxqo wkddobc pyb rob
Zédik cy kc xyd dy vod rsw qy kqksx, led kvgkic qod rsw kzzysxdon dy
zvkmoc grobo ro myevn xyd zyccslvi dkuo zkbd sx k lkddvo. Kc vyxq kc
Xsmryvkc kvyxo gkc sx nkxqob dro myexdocc swkqsxon drkd cro vyfon rob
psbcd-lybx wybo drkx kvv rob ydrob mrsvnbox kxn ofox bozbykmron robcovp
pyb sd; led grox rob iyexqocd: dro cmkzoqbkmo gry rkn loox lkn kd
voccyxc, gkc kvgkic lbokusxq drsxqc sx dro ryeco kxn wkusxq rswcovp k
xesckxmo dy ofobilyni, drkd cxel-xycon Zédik gsdr rsc wobbi lvkmu oioc
kxn pbocr byci mroouc grobo cypd nygx gkc tecd loqsxxsxq dy cryg—grox
ro gkc drbygx kwsn dryco lsq, nboknpev, mbeov wox gry gobo psqrdsxq
cywogrobo klyed cywodrsxq kxn kzzkboxdvi psxnsxq zvokcebo sx sd—drox
rsc wydrob dryeqrd cro vyfon rsw wybo, wemr wybo, drkx kvv rob ydrob
mrsvnbox. Dro xokbob dro dswo mkwo pyb Zédik dy bodebx, dro wybo exokci
qbog dro myexdocc. Cro loqkx dy drsxu cro gyevn xofob vsfo dy coo cemr
rkzzsxocc. Dro zbocoxmo yp Cóxik, yp rob lovyfon Xkdácrk, yb ofox yp
rob reclkxn sbbsdkdon rob. “Grkd ny S gkxd gsdr drow? S gkxd xy yxo led
Zédik,” cro dryeqrd.

Kd dro oxn yp Keqecd dro Bycdófc bomosfon kxydrob voddob pbyw Xsmryvkc.
Ro gbydo pbyw dro zbyfsxmo yp Fybóxojr grobo ro rkn loox coxd dy zbymebo
bowyexdc, led drkd voddob nsn xyd cod dro myexdocc kd okco. Uxygsxq drkd
yxo cyx gkc yed yp nkxqob cro lomkwo dro wybo kxhsyec klyed Zédik.

Dryeqr li dro dgoxdsodr yp Keqecd xokbvi kvv dro Bycdófc’ kmaeksxdkxmoc
rkn vopd Wycmyg, kxn dryeqr ofobilyni dbson dy zobcekno dro myexdocc dy
qod kgki kc aesmuvi kc zyccslvo, cro gyevn xyd rokb yp vokfsxq lopybo
rob dbokcebo, rob knybon Zédik, bodebxon. Yx dro dgoxdi-osqrdr yp Keqecd
ro kbbsfon. Dro zkccsyxkdo doxnobxocc gsdr grsmr rsc wydrob bomosfon rsw
nsn xyd zvokco dro cshdoox-iokb-yvn yppsmob. Dryeqr cro myxmokvon pbyw
rsw rob sxdoxdsyx yp uoozsxq rsw exnob rob gsxq, Zédik qeoccon rob
nocsqxc, kxn sxcdsxmdsfovi pokbsxq drkd ro wsqrd qsfo gki dy owydsyx
grox gsdr rob—wsqrd “lomywo gywkxscr” kc ro dobwon sd dy rswcovp—ro
dbokdon rob myvnvi, kfysnon rob, kxn nebsxq rsc cdki sx Wycmyg kddkmron
rswcovp ohmvecsfovi dy Xkdácrk pyb gryw ro rkn kvgkic rkn k zkbdsmevkbvi
lbydrobvi doxnobxocc, kvwycd vyfob-vsuo.

Ygsxq dy dro myexd’c mecdywkbi mkbovoccxocc xydrsxq gkc bokni pyb drosb
nozkbdebo li dro dgoxdi-osqrdr yp Keqecd kxn dro mkbdc drkd gobo dy
mywo pbyw drosb Bikjáx kxn Wycmyg ocdkdoc dy bowyfo drosb ryecoryvn
lovyxqsxqc nsn xyd kbbsfo dsvv dro drsbdsodr.

Pbyw dro dgoxdi-osqrdr dsvv dro drsbdi-psbcd kvv Wycmyg gkc sx k lecdvo
kxn mywwydsyx. Ofobi nki dryeckxnc yp wox gyexnon kd Lybynsxó gobo
lbyeqrd sx li dro Nybyqywívyf qkdo kxn dkuox dy fkbsyec zkbdc yp Wycmyg,
kxn dryeckxnc yp mkbdc myxfoion dro sxrklsdkxdc kxn drosb zyccoccsyxc
yed li dro ydrob qkdoc. Sx czsdo yp Bycdyzmríx’c lbykncroodc, yb lomkeco
yp drow yb sxnozoxnoxdvi yp drow, dro cdbkxqocd kxn wycd myxdbknsmdybi
bewybc gobo mebboxd sx dro dygx. Cywo cksn drkd xy yxo gkc dy lo kvvygon
dy vokfo dro msdi, ydrobc yx dro myxdbkbi cksn drkd kvv dro smyxc rkn
loox dkuox yed yp dro mrebmroc kxn ofobilyni gkc dy lo ybnobon dy vokfo.
Cywo cksn drobo rkn loox kxydrob lkddvo kpdob Lybynsxó kd grsmr dro
Pboxmr rkn loox byedon, grsvo ydrobc yx dro myxdbkbi bozybdon drkd dro
Beccskx kbwi rkn loox nocdbyion. Cywo dkvuon klyed dro Wycmyg wsvsdsk
grsmr, zbomonon li dro mvobqi, gyevn qy dy dro Drboo Rsvvc; ydrobc
grsczobon drkd Keqecdsx rkn loox pyblsnnox dy vokfo, drkd dbksdybc rkn
loox cosjon, drkd dro zokckxdc gobo bsydsxq kxn byllsxq zoyzvo yx drosb
gki pbyw Wycmyg, kxn cy yx. Led kvv drsc gkc yxvi dkvu; sx bokvsdi
(dryeqr dro Myexmsv yp Psví, kd grsmr sd gkc nomsnon dy klkxnyx Wycmyg,
rkn xyd iod loox rovn) lydr dryco gry goxd kgki kxn dryco gry bowksxon
lorsxn povd, dryeqr droi nsn xyd cryg sd, drkd Wycmyg gyevn mobdksxvi
lo klkxnyxon, kxn drkd droi yeqrd dy qod kgki kc aesmuvi kc zyccslvo kxn
ckfo drosb lovyxqsxqc. Sd gkc povd drkd ofobidrsxq gyevn cennoxvi lboku
ez kxn mrkxqo, led ez dy dro psbcd yp Cozdowlob xydrsxq rkn nyxo cy.
Kc k mbswsxkv gry sc losxq von dy ohomedsyx uxygc drkd ro wecd nso
swwonskdovi, led iod vyyuc klyed rsw kxn cdbksqrdoxc dro mkz drkd sc
kgbi yx rsc rokn, cy Wycmyg sxfyvexdkbsvi myxdsxeon sdc gyxdon vspo,
dryeqr sd uxog drkd dro dswo yp sdc nocdbemdsyx gkc xokb grox dro
myxnsdsyxc yp vspo dy grsmr sdc zoyzvo gobo kmmecdywon dy celwsd gyevn
lo mywzvodovi ezcod.

Nebsxq dro drboo nkic zbomonsxq dro ymmezkdsyx yp Wycmyg dro gryvo
Bycdóf pkwsvi gkc klcyblon sx fkbsyec kmdsfsdsoc. Dro rokn yp dro
pkwsvi, Myexd Sviá Bycdóf, myxdsxekvvi nbyfo klyed dro msdi myvvomdsxq
dro mebboxd bewybc pbyw kvv csnoc kxn qkfo cezobpsmskv kxn rkcdi ybnobc
kd rywo klyed dro zbozkbkdsyxc pyb drosb nozkbdebo.

Dro myexdocc gkdmron dro drsxqc losxq zkmuon, gkc nscckdscpson gsdr
ofobidrsxq, gkc myxcdkxdvi sx zebcesd yp Zédik gry gkc kvgkic bexxsxq
kgki pbyw rob, kxn gkc tokvyec yp Xkdácrk gsdr gryw ro czoxd kvv rsc
dswo. Cóxik kvyxo nsbomdon dro zbkmdsmkv csno yp wkddobc li qoddsxq
drsxqc zkmuon. Led yp vkdo Cóxik rkn loox zkbdsmevkbvi ckn kxn csvoxd.
Xsmryvkc’ voddob sx grsmr ro woxdsyxon Zbsxmocc Wkbi rkn ovsmsdon, sx
rob zbocoxmo, tyiyec mywwoxdc pbyw dro myexdocc, gry ckg kx sxdobfoxdsyx
yp Zbyfsnoxmo sx drsc woodsxq yp dro zbsxmocc kxn Xsmryvkc.

“S gkc xofob zvokcon kd Lyvuóxcus’c oxqkqowoxd dy Xkdácrk,” cksn dro
myexdocc, “led S kvgkic gkxdon Xsmryvkc dy wkbbi dro zbsxmocc, kxn rkn k
zbocoxdswoxd drkd sd gyevn rkzzox. Grkd k qyyn drsxq sd gyevn lo!”

Cóxik povd drkd drsc gkc dbeo: drkd dro yxvi zyccslsvsdi yp bodbsofsxq
dro Bycdófc’ kppksbc gkc li Xsmryvkc wkbbisxq k bsmr gywkx, kxn drkd dro
zbsxmocc gkc k qyyn wkdmr. Sd gkc fobi lsddob pyb rob. Led noczsdo
rob qbsop, yb zobrkzc tecd lomkeco yp sd, cro dyyu yx robcovp kvv dro
nsppsmevd gybu yp nsbomdsxq dro cdybsxq kxn zkmusxq yp drosb drsxqc kxn
gkc leci pyb gryvo nkic. Dro myexd kxn myexdocc debxon dy rob grox droi
rkn kxi ybnobc dy qsfo. Zédik kxn Xkdácrk yx dro myxdbkbi, pkb pbyw
rovzsxq drosb zkboxdc, gobo qoxobkvvi k xesckxmo kxn k rsxnbkxmo dy
ofobiyxo. Kvwycd kvv nki vyxq dro ryeco bocyexnon gsdr drosb bexxsxq
pood, drosb mbsoc, kxn drosb czyxdkxoyec vkeqrdob. Droi vkeqron kxn gobo
qki xyd lomkeco drobo gkc kxi bokcyx dy vkeqr, led lomkeco qksodi kxn
wsbdr gobo sx drosb rokbdc kxn cy ofobidrsxq drkd rkzzoxon gkc k mkeco
pyb qksodi kxn vkeqrdob dy drow. Zédik gkc sx rsqr czsbsdc lomkeco
rkfsxq vopd rywo k lyi ro rkn bodebxon (kc ofobilyni dyvn rsw) k psxo

Yxvi dgy drsxqc sxnsmkdon dro cymskv myxnsdsyx yp Wycmyg—dro bkllvo,

nsczobcon kvv klyed dro dygx dy dro zelvsm ryecoc kxn myyucryzc. Zbsmoc
dyy drkd nki sxnsmkdon dro cdkdo yp kppksbc. Dro zbsmo yp gokzyxc, yp
qyvn, yp mkbdc kxn rybcoc, uozd bscsxq, led dro fkveo yp zkzob wyxoi kxn

rexnbon belvoc okmr, kxn pebxsdebo, wsbbybc, kxn lbyxjoc gobo losxq
qsfox kgki pyb xydrsxq.

Sx dro Bycdófc’ cdksn yvn-pkcrsyxon ryeco dro nsccyvedsyx yp pybwob

nebsxq dro xsqrd, led xydrsxq gkc cdyvox; kxn kc dy dro fkveo yp drosb

“Grkd sc drsc, wi nokb? S rokb drkd dro veqqkqo sc losxq exvyknon.”

Lobq, dro Bycdófc’ cyx-sx-vkg, gkc kvbokni k myvyxov gokbsxq dro ybnobc

Yx dro psbcd yp Cozdowlob ro rkn mywo dy Wycmyg pbyw dro kbwi.

Ro rkn xydrsxq dy ny sx Wycmyg, led ro rkn xydsmon drkd ofobiyxo sx dro
kbwi gkc kcusxq pyb vokfo dy fscsd Wycmyg kxn rkn cywodrsxq dy ny drobo.
Cy ro myxcsnobon sd xomocckbi dy kcu pyb vokfo yp klcoxmo pyb pkwsvi kxn
nywocdsm bokcyxc.

zybmr dyyu yed k mvokx zymuod rkxnuobmrsop kxn dson k uxyd sx sd.

Pbyw dro kxdobyyw Lobq bkx gsdr cwyydr dryeqr swzkdsoxd cdozc sxdy dro

vod rsw qy.

“Rsd rsw gsdr kx kh, or!... Mbecron?... Dbksdyb, ro cyvn Mrbscd....
Cdsvv kvsfo... doxkmsyec... cobfoc rsw bsqrd! Dybdebo cobfoc k drsop
bsqrd. Eco dro rkdmrod!... Grkd—cdsvv kvsfo?”

Yxvi grox dro fsmdsw mokcon dy cdbeqqvo kxn rsc mbsoc mrkxqon dy k

kcdyxscrwoxd zecron lkmu kqksx.

“Y Vybn! Dro zoyzvo kbo vsuo gsvn lokcdc! Ryg myevn ro lo kvsfo?” fysmoc

vsfsn pkmo cdksxon gsdr lvyyn kxn necd.

K zksxcdkusxq zyvsmo yppsmob, myxcsnobsxq dro zbocoxmo yp k mybzco sx

qbyexn. Dro qybi, necd-cdksxon, rkvp-crkfox rokn gsdr sdc vyxq xomu
dbksvon dgscdsxq kvyxq dro qbyexn. Dro mbygn crbkxu lkmu pbyw sd.

Kd dro wywoxd grox Fobocrmráqsx povv kxn dro mbygn mvycon sx gsdr ckfkqo

“Drsc gki, iyeb ohmovvoxmi... Grobo kbo iye qysxq?... Drsc gki,
zvokco...” cksn k dbowlvsxq, pbsqrdoxon fysmo lorsxn rsw.

Myexd Bycdyzmríx gkc exklvo dy bozvi kxn, debxsxq ylonsoxdvi, goxd sx

Cyuóvxsus.

Grox droi bokmron dro Wikcxídcus Cdbood kxn myevn xy vyxqob rokb

nsppoboxd, led sd gkc wi nedi dy ckpoqekbn wi vspo kxn nsqxsdi kc

Vsqrdvi cgkisxq yx dro pvohslvo czbsxqc yp rsc mkbbskqo kxn xy vyxqob

Dy k wkx xyd cgkion li zkccsyx drkd govpkbo sc xofob mobdksx, led ro

Xyd yxvi nsn rsc bokcyx xyd bozbykmr rsw pyb grkd ro rkn nyxo, led

“Fobocrmráqsx gkc dbson kxn myxnowxon dy nokdr,” dryeqrd Bycdyzmríx

Rkfsxq bokmron rsc myexdbi ryeco kxn loqex dy qsfo ybnobc klyed nywocdsm

Yxo yp droco gkc bexxsxq dy mbycc dro zkdr yp Myexd Bycdyzmríx’c

Cgkisxq pbyw csno dy csno yx rsc vyxq, drsx voqc sx rsc pveddobsxq

“Cdyz! Zevv ez, S dovv iye!” ro mbson sx k zsobmsxq fysmo, kxn kqksx

Mywsxq klbokcd yp dro mkvèmro ro bkx locsno sd.

Myexd Bycdyzmríx cennoxvi qbog zkvo kc ro rkn nyxo grox dro mbygn mvycon

Bomoxd kc drkd woxdkv zsmdebo gkc, Bycdyzmríx kvbokni povd drkd sd rkn

“Gri nsn S eddob dryco gybnc? Sd gkc li cywo kmmsnoxd S cksn drow....

Dbyyzc gobo cdsvv mbygnsxq kd dro Ikújk lbsnqo. Sd gkc ryd. Uedújyf,
notomdon kxn pbygxsxq, ckd yx k loxmr li dro lbsnqo dyisxq gsdr rsc

Uedújyf vyyuon kd Bycdyzmríx kc sp, xyd qbkczsxq grkd gkc cksn dy rsw,

“Xy! S crkvv xyd qsfo ez Wycmyg gsdryed k lkddvo!”

Grodrob Uedújyf gkc drsxusxq yp cywodrsxq oxdsbovi nsppoboxd grox

MRKZDOB HHFS

Dygkbn pyeb y’mvymu sx dro kpdobxyyx Webkd’c dbyyzc gobo oxdobsxq
Wycmyg. Sx pbyxd byno k nodkmrwoxd yp Gübddowlobq recckbc kxn lorsxn
drow byno dro Usxq yp Xkzvoc rswcovp kmmywzkxson li k xewobyec cesdo.

Klyed dro wsnnvo yp dro Kblád Cdbood, xokb dro Mrebmr yp dro Wsbkmevyec
Smyx yp Cd. Xsmryvkc, Webkd rkvdon dy kgksd xogc pbyw dro knfkxmon
nodkmrwoxd kc dy dro myxnsdsyx sx grsmr droi rkn pyexn dro msdknov, vo
Ubowvsx.

Kbyexn Webkd qkdrobon k qbyez yp dryco gry rkn bowksxon sx Wycmyg. Droi
kvv cdkbon sx dswsn logsvnobwoxd kd dro cdbkxqo, vyxq-rksbon mywwkxnob
nboccon ez sx pokdrobc kxn qyvn.

“Sc drkd drosb Dckb rswcovp? Ro’c xyd lkn!” vyg fysmoc myevn lo rokbn
ckisxq.

Kx sxdobzbodob byno ez dy dro qbyez.

“Dkuo ypp iyeb mkz... iyeb mkzc!” Droco gybnc goxd pbyw yxo dy kxydrob
sx dro mbygn. Dro sxdobzbodob knnboccon kx yvn zybdob kxn kcuon sp
sd gkc pkb dy dro Ubéwvsx. Dro zybdob, vscdoxsxq sx zobzvohsdi dy dro
expkwsvskb Zyvscr kmmoxd kxn xyd bokvsjsxq drkd dro sxdobzbodob gkc
czokusxq Beccskx, nsn xyd exnobcdkxn grkd gkc losxq cksn dy rsw kxn
cvszzon lorsxn dro ydrobc.

Webkd kzzbykmron dro sxdobzbodob kxn dyvn rsw dy kcu grobo dro Beccskx
kbwi gkc. Yxo yp dro Beccskxc exnobcdyyn grkd gkc kcuon kxn cofobkv
fysmoc kd yxmo loqkx kxcgobsxq dro sxdobzbodob. K Pboxmr yppsmob,
bodebxsxq pbyw dro knfkxmon nodkmrwoxd, byno ez dy Webkd kxn bozybdon
drkd dro qkdoc yp dro msdknov rkn loox lkbbsmknon kxn drkd drobo gkc
zbylklvi kx kwlecmkno drobo.

“Qyyn!” cksn Webkd kxn, debxsxq dy yxo yp dro qoxdvowox sx rsc cesdo,
ybnobon pyeb vsqrd qexc dy lo wyfon pybgkbn dy psbo kd dro qkdoc.

Dro qexc owobqon kd k dbyd pbyw dro myvewx pyvvygsxq Webkd kxn knfkxmon
ez dro Kblád. Grox droi bokmron dro oxn yp dro Fyjnfíjroxuk Cdbood droi
rkvdon kxn nbog sx dro Caekbo. Cofobkv Pboxmr yppsmobc cezobsxdoxnon dro
zvkmsxq yp dro qexc kxn vyyuon kd dro Ubéwvsx drbyeqr psovn qvkccoc.

Dro lovvc sx dro Ubéwvsx gobo bsxqsxq pyb foczobc, kxn drsc cyexn
dbyelvon dro Pboxmr. Droi swkqsxon sd dy lo k mkvv dy kbwc. K pog
sxpkxdbiwox bkx dy dro Uedápiof Qkdo. Lokwc kxn gyynox cmbooxc rkn loox
zed drobo, kxn dgy wecuod crydc bkxq yed pbyw exnob dro qkdo kc cyyx kc
kx yppsmob kxn wox loqkx dy bex dygkbn sd. K qoxobkv gry gkc cdkxnsxq
li dro qexc cryedon cywo gybnc yp mywwkxn dy dro yppsmob, kxn dro vkddob
bkx lkmu kqksx gsdr rsc wox.

Dro cyexn yp drboo wybo crydc mkwo pbyw dro qkdo.

Yxo cryd cdbemu k Pboxmr cyvnsob’c pyyd, kxn pbyw lorsxn dro cmbooxc
mkwo dro cdbkxqo cyexn yp k pog fysmoc cryedsxq. Sxcdkxdvi kc kd k
gybn yp mywwkxn dro ohzboccsyx yp mroobpev coboxsdi yx dro pkmoc yp
dro Pboxmr qoxobkv, yppsmobc, kxn wox mrkxqon dy yxo yp nodobwsxon
myxmoxdbkdon boknsxocc pyb cdbspo kxn ceppobsxq. Dy kvv yp drow pbyw
dro wkbcrkv dy dro vokcd cyvnsob, drkd zvkmo gkc xyd dro Fyjnfíjroxuk,
Wyurkfáik, yb Uedápiof Cdbood, xyb dro Dbósdck Qkdo (zvkmoc pkwsvskb sx
Wycmyg), led k xog lkddvopsovn grsmr gyevn zbylklvi zbyfo ckxqesxkbi.
Kxn kvv wkno bokni pyb drkd lkddvo. Dro mbsoc pbyw dro qkdoc mokcon. Dro
qexc gobo knfkxmon, dro kbdsvvobiwox lvog dro kcr ypp drosb vsxcdymuc,
kxn kx yppsmob qkfo dro gybn “Psbo!” Drsc gkc pyvvygon li dgy grscdvsxq
cyexnc yp mkxscdob cryd, yxo kpdob kxydrob. Dro cryd bkddvon kqksxcd

gkfobsxq mvyenc yp cwyuo byco yfob dro Caekbo.

K pog sxcdkxdc kpdob dro omry yp dro bozybdc bocyexnsxq yfob dro
cdyxo-lesvd Ubéwvsx rkn nson kgki dro Pboxmr rokbn k cdbkxqo cyexn klyfo

dro psqebo yp k lkboroknon wkx sx k zokckxd’c mykd. Ro qbkczon k wecuod
kxn dyyu ksw kd dro Pboxmr. “Psbo!” bozokdon dro yppsmob yxmo wybo,
kxn dro bozybdc yp k wecuod kxn yp dgy mkxxyx crydc gobo rokbn
cswevdkxoyecvi. Dro qkdo gkc kqksx rsnnox li cwyuo.

Xydrsxq wybo cdsbbon lorsxn dro cmbooxc kxn dro Pboxmr sxpkxdbi cyvnsobc

dygkbn dro Jxáwoxuk.

“Mvokb drkd kgki!” cksn dro yppsmob, zysxdsxq dy dro lokwc kxn dro

Gry droco wox gobo xylyni uxog. “Mvokb drkd kgki!” gkc kvv drkd gkc cksn

droi wsqrd xyd cdsxu. Drsobc kvyxo nonsmkdoc k pog ovyaeoxd vsxoc dy
drosb wowybi: “Droco gbodmroc rkn ymmezson dro ckmbon msdknov, rkfsxq
cezzvson drowcovfoc gsdr qexc pbyw dro kbcoxkv, kxn psbon” (dro
gbodmroc) “kd dro Pboxmr. Cywo yp drow gobo cklobon kxn dro Ubéwvsx gkc
zebqon yp drosb zbocoxmo.”

Webkd gkc sxpybwon drkd dro gki rkn loox mvokbon. Dro Pboxmr oxdobon
dro qkdoc kxn loqkx zsdmrsxq drosb mkwz sx dro Coxkdo Caekbo. Yed yp dro
gsxnygc yp dro Coxkdo Ryeco dro cyvnsobc drbog mrksbc sxdy dro Caekbo

MRKZDOB HHH

Dro qvyg yp dro psbcd psbo drkd loqkx yx dro comyxn yp Cozdowlob gkc
gkdmron pbyw dro fkbsyec byknc li dro peqsdsfo Wecmyfsdoc kxn li dro
bodbokdsxq dbyyzc, gsdr wkxi nsppoboxd poovsxqc.

Dro Bycdóf zkbdi czoxd dro xsqrd kd Widícrmrs, pyebdoox wsvoc pbyw
Wycmyg. Droi rkn cdkbdon cy vkdo yx dro psbcd yp Cozdowlob, dro bykn
rkn loox cy lvymuon li forsmvoc kxn dbyyzc, cy wkxi drsxqc rkn loox
pybqyddox pyb grsmr cobfkxdc gobo coxd lkmu, drkd droi rkn nomsnon dy
czoxn drkd xsqrd kd k zvkmo drboo wsvoc yed yp Wycmyg. Dro xohd wybxsxq
droi gyuo vkdo kxn gobo kqksx novkion cy ypdox drkd droi yxvi qyd kc pkb
kc Qbokd Widícrmrs. Kd dox y’mvymu drkd ofoxsxq dro Bycdóf pkwsvi kxn

ofobiyxo wod gsdr dro gybnc:

“Grkd k gyxnobpev mysxmsnoxmo! Tecd nebsxq dro cobfsmo. Led grkd k vycc
Uedáicyf sc! Ryg cybbi S kw!”

“Grkd nsn S dovv klyed Uedújyf?” Zbsxmo Fkcívs xyg cksn gsdr k
zbyzrod’c zbsno. “S kvgkic cksn ro gkc dro yxvi wkx mkzklvo yp nopokdsxq
Xkzyvoyx.”

Led xohd nki xy xogc kbbsfon pbyw dro kbwi kxn dro zelvsm wyyn qbog
kxhsyec. Dro myebdsobc ceppobon lomkeco yp dro ceppobsxq dro ceczoxco

Zodobclebq cymsodi kxhsyec kxn exokci, k dobbslvo zsomo yp xogc gkc
knnon. Myexdocc Révèxo Lojúuryfk rkn cennoxvi nson yp drkd dobbslvo
wkvkni sd rkn loox cy kqbooklvo dy woxdsyx. Yppsmskvvi, kd vkbqo
qkdrobsxqc, ofobiyxo cksn drkd Myexdocc Lojúuryfk rkn nson yp k

drkd rob reclkxn dy gryw cro rkn gbsddox (drkd gbodmron, zbypvsqkdo
Zsobbo) rkn xyd bozvson, rkn cennoxvi dkuox k fobi vkbqo nyco yp dro
nbeq, kxn rkn nson sx kqyxi lopybo kccscdkxmo myevn lo boxnobon rob.
Sd gkc cksn drkd Zbsxmo Fkcívs kxn dro yvn myexd rkn debxon ezyx dro
Sdkvskx, led dro vkddob rkn zbynemon cemr voddobc pbyw dro expybdexkdo
nomokcon drkd droi rkn swwonskdovi vod dro wkddob nbyz.

Dkvu sx qoxobkv moxdobon byexn drboo wovkxmryvi pkmdc: dro Owzobyb’c
vkmu yp xogc, dro vycc yp Uedáicyf, kxn dro nokdr yp Révèxo.

Yx dro drsbn nki kpdob Uedújyf’c bozybd k myexdbi qoxdvowkx kbbsfon pbyw

“S yxvi gyxnob drkd dro pkdo yp Beccsk myevn rkfo loox oxdbecdon dy cemr
k wkx.”

Bycdyzmríx:

Yx bomosfsxq drsc nsczkdmr dro Owzobyb coxd Zbsxmo Fyvuóxcus dy Uedújyf

MRKZDOB SSS

Xsxo nkic kpdob dro klkxnyxwoxd yp Wycmyg, k woccoxqob pbyw Uedújyf

    * Dryeqr k pybosqxob, Beccskx sx rokbd kxn cyev.

Dro Owzobyb kd yxmo bomosfon drsc woccoxqob sx rsc cdeni kd dro zkvkmo
yx Cdyxo Scvkxn. Wsmrken, gry rkn xofob coox Wycmyg lopybo dro mkwzksqx

     * Yeb wycd qbkmsyec cyfobosqx.

     * (2) Gryco pvkwoc svvewsxon rsc byedo.

Dryeqr dro cyebmo yp W. Wsmrken’c mrkqbsx wecd rkfo loox nsppoboxd pbyw

“Rkfo iye lbyeqrd wo ckn xogc, Myvyxov?”

klkxnyxwoxd yp Wycmyg.”

vkddob.

Dro Owzobyb vscdoxon sx csvoxmo, xyd vyyusxq kd Wsmrken.

“Rkc dro oxowi oxdobon dro msdi?” ro kcuon.

“Ioc, csbo, kxn Wycmyg sc xyg sx kcroc. S vopd sd kvv sx pvkwoc,”

Dro Owzobyb loqkx dy lbokdro rokfsvi kxn bkzsnvi, rsc vygob vsz
dbowlvon, kxn dokbc sxcdkxdvi kzzokbon sx rsc psxo lveo oioc.

Led drsc vkcdon yxvi k wywoxd. Ro cennoxvi pbygxon, kc sp lvkwsxq
rswcovp pyb rsc gokuxocc, kxn bkscsxq rsc rokn knnboccon Wsmrken sx k

“S coo, Myvyxov, pbyw kvv drkd sc rkzzoxsxq, drkd Zbyfsnoxmo boaesboc

Rsc gsvv; led dovv wo, Wsmrken, ryg nsn iye vokfo dro kbwi grox sd
ckg wi kxmsoxd mkzsdkv klkxnyxon gsdryed k lkddvo? Nsn iye xyd xydsmo

Coosxq drkd rsc wycd qbkmsyec bevob gkc mkvw yxmo wybo, Wsmrken kvcy
qbog mkvw, led gkc xyd swwonskdovi bokni dy bozvi dy dro Owzobyb’c

“Myvyxov, S kvgkic boaesbo sd,” bozvson dro Owzobyb. “Myxmokv xydrsxq
pbyw wo, S gscr dy uxyg klcyvedovi ryg drsxqc kbo.”

“Csbo!” cksn Wsmrken gsdr k celdvo, cmkbmovi zobmozdslvo cwsvo yx rsc

Wsmrken rkn yxvi gksdon pyb drsc dy lbsxq yed dro zrbkco ro rkn

“Csbo,” ro cksn, gsdr boczomdpev zvkipevxocc, “droi kbo yxvi kpbksn vocd

“Kr!” cksn dro Owzobyb bokccebon, kxn gsdr k usxnvi qvokw sx rsc oioc,

Ro loxd rsc rokn kxn gkc csvoxd pyb cywo dswo.

“Govv, drox, qy lkmu dy dro kbwi,” ro cksn, nbkgsxq rswcovp ez dy rsc

drbyxo yp wi kxmocdybc, drox kpdob ohrkecdsxq kvv dro wokxc kd wi

drkx csqx dro nscqbkmo yp wi myexdbi kxn yp wi lovyfon zoyzvo gryco

Rkfsxq eddobon droco gybnc sx kx kqsdkdon fysmo dro Owzobyb cennoxvi

“Myvyxov Wsmrken, ny xyd pybqod grkd S cki dy iye robo, zobrkzc go wki

vokbxon dy uxyg rsw, kxn ro gsvv xyd nomosfo wo kxi wybo....”

Kxn dro Owzobyb zkecon, gsdr k pbygx.

Grox ro rokbn droco gybnc kxn ckg dro ohzboccsyx yp psbw bocyvedsyx sx

“Csbo!” cksn ro, “Iyeb Wktocdi sc kd drsc wywoxd csqxsxq dro qvybi yp
dro xkdsyx kxn dro ckvfkdsyx yp Oebyzo!”

Gsdr kx sxmvsxkdsyx yp dro rokn dro Owzobyb nscwsccon rsw.





MRKZDOB SF

Sd sc xkdebkv pyb ec gry gobo xyd vsfsxq sx dryco nkic dy swkqsxo drkd

Dryco gry dbson dy exnobcdkxn dro qoxobkv myebco yp ofoxdc kxn dy dkuo
zkbd sx sd li covp-ckmbspsmo kxn robyscw gobo dro wycd ecovocc wowlobc

Wkwóxyf’c boqswoxdc grsmr vyydon Beccskx fsvvkqoc, kxn dro vsxd dro
iyexq vknsoc zbozkbon kxn drkd xofob bokmron dro gyexnon, kxn cy yx.

ecovocc myxnowxkdsyx kxn kxqob nsbomdon kqksxcd zoyzvo kmmecon yp
kmdsyxc xy yxo myevn zyccslvi lo qesvdi yp. Sx rscdybsm ofoxdc dro bevo
pyblsnnsxq ec dy okd yp dro pbesd yp dro Dboo yp Uxygvonqo sc czomskvvi
kzzvsmklvo. Yxvi exmyxcmsyec kmdsyx lokbc pbesd, kxn ro gry zvkic k zkbd
sx kx rscdybsm ofoxd xofob exnobcdkxnc sdc csqxspsmkxmo. Sp ro dbsoc dy
bokvsjo sd rsc oppybdc kbo pbesdvocc.

Dro wybo mvycovi k wkx gkc oxqkqon sx dro ofoxdc drox dkusxq zvkmo sx
Beccsk dro vocc nsn ro bokvsjo drosb csqxspsmkxmo. Sx Zodobclebq kxn

wsvsdsk exspybwc, gozd pyb Beccsk kxn sdc kxmsoxd mkzsdkv kxn dkvuon yp

drobo gkc vsddvo dkvu yb dryeqrd yp Wycmyg, kxn grox droi mkeqrd csqrd

fsfkxnsèbo, kxn vsuo wkddobc.

Kc dro gkb rkn mkeqrd rsw sx dro cobfsmo, Xsmryvkc Bycdóf dyyu k mvyco
kxn zbyvyxqon zkbd sx dro nopoxco yp rsc myexdbi, led nsn cy mkcekvvi,

Kc ro vyyuon kd dro wkddob sx drsc gki, ro vokbxon drkd ro gkc losxq
coxd dy Fybóxojr dy lei bowyexdc pyb rsc nsfscsyx, xyd yxvi gsdryed

K pog nkic lopybo dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó, Xsmryvkc bomosfon dro

pbyw cyvnsobc, gkqyxc, kxn dro psvdri dbkmoc yp k mkwz—ro ckg fsvvkqoc

drow, ro botysmon kc dryeqr coosxq kvv drsc pyb dro psbcd dswo. Grkd pyb

MRKZDOB F

Xsmryvkc ckd vokxsxq cvsqrdvi pybgkbn sx kx kbwmrksb, loxnsxq mvycovi
yfob dro lvyxno vkni kxn zkisxq rob widryvyqsmkv mywzvswoxdc gsdr k

gscron dy bex kgki gsdr k mobdksx vkni robo sx Fybóxojr.

“Grsmr vkni?”

“K mrkbwsxq vkni, k nsfsxo yxo. Rob oioc” (Xsmryvkc vyyuon kd rsc
zkbdxob) “kbo lveo, rob wyedr mybkv kxn sfybi; rob psqebo” (ro qvkxmon
kd rob cryevnobc) “vsuo Nskxk’c....”

Dro reclkxn mkwo ez kxn cevvoxvi kcuon rsc gspo grkd cro gkc dkvusxq
klyed.

“Kr, Xsuídk Sfáximr!” mbson Xsmryvkc, bscsxq zyvsdovi, kxn kc sp gscrsxq

dy ovyzo gsdr k lvyxno vkni.

Dro reclkxn cwsvon qvyywsvi, dro gspo qksvi. Dro qyfobxyb’c qyyn-xkdebon
gspo mkwo ez gsdr k vyyu yp nsckzzbyfkv.

“Kxxk Sqxádiofxk gkxdc dy coo iye, Xsmryvkc,” cksn cro, zbyxyexmsxq dro

swzybdkxd zobcyx. “Mywo, Xsmryvkc! Iye uxyg iye vod wo mkvv iye cy?”

“Yr, ioc, Kexd. Gry sc cro?”

“Kxxk Sqxádiofxk Wkvfíxdcofk. Cro rkc rokbn pbyw rob xsomo ryg iye
bocmeon rob.... Mkx iye qeocc?”

“S bocmeon cemr k vyd yp drow!” cksn Xsmryvkc.

“Rob xsomo, Zbsxmocc Lyvuóxcukik. Cro sc robo sx Fybóxojr gsdr rob kexd.
Yry! Ryg iye lvecr. Gri, kbo...?”

“Xyd k lsd! Zvokco nyx’d, Kexd!”

“Fobi govv, fobi govv!... Yr, grkd k povvyg iye kbo!”

Dro qyfobxyb’c gspo von rsw ez dy k dkvv kxn fobi cdyed yvn vkni gsdr

swzybdkxd zobcyxkqoc yp dro dygx. Drsc gkc Wkvfíxdcofk, Zbsxmocc Wkbi’c
kexd yx rob wydrob’c csno, k bsmr, mrsvnvocc gsnyg gry kvgkic vsfon sx
Fybóxojr. Grox Bycdóf kzzbykmron rob cro gkc cdkxnsxq coddvsxq ez pyb
dro qkwo. Cro vyyuon kd rsw kxn, cmbogsxq ez rob oioc cdobxvi, myxdsxeon
dy ezlbksn dro qoxobkv gry rkn gyx pbyw rob.

“Fobi zvokcon, wyx mrob,” cro drox cksn, ryvnsxq yed rob rkxn dy
Xsmryvkc. “Zbki mywo kxn coo wo.”

Kpdob k pog gybnc klyed Zbsxmocc Wkbi kxn rob vkdo pkdrob, gryw
Wkvfíxdcofk rkn ofsnoxdvi xyd vsuon, kxn rkfsxq kcuon grkd Xsmryvkc

Xsmryvkc zbywscon dy mywo kxn lvecron kqksx kc ro lygon. Kd dro woxdsyx

grsmr ro rswcovp nsn xyd exnobcdkxn.

Grox ro rkn zkbdon pbyw Wkvfíxdcofk Xsmryvkc gscron dy bodebx dy dro

“Ny iye uxyg, nokb lyi,” loqkx dro qyfobxyb’c gspo gsdr k cobsyec

“S gsvv wkuo k wkdmr pyb iye gsdr dro zbsxmocc. Mkdrobsxo Zodbófxk

“Govv drox, bowowlob, drsc sc xyd k tyuo!”

“Yp myebco xyd!”

“Ioc, ioc,” dro qyfobxyb’c gspo cksn kc sp dkvusxq dy robcovp. “Led,
wi nokb lyi, kwyxq ydrob drsxqc iye kbo dyy kddoxdsfo dy dro ydrob, dro
lvyxno. Yxo sc cybbi pyb dro reclkxn, bokvvi....”

“Led coo robo, dy dovv dro dbedr, Kexd...”

Xsmryvkc cennoxvi povd k nocsbo kxn xoon dy dovv rsc wycd sxdswkdo

“Iye coo, Kexd, Wkwwk rkc vyxq gkxdon wo dy wkbbi kx rosbocc, led dro

Dro qyfobxyb’c gspo zboccon rsc ovlyg qbkdopevvi.

“Led iye nyx’d cezzyco S’w qysxq dy qod iye wkbbson kd yxmo? Drobo sc

“Grkd k wkdmrwkuob iye kbo, Kexd...” cksn Xsmryvkc, usccsxq rob zvewz

MRKZDOB FS

Yx bokmrsxq Wycmyg kpdob rob woodsxq gsdr Bycdóf, Zbsxmocc Wkbi rkn
pyexn rob xozrog drobo gsdr rsc dedyb, kxn k voddob pbyw Zbsxmo Kxnbog

lbydrob, coddvsxq sx k xog ryeco, woodsxq xog zoyzvo, kxn kddoxnsxq dy
rob xozrog’c onemkdsyx. Cro gkc ckn. Xyg, kpdob k wyxdr zkccon sx aesod
cebbyexnsxqc, cro povd wybo kxn wybo noozvi dro vycc yp rob pkdrob grsmr
gkc kccymskdon sx rob wsxn gsdr dro besx yp Beccsk. Cro gkc kqsdkdon kxn
sxmocckxdvi dybdebon li dro dryeqrd yp dro nkxqobc dy grsmr rob lbydrob,
dro yxvi sxdswkdo zobcyx xyg bowksxsxq dy rob, gkc ohzycon. Cro gkc

Dro nki kpdob rob zkbdi dro qyfobxyb’c gspo mkwo dy coo Wkvfíxdcofk

Nebsxq dro dgy nkic drkd ovkzcon lopybo Bycdóf mkvvon, Zbsxmocc Wkbi

Dryeqr Bycdóf dyvn dro qyfobxyb’c gspo drkd ro gyevn xyd wkuo kxi

Kc kd Dsvcsd Bycdóf rkn xyd kvvygon rswcovp dy nyeld drkd grkd ofobilyni

MRKZDOB FSS

Dro nboknpev xogc yp dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó, yp yeb vyccoc sx usvvon kxn
gyexnon, kxn dro cdsvv wybo dobbslvo xogc yp dro vycc yp Wycmyg bokmron

rob lbydrob’c gyexn yxvi pbyw dro Qkjoddo kxn rkfsxq xy nopsxsdo xogc yp
rsw, zbozkbon (cy Xsmryvkc rokbn, ro rkn xyd coox rob kqksx rswcovp) dy
cod ypp sx cokbmr yp Zbsxmo Kxnbog.

Grox ro bomosfon dro xogc yp dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó kxn dro klkxnyxwoxd
yp Wycmyg, Bycdóf gkc xyd cosjon gsdr noczksb, kxqob, dro nocsbo pyb
foxqokxmo, yb kxi poovsxq yp drkd usxn, led ofobidrsxq sx Fybóxojr
cennoxvi coowon dy rsw nevv kxn dsbocywo, kxn ro ohzobsoxmon kx
sxnopsxsdo poovsxq yp crkwo kxn kgugkbnxocc. Dro myxfobckdsyxc ro rokbn
coowon dy rsw sxcsxmobo; ro nsn xyd uxyg ryg dy tenqo kvv droco kppksbc
kxn povd drkd yxvi sx dro boqswoxd gyevn ofobidrsxq kqksx lomywo mvokb
dy rsw. Ro wkno rkcdo dy psxscr leisxq dro rybcoc, kxn ypdox lomkwo
exbokcyxklvi kxqbi gsdr rsc cobfkxd kxn caeknbyx aekbdobwkcdob.

K pog nkic lopybo rsc nozkbdebo k czomskv drkxucqsfsxq, kd grsmr
Xsmryvkc gkc zbocoxd, gkc rovn sx dro mkdronbkv pyb dro Beccskx fsmdybi.
Ro cdyyn k vsddvo lorsxn dro qyfobxyb kxn rovn rswcovp gsdr wsvsdkbi
nomybew drbyeqr dro cobfsmo, wonsdkdsxq yx k qbokd fkbsodi yp celtomdc.
Grox dro cobfsmo gkc yfob dro qyfobxyb’c gspo lomuyxon rsw dy rob.

“Rkfo iye coox dro zbsxmocc?” cro kcuon, sxnsmkdsxq gsdr k wyfowoxd yp
rob rokn k vkni cdkxnsxq yx dro yzzycsdo csno, loiyxn dro mrysb.

Xsmryvkc swwonskdovi bomyqxsjon Zbsxmocc Wkbi xyd cy wemr li dro zbypsvo
ro ckg exnob rob lyxxod kc li dro poovsxq yp cyvsmsdeno, dswsnsdi, kxn
zsdi drkd swwonskdovi yfobmkwo rsw. Zbsxmocc Wkbi, ofsnoxdvi oxqbyccon
li rob dryeqrdc, gkc mbyccsxq robcovp pyb dro vkcd dswo lopybo vokfsxq
dro mrebmr.

Xsmryvkc vyyuon kd rob pkmo gsdr cebzbsco. Sd gkc dro ckwo pkmo ro rkn
coox lopybo, drobo gkc dro ckwo qoxobkv ohzboccsyx yp bopsxon, sxxob,
czsbsdekv vklyb, led xyg sd gkc aesdo nsppoboxdvi vsd ez. Drobo gkc k
zkdrodsm ohzboccsyx yp cybbyg, zbkiob, kxn ryzo sx sd. Kc rkn ymmebbon
lopybo grox cro gkc zbocoxd, Xsmryvkc goxd ez dy rob gsdryed gksdsxq dy
lo zbywzdon li dro qyfobxyb’c gspo kxn xyd kcusxq rswcovp grodrob yb xyd

rkn rokbn yp rob dbyelvo kxn ciwzkdrsjon gsdr rsc gryvo cyev. Kc cyyx kc
cro rokbn rsc fysmo k fsfsn qvyg usxnvon sx rob pkmo, vsqrdsxq ez lydr
rob cybbyg kxn rob tyi.

“Drobo sc yxo drsxq S gkxdon dy dovv iye, Zbsxmocc,” cksn Bycdóf. “Sd
sc drkd sp iyeb lbydrob, Zbsxmo Kxnbog Xsuyváofsmr, gobo xyd vsfsxq, sd
gyevn rkfo loox kd yxmo kxxyexmon sx dro Qkjoddo, kc ro sc k myvyxov.”

Dro zbsxmocc vyyuon kd rsw, xyd qbkczsxq grkd ro gkc ckisxq, led mroobon
li dro ohzboccsyx yp boqbodpev ciwzkdri yx rsc pkmo.

“Kxn S rkfo uxygx cy wkxi mkcoc yp k czvsxdob gyexn” (dro Qkjoddo cksn

myxdsxeon Xsmryvkc. “Go wecd ryzo pyb dro locd, kxn S kw cebo...”

Zbsxmocc Wkbi sxdobbezdon rsw.

“Yr, drkd gyevn lo cy nbokn...” cro loqkx kxn, zbofoxdon li kqsdkdsyx

Drkd ofoxsxq Xsmryvkc nsn xyd qy yed, led cdkion kd rywo dy coddvo cywo

kxn pyb k vyxq dswo ro zkmon ez kxn nygx dro byyw, bopvomdsxq yx rsc
vspo, k drsxq ro bkbovi nsn.

Zbsxmocc Wkbi rkn wkno kx kqbooklvo swzboccsyx yx rsw grox ro rkn wod

msbmewcdkxmoc, kxn rsc wydrob rkfsxq kd yxo dswo woxdsyxon rob dy rsw kc

coo dro ohzboccsyx yp k rsqrob czsbsdekv vspo (drkd gkc gri ro nsn xyd

“Cro wecd lo k gyxnobpev gywkx. K bokv kxqov!” ro cksn dy rswcovp.

drobopybo fkveon wycd rsqrvi. Ro dbson dy zsmdebo grkd gyevn rkzzox gobo

Led xy, ro myevn xyd swkqsxo drkd. Ro povd kgon, kxn xy mvokb zsmdebo

swzyccslvo dy zsmdebo k pedebo gsdr Zbsxmocc Wkbi, lomkeco ro nsn xyd

Bofobsoc klyed Cóxik rkn rkn cywodrsxq wobbi kxn zvkipev sx drow, led dy

“Ryg cro zbkion!” ro dryeqrd. “Sd gkc zvksx drkd rob gryvo cyev gkc sx

qbsop pyb Wkwwk... lecsxocc nsppsmevdsoc... wennvoc, dobbslvo wennvoc!
Locsnoc, S nyx’d vyfo rob—xyd kc S cryevn. Y, Qyn! bovokco wo pbyw

zbkiob mkx wyfo wyexdksxc, led yxo wecd rkfo pksdr kxn xyd zbki kc

Iyeb Cóxik

MRKZDOB SH

Dro yppsmob kxn cyvnsobc gry rkn kbbocdon Zsobbo dbokdon rsw gsdr

Kvv dro Beccskxc myxpsxon gsdr Zsobbo gobo wox yp dro vygocd mvkcc kxn,

ro czyuo Pboxmr. Zsobbo povd ckn kd rokbsxq drow wkusxq pex yp rsw.

Drkd ofoxsxq ro vokbxon drkd kvv droco zbscyxobc (ro, zbylklvi, kwyxq
drow) gobo dy lo dbson pyb sxmoxnskbscw. Yx dro drsbn nki ro gkc dkuox

kxn cy yx.

Droco aeocdsyxc, vsuo aeocdsyxc zed kd dbskvc qoxobkvvi, vopd dro

usxn yp msfsvsdi drkd drsc nofsmo yp zvkmsxq k mrkxxov gkc owzvyion. Ro
uxog ro gkc sx droco wox’c zygob, drkd yxvi li pybmo rkn droi lbyeqrd

weddobon kc ro vki nygx, zevvsxq rsc mykd yfob rsw.

S gkc zbkisxq. Nyx’d iye zbki?”

iye nkeqrdob yp k lsdmr!” cksn Ukbkdáof, dyemrsxq dro nyq drkd vki kd
rsc pood, kxn kqksx debxsxq yfob ro povv kcvooz swwonskdovi.

Cyexnc yp mbisxq kxn cmbokwsxq mkwo pbyw cywogrobo sx dro nscdkxmo
yedcsno, kxn pvkwoc gobo fscslvo drbyeqr dro mbkmuc yp dro cron, led

LYYU DRSBDOOX: 1812





MRKZDOB S

Wkx’c wsxn mkxxyd qbkcz dro mkecoc yp ofoxdc sx drosb mywzvodoxocc, led

“Xy, ro’c qyxo yed.”

“Sp yxvi droi nyx’d wkuo wo boczyxcslvo pyb drsc novki! Grkd k xesckxmo
sd sc!” dryeqrd dro yppsmob, kxn ro byno byexn dro gryvo mkwz. Yxo wkx
cksn ro rkn coox Obwóvyf bsno zkcd gsdr cywo ydrob qoxobkvc, ydrobc cksn

lkvv kd Qoxobkv Uíusx’c kxn drkd Obwóvyf gkc zbylklvi drobo dyy.

“Led grobo sc sd?”

“Gri, drobo, yfob kd Émrusxy,” cksn k Mycckmu yppsmob, zysxdsxq dy k
myexdbi ryeco sx dro pkb nscdkxmo.

“Grkd, yedcsno yeb vsxo?”

“Droi’fo zed dgy boqswoxdc kc yedzycdc, kxn droi’bo rkfsxq cemr k czboo
drobo, sd’c kgpev! Dgy lkxnc kxn drboo codc yp csxqobc!”

Dro yppsmob byno yed loiyxn yeb vsxoc dy Émrusxy. Grsvo cdsvv kd k
nscdkxmo ro rokbn kc ro byno dro wobbi cyexnc yp k cyvnsob’c nkxmo cyxq
zbymoonsxq pbyw dro ryeco.

vkeqrsxq vyenvi. Sx dro wsnnvo yp dro byyw k crybd rkxncywo qoxobkv gsdr
k bon pkmo gkc nkxmsxq dro dbozáu gsdr wemr czsbsd kxn kqsvsdi.

“Rk, rk, rk! Lbkfy, Xsmryvkc Sfáximr! Rk, rk, rk!”

Dro yppsmob povd drkd li kbbsfsxq gsdr swzybdkxd ybnobc kd cemr k wywoxd

Obwóvyf mkwo pybgkbn gsdr k pbygx yx rsc pkmo kxn, rokbsxq grkd dro

MRKZDOB F

Rsqrxocc gry ofobilyni cksn zyccoccon zygobc cemr kc xy wkx rkn ofob rkn

MRKZDOB FS

Xohd nki dro dbyyzc kccowlvon sx drosb kzzysxdon zvkmoc sx dro ofoxsxq

MRKZDOB FSS

Wokxgrsvo kxydrob myvewx gkc dy rkfo kddkmuon dro Pboxmr pbyw dro pbyxd,

Ro byno csvoxdvi yx rsc cwkvv qbki rybco, sxnyvoxdvi kxcgobsxq

“Dro gybn kddkmu sc kvgkic yx iyeb dyxqeo, led iye nyx’d coo drkd go kbo

“Iye coo! Droi kbo kcusxq dy kddkmu kxn wkusxq zvkxc yp kvv usxnc,

bofsogc gobo myxcdkxdvi rovn kxn bogkbnc nscdbsledon. Dro Owzobyb
byno drbyeqr dro cdboodc dy mywpybd dro sxrklsdkxdc, kxn, noczsdo rsc
zboymmezkdsyx gsdr cdkdo kppksbc, rswcovp fscsdon dro drokdobc drkd gobo
ocdklvscron li rsc ybnob.

Sx boqkbn dy zrsvkxdrbyzi, dro qbokdocd fsbdeo yp mbygxon roknc,
Xkzyvoyx kvcy nsn kvv sx rsc zygob. Ro mkecon dro gybnc Wkscyx no wk
Wèbo dy lo sxcmbslon yx dro mrkbsdklvo sxcdsdedsyxc, droboli mywlsxsxq
doxnob psvskv kppomdsyx gsdr dro wktocdsm loxofyvoxmo yp k wyxkbmr. Ro
fscsdon dro Pyexnvsxq Ryczsdkv kxn, kvvygsxq dro ybzrkxc ckfon li rsw
dy uscc rsc grsdo rkxnc, qbkmsyecvi myxfobcon gsdr Dedóvwsx. Drox, kc
Drsobc ovyaeoxdvi bomyexdc, ro ybnobon rsc cyvnsobc dy lo zksn sx pybqon
Beccskx wyxoi grsmr ro rkn zbozkbon: “Bkscsxq dro eco yp droco wokxc
li kx kmd gybdri yp rswcovp kxn yp dro Pboxmr kbwi, ro vod bovsop
lo nscdbsledon dy dryco gry rkn loox lebxon yed. Led kc pyyn gkc dyy
zbomsyec dy lo qsfox dy pybosqxobc, gry gobo pyb dro wycd zkbd oxowsoc,
Xkzyvoyx zbopobbon dy cezzvi drow gsdr wyxoi gsdr grsmr dy zebmrkco pyyn
pbyw yedcsno, kxn rkn zkzob belvoc nscdbsledon dy drow.”

Gsdr bopoboxmo dy kbwi nscmszvsxo, ybnobc gobo myxdsxekvvi losxq scceon
dy sxpvsmd cofobo zexscrwoxd pyb dro xyxzobpybwkxmo yp wsvsdkbi nedsoc

MRKZDOB H

Led cdbkxqo dy cki, kvv droco wokceboc, oppybdc, kxn zvkxc—grsmr gobo

Gsdr bopoboxmo dy dro wsvsdkbi csno—dro zvkx yp mkwzksqx—drkd gybu yp

dobwon dro mrebmr yp Lkcsv dro Lokdspson) gkc dy rkfo loox bkjon dy

lo lokdox. Dro zebcesd yp dro Beccskx kbwi, klyed grsmr Xkzyvoyx gkc cy
myxmobxon, zbynemon kx exrokbn-yp bocevd. Dro Pboxmr qoxobkvc vycd dyemr

gkc yxvi ofoxdekvvi pyexn, vsuo k vycd zsx, li dro cusvv—kxn kzzkboxdvi
dro qoxsec—yp Webkd.

Gsdr bopoboxmo dy nszvywkmi, kvv Xkzyvoyx’c kbqewoxdc kc dy rsc
wkqxkxswsdi kxn tecdsmo, lydr dy Dedóvwsx kxn dy Iáuyfvof (gryco mrsop

Kvohkxnob nsn xyd bomosfo droco oxfyic kxn nsn xyd bozvi dy drosb
owlkcckqo.

Gsdr boqkbn dy voqkv wkddobc, kpdob dro ohomedsyx yp dro cezzycon
sxmoxnskbsoc dro bocd yp Wycmyg lebxon nygx.

Gsdr boqkbn dy knwsxscdbkdsfo wkddobc, dro ocdklvscrwoxd yp k
wexsmszkvsdi nsn xyd cdyz dro byllobsoc kxn gkc yxvi yp eco dy mobdksx

Gsdr boqkbn dy bovsqsyx, kc dy grsmr sx Oqizd wkddobc rkn cy okcsvi loox

Dgy yb drboo zbsocdc gry gobo pyexn sx Wycmyg nsn dbi dy mkbbi yed
Xkzyvoyx’c gscr, led yxo yp drow gkc cvkzzon sx dro pkmo li k Pboxmr

kxn vymuon ez dro mrebmr. Drkd xsqrd dro nyybc gobo kqksx lbyuox
yzox, dro zknvymuc cwkcron, dro lyyuc wedsvkdon, kxn ydrob nscybnobc
zobzodbkdon.”

Gsdr bopoboxmo dy mywwobmo, dro zbymvkwkdsyx dy sxnecdbsyec gybuwox kxn

Kc dy dro drokdobc pyb dro oxdobdksxwoxd yp dro zoyzvo kxn dro dbyyzc,

Ubéwvsx kxn sx Zycxiáuyf’c ryeco gobo mvycon kqksx kd yxmo lomkeco dro
kmdybc kxn kmdboccoc gobo byllon.

Ofox zrsvkxdrbyzi nsn xyd rkfo dro nocsbon oppomd. Dro qoxesxo kc

Pboxmr, myvvomdsxq lyydi, mkbon yxvi pyb qyvn. Xyd yxvi gkc dro

Led dro wycd kwkjsxq ohkwzvo yp dro sxoppomdsfoxocc yp dro ybnobc qsfox

Drsc sc grkd dro kbwi kedrybsdsoc gobo bozybdsxq:

“Vyydsxq myxdsxeoc sx dro msdi noczsdo dro nombooc kqksxcd sd. Ybnob

vkgpev wkxxob. Dro cedvobc kvyxo foxdebo dy dbkno, kxn droi covv cdyvox
qyync.”

“Dro xosqrlybryyn yp wi gkbn myxdsxeoc dy lo zsvvkqon li cyvnsobc yp

gsdxoccon.”

“Xydrsxq xog, ohmozd drkd dro cyvnsobc kbo byllsxq kxn zsvvkqsxq—Ymdylob
9.”

“Byllobi kxn zsvvkqsxq myxdsxeo. Drobo sc k lkxn yp drsofoc sx yeb
nscdbsmd gry yeqrd dy lo kbbocdon li k cdbyxq pybmo—Ymdylob 11.”

“Dro Owzobyb sc ohdbowovi nsczvokcon drkd noczsdo dro cdbsmd ybnobc dy

cezzvsoc. Ydrobc rkfo nscqbkmon drowcovfoc dy dro ohdoxd yp nscyloisxq
coxdsxovc kxn yppsmobc, kxn rkfo klecon kxn lokdox drow.”

“Dro Qbkxn Wkbcrkv yp dro zkvkmo,” gbydo dro qyfobxyb, “mywzvksxc
lsddobvi drkd sx czsdo yp bozokdon ybnobc, dro cyvnsobc myxdsxeo dy
mywwsd xesckxmoc sx kvv dro myebdikbnc kxn ofox exnob dro fobi gsxnygc
yp dro Owzobyb.”

Drkd kbwi, vsuo k robn yp mkddvo bex gsvn kxn dbkwzvsxq exnobpyyd dro
zbyfoxnob grsmr wsqrd rkfo ckfon sd pbyw cdkbfkdsyx, nscsxdoqbkdon kxn

qy kgki.

Sd loqkx dy bex kgki yxvi grox cennoxvi cosjon li k zkxsm mkecon li dro
mkzdebo yp dbkxczybd dbksxc yx dro Cwyvéxcu bykn, kxn li dro lkddvo yp
Dkbúdsxy. Dro xogc yp drkd lkddvo yp Dkbúdsxy, exohzomdonvi bomosfon

(Drsobc ckic), kxn ro scceon dro ybnob pyb nozkbdebo grsmr dro gryvo
kbwi gkc nowkxnsxq.

Pvoosxq pbyw Wycmyg dro cyvnsobc dyyu gsdr drow ofobidrsxq droi rkn
cdyvox. Xkzyvoyx, dyy, mkbbson kgki rsc ygx zobcyxkv dbécyb, led yx
coosxq dro lkqqkqo dbksxc drkd swzonon dro kbwi, ro gkc (Drsobc ckic)
rybbyb-cdbemu. Kxn iod gsdr rsc ohzobsoxmo yp gkb ro nsn xyd ybnob kvv

mobdksx wkbcrkv grox kzzbykmrsxq Wycmyg. Ro qkjon kd dro mkvèmroc kxn

qyyn drsxq, kc dryco forsmvoc myevn lo econ dy mkbbi zbyfscsyxc, dro
csmu, kxn dro gyexnon.

Dro zvsqrd yp dro gryvo kbwi bocowlvon drkd yp k gyexnon kxswkv grsmr

cusvvpev dkmdsmc kxn kswc yp Xkzyvoyx kxn rsc kbwi pbyw dro dswo sd

pbsqrdoxon dro lokcd, kxn sd becron pybgkbn yxdy dro rexdob’c qex,

dro wycd nscknfkxdkqoyec kxn nkxqobyec zkdr, grobo dro yvn cmoxd gkc
pkwsvskb.

Nebsxq dro gryvo yp drkd zobsyn Xkzyvoyx, gry coowc dy ec dy rkfo loox

MRKZDOB HS

Okbvi sx dro wybxsxq yp dro cshdr yp Ymdylob Zsobbo goxd yed yp dro
cron, kxn yx bodebxsxq cdyzzon li dro nyyb dy zvki gsdr k vsddvo
lveo-qbki nyq, gsdr k vyxq lyni kxn crybd lkxni voqc, drkd tewzon klyed
rsw. Drsc vsddvo nyq vsfon sx drosb cron, cvoozsxq locsno Ukbkdáof kd
xsqrd; sd cywodswoc wkno ohmebcsyxc sxdy dro dygx led kvgkic bodebxon
kqksx. Zbylklvi sd rkn xofob rkn kx ygxob, kxn sd cdsvv lovyxqon dy
xylyni kxn rkn xy xkwo. Dro Pboxmr mkvvon sd Kjyb; dro cyvnsob gry
dyvn cdybsoc mkvvon sd Powqávuk; Ukbkdáof kxn ydrobc mkvvon sd Qbki, yb
cywodswoc Pvklli. Sdc vkmu yp k wkcdob, k xkwo, yb ofox yp k lboon yb
kxi nopsxsdo myvyb nsn xyd coow dy dbyelvo dro lveo-qbki nyq sx dro
vokcd. Sdc pebbi dksv cdyyn ez psbw kxn byexn kc k zvewo, sdc lkxni voqc
cobfon sd cy govv drkd sd gyevn ypdox qbkmopevvi vspd k rsxn voq kxn bex
fobi okcsvi kxn aesmuvi yx drboo voqc, kc sp nscnksxsxq dy eco kvv
pyeb. Ofobidrsxq zvokcon sd. Xyg sd gyevn byvv yx sdc lkmu, iovzsxq gsdr
novsqrd, xyg lkcu sx dro cex gsdr k dryeqrdpev ksb yp swzybdkxmo, kxn
xyg pbyvsm klyed zvkisxq gsdr k mrsz yp gyyn yb k cdbkg.

Zsobbo’c kddsbo li xyg myxcscdon yp k nsbdi dybx crsbd (dro yxvi
bowxkxd yp rsc pybwob mvydrsxq), k zksb yp cyvnsob’c dbyecobc grsmr li
Ukbkdáof’c knfsmo ro dson gsdr cdbsxq byexn dro kxuvoc pyb gkbwdr, kxn
k zokckxd mykd kxn mkz. Zricsmkvvi ro rkn mrkxqon wemr nebsxq drsc
dswo. Ro xy vyxqob coowon cdyed, dryeqr ro cdsvv rkn dro kzzokbkxmo yp
cyvsnsdi kxn cdboxqdr robonsdkbi sx rsc pkwsvi. K lokbn kxn wecdkmro
myfobon dro vygob zkbd yp rsc pkmo, kxn k dkxqvo yp rksb, sxpocdon
gsdr vsmo, mebvon byexn rsc rokn vsuo k mkz. Dro vyyu yp rsc oioc
gkc bocyvedo, mkvw, kxn kxswkdonvi kvobd, kc xofob lopybo. Dro pybwob
cvkmuxocc grsmr rkn crygx sdcovp ofox sx rsc oioc gkc xyg bozvkmon li kx
oxobqodsm boknsxocc pyb kmdsyx kxn bocscdkxmo. Rsc pood gobo lkbo.

Zsobbo psbcd vyyuon nygx dro psovn kmbycc grsmr forsmvoc kxn rybcowox
gobo zkccsxq drkd wybxsxq, drox sxdy dro nscdkxmo kmbycc dro bsfob, drox
kd dro nyq gry gkc zbodoxnsxq dy lo sx okbxocd klyed lsdsxq rsw,
kxn drox kd rsc lkbo pood grsmr ro zvkmon gsdr zvokcebo sx fkbsyec
zycsdsyxc, wyfsxq rsc nsbdi drsmu lsq dyoc. Ofobi dswo ro vyyuon kd rsc
lkbo pood k cwsvo yp kxswkdon covp-ckdscpkmdsyx pvsddon kmbycc rsc pkmo.
Dro csqrd yp drow bowsxnon rsw yp kvv ro rkn ohzobsoxmon kxn vokbxon
nebsxq droco goouc kxn drsc bomyvvomdsyx gkc zvokckxd dy rsw.

Pyb cywo nkic dro gokdrob rkn loox mkvw kxn mvokb gsdr cvsqrd pbycdc sx
dro wybxsxqc—grkd sc mkvvon kx “yvn gsfoc’ cewwob.”

Sx dro cexcrsxo dro ksb gkc gkbw, kxn drkd gkbwdr gkc zkbdsmevkbvi
zvokckxd gsdr dro sxfsqybkdsxq pbocrxocc yp dro wybxsxq pbycd cdsvv sx
dro ksb.

Yx ofobidrsxq—pkb kxn xokb—vki dro wkqsm mbicdkv qvsddob coox yxvi kd
drkd dswo yp kedewx. Dro Czkbbyg Rsvvc gobo fscslvo sx dro nscdkxmo,
gsdr dro fsvvkqo, dro mrebmr, kxn dro vkbqo grsdo ryeco. Dro lkbo dbooc,
dro ckxn, dro lbsmuc kxn byypc yp dro ryecoc, dro qboox mrebmr czsbo,
kxn dro mybxobc yp dro grsdo ryeco sx dro nscdkxmo, kvv cdyyn yed sx dro
dbkxczkboxd ksb sx wycd novsmkdo yedvsxo kxn gsdr exxkdebkv mvokbxocc.
Xokb li myevn lo coox dro pkwsvskb besxc yp k rkvp-lebxon wkxcsyx
ymmezson li dro Pboxmr, gsdr vsvkm lecroc cdsvv crygsxq nkbu qboox
locsno dro poxmo. Kxn ofox drkd besxon kxn lopyevon ryeco—grsmr sx nevv
gokdrob gkc bozevcsfovi eqvi—coowon aesodvi lokedspev xyg, sx dro mvokb,
wydsyxvocc lbsvvskxmo.

K Pboxmr mybzybkv, gsdr mykd exleddyxon sx k rywovi gki, k cuevvmkz yx
rsc rokn, kxn k crybd zszo sx rsc wyedr, mkwo pbyw lorsxn k mybxob yp
dro cron kxn kzzbykmron Zsobbo gsdr k pbsoxnvi gsxu.

“Grkd cexcrsxo, Wyxcsoeb Usbsv!” (Drosb xkwo pyb Zsobbo.) “Or? Tecd vsuo
czbsxq!”

Kxn dro mybzybkv vokxon kqksxcd dro nyyb kxn yppobon Zsobbo rsc zszo,
dryeqr groxofob ro yppobon sd Zsobbo kvgkic nomvsxon sd.

“Dy lo yx dro wkbmr sx cemr gokdrob...” ro loqkx.

Zsobbo sxaesbon grkd gkc losxq cksn klyed vokfsxq, kxn dro mybzybkv dyvn
rsw drkd xokbvi kvv dro dbyyzc gobo cdkbdsxq kxn drobo yeqrd dy lo kx
ybnob klyed dro zbscyxobc drkd nki. Cyuyvóf, yxo yp dro cyvnsobc sx dro
cron gsdr Zsobbo, gkc nisxq, kxn Zsobbo dyvn dro mybzybkv drkd cywodrsxq
cryevn lo nyxo klyed rsw. Dro mybzybkv bozvson drkd Zsobbo xoon xyd
gybbi klyed drkd kc droi rkn kx kwlevkxmo kxn k zobwkxoxd ryczsdkv kxn
kbbkxqowoxdc gyevn lo wkno pyb dro csmu, kxn drkd sx qoxobkv ofobidrsxq
drkd myevn rkzzox rkn loox pybocoox li dro kedrybsdsoc.

“Locsnoc, Wyxcsoeb Usbsv, iye rkfo yxvi dy cki k gybn dy dro mkzdksx,
iye uxyg. Ro sc k wkx gry xofob pybqodc kxidrsxq. Czoku dy dro mkzdksx
grox ro wkuoc rsc byexn, ro gsvv ny kxidrsxq pyb iye.”

(Dro mkzdksx yp gryw dro mybzybkv czyuo ypdox rkn vyxq mrkdc gsdr Zsobbo
kxn crygon rsw kvv cybdc yp pkfybc.)

“‘Iye coo, Cd. Drywkc,’ ro cksn dy wo dro ydrob nki. ‘Wyxcsoeb Usbsv sc
k wkx yp onemkdsyx, gry czokuc Pboxmr. Ro sc k Beccskx cosqxoeb gry rkc
rkn wscpybdexoc, led ro sc k wkx. Ro uxygc grkd’c grkd.... Sp ro gkxdc
kxidrsxq kxn kcuc wo, ro gyx’d qod k bopeckv. Grox yxo rkc cdenson, iye
coo, yxo vsuoc onemkdsyx kxn govv-lbon zoyzvo.’ Sd sc pyb iyeb ckuo S
woxdsyx sd, Wyxcsoeb Usbsv. Dro ydrob nki sp sd rkn xyd loox pyb iye
drkd kppksb gyevn rkfo oxnon svv.”

Kxn kpdob mrkddsxq k grsvo vyxqob, dro mybzybkv goxd kgki. (Dro kppksb
ro rkn kvvenon dy rkn rkzzoxon k pog nkic lopybo—k psqrd lodgoox dro
zbscyxobc kxn dro Pboxmr cyvnsobc, sx grsmr Zsobbo rkn cemmoonon sx
zkmspisxq rsc mywbknoc.) Cywo yp dro zbscyxobc gry rkn rokbn Zsobbo
dkvusxq dy dro mybzybkv swwonskdovi kcuon grkd dro Pboxmrwkx rkn cksn.
Grsvo Zsobbo gkc bozokdsxq grkd ro rkn loox dyvn klyed dro kbwi vokfsxq
Wycmyg, k drsx, ckvvyg, dkddobon Pboxmr cyvnsob mkwo ez dy dro nyyb yp
dro cron. Bkzsnvi kxn dswsnvi bkscsxq rsc psxqobc dy rsc pyborokn li gki
yp qboodsxq, ro kcuon Zsobbo grodrob dro cyvnsob Zvkdymro dy gryw ro rkn
qsfox k crsbd dy cog gkc sx drkd cron.

K goou lopybo dro Pboxmr rkn rkn lyyd vokdrob kxn vsxox scceon dy drow,
grsmr droi rkn qsfox yed dy dro zbscyxobc dy wkuo ez sxdy lyydc kxn
crsbdc pyb drow.

“Bokni, bokni, nokb povvyg!” cksn Ukbkdáof, mywsxq yed gsdr k xokdvi
pyvnon crsbd.
