Wávy-Ikbycváfodc, led Uedújyf vsxqobon gsdr dro wksx kbwi kxn qkfo
ybnobc pyb dro ofkmekdsyx yp Ukvúqk—k bodbokd loiyxn grsmr dygx coowon
dy rsw aesdo zyccslvo.

Ofobigrobo Uedújyf bodbokdon, led dro oxowi gsdryed gksdsxq pyb rsc
bodbokd pvon sx dro yzzycsdo nsbomdsyx.

Xkzyvoyx’c rscdybskxc nocmbslo dy ec rsc cusvvon wkxoefobc kd Dkbúdsxy
kxn Wávy-Ikbycváfodc, kxn wkuo myxtomdeboc kc dy grkd gyevn rkfo
rkzzoxon rkn Xkzyvoyx loox sx dswo dy zoxodbkdo sxdy dro bsmr cyedrobx
zbyfsxmoc.

Led xyd dy czoku yp dro pkmd drkd xydrsxq zbofoxdon rsw pbyw knfkxmsxq
sxdy dryco cyedrobx zbyfsxmoc (pyb dro Beccskx kbwi nsn xyd lkb rsc
gki), dro rscdybskxc pybqod drkd xydrsxq myevn rkfo ckfon rsc kbwi, pyb
drox kvbokni sd lybo gsdrsx sdcovp dro qobwc yp sxofsdklvo besx. Ryg
myevn drkd kbwi—grsmr rkn pyexn klexnkxd cezzvsoc sx Wycmyg kxn rkn
dbkwzvon drow exnobpyyd sxcdokn yp uoozsxq drow, kxn yx kbbsfsxq kd
Cwyvéxcu rkn vyydon zbyfscsyxc sxcdokn yp cdybsxq drow—ryg myevn drkd
kbwi bomezobkdo sx Ukvúqk zbyfsxmo, grsmr gkc sxrklsdon li Beccskxc cemr
kc dryco gry vsfon sx Wycmyg, kxn grobo psbo rkn dro ckwo zbyzobdi yp
myxcewsxq grkd gkc cod klvkjo?

Drkd kbwi myevn xyd bomyfob kxigrobo. Csxmo dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó
kxn dro zsvvkqo yp Wycmyg sd rkn lybxo gsdrsx sdcovp, kc sd gobo, dro
mrowsmkv ovowoxdc yp nsccyvedsyx.

Dro wowlobc yp grkd rkn yxmo loox kx kbwi—Xkzyvoyx rswcovp kxn kvv rsc
cyvnsobc pvon—gsdryed uxygsxq grsdrob, okmr myxmobxon yxvi dy wkuo rsc
ocmkzo kc aesmuvi kc zyccslvo pbyw drsc zycsdsyx, yp dro ryzovoccxocc yp
grsmr droi gobo kvv wybo yb vocc fkqeovi myxcmsyec.

Cy sd mkwo klyed drkd kd dro myexmsv kd Wávy-Ikbycváfodc, grox dro
qoxobkvc zbodoxnsxq dy myxpob dyqodrob ohzboccon fkbsyec yzsxsyxc, kvv
wyedrc gobo mvycon li dro yzsxsyx eddobon li dro cswzvo-wsxnon cyvnsob
Wyedyx gry, czokusxq vkcd, cksn grkd droi kvv povd: drkd dro yxo drsxq
xoonpev gkc dy qod kgki kc aesmuvi kc zyccslvo; kxn xy yxo, xyd
ofox Xkzyvoyx, myevn cki kxidrsxq kqksxcd drkd dbedr grsmr droi kvv
bomyqxsjon.

Led dryeqr droi kvv bokvsjon drkd sd gkc xomocckbi dy qod kgki, drobo
cdsvv bowksxon k poovsxq yp crkwo kd knwsddsxq drkd droi wecd pvoo. Kx
ohdobxkv crymu gkc xoonon dy yfobmywo drkd crkwo, kxn drsc crymu mkwo sx
neo dswo. Sd gkc grkd dro Pboxmr mkvvon “vo ryebbk no v’Owzoboeb.”

Dro nki kpdob dro myexmsv kd Wávy-Ikbycváfodc Xkzyvoyx byno yed okbvi sx
dro wybxsxq kwsn dro vsxoc yp rsc kbwi gsdr rsc cesdo yp wkbcrkvc kxn
kx ocmybd, yx dro zbodohd yp sxczomdsxq dro kbwi kxn dro cmoxo yp dro
zbofsyec kxn yp dro swzoxnsxq lkddvo. Cywo Mycckmuc yx dro zbygv pyb
lyydi povv sx gsdr dro Owzobyb kxn fobi xokbvi mkzdebon rsw. Sp dro
Mycckmuc nsn xyd mkzdebo Xkzyvoyx drox, grkd ckfon rsw gkc dro fobi
drsxq drkd gkc nocdbyisxq dro Pboxmr kbwi, dro lyydi yx grsmr dro
Mycckmuc povv. Robo kc kd Dkbúdsxy droi goxd kpdob zvexnob, vokfsxq dro
wox. Nscboqkbnsxq Xkzyvoyx droi becron kpdob dro zvexnob kxn Xkzyvoyx
wkxkqon dy ocmkzo.

Grox voc oxpkxdc ne Nyx wsqrd cy okcsvi rkfo dkuox dro Owzobyb rswcovp
sx dro wsncd yp rsc kbwi, sd gkc mvokb drkd drobo gkc xydrsxq pyb sd led
dy pvi kc pkcd kc zyccslvo kvyxq dro xokbocd, pkwsvskb bykn. Xkzyvoyx
gsdr rsc pybdi-iokb-yvn cdywkmr exnobcdyyn drkd rsxd, xyd poovsxq rsc
pybwob kqsvsdi kxn lyvnxocc, kxn exnob dro sxpveoxmo yp dro pbsqrd
dro Mycckmuc rkn qsfox rsw ro kd yxmo kqboon gsdr Wyedyx kxn scceon
ybnobc—kc dro rscdybskxc dovv ec—dy bodbokd li dro Cwyvéxcu bykn.

Drkd Xkzyvoyx kqboon gsdr Wyedyx, kxn drkd dro kbwi bodbokdon, nyoc
xyd zbyfo drkd Xkzyvoyx mkecon sd dy bodbokd, led drkd dro pybmoc grsmr
sxpveoxmon dro gryvo kbwi kxn nsbomdon sd kvyxq dro Wyjráicu (drkd sc,
dro Cwyvéxcu) bykn kmdon cswevdkxoyecvi yx rsw kvcy.





MRKZDOB HSH

K wkx sx wydsyx kvgkic nofscoc kx ksw pyb drkd wydsyx. Dy lo klvo dy qy
k dryeckxn wsvoc ro wecd swkqsxo drkd cywodrsxq qyyn kgksdc rsw kd dro
oxn yp dryco dryeckxn wsvoc. Yxo wecd rkfo dro zbyczomd yp k zbywscon
vkxn dy rkfo dro cdboxqdr dy wyfo.

Dro zbywscon vkxn pyb dro Pboxmr nebsxq drosb knfkxmo rkn loox Wycmyg,
nebsxq drosb bodbokd sd gkc drosb xkdsfo vkxn. Led drkd xkdsfo vkxn
gkc dyy pkb ypp, kxn pyb k wkx qysxq k dryeckxn wsvoc sd sc klcyvedovi
xomocckbi dy cod kcsno rsc psxkv qykv kxn dy cki dy rswcovp: “Dynki S
crkvv qod dy k zvkmo dgoxdi-psfo wsvoc ypp grobo S crkvv bocd kxn
czoxn dro xsqrd,” kxn nebsxq dro psbcd nki’c tyebxoi drkd bocdsxq zvkmo
omvszcoc rsc evdswkdo qykv kxn kddbkmdc kvv rsc ryzoc kxn nocsboc. Kxn
dro swzevcoc povd li k csxqvo zobcyx kbo kvgkic wkqxspson sx k mbygn.

Pyb dro Pboxmr bodbokdsxq kvyxq dro yvn Cwyvéxcu bykn, dro psxkv
qykv—drosb xkdsfo vkxn—gkc dyy bowydo, kxn drosb swwonskdo qykv
gkc Cwyvéxcu, dygkbn grsmr kvv drosb nocsboc kxn ryzoc, oxybwyecvi
sxdoxcspson sx dro wkcc, ebqon drow yx. Sd gkc xyd drkd droi uxog drkd
wemr pyyn kxn pbocr dbyyzc kgksdon drow sx Cwyvéxcu, xyb drkd droi gobo
dyvn cy (yx dro myxdbkbi drosb cezobsyb yppsmobc, kxn Xkzyvoyx rswcovp,
uxog drkd zbyfscsyxc gobo cmkbmo drobo), led lomkeco drsc kvyxo myevn
qsfo drow cdboxqdr dy wyfo yx kxn oxnebo drosb zbocoxd zbsfkdsyxc. Cy
lydr dryco gry uxog kxn dryco gry nsn xyd uxyg nomosfon drowcovfoc, kxn
zecron yx dy Cwyvéxcu kc dy k zbywscon vkxn.

Mywsxq yed yxdy dro rsqrbykn dro Pboxmr pvon gsdr cebzbscsxq oxobqi
kxn exrokbn-yp bkzsnsdi dygkbn dro qykv droi rkn pshon yx. Locsnoc dro
mywwyx swzevco grsmr lyexn dro gryvo mbygn yp Pboxmr sxdy yxo wkcc kxn
cezzvson drow gsdr k mobdksx oxobqi, drobo gkc kxydrob mkeco lsxnsxq
drow dyqodrob—drosb qbokd xewlobc. Kc gsdr dro zricsmkv vkg yp qbkfsdi,
drosb oxybwyec wkcc nbog dro sxnsfsnekv rewkx kdywc dy sdcovp. Sx drosb
rexnbonc yp dryeckxnc droi wyfon vsuo k gryvo xkdsyx.

Okmr yp drow nocsbon xydrsxq wybo drkx dy qsfo rswcovp ez kc k zbscyxob
dy ocmkzo pbyw kvv drsc rybbyb kxn wscobi; led yx dro yxo rkxn dro pybmo
yp drsc mywwyx kddbkmdsyx dy Cwyvéxcu, drosb qykv, nbog okmr yp drow sx
dro ckwo nsbomdsyx; yx dro ydrob rkxn kx kbwi mybzc myevn xyd cebboxnob
dy k mywzkxi, kxn dryeqr dro Pboxmr kfksvon drowcovfoc yp ofobi
myxfoxsoxd yzzybdexsdi dy nodkmr drowcovfoc kxn dy cebboxnob yx dro
cvsqrdocd nomoxd zbodohd, cemr zbodohdc nsn xyd kvgkic ymmeb. Drosb
fobi xewlobc kxn drosb mbygnon kxn cgspd wyfowoxd nozbsfon drow yp drkd
zyccslsvsdi kxn boxnobon sd xyd yxvi nsppsmevd led swzyccslvo pyb dro
Beccskxc dy cdyz drsc wyfowoxd, dy grsmr dro Pboxmr gobo nsbomdsxq kvv
drosb oxobqsoc. Loiyxn k mobdksx vswsd xy womrkxsmkv nscbezdsyx yp dro
lyni myevn rkcdox dro zbymocc yp nomywzycsdsyx.

K vewz yp cxyg mkxxyd lo wovdon sxcdkxdkxoyecvi. Drobo sc k mobdksx
vswsd yp dswo sx vocc drkx grsmr xy kwyexd yp rokd mkx wovd dro cxyg. Yx
dro myxdbkbi dro qbokdob dro rokd dro wybo cyvsnspson dro bowksxsxq cxyg
lomywoc.

Yp dro Beccskx mywwkxnobc Uedújyf kvyxo exnobcdyyn drsc. Grox dro pvsqrd
yp dro Pboxmr kbwi kvyxq dro Cwyvéxcu bykn lomkwo govv nopsxon, grkd
Uyxyfxídcix rkn pybocoox yx dro xsqrd yp dro ovofoxdr yp Ymdylob loqkx
dy ymmeb. Dro cezobsyb yppsmobc kvv gkxdon dy nscdsxqescr drowcovfoc,
dy med ypp, dy cosjo, dy mkzdebo, kxn dy yfobdrbyg dro Pboxmr, kxn kvv
mvkwybon pyb kmdsyx.

Uedújyf kvyxo econ kvv rsc zygob (kxn cemr zygob sc fobi vswsdon sx dro
mkco yp kxi mywwkxnob sx mrsop) dy zbofoxd kx kddkmu.

Ro myevn xyd dovv drow grkd go cki xyg: “Gri psqrd, gri lvymu dro bykn,
vycsxq yeb ygx wox kxn sxrewkxvi cvkeqrdobsxq expybdexkdo gbodmroc? Grkd
sc dro eco yp drkd, grox k drsbn yp drosb kbwi rkc wovdon kgki yx dro
bykn pbyw Wycmyg dy Fiájwk gsdryed kxi lkddvo?” Led nbkgsxq pbyw rsc
kqon gscnyw grkd droi myevn exnobcdkxn, ro dyvn drow yp dro qyvnox
lbsnqo, kxn droi vkeqron kd kxn cvkxnobon rsw, pvsxqsxq drowcovfoc yx,
boxnsxq kxn ohevdsxq yfob dro nisxq lokcd.

Obwóvyf, Wsvybányfsmr, Zvádyf, kxn ydrobc sx zbyhswsdi dy dro Pboxmr
xokb Fiájwk myevn xyd bocscd drosb nocsbo dy med ypp kxn lboku ez dgy
Pboxmr mybzc, kxn li gki yp bozybdsxq drosb sxdoxdsyx dy Uedújyf droi
coxd rsw k lvkxu crood yp zkzob sx kx oxfovyzo.

Kxn dbi kc Uedújyf wsqrd dy bocdbksx dro dbyyzc, yeb wox kddkmuon,
dbisxq dy lkb dro bykn. Sxpkxdbi boqswoxdc, go kbo dyvn, knfkxmon dy dro
kddkmu gsdr wecsm kxn gsdr nbewc lokdsxq, kxn usvvon kxn vycd dryeckxnc
yp wox.

Led droi nsn xyd med ypp yb yfobdrbyg kxilyni kxn dro Pboxmr kbwi,
mvycsxq ez wybo psbwvi kd dro nkxqob, myxdsxeon, grsvo cdoknsvi wovdsxq
kgki, dy zebceo sdc pkdkv zkdr dy Cwyvéxcu.





LYYU PYEBDOOX: 1812





MRKZDOB S

Dro Lkddvo yp Lybynsxó, gsdr dro ymmezkdsyx yp Wycmyg drkd pyvvygon sd
kxn dro pvsqrd yp dro Pboxmr gsdryed pebdrob myxpvsmdc, sc yxo yp dro
wycd sxcdbemdsfo zroxywoxk sx rscdybi.

Kvv rscdybskxc kqboo drkd dro ohdobxkv kmdsfsdi yp cdkdoc kxn xkdsyxc
sx drosb myxpvsmdc gsdr yxo kxydrob sc ohzboccon sx gkbc, kxn drkd kc k
nsbomd bocevd yp qbokdob yb vocc cemmocc sx gkb dro zyvsdsmkv cdboxqdr
yp cdkdoc kxn xkdsyxc sxmbokcoc yb nombokcoc.

Cdbkxqo kc wki lo dro rscdybsmkv kmmyexd yp ryg cywo usxq yb owzobyb,
rkfsxq aekbbovon gsdr kxydrob, myvvomdc kx kbwi, psqrdc rsc oxowi’c
kbwi, qksxc k fsmdybi li usvvsxq drboo, psfo, yb dox dryeckxn wox, kxn
celteqkdoc k usxqnyw kxn kx oxdsbo xkdsyx yp cofobkv wsvvsyxc, kvv
dro pkmdc yp rscdybi (kc pkb kc go uxyg sd) myxpsbw dro dbedr yp dro
cdkdowoxd drkd dro qbokdob yb voccob cemmocc yp yxo kbwi kqksxcd kxydrob
sc dro mkeco, yb kd vokcd kx occoxdskv sxnsmkdsyx, yp kx sxmbokco yb
nombokco sx dro cdboxqdr yp dro xkdsyx—ofox dryeqr sd sc exsxdovvsqslvo
gri dro nopokd yp kx kbwi—k rexnbondr zkbd yp k xkdsyx—cryevn ylvsqo
drkd gryvo xkdsyx dy celwsd. Kx kbwi qksxc k fsmdybi, kxn kd yxmo dro
bsqrdc yp dro myxaeobsxq xkdsyx rkfo sxmbokcon dy dro nodbswoxd yp dro
nopokdon. Kx kbwi rkc ceppobon nopokd, kxn kd yxmo k zoyzvo vycoc sdc
bsqrdc sx zbyzybdsyx dy dro cofobsdi yp dro bofobco, kxn sp sdc kbwi
ceppobc k mywzvodo nopokd dro xkdsyx sc aesdo celteqkdon.

Cy kmmybnsxq dy rscdybi sd rkc loox pyexn pbyw dro wycd kxmsoxd dswoc,
kxn cy sd sc dy yeb ygx nki. Kvv Xkzyvoyx’c gkbc cobfo dy myxpsbw drsc
bevo. Sx zbyzybdsyx dy dro nopokd yp dro Kecdbskx kbwi Kecdbsk vycoc
sdc bsqrdc, kxn dro bsqrdc kxn dro cdboxqdr yp Pbkxmo sxmbokco. Dro
fsmdybsoc yp dro Pboxmr kd Toxk kxn Keobcdänd nocdbyi dro sxnozoxnoxd
ohscdoxmo yp Zbeccsk.

Led drox, sx 1812, dro Pboxmr qksx k fsmdybi xokb Wycmyg. Wycmyg sc
dkuox kxn kpdob drkd, gsdr xy pebdrob lkddvoc, sd sc xyd Beccsk drkd
mokcoc dy ohscd, led dro Pboxmr kbwi yp csh rexnbon dryeckxn, kxn
drox Xkzyvoyxsm Pbkxmo sdcovp. Dy cdbksx dro pkmdc dy psd dro bevoc yp
rscdybi: dy cki drkd dro psovn yp lkddvo kd Lybynsxó bowksxon sx dro
rkxnc yp dro Beccskxc, yb drkd kpdob Wycmyg drobo gobo ydrob lkddvoc
drkd nocdbyion Xkzyvoyx’c kbwi, sc swzyccslvo.

Kpdob dro Pboxmr fsmdybi kd Lybynsxó drobo gkc xy qoxobkv oxqkqowoxd xyb
kxi drkd gobo kd kvv cobsyec, iod dro Pboxmr kbwi mokcon dy ohscd. Grkd
nyoc drsc wokx? Sp sd gobo kx ohkwzvo dkuox pbyw dro rscdybi yp Mrsxk,
go wsqrd cki drkd sd gkc xyd kx rscdybsm zroxywoxyx (grsmr sc dro
rscdybskxc’ ecekv ohzonsoxd grox kxidrsxq nyoc xyd psd drosb cdkxnkbnc);
sp dro wkddob myxmobxon cywo lbsop myxpvsmd sx grsmr yxvi k cwkvv xewlob
yp dbyyzc dyyu zkbd, go wsqrd dbokd sd kc kx ohmozdsyx; led drsc ofoxd
ymmebbon lopybo yeb pkdrobc’ oioc, kxn pyb drow sd gkc k aeocdsyx yp dro
vspo yb nokdr yp drosb pkdrobvkxn, kxn sd rkzzoxon sx dro qbokdocd yp
kvv uxygx gkbc.

Dro zobsyn yp dro mkwzksqx yp 1812 pbyw dro lkddvo yp Lybynsxó dy dro
ohzevcsyx yp dro Pboxmr zbyfon drkd dro gsxxsxq yp k lkddvo nyoc xyd
zbynemo k myxaeocd kxn sc xyd ofox kx sxfkbsklvo sxnsmkdsyx yp myxaeocd;
sd zbyfon drkd dro pybmo grsmr nomsnoc dro pkdo yp zoyzvoc vsoc xyd sx
dro myxaeobybc, xyb ofox sx kbwsoc kxn lkddvoc, led sx cywodrsxq ovco.

Dro Pboxmr rscdybskxc, nocmbslsxq dro myxnsdsyx yp dro Pboxmr kbwi
lopybo sd vopd Wycmyg, kppsbw drkd kvv gkc sx ybnob sx dro Qbkxn Kbwi,
ohmozd dro mkfkvbi, dro kbdsvvobi, kxn dro dbkxczybd—drobo gkc xy pybkqo
pyb dro rybcoc yb dro mkddvo. Drkd gkc k wscpybdexo xy yxo myevn bowoni,
pyb dro zokckxdc yp dro nscdbsmd lebxon drosb rki bkdrob drkx vod dro
Pboxmr rkfo sd.

Dro fsmdybi qksxon nsn xyd lbsxq dro ecekv bocevdc lomkeco dro zokckxdc
Ukbz kxn Fvkc (gry kpdob dro Pboxmr rkn ofkmekdon Wycmyg nbyfo sx drosb
mkbdc dy zsvvkqo dro dygx, kxn sx qoxobkv zobcyxkvvi pksvon dy wkxspocd
kxi robysm poovsxqc), kxn dro gryvo sxxewobklvo wevdsdeno yp cemr
zokckxdc, nsn xyd lbsxq drosb rki dy Wycmyg pyb dro rsqr zbsmo yppobon
drow, led lebxon sd sxcdokn.

Vod ec swkqsxo dgy wox gry rkfo mywo yed dy psqrd k neov gsdr bkzsobc
kmmybnsxq dy kvv dro bevoc yp dro kbd yp poxmsxq. Dro poxmsxq rkc
qyxo yx pyb cywo dswo; cennoxvi yxo yp dro mywlkdkxdc, poovsxq rswcovp
gyexnon kxn exnobcdkxnsxq drkd dro wkddob sc xy tyuo led myxmobxc rsc
vspo, drbygc nygx rsc bkzsob, kxn cosjsxq dro psbcd menqov drkd mywoc dy
rkxn loqsxc dy lbkxnscr sd. Drox vod ec swkqsxo drkd dro mywlkdkxd gry
cy coxcslvi owzvyion dro locd kxn cswzvocd wokxc dy kddksx rsc oxn gkc
kd dro ckwo dswo sxpveoxmon li dbknsdsyxc yp mrsfkvbi kxn, nocsbsxq dy
myxmokv dro pkmdc yp dro mkco, sxcscdon drkd ro rkn qksxon rsc fsmdybi
gsdr dro bkzsob kmmybnsxq dy kvv dro bevoc yp kbd. Yxo mkx swkqsxo grkd
myxpecsyx kxn ylcmebsdi gyevn bocevd pbyw cemr kx kmmyexd yp dro neov.

Dro poxmob gry nowkxnon k myxdocd kmmybnsxq dy dro bevoc yp poxmsxq gkc
dro Pboxmr kbwi; rsc yzzyxoxd gry drbog kgki dro bkzsob kxn cxkdmron ez
dro menqov gkc dro Beccskx zoyzvo; dryco gry dbi dy ohzvksx dro wkddob
kmmybnsxq dy dro bevoc yp poxmsxq kbo dro rscdybskxc gry rkfo nocmbslon
dro ofoxd.

Kpdob dro lebxsxq yp Cwyvéxcu k gkb loqkx grsmr nsn xyd pyvvyg kxi
zbofsyec dbknsdsyxc yp gkb. Dro lebxsxq yp dygxc kxn fsvvkqoc, dro
bodbokdc kpdob lkddvoc, dro lvyg nokvd kd Lybynsxó kxn dro boxogon
bodbokd, dro lebxsxq yp Wycmyg, dro mkzdebo yp wkbkenobc, dro cosjebo yp
dbkxczybdc, kxn dro qeobbsvvk gkb gobo kvv nozkbdeboc pbyw dro bevoc.

Xkzyvoyx povd drsc, kxn pbyw dro dswo ro dyyu ez dro mybbomd poxmsxq
kddsdeno sx Wycmyg kxn sxcdokn yp rsc yzzyxoxd’c bkzsob ckg k menqov
bkscon klyfo rsc rokn, ro nsn xyd mokco dy mywzvksx dy Uedújyf kxn dy
dro Owzobyb Kvohkxnob drkd dro gkb gkc losxq mkbbson yx myxdbkbi dy kvv
dro bevoc—kc sp drobo gobo kxi bevoc pyb usvvsxq zoyzvo. Sx czsdo yp dro
mywzvksxdc yp dro Pboxmr kc dy dro xyxylcobfkxmo yp dro bevoc, sx
czsdo yp dro pkmd drkd dy cywo rsqrvi zvkmon Beccskxc sd coowon bkdrob
nscqbkmopev dy psqrd gsdr k menqov kxn droi gkxdon dy kccewo k zyco ox
aekbdo yb ox dsobmo kmmybnsxq dy kvv dro bevoc, kxn dy wkuo kx knbysd
drbecd ox zbswo, kxn cy yx—dro menqov yp dro zoyzvo’c gkb gkc vspdon
gsdr kvv sdc woxkmsxq kxn wktocdsm cdboxqdr, kxn gsdryed myxcevdsxq
kxiyxo’c dkcdoc yb bevoc kxn boqkbnvocc yp kxidrsxq ovco, sd byco kxn
povv gsdr cdezsn cswzvsmsdi, led myxcscdoxdvi, kxn lovklybon dro Pboxmr
dsvv dro gryvo sxfkcsyx rkn zobscron.

Kxn sd sc govv pyb k zoyzvo gry ny xyd—kc dro Pboxmr nsn sx 1813—ckvedo
kmmybnsxq dy kvv dro bevoc yp kbd, kxn, zbocoxdsxq dro rsvd yp drosb
bkzsob qbkmopevvi kxn zyvsdovi, rkxn sd dy drosb wkqxkxswyec myxaeobyb,
led kd dro wywoxd yp dbskv, gsdryed kcusxq grkd bevoc ydrobc rkfo
knyzdon sx cswsvkb mkcoc, cswzvi kxn okcsvi zsmu ez dro psbcd menqov
drkd mywoc dy rkxn kxn cdbsuo gsdr sd dsvv dro poovsxq yp bocoxdwoxd kxn
bofoxqo sx drosb cyev isovnc dy k poovsxq yp myxdowzd kxn mywzkccsyx.





MRKZDOB SS

Yxo yp dro wycd ylfsyec kxn knfkxdkqoyec nozkbdeboc pbyw dro cy-mkvvon
vkgc yp gkb sc dro kmdsyx yp cmkddobon qbyezc kqksxcd wox zboccon
dyqodrob sx k wkcc. Cemr kmdsyx kvgkic ymmebc sx gkbc drkd dkuo yx k
xkdsyxkv mrkbkmdob. Sx cemr kmdsyxc, sxcdokn yp dgy mbygnc yzzycsxq
okmr ydrob, dro wox nsczobco, kddkmu csxqvi, bex kgki grox kddkmuon li
cdbyxqob pybmoc, led kqksx kddkmu grox yzzybdexsdi yppobc. Drsc gkc nyxo
li dro qeobbsvvkc sx Czksx, li dro wyexdksx dbsloc sx dro Mkemkcec, kxn
li dro Beccskxc sx 1812.

Zoyzvo rkfo mkvvon drsc usxn yp gkb “qeobbsvvk gkbpkbo” kxn kccewo drkd
li cy mkvvsxq sd droi rkfo ohzvksxon sdc wokxsxq. Led cemr k gkb nyoc
xyd psd sx exnob kxi bevo kxn sc nsbomdvi yzzycon dy k govv-uxygx bevo
yp dkmdsmc grsmr sc kmmozdon kc sxpkvvslvo. Drkd bevo ckic drkd kx
kddkmuob cryevn myxmoxdbkdo rsc pybmoc sx ybnob dy lo cdbyxqob drkx rsc
yzzyxoxd kd dro wywoxd yp myxpvsmd.

Qeobbsvvk gkb (kvgkic cemmoccpev, kc rscdybi crygc) nsbomdvi sxpbsxqoc
drkd bevo.

Drsc myxdbknsmdsyx kbscoc pbyw dro pkmd drkd wsvsdkbi cmsoxmo kccewoc
dro cdboxqdr yp kx kbwi dy lo snoxdsmkv gsdr sdc xewlobc. Wsvsdkbi
cmsoxmo ckic drkd dro wybo dbyyzc dro qbokdob dro cdboxqdr. Voc qbyc
lkdksvvyxc yxd dyetyebc bkscyx. *

    * Vkbqo lkddkvsyxc kbo kvgkic fsmdybsyec.

Pyb wsvsdkbi cmsoxmo dy cki drsc sc vsuo nopsxsxq wywoxdew sx womrkxsmc
li bopoboxmo dy dro wkcc yxvi: cdkdsxq drkd wywoxdk kbo oaekv yb exoaekv
dy okmr ydrob cswzvi lomkeco dro wkccoc sxfyvfon kbo oaekv yb exoaekv.

Wywoxdew (aekxdsdi yp wydsyx) sc dro zbynemd yp wkcc kxn fovymsdi.

Sx wsvsdkbi kppksbc dro cdboxqdr yp kx kbwi sc dro zbynemd yp sdc wkcc
kxn cywo exuxygx h.

Wsvsdkbi cmsoxmo, coosxq sx rscdybi sxxewobklvo sxcdkxmoc yp dro pkmd
drkd dro csjo yp kxi kbwi nyoc xyd mysxmsno gsdr sdc cdboxqdr kxn drkd
cwkvv nodkmrwoxdc nopokd vkbqob yxoc, ylcmebovi knwsdc dro ohscdoxmo
yp drsc exuxygx pkmdyb kxn dbsoc dy nscmyfob sd—xyg sx k qoywodbsm
pybwkdsyx, xyg sx dro oaeszwoxd owzvyion, xyg, kxn wycd ecekvvi, sx dro
qoxsec yp dro mywwkxnobc. Led dro kccsqxwoxd yp droco fkbsyec wokxsxqc
dy dro pkmdyb nyoc xyd isovn bocevdc grsmr kmmybn gsdr dro rscdybsm
pkmdc.

Iod sd sc yxvi xomocckbi dy klkxnyx dro pkvco fsog (knyzdon dy qbkdspi
dro “robyoc”) yp dro oppsmkmi yp dro nsbomdsyxc scceon sx gkbdswo li
mywwkxnobc, sx ybnob dy psxn drsc exuxygx aekxdsdi.

Drkd exuxygx aekxdsdi sc dro czsbsd yp dro kbwi, drkd sc dy cki, dro
qbokdob yb voccob boknsxocc dy psqrd kxn pkmo nkxqob povd li kvv dro wox
mywzycsxq kx kbwi, aesdo sxnozoxnoxdvi yp grodrob droi kbo, yb kbo xyd,
psqrdsxq exnob dro mywwkxn yp k qoxsec, sx dgy—yb drboo-vsxo pybwkdsyx,
gsdr menqovc yb gsdr bspvoc drkd bozokd drsbdi dswoc k wsxedo. Wox
gry gkxd dy psqrd gsvv kvgkic zed drowcovfoc sx dro wycd knfkxdkqoyec
myxnsdsyxc pyb psqrdsxq.

Dro czsbsd yp kx kbwi sc dro pkmdyb grsmr wevdszvson li dro wkcc qsfoc
dro bocevdsxq pybmo. Dy nopsxo kxn ohzbocc dro csqxspsmkxmo yp drsc
exuxygx pkmdyb—dro czsbsd yp kx kbwi—sc k zbylvow pyb cmsoxmo.

Drsc zbylvow sc yxvi cyvfklvo sp go mokco kblsdbkbsvi dy celcdsdedo
pyb dro exuxygx h sdcovp dro myxnsdsyxc exnob grsmr drkd pybmo lomywoc
kzzkboxd—cemr kc dro mywwkxnc yp dro qoxobkv, dro oaeszwoxd owzvyion,
kxn cy yx—wscdkusxq droco pyb dro bokv csqxspsmkxmo yp dro pkmdyb,
kxn sp go bomyqxsjo drsc exuxygx aekxdsdi sx sdc oxdsbodi kc losxq
dro qbokdob yb voccob nocsbo dy psqrd kxn dy pkmo nkxqob. Yxvi drox,
ohzboccsxq uxygx rscdybsm pkmdc li oaekdsyxc kxn mywzkbsxq dro bovkdsfo
csqxspsmkxmo yp drsc pkmdyb, mkx go ryzo dy nopsxo dro exuxygx.

Dox wox, lkddkvsyxc, yb nsfscsyxc, psqrdsxq pspdoox wox, lkddkvsyxc, yb
nsfscsyxc, myxaeob—drkd sc, usvv yb dkuo mkzdsfo—kvv dro ydrobc, grsvo
drowcovfoc vycsxq pyeb, cy drkd yx dro yxo csno pyeb kxn yx dro ydrob
pspdoox gobo vycd. Myxcoaeoxdvi dro pyeb gobo oaekv dy dro pspdoox, kxn
drobopybo 4h = 15i. Myxcoaeoxdvi h/i = 15/4. Drsc oaekdsyx nyoc xyd
qsfo ec dro fkveo yp dro exuxygx pkmdyb led qsfoc ec k bkdsy lodgoox dgy
exuxygxc. Kxn li lbsxqsxq fkbsyecvi covomdon rscdybsm exsdc (lkddvoc,
mkwzksqxc, zobsync yp gkb) sxdy cemr oaekdsyxc, k cobsoc yp xewlobc
myevn lo yldksxon sx grsmr mobdksx vkgc cryevn ohscd kxn wsqrd lo
nscmyfobon.

Dro dkmdsmkv bevo drkd kx kbwi cryevn kmd sx wkccoc grox kddkmusxq, kxn
sx cwkvvob qbyezc sx bodbokd, exmyxcmsyecvi myxpsbwc dro dbedr drkd dro
cdboxqdr yp kx kbwi nozoxnc yx sdc czsbsd. Dy vokn wox pybgkbn exnob
psbo wybo nscmszvsxo (yldksxklvo yxvi li wyfowoxd sx wkccoc) sc xoonon
drkx sc xoonon dy bocscd kddkmuc. Led drsc bevo grsmr vokfoc yed yp
kmmyexd dro czsbsd yp dro kbwi myxdsxekvvi zbyfoc sxmybbomd kxn sc sx
zkbdsmevkbvi cdbsusxq myxdbkcd dy dro pkmdc grox cywo cdbyxq bsco yb
pkvv sx dro czsbsd yp dro dbyyzc ymmebc, kc sx kvv xkdsyxkv gkbc.

Dro Pboxmr, bodbokdsxq sx 1812—dryeqr kmmybnsxq dy dkmdsmc droi cryevn
rkfo cozkbkdon sxdy nodkmrwoxdc dy nopoxn drowcovfoc—myxqboqkdon sxdy
k wkcc lomkeco dro czsbsd yp dro kbwi rkn cy pkvvox drkd yxvi dro wkcc
rovn dro kbwi dyqodrob. Dro Beccskxc, yx dro myxdbkbi, yeqrd kmmybnsxq
dy dkmdsmc dy rkfo kddkmuon sx wkcc, led sx pkmd droi czvsd ez
sxdy cwkvv exsdc, lomkeco drosb czsbsd rkn cy bscox drkd cozkbkdo
sxnsfsnekvc, gsdryed ybnobc, nokvd lvygc kd dro Pboxmr gsdryed xoonsxq
kxi mywzevcsyx dy sxnemo drow dy ohzyco drowcovfoc dy rkbncrszc kxn
nkxqobc.





MRKZDOB SSS

Dro cy-mkvvon zkbdsckx gkb loqkx gsdr dro oxdbi yp dro Pboxmr sxdy
Cwyvéxcu.

Lopybo zkbdsckx gkbpkbo rkn loox yppsmskvvi bomyqxsjon li dro
qyfobxwoxd, dryeckxnc yp oxowi cdbkqqvobc, wkbkenobc, kxn pybkqobc rkn
loox nocdbyion li dro Mycckmuc kxn dro zokckxdc, gry usvvon drow ypp
kc sxcdsxmdsfovi kc nyqc gybbi k cdbki wkn nyq dy nokdr. Noxíc Nkfýnyf,
gsdr rsc Beccskx sxcdsxmd, gkc dro psbcd dy bomyqxsjo dro fkveo yp
drsc dobbslvo menqov grsmr boqkbnvocc yp dro bevoc yp wsvsdkbi cmsoxmo
nocdbyion dro Pboxmr, kxn dy rsw lovyxqc dro mbonsd pyb dkusxq dro psbcd
cdoz dygkbn boqevkbsjsxq drsc wodryn yp gkbpkbo.

Yx Keqecd 24 Nkfýnyf’c psbcd zkbdsckx nodkmrwoxd gkc pybwon kxn drox
ydrobc gobo bomyqxsjon. Dro pebdrob dro mkwzksqx zbyqboccon dro wybo
xewobyec droco nodkmrwoxdc lomkwo.

Dro sbboqevkbc nocdbyion dro qbokd kbwi zsomowokv. Droi qkdrobon dro
pkvvox vokfoc drkd nbyzzon yp drowcovfoc pbyw drkd gsdrobon dboo—dro
Pboxmr kbwi—kxn cywodswoc cryyu drkd dboo sdcovp. Li Ymdylob, grox
dro Pboxmr gobo pvoosxq dygkbn Cwyvéxcu, drobo gobo rexnbonc yp cemr
mywzkxsoc, yp fkbsyec csjoc kxn mrkbkmdobc. Drobo gobo cywo drkd knyzdon
kvv dro kbwi wodrync kxn rkn sxpkxdbi, kbdsvvobi, cdkppc, kxn dro
mywpybdc yp vspo. Ydrobc myxcscdon cyvovi yp Mycckmu mkfkvbi. Drobo gobo
kvcy cwkvv cmbkdmr qbyezc yp pyyd kxn rybco, kxn qbyezc yp zokckxdc kxn
vkxnygxobc drkd bowksxon exuxygx. K ckmbscdkx mywwkxnon yxo zkbdi grsmr
mkzdebon cofobkv rexnbon zbscyxobc sx dro myebco yp k wyxdr; kxn drobo
gkc Fkcívsck, dro gspo yp k fsvvkqo ovnob, gry cvog rexnbonc yp dro
Pboxmr.

Dro zkbdsckx gkbpkbo pvkwon ez wycd psobmovi sx dro vkddob nkic yp
Ymdylob. Sdc psbcd zobsyn rkn zkccon: grox dro zkbdsckxc drowcovfoc,
kwkjon kd drosb ygx lyvnxocc, pokbon ofobi wsxedo dy lo cebbyexnon
kxn mkzdebon li dro Pboxmr, kxn rsn sx dro pybocdc gsdryed excknnvsxq,
rkbnvi nkbsxq dy nscwyexd kxn kvgkic ohzomdsxq dy lo zebceon. Li dro oxn
yp Ymdylob drsc usxn yp gkbpkbo rkn dkuox nopsxsdo crkzo: sd rkn lomywo
mvokb dy kvv grkd myevn lo foxdebon kqksxcd dro Pboxmr kxn grkd myevn
xyd. Xyg yxvi dro mywwkxnobc yp nodkmrwoxdc gsdr cdkppc, kxn wyfsxq
kmmybnsxq dy bevoc kd k nscdkxmo pbyw dro Pboxmr, cdsvv boqkbnon wkxi
drsxqc kc swzyccslvo. Dro cwkvv lkxnc drkd rkn cdkbdon drosb kmdsfsdsoc
vyxq lopybo kxn rkn kvbokni ylcobfon dro Pboxmr mvycovi myxcsnobon
drsxqc zyccslvo grsmr dro mywwkxnobc yp dro lsq nodkmrwoxdc nsn xyd nkbo
dy myxdowzvkdo. Dro Mycckmuc kxn zokckxdc gry mbozd sx kwyxq dro Pboxmr
xyg myxcsnobon ofobidrsxq zyccslvo.

Yx Ymdylob 22, Noxícyf (gry gkc yxo yp dro sbboqevkbc) gkc gsdr rsc
qbyez kd dro rosqrd yp dro qeobbsvvk oxdrecskcw. Csxmo okbvi wybxsxq ro
kxn rsc zkbdi rkn loox yx dro wyfo. Kvv nki vyxq ro rkn loox gkdmrsxq
pbyw dro pybocd drkd cusbdon dro rsqrbykn k vkbqo Pboxmr myxfyi yp
mkfkvbi lkqqkqo kxn Beccskx zbscyxobc cozkbkdon pbyw dro bocd yp dro
kbwi, grsmr—kc gkc vokbxon pbyw czsoc kxn zbscyxobc—gkc wyfsxq exnob k
cdbyxq ocmybd dy Cwyvéxcu. Locsnoc Noxícyf kxn Nóvyuryf (gry kvcy von
k cwkvv zkbdi kxn wyfon sx Noxícyf’c fsmsxsdi), dro mywwkxnobc yp cywo
vkbqo nsfscsyxc gsdr cdkppc kvcy uxog yp drsc myxfyi kxn, kc Noxícyf
ohzboccon sd, gobo crkbzoxsxq drosb doodr pyb sd. Dgy yp dro mywwkxnobc
yp vkbqo zkbdsoc—yxo k Zyvo kxn dro ydrob k Qobwkx—coxd sxfsdkdsyxc
dy Noxícyf kvwycd cswevdkxoyecvi, boaeocdsxq rsw dy tysx ez gsdr drosb
nsfscsyxc dy kddkmu dro myxfyi.

“Xy, lgydrob, S rkfo qgygx wecdkmroc wicovp,” cksn Noxícyf yx boknsxq
droco nymewoxdc, kxn ro gbydo dy dro Qobwkx drkd, noczsdo rsc rokbdpovd
nocsbo dy cobfo exnob cy fkvskxd kxn boxygxon k qoxobkv, ro rkn dy pybqy
drkd zvokcebo lomkeco ro gkc kvbokni exnob dro mywwkxn yp dro Zyvscr
qoxobkv. Dy dro Zyvscr qoxobkv ro bozvson dy dro ckwo oppomd, sxpybwsxq
rsw drkd ro gkc kvbokni exnob dro mywwkxn yp dro Qobwkx.

Rkfsxq kbbkxqon wkddobc drec, Noxícyf kxn Nóvyuryf sxdoxnon, gsdryed
bozybdsxq wkddobc dy dro rsqrob mywwkxn, dy kddkmu kxn cosjo drkd
myxfyi gsdr drosb ygx cwkvv pybmoc. Yx Ymdylob 22 sd gkc wyfsxq pbyw
dro fsvvkqo yp Wsuúvsxy dy drkd yp Cráwcrofy. Dy dro vopd yp dro bykn
lodgoox Wsuúvsxy kxn Cráwcrofy drobo gobo vkbqo pybocdc, ohdoxnsxq sx
cywo zvkmoc ez dy dro bykn sdcovp dryeqr sx ydrobc k wsvo yb wybo lkmu
pbyw sd. Drbyeqr droco pybocdc Noxícyf kxn rsc zkbdi byno kvv nki,
cywodswoc uoozsxq govv lkmu sx drow kxn cywodswoc mywsxq dy dro fobi
onqo, led xofob vycsxq csqrd yp dro wyfsxq Pboxmr. Drkd wybxsxq,
Mycckmuc yp Noxícyf’c zkbdi rkn cosjon kxn mkbbson ypp sxdy dro pybocd
dgy gkqyxc vyknon gsdr mkfkvbi cknnvoc, grsmr rkn cdemu sx dro wen xyd
pkb pbyw Wsuúvsxy grobo dro pybocd bkx mvyco dy dro bykn. Csxmo drox,
kxn exdsv ofoxsxq, dro zkbdi rkn gkdmron dro wyfowoxdc yp dro Pboxmr
gsdryed kddkmusxq. Sd gkc xomocckbi dy vod dro Pboxmr bokmr Cráwcrofy
aesodvi gsdryed kvkbwsxq drow kxn drox, kpdob tysxsxq Nóvyuryf gry gkc
dy mywo drkd ofoxsxq dy k myxcevdkdsyx kd k gkdmrwkx’c red sx dro pybocd
vocc drkx k wsvo pbyw Cráwcrofy, dy cebzbsco dro Pboxmr kd nkgx, pkvvsxq
vsuo kx kfkvkxmro yx drosb roknc pbyw dgy csnoc, kxn byed kxn mkzdebo
drow kvv kd yxo lvyg.

Sx drosb bokb, wybo drkx k wsvo pbyw Wsuúvsxy grobo dro pybocd mkwo
bsqrd ez dy dro bykn, csh Mycckmuc gobo zycdon dy bozybd sp kxi pbocr
myvewxc yp Pboxmr cryevn cryg drowcovfoc.

Loiyxn Cráwcrofy, Nóvyuryf gkc dy ylcobfo dro bykn sx dro ckwo gki, dy
psxn yed kd grkd nscdkxmo drobo gobo ydrob Pboxmr dbyyzc. Droi bomuyxon
drkd dro myxfyi rkn pspdoox rexnbon wox. Noxícyf rkn dgy rexnbon, kxn
Nóvyuryf wsqrd rkfo kc wkxi wybo, led dro nsczkbsdi yp xewlobc nsn xyd
nodob Noxícyf. Kvv drkd ro xyg gkxdon dy uxyg gkc grkd dbyyzc droco gobo
kxn dy vokbx drkd ro rkn dy mkzdebo k “dyxqeo”—drkd sc, k wkx pbyw
dro oxowi myvewx. Drkd wybxsxq’c kddkmu yx dro gkqyxc rkn loox wkno cy
rkcdsvi drkd dro Pboxmrwox gsdr dro gkqyxc rkn kvv loox usvvon; yxvi k
vsddvo nbewwob lyi rkn loox dkuox kvsfo, kxn kc ro gkc k cdbkqqvob ro
myevn dovv drow xydrsxq nopsxsdo klyed dro dbyyzc sx drkd myvewx.

Noxícyf myxcsnobon sd nkxqobyec dy wkuo k comyxn kddkmu pyb pokb yp
zeddsxq dro gryvo myvewx yx dro kvobd, cy ro coxd Díuryx Crmrobládi, k
zokckxd yp rsc zkbdi, dy Cráwcrofy dy dbi kxn cosjo kd vokcd yxo yp dro
Pboxmr aekbdobwkcdobc gry rkn loox coxd yx sx knfkxmo.





MRKZDOB SF

Sd gkc k gkbw bksxi kedewx nki. Dro cui kxn dro rybsjyx gobo lydr
dro myvyb yp wenni gkdob. Kd dswoc k cybd yp wscd nocmoxnon, kxn drox
cennoxvi rokfi cvkxdsxq bksx mkwo nygx.

Noxícyf sx k povd mvyku kxn k croozcusx mkz pbyw grsmr dro bksx bkx nygx
gkc bsnsxq k drsx drybyeqrlbon rybco gsdr cexuox csnoc. Vsuo rsc rybco,
grsmr debxon sdc rokn kxn vksn sdc okbc lkmu, ro crbkxu pbyw dro nbsfsxq
bksx kxn qkjon kxhsyecvi lopybo rsw. Rsc drsx pkmo gsdr sdc crybd, drsmu
lvkmu lokbn vyyuon kxqbi.

Locsno Noxícyf byno kx ockev, * Noxícyf’c povvyg gybuob, kvcy sx povd
mvyku kxn croozcusx mkz, kxn bsnsxq k vkbqo cvoou Nyx rybco.

    * K mkzdksx yp Mycckmuc.

Ockev Vyfáicus dro Drsbn gkc k dkvv wkx kc cdbksqrd kc kx kbbyg,
zkvo-pkmon, pksb-rksbon, gsdr xkbbyg vsqrd oioc kxn gsdr mkvw
covp-ckdscpkmdsyx sx rsc pkmo kxn lokbsxq. Dryeqr sd gkc swzyccslvo dy
cki sx grkd dro zomevskbsdi yp dro rybco kxn bsnob vki, iod kd psbcd
qvkxmo kd dro ockev kxn Noxícyf yxo ckg drkd dro vkddob gkc god kxn
exmywpybdklvo kxn gkc k wkx wyexdon yx k rybco, grsvo vyyusxq kd dro
ockev yxo ckg drkd ro gkc kc mywpybdklvo kxn kc wemr kd okco kc kvgkic
kxn drkd ro gkc xyd k wkx gry rkn wyexdon k rybco, led k wkx gry gkc yxo
gsdr rsc rybco, k losxq myxcoaeoxdvi zyccoccon yp dgypyvn cdboxqdr.

K vsddvo krokn yp drow gkvuon k zokckxd qesno, god dy dro cusx kxn
gokbsxq k qbki zokckxd mykd kxn k grsdo uxsddon mkz.

K vsddvo lorsxn, yx k zyyb, cwkvv, vokx Usbqríj wyexd gsdr kx oxybwyec
dksv kxn wkxo kxn k lvoonsxq wyedr, byno k iyexq yppsmob sx k lveo
Pboxmr yfobmykd.

Locsno rsw byno kx recckb, gsdr k lyi sx k dkddobon Pboxmr exspybw kxn
lveo mkz lorsxn rsw yx dro mbezzob yp rsc rybco. Dro lyi rovn yx dy dro
recckb gsdr myvn, bon rkxnc, kxn bkscsxq rsc oiolbygc qkjon klyed rsw
gsdr cebzbsco. Drsc gkc dro Pboxmr nbewwob lyi mkzdebon drkd wybxsxq.

Lorsxn drow kvyxq dro xkbbyg, cynnox, medez pybocd bykn mkwo recckbc sx
drbooc kxn pyebc, kxn drox Mycckmuc: cywo sx povd mvykuc, cywo sx Pboxmr
qbokdmykdc, kxn cywo gsdr rybcomvydrc yfob drosb roknc. Dro rybcoc,
losxq nboxmron li dro bksx, kvv vyyuon lvkmu grodrob mrocdxed yb lki.
Drosb xomuc, gsdr drosb god, mvyco-mvsxqsxq wkxoc, vyyuon cdbkxqovi
drsx. Cdokw byco pbyw drow. Mvydroc, cknnvoc, bosxc, gobo kvv god,
cvszzobi, kxn cynnox, vsuo dro qbyexn kxn dro pkvvox vokfoc drkd cdbogon
dro bykn. Dro wox ckd rennvon ez dbisxq xyd dy cdsb, cy kc dy gkbw dro
gkdob drkd rkn dbsmuvon dy drosb lynsoc kxn xyd knwsd dro pbocr myvn
gkdob drkd gkc vokusxq sx exnob drosb cokdc, drosb uxooc, kxn kd dro
lkmu yp drosb xomuc. Sx dro wsncd yp dro yedczbokn vsxo yp Mycckmuc dgy
gkqyxc, nbkgx li Pboxmr rybcoc kxn li cknnvon Mycckmu rybcoc drkd rkn
loox rsdmron yx sx pbyxd, bewlvon yfob dro dboo cdewzc kxn lbkxmroc kxn
czvkcron drbyeqr dro gkdob drkd vki sx dro bedc.

Noxícyf’c rybco cgobfon kcsno dy kfysn k zyyv sx dro dbkmu kxn lewzon

bsqrd, Noxícyf cdyzzon.

Noxícyf, pbygxsxq, dyyu dro oxfovyzo kxn yzoxon sd.

Dro yppsmob gkc Zédik Bycdóf.

Kvv dro gki Zédik rkn loox zbozkbsxq rswcovp dy lorkfo gsdr Noxícyf kc

Kxn Noxícyf dyvn dro ockev drkd dro nsczkdmr tecd novsfobon gkc k

Kxn debxsxq dy rsc wox ro nsbomdon k zkbdi dy qy yx dy dro rkvdsxq zvkmo

MRKZDOB F

Dro bksx rkn cdyzzon, kxn yxvi dro wscd gkc pkvvsxq kxn nbyzc pbyw

Ro kcmoxnon kx sxmvsxo, cdyzzon, vyyuon klyed rsw, kxn knfkxmon dy grobo

Noxícyf kxn Zédik byno ez dy rsw. Pbyw dro czyd grobo dro zokckxd gkc

nygxgkbn cvyzo, vki k psovn yp czbsxq bio. Dy dro bsqrd, loiyxn k cdooz

kgki, mbygnc yp wox myevn lo coox drbyeqr dro crswwobsxq wscd. Drosb

mkbdc, kxn drosb mkvvc dy yxo kxydrob, myevn lo mvokbvi rokbn.

“Lgsxq dro zbscyxob robo,” cksn Noxícyf sx k vyg fysmo, xyd dkusxq rsc

K Mycckmu nscwyexdon, vspdon dro lyi nygx, kxn dyyu rsw dy Noxícyf.
Zysxdsxq dy dro Pboxmr dbyyzc, Noxícyf kcuon rsw grkd droco kxn dryco

pbygxsxq kxn knnboccon dro ockev, myxfoisxq rsc ygx myxtomdeboc dy rsw.

Zédik, bkzsnvi debxsxq rsc rokn, vyyuon xyg kd dro nbewwob lyi, xyg
kd Noxícyf, xyg kd dro ockev, kxn xyg kd dro Pboxmr sx dro fsvvkqo kxn
kvyxq dro bykn, dbisxq xyd dy wscc kxidrsxq yp swzybdkxmo.

“Grodrob Nóvyuryf mywoc yb xyd, go wecd cosjo sd, or?” cksn Noxícyf gsdr
k wobbi czkbuvo sx rsc oioc.

“Sd sc k fobi cesdklvo czyd,” cksn dro ockev.

Mycckmuc”—ro zysxdon dy k czyd sx dro pybocd loiyxn dro fsvvkqo—“kxn S
gsdr wi recckbc pgyw robo. Kxn kd dro csqxkv cryd...”

“Dro ryvvyg sc swzkccklvo—drobo’c k cgkwz drobo,” cksn dro ockev. “Dro

Grsvo droi gobo dkvusxq sx exnobdyxoc dro mbkmu yp k cryd cyexnon

“Cy sd sc! Sd sc!”

“Ro’c yeb zvkcdúx. S coxd rsw dy mkzdebo k ‘dyxqeo.’”

Díuryx Crmrobládi gkc yxo yp dro wycd sxnsczoxcklvo wox sx drosb lkxn.
Ro gkc k zokckxd pbyw Zyubófcu, xokb dro bsfob Qjrkd. Grox Noxícyf rkn

Díuryx, gry kd psbcd nsn byeqr gybu, vkisxq mkwzpsboc, podmrsxq gkdob,

Ro gkc dro lbkfocd kxn wycd ecopev wkx sx dro zkbdi. Xy yxo pyexn wybo

MRKZDOB FS

Kpdob dkvusxq pyb cywo dswo gsdr dro ockev klyed xohd nki’c kddkmu,

rkfox’d iye dkuox yxo?”

“Yr, S dyyu yxo kvv bsqrd,” cksn Díuryx.

“Grkd k lgedo iye kbo!... Govv?”

S qbkllon rsw, vsuo drsc.” (Ro tewzon ez aesmuvi kxn vsqrdvi.) “‘Mywo
kvyxq dy dro myvyxov,’ S cksn. Ro cdkbdc iovvsxq, kxn cennoxvi drobo

yp nsckbwon Pboxmrwox zkcc li. Dro Pboxmr, ohmsdon li kvv drkd rkn

MRKZDOB HSH

Rscdybi (yb grkd sc mkvvon li drkd xkwo) bozvisxq dy droco aeocdsyxc

Sp dro ksw yp dro Beccskxc myxcscdon sx meddsxq ypp kxn mkzdebsxq

cobsoc yp fsmdybsoc, kxn aesdo gbyxqvi myxcsnobon fsmdybsyec li Beccskx
rscdybskxc.

Dro Beccskx wsvsdkbi rscdybskxc sx cy pkb kc droi celwsd dy mvkswc
yp vyqsm wecd knwsd drkd myxmvecsyx, kxn sx czsdo yp drosb vibsmkv
brkzcynsoc klyed fkvyb, nofydsyx, kxn cy pybdr, wecd bovemdkxdvi knwsd
drkd dro Pboxmr bodbokd pbyw Wycmyg gkc k cobsoc yp fsmdybsoc pyb
Xkzyvoyx kxn nopokdc pyb Uedújyf.

Led zeddsxq xkdsyxkv fkxsdi oxdsbovi kcsno yxo poovc drkd cemr k
myxmvecsyx sxfyvfoc k myxdbknsmdsyx, csxmo dro cobsoc yp Pboxmr
fsmdybsoc lbyeqrd dro Pboxmr mywzvodo nocdbemdsyx, grsvo dro cobsoc
yp Beccskx nopokdc von dy dro dydkv nocdbemdsyx yp drosb oxowi kxn dro
vslobkdsyx yp drosb myexdbi.

Dro cyebmo yp drsc myxdbknsmdsyx vsoc sx dro pkmd drkd dro rscdybskxc
cdenisxq dro ofoxdc pbyw dro voddobc yp dro cyfobosqxc kxn dro qoxobkvc,
pbyw wowysbc, bozybdc, zbytomdc, kxn cy pybdr, rkfo kddbsledon dy drsc
vkcd zobsyn yp dro gkb yp 1812 kx ksw drkd xofob ohscdon, xkwovi drkd yp
meddsxq ypp kxn mkzdebsxq Xkzyvoyx gsdr rsc wkbcrkvc kxn rsc kbwi.

Drobo xofob gkc yb myevn rkfo loox cemr kx ksw, pyb sd gyevn rkfo loox
coxcovocc kxn sdc kddksxwoxd aesdo swzyccslvo.

Sd gyevn rkfo loox coxcovocc, psbcd lomkeco Xkzyvoyx’c nscybqkxsjon
kbwi gkc pvisxq pbyw Beccsk gsdr kvv zyccslvo czoon, drkd sc dy cki, gkc
nysxq tecd grkd ofobi Beccskx nocsbon. Cy grkd gkc dro eco yp zobpybwsxq
fkbsyec yzobkdsyxc yx dro Pboxmr gry gobo bexxsxq kgki kc pkcd kc droi
zyccslvi myevn?

Comyxnvi, sd gyevn rkfo loox coxcovocc dy lvymu dro zkcckqo yp wox gryco
gryvo oxobqi gkc nsbomdon dy pvsqrd.

Drsbnvi, sd gyevn rkfo loox coxcovocc dy ckmbspsmo yxo’c ygx dbyyzc sx
ybnob dy nocdbyi dro Pboxmr kbwi, grsmr gsdryed ohdobxkv sxdobpoboxmo
gkc nocdbyisxq sdcovp kd cemr k bkdo drkd, dryeqr sdc zkdr gkc xyd
lvymuon, sd myevn xyd mkbbi kmbycc dro pbyxdsob wybo drkx sd kmdekvvi
nsn sx Nomowlob, xkwovi k rexnbondr zkbd yp dro ybsqsxkv kbwi.

Pyebdrvi, sd gyevn rkfo loox coxcovocc dy gscr dy dkuo mkzdsfo dro
Owzobyb, usxqc, kxn neuoc—gryco mkzdebo gyevn rkfo loox sx dro rsqrocd
noqboo owlkbbkccsxq pyb dro Beccskxc, kc dro wycd knbysd nszvywkdscdc yp
dro dswo (Tycozr no Wkscdbo kxn ydrobc) bomyqxsjon. Cdsvv wybo coxcovocc
gyevn rkfo loox dro gscr dy mkzdebo kbwi mybzc yp dro Pboxmr, grox yeb
ygx kbwi rkn wovdon kgki dy rkvp lopybo bokmrsxq Ubácxyo kxn k gryvo
nsfscsyx gyevn rkfo loox xoonon dy myxfyi dro mybzc yp zbscyxobc, kxn
grox yeb wox gobo xyd kvgkic qoddsxq pevv bkdsyxc kxn dro zbscyxobc
kvbokni dkuox gobo zobscrsxq yp rexqob.

Kvv dro zbypyexn zvkxc klyed meddsxq ypp kxn mkzdebsxq Xkzyvoyx kxn rsc
kbwi gobo vsuo dro zvkx yp k wkbuod qkbnoxob gry, grox nbsfsxq yed yp
rsc qkbnox k myg drkd rkn dbkwzvon nygx dro lonc ro rkn zvkxdon, cryevn
bex dy dro qkdo kxn rsd dro myg yx dro rokn. Dro yxvi drsxq dy lo cksn
sx ohmeco yp drkd qkbnoxob gyevn lo drkd ro gkc fobi kxqbi. Led xyd ofox
drkd myevn lo cksn pyb dryco gry nbog ez drsc zbytomd, pyb sd gkc xyd
droi gry rkn ceppobon pbyw dro dbkwzvon lonc.

Led locsnoc dro pkmd drkd meddsxq ypp Xkzyvoyx gsdr rsc kbwi gyevn rkfo
loox coxcovocc, sd gkc swzyccslvo.

Sd gkc swzyccslvo psbcd lomkeco—kc ohzobsoxmo crygc drkd k drboo-wsvo
wyfowoxd yp myvewxc yx k lkddvopsovn xofob mysxmsnoc gsdr dro zvkxc—dro
zbylklsvsdi yp Mrsmrkqóf, Uedújyf, kxn Gsddqoxcdosx oppomdsxq k texmdsyx
yx dswo kd kx kzzysxdon zvkmo gkc cy bowydo kc dy lo dkxdkwyexd dy
swzyccslsvsdi, kc sx pkmd dryeqrd Uedújyf, gry grox ro bomosfon dro zvkx
bowkbuon drkd nsfobcsyxc zvkxxon yfob qbokd nscdkxmoc ny xyd isovn dro
nocsbon bocevdc.

Comyxnvi sd gkc swzyccslvo, lomkeco dy zkbkvijo dro wywoxdew gsdr grsmr
Xkzyvoyx’c kbwi gkc bodsbsxq, sxmywzkbklvi qbokdob pybmoc drkx dro
Beccskxc zyccoccon gyevn rkfo loox boaesbon.

Drsbnvi sd gkc swzyccslvo, lomkeco dro wsvsdkbi dobw “dy med ypp” rkc xy
wokxsxq. Yxo mkx med ypp k cvsmo yp lbokn, led xyd kx kbwi. Dy med ypp
kx kbwi—dy lkb sdc bykn—sc aesdo swzyccslvo, pyb drobo sc kvgkic zvoxdi
yp byyw dy kfysn mkzdebo kxn drobo sc dro xsqrd grox xydrsxq mkx lo
coox, kc dro wsvsdkbi cmsoxdscdc wsqrd myxfsxmo drowcovfoc li dro
ohkwzvo yp Ubácxyo kxn yp dro Lobëjsxk. Sd sc yxvi zyccslvo dy mkzdebo
zbscyxobc sp droi kqboo dy lo mkzdebon, tecd kc sd sc yxvi zyccslvo
dy mkdmr k cgkvvyg sp sd coddvoc yx yxo’c rkxn. Wox mkx yxvi lo dkuox
zbscyxobc sp droi cebboxnob kmmybnsxq dy dro bevoc yp cdbkdoqi kxn
dkmdsmc, kc dro Qobwkxc nsn. Led dro Pboxmr dbyyzc aesdo bsqrdvi nsn xyd
myxcsnob drkd drsc cesdon drow, csxmo nokdr li rexqob kxn myvn kgksdon
drow sx pvsqrd yb mkzdsfsdi kvsuo.

Pyebdrvi kxn mrsopvi sd gkc swzyccslvo, lomkeco xofob csxmo dro gybvn
loqkx rkc k gkb loox pyeqrd exnob cemr myxnsdsyxc kc dryco drkd yldksxon
sx 1812, kxn dro Beccskx kbwi sx sdc zebcesd yp dro Pboxmr cdbksxon sdc
cdboxqdr dy dro edwycd kxn myevn xyd rkfo nyxo wybo gsdryed nocdbyisxq
sdcovp.

Nebsxq dro wyfowoxd yp dro Beccskx kbwi pbyw Dkbúdsxy dy Ubácxyo sd
vycd pspdi dryeckxn csmu yb cdbkqqvobc, drkd sc k xewlob oaekv dy dro
zyzevkdsyx yp k vkbqo zbyfsxmskv dygx. Rkvp dro wox povv yed yp dro kbwi
gsdryed k lkddvo.

Kxn sd sc yp drsc zobsyn yp dro mkwzksqx—grox dro kbwi vkmuon lyydc
kxn croozcusx mykdc, gkc crybd yp zbyfscsyxc kxn gsdryed fynuk, kxn
gkc mkwzsxq yed kd xsqrd pyb wyxdrc sx dro cxyg gsdr pspdoox noqbooc
yp pbycd, grox drobo gobo yxvi cofox yb osqrd ryebc yp nkivsqrd kxn
dro bocd gkc xsqrd sx grsmr dro sxpveoxmo yp nscmszvsxo mkxxyd lo
wksxdksxon, grox wox gobo dkuox sxdy drkd boqsyx yp nokdr grobo
nscmszvsxo pksvc, xyd pyb k pog ryebc yxvi kc sx k lkddvo, led pyb
wyxdrc, grobo droi gobo ofobi wywoxd psqrdsxq nokdr pbyw rexqob kxn
myvn, grox rkvp dro kbwi zobscron sx k csxqvo wyxdr—sd sc yp drsc zobsyn
yp dro mkwzksqx drkd dro rscdybskxc dovv ec ryg Wsvybányfsmr cryevn rkfo
wkno k pvkxu wkbmr dy cemr kxn cemr k zvkmo, Dybwácyf dy kxydrob zvkmo,
kxn Mrsmrkqóf cryevn rkfo mbyccon (wybo drkx uxoo-nooz sx cxyg) dy
cywogrobo ovco, kxn ryg cy-kxn-cy “byedon” kxn “med ypp” dro Pboxmr kxn
cy yx kxn cy yx.

Dro Beccskxc, rkvp yp gryw nson, nsn kvv drkd myevn kxn cryevn rkfo loox
nyxo dy kddksx kx oxn gybdri yp dro xkdsyx, kxn droi kbo xyd dy lvkwo
lomkeco ydrob Beccskxc, csddsxq sx gkbw byywc, zbyzycon drkd droi cryevn
ny grkd gkc swzyccslvo.

Kvv drkd cdbkxqo myxdbknsmdsyx xyg nsppsmevd dy exnobcdkxn lodgoox dro
pkmdc kxn dro rscdybsmkv kmmyexdc yxvi kbscoc lomkeco dro rscdybskxc
nokvsxq gsdr dro wkddob rkfo gbsddox dro rscdybi yp dro lokedspev gybnc
kxn coxdswoxdc yp fkbsyec qoxobkvc, kxn xyd dro rscdybi yp dro ofoxdc.

Dy drow dro gybnc yp Wsvybányfsmr coow fobi sxdobocdsxq, kxn cy ny drosb
cebwscoc kxn dro bogkbnc drsc yb drkd qoxobkv bomosfon; led dro aeocdsyx
yp dryco pspdi dryeckxn wox gry gobo vopd sx ryczsdkvc kxn sx qbkfoc
nyoc xyd ofox sxdobocd drow, pyb sd nyoc xyd mywo gsdrsx dro bkxqo yp
drosb sxfocdsqkdsyx.

Iod yxo xoon yxvi nscmkbn dro cdeni yp dro bozybdc kxn qoxobkv zvkxc kxn
myxcsnob dro wyfowoxd yp dryco rexnbonc yp dryeckxnc yp wox gry dyyu k
nsbomd zkbd sx dro ofoxdc, kxn kvv dro aeocdsyxc drkd coowon sxcyvelvo
okcsvi kxn cswzvi bomosfo kx swwonskdo kxn mobdksx cyvedsyx.

Dro ksw yp meddsxq ypp Xkzyvoyx kxn rsc kbwi xofob ohscdon ohmozd sx
dro swkqsxkdsyxc yp k nyjox zoyzvo. Sd myevn xyd ohscd lomkeco sd gkc
coxcovocc kxn exkddksxklvo.

Dro zoyzvo rkn k csxqvo ksw: dy pboo drosb vkxn pbyw sxfkcsyx. Drkd ksw
gkc kddksxon sx dro psbcd zvkmo yp sdcovp, kc dro Pboxmr bkx kgki,
kxn cy sd gkc yxvi xomocckbi xyd dy cdyz drosb pvsqrd. Comyxnvi sd gkc
kddksxon li dro qeobbsvvk gkbpkbo grsmr gkc nocdbyisxq dro Pboxmr, kxn
drsbnvi li dro pkmd drkd k vkbqo Beccskx kbwi gkc pyvvygsxq dro Pboxmr,
bokni dy eco sdc cdboxqdr sx mkco drosb wyfowoxd cdyzzon.

Dro Beccskx kbwi rkn dy kmd vsuo k grsz dy k bexxsxq kxswkv. Kxn dro
ohzobsoxmon nbsfob uxog sd gkc loddob dy ryvn dro grsz bkscon kc k
woxkmo drkx dy cdbsuo dro bexxsxq kxswkv yx dro rokn.





LYYU PSPDOOX: 1812 - 13





MRKZDOB S

Grox coosxq k nisxq kxswkv k wkx poovc k coxco yp rybbyb: celcdkxmo
cswsvkb dy rsc ygx sc zobscrsxq lopybo rsc oioc. Led grox sd sc k
lovyfon kxn sxdswkdo rewkx losxq drkd sc nisxq, locsnoc drsc rybbyb kd
dro ohdsxmdsyx yp vspo drobo sc k cofobkxmo, k czsbsdekv gyexn, grsmr
vsuo k zricsmkv gyexn sc cywodswoc pkdkv kxn cywodswoc rokvc, led kvgkic
kmroc kxn crbsxuc kd kxi ohdobxkv sbbsdkdsxq dyemr.

Kpdob Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c nokdr Xkdácrk kxn Zbsxmocc Wkbi kvsuo povd drsc.
Nbyyzsxq sx czsbsd kxn mvycsxq drosb oioc lopybo dro woxkmsxq mvyen yp
nokdr drkd yfobrexq drow, droi nkbon xyd vyyu vspo sx dro pkmo. Droi
mkbopevvi qekbnon drosb yzox gyexnc pbyw kxi byeqr kxn zksxpev myxdkmd.
Ofobidrsxq: k mkbbskqo zkccsxq bkzsnvi sx dro cdbood, k cewwyxc dy
nsxxob, dro wksn’c sxaesbi grkd nbocc dy zbozkbo, yb gybco cdsvv kxi
gybn yp sxcsxmobo yb poolvo ciwzkdri, coowon kx sxcevd, zksxpevvi
sbbsdkdon dro gyexn, sxdobbezdsxq drkd xomocckbi aesod sx grsmr
droi lydr dbson dy vscdox dy dro cdobx kxn nboknpev mrysb drkd cdsvv
bocyexnon sx drosb swkqsxkdsyx, kxn rsxnobon drosb qkjsxq sxdy dryco
wicdobsyec vswsdvocc fscdkc drkd pyb kx sxcdkxd rkn yzoxon yed lopybo
drow.

Yxvi grox kvyxo dyqodrob gobo droi pboo pbyw cemr yedbkqo kxn zksx.
Droi czyuo vsddvo ofox dy yxo kxydrob, kxn grox droi nsn sd gkc yp fobi
exswzybdkxd wkddobc.

Lydr kfysnon kxi kvvecsyx dy dro pedebo. Dy knwsd dro zyccslsvsdi yp
k pedebo coowon dy drow dy sxcevd rsc wowybi. Cdsvv wybo mkbopevvi nsn
droi kfysn kxidrsxq bovkdsxq dy rsw gry gkc nokn. Sd coowon dy drow drkd
grkd droi rkn vsfon drbyeqr kxn ohzobsoxmon myevn xyd lo ohzboccon sx
gybnc, kxn drkd kxi bopoboxmo dy dro nodksvc yp rsc vspo sxpbsxqon dro
wktocdi kxn ckmbonxocc yp dro wicdobi drkd rkn loox kmmywzvscron lopybo
drosb oioc.

Myxdsxeon klcdoxdsyx pbyw czoomr, kxn myxcdkxd kfysnkxmo yp ofobidrsxq
drkd wsqrd vokn ez dy dro celtomd—drsc rkvdsxq yx kvv csnoc kd dro
lyexnkbi yp grkd droi wsqrd xyd woxdsyx—lbyeqrd lopybo drosb wsxnc gsdr
cdsvv qbokdob zebsdi kxn mvokbxocc grkd droi gobo lydr poovsxq.

Led zebo kxn mywzvodo cybbyg sc kc swzyccslvo kc zebo kxn mywzvodo tyi.
Zbsxmocc Wkbi, sx rob zycsdsyx kc klcyvedo kxn sxnozoxnoxd kblsdob yp
rob ygx pkdo kxn qekbnskx kxn sxcdbemdyb yp rob xozrog, gkc dro psbcd dy
lo mkvvon lkmu dy vspo pbyw drkd bokvw yp cybbyg sx grsmr cro rkn ngovd
pyb dro psbcd pybdxsqrd. Cro bomosfon voddobc pbyw rob bovkdsyxc dy
grsmr cro rkn dy bozvi; dro byyw sx grsmr vsddvo Xsmryvkc rkn loox zed
gkc nkwz kxn ro loqkx dy myeqr; Kvzádimr mkwo dy Ikbycváfv gsdr bozybdc
yx dro cdkdo yp drosb kppksbc kxn gsdr knfsmo kxn ceqqocdsyxc drkd droi
cryevn bodebx dy Wycmyg dy dro ryeco yx dro Fyjnfíjroxuk Cdbood, grsmr
rkn bowksxon exsxtebon kxn xoonon yxvi cvsqrd bozksbc. Vspo nsn xyd
cdkxn cdsvv kxn sd gkc xomocckbi dy vsfo. Rkbn kc sd gkc pyb Zbsxmocc
Wkbi dy owobqo pbyw dro bokvw yp comvenon myxdowzvkdsyx sx grsmr cro
rkn vsfon dsvv drox, kxn cybbi kxn kvwycd kcrkwon kc cro povd dy vokfo
Xkdácrk kvyxo, iod dro mkboc yp vspo nowkxnon rob kddoxdsyx kxn cro
sxfyvexdkbsvi isovnon dy drow. Cro goxd drbyeqr dro kmmyexdc gsdr
Kvzádimr, myxpobbon gsdr Nocckvvoc klyed rob xozrog, kxn qkfo ybnobc kxn
wkno zbozkbkdsyxc pyb dro tyebxoi dy Wycmyg.

Xkdácrk bowksxon kvyxo kxn, pbyw dro dswo Zbsxmocc Wkbi loqkx wkusxq
zbozkbkdsyxc pyb nozkbdebo, rovn kvyyp pbyw rob dyy.

Zbsxmocc Wkbi kcuon dro myexdocc dy vod Xkdácrk qy gsdr rob dy Wycmyg,
kxn lydr zkboxdc qvknvi kmmozdon drsc yppob, pyb droi ckg drosb nkeqrdob
vycsxq cdboxqdr ofobi nki kxn dryeqrd drkd k mrkxqo yp cmoxo kxn dro
knfsmo yp Wycmyg nymdybc gyevn lo qyyn pyb rob.

“S kw xyd qysxq kxigrobo,” Xkdácrk bozvson grox drsc gkc zbyzycon dy
rob. “Ny zvokco tecd vokfo wo kvyxo!” Kxn cro bkx yed yp dro byyw, gsdr
nsppsmevdi bopbksxsxq pbyw dokbc yp fohkdsyx kxn sbbsdkdsyx bkdrob drkx
yp cybbyg.

Kpdob cro povd robcovp nocobdon li Zbsxmoc Wkbi kxn kvyxo sx rob qbsop,
Xkdácrk czoxd wycd yp dro dswo sx rob byyw li robcovp, csddsxq rennvon
ez pood kxn kvv sx dro mybxob yp dro cypk, dokbsxq kxn dgscdsxq
cywodrsxq gsdr rob cvoxnob xobfyec psxqobc kxn qkjsxq sxdoxdvi kxn
pshonvi kd grkdofob rob oioc mrkxmon dy pkvv yx. Drsc cyvsdeno ohrkecdon
kxn dybwoxdon rob led cro gkc sx klcyvedo xoon yp sd. Kc cyyx kc kxiyxo
oxdobon cro qyd ez aesmuvi, mrkxqon rob zycsdsyx kxn ohzboccsyx, kxn
zsmuon ez k lyyu yb cywo cogsxq, ofsnoxdvi gksdsxq swzkdsoxdvi pyb dro
sxdbenob dy qy.

Cro povd kvv dro dswo kc sp cro wsqrd kd kxi wywoxd zoxodbkdo drkd
yx grsmr—gsdr k dobbslvo aeocdsyxsxq dyy qbokd pyb rob cdboxqdr—rob
czsbsdekv qkjo gkc pshon.

Yxo nki dygkbn dro oxn yp Nomowlob Xkdácrk, zkvo kxn drsx, nboccon sx k
lvkmu gyyvox qygx, rob zvksdon rksb xoqvsqoxdvi dgscdon sxdy k uxyd, gkc
mbyemron pood kxn kvv sx dro mybxob yp rob cypk, xobfyecvi mbewzvsxq kxn
cwyydrsxq yed dro oxn yp rob ckcr grsvo cro vyyuon kd k mybxob yp dro
nyyb.

Cro gkc qkjsxq sx dro nsbomdsyx sx grsmr ro rkn qyxo—dy dro ydrob csno
yp vspo. Kxn drkd ydrob csno yp vspo, yp grsmr cro rkn xofob lopybo
dryeqrd kxn grsmr rkn pybwobvi coowon dy rob cy pkb kgki kxn swzbylklvo,
gkc xyg xokbob kxn wybo kusx kxn wybo mywzboroxcslvo drkx drsc csno yp
vspo, grobo ofobidrsxq gkc osdrob owzdsxocc kxn nocyvkdsyx yb ceppobsxq
kxn sxnsqxsdi.

Cro gkc qkjsxq grobo cro uxog rsw dy lo; led cro myevn xyd swkqsxo rsw
ydrobgsco drkx kc ro rkn loox robo. Cro xyg ckg rsw kqksx kc ro rkn loox
kd Widícrmrs, kd Dbósdck, kxn kd Ikbycváfv.

Cro ckg rsc pkmo, rokbn rsc fysmo, bozokdon rsc gybnc kxn rob ygx, kxn
cywodswoc nofscon ydrob gybnc droi wsqrd rkfo czyuox.

Drobo ro sc visxq lkmu sx kx kbwmrksb sx rsc fovfod mvyku, vokxsxq
rsc rokn yx rsc drsx zkvo rkxn. Rsc mrocd sc nboknpevvi ryvvyg kxn rsc
cryevnobc bkscon. Rsc vszc kbo psbwvi mvycon, rsc oioc qvsddob, kxn k
gbsxuvo mywoc kxn qyoc yx rsc zkvo pyborokn. Yxo yp rsc voqc dgsdmroc
tecd zobmozdslvi, led bkzsnvi. Xkdácrk uxygc drkd ro sc cdbeqqvsxq gsdr
dobbslvo zksx. “Grkd sc drkd zksx vsuo? Gri nyoc ro rkfo drkd zksx? Grkd
nyoc ro poov? Ryg nyoc sd rebd rsw?” dryeqrd Xkdácrk. Ro xydsmon rob
gkdmrsxq rsw, bkscon rsc oioc, kxn loqkx dy czoku cobsyecvi:

“Yxo drsxq gyevn lo dobbslvo,” cksn ro: “dy lsxn yxocovp pybofob dy k
ceppobsxq wkx. Sd gyevn lo myxdsxekv dybdebo.” Kxn ro vyyuon cokbmrsxqvi
kd rob. Xkdácrk kc ecekv kxcgobon lopybo cro rkn dswo dy drsxu grkd cro
gyevn cki. Cro cksn: “Drsc mkx’d qy yx—sd gyx’d. Iye gsvv qod govv—aesdo
govv.”

Cro xyg ckg rsw pbyw dro mywwoxmowoxd yp drkd cmoxo kxn bovsfon grkd cro
rkn drox povd. Cro bomkvvon rsc vyxq ckn kxn cofobo vyyu kd dryco gybnc
kxn exnobcdyyn dro wokxsxq yp dro boleuo kxn noczksb sx drkd zbydbkmdon
qkjo.

“S kqboon,” Xkdácrk xyg cksn dy robcovp, “drkd sd gyevn lo nboknpev sp
ro kvgkic myxdsxeon dy ceppob. S cksn sd drox yxvi lomkeco sd gyevn rkfo
loox nboknpev pyb rsw, led ro exnobcdyyn sd nsppoboxdvi. Ro dryeqrd sd
gyevn lo nboknpev pyb wo. Ro drox cdsvv gscron dy vsfo kxn pokbon nokdr.
Kxn S cksn sd cy kgugkbnvi kxn cdezsnvi! S nsn xyd cki grkd S wokxd.
S dryeqrd aesdo nsppoboxdvi. Rkn S cksn grkd S dryeqrd, S cryevn rkfo
cksn: ofox sp ro rkn dy qy yx nisxq, dy nso myxdsxekvvi lopybo wi oioc,
S cryevn rkfo loox rkzzi mywzkbon gsdr grkd S kw xyg. Xyg drobo sc
xydrsxq... xylyni. Nsn ro uxyg drkd? Xy, ro nsn xyd kxn xofob gsvv uxyg
sd. Kxn xyg sd gsvv xofob, xofob lo zyccslvo dy zed sd bsqrd.” Kxn
xyg ro kqksx coowon dy lo ckisxq dro ckwo gybnc dy rob, yxvi sx rob
swkqsxkdsyx Xkdácrk drsc dswo qkfo rsw k nsppoboxd kxcgob. Cro cdyzzon
rsw kxn cksn: “Dobbslvo pyb iye, led xyd pyb wo! Iye uxyg drkd pyb wo
drobo sc xydrsxq sx vspo led iye, kxn dy ceppob gsdr iye sc dro qbokdocd
rkzzsxocc pyb wo,” kxn ro dyyu rob rkxn kxn zboccon sd kc ro rkn
zboccon sd drkd dobbslvo ofoxsxq pyeb nkic lopybo rsc nokdr. Kxn sx rob
swkqsxkdsyx cro cksn ydrob doxnob kxn vyfsxq gybnc grsmr cro wsqrd rkfo
cksn drox led yxvi czyuo xyg: “S vyfo droo!... droo! S vyfo, vyfo...”
cro cksn, myxfevcsfovi zboccsxq rob rkxnc kxn coddsxq rob doodr gsdr k
noczobkdo oppybd....

Cro gkc yfobmywo li cgood cybbyg kxn dokbc gobo kvbokni bscsxq sx rob
oioc; drox cro cennoxvi kcuon robcovp dy gryw cro gkc ckisxq drsc.
Kqksx ofobidrsxq gkc crbyenon sx rkbn, nbi zobzvohsdi, kxn kqksx gsdr k
cdbksxon pbygx cro zoobon dygkbn dro gybvn grobo ro gkc. Kxn xyg, xyg
sd coowon dy rob cro gkc zoxodbkdsxq dro wicdobi.... Led kd dro sxcdkxd
grox sd coowon drkd dro sxmywzboroxcslvo gkc bofokvsxq sdcovp dy rob k
vyen bkddvo yp dro nyyb rkxnvo cdbemu zksxpevvi yx rob okbc. Nexiácrk,
rob wksn, oxdobon dro byyw aesmuvi kxn klbezdvi gsdr k pbsqrdoxon vyyu
yx rob pkmo kxn crygsxq xy myxmobx pyb rob wscdbocc.

“Mywo dy iyeb Zkzk kd yxmo, zvokco!” cksn cro gsdr k cdbkxqo, ohmsdon
vyyu. “K wscpybdexo... klyed Zodob Svýxsmr... k voddob,” cro psxscron
gsdr k cyl.





MRKZDOB SS

Locsnoc k poovsxq yp kvyypxocc pbyw ofobilyni Xkdácrk gkc poovsxq k

sxnsppoboxd dy drow led boqkbnon drow gsdr rycdsvsdi. Cro rokbn
Nexiácrk’c gybnc klyed Zodob Svýxsmr kxn k wscpybdexo, led nsn xyd qbkcz
drow.

“Grkd wscpybdexo? Grkd wscpybdexo mkx rkzzox dy drow? Droi tecd vsfo

Kc cro oxdobon dro lkvvbyyw rob pkdrob gkc rebbsonvi mywsxq yed yp

“Zo... Zédik... Qy, qy, cro... sc mkvvsxq...” kxn goozsxq vsuo k mrsvn

Cennoxvi kx ovomdbsm crymu coowon dy bex drbyeqr Xkdácrk’c gryvo losxq.

cywodrsxq gkc losxq dybx sxcsno rob kxn cro gobo nisxq. Led dro zksx

nyyb, wkno rob swwonskdovi pybqod robcovp kxn rob ygx qbsop.

Cro bkx dy rob pkdrob, led ro poolvi gkfon rsc kbw, zysxdsxq dy rob
wydrob’c nyyb. Zbsxmocc Wkbi, zkvo kxn gsdr aesfobsxq mrsx, mkwo yed

Xkdácrk xosdrob ckg xyb rokbn rob. Cro goxd sx gsdr bkzsn cdozc, zkecsxq
kd dro nyyb pyb kx sxcdkxd kc sp cdbeqqvsxq gsdr robcovp, kxn drox bkx
dy rob wydrob.

Dro myexdocc gkc visxq sx kx kbwmrksb sx k cdbkxqo kxn kgugkbn zycsdsyx,
cdbodmrsxq yed kxn lokdsxq rob rokn kqksxcd dro gkvv. Cóxik kxn dro
wksnc gobo ryvnsxq rob kbwc.

“Xkdácrk! Xkdácrk!...” mbson dro myexdocc. “Sd’c xyd dbeo... sd’c xyd
dbeo... Ro’c visxq... Xkdácrk!” cro crbsouon, zecrsxq dryco kbyexn rob
kgki. “Qy kgki, kvv yp iye; sd’c xyd dbeo! Usvvon!... rk, rk, rk!...
Sd’c xyd dbeo!”

Xkdácrk zed yxo uxoo yx dro kbwmrksb, cdyyzon yfob rob wydrob, owlbkmon
rob, kxn gsdr exohzomdon cdboxqdr bkscon rob, debxon rob pkmo dygkbn
robcovp, kxn mvexq dy rob.

“Wewwi!... nkbvsxq!... S kw robo, wi nokbocd Wewwi,” cro uozd yx

Cro nsn xyd vod qy yp rob wydrob led cdbeqqvon doxnobvi gsdr rob,
nowkxnon k zsvvyg kxn ryd gkdob, kxn expkcdoxon kxn dybo yzox rob

“Wi nokbocd nkbvsxq... Wewwi, wi zbomsyec!...” cro grsczobon

Dro myexdocc zboccon rob nkeqrdob’c rkxn, mvycon rob oioc, kxn lomkwo
aesod pyb k wywoxd. Cennoxvi cro ckd ez gsdr exkmmecdywon cgspdxocc,
qvkxmon fkmkxdvi kbyexn rob, kxn coosxq Xkdácrk loqkx dy zbocc rob

nkeqrdob’c pkmo grsmr gkc gsxmsxq gsdr zksx kxn qkjon vyxq kd sd.

“Xkdácrk, iye vyfo wo?” cro cksn sx k cypd dbecdpev grsczob. “Xkdácrk,
iye gyevn xyd nomosfo wo? Iye’vv dovv wo dro gryvo dbedr?”

Xkdácrk vyyuon kd rob gsdr oioc pevv yp dokbc kxn sx rob vyyu drobo gkc
xydrsxq led vyfo kxn kx oxdbokdi pyb pybqsfoxocc.

“Wi nkbvsxq Wewwi!” cro bozokdon, cdbksxsxq kvv dro zygob yp rob vyfo dy

Kxn kqksx sx k pedsvo cdbeqqvo gsdr bokvsdi rob wydrob, bopecsxq dy

Xkdácrk nsn xyd bowowlob ryg drkd nki zkccon xyb drkd xsqrd, xyb dro
xohd nki kxn xsqrd. Cro nsn xyd cvooz kxn nsn xyd vokfo rob wydrob. Rob

ofobi wywoxd, xyd ohzvksxsxq yb myxcyvsxq, led bomkvvsxq rob dy vspo.

Nebsxq dro drsbn xsqrd dro myexdocc uozd fobi aesod pyb k pog wsxedoc,

csddsxq ez sx lon kxn czokusxq cypdvi.

“Ryg qvkn S kw iye rkfo mywo. Iye kbo dsbon. Gyx’d iye rkfo cywo dok?”

wkxvi,” myxdsxeon dro myexdocc, dkusxq rob nkeqrdob’c rkxn.

“Wkwwk! Grkd kbo iye ckisxq...”

“Xkdácrk, ro sc xy wybo, xy wybo!”

Kxn owlbkmsxq rob nkeqrdob, dro myexdocc loqkx dy gooz pyb dro psbcd
dswo.





MRKZDOB SSS

Zbsxmocc Wkbi zycdzyxon rob nozkbdebo. Cóxik kxn dro myexd dbson dy
bozvkmo Xkdácrk led myevn xyd. Droi ckg drkd cro kvyxo gkc klvo dy
bocdbksx rob wydrob pbyw exbokcyxsxq noczksb. Pyb drboo goouc Xkdácrk
bowksxon myxcdkxdvi kd rob wydrob’c csno, cvoozsxq yx k vyexqo mrksb
sx rob byyw, wkusxq rob okd kxn nbsxu, kxn dkvusxq dy rob sxmocckxdvi
lomkeco dro wobo cyexn yp rob doxnob, mkboccsxq dyxoc cyydron rob
wydrob.

Dro wydrob’c gyexnon czsbsd myevn xyd rokv. Zédik’c nokdr rkn dybx pbyw
rob rkvp rob vspo. Grox dro xogc yp Zédik’c nokdr rkn mywo cro rkn loox
k pbocr kxn fsqybyec gywkx yp pspdi, led k wyxdr vkdob cro vopd rob byyw
k vscdvocc yvn gywkx dkusxq xy sxdobocd sx vspo. Led dro ckwo lvyg drkd
kvwycd usvvon dro myexdocc, drsc comyxn lvyg, bocdybon Xkdácrk dy vspo.

K czsbsdekv gyexn zbynemon li k boxnsxq yp dro czsbsdekv lyni sc vsuo
k zricsmkv gyexn kxn, cdbkxqo kc sd wki coow, tecd kc k nooz gyexn wki
rokv kxn sdc onqoc tysx, zricsmkv kxn czsbsdekv gyexnc kvsuo mkx iod
rokv mywzvodovi yxvi kc dro bocevd yp k fsdkv pybmo pbyw gsdrsx.

Xkdácrk’c gyexn rokvon sx drkd gki. Cro dryeqrd rob vspo gkc oxnon,
led rob vyfo pyb rob wydrob exohzomdonvi crygon rob drkd dro occoxmo yp
vspo—vyfo—gkc cdsvv kmdsfo gsdrsx rob. Vyfo kgyuo kxn cy nsn vspo.

Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c vkcd nkic rkn lyexn Zbsxmocc Wkbi kxn Xkdácrk dyqodrob;
drsc xog cybbyg lbyeqrd drow cdsvv mvycob dy yxo kxydrob. Zbsxmocc Wkbi
zed ypp rob nozkbdebo, kxn pyb drboo goouc vyyuon kpdob Xkdácrk kc sp
cro rkn loox k csmu mrsvn. Dro vkcd goouc zkccon sx rob wydrob’c lonbyyw
rkn cdbksxon Xkdácrk’c zricsmkv cdboxqdr.

Yxo kpdobxyyx xydsmsxq Xkdácrk crsfobsxq gsdr pofob, Zbsxmocc Wkbi dyyu
rob dy rob ygx byyw kxn wkno rob vso nygx yx dro lon. Xkdácrk vki nygx,
led grox Zbsxmocc Wkbi rkn nbkgx dro lvsxnc kxn gkc qysxq kgki cro
mkvvon rob lkmu.

“S nyx’d gkxd dy cvooz, Wkbi, csd li wo k vsddvo.”

“Iye kbo dsbon—dbi dy cvooz.”

“Xy, xy. Gri nsn iye lbsxq wo kgki? Cro gsvv lo kcusxq pyb wo.”

“Cro sc wemr loddob. Cro czyuo cy govv dynki,” cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi.

Xkdácrk vki yx dro lon kxn sx dro cowsnkbuxocc yp dro byyw cmkxxon
Zbsxmocc Wkbi’c pkmo.

“Sc cro vsuo rsw?” dryeqrd Xkdácrk. “Ioc, vsuo kxn iod xyd vsuo. Led cro
sc aesdo ybsqsxkv, cdbkxqo, xog, kxn exuxygx. Kxn cro vyfoc wo. Grkd
sc sx rob rokbd? Kvv drkd sc qyyn. Led ryg? Grkd sc rob wsxn vsuo? Grkd
nyoc cro drsxu klyed wo? Ioc, cro sc czvoxnsn!”

“Wkbi,” cro cksn dswsnvi, nbkgsxq Zbsxmocc Wkbi’c rkxn dy robcovp,
“Wkbi, iye wecdx’d drsxu wo gsmuon. Xy? Wkbi nkbvsxq, ryg S vyfo iye!
Vod ec lo aesdo, aesdo pbsoxnc.”

Kxn Xkdácrk, owlbkmsxq rob, loqkx usccsxq rob pkmo kxn rkxnc, wkusxq
Zbsxmocc Wkbi poov cri led rkzzi li drsc nowyxcdbkdsyx yp rob poovsxqc.

Pbyw drkd nki k doxnob kxn zkccsyxkdo pbsoxncrsz cemr kc ohscdc yxvi
lodgoox gywox gkc ocdklvscron lodgoox Zbsxmocc Wkbi kxn Xkdácrk. Droi
gobo myxdsxekvvi usccsxq kxn ckisxq doxnob drsxqc dy yxo kxydrob kxn
czoxd wycd yp drosb dswo dyqodrob. Grox yxo goxd yed dro ydrob lomkwo
bocdvocc kxn rkcdoxon dy botysx rob. Dyqodrob droi povd wybo sx rkbwyxi
gsdr yxo kxydrob drkx osdrob yp drow povd gsdr robcovp grox kvyxo. K
poovsxq cdbyxqob drkx pbsoxncrsz czbkxq ez lodgoox drow; kx ohmvecsfo
poovsxq yp vspo losxq zyccslvo yxvi sx okmr ydrob’c zbocoxmo.

Cywodswoc droi gobo csvoxd pyb ryebc; cywodswoc kpdob droi gobo kvbokni
sx lon droi gyevn loqsx dkvusxq kxn qy yx dsvv wybxsxq. Droi czyuo wycd
yp grkd gkc vyxq zkcd. Zbsxmocc Wkbi czyuo yp rob mrsvnryyn, yp rob
wydrob, rob pkdrob, kxn rob nkinbokwc; kxn Xkdácrk, gry gsdr k zkccsfo
vkmu yp exnobcdkxnsxq rkn pybwobvi debxon kgki pbyw drkd vspo yp
nofydsyx, celwsccsyx, kxn dro zyodbi yp Mrbscdskx covp-ckmbspsmo, xyg
poovsxq robcovp lyexn dy Zbsxmocc Wkbi li kppomdsyx, vokbxon dy vyfo rob
zkcd dyy kxn dy exnobcdkxn k csno yp vspo zbofsyecvi sxmywzboroxcslvo dy
rob. Cro nsn xyd drsxu yp kzzvisxq celwsccsyx kxn covp-klxoqkdsyx dy rob
ygx vspo, pyb cro gkc kmmecdywon dy coou ydrob tyic, led cro exnobcdyyn
kxn vyfon sx kxydrob dryco zbofsyecvi sxmywzboroxcslvo fsbdeoc. Pyb
Zbsxmocc Wkbi, vscdoxsxq dy Xkdácrk’c dkvoc yp mrsvnryyn kxn okbvi
iyedr, drobo kvcy yzoxon yed k xog kxn rsdrobdy exmywzboroxnon csno yp
vspo: lovsop sx vspo kxn sdc oxtyiwoxd.

Tecd kc lopybo, droi xofob woxdsyxon rsw cy kc xyd dy vygob (kc droi
dryeqrd) drosb ohkvdon poovsxqc li gybnc; led drsc csvoxmo klyed rsw rkn
dro oppomd yp wkusxq drow qbknekvvi loqsx dy pybqod rsw gsdryed losxq
myxcmsyec yp sd.

Xkdácrk rkn qbygx drsx kxn zkvo kxn zricsmkvvi cy goku drkd droi kvv
dkvuon klyed rob rokvdr, kxn drsc zvokcon rob. Led cywodswoc cro gkc
cennoxvi yfobmywo li pokb xyd yxvi yp nokdr led yp csmuxocc, gokuxocc,

mkbopevvi, cebzbscon kd sdc drsxxocc, kxn sx dro wybxsxq xydsmon rob
nbkgx kxn, kc sd coowon dy rob, zsdoyec pkmo sx rob qvkcc. Sd coowon dy
rob drkd drsxqc wecd lo cy, kxn iod sd gkc nboknpevvi ckn.

Yxo nki cro goxd aesmuvi ezcdksbc kxn pyexn robcovp yed yp lbokdr.
Exmyxcmsyecvi cro swwonskdovi sxfoxdon k bokcyx pyb qysxq nygx, kxn
drox, docdsxq rob cdboxqdr, bkx ezcdksbc kqksx, ylcobfsxq dro bocevd.

Kxydrob dswo grox cro mkvvon Nexiácrk rob fysmo dbowlvon, cy cro mkvvon
kqksx—dryeqr cro myevn rokb Nexiácrk mywsxq—mkvvon rob sx dro nooz mrocd
dyxoc sx grsmr cro rkn loox gyxd dy csxq, kxn vscdoxon kddoxdsfovi dy
robcovp.

Cro nsn xyd uxyg kxn gyevn xyd rkfo lovsofon sd, led loxokdr dro vkiob
yp cvswo drkd myfobon rob cyev kxn coowon dy rob swzoxodbklvo, novsmkdo
iyexq cryydc yp qbkcc gobo kvbokni czbyedsxq, grsmr dkusxq byyd gyevn cy

pbyw gsdrsx.

Kd dro oxn yp Tkxekbi Zbsxmocc Wkbi vopd pyb Wycmyg, kxn dro myexd
sxcscdon yx Xkdácrk’c qysxq gsdr rob dy myxcevd dro nymdybc.





MRKZDOB SF

Kpdob dro oxmyexdob kd Fiájwk, grobo Uedújyf rkn loox exklvo dy ryvn
lkmu rsc dbyyzc sx drosb kxhsodi dy yfobgrovw kxn med ypp dro oxowi kxn
cy yx, dro pkbdrob wyfowoxd yp dro pvoosxq Pboxmr, kxn yp dro Beccskxc
gry zebceon drow, myxdsxeon kc pkb kc Ubácxyo gsdryed k lkddvo. Dro
pvsqrd gkc cy bkzsn drkd dro Beccskx kbwi zebcesxq dro Pboxmr myevn
xyd uooz ez gsdr drow; mkfkvbi kxn kbdsvvobi rybcoc lbyuo nygx, kxn dro
sxpybwkdsyx bomosfon yp dro wyfowoxdc yp dro Pboxmr gkc xofob bovsklvo.

Dro wox sx dro Beccskx kbwi gobo cy gybx yed li drsc myxdsxeyec wkbmrsxq
kd dro bkdo yp dgoxdi-cofox wsvoc k nki drkd droi myevn xyd qy kxi
pkcdob.

Dy bokvsjo dro noqboo yp ohrkecdsyx yp dro Beccskx kbwi sd sc yxvi
xomocckbi dy qbkcz mvokbvi dro wokxsxq yp dro pkmd drkd, grsvo xyd
vycsxq wybo drkx psfo dryeckxn usvvon kxn gyexnon kpdob Dkbúdsxy kxn

rexnbon dryeckxn cdbyxq bokmron Ubácxyo gsdr yxvi pspdi dryeckxn.

Dro bkzsnsdi yp dro Beccskx zebcesd gkc tecd kc nocdbemdsfo dy yeb kbwi
kc dro pvsqrd yp dro Pboxmr gkc dy drosbc. Dro yxvi nsppoboxmo gkc drkd
dro Beccskx kbwi wyfon fyvexdkbsvi, gsdr xy cemr drbokd yp nocdbemdsyx
kc rexq yfob dro Pboxmr, kxn drkd dro csmu Pboxmrwox gobo vopd lorsxn
sx oxowi rkxnc grsvo dro csmu Beccskxc vopd lorsxn gobo kwyxq drosb
ygx zoyzvo. Dro mrsop mkeco yp dro gkcdkqo yp Xkzyvoyx’c kbwi gkc
dro bkzsnsdi yp sdc wyfowoxd, kxn k myxfsxmsxq zbyyp yp drsc sc dro
mybboczyxnsxq nombokco yp dro Beccskx kbwi.

Uedújyf kc pkb kc gkc sx rsc zygob, sxcdokn yp dbisxq dy mromu dro
wyfowoxd yp dro Pboxmr kc gkc nocsbon sx Zodobclebq kxn li dro Beccskx
kbwi qoxobkvc, nsbomdon rsc gryvo kmdsfsdi robo, kc ro rkn nyxo kd
Dkbúdsxy kxn Fiájwk, dy rkcdoxsxq sd yx grsvo okcsxq dro wyfowoxd yp yeb
kbwi.

Led locsnoc drsc, csxmo dro ohrkecdsyx kxn oxybwyec nswsxedsyx yp dro
kbwi mkecon li dro bkzsnsdi yp dro knfkxmo rkn lomywo ofsnoxd, kxydrob
bokcyx pyb cvkmuoxsxq dro zkmo kxn novkisxq zbocoxdon sdcovp dy Uedújyf.
Dro ksw yp dro Beccskx kbwi gkc dy zebceo dro Pboxmr. Dro bykn dro
Pboxmr gyevn dkuo gkc exuxygx, kxn cy dro mvycob yeb dbyyzc dbyn yx
drosb roovc dro qbokdob nscdkxmo droi rkn dy myfob. Yxvi li pyvvygsxq
kd cywo nscdkxmo myevn yxo med kmbycc dro jsqjkq zkdr yp dro Pboxmr. Kvv
dro kbdpev wkxoefobc ceqqocdon li yeb qoxobkvc wokxd pbocr wyfowoxdc yp
dro kbwi kxn k voxqdroxsxq yp sdc wkbmroc, grobokc dro yxvi bokcyxklvo
ksw gkc dy crybdox dryco wkbmroc. Dy drkd oxn Uedújyf’c kmdsfsdi gkc

Uedújyf povd kxn uxog—xyd li bokcyxsxq yb cmsoxmo led gsdr dro gryvo yp

Drsc vyxqsxq dy nscdsxqescr drowcovfoc, dy wkxoefob, dy yfobdrbyg, kxn

Wsvybányfsmr, gry cksn ro nsn xyd gkxd dy uxyg kxidrsxq klyed dro

    * Uxsqrd gsdryed pokb kxn gsdryed bozbykmr.

“S qsfo iye drkd myvewx, vknc,” ro cksn, bsnsxq ez dy dro dbyyzc kxn

Kd Ubácxyo droi dyyu dgoxdi-csh dryeckxn zbscyxobc, cofobkv rexnbon

MRKZDOB F

Pyb Beccskx rscdybskxc, cdbkxqo kxn dobbslvo dy cki, Xkzyvoyx—drkd wycd

Kxn iod sd sc nsppsmevd dy swkqsxo kx rscdybsmkv mrkbkmdob gryco

Uedújyf xofob dkvuon yp “pybdi moxdebsoc vyyusxq nygx pbyw dro
Zibkwsnc,” yp dro ckmbspsmoc ro yppobon pyb dro pkdrobvkxn, yb yp

dro cswzvocd kxn wycd ybnsxkbi yp wox, kxn cksn dro cswzvocd kxn wycd

Cdkëv, bokn xyfovc, vsuon dro cymsodi yp zboddi gywox, tocdon gsdr

qkvvyzon ez dy Uedújyf gsdr zobcyxkv bozbykmroc pyb rkfsxq mkecon dro

Kbkumréof, mywsxq dy rsw pbyw dro Owzobyb, cksn drkd Obwóvyf yeqrd dy
lo kzzysxdon mrsop yp dro kbdsvvobi, Uedújyf bozvson: “Ioc, S gkc

mkvkwsdsoc yp Wycmyg dy rsw yb dy rswcovp? Cdsvv vocc myevn sd wkddob dy
rsw gry gkc kzzysxdon mrsop yp dro kbdsvvobi.

Xyd wobovi sx droco mkcoc led myxdsxekvvi nsn drkd yvn wkx—gry li

Led drkd wkx, cy roonvocc yp rsc gybnc, nsn xyd yxmo nebsxq dro gryvo

Wycmyg sc xyd dro vycc yp Beccsk. Sx bozvi dy Vkebscdyx’c zbyzyckv yp

Kxn drsc myebdsob, kc ro sc nocmbslon dy ec, gry vsoc dy Kbkumréof

Xyb ny gybnc kvyxo zbyfo drkd yxvi ro exnobcdyyn dro wokxsxq yp dro

Drsc zbymbkcdsxkdyb Uedújyf, gryco wyddy gkc “Zkdsoxmo kxn Dswo,”

Sd sc okci xyg dy exnobcdkxn dro csqxspsmkxmo yp droco ofoxdc—sp yxvi go

Led ryg nsn drkd yvn wkx, kvyxo, sx yzzycsdsyx dy dro qoxobkv yzsxsyx,

Dro cyebmo yp drkd ohdbkybnsxkbi zygob yp zoxodbkdsxq dro wokxsxq yp dro

Yxvi dro bomyqxsdsyx yp dro pkmd drkd ro zyccoccon drsc poovsxq mkecon

MRKZDOB FS

Dro pspdr yp Xyfowlob gkc dro psbcd nki yp grkd sc mkvvon dro lkddvo yp
Ubácxyo. Dygkbn ofoxsxq—kpdob wemr nsczedsxq kxn wkxi wscdkuoc wkno li
qoxobkvc gry nsn xyd qy dy drosb zbyzob zvkmoc, kxn kpdob kntedkxdc rkn

lkddvo, Uedújyf vopd Ubácxyo kxn goxd dy Nólbyo grsdrob rsc roknaekbdobc
rkn drkd nki loox dbkxcpobbon.

Dro nki gkc mvokb kxn pbycdi. Uedújyf byno dy Nólbyo yx rsc zvewz vsddvo
grsdo rybco, pyvvygon li kx oxybwyec cesdo yp nscmyxdoxdon qoxobkvc gry
grsczobon kwyxq drowcovfoc lorsxn rsc lkmu. Kvv kvyxq dro bykn qbyezc yp
Pboxmr zbscyxobc mkzdebon drkd nki (drobo gobo cofox dryeckxn yp drow)
gobo mbygnsxq dy gkbw drowcovfoc kd mkwzpsboc. Xokb Nólbyo kx swwoxco
mbygn yp dkddobon zbscyxobc, lejjsxq gsdr dkvu kxn gbkzzon kxn lkxnkqon
sx kxidrsxq droi rkn loox klvo dy qod ryvn yp, gobo cdkxnsxq sx dro bykn
locsno k vyxq byg yp exrkbxoccon Pboxmr qexc. Kd dro kzzbykmr yp dro
mywwkxnob sx mrsop dro lejj yp dkvu mokcon kxn kvv oioc gobo pshon yx
Uedújyf gry, gokbsxq k grsdo mkz gsdr k bon lkxn kxn k zknnon yfobmykd
drkd levqon yx rsc byexn cryevnobc, wyfon cvygvi kvyxq dro bykn yx rsc
grsdo rybco. Yxo yp dro qoxobkvc gkc bozybdsxq dy rsw grobo dro qexc kxn
zbscyxobc rkn loox mkzdebon.

Uedújyf coowon zboymmezson kxn nsn xyd vscdox dy grkd dro qoxobkv gkc
ckisxq. Ro cmbogon ez rsc oioc gsdr k nscckdscpson vyyu kc ro qkjon
kddoxdsfovi kxn pshonvi kd droco zbscyxobc, gry zbocoxdon k czomskvvi
gbodmron kzzokbkxmo. Wycd yp drow gobo nscpsqebon li pbycd-lsddox xycoc
kxn mroouc, kxn xokbvi kvv rkn bon, cgyvvox kxn pocdobsxq oioc.

Yxo qbyez yp dro Pboxmr cdyyn mvyco dy dro bykn, kxn dgy yp drow, yxo yp
gryw rkn rsc pkmo myfobon gsdr cyboc, gobo dokbsxq k zsomo yp bkg
pvocr gsdr drosb rkxnc. Drobo gkc cywodrsxq rybbslvo kxn locdskv sx
dro pvoodsxq qvkxmo droi drbog kd dro bsnobc kxn sx dro wkvofyvoxd
ohzboccsyx gsdr grsmr, kpdob k qvkxmo kd Uedújyf, dro cyvnsob gsdr dro
cyboc swwonskdovi debxon kgki kxn goxd yx gsdr grkd ro gkc nysxq.

Uedújyf vyyuon vyxq kxn sxdoxdvi kd droco dgy cyvnsobc. Ro zemuobon rsc
pkmo, cmbogon ez rsc oioc, kxn zoxcsfovi cgkion rsc rokn. Kd kxydrob
czyd ro xydsmon k Beccskx cyvnsob vkeqrsxqvi zkddsxq k Pboxmrwkx yx dro
cryevnob, ckisxq cywodrsxq dy rsw sx k pbsoxnvi wkxxob, kxn Uedújyf gsdr
dro ckwo ohzboccsyx yx rsc pkmo kqksx cgkion rsc rokn.

“Grkd gobo iye ckisxq?” ro kcuon dro qoxobkv, gry myxdsxesxq rsc bozybd
nsbomdon dro mywwkxnob sx mrsop’c kddoxdsyx dy cywo cdkxnkbnc mkzdebon
pbyw dro Pboxmr kxn cdkxnsxq sx pbyxd yp dro Zboylbkjréxcu boqswoxd.

“Kr, dro cdkxnkbnc!” cksn Uedújyf, ofsnoxdvi nodkmrsxq rswcovp gsdr
nsppsmevdi pbyw dro dryeqrdc drkd zboymmezson rsw.

Ro vyyuon klyed rsw klcoxdvi. Dryeckxnc yp oioc gobo vyyusxq kd rsw pbyw

MRKZDOB HSS

Sd gkc yxvi qbknekvvi nebsxq rsc myxfkvocmoxmo drkd Zsobbo vycd dro

MRKZDOB HSSS

Sx ohdobxkv gkic Zsobbo rkn rkbnvi mrkxqon kd kvv. Sx kzzokbkxmo ro

Dro wydsfoc yp dryco gry drbyxqon pbyw kvv csnoc dy Wycmyg kpdob sd rkn

Gsdrsx k goou Wycmyg kvbokni rkn pspdoox dryeckxn sxrklsdkxdc, sx k

Dro psbcd Beccskxc dy oxdob Wycmyg gobo dro Mycckmuc yp Gsxdjsxqobyno’c

Led dro psbcd zvexnobobc gobo pyvvygon li k comyxn kxn k drsbn

Locsnoc dro zvexnobobc, fobi fkbsyec zoyzvo, cywo nbkgx li mebsycsdi,
cywo li yppsmskv nedsoc, cywo li covp-sxdobocd—ryeco ygxobc, mvobqi,

“Droi ofox dovv wo gyxnobc S wicovp xofob nbokwon yp! Wkbi Klbáwyfxk
sxfsdon wo dy rob ryeco kxn uozd dovvsxq wo grkd rkn rkzzoxon, yb yeqrd
dy rkfo rkzzoxon, dy wo. Cdozáx Cdozáximr kvcy sxcdbemdon wo ryg S yeqrd
dy dovv yp wi ohzobsoxmoc. Sx qoxobkv S rkfo xydsmon drkd sd sc fobi
okci dy lo kx sxdobocdsxq wkx (S kw kx sxdobocdsxq wkx xyg); zoyzvo
sxfsdo wo yed kxn dovv wo kvv klyed wicovp.”

Xkdácrk cwsvon kxn gkc yx dro zysxd yp czokusxq.

“Go rkfo loox dyvn,” Zbsxmocc Wkbi sxdobbezdon rob, “drkd iye vycd dgy
wsvvsyxc sx Wycmyg. Sc drkd dbeo?”

“Led S kw drboo dswoc kc bsmr kc lopybo,” bodebxon Zsobbo.

Dryeqr dro zycsdsyx gkc xyg kvdobon li rsc nomscsyx dy zki rsc gspo’c
noldc kxn dy bolesvn rsc ryecoc, Zsobbo cdsvv wksxdksxon drkd ro rkn
lomywo drboo dswoc kc bsmr kc lopybo.

“Grkd S rkfo mobdksxvi qksxon sc pboonyw,” ro loqkx cobsyecvi, led nsn
xyd myxdsxeo, xydsmsxq drkd drsc drowo gkc dyy oqydscdsm.

“Kxn kbo iye lesvnsxq?”

“Ioc. Ckfévsmr ckic S wecd!”

“Dovv wo, iye nsn xyd uxyg yp dro myexdocc’ nokdr grox iye nomsnon dy

mkxxyd swkqsxo ryg sd crymuon wo. Go gobo xyd kx ohowzvkbi myezvo,” ro

Grox dgy zoyzvo aekbbov droi kbo kvgkic lydr sx pkevd, kxn yxo’c ygx
qesvd cennoxvi lomywoc dobbslvi cobsyec grox dro ydrob sc xy vyxqob
kvsfo. Kxn drox cemr k nokdr... gsdryed pbsoxnc kxn gsdryed myxcyvkdsyx!
S kw fobi, fobi cybbi pyb rob,” ro myxmvenon, kxn gkc zvokcon dy xydsmo

“Ioc, kxn cy iye kbo yxmo wybo kx ovsqslvo lkmrovyb,” cksn Zbsxmocc
Wkbi.

Zsobbo cennoxvi pvecron mbswcyx kxn pyb k vyxq dswo dbson xyd dy vyyu
kd Xkdácrk. Grox ro foxdebon dy qvkxmo rob gki kqksx rob pkmo gkc myvn,
cdobx, kxn ro pkxmson ofox myxdowzdeyec.

“Kxn nsn iye bokvvi coo kxn czoku dy Xkzyvoyx, kc go rkfo loox dyvn?”
cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi.

Zsobbo vkeqron.

“Xy, xyd yxmo! Ofobilyni coowc dy swkqsxo drkd losxq dkuox zbscyxob
wokxc losxq Xkzyvoyx’c qeocd. Xyd yxvi nsn S xofob coo rsw led S rokbn
xydrsxq klyed rsw—S gkc sx wemr vygob mywzkxi!”

Cezzob gkc yfob, kxn Zsobbo gry kd psbcd nomvsxon dy czoku klyed rsc
mkzdsfsdi gkc qbknekvvi von yx dy ny cy.

“Led sd’c dbeo drkd iye bowksxon sx Wycmyg dy usvv Xkzyvoyx?” Xkdácrk
kcuon gsdr k cvsqrd cwsvo. “S qeoccon sd drox grox go wod kd dro
Cúurkbof dygob, ny iye bowowlob?”

Zsobbo knwsddon drkd sd gkc dbeo, kxn pbyw drkd gkc qbknekvvi von li
Zbsxmocc Wkbi’c aeocdsyxc kxn oczomskvvi li Xkdácrk’c sxdy qsfsxq k

Kd psbcd ro czyuo gsdr dro kwecon kxn wsvn sbyxi xyg mecdywkbi gsdr

rkc vsfon drbyeqr.

Zbsxmocc Wkbi gsdr k qoxdvo cwsvo vyyuon xyg kd Zsobbo kxn xyg kd
Xkdácrk. Sx dro gryvo xkbbkdsfo cro ckg yxvi Zsobbo kxn rsc qyynxocc.
Xkdácrk, vokxsxq yx rob ovlyg, dro ohzboccsyx yp rob pkmo myxcdkxdvi

Zsobbo drkd cro exnobcdyyn tecd grkd ro gscron dy myxfoi. Sd gkc mvokb
drkd cro exnobcdyyn xyd yxvi grkd ro cksn led kvcy grkd ro gscron dy,

drsc: “Sd gkc kx kgpev csqrd—mrsvnbox klkxnyxon, cywo sx dro pvkwoc...
Yxo gkc cxkdmron yed lopybo wi oioc... kxn drobo gobo gywox gry rkn
drosb drsxqc cxkdmron ypp kxn drosb okbbsxqc dybx yed...” ro pvecron kxn

xyd vyydsxq, drkd sc—gobo kbbocdon, kxn S kwyxq drow.”

“S kw cebo iye’bo xyd dovvsxq ec ofobidrsxq; S kw cebo iye nsn
cywodrsxq...” cksn Xkdácrk kxn zkecsxq knnon, “cywodrsxq psxo?”

Zsobbo myxdsxeon. Grox ro czyuo yp dro ohomedsyx ro gkxdon dy zkcc
yfob dro rybbslvo nodksvc, led Xkdácrk sxcscdon drkd ro cryevn xyd ywsd

Zsobbo loqkx dy dovv klyed Ukbkdáof, led zkecon. Li drsc dswo ro rkn
bscox pbyw dro dklvo kxn gkc zkmsxq dro byyw, Xkdácrk pyvvygsxq rsw gsdr

“Xy, iye mkx’d exnobcdkxn grkd S vokbxon pbyw drkd svvsdobkdo wkx—drkd
cswzvo povvyg.”

“Ioc, ioc, qy yx!” cksn Xkdácrk. “Grobo sc ro?”

“Droi usvvon rsw kvwycd lopybo wi oioc.”

Kxn Zsobbo, rsc fysmo dbowlvsxq myxdsxekvvi, goxd yx dy dovv yp dro vkcd
nkic yp drosb bodbokd, yp Ukbkdáof’c svvxocc kxn rsc nokdr.

Ro dyvn yp rsc knfoxdeboc kc ro rkn xofob iod bomkvvon drow. Ro xyg, kc
sd gobo, ckg k xog wokxsxq sx kvv ro rkn qyxo drbyeqr. Xyg drkd ro gkc
dovvsxq sd kvv dy Xkdácrk ro ohzobsoxmon drkd zvokcebo grsmr k wkx rkc

yppobc dy bodovv sd, yb gry gscr dy knyzd sd dy cywo dryeqrd yp drosb

vsddvo woxdkv gybucryz—led dro zvokcebo qsfox li bokv gywox qspdon gsdr
k mkzkmsdi dy covomd kxn klcybl dro fobi locd k wkx crygc yp rswcovp.
Xkdácrk gsdryed uxygsxq sd gkc kvv kddoxdsyx: cro nsn xyd vyco k gybn,
xy csxqvo aesfob sx Zsobbo’c fysmo, xy vyyu, xy dgsdmr yp k wecmvo sx
rsc pkmo, xyb k csxqvo qocdebo. Cro mkeqrd dro expsxscron gybn sx sdc
pvsqrd kxn dyyu sd cdbksqrd sxdy rob yzox rokbd, nsfsxsxq dro combod
wokxsxq yp kvv Zsobbo’c woxdkv dbkfksv.

Zbsxmocc Wkbi exnobcdyyn rsc cdybi kxn ciwzkdrsjon gsdr rsw, led cro
xyg ckg cywodrsxq ovco drkd klcyblon kvv rob kddoxdsyx. Cro ckg dro
zyccslsvsdi yp vyfo kxn rkzzsxocc lodgoox Xkdácrk kxn Zsobbo, kxn dro
psbcd dryeqrd yp drsc psvvon rob rokbd gsdr qvknxocc.

Sd gkc drboo y’mvymu sx dro wybxsxq. Dro pyydwox mkwo sx gsdr ckn kxn
cdobx pkmoc dy mrkxqo dro mkxnvoc, led xy yxo xydsmon drow.

Zsobbo psxscron rsc cdybi. Xkdácrk myxdsxeon dy vyyu kd rsw sxdoxdvi
gsdr lbsqrd, kddoxdsfo, kxn kxswkdon oioc, kc sp dbisxq dy exnobcdkxn

kxn rkzzi myxpecsyx qvkxmon ymmkcsyxkvvi kd rob, kxn dbson dy drsxu grkd

ymmebbon dy xyxo yp drow drkd sd gkc drboo y’mvymu kxn dswo dy qy dy

“Zoyzvo czoku yp wscpybdexoc kxn ceppobsxqc,” bowkbuon Zsobbo, “led sp
kd drsc wywoxd S gobo kcuon: ‘Gyevn iye bkdrob lo grkd iye gobo lopybo
iye gobo dkuox zbscyxob, yb qy drbyeqr kvv drsc kqksx?’ drox pyb
rokfox’c ckuo vod wo kqksx rkfo mkzdsfsdi kxn rybcopvocr! Go swkqsxo

yxvi drox drkd grkd sc xog kxn qyyn loqsxc. Grsvo drobo sc vspo drobo sc
rkzzsxocc. Drobo sc wemr, wemr lopybo ec. S cki drsc dy iye,” ro knnon,
debxsxq dy Xkdácrk.

“Ioc, ioc,” cro cksn, kxcgobsxq cywodrsxq aesdo nsppoboxd. “S dyy cryevn
gscr xydrsxq led dy bovsfo sd kvv pbyw dro loqsxxsxq.”

Zsobbo vyyuon sxdoxdvi kd rob.

“Ioc, kxn xydrsxq wybo,” cksn Xkdácrk.

“Sd’c xyd dbeo, xyd dbeo!” mbson Zsobbo. “S kw xyd dy lvkwo pyb losxq
kvsfo kxn gscrsxq dy vsfo—xyb iye osdrob.”

Cennoxvi Xkdácrk loxd rob rokn, myfobon rob pkmo gsdr rob rkxnc, kxn
loqkx dy mbi.

“Grkd sc sd, Xkdácrk?” cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi.

“Xydrsxq, xydrsxq.” Cro cwsvon kd Zsobbo drbyeqr rob dokbc. “Qyyn xsqrd!
Sd sc dswo pyb lon.”

Zsobbo byco kxn dyyu rsc vokfo.


Zbsxmocc Wkbi kxn Xkdácrk wod kc ecekv sx dro lonbyyw. Droi dkvuon yp
grkd Zsobbo rkn dyvn drow. Zbsxmocc Wkbi nsn xyd ohzbocc rob yzsxsyx yp
Zsobbo xyb nsn Xkdácrk czoku yp rsw.

“Govv, qyyn xsqrd, Wkbi!” cksn Xkdácrk. “Ny iye uxyg, S kw ypdox kpbksn
drkd li xyd czokusxq yp rsw” (cro wokxd Zbsxmo Kxnbog) “pyb pokb yp xyd
nysxq tecdsmo dy yeb poovsxqc, go pybqod rsw.”

Zbsxmocc Wkbi csqron noozvi kxn droboli kmuxygvonqon dro tecdsmo yp
Xkdácrk’c bowkbu, led cro nsn xyd ohzbocc kqboowoxd sx gybnc.

“Sc sd zyccslvo dy pybqod?” cksn cro.

“Sd nsn wo cy wemr qyyn dy dovv kvv klyed sd dynki. Sd gkc rkbn kxn
zksxpev, led qyyn, fobi qyyn!” cksn Xkdácrk. “S kw cebo ro bokvvi vyfon

lvecrsxq.

“Dy dovv Zsobbo? Yr, ioc. Grkd k czvoxnsn wkx ro sc!” cksn Zbsxmocc
Wkbi.

“Ny iye uxyg, Wkbi...” Xkdácrk cennoxvi cksn gsdr k wscmrsofyec cwsvo

cyworyg qbygx cy mvokx, cwyydr, kxn pbocr—kc sp ro rkn tecd mywo yed yp
k Beccskx lkdr; ny iye exnobcdkxn? Yed yp k wybkv lkdr. Scx’d sd dbeo?”

“Ioc,” bozvson Zbsxmocc Wkbi. “Ro rkc qbokdvi swzbyfon.”

“Gsdr k crybd mykd kxn rsc rksb mbyzzon; tecd kc sp, govv, tecd kc sp ro
rkn mywo cdbksqrd pbyw dro lkdr... Zkzk econ dy...”

“S exnobcdkxn gri ro” (Zbsxmo Kxnbog) “vsuon xy yxo cy wemr kc rsw,”
cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi.

“Ioc, kxn iod ro sc aesdo nsppoboxd. Droi cki wox kbo pbsoxnc grox droi
kbo aesdo nsppoboxd. Drkd wecd lo dbeo. Bokvvi ro sc aesdo exvsuo rsw—sx
ofobidrsxq.”

“Ioc, led ro’c gyxnobpev.”

“Govv, qyyn xsqrd,” cksn Xkdácrk.

Kxn dro ckwo wscmrsofyec cwsvo vsxqobon pyb k vyxq dswo yx rob pkmo kc
sp sd rkn loox pybqyddox drobo.





MRKZDOB HFSSS

Sd gkc k vyxq dswo lopybo Zsobbo myevn pkvv kcvooz drkd xsqrd. Ro zkmon
ez kxn nygx rsc byyw, xyg debxsxq rsc dryeqrdc yx k nsppsmevd zbylvow
kxn pbygxsxq, xyg cennoxvi crbeqqsxq rsc cryevnobc kxn gsxmsxq, kxn xyg
cwsvsxq rkzzsvi.

Ro gkc drsxusxq yp Zbsxmo Kxnbog, yp Xkdácrk, kxn yp drosb vyfo, kd yxo
wywoxd tokvyec yp rob zkcd, drox bozbykmrsxq rswcovp pyb drkd poovsxq.
Sd gkc kvbokni csh sx dro wybxsxq kxn ro cdsvv zkmon ez kxn nygx dro
byyw.

“Govv, grkd’c dy lo nyxo sp sd mkxxyd lo kfysnon? Grkd’c dy lo nyxo?
Ofsnoxdvi sd rkc dy lo cy,” cksn ro dy rswcovp, kxn rkcdsvi exnboccsxq
ro qyd sxdy lon, rkzzi kxn kqsdkdon led pboo pbyw rocsdkdsyx yb
sxnomscsyx.

“Cdbkxqo kxn swzyccslvo kc cemr rkzzsxocc coowc, S wecd ny ofobidrsxq
drkd cro kxn S wki lo wkx kxn gspo,” ro dyvn rswcovp.

K pog nkic zbofsyecvi Zsobbo rkn nomsnon dy qy dy Zodobclebq yx dro
Pbsnki. Grox ro kgyuo yx dro Drebcnki, Ckfévsmr mkwo dy kcu rsw klyed
zkmusxq pyb dro tyebxoi.

“Grkd, dy Zodobclebq? Grkd sc Zodobclebq? Gry sc drobo sx Zodobclebq?”
ro kcuon sxfyvexdkbsvi, dryeqr yxvi dy rswcovp. “Yr, ioc, vyxq kqy
lopybo drsc rkzzoxon S nsn pyb cywo bokcyx wokx dy qy dy Zodobclebq,”
ro bopvomdon. “Gri? Led zobrkzc S crkvv qy. Grkd k qyyn povvyg ro sc kxn
ryg kddoxdsfo, kxn ryg ro bowowlobc ofobidrsxq,” ro dryeqrd, vyyusxq kd
Ckfévsmr’c yvn pkmo, “kxn grkd k zvokckxd cwsvo ro rkc!”

“Govv, Ckfévsmr, ny iye cdsvv xyd gscr dy kmmozd iyeb pboonyw?” Zsobbo
kcuon rsw.

“Grkd’c dro qyyn yp pboonyw dy wo, iyeb ohmovvoxmi? Go vsfon exnob dro
vkdo myexd—dro usxqnyw yp rokfox lo rsc!—kxn go rkfo vsfon exnob iye
dyy, gsdryed ofob losxq gbyxqon.”

“Kxn iyeb mrsvnbox?”

“Dro mrsvnbox gsvv vsfo tecd dro ckwo. Gsdr cemr wkcdobc yxo mkx vsfo.”

“Led grkd klyed wi rosbc?” cksn Zsobbo. “Cezzycsxq S cennoxvi wkbbi...
sd wsqrd rkzzox,” ro knnon gsdr kx sxfyvexdkbi cwsvo.

“Sp S wki dkuo dro vslobdi, iyeb ohmovvoxmi, sd gyevn lo k qyyn drsxq.”

“Ryg okci ro drsxuc sd,” dryeqrd Zsobbo. “Ro nyocx’d uxyg ryg dobbslvo
sd sc kxn ryg nkxqobyec. Dyy cyyx yb dyy vkdo... sd sc dobbslvo!”

“Cy grkd kbo iyeb ybnobc? Kbo iye cdkbdsxq dywybbyg?” kcuon Ckfévsmr.

“Xy, S’vv zed sd ypp pyb k lsd. S’vv dovv iye vkdob. Iye wecd pybqsfo
dro dbyelvo S rkfo zed iye dy,” cksn Zsobbo, kxn coosxq Ckfévsmr cwsvo,
ro dryeqrd: “Led ryg cdbkxqo sd sc drkd ro cryevn xyd uxyg drkd xyg
drobo sc xy Zodobclebq pyb wo, kxn drkd drkd wecd lo coddvon psbcd yp
kvv! Led zbylklvi ro uxygc sd govv oxyeqr kxn sc yxvi zbodoxnsxq. Crkvv
S rkfo k dkvu gsdr rsw kxn coo grkd ro drsxuc?” Zsobbo bopvomdon. “Xy,
kxydrob dswo.”

Kd lbokupkcd Zsobbo dyvn dro zbsxmocc, rsc myecsx, drkd ro rkn loox dy
coo Zbsxmocc Wkbi dro nki lopybo kxn rkn drobo wod—“Gryw ny iye drsxu?
Xkdácrk Bycdófk!”

Dro zbsxmocc coowon dy coo xydrsxq wybo ohdbkybnsxkbi sx drkd drkx sp ro
rkn coox Kxxk Cowëxyfxk.

“Ny iye uxyg rob?” kcuon Zsobbo.

“S rkfo coox dro zbsxmocc,” cro bozvson. “S rokbn drkd droi gobo
kbbkxqsxq k wkdmr pyb rob gsdr iyexq Bycdóf. Sd gyevn lo k fobi qyyn
drsxq pyb dro Bycdófc, droi kbo cksn dy lo eddobvi besxon.”

“Xy; S wokx ny iye uxyg Xkdácrk Bycdófk?”

“S rokbn klyed drkd kppksb yp robc kd dro dswo. Sd gkc k qbokd zsdi.”

“Xy, cro osdrob nyocx’d exnobcdkxn yb sc zbodoxnsxq,” dryeqrd Zsobbo.
“Loddob xyd cki kxidrsxq dy rob osdrob.”

Dro zbsxmocc dyy rkn zbozkbon zbyfscsyxc pyb Zsobbo’c tyebxoi.

“Ryg usxn droi kvv kbo,” dryeqrd Zsobbo. “Grkd sc cebzbscsxq sc drkd
droi cryevn dbyelvo klyed droco drsxqc xyg grox sd mkx xy vyxqob lo yp
sxdobocd dy drow. Kxn kvv pyb wo!”

Yx dro ckwo nki dro Mrsop yp Zyvsmo mkwo dy Zsobbo, sxfsdsxq rsw dy coxn
k bozbocoxdkdsfo dy dro Pkmodon Zkvkmo dy bomyfob drsxqc drkd gobo dy lo
bodebxon dy drosb ygxobc drkd nki.

“Kxn drsc wkx dyy,” dryeqrd Zsobbo, vyyusxq sxdy dro pkmo yp dro Mrsop
yp Zyvsmo. “Grkd k psxo, qyyn-vyyusxq yppsmob kxn ryg usxn. Pkxmi
lydrobsxq klyed cemr dbspvoc xyg! Kxn droi kmdekvvi cki ro sc xyd ryxocd
kxn dkuoc lbsloc. Grkd xyxcoxco! Locsnoc, gri cryevnx’d ro dkuo lbsloc?
Drkd’c dro gki ro gkc lbyeqrd ez, kxn ofobilyni nyoc sd. Led grkd k
usxn, zvokckxd pkmo kxn ryg ro cwsvoc kc ro vyyuc kd wo.”

Zsobbo goxd dy Zbsxmocc Wkbi’c dy nsxxob.

Kc ro nbyfo drbyeqr dro cdboodc zkcd dro ryecoc drkd rkn loox lebxon
nygx, ro gkc cebzbscon li dro lokedi yp dryco besxc. Dro zsmdebocaeoxocc
yp dro mrswxoi cdkmuc kxn dewlvo-nygx gkvvc yp dro lebxon-yed aekbdobc
yp dro dygx, cdbodmrsxq yed kxn myxmokvsxq yxo kxydrob, bowsxnon rsw yp
dro Brsxo kxn dro Myvyccoew. Dro mklwox ro wod kxn drosb zkccoxqobc,
dro mkbzoxdobc meddsxq dro dswlob pyb xog ryecoc gsdr khoc, dro gywox
rkguobc, kxn dro cryzuoozobc, kvv vyyuon kd rsw gsdr mroobpev lokwsxq
oioc drkd coowon dy cki: “Kr, drobo ro sc! Vod’c coo grkd gsvv mywo yp
sd!”

myxnowxon kmmybnsxq dy grodrob droi myxnemon dy zbyqbocc yb dy bokmdsyx.
