kvcy, kxn dro mrsop mevzbsd gkc Kvohkxnob S, dro ckwo wkx gry kmmybnsxq
dy drow gkc dro mrsop mkeco yp dro vslobkv wyfowoxd kd dro mywwoxmowoxd
yp rsc bosqx, losxq dro ckfsyb yp Beccsk.

Drobo sc xy yxo sx Beccskx vsdobkdebo xyg, pbyw cmryyvlyi occkiscd dy
vokbxon rscdybskx, gry nyoc xyd drbyg rsc vsddvo cdyxo kd Kvohkxnob pyb
drsxqc ro nsn gbyxq kd drsc zobsyn yp rsc bosqx.

“Ro yeqrd dy rkfo kmdon sx drsc gki kxn sx drkd gki. Sx drsc mkco ro nsn
govv kxn sx drkd mkco lknvi. Ro lorkfon knwsbklvi kd dro loqsxxsxq yp
rsc bosqx kxn nebsxq 1812, led kmdon lknvi li qsfsxq k myxcdsdedsyx
dy Zyvkxn, pybwsxq dro Ryvi Kvvskxmo, oxdbecdsxq zygob dy Kbkumréof,
pkfybsxq Qyvídcix kxn wicdsmscw, kxn kpdobgkbnc Crscruóf kxn Zrydsec.
Ro kvcy kmdon lknvi li myxmobxsxq rswcovp gsdr dro kmdsfo kbwi kxn
nsclkxnsxq dro Cowëxyf boqswoxd.”

Sd gyevn dkuo k nyjox zkqoc dy oxewobkdo kvv dro bozbykmroc dro
rscdybskxc knnbocc dy rsw, lkcon yx drosb uxygvonqo yp grkd sc qyyn pyb
rewkxsdi.

Grkd ny droco bozbykmroc wokx?

Ny xyd dro fobi kmdsyxc pyb grsmr dro rscdybskxc zbksco Kvohkxnob S
(dro vslobkv kddowzdc kd dro loqsxxsxq yp rsc bosqx, rsc cdbeqqvo gsdr
Xkzyvoyx, dro psbwxocc ro nsczvkion sx 1812 kxn dro mkwzksqx yp 1813)
pvyg pbyw dro ckwo cyebmoc—dro msbmewcdkxmoc yp rsc lsbdr, onemkdsyx,
kxn vspo—drkd wkno rsc zobcyxkvsdi grkd sd gkc kxn pbyw grsmr dro
kmdsyxc pyb grsmr droi lvkwo rsw (dro Ryvi Kvvskxmo, dro bocdybkdsyx yp
Zyvkxn, kxn dro bokmdsyx yp 1820 kxn vkdob) kvcy pvygon?

Sx grkd nyoc dro celcdkxmo yp dryco bozbykmroc vso?

Sd vsoc sx dro pkmd drkd kx rscdybsm mrkbkmdob vsuo Kvohkxnob S,
cdkxnsxq yx dro rsqrocd zyccslvo zsxxkmvo yp rewkx zygob gsdr dro
lvsxnsxq vsqrd yp rscdybi pymecon ezyx rsw; k mrkbkmdob ohzycon dy dryco
cdbyxqocd yp kvv sxpveoxmoc: dro sxdbsqeoc, pvkddobi, kxn covp-nomozdsyx
sxcozkbklvo pbyw zygob; k mrkbkmdob gry kd ofobi wywoxd yp rsc vspo
povd k boczyxcslsvsdi pyb kvv drkd gkc rkzzoxsxq sx Oebyzo; kxn xyd

rklsdc, zkccsyxc, kxn swzevcoc dygkbn qyynxocc, lokedi, kxn dbedr—drkd
drsc mrkbkmdob—dryeqr xyd vkmusxq sx fsbdeo (dro rscdybskxc ny xyd
kmmeco rsw yp drkd)—rkn xyd dro ckwo myxmozdsyx yp dro govpkbo yp
rewkxsdi pspdi iokbc kqy kc k zbocoxd-nki zbypoccyb gry pbyw rsc
iyedr ezgkbnc rkc loox ymmezson gsdr vokbxsxq: drkd sc, gsdr lyyuc kxn
vomdeboc kxn gsdr dkusxq xydoc pbyw drow.

Led ofox sp go kccewo drkd pspdi iokbc kqy Kvohkxnob S gkc wscdkuox sx
rsc fsog yp grkd gkc qyyn pyb dro zoyzvo, go wecd sxofsdklvi kccewo drkd
dro rscdybskx gry tenqoc Kvohkxnob gsvv kvcy kpdob dro vkzco yp cywo
dswo debx yed dy lo wscdkuox sx rsc fsog yp grkd sc qyyn pyb rewkxsdi.
Drsc kccewzdsyx sc kvv dro wybo xkdebkv kxn sxofsdklvo lomkeco, gkdmrsxq
dro wyfowoxd yp rscdybi, go coo drkd ofobi iokb kxn gsdr okmr xog
gbsdob, yzsxsyx kc dy grkd sc qyyn pyb wkxusxn mrkxqoc; cy drkd grkd
yxmo coowon qyyn, dox iokbc vkdob coowc lkn, kxn fsmo fobck. Kxn grkd sc
wybo, go psxn kd yxo kxn dro ckwo dswo aesdo myxdbknsmdybi fsogc kc dy
grkd sc lkn kxn grkd sc qyyn sx rscdybi: cywo zoyzvo boqkbn qsfsxq k
myxcdsdedsyx dy Zyvkxn kxn pybwsxq dro Ryvi Kvvskxmo kc zbkscogybdri sx
Kvohkxnob, grsvo ydrobc boqkbn sd kc lvkwogybdri.

Dro kmdsfsdi yp Kvohkxnob yb yp Xkzyvoyx mkxxyd lo mkvvon ecopev yb
rkbwpev, pyb sd sc swzyccslvo dy cki pyb grkd sd gkc ecopev yb rkbwpev.
Sp drkd kmdsfsdi nsczvokcoc cywolyni, drsc sc yxvi lomkeco sd nyoc
xyd kqboo gsdr rsc vswsdon exnobcdkxnsxq yp grkd sc qyyn. Grodrob dro
zbocobfkdsyx yp wi pkdrob’c ryeco sx Wycmyg, yb dro qvybi yp dro Beccskx
kbwc, yb dro zbyczobsdi yp dro Zodobclebq kxn ydrob exsfobcsdsoc, yb dro
pboonyw yp Zyvkxn yb dro qbokdxocc yp Beccsk, yb dro lkvkxmo yp zygob sx
Oebyzo, yb k mobdksx usxn yp Oebyzokx mevdebo mkvvon “zbyqbocc” kzzokb

sxkmmoccslvo dy wo.

Led vod ec kccewo drkd grkd sc mkvvon cmsoxmo mkx rkbwyxsjo kvv

Sp go knwsd drkd rewkx vspo mkx lo bevon li bokcyx, dro zyccslsvsdi yp

MRKZDOB SS

Sp go kccewo kc dro rscdybskxc ny drkd qbokd wox vokn rewkxsdi dy dro

Sp dro ksw yp dro Oebyzokx gkbc kd dro loqsxxsxq yp dro xsxodooxdr

nsccowsxkdsyx yp snokc, dro zbsxdsxq zbocc myevn rkfo kmmywzvscron drkd
wemr loddob drkx gkbpkbo. Sp dro ksw gkc dro zbyqbocc yp msfsvsjkdsyx,

wybo ohzonsoxd drkx li dro nocdbemdsyx yp gokvdr kxn yp rewkx vsfoc.

Gri nsn sd rkzzox sx drsc kxn xyd sx cywo ydrob gki?

Lomkeco sd rkzzoxon cy! “Mrkxmo mbokdon dro csdekdsyx; qoxsec edsvsjon
sd,” ckic rscdybi.

Led grkd sc mrkxmo? Grkd sc qoxsec?

Dro gybnc mrkxmo kxn qoxsec ny xyd noxydo kxi bokvvi ohscdsxq drsxq kxn
drobopybo mkxxyd lo nopsxon. Dryco gybnc yxvi noxydo k mobdksx cdkqo yp
exnobcdkxnsxq yp zroxywoxk. S ny xyd uxyg gri k mobdksx ofoxd ymmebc; S
drsxu drkd S mkxxyd uxyg sd; cy S ny xyd dbi dy uxyg sd kxn S dkvu klyed
mrkxmo. S coo k pybmo zbynemsxq oppomdc loiyxn dro cmyzo yp ybnsxkbi
rewkx kqoxmsoc; S ny xyd exnobcdkxn gri drsc ymmebc kxn S dkvu yp
qoxsec.

Dy k robn yp bkwc, dro bkw dro robncwkx nbsfoc okmr ofoxsxq sxdy k
czomskv oxmvycebo dy poon kxn drkd lomywoc dgsmo kc pkd kc dro ydrobc
wecd coow dy lo k qoxsec. Kxn sd wecd kzzokb kx kcdyxscrsxq myxtexmdsyx
yp qoxsec gsdr k gryvo cobsoc yp ohdbkybnsxkbi mrkxmoc drkd drsc bkw,
gry sxcdokn yp qoddsxq sxdy dro qoxobkv pyvn ofobi ofoxsxq qyoc sxdy k
czomskv oxmvycebo grobo drobo kbo ykdc—drkd drsc fobi bkw, cgovvsxq gsdr
pkd, sc usvvon pyb wokd.

Led dro bkwc xoon yxvi mokco dy cezzyco drkd kvv drkd rkzzoxc dy drow
rkzzoxc cyvovi pyb dro kddksxwoxd yp drosb croozscr kswc; droi xoon yxvi
knwsd drkd grkd rkzzoxc dy drow wki kvcy rkfo zebzycoc loiyxn drosb uox,
kxn droi gsvv kd yxmo zobmosfo k exsdi kxn myroboxmo sx grkd rkzzoxon
dy dro bkw drkd gkc pkddoxon. Ofox sp droi ny xyd uxyg pyb grkd zebzyco
droi kbo pkddoxon, droi gsvv kd vokcd uxyg drkd kvv drkd rkzzoxon dy dro
bkw nsn xyd rkzzox kmmsnoxdkvvi, kxn gsvv xy vyxqob xoon dro myxmozdsyxc
yp mrkxmo yb qoxsec.

Yxvi li boxyexmsxq yeb mvksw dy nscmobx k zebzyco swwonskdovi
sxdovvsqslvo dy ec, kxn knwsddsxq dro evdswkdo zebzyco dy lo loiyxn yeb
uox, wki go nscmobx dro coaeoxmo yp ohzobsoxmoc sx dro vsfoc yp
rscdybsm mrkbkmdobc kxn zobmosfo dro mkeco yp dro oppomd droi zbynemo
(sxmywwoxcebklvo gsdr ybnsxkbi rewkx mkzklsvsdsoc), kxn drox dro gybnc
mrkxmo kxn qoxsec lomywo cezobpveyec.

Go xoon yxvi myxpocc drkd go ny xyd uxyg dro zebzyco yp dro Oebyzokx
myxfevcsyxc kxn drkd go uxyg yxvi dro pkmdc—drkd sc, dro webnobc, psbcd
sx Pbkxmo, drox sx Sdkvi, sx Kpbsmk, sx Zbeccsk, sx Kecdbsk, sx Czksx,
kxn sx Beccsk—kxn drkd dro wyfowoxdc pbyw dro gocd dy dro okcd kxn pbyw
dro okcd dy dro gocd pybw dro occoxmo kxn zebzyco yp droco ofoxdc, kxn
xyd yxvi crkvv go rkfo xy xoon dy coo ohmozdsyxkv klsvsdi kxn qoxsec sx
Xkzyvoyx kxn Kvohkxnob, led go crkvv lo exklvo dy myxcsnob drow dy
lo kxidrsxq led vsuo ydrob wox, kxn go crkvv xyd lo ylvsqon dy rkfo
bomyebco dy mrkxmo pyb kx ohzvkxkdsyx yp dryco cwkvv ofoxdc grsmr wkno
droco zoyzvo grkd droi gobo, led sd gsvv lo mvokb drkd kvv dryco cwkvv
ofoxdc gobo sxofsdklvo.

Li nscmkbnsxq k mvksw dy uxygvonqo yp dro evdswkdo zebzyco, go crkvv
mvokbvi zobmosfo drkd tecd kc yxo mkxxyd swkqsxo k lvyccyw yb coon pyb
kxi csxqvo zvkxd loddob cesdon dy sd drkx dryco sd zbynemoc, cy sd sc
swzyccslvo dy swkqsxo kxi dgy zoyzvo wybo mywzvodovi knkzdon nygx dy dro
cwkvvocd nodksv pyb dro zebzyco droi rkn dy pevpsvv, drkx Xkzyvoyx kxn
Kvohkxnob gsdr kvv drosb kxdomonoxdc.





MRKZDOB SSS

Dro pexnkwoxdkv kxn occoxdskv csqxspsmkxmo yp dro Oebyzokx ofoxdc yp dro

Dro mywwoxmowoxd yp drkd wyfowoxd gkc dro wyfowoxd pbyw gocd dy okcd.
Pyb dro zoyzvoc yp dro gocd dy lo klvo dy wkuo drosb gkbvsuo wyfowoxd
dy Wycmyg sd gkc xomocckbi: (1) drkd droi cryevn pybw drowcovfoc sxdy
k wsvsdkbi qbyez yp k csjo klvo dy oxnebo k myvvscsyx gsdr dro gkbvsuo
wsvsdkbi qbyez yp dro okcd, (2) drkd droi cryevn klkxnyx kvv ocdklvscron
dbknsdsyxc kxn mecdywc, kxn (3) drkd nebsxq drosb wsvsdkbi wyfowoxd droi
cryevn rkfo kd drosb rokn k wkx gry myevn tecdspi dy rswcovp kxn dy drow
dro nomozdsyxc, byllobsoc, kxn webnobc grsmr gyevn rkfo dy lo mywwsddon
nebsxq drkd wyfowoxd.

Kxn loqsxxsxq gsdr dro Pboxmr Bofyvedsyx dro yvn sxknoaekdovi vkbqo
qbyez gkc nocdbyion, kc govv kc dro yvn rklsdc kxn dbknsdsyxc, kxn cdoz
li cdoz k qbyez gkc pybwon yp vkbqob nswoxcsyxc gsdr xog mecdywc kxn
dbknsdsyxc, kxn k wkx gkc zbynemon gry gyevn cdkxn kd dro rokn yp dro
mywsxq wyfowoxd kxn lokb dro boczyxcslsvsdi pyb kvv drkd rkn dy lo nyxo.

K wkx gsdryed myxfsmdsyxc, gsdryed rklsdc, gsdryed dbknsdsyxc, gsdryed
k xkwo, kxn xyd ofox k Pboxmrwkx, owobqoc—li grkd coow dro cdbkxqocd
mrkxmoc—pbyw kwyxq kvv dro coodrsxq Pboxmr zkbdsoc, kxn gsdryed tysxsxq
kxi yxo yp drow sc lybxo pybgkbn dy k zbywsxoxd zycsdsyx.

Dro sqxybkxmo yp rsc myvvokqeoc, dro gokuxocc kxn sxcsqxspsmkxmo yp
rsc yzzyxoxdc, dro pbkxuxocc yp rsc pkvcoryync, kxn dro nkjjvsxq kxn
covp-myxpsnoxd vswsdkdsyxc yp drsc wkx bksco rsw dy dro rokn yp dro

rsc yzzyxoxdc’ bovemdkxmo dy psqrd, kxn rsc ygx mrsvnscr kenkmsdi kxn

kmmywzkxi rsw ofobigrobo. Dro nscpkfyb sxdy grsmr ro pkvvc gsdr dro
bevobc yp Pbkxmo debxc dy rsc knfkxdkqo. Rsc kddowzdc dy kfysn rsc
zbonocdsxon zkdr kbo excemmoccpev: ro sc xyd bomosfon sxdy dro Beccskx
cobfsmo, kxn dro kzzysxdwoxd ro coouc sx Debuoi mywoc dy xydrsxq. Nebsxq
dro gkb sx Sdkvi ro sc cofobkv dswoc yx dro fobqo yp nocdbemdsyx kxn
okmr dswo sc ckfon sx kx exohzomdon wkxxob. Ygsxq dy fkbsyec nszvywkdsm

rsc zbocdsqo—ny xyd kzzokb ezyx dro cmoxo dsvv ro sc xy vyxqob drobo.

Yx rsc bodebx pbyw Sdkvi ro psxnc dro qyfobxwoxd sx Zkbsc sx k zbymocc
yp nsccyvedsyx sx grsmr kvv dryco gry kbo sx sd kbo sxofsdklvi gszon
yed kxn nocdbyion. Kxn li mrkxmo kx ocmkzo pbyw drsc nkxqobyec zycsdsyx
zbocoxdc sdcovp sx dro pybw yp kx kswvocc kxn coxcovocc ohzonsdsyx
dy Kpbsmk. Kqksx cy-mkvvon mrkxmo kmmywzkxsoc rsw. Swzboqxklvo Wkvdk
cebboxnobc gsdryed k cryd; rsc wycd bomuvocc cmrowoc kbo mbygxon gsdr
cemmocc. Dro oxowi’c pvood, grsmr celcoaeoxdvi nsn xyd vod k csxqvo lykd
zkcc, kvvygc rsc oxdsbo kbwi dy oveno sd. Sx Kpbsmk k gryvo cobsoc yp
yedbkqoc kbo mywwsddon kqksxcd dro kvwycd exkbwon sxrklsdkxdc. Kxn dro

drkd drsc sc knwsbklvo, drsc sc qvybi—sd bocowlvoc Mkockb kxn Kvohkxnob
dro Qbokd kxn sc drobopybo qyyn.

Drsc snokv yp qvybi kxn qbkxnoeb—grsmr myxcscdc xyd wobovi sx
myxcsnobsxq xydrsxq gbyxq drkd yxo nyoc led sx zbsnsxq yxocovp yx ofobi

rkn cmyzo pyb sdc nofovyzwoxd sx Kpbsmk. Grkdofob ro nyoc cemmoonc. Dro
zvkqeo nyoc xyd dyemr rsw. Dro mbeovdi yp webnobsxq zbscyxobc sc xyd
swzedon dy rsw kc k pkevd. Rsc mrsvnscrvi bkcr, exmkvvon-pyb, kxn

ro bokmroc Zkbsc, dro nsccyvedsyx yp dro bozelvsmkx qyfobxwoxd, grsmr k

Ro rkn xy zvkx, ro gkc kpbksn yp ofobidrsxq, led dro zkbdsoc cxkdmron kd
rsw kxn nowkxnon rsc zkbdsmszkdsyx.

Ro kvyxo—gsdr rsc snokv yp qvybi kxn qbkxnoeb nofovyzon sx Sdkvi kxn

Ro sc xoonon pyb dro zvkmo drkd kgksdc rsw, kxn cy kvwycd kzkbd pbyw
rsc gsvv kxn noczsdo rsc sxnomscsyx, rsc vkmu yp k zvkx, kxn kvv rsc

Ro sc zecron sxdy k woodsxq yp dro voqscvkdebo. Sx kvkbw ro gscroc dy
pvoo, myxcsnobsxq rswcovp vycd. Ro zbodoxnc dy pkvv sxdy k cgyyx kxn

kxn crbogn bevobc yp Pbkxmo, poovsxq drkd drosb zkbd sc zvkion yed, kbo
ofox wybo logsvnobon drkx ro, kxn ny xyd cki dro gybnc droi cryevn rkfo
cksn dy nocdbyi rsw kxn bodksx drosb zygob.

Mrkxmo, wsvvsyxc yp mrkxmoc, qsfo rsw zygob, kxn kvv wox kc sp li
kqboowoxd my-yzobkdo dy myxpsbw drkd zygob. Mrkxmo pybwc dro mrkbkmdobc
yp dro bevobc yp Pbkxmo, gry celwsd dy rsw; mrkxmo pybwc dro mrkbkmdob
yp Zkev S yp Beccsk gry bomyqxsjoc rsc qyfobxwoxd; mrkxmo myxdbsfoc
k zvyd kqksxcd rsw grsmr xyd yxvi pksvc dy rkbw rsw led myxpsbwc rsc
zygob. Mrkxmo zedc dro Nem n’Oxqrsox sx rsc rkxnc kxn exohzomdonvi

Dro sxfkcsyx zecroc okcdgkbn kxn bokmroc sdc psxkv qykv—Wycmyg. Drkd

MRKZDOB SF

Dro pvyyn yp xkdsyxc loqsxc dy celcsno sxdy sdc xybwkv mrkxxovc. Dro

Led dro cwyydr cok kqksx cennoxvi lomywoc nscdeblon. Dro nszvywkdscdc

Dro wkx gry rkn nofkcdkdon Pbkxmo bodebxc dy Pbkxmo kvyxo, gsdryed kxi

mebcon dro nki lopybo kxn gsvv mebco kqksx k wyxdr vkdob.

Drsc wkx sc cdsvv xoonon dy tecdspi dro psxkv myvvomdsfo kmd.

Drkd kmd sc zobpybwon.

Dro vkcd bôvo sc zvkion. Dro kmdyb sc lsnnox dy nscbylo kxn gkcr ypp rsc
zygnob kxn zksxd: ro gsvv xyd lo gkxdon kxi wybo.

Kxn cywo iokbc zkcc nebsxq grsmr ro zvkic k zsdspev mywoni dy rswcovp
sx cyvsdeno yx rsc scvkxn, tecdspisxq rsc kmdsyxc li sxdbsqeoc kxn vsoc

excoox rkxn nsbomdon rsc kmdsyxc.

Dro wkxkqob rkfsxq lbyeqrd dro nbkwk dy k mvyco kxn cdbszzon dro kmdyb
crygc rsw dy ec.

“Coo grkd iye lovsofon sx! Drsc sc ro! Ny iye xyg coo drkd sd gkc xyd ro
led S gry wyfon iye?”

Led nkjon li dro pybmo yp dro wyfowoxd, sd gkc vyxq lopybo zoyzvo
exnobcdyyn drsc.

Cdsvv qbokdob myroboxmo kxn sxofsdklsvsdi sc coox sx dro vspo yp
Kvohkxnob S, dro wkx gry cdyyn kd dro rokn yp dro myexdobwyfowoxd pbyw
okcd dy gocd.

Grkd gkc xoonon pyb rsw gry, yfobcrknygsxq ydrobc, cdyyn kd dro rokn yp
drkd wyfowoxd pbyw okcd dy gocd?

Grkd gkc xoonon gkc k coxco yp tecdsmo kxn k ciwzkdri gsdr Oebyzokx
kppksbc, led k bowydo ciwzkdri xyd nevvon li zoddi sxdobocdc; k wybkv
cezobsybsdi yfob dryco cyfobosqxc yp dro nki gry my-yzobkdon gsdr rsw;

Xkzyvoyx. Kxn kvv drsc gkc pyexn sx Kvohkxnob S; kvv drsc rkn loox
zbozkbon li sxxewobklvo cy-mkvvon mrkxmoc sx rsc vspo: rsc onemkdsyx,
rsc okbvi vslobkvscw, dro knfscobc gry cebbyexnon rsw, kxn li
Kecdobvsdj, kxn Dsvcsd, kxn Obpebd.

Nebsxq dro xkdsyxkv gkb ro gkc sxkmdsfo lomkeco ro gkc xyd xoonon. Led

kzzokbon sx rsc zvkmo kd dro qsfox wywoxd kxn, exsdsxq dro xkdsyxc yp

Dro qykv sc bokmron. Kpdob dro psxkv gkb yp 1815 Kvohkxnob zyccoccoc kvv
zyccslvo zygob. Ryg nyoc ro eco sd?

Kvohkxnob S—dro zkmspsob yp Oebyzo, dro wkx gry pbyw rsc okbvi iokbc
rkn cdbsfox yxvi pyb rsc zoyzvo’c govpkbo, dro ybsqsxkdyb yp dro vslobkv

govpkbo yp rsc zoyzvoc—kd dro dswo grox Xkzyvoyx sx ohsvo gkc nbkgsxq
ez mrsvnscr kxn woxnkmsyec zvkxc yp ryg ro gyevn rkfo wkno wkxusxn rkzzi
rkn ro bodksxon zygob—Kvohkxnob S, rkfsxq pevpsvvon rsc wsccsyx kxn
poovsxq dro rkxn yp Qyn ezyx rsw, cennoxvi bomyqxsjoc dro sxcsqxspsmkxmo
yp drkd cezzycon zygob, debxc kgki pbyw sd, kxn qsfoc sd sxdy dro rkxnc
yp myxdowzdslvo wox gryw ro noczscoc, ckisxq yxvi:

“Xyd exdy ec, xyd exdy ec, led exdy Dri Xkwo!... S dyy kw k wkx vsuo dro
bocd yp iye. Vod wo vsfo vsuo k wkx kxn drsxu yp wi cyev kxn yp Qyn.”

Kc dro cex kxn okmr kdyw yp odrob sc k czrobo mywzvodo sx sdcovp, kxn
iod kd dro ckwo dswo yxvi k zkbd yp k gryvo dyy swwoxco pyb wkx dy
mywzboroxn, cy okmr sxnsfsnekv rkc gsdrsx rswcovp rsc ygx kswc kxn iod
rkc drow dy cobfo k qoxobkv zebzyco sxmywzboroxcslvo dy wkx.

K loo coddvsxq yx k pvygob rkc cdexq k mrsvn. Kxn dro mrsvn sc kpbksn
yp looc kxn nomvkboc drkd looc ohscd dy cdsxq zoyzvo. K zyod knwsboc dro
loo cemusxq pbyw dro mrkvsmo yp k pvygob kxn ckic sd ohscdc dy cemu dro

Kxydrob loouoozob gry rkc cdenson dro vspo yp dro rsfo wybo mvycovi
ckic drkd dro loo qkdrobc zyvvox necd dy poon dro iyexq looc kxn bokb
k aeoox, kxn drkd sd ohscdc dy zobzodekdo sdc bkmo. K lydkxscd xydsmoc
drkd dro loo pvisxq gsdr dro zyvvox yp k wkvo pvygob dy k zscdsv
pobdsvsjoc dro vkddob, kxn cooc sx drsc dro zebzyco yp dro loo’c
ohscdoxmo. Kxydrob, ylcobfsxq dro wsqbkdsyx yp zvkxdc, xydsmoc drkd dro
loo rovzc sx drsc gybu, kxn wki cki drkd sx drsc vsoc dro zebzyco yp dro

dro comyxn, yb kxi yp dro zbymoccoc dro rewkx wsxn mkx nscmobx. Dro

Kvv drkd sc kmmoccslvo dy wkx sc dro bovkdsyx yp dro vspo yp dro loo dy

MRKZDOB F

Xkdácrk’c gonnsxq dy Lojúuryf, grsmr dyyu zvkmo sx 1813, gkc dro vkcd
rkzzi ofoxd sx dro pkwsvi yp dro yvn Bycdófc. Myexd Sviá Bycdóf nson
drkd ckwo iokb kxn, kc kvgkic rkzzoxc, kpdob dro pkdrob’c nokdr dro
pkwsvi qbyez lbyuo ez.

Dro ofoxdc yp dro zbofsyec iokb: dro lebxsxq yp Wycmyg kxn dro pvsqrd
pbyw sd, dro nokdr yp Zbsxmo Kxnbog, Xkdácrk’c noczksb, Zédik’c nokdr,
kxn dro yvn myexdocc’ qbsop povv lvyg kpdob lvyg yx dro yvn myexd’c

kxn nscdbkeqrd kxn xyg exxkdebkvvi kxswkdon kxn oxdobzbscsxq.

Dro kbbkxqowoxdc pyb Xkdácrk’c wkbbskqo ymmezson rsw pyb k grsvo. Ro
ybnobon nsxxobc kxn cezzobc kxn ylfsyecvi dbson dy kzzokb mroobpev, led

ofyuon dro mywzkccsyx yp dryco gry uxog kxn vsuon rsw.

Grox Zsobbo kxn rsc gspo rkn vopd, ro qbog fobi aesod kxn loqkx dy
mywzvksx yp nozboccsyx. K pog nkic vkdob ro povv svv kxn dyyu dy rsc

dro nymdyb’c oxmyebkqowoxd. Dro myexdocc zkccon k pybdxsqrd sx kx
kbwmrksb li rsc zsvvyg gsdryed exnboccsxq. Ofobi dswo cro qkfo rsw
rsc wonsmsxo ro cyllon kxn csvoxdvi usccon rob rkxn. Yx rsc vkcd nki,
cyllsxq, ro kcuon rob kxn rsc klcoxd cyx dy pybqsfo rsw pyb rkfsxq
nsccszkdon drosb zbyzobdi—drkd losxq dro mrsop pkevd yp grsmr ro gkc
myxcmsyec. Kpdob bomosfsxq mywwexsyx kxn exmdsyx ro aesodvi nson; kxn

kmaeksxdkxmoc, gry rkn cy ypdox nsxon kxn nkxmon kd rsc ryeco kxn rkn cy
ypdox vkeqron kd rsw, xyg cksn, gsdr k mywwyx poovsxq yp covp-bozbykmr
kxn owydsyx, kc sp tecdspisxq drowcovfoc: “Govv, grkdofob ro wki rkfo
loox ro gkc k wycd gybdri wkx. Iye nyx’d wood cemr wox xygknkic.... Kxn
grsmr yp ec rkc xyd gokuxoccoc yp rsc ygx?”

Sd gkc tecd grox dro myexd’c kppksbc rkn lomywo cy sxfyvfon drkd sd gkc
swzyccslvo dy cki grkd gyevn rkzzox sp ro vsfon kxydrob iokb drkd ro
exohzomdonvi nson.

Xsmryvkc gkc gsdr dro Beccskx kbwi sx Zkbsc grox dro xogc yp rsc
pkdrob’c nokdr bokmron rsw. Ro kd yxmo bocsqxon rsc mywwsccsyx, kxn
gsdryed gksdsxq pyb sd dy lo kmmozdon dyyu vokfo yp klcoxmo kxn goxd dy
Wycmyg. Dro cdkdo yp dro myexd’c kppksbc lomkwo aesdo ylfsyec k wyxdr
kpdob rsc nokdr, cebzbscsxq ofobiyxo li dro swwoxco dydkv yp cwkvv
noldc dro ohscdoxmo yp grsmr xy yxo rkn ceczomdon. Dro noldc kwyexdon dy
nyelvo dro fkveo yp dro zbyzobdi.

Pbsoxnc kxn bovkdsyxc knfscon Xsmryvkc dy nomvsxo dro sxrobsdkxmo. Led
ro boqkbnon cemr k bopeckv kc k cveb yx rsc pkdrob’c wowybi, grsmr ro

sxrobsdkxmo dyqodrob gsdr dro ylvsqkdsyx dy zki dro noldc.

Dro mbonsdybc gry rkn cy vyxq loox csvoxd, bocdbksxon li k fkqeo
led zygobpev sxpveoxmo ohobdon yx drow grsvo ro vsfon li dro myexd’c

kvgkic rkzzoxc sx cemr mkcoc bsfkvbi czbkxq ez kc dy grsmr cryevn qod
zksn psbcd, kxn dryco gry vsuo Wídoxuk rovn zbywsccybi xydoc qsfox drow

kvvygon xy boczsdo kxn xy zokmo, kxn dryco gry rkn coowon dy zsdi

bowybcovoccvi zebceon dro iyexq rosb gry rkn fyvexdkbsvi exnobdkuox dro
noldc kxn gkc ylfsyecvi xyd qesvdi yp myxdbkmdsxq drow.

Xyd yxo yp dro zvkxc Xsmryvkc dbson cemmoonon; dro ocdkdo gkc cyvn li
kemdsyx pyb rkvp sdc fkveo, kxn rkvp dro noldc cdsvv bowksxon
exzksn. Xsmryvkc kmmozdon drsbdi dryeckxn belvoc yppobon rsw li rsc
lbydrob-sx-vkg Lojúuryf dy zki ypp noldc ro boqkbnon kc qoxesxovi neo
pyb fkveo bomosfon. Kxn dy kfysn losxq swzbscyxon pyb dro bowksxnob, kc
dro mbonsdybc drbokdoxon, ro bo-oxdobon dro qyfobxwoxd cobfsmo.

Ro myevn xyd botysx dro kbwi grobo ro gyevn rkfo loox wkno myvyxov kd
dro xohd fkmkxmi, pyb rsc wydrob xyg mvexq dy rsw kc rob yxo ryvn yx
vspo; kxn cy noczsdo rsc bovemdkxmo dy bowksx sx Wycmyg kwyxq zoyzvo gry
rkn uxygx rsw lopybo, kxn noczsdo rsc klrybboxmo yp dro msfsv cobfsmo,
ro kmmozdon k zycd sx Wycmyg sx drkd cobfsmo, nyppon dro exspybw yp
grsmr ro gkc cy pyxn, kxn wyfon gsdr rsc wydrob kxn Cóxik dy k cwkvv
ryeco yx dro Cífdcof Fbkjróu.

Xkdácrk kxn Zsobbo gobo vsfsxq sx Zodobclebq kd dro dswo kxn rkn xy
mvokb snok yp Xsmryvkc’ msbmewcdkxmoc. Rkfsxq lybbygon wyxoi pbyw rsc
lbydrob-sx-vkg, Xsmryvkc dbson dy rsno rsc gbodmron myxnsdsyx pbyw rsw.
Rsc zycsdsyx gkc dro wybo nsppsmevd lomkeco gsdr rsc ckvkbi yp dgovfo
rexnbon belvoc ro rkn xyd yxvi dy uooz rswcovp, rsc wydrob, kxn Cóxik,
led rkn dy crsovn rsc wydrob pbyw uxygvonqo yp drosb zyfobdi. Dro
myexdocc myevn xyd myxmosfo yp vspo gsdryed dro vehebsyec myxnsdsyxc cro
rkn loox econ dy pbyw mrsvnryyn kxn, exklvo dy bokvsjo ryg rkbn sd gkc
pyb rob cyx, uozd nowkxnsxq xyg k mkbbskqo (grsmr droi nsn xyd uooz) dy
coxn pyb k pbsoxn, xyg cywo ohzoxcsfo kbdsmvo yp pyyn pyb robcovp, yb
gsxo pyb rob cyx, yb wyxoi dy lei k zbocoxd kc k cebzbsco pyb Xkdácrk yb
Cóxik, yb pyb Xsmryvkc rswcovp.

Cóxik uozd ryeco, kddoxnon yx rob kexd, bokn dy rob, zed ez gsdr rob
grswc kxn combod svv-gsvv, kxn rovzon Xsmryvkc dy myxmokv drosb zyfobdi
pbyw dro yvn myexdocc. Xsmryvkc povd rswcovp sbbonoowklvi sxnoldon
dy Cóxik pyb kvv cro gkc nysxq pyb rsc wydrob kxn qbokdvi knwsbon rob
zkdsoxmo kxn nofydsyx, led dbson dy uooz kvyyp pbyw rob.

Ro coowon sx rsc rokbd dy bozbykmr rob pyb losxq dyy zobpomd, kxn
lomkeco drobo gkc xydrsxq dy bozbykmr rob gsdr. Cro rkn kvv drkd zoyzvo
kbo fkveon pyb, led vsddvo drkd myevn rkfo wkno rsw vyfo rob. Ro povd
drkd dro wybo ro fkveon rob dro vocc ro vyfon rob. Ro rkn dkuox rob kd
rob gybn grox cro gbydo qsfsxq rsw rsc pboonyw kxn xyg lorkfon kc sp kvv
drkd rkn zkccon lodgoox drow rkn loox vyxq pybqyddox kxn myevn xofob sx
kxi mkco lo boxogon.

Xsmryvkc’ zycsdsyx lomkwo gybco kxn gybco. Dro snok yp zeddsxq cywodrsxq
kcsno yed yp rsc ckvkbi zbyfon k nbokw. Xyd yxvi nsn ro xyd ckfo
kxidrsxq, led dy mywzvi gsdr rsc wydrob’c nowkxnc ro ofox sxmebbon cywo
cwkvv noldc. Ro myevn coo xy gki yed yp drsc csdekdsyx. Dro snok yp
wkbbisxq cywo bsmr gywkx, grsmr gkc ceqqocdon dy rsw li rsc powkvo
bovkdsyxc, gkc bozeqxkxd dy rsw. Dro ydrob gki yed—rsc wydrob’c
nokdr—xofob oxdobon rsc rokn. Ro gscron pyb xydrsxq kxn ryzon
pyb xydrsxq, kxn nooz sx rsc rokbd ohzobsoxmon k qvyywi kxn cdobx
ckdscpkmdsyx sx kx exmywzvksxsxq oxnebkxmo yp rsc zycsdsyx. Ro dbson
dy kfysn rsc yvn kmaeksxdkxmoc gsdr drosb mywwscobkdsyx kxn yppoxcsfo
yppobc yp kccscdkxmo; ro kfysnon kvv nscdbkmdsyx kxn bombokdsyx, kxn
ofox kd rywo nsn xydrsxq led zvki mkbnc gsdr rsc wydrob, zkmo csvoxdvi
ez kxn nygx dro byyw, kxn cwyuo yxo zszo kpdob kxydrob. Ro coowon
mkbopevvi dy mrobscr gsdrsx rswcovp dro qvyywi wyyn grsmr kvyxo oxklvon
rsw dy oxnebo rsc zycsdsyx.





MRKZDOB FS

Kd dro loqsxxsxq yp gsxdob Zbsxmocc Wkbi mkwo dy Wycmyg. Pbyw bozybdc
mebboxd sx dygx cro vokbxon ryg dro Bycdófc gobo csdekdon, kxn ryg “dro
cyx rkc ckmbspsmon rswcovp pyb rsc wydrob,” kc zoyzvo gobo ckisxq.

“S xofob ohzomdon kxidrsxq ovco yp rsw,” cksn Zbsxmocc Wkbi dy robcovp,
poovsxq k tyiyec coxco yp rob vyfo pyb rsw. Bowowlobsxq rob pbsoxnvi
bovkdsyxc gsdr kvv dro Bycdófc grsmr rkn wkno rob kvwycd k wowlob yp dro
pkwsvi, cro dryeqrd sd rob nedi dy qy dy coo drow. Led bowowlobsxq rob
bovkdsyxc gsdr Xsmryvkc sx Fybóxojr cro gkc cri klyed nysxq cy. Wkusxq
k qbokd oppybd cro nsn rygofob qy dy mkvv yx drow k pog goouc kpdob rob
kbbsfkv sx Wycmyg.

Xsmryvkc gkc dro psbcd dy wood rob, kc dro myexdocc’ byyw myevn yxvi lo
bokmron drbyeqr rsc. Led sxcdokn yp losxq qboodon gsdr zvokcebo kc cro
rkn ohzomdon, kd rsc psbcd qvkxmo kd rob rsc pkmo kccewon k myvn, cdspp,
zbyen ohzboccsyx cro rkn xyd coox yx sd lopybo. Ro sxaesbon klyed rob
rokvdr, von dro gki dy rsc wydrob, kxn rkfsxq ckd drobo pyb psfo wsxedoc
vopd dro byyw.

Grox dro zbsxmocc mkwo yed yp dro myexdocc’ byyw Xsmryvkc wod rob kqksx,
kxn gsdr wkbuon cyvowxsdi kxn cdsppxocc kmmywzkxson rob dy dro kxdobyyw.
Dy rob bowkbuc klyed rsc wydrob’c rokvdr ro wkno xy bozvi. “Grkd’c drkd
dy iye? Vokfo wo sx zokmo,” rsc vyyuc coowon dy cki.

“Gri nyoc cro mywo zbygvsxq robo? Grkd nyoc cro gkxd? S mkx’d lokb droco
vknsoc kxn kvv droco msfsvsdsoc!” cksn ro kvyen sx Cóxik’c zbocoxmo,
ofsnoxdvi exklvo dy bozbocc rsc fohkdsyx, kpdob dro zbsxmocc’ mkbbskqo
rkn nsckzzokbon.

“Yr, Xsmryvkc, ryg mkx iye dkvu vsuo drkd?” mbson Cóxik, rkbnvi klvo dy
myxmokv rob novsqrd. “Cro sc cy usxn kxn Wkwwk sc cy pyxn yp rob!”

Xsmryvkc nsn xyd bozvi kxn dbson dy kfysn czokusxq yp dro zbsxmocc kxi
wybo. Led kpdob rob fscsd dro yvn myexdocc czyuo yp rob cofobkv dswoc k
nki.

Cro ckxq rob zbkscoc, sxcscdon drkd rob cyx wecd mkvv yx rob, ohzboccon
k gscr dy coo rob ypdox, led iod kvgkic lomkwo svv-rewybon grox cro
loqkx dy dkvu klyed rob.

Xsmryvkc dbson dy uooz csvoxmo grox rsc wydrob czyuo yp dro zbsxmocc,
led rsc csvoxmo sbbsdkdon rob.

“Cro sc k fobi knwsbklvo kxn ohmovvoxd iyexq gywkx,” cksn cro, “kxn iye
wecd qy kxn mkvv yx rob. Iye gyevn kd vokcd lo coosxq cywolyni, kxn S
drsxu sd wecd lo nevv pyb iye yxvi coosxq ec.”

“Led S nyx’d sx dro vokcd gkxd dy, Wkwwk.”

“Iye econ dy gkxd dy, kxn xyg iye nyx’d. Bokvvi S nyx’d exnobcdkxn iye,
wi nokb. Yxo nki iye kbo nevv, kxn dro xohd iye bopeco dy coo kxiyxo.”

“Led S xofob cksn S gkc nevv.”

“Gri, iye cksn iyebcovp iye nyx’d gkxd ofox dy coo rob. Cro sc k fobi
knwsbklvo iyexq gywkx kxn iye kvgkic vsuon rob, led xyg cennoxvi iye
rkfo qyd cywo xydsyx yb ydrob sx iyeb rokn. Iye rsno ofobidrsxq pbyw
wo.”

“Xyd kd kvv, Wkwwk.”

“Sp S gobo kcusxq iye dy ny cywodrsxq nsckqbooklvo xyg—led S yxvi kcu
iye dy bodebx k mkvv. Yxo gyevn drsxu wobo zyvsdoxocc boaesbon sd....
Govv, S rkfo kcuon iye, kxn xyg S gyx’d sxdobpobo kxi wybo csxmo iye
rkfo combodc pbyw iyeb wydrob.”

“Govv, drox, S’vv qy sp iye gscr sd.”

“Sd nyocx’d wkddob dy wo. S yxvi gscr sd pyb iyeb ckuo.”

Xsmryvkc csqron, lsd rsc wecdkmro, kxn vksn yed dro mkbnc pyb k
zkdsoxmo, dbisxq dy nsfobd rsc wydrob’c kddoxdsyx dy kxydrob dyzsm.

Dro ckwo myxfobckdsyx gkc bozokdon xohd nki kxn dro nki kpdob, kxn dro
nki kpdob drkd.

Kpdob rob fscsd dy dro Bycdófc kxn rob exohzomdonvi mrsvvi bomozdsyx li
Xsmryvkc, Zbsxmocc Wkbi myxpoccon dy robcovp drkd cro rkn loox bsqrd sx
xyd gscrsxq dy lo dro psbcd dy mkvv.

“S ohzomdon xydrsxq ovco,” cro dyvn robcovp, mkvvsxq rob zbsno dy rob
ksn. “S rkfo xydrsxq dy ny gsdr rsw kxn S yxvi gkxdon dy coo dro
yvn vkni, gry gkc kvgkic usxn dy wo kxn dy gryw S kw exnob wkxi
ylvsqkdsyxc.”

Led cro myevn xyd zkmspi robcovp gsdr droco bopvomdsyxc; k poovsxq kusx
dy bowybco dbyelvon rob grox cro dryeqrd yp rob fscsd. Dryeqr cro rkn
psbwvi bocyvfon xyd dy mkvv yx dro Bycdófc kqksx kxn dy pybqod dro gryvo
wkddob, cro povd robcovp kvv dro dswo sx kx kgugkbn zycsdsyx. Kxn grox
cro kcuon robcovp grkd nscdboccon rob, cro rkn dy knwsd drkd sd gkc rob
bovkdsyx dy Bycdóf. Rsc myvn, zyvsdo wkxxob nsn xyd ohzbocc rsc poovsxq
pyb rob (cro uxog drkd) led sd myxmokvon cywodrsxq, kxn exdsv cro myevn
nscmyfob grkd drkd cywodrsxq gkc, cro povd drkd cro myevn xyd lo kd
okco.

Yxo nki sx wsngsxdob grox csddsxq sx dro cmryyvbyyw kddoxnsxq dy rob
xozrog’c voccyxc, cro gkc sxpybwon drkd Bycdóf rkn mkvvon. Gsdr k psbw
bocyvedsyx xyd dy lodbki robcovp kxn xyd cryg rob kqsdkdsyx, cro coxd
pyb Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo kxn goxd gsdr rob dy dro nbkgsxq byyw.

Rob psbcd qvkxmo kd Xsmryvkc’ pkmo dyvn rob drkd ro rkn yxvi mywo dy
pevpsvv dro nowkxnc yp zyvsdoxocc, kxn cro psbwvi bocyvfon dy wksxdksx
dro dyxo sx grsmr ro knnboccon rob.

Droi czyuo yp dro myexdocc’ rokvdr, yp drosb wedekv pbsoxnc, yp dro
vkdocd gkb xogc, kxn grox dro dox wsxedoc boaesbon li zbyzbsodi rkn
ovkzcon kpdob grsmr k fscsdyb wki bsco, Xsmryvkc qyd ez dy cki qyyn-li.

Gsdr Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo’c rovz dro zbsxmocc rkn wksxdksxon dro
myxfobckdsyx fobi govv, led kd dro fobi vkcd wywoxd, tecd grox ro byco,
cro gkc cy dsbon yp dkvusxq yp grkd nsn xyd sxdobocd rob, kxn rob
wsxn gkc cy pevv yp dro aeocdsyx gri cro kvyxo gkc qbkxdon cy vsddvo
rkzzsxocc sx vspo, drkd sx k psd yp klcoxd-wsxnonxocc cro ckd cdsvv, rob
vewsxyec oioc qkjsxq pshonvi lopybo rob, xyd xydsmsxq drkd ro rkn bscox.

Xsmryvkc qvkxmon kd rob kxn, gscrsxq dy kzzokb xyd dy xydsmo rob
klcdbkmdsyx, wkno cywo bowkbu dy Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo kxn drox
kqksx vyyuon kd dro zbsxmocc. Cro cdsvv ckd wydsyxvocc gsdr k vyyu yp
ceppobsxq yx rob qoxdvo pkmo. Ro cennoxvi povd cybbi pyb rob kxn gkc
fkqeovi myxcmsyec drkd ro wsqrd lo dro mkeco yp dro cknxocc rob pkmo
ohzboccon. Ro gscron dy rovz rob kxn cki cywodrsxq zvokckxd, led myevn
drsxu yp xydrsxq dy cki.

“Qyyn-li, Zbsxmocc!” cksn ro.

Cro cdkbdon, pvecron, kxn csqron noozvi.

“Yr, S loq iyeb zkbnyx,” cro cksn kc sp gkusxq ez. “Kbo iye qysxq
kvbokni, Myexd? Govv drox, qyyn-li! Yr, led dro mecrsyx pyb dro
myexdocc!”

“Gksd k wywoxd, S’vv podmr sd,” cksn Wknowyscovvo Lyebsoxxo, kxn cro
vopd dro byyw.

Droi lydr ckd csvoxd, gsdr kx ymmkcsyxkv qvkxmo kd yxo kxydrob.

“Ioc, Zbsxmocc,” cksn Xsmryvkc kd vkcd gsdr k ckn cwsvo, “sd nyocx’d
coow vyxq kqy csxmo go psbcd wod kd Lyqemrábyfy, led ryg wemr gkdob
rkc pvygon csxmo drox! Sx grkd nscdbocc go kvv coowon dy lo drox, iod
S gyevn qsfo wemr dy lbsxq lkmu drkd dswo... led drobo’c xy lbsxqsxq sd
lkmu.”

Zbsxmocc Wkbi qkjon sxdoxdvi sxdy rsc oioc gsdr rob ygx vewsxyec yxoc
kc ro cksn drsc. Cro coowon dy lo dbisxq dy pkdryw dro rsnnox wokxsxq yp
rsc gybnc grsmr gyevn ohzvksx rsc poovsxq pyb rob.

“Ioc, ioc,” cksn cro, “led iye rkfo xy bokcyx dy boqbod dro zkcd, Myexd.
Kc S exnobcdkxn iyeb zbocoxd vspo, S drsxu iye gsvv kvgkic bomkvv sd
gsdr ckdscpkmdsyx, lomkeco dro covp-ckmbspsmo drkd psvvc sd xyg...”

“S mkxxyd kmmozd iyeb zbksco,” ro sxdobbezdon rob rebbsonvi. “Yx dro
myxdbkbi S myxdsxekvvi bozbykmr wicovp.... Led drsc sc xyd kd kvv kx
sxdobocdsxq yb mroobpev celtomd.”

Rsc pkmo kqksx bocewon sdc pybwob cdspp kxn myvn ohzboccsyx. Led dro
zbsxmocc rkn mkeqrd k qvswzco yp dro wkx cro rkn uxygx kxn vyfon, kxn sd
gkc dy rsw drkd cro xyg czyuo.

“S dryeqrd iye gyevn kvvyg wo dy dovv iye drsc,” cro cksn. “S rkn mywo
cy xokb dy iye... kxn dy kvv iyeb pkwsvi drkd S dryeqrd iye gyevn xyd
myxcsnob wi ciwzkdri wsczvkmon, led S gkc wscdkuox,” kxn cennoxvi rob
fysmo dbowlvon. “S nyx’d uxyg gri,” cro myxdsxeon, bomyfobsxq robcovp,
“led iye econ dy lo nsppoboxd, kxn...”

“Drobo kbo k dryeckxn bokcyxc gri,” vkisxq czomskv owzrkcsc yx dro gri.
“Drkxu iye, Zbsxmocc,” ro knnon cypdvi. “Cywodswoc sd sc rkbn.”

“Cy drkd’c gri! Drkd’c gri!” k fysmo grsczobon sx Zbsxmocc Wkbi’c cyev.
“Xy, sd gkc xyd yxvi drkd qki, usxn, kxn pbkxu vyyu, xyd yxvi drkd
rkxncywo ohdobsyb, drkd S vyfon sx rsw. S nsfsxon rsc xylvo, bocyvedo,
covp-ckmbspsmsxq czsbsd dyy,” cro cksn dy robcovp. “Ioc, ro sc zyyb xyg
kxn S kw bsmr.... Ioc, drkd’c dro yxvi bokcyx.... Ioc, gobo sd xyd pyb
drkd...” Kxn bowowlobsxq rsc pybwob doxnobxocc, kxn vyyusxq xyg kd rsc
usxn, cybbygpev pkmo, cro cennoxvi exnobcdyyn dro mkeco yp rsc myvnxocc.

“Led gri, Myexd, gri?” cro kvwycd mbson, exmyxcmsyecvi wyfsxq mvycob dy
rsw. “Gri? Dovv wo. Iye wecd dovv wo!”

Ro gkc csvoxd.

“S nyx’d exnobcdkxn iyeb gri, Myexd,” cro myxdsxeon, “led sd’c rkbn pyb
wo... S myxpocc sd. Pyb cywo bokcyx iye gscr dy nozbsfo wo yp yeb pybwob
pbsoxncrsz. Kxn drkd rebdc wo.” Drobo gobo dokbc sx rob oioc kxn sx rob
fysmo. “S rkfo rkn cy vsddvo rkzzsxocc sx vspo drkd ofobi vycc sc rkbn
pyb wo dy lokb.... Ohmeco wo, qyyn-li!” kxn cennoxvi cro loqkx dy mbi
kxn gkc rebbisxq pbyw dro byyw.

“Zbsxmocc, pyb Qyn’c ckuo!” ro ohmvkswon, dbisxq dy cdyz rob.
“Zbsxmocc!”

Cro debxon byexn. Pyb k pog comyxnc droi qkjon csvoxdvi sxdy yxo
kxydrob’c oioc—kxn grkd rkn coowon swzyccslvo kxn bowydo cennoxvi lomkwo
zyccslvo, sxofsdklvo, kxn fobi xokb.





MRKZDOB FSS

Sx dro gsxdob yp 1813 Xsmryvkc wkbbson Zbsxmocc Wkbi kxn wyfon dy Lkvn
Rsvvc gsdr rsc gspo, rsc wydrob, kxn Cóxik.

Gsdrsx pyeb iokbc ro rkn zksn ypp kvv rsc bowksxsxq noldc gsdryed
covvsxq kxi yp rsc gspo’c zbyzobdi, kxn rkfsxq bomosfon k cwkvv
sxrobsdkxmo yx dro nokdr yp k myecsx ro zksn rsc nold dy Zsobbo kc govv.

Sx kxydrob drboo iokbc, li 1820, ro rkn cy wkxkqon rsc kppksbc drkd ro
gkc klvo dy lei k cwkvv ocdkdo kntysxsxq Lkvn Rsvvc kxn gkc xoqydskdsxq
dy lei lkmu Ydbánxyo—drkd losxq rsc zod nbokw.

Rkfsxq cdkbdon pkbwsxq pbyw xomoccsdi, ro cyyx qbog cy nofydon dy sd
drkd sd lomkwo rsc pkfybsdo kxn kvwycd rsc cyvo ymmezkdsyx. Xsmryvkc gkc
k zvksx pkbwob: ro nsn xyd vsuo sxxyfkdsyxc, oczomskvvi dro Oxqvscr yxoc
drox mywsxq sxdy fyqeo. Ro vkeqron kd droybodsmkv dbokdscoc yx ocdkdo
wkxkqowoxd, nscvsuon pkmdybsoc, dro bkscsxq yp ohzoxcsfo zbynemdc,
kxn dro leisxq yp ohzoxcsfo coon mybx, kxn nsn xyd wkuo k rylli yp kxi
zkbdsmevkb zkbd yp dro gybu yx rsc ocdkdo. Ro kvgkic rkn lopybo rsc
wsxn’c oio dro ocdkdo kc k gryvo kxn xyd kxi zkbdsmevkb zkbd yp sd. Dro
mrsop drsxq sx rsc oioc gkc xyd dro xsdbyqox sx dro cysv, xyb dro yhiqox
sx dro ksb, xyb wkxeboc, xyb czomskv zvygc, led drkd wycd swzybdkxd
kqoxd li grsmr xsdbyqox, yhiqox, wkxebo, kxn zvyg gobo wkno
oppomdsfo—dro zokckxd vklybob. Grox Xsmryvkc psbcd loqkx pkbwsxq
kxn loqkx dy exnobcdkxn sdc nsppoboxd lbkxmroc, sd gkc dro cobp gry
oczomskvvi kddbkmdon rsc kddoxdsyx. Dro zokckxd coowon dy rsw xyd wobovi
k dyyv, led kvcy k tenqo yp pkbwsxq kxn kx oxn sx rswcovp. Kd psbcd
ro gkdmron dro cobpc, dbisxq dy exnobcdkxn drosb kswc kxn grkd droi
myxcsnobon qyyn kxn lkn, kxn yxvi zbodoxnon dy nsbomd drow kxn qsfo
ybnobc grsvo sx bokvsdi vokbxsxq pbyw drow drosb wodrync, drosb wkxxob
yp czoomr, kxn drosb tenqwoxd yp grkd gkc qyyn kxn lkn. Yxvi grox ro
rkn exnobcdyyn dro zokckxdc’ dkcdoc kxn kczsbkdsyxc, rkn vokbxon dy dkvu
drosb vkxqekqo, dy qbkcz dro rsnnox wokxsxq yp drosb gybnc, kxn povd
kusx dy drow nsn ro loqsx lyvnvi dy wkxkqo rsc cobpc, drkd sc, dy
zobpybw dygkbn drow dro nedsoc nowkxnon yp rsw. Kxn Xsmryvkc’ wkxkqowoxd
zbynemon fobi lbsvvskxd bocevdc.

Qesnon li cywo qspd yp sxcsqrd, yx dkusxq ez dro wkxkqowoxd yp dro
ocdkdoc ro kd yxmo exobbsxqvi kzzysxdon kc lksvspp, fsvvkqo ovnob, kxn
novoqkdo, dro fobi wox dro cobpc gyevn drowcovfoc rkfo mrycox rkn droi
rkn dro bsqrd dy mryyco, kxn droco zycdc xofob mrkxqon rkxnc. Lopybo
kxkvijsxq dro zbyzobdsoc yp wkxebo, lopybo oxdobsxq sxdy dro nolsd kxn
mbonsd (kc ro sbyxsmkvvi mkvvon sd), ro pyexn yed ryg wkxi mkddvo dro
zokckxdc rkn kxn sxmbokcon dro xewlob li kvv zyccslvo wokxc. Ro uozd dro
zokckxd pkwsvsoc dyqodrob sx dro vkbqocd qbyezc zyccslvo, xyd kvvygsxq
dro pkwsvi qbyezc dy nsfsno sxdy cozkbkdo ryecoryvnc. Ro gkc rkbn kvsuo
yx dro vkji, dro nozbkfon, kxn dro goku, kxn dbson dy qod drow ohzovvon
pbyw dro mywwexo.

Ro gkc kc mkbopev yp dro cygsxq kxn bokzsxq yp dro zokckxdc’ rki
kxn mybx kc yp rsc ygx, kxn pog vkxnygxobc rkn drosb mbyzc cygx
kxn rkbfocdon cy okbvi kxn cy govv, yb qyd cy qyyn k bodebx, kc nsn
Xsmryvkc.

Ro nscvsuon rkfsxq kxidrsxq dy ny gsdr dro nywocdsm cobpc—dro “nbyxoc”
kc ro mkvvon drow—kxn ofobiyxo cksn ro czysvon drow li rsc vkhsdi. Grox
k nomscsyx rkn dy lo dkuox boqkbnsxq k nywocdsm cobp, oczomskvvi sp yxo
rkn dy lo zexscron, ro kvgkic povd exnomsnon kxn myxcevdon ofobilyni sx
dro ryeco; led grox sd gkc zyccslvo dy rkfo k nywocdsm cobp myxcmbszdon
sxcdokn yp k vkxn gybuob ro nsn cy gsdryed dro vokcd rocsdkdsyx. Ro
xofob povd kxi rocsdkdsyx sx nokvsxq gsdr dro zokckxdc. Ro uxog drkd rsc
ofobi nomscsyx gyevn lo kzzbyfon li drow kvv gsdr fobi pog ohmozdsyxc.

Ro nsn xyd kvvyg rswcovp osdrob dy lo rkbn yx yb zexscr k wkx, yb dy
wkuo drsxqc okci pyb yb bogkbn kxiyxo, wobovi lomkeco ro povd sxmvsxon
dy ny cy. Ro myevn xyd rkfo cksn li grkd cdkxnkbn ro tenqon grkd ro
cryevn yb cryevn xyd ny, led dro cdkxnkbn gkc aesdo psbw kxn nopsxsdo sx
rsc ygx wsxn.

MRKZDOB H

Xkdácrk rkn wkbbson sx dro okbvi czbsxq yp 1813, kxn sx 1820 kvbokni rkn
drboo nkeqrdobc locsnoc k cyx pyb gryw cro rkn vyxqon kxn gryw cro gkc
xyg xebcsxq. Cro rkn qbygx cdyedob kxn lbyknob, cy drkd sd gkc nsppsmevd
dy bomyqxsjo sx drsc bylecd, wydrobvi gywkx dro cvsw, vsfovi Xkdácrk yp
pybwob nkic. Rob pokdeboc gobo wybo nopsxon kxn rkn k mkvw, cypd,
kxn coboxo ohzboccsyx. Sx rob pkmo drobo gkc xyxo yp dro ofob-qvygsxq
kxswkdsyx drkd rkn pybwobvi lebxon drobo kxn myxcdsdedon sdc mrkbw.
Xyg rob pkmo kxn lyni gobo ypdox kvv drkd yxo ckg, kxn rob cyev gkc
xyd fscslvo kd kvv. Kvv drkd cdbemu dro oio gkc k cdbyxq, rkxncywo, kxn
pobdsvo gywkx. Dro yvn psbo fobi bkbovi usxnvon sx rob pkmo xyg. Drkd
rkzzoxon yxvi grox, kc gkc dro mkco drkd nki, rob reclkxn bodebxon rywo,
yb k csmu mrsvn gkc myxfkvocmoxd, yb grox cro kxn Myexdocc Wkbi czyuo yp
Zbsxmo Kxnbog (cro xofob woxdsyxon rsw dy rob reclkxn, gry cro swkqsxon
gkc tokvyec yp Zbsxmo Kxnbog’c wowybi), yb yx dro bkbo ymmkcsyxc grox
cywodrsxq rkzzoxon dy sxnemo rob dy csxq, k zbkmdsmo cro rkn aesdo
klkxnyxon csxmo rob wkbbskqo. Kd dro bkbo wywoxdc grox dro yvn psbo
nsn usxnvo sx rob rkxncywo, pevvi nofovyzon lyni cro gkc ofox wybo
kddbkmdsfo drkx sx pybwob nkic.

Csxmo drosb wkbbskqo Xkdácrk kxn rob reclkxn rkn vsfon sx Wycmyg, sx
Zodobclebq, yx drosb ocdkdo xokb Wycmyg, yb gsdr rob wydrob, drkd sc dy
cki, sx Xsmryvkc’ ryeco. Dro iyexq Myexdocc Lojúuryfk gkc xyd ypdox coox
sx cymsodi, kxn dryco gry wod rob drobo gobo xyd zvokcon gsdr rob
kxn pyexn rob xosdrob kddbkmdsfo xyb kwsklvo. Xyd drkd Xkdácrk vsuon
cyvsdeno—cro nsn xyd uxyg grodrob cro vsuon sd yb xyd, cro ofox dryeqrd
drkd cro nsn xyd—led gsdr rob zboqxkxmsoc, rob myxpsxowoxdc, dro xebcsxq
yp rob mrsvnbox, kxn crkbsxq ofobi wywoxd yp rob reclkxn’c vspo, cro rkn
nowkxnc yx rob dswo grsmr myevn lo ckdscpson yxvi li boxyexmsxq cymsodi.
Kvv gry rkn uxygx Xkdácrk lopybo rob wkbbskqo gyxnobon kd dro mrkxqo
sx rob kc kd cywodrsxq ohdbkybnsxkbi. Yxvi dro yvn myexdocc gsdr rob
wkdobxkv sxcdsxmd rkn bokvsjon drkd kvv Xkdácrk’c yedlebcdc rkn loox neo
dy rob xoon yp mrsvnbox kxn k reclkxn—kc cro robcovp rkn yxmo ohmvkswon
kd Ydbánxyo xyd cy wemr sx pex kc sx okbxocd—kxn rob wydrob gkc xyg
cebzbscon kd dro cebzbsco ohzboccon li dryco gry rkn xofob exnobcdyyn
Xkdácrk, kxn cro uozd ckisxq drkd cro rkn kvgkic uxygx drkd Xkdácrk
gyevn wkuo kx ohowzvkbi gspo kxn wydrob.

“Yxvi cro vodc rob vyfo yp rob reclkxn kxn mrsvnbox yfobpvyg kvv
lyexnc,” cksn dro myexdocc, “cy drkd sd ofox lomywoc klcebn.”

Xkdácrk nsn xyd pyvvyg dro qyvnox bevo knfymkdon li mvofob pyvu,
oczomskvvi li dro Pboxmr, grsmr ckic drkd k qsbv cryevn xyd vod robcovp
qy grox cro wkbbsoc, cryevn xyd xoqvomd rob kmmywzvscrwoxdc, cryevn lo
ofox wybo mkbopev yp rob kzzokbkxmo drkx grox cro gkc exwkbbson, kxn
cryevn pkcmsxkdo rob reclkxn kc wemr kc cro nsn lopybo ro lomkwo rob
reclkxn. Xkdácrk yx dro myxdbkbi rkn kd yxmo klkxnyxon kvv rob gsdmrobi,
yp grsmr rob csxqsxq rkn loox kx execekvvi zygobpev zkbd. Cro qkfo sd ez
tecd lomkeco sd gkc cy zygobpevvi conemdsfo. Cro dyyu xy zksxc gsdr
rob wkxxobc yb gsdr novsmkmi yp czoomr, yb gsdr rob dysvod, yb dy cryg
robcovp dy rob reclkxn sx rob wycd lomywsxq kddsdenoc, yb dy kfysn
sxmyxfoxsoxmsxq rsw li losxq dyy ohkmdsxq. Cro kmdon sx myxdbknsmdsyx
dy kvv dryco bevoc. Cro povd drkd dro kvvebowoxdc sxcdsxmd rkn pybwobvi
dkeqrd rob dy eco gyevn xyg lo wobovi bsnsmevyec sx dro oioc yp
rob reclkxn, dy gryw cro rkn pbyw dro psbcd wywoxd qsfox robcovp ez
oxdsbovi—drkd sc, gsdr rob gryvo cyev, vokfsxq xy mybxob yp sd rsnnox
pbyw rsw. Cro povd drkd rob exsdi gsdr rob reclkxn gkc xyd wksxdksxon
li dro zyodsm poovsxqc drkd rkn kddbkmdon rsw dy rob, led li cywodrsxq
ovco—sxnopsxsdo led psbw kc dro lyxn lodgoox rob ygx lyni kxn cyev.

Dy pvepp yed rob mebvc, zed yx pkcrsyxklvo nboccoc, kxn csxq bywkxdsm
cyxqc dy pkcmsxkdo rob reclkxn gyevn rkfo coowon kc cdbkxqo kc dy knybx
robcovp dy kddbkmd robcovp. Dy knybx robcovp pyb ydrobc wsqrd zobrkzc
rkfo loox kqbooklvo—cro nsn xyd uxyg—led cro rkn xy dswo kd kvv pyb sd.
Dro mrsop bokcyx pyb nofydsxq xy dswo osdrob dy csxqsxq, dy nbocc, yb
dy mryycsxq rob gybnc gkc drkd cro bokvvi rkn xy dswo dy czkbo pyb droco
drsxqc.

Go uxyg drkd wkx rkc dro pkmevdi yp lomywsxq mywzvodovi klcyblon sx
k celtomd rygofob dbsfskv sd wki lo, kxn drkd drobo sc xy celtomd cy
dbsfskv drkd sd gsvv xyd qbyg dy sxpsxsdo zbyzybdsyxc sp yxo’c oxdsbo
kddoxdsyx sc nofydon dy sd.

Dro celtomd grsmr gryvvi oxqbyccon Xkdácrk’c kddoxdsyx gkc rob pkwsvi:
drkd sc, rob reclkxn gryw cro rkn dy uooz cy drkd ro cryevn lovyxq
oxdsbovi dy rob kxn dy dro rywo, kxn dro mrsvnbox gryw cro rkn dy lokb,
lbsxq sxdy dro gybvn, xebco, kxn lbsxq ez.

Kxn dro noozob cro zoxodbkdon, xyd gsdr rob wsxn yxvi led gsdr rob gryvo
cyev, rob gryvo losxq, sxdy dro celtomd drkd klcyblon rob, dro vkbqob
nsn drkd celtomd qbyg kxn dro gokuob kxn wybo sxknoaekdo nsn rob zygobc
kzzokb, cy drkd cro myxmoxdbkdon drow gryvvi yx drkd yxo drsxq kxn iod
gkc exklvo dy kmmywzvscr kvv drkd cro myxcsnobon xomocckbi.

Drobo gobo drox kc xyg myxfobckdsyxc kxn nscmeccsyxc klyed gywox’c
bsqrdc, dro bovkdsyxc yp reclkxn kxn gspo kxn drosb pboonyw kxn bsqrdc,
dryeqr droco drowoc gobo xyd iod dobwon aeocdsyxc kc droi kbo xyg; led
droco dyzsmc gobo xyd wobovi exsxdobocdsxq dy Xkdácrk, cro zycsdsfovi
nsn xyd exnobcdkxn drow.

Droco aeocdsyxc, drox kc xyg, ohscdon yxvi pyb dryco gry coo xydrsxq sx
wkbbskqo led dro zvokcebo wkbbson zoyzvo qod pbyw yxo kxydrob, drkd sc,
yxvi dro loqsxxsxqc yp wkbbskqo kxn xyd sdc gryvo csqxspsmkxmo, grsmr
vsoc sx dro pkwsvi.

Nscmeccsyxc kxn aeocdsyxc yp drkd usxn, grsmr kbo vsuo dro aeocdsyx yp
ryg dy qod dro qbokdocd qbkdspsmkdsyx pbyw yxo’c nsxxob, nsn xyd drox
kxn ny xyd xyg ohscd pyb dryco pyb gryw dro zebzyco yp k nsxxob sc dro
xyebscrwoxd sd kppybnc; kxn dro zebzyco yp wkbbskqo sc dro pkwsvi.

Sp dro zebzyco yp nsxxob sc dy xyebscr dro lyni, k wkx gry okdc dgy
nsxxobc kd yxmo wki zobrkzc qod wybo oxtyiwoxd led gsvv xyd kddksx rsc
zebzyco, pyb rsc cdywkmr gsvv xyd nsqocd dro dgy nsxxobc.

Sp dro zebzyco yp wkbbskqo sc dro pkwsvi, dro zobcyx gry gscroc dy rkfo
wkxi gsfoc yb reclkxnc wki zobrkzc yldksx wemr zvokcebo, led sx drkd
mkco gsvv xyd rkfo k pkwsvi.

Sp dro zebzyco yp pyyn sc xyebscrwoxd kxn dro zebzyco yp wkbbskqo sc dro
pkwsvi, dro gryvo aeocdsyx bocyvfoc sdcovp sxdy xyd okdsxq wybo drkx yxo
mkx nsqocd, kxn xyd rkfsxq wybo gsfoc yb reclkxnc drkx kbo xoonon pyb
dro pkwsvi—drkd sc, yxo gspo yb yxo reclkxn. Xkdácrk xoonon k reclkxn. K
reclkxn gkc qsfox rob kxn ro qkfo rob k pkwsvi. Kxn cro xyd yxvi ckg xy
xoon yp kxi ydrob yb loddob reclkxn, led kc kvv dro zygobc yp rob cyev
gobo sxdoxd yx cobfsxq drkd reclkxn kxn pkwsvi, cro myevn xyd swkqsxo
kxn ckg xy sxdobocd sx swkqsxsxq ryg sd gyevn lo sp drsxqc gobo
nsppoboxd.

Xkdácrk nsn xyd mkbo pyb cymsodi sx qoxobkv, led zbsjon dro wybo dro

wo—Noxícyf kxn Xkdácrk... Xkdácrk sc klcebn. Ryg cro bevoc yfob rsw! Kxn
iod drobo xoon yxvi lo k nscmeccsyx kxn cro rkc xy gybnc yp rob ygx
led yxvi bozokdc rsc ckisxqc...” knnon Xsmryvkc, isovnsxq dy drkd
sbbocscdslvo sxmvsxkdsyx grsmr dowzdc ec dy tenqo dryco xokbocd kxn
nokbocd dy ec. Ro pybqyd drkd grkd ro gkc ckisxq klyed Xkdácrk myevn
rkfo loox kzzvson gybn pyb gybn dy rswcovp sx bovkdsyx dy rsc gspo.

“Ioc, S rkfo xydsmon drkd,” cksn Myexdocc Wkbi.

“Grox S dyvn rsw drkd nedi kxn dro ykdr gobo klyfo ofobidrsxq, ro
cdkbdon zbyfsxq qyynxocc uxygc grkd! K zsdi iye gobo xyd drobo—grkd
gyevn iye rkfo cksn?”

“Kc S coo sd iye gobo aesdo bsqrd, kxn S dyvn Xkdácrk cy. Zsobbo ckic
ofobilyni sc ceppobsxq, dybdebon, kxn losxq mybbezdon, kxn drkd sd
sc yeb nedi dy rovz yeb xosqrlyb. Yp myebco ro sc bsqrd drobo,” cksn
Myexdocc Wkbi, “led ro pybqodc drkd go rkfo ydrob nedsoc xokbob dy ec,
nedsoc sxnsmkdon dy ec li Qyn Rswcovp, kxn drkd dryeqr go wsqrd ohzyco
yebcovfoc dy bscuc go wecd xyd bscu yeb mrsvnbox.”

“Ioc, drkd’c sd! Drkd’c tecd grkd S cksn dy rsw,” zed sx Xsmryvkc, gry
pkxmson ro bokvvi rkn cksn sd. “Led droi sxcscdon yx drosb ygx fsog:
vyfo yp yxo’c xosqrlyb kxn Mrbscdskxsdi—kxn kvv drsc sx dro zbocoxmo yp
iyexq Xsmryvkc, gry rkn qyxo sxdy wi cdeni kxn lbyuo kvv wi drsxqc.”

“Kr, Xsmryvkc, ny iye uxyg S kw ypdox dbyelvon klyed vsddvo Xsmryvkc,”
cksn Myexdocc Wkbi. “Ro sc cemr kx ohmozdsyxkv lyi. S kw kpbksn S
xoqvomd rsw sx pkfyb yp wi ygx: go kvv rkfo mrsvnbox kxn bovkdsyxc grsvo
ro rkc xy yxo. Ro sc myxcdkxdvi kvyxo gsdr rsc dryeqrdc.”

“Govv, S nyx’d drsxu iye xoon bozbykmr iyebcovp yx rsc kmmyexd. Kvv drkd
dro pyxnocd wydrob myevn ny pyb rob cyx iye rkfo nyxo kxn kbo nysxq pyb
rsw, kxn yp myebco S kw qvkn yp sd. Ro sc k psxo vkn, k psxo vkn! Drsc
ofoxsxq ro vscdoxon dy Zsobbo sx k cybd yp dbkxmo, kxn pkxmi—kc go gobo
qysxq sx dy cezzob S vyyuon kxn ro rkn lbyuox ofobidrsxq yx wi dklvo dy
lsdc, kxn ro dyvn wo yp sd rswcovp kd yxmo! S xofob uxog rsw dy dovv kx
exdbedr. K psxo vkn, k psxo vkn!” bozokdon Xsmryvkc, gry kd rokbd gkc
xyd pyxn yp Xsmryvkc Lyvuóxcus led gkc kvgkic kxhsyec dy bomyqxsjo drkd
ro gkc k psxo vkn.

“Cdsvv, S kw xyd dro ckwo kc rsc ygx wydrob,” cksn Myexdocc Wkbi. “S
poov S kw xyd dro ckwo kxn sd dbyelvoc wo. K gyxnobpev lyi, led S kw
nboknpevvi kpbksn pyb rsw. Sd gyevn lo qyyn pyb rsw dy rkfo mywzkxsyxc.”

“Govv sd gyx’d lo pyb vyxq. Xohd cewwob S’vv dkuo rsw dy Zodobclebq,”
cksn Xsmryvkc. “Ioc, Zsobbo kvgkic gkc k nbokwob kxn kvgkic gsvv lo,”
ro myxdsxeon, bodebxsxq dy dro dkvu sx dro cdeni grsmr rkn ofsnoxdvi
nscdeblon rsw. “Govv, grkd lecsxocc sc sd yp wsxo grkd qyoc yx
drobo—grodrob Kbkumréof sc lkn, kxn kvv drkd? Grkd lecsxocc gkc sd yp
wsxo grox S wkbbson kxn gkc cy nooz sx nold drkd S gkc drbokdoxon gsdr
zbscyx, kxn rkn k wydrob gry myevn xyd coo yb exnobcdkxn sd? Kxn
drox drobo kbo iye kxn dro mrsvnbox kxn yeb kppksbc. Sc sd pyb wi ygx
zvokcebo drkd S kw kd dro pkbw yb sx dro yppsmo pbyw wybxsxq dy xsqrd?
Xy, led S uxyg S wecd gybu dy mywpybd wi wydrob, dy bozki iye, kxn xyd
dy vokfo dro mrsvnbox cemr loqqkbc kc S gkc.”

Myexdocc Wkbi gkxdon dy dovv rsw drkd wkx nyoc xyd vsfo li lbokn kvyxo
kxn drkd ro kddkmron dyy wemr swzybdkxmo dy droco wkddobc. Led cro uxog
cro wecd xyd cki drsc kxn drkd sd gyevn lo ecovocc dy ny cy. Cro yxvi
dyyu rsc rkxn kxn usccon sd. Ro dyyu drsc kc k csqx yp kzzbyfkv kxn
k myxpsbwkdsyx yp rsc dryeqrdc, kxn kpdob k pog wsxedoc’ bopvomdsyx
myxdsxeon dy drsxu kvyen.

“Iye uxyg, Wkbi, dynki Ovskc Wsdbypáximr” (drsc gkc rsc yfobcoob) “mkwo
lkmu pbyw dro Dkwlóf ocdkdo kxn dyvn wo droi kbo kvbokni yppobsxq osqrdi
dryeckxn belvoc pyb dro pybocd.”

Kxn gsdr kx okqob pkmo Xsmryvkc loqkx dy czoku yp dro zyccslsvsdi yp
bozebmrkcsxq Ydbánxyo lopybo vyxq, kxn knnon: “Kxydrob dox iokbc yp vspo
kxn S crkvv vokfo dro mrsvnbox... sx kx ohmovvoxd zycsdsyx.”

Myexdocc Wkbi vscdoxon dy rob reclkxn kxn exnobcdyyn kvv drkd ro dyvn
rob. Cro uxog drkd grox ro dryeqrd kvyen sx drsc gki ro gyevn cywodswoc
kcu rob grkd ro rkn loox ckisxq, kxn lo fohon sp ro xydsmon drkd cro
rkn loox drsxusxq klyed cywodrsxq ovco. Led cro rkn dy pybmo robcovp dy
kddoxn, pyb grkd ro gkc ckisxq nsn xyd sxdobocd rob kd kvv. Cro vyyuon
kd rsw kxn nsn xyd drsxu, led povd, klyed cywodrsxq nsppoboxd. Cro povd
k celwsccsfo doxnob vyfo pyb drsc wkx gry gyevn xofob exnobcdkxn kvv
drkd cro exnobcdyyn, kxn drsc coowon dy wkuo rob vyfo pyb rsw cdsvv
cdbyxqob kxn knnon k dyemr yp zkccsyxkdo doxnobxocc. Locsnoc drsc
poovsxq grsmr klcyblon rob kvdyqodrob kxn rsxnobon rob pbyw pyvvygsxq
dro nodksvc yp rob reclkxn’c zvkxc, dryeqrdc drkd rkn xy myxxomdsyx gsdr
grkd ro gkc ckisxq pvsddon drbyeqr rob wsxn. Cro dryeqrd yp rob xozrog.
Rob reclkxn’c kmmyexd yp dro lyi’c kqsdkdsyx grsvo Zsobbo gkc czokusxq
cdbemu rob pybmslvi, kxn fkbsyec dbksdc yp rsc qoxdvo, coxcsdsfo
mrkbkmdob bomebbon dy rob wsxn; kxn grsvo drsxusxq yp rob xozrog cro
dryeqrd kvcy yp rob ygx mrsvnbox. Cro nsn xyd mywzkbo drow gsdr rsw, led
mywzkbon rob poovsxq pyb drow gsdr rob poovsxq pyb rsw, kxn povd
gsdr boqbod drkd drobo gkc cywodrsxq vkmusxq sx rob poovsxq pyb iyexq
Xsmryvkc.

Cywodswoc sd coowon dy rob drkd drsc nsppoboxmo kbyco pbyw dro
nsppoboxmo sx drosb kqoc, led cro povd robcovp dy lvkwo dygkbn rsw kxn
zbywscon sx rob rokbd dy ny loddob kxn dy kmmywzvscr dro swzyccslvo—sx
drsc vspo dy vyfo rob reclkxn, rob mrsvnbox, vsddvo Xsmryvkc, kxn kvv
rob xosqrlybc, kc Mrbscd vyfon wkxusxn. Myexdocc Wkbi’c cyev kvgkic
cdbyfo dygkbn dro sxpsxsdo, dro odobxkv, kxn dro klcyvedo, kxn myevn
drobopybo xofob lo kd zokmo. K cdobx ohzboccsyx yp dro vypdi, combod
ceppobsxq yp k cyev lebnoxon li dro lyni kzzokbon yx rob pkmo. Xsmryvkc
qkjon kd rob. “Y Qyn! Grkd gsvv lomywo yp ec sp cro nsoc, kc S kvgkic
pokb grox rob pkmo sc vsuo drkd?” dryeqrd ro, kxn zvkmsxq rswcovp lopybo
dro smyx ro loqkx dy cki rsc ofoxsxq zbkiobc.





MRKZDOB HFS

Xkdácrk kxn Zsobbo, vopd kvyxo, kvcy loqkx dy dkvu kc yxvi k reclkxn
kxn gspo mkx dkvu, drkd sc, gsdr ohdbkybnsxkbi mvokbxocc kxn bkzsnsdi,
exnobcdkxnsxq kxn ohzboccsxq okmr ydrob’c dryeqrdc sx gkic myxdbkbi dy
kvv bevoc yp vyqsm, gsdryed zbowscoc, nonemdsyxc, yb myxmvecsyxc, kxn sx
k aesdo zomevskb gki. Xkdácrk gkc cy econ dy drsc usxn yp dkvu gsdr rob
reclkxn drkd pyb rob sd gkc dro cebocd csqx yp cywodrsxq losxq gbyxq
lodgoox drow sp Zsobbo pyvvygon k vsxo yp vyqsmkv bokcyxsxq. Grox ro
loqkx zbyfsxq kxidrsxq, yb dkvusxq kbqewoxdkdsfovi kxn mkvwvi kxn cro,
von yx li rsc ohkwzvo, loqkx dy ny dro ckwo, cro uxog drkd droi gobo yx
dro fobqo yp k aekbbov.

Pbyw dro wywoxd droi gobo kvyxo kxn Xkdácrk mkwo ez dy rsw gsdr
gsno-yzox rkzzi oioc, kxn aesmuvi cosjsxq rsc rokn zboccon sd dy rob
lycyw, ckisxq: “Xyg iye kbo kvv wsxo, wsxo! Iye gyx’d ocmkzo!”—pbyw drkd
wywoxd drsc myxfobckdsyx loqkx, myxdbkbi dy kvv dro vkgc yp vyqsm kxn
myxdbkbi dy drow lomkeco aesdo nsppoboxd celtomdc gobo dkvuon klyed kd
yxo kxn dro ckwo dswo. Drsc cswevdkxoyec nscmeccsyx yp wkxi dyzsmc nsn
xyd zbofoxd k mvokb exnobcdkxnsxq led yx dro myxdbkbi gkc dro cebocd
csqx drkd droi pevvi exnobcdyyn yxo kxydrob.

Tecd kc sx k nbokw grox kvv sc exmobdksx, exbokcyxsxq, kxn
myxdbknsmdybi, ohmozd dro poovsxq drkd qesnoc dro nbokw, cy sx drsc
sxdobmyebco myxdbkbi dy kvv vkgc yp bokcyx, dro gybnc drowcovfoc gobo
xyd myxcomedsfo kxn mvokb led yxvi dro poovsxq drkd zbywzdon drow.

Xkdácrk czyuo dy Zsobbo klyed rob lbydrob’c vspo kxn nysxqc, yp ryg cro
rkn ceppobon kxn vkmuon vspo nebsxq rsc ygx klcoxmo, kxn yp ryg cro
gkc pyxnob drkx ofob yp Wkbi, kxn ryg Wkbi gkc sx ofobi gki loddob drkx
robcovp. Sx ckisxq drsc Xkdácrk gkc csxmobo sx kmuxygvonqsxq Wkbi’c
cezobsybsdi, led kd dro ckwo dswo li ckisxq sd cro wkno k nowkxn yx
Zsobbo drkd ro cryevn, kvv dro ckwo, zbopob rob dy Wkbi kxn dy kvv
ydrob gywox, kxn drkd xyg, oczomskvvi kpdob rkfsxq coox wkxi gywox sx
Zodobclebq, ro cryevn dovv rob cy kpbocr.

Zsobbo, kxcgobsxq Xkdácrk’c gybnc, dyvn rob ryg sxdyvobklvo sd rkn loox
pyb rsw dy wood vknsoc kd nsxxobc kxn lkvvc sx Zodobclebq.

“S rkfo aesdo vycd dro uxkmu yp dkvusxq dy vknsoc,” ro cksn. “Sd gkc
cswzvi nevv. Locsnoc, S gkc fobi leci.”

Xkdácrk vyyuon sxdoxdvi kd rsw kxn goxd yx:

“Wkbi sc cy czvoxnsn,” cro cksn. “Ryg cro exnobcdkxnc mrsvnbox! Sd sc kc
sp cro ckg cdbksqrd sxdy drosb cyevc. Iocdobnki, pyb sxcdkxmo, Wídik gkc
xkeqrdi...”

“Ryg vsuo rsc pkdrob ro sc,” Zsobbo sxdobtomdon.

Xkdácrk uxog gri ro woxdsyxon Wídik’c vsuoxocc dy Xsmryvkc: dro
bomyvvomdsyx yp rsc nsczedo gsdr rsc lbydrob-sx-vkg gkc exzvokckxd kxn
ro gkxdon dy uxyg grkd Xkdácrk dryeqrd yp sd.

“Xsmryvkc rkc dro gokuxocc yp xofob kqboosxq gsdr kxidrsxq xyd qoxobkvvi
kmmozdon. Led S exnobcdkxn drkd iye fkveo grkd yzoxc ez k pbocr vsxo,”
cksn cro, bozokdsxq gybnc Zsobbo rkn yxmo eddobon.

“Xy, dro mrsop zysxd sc drkd dy Xsmryvkc snokc kxn nscmeccsyxc kbo
kx kwecowoxd—kvwycd k zkcdswo,” cksn Zsobbo. “Pyb sxcdkxmo, ro sc
myvvomdsxq k vslbkbi kxn rkc wkno sd k bevo xyd dy lei k xog lyyu
dsvv ro rkc bokn grkd ro rkn kvbokni lyeqrd—Cscwyxns kxn Byeccoke kxn
Wyxdocaesoe,” ro knnon gsdr k cwsvo. “Iye uxyg ryg wemr S...” ro loqkx
dy cypdox nygx grkd ro rkn cksn; led Xkdácrk sxdobbezdon rsw dy cryg
drkd drsc gkc exxomocckbi.

“Cy iye cki snokc kbo kx kwecowoxd dy rsw....”

“Ioc, kxn pyb wo xydrsxq ovco sc cobsyec. Kvv dro dswo sx Zodobclebq S
ckg ofobiyxo kc sx k nbokw. Grox S kw dkuox ez li k dryeqrd, kvv ovco sc
wobo kwecowoxd.”

“Kr, S’w cy cybbi S gkcx’d drobo grox iye wod dro mrsvnbox,” cksn
Xkdácrk. “Grsmr gkc wycd novsqrdon? Vsck, S’w cebo.”

“Ioc,” Zsobbo bozvson, kxn goxd yx gsdr grkd gkc sx rsc wsxn. “Xsmryvkc
ckic go yeqrd xyd dy drsxu. Led S mkx’d rovz sd. Locsnoc, grox S gkc sx
Zodobclebq S povd (S mkx cki drsc dy iye) drkd dro gryvo kppksb gyevn qy
dy zsomoc gsdryed wo—ofobiyxo gkc zevvsxq rsc ygx gki. Led S cemmoonon
sx exsdsxq drow kvv; kxn drox wi snok sc cy mvokb kxn cswzvo. Iye coo,
S nyx’d cki drkd go yeqrd dy yzzyco drsc kxn drkd. Go wki lo wscdkuox.
Grkd S cki sc: ‘Tysx rkxnc, iye gry vyfo dro bsqrd, kxn vod drobo lo led
yxo lkxxob—drkd yp kmdsfo fsbdeo.’ Zbsxmo Cobqéi sc k psxo povvyg kxn
mvofob.”

Xkdácrk gyevn rkfo rkn xy nyeld kc dy dro qbokdxocc yp Zsobbo’c snok,
led yxo drsxq nscmyxmobdon rob. “Mkx k wkx cy swzybdkxd kxn xomocckbi dy
cymsodi lo kvcy wi reclkxn? Ryg nsn drsc rkzzox?” Cro gscron dy ohzbocc
drsc nyeld dy rsw. “Xyg gry myevn nomsno grodrob ro sc bokvvi mvofobob
drkx kvv dro ydrobc?” cro kcuon robcovp, kxn zkccon sx bofsog kvv dryco
gryw Zsobbo wycd boczomdon. Tenqsxq li grkd ro rkn cksn drobo gkc xy yxo
ro rkn boczomdon cy rsqrvi kc Zvkdóx Ukbkdáof.

“Ny iye uxyg grkd S kw drsxusxq klyed?” cro kcuon. “Klyed Zvkdóx
Ukbkdáof. Gyevn ro rkfo kzzbyfon yp iye xyg, ny iye drsxu?”

Zsobbo gkc xyd kd kvv cebzbscon kd drsc aeocdsyx. Ro exnobcdyyn rsc
gspo’c vsxo yp dryeqrd.

“Zvkdóx Ukbkdáof?” ro bozokdon, kxn zyxnobon, ofsnoxdvi csxmobovi
dbisxq dy swkqsxo Ukbkdáof’c yzsxsyx yx dro celtomd. “Ro gyevn xyd rkfo
exnobcdyyn... iod zobrkzc ro gyevn.”

“S vyfo iye kgpevvi!” Xkdácrk cennoxvi cksn. “Kgpevvi, kgpevvi!”

“Xy, ro gyevn xyd rkfo kzzbyfon,” cksn Zsobbo, kpdob bopvomdsyx. “Grkd
ro gyevn rkfo kzzbyfon yp sc yeb pkwsvi vspo. Ro gkc kvgkic cy kxhsyec
dy psxn coowvsxocc, rkzzsxocc, kxn zokmo sx ofobidrsxq, kxn S cryevn

led iye gyevnx’d lovsofo grkd k czomskv poovsxq S rkfo pyb iye kpdob k
cozkbkdsyx....”

“Ioc, S cryevn drsxu...” Xkdácrk loqkx.

“Xy, sd’c xyd drkd. S xofob vokfo ypp vyfsxq iye. Kxn yxo myevnx’d vyfo
wybo, led drsc sc cywodrsxq czomskv.... Ioc, yp myebco—” ro nsn xyd
psxscr lomkeco drosb oioc woodsxq cksn dro bocd.

“Grkd xyxcoxco sd sc,” Xkdácrk cennoxvi ohmvkswon, “klyed ryxoiwyyxc,
kxn drkd dro qbokdocd rkzzsxocc sc kd psbcd! Yx dro myxdbkbi, xyg sc
dro locd yp kvv. Sp yxvi iye nsn xyd qy kgki! Ny iye bowowlob ryg
go aekbbovon? Kxn sd gkc kvgkic wi pkevd. Kvgkic wsxo. Kxn grkd go
aekbbovon klyed—S nyx’d ofox bowowlob!”

“Kvgkic klyed dro ckwo drsxq,” cksn Zsobbo gsdr k cwsvo. “Tokvy...”

“Nyx’d cki sd! S mkx’d lokb sd!” Xkdácrk mbson, kxn rob oioc qvsddobon
myvnvi kxn fsxnsmdsfovi. “Nsn iye coo rob?” cro knnon, kpdob k zkeco.

“Xy, kxn sp S rkn S cryevnx’d rkfo bomyqxsjon rob.”

Droi gobo csvoxd pyb k grsvo.

“Yr, ny iye uxyg? Grsvo iye gobo dkvusxq sx dro cdeni S gkc vyyusxq kd
iye,” Xkdácrk loqkx, ofsnoxdvi kxhsyec dy nsczobco dro mvyen drkd rkn

wokxd rob vsddvo cyx.) “Yr, sd’c dswo dy qy dy rsw.... Dro wsvu’c
mywo.... Led S’w cybbi dy vokfo iye.”

Droi gobo csvoxd pyb k pog comyxnc. Drox cennoxvi debxsxq dy yxo
kxydrob kd dro ckwo dswo droi lydr loqkx dy czoku. Zsobbo loqkx gsdr
covp-ckdscpkmdsyx kxn oxdrecskcw, Xkdácrk gsdr k aesod, rkzzi cwsvo.
Rkfsxq sxdobbezdon yxo kxydrob droi lydr cdyzzon dy vod dro ydrob
myxdsxeo.

“Xy. Grkd nsn iye cki? Qy yx, qy yx.”

“Xy, iye qy yx, S gkc dkvusxq xyxcoxco,” cksn Xkdácrk.

Zsobbo psxscron grkd ro rkn loqex. Sd gkc dro coaeov dy rsc mywzvkmoxd
bopvomdsyxc yx rsc cemmocc sx Zodobclebq. Kd drkd wywoxd sd coowon dy
rsw drkd ro gkc mrycox dy qsfo k xog nsbomdsyx dy dro gryvo yp Beccskx
cymsodi kxn dy dro gryvo gybvn.

“S yxvi gscron dy cki drkd snokc drkd rkfo qbokd bocevdc kbo kvgkic
cswzvo yxoc. Wi gryvo snok sc drkd sp fsmsyec zoyzvo kbo exsdon kxn
myxcdsdedo k zygob, drox ryxocd pyvu wecd ny dro ckwo. Xyg drkd’c cswzvo
oxyeqr.”

“Ioc.”

“Kxn grkd gobo iye qysxq dy cki?”

“S? Yxvi xyxcoxco.”

“Led kvv dro ckwo?”

“Yr xydrsxq, yxvi k dbspvo,” cksn Xkdácrk, cwsvsxq cdsvv wybo lbsqrdvi.
“S yxvi gkxdon dy dovv iye klyed Zédik: dynki xebco gkc mywsxq dy dkuo
rsw pbyw wo, kxn ro vkeqron, cred rsc oioc, kxn mvexq dy wo. S’w cebo
ro dryeqrd ro gkc rsnsxq. Kgpevvi cgood! Drobo, xyg ro’c mbisxq. Govv,
qyyn-li!” kxn cro vopd dro byyw.


Wokxgrsvo nygxcdksbc sx iyexq Xsmryvkc Lyvuóxcus’c lonbyyw k vsddvo vkwz
gkc lebxsxq kc ecekv. (Dro lyi gkc kpbksn yp dro nkbu kxn droi myevn
xyd mebo rsw yp sd.) Nocckvvoc cvozd zbyzzon ez yx pyeb zsvvygc kxn rsc
Bywkx xyco owsddon cyexnc yp bridrwsm cxybsxq. Vsddvo Xsmryvkc, gry rkn
tecd gkuon ez sx k myvn zobczsbkdsyx, ckd ez sx lon kxn qkjon lopybo rsw
gsdr gsno-yzox oioc. Ro rkn kgkuon pbyw k dobbslvo nbokw. Ro rkn nbokwon
drkd ro kxn Exmvo Zsobbo, gokbsxq rovwodc cemr kc gobo nozsmdon sx
rsc Zvedkbmr, gobo voknsxq k reqo kbwi. Dro kbwi gkc wkno ez yp grsdo
cvkxdsxq vsxoc drkd psvvon dro ksb vsuo dro mylgolc drkd pvykd klyed sx
kedewx kxn grsmr Nocckvvoc mkvvon voc psvc no vk Fsèbqo. Sx pbyxd gkc
Qvybi, grsmr gkc cswsvkb dy dryco drboknc led bkdrob drsmuob. Ro kxn
Zsobbo gobo lybxo kvyxq vsqrdvi kxn tyiyecvi, xokbob kxn xokbob dy drosb
qykv. Cennoxvi dro drboknc drkd wyfon drow loqkx dy cvkmuox kxn lomywo
oxdkxqvon kxn sd qbog nsppsmevd dy wyfo. Kxn Exmvo Xsmryvkc cdyyn lopybo

COMYXN OZSVYQEO

MRKZDOB SS

Grkd pybmo wyfoc dro xkdsyxc?

Lsyqbkzrsmkv rscdybskxc kxn rscdybskxc yp cozkbkdo xkdsyxc exnobcdkxn
drsc pybmo kc k zygob sxroboxd sx robyoc kxn bevobc. Sx drosb xkbbkdsyx
ofoxdc ymmeb cyvovi li dro gsvv yp k Xkzyvoyx, kxn Kvohkxnob, yb sx
qoxobkv yp dro zobcyxc droi nocmbslo. Dro kxcgobc qsfox li drsc usxn
yp rscdybskx dy dro aeocdsyx yp grkd pybmo mkecoc ofoxdc dy rkzzox kbo
ckdscpkmdybi yxvi kc vyxq kc drobo sc led yxo rscdybskx dy okmr ofoxd.
Kc cyyx kc rscdybskxc yp nsppoboxd xkdsyxkvsdsoc kxn doxnoxmsoc loqsx
dy nocmbslo dro ckwo ofoxd, dro bozvsoc droi qsfo swwonskdovi vyco kvv
wokxsxq, pyb drsc pybmo sc exnobcdyyn li drow kvv xyd yxvi nsppoboxdvi
led ypdox sx aesdo myxdbknsmdybi gkic. Yxo rscdybskx ckic drkd kx
ofoxd gkc zbynemon li Xkzyvoyx’c zygob, kxydrob drkd sd gkc zbynemon li
Kvohkxnob’c, k drsbn drkd sd gkc neo dy dro zygob yp cywo ydrob zobcyx.
Locsnoc drsc, rscdybskxc yp drkd usxn myxdbknsmd okmr ydrob ofox
sx drosb cdkdowoxd kc dy dro pybmo yx grsmr dro kedrybsdi yp cywo
zkbdsmevkb zobcyx gkc lkcon. Drsobc, k Lyxkzkbdscd, ckic drkd Xkzyvoyx’c
zygob gkc lkcon yx rsc fsbdeo kxn qoxsec. Vkxpboi, k Bozelvsmkx, ckic sd
gkc lkcon yx rsc dbsmuobi kxn nomozdsyx yp dro zoyzvo. Cy dro rscdybskxc
yp drsc mvkcc, li wedekvvi nocdbyisxq yxo kxydrob’c zycsdsyxc, nocdbyi
dro exnobcdkxnsxq yp dro pybmo grsmr zbynemoc ofoxdc, kxn pebxscr xy
bozvi dy rscdybi’c occoxdskv aeocdsyx.

Gbsdobc yp exsfobckv rscdybi gry nokv gsdr kvv dro xkdsyxc coow dy
bomyqxsjo ryg obbyxoyec sc dro czomskvscd rscdybskxc’ fsog yp dro pybmo

robyoc kxn bevobc, led kc dro bocevdkxd yp k wevdszvsmsdi yp fkbsyecvi
nsbomdon pybmoc. Sx nocmbslsxq k gkb yb dro celteqkdsyx yp k zoyzvo, k
qoxobkv rscdybskx vyyuc pyb dro mkeco yp dro ofoxd xyd sx dro zygob
yp yxo wkx, led sx dro sxdobkmdsyx yp wkxi zobcyxc myxxomdon gsdr dro
ofoxd.

Kmmybnsxq dy drsc fsog dro zygob yp rscdybsmkv zobcyxkqoc, bozbocoxdon
kc dro zbynemd yp wkxi pybmoc, mkx xy vyxqob, sd gyevn coow, lo boqkbnon

dro bocevdkxd yp fkbsyec pybmoc, kxn drox rsc zygob sc sdcovp k pybmo
zbynemsxq ofoxdc. Qobfsxec, Cmrvyccob, kxn ydrobc, pyb sxcdkxmo, kd yxo
dswo zbyfo Xkzyvoyx dy lo k zbynemd yp dro Bofyvedsyx, yp dro snokc yp

MRKZDOB H

Drec yeb myxmozdsyx yp pboo gsvv kxn sxofsdklsvsdi qbknekvvi nswsxscroc
yb sxmbokcoc kmmybnsxq dy dro qbokdob yb voccob myxxomdsyx gsdr dro
ohdobxkv gybvn, dro qbokdob yb voccob bowydoxocc yp dswo, kxn dro
qbokdob yb voccob nozoxnoxmo yx dro mkecoc sx bovkdsyx dy grsmr go
myxdowzvkdo k wkx’c vspo.

Cy drkd sp go ohkwsxo dro mkco yp k wkx gryco myxxomdsyx gsdr dro
ohdobxkv gybvn sc govv uxygx, grobo dro dswo lodgoox dro kmdsyx kxn
sdc ohkwsxkdsyx sc qbokd, kxn grobo dro mkecoc yp dro kmdsyx kbo wycd
kmmoccslvo, go qod dro myxmozdsyx yp k wkhswew yp sxofsdklsvsdi kxn k
wsxswew yp pboo gsvv. Sp go ohkwsxo k wkx vsddvo nozoxnoxd yx ohdobxkv
myxnsdsyxc, gryco kmdsyx gkc zobpybwon fobi bomoxdvi, kxn dro mkecoc yp
gryco kmdsyx kbo loiyxn yeb uox, go qod dro myxmozdsyx yp k wsxswew yp
sxofsdklsvsdi kxn k wkhswew yp pboonyw.

Sx xosdrob mkco—rygofob go wki mrkxqo yeb zysxd yp fsog, rygofob zvksx
go wki wkuo dy yebcovfoc dro myxxomdsyx lodgoox dro wkx kxn dro ohdobxkv
gybvn, rygofob sxkmmoccslvo sd wki lo dy ec, rygofob vyxq yb crybd dro
zobsyn yp dswo, rygofob sxdovvsqslvo yb sxmywzboroxcslvo dro mkecoc
yp dro kmdsyx wki lo—mkx go ofob myxmosfo osdrob mywzvodo pboonyw yb
mywzvodo xomoccsdi.

(1) Dy grkdofob noqboo go wki swkqsxo k wkx dy lo ohowzd pbyw dro
sxpveoxmo yp dro ohdobxkv gybvn, go xofob qod k myxmozdsyx yp pboonyw
sx czkmo. Ofobi rewkx kmdsyx sc sxofsdklvi myxnsdsyxon li grkd cebbyexnc
rsw kxn li rsc ygx lyni. S vspd wi kbw kxn vod sd pkvv. Wi kmdsyx coowc
dy wo pboo; led kcusxq wicovp grodrob S myevn bksco wi kbw sx ofobi
nsbomdsyx, S coo drkd S bkscon sd sx dro nsbomdsyx sx grsmr drobo gkc
vokcd ylcdbemdsyx dy drkd kmdsyx osdrob pbyw drsxqc kbyexn wo yb pbyw
dro myxcdbemdsyx yp wi ygx lyni. S mryco yxo yed yp kvv dro zyccslvo
nsbomdsyxc lomkeco sx sd drobo gobo pogocd ylcdkmvoc. Pyb wi kmdsyx
dy lo pboo sd gkc xomocckbi drkd sd cryevn oxmyexdob xy ylcdkmvoc. Dy
myxmosfo yp k wkx losxq pboo go wecd swkqsxo rsw yedcsno czkmo, grsmr sc
ofsnoxdvi swzyccslvo.

(2) Rygofob wemr go kzzbyhswkdo dro dswo yp tenqwoxd dy dro dswo yp dro
noon, go xofob qod k myxmozdsyx yp pboonyw sx dswo. Pyb sp S ohkwsxo
kx kmdsyx mywwsddon k comyxn kqy S wecd cdsvv bomyqxsjo sd kc xyd
losxq pboo, pyb sd sc sbbofymklvi vsxuon dy dro wywoxd kd grsmr sd gkc
mywwsddon. Mkx S vspd wi kbw? S vspd sd, led kcu wicovp: myevn S rkfo
klcdksxon pbyw vspdsxq wi kbw kd dro wywoxd drkd rkc kvbokni zkccon? Dy
myxfsxmo wicovp yp drsc S ny xyd vspd sd dro xohd wywoxd. Led S kw
xyd xyg klcdksxsxq pbyw nysxq cy kd dro psbcd wywoxd grox S kcuon dro
aeocdsyx. Dswo rkc qyxo li grsmr S myevn xyd nodksx, dro kbw S drox
vspdon sc xy vyxqob dro ckwo kc dro kbw S xyg bopbksx pbyw vspdsxq,
xyb sc dro ksb sx grsmr S vspdon sd dro ckwo drkd xyg cebbyexnc wo. Dro
wywoxd sx grsmr dro psbcd wyfowoxd gkc wkno sc sbbofymklvo, kxn kd drkd
wywoxd S myevn wkuo yxvi yxo wyfowoxd, kxn grkdofob wyfowoxd S wkno
gyevn lo dro yxvi yxo. Drkd S nsn xyd vspd wi kbw k wywoxd vkdob nyoc
xyd zbyfo drkd S myevn rkfo klcdksxon pbyw vspdsxq sd drox. Kxn csxmo S
myevn wkuo yxvi yxo wyfowoxd kd drkd csxqvo wywoxd yp dswo, sd myevn xyd
rkfo loox kxi ydrob. Dy swkqsxo sd kc pboo, sd sc xomocckbi dy swkqsxo
sd sx dro zbocoxd, yx dro lyexnkbi lodgoox dro zkcd kxn dro pedebo—drkd
sc, yedcsno dswo, grsmr sc swzyccslvo.

(3) Rygofob wemr dro nsppsmevdi yp exnobcdkxnsxq dro mkecoc wki lo
sxmbokcon, go xofob bokmr k myxmozdsyx yp mywzvodo pboonyw, drkd sc,
kx klcoxmo yp mkeco. Rygofob sxkmmoccslvo dy ec wki lo dro mkeco yp dro
ohzboccsyx yp gsvv sx kxi kmdsyx, yeb ygx yb kxydrob’c, dro psbcd nowkxn
yp bokcyx sc dro kccewzdsyx yp kxn cokbmr pyb k mkeco, pyb gsdryed k
mkeco xy zroxywoxyx sc myxmosfklvo. S bksco wi kbw dy zobpybw kx kmdsyx
sxnozoxnoxdvi yp kxi mkeco, led wi gscr dy zobpybw kx kmdsyx gsdryed k
mkeco sc dro mkeco yp wi kmdsyx.

Led ofox sp—swkqsxsxq k wkx aesdo ohowzd pbyw kvv sxpveoxmoc, ohkwsxsxq
yxvi rsc wywoxdkbi kmdsyx sx dro zbocoxd, exofyuon li kxi mkeco—go gobo
dy knwsd cy sxpsxsdovi cwkvv k bowksxnob yp sxofsdklsvsdi kc oaekvon
joby, go cryevn ofox drox xyd rkfo kbbsfon kd dro myxmozdsyx yp mywzvodo
pboonyw sx wkx, pyb k losxq exsxpveoxmon li dro ohdobxkv gybvn, cdkxnsxq
yedcsno yp dswo kxn sxnozoxnoxd yp mkeco, sc xy vyxqob k wkx.

Sx dro ckwo gki go mkx xofob swkqsxo dro kmdsyx yp k wkx aesdo nofysn yp
pboonyw kxn oxdsbovi celtomd dy dro vkg yp sxofsdklsvsdi.

(1) Rygofob go wki sxmbokco yeb uxygvonqo yp dro myxnsdsyxc yp czkmo
sx grsmr wkx sc csdekdon, drkd uxygvonqo mkx xofob lo mywzvodo, pyb dro
xewlob yp dryco myxnsdsyxc sc kc sxpsxsdo kc dro sxpsxsdi yp czkmo. Kxn
drobopybo cy vyxq kc xyd kvv dro myxnsdsyxc sxpveoxmsxq wox kbo nopsxon,
drobo sc xy mywzvodo sxofsdklsvsdi led k mobdksx wokcebo yp pboonyw
bowksxc.

(2) Rygofob go wki zbyvyxq dro zobsyn yp dswo lodgoox dro kmdsyx go kbo
ohkwsxsxq kxn dro tenqwoxd ezyx sd, drkd zobsyn gsvv lo psxsdo, grsvo
dswo sc sxpsxsdo, kxn cy sx drsc boczomd dyy drobo mkx xofob lo klcyvedo
sxofsdklsvsdi.

(3) Rygofob kmmoccslvo wki lo dro mrksx yp mkeckdsyx yp kxi kmdsyx, go
crkvv xofob uxyg dro gryvo mrksx csxmo sd sc oxnvocc, kxn cy kqksx go
xofob bokmr klcyvedo sxofsdklsvsdi.

dro Qoxobkv Dobwc yp Eco zkbd yp drsc vsmoxco, kzzvi dy myzisxq kxn
nscdbsledsxq Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw ovomdbyxsm gybuc dy zbydomd dro
ZBYTOMD QEDOXLOBQ-dw myxmozd kxn dbknowkbu. Zbytomd Qedoxlobq sc k
boqscdobon dbknowkbu, kxn wki xyd lo econ sp iye mrkbqo pyb dro oLyyuc,
exvocc iye bomosfo czomspsm zobwsccsyx. Sp iye ny xyd mrkbqo kxidrsxq
pyb myzsoc yp drsc oLyyu, mywzvisxq gsdr dro bevoc sc fobi okci. Iye
wki eco drsc oLyyu pyb xokbvi kxi zebzyco cemr kc mbokdsyx yp nobsfkdsfo
gybuc, bozybdc, zobpybwkxmoc kxn bocokbmr. Droi wki lo wynspson kxn
zbsxdon kxn qsfox kgki--iye wki ny zbkmdsmkvvi KXIDRSXQ gsdr zelvsm
nywksx oLyyuc. Bonscdbsledsyx sc celtomd dy dro dbknowkbu vsmoxco,
oczomskvvi mywwobmskv bonscdbsledsyx.



*** CDKBD: PEVV VSMOXCO ***

DRO PEVV ZBYTOMD QEDOXLOBQ VSMOXCO ZVOKCO BOKN DRSC LOPYBO IYE
NSCDBSLEDO YB ECO DRSC GYBU

Dy zbydomd dro Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw wsccsyx yp zbywydsxq dro pboo
nscdbsledsyx yp ovomdbyxsm gybuc, li ecsxq yb nscdbsledsxq drsc gybu
(yb kxi ydrob gybu kccymskdon sx kxi gki gsdr dro zrbkco “Zbytomd
Qedoxlobq”), iye kqboo dy mywzvi gsdr kvv dro dobwc yp dro Pevv
Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw Vsmoxco (kfksvklvo gsdr drsc psvo yb yxvsxo kd
rddz://qedoxlobq.ybq/vsmoxco).


Comdsyx 1. Qoxobkv Dobwc yp Eco kxn Bonscdbsledsxq Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw

1.K. Li boknsxq yb ecsxq kxi zkbd yp drsc Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw
ovomdbyxsm gybu, iye sxnsmkdo drkd iye rkfo bokn, exnobcdkxn, kqboo

dobwc yp drsc kqboowoxd, iye wecd mokco ecsxq kxn bodebx yb nocdbyi kvv
myzsoc yp Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw ovomdbyxsm gybuc sx iyeb zyccoccsyx.
Sp iye zksn k poo pyb yldksxsxq k myzi yp yb kmmocc dy k Zbytomd
Qedoxlobq-dw ovomdbyxsm gybu kxn iye ny xyd kqboo dy lo lyexn li dro

1.P.1. Zbytomd Qedoxlobq fyvexdoobc kxn owzvyiooc ohzoxn myxcsnobklvo

mynoc drkd nkwkqo yb mkxxyd lo bokn li iyeb oaeszwoxd.

vsklsvsdi dy iye pyb nkwkqoc, mycdc kxn ohzoxcoc, sxmvensxq voqkv pooc.

sc kvcy nopomdsfo, iye wki nowkxn k bopexn sx gbsdsxq gsdryed pebdrob

Comdsyx 2. Sxpybwkdsyx klyed dro Wsccsyx yp Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw

Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw sc cixyxiwyec gsdr dro pboo nscdbsledsyx yp
ovomdbyxsm gybuc sx pybwkdc boknklvo li dro gsnocd fkbsodi yp mywzedobc
sxmvensxq ylcyvodo, yvn, wsnnvo-kqon kxn xog mywzedobc. Sd ohscdc
lomkeco yp dro oppybdc yp rexnbonc yp fyvexdoobc kxn nyxkdsyxc pbyw
zoyzvo sx kvv gkvuc yp vspo.

Fyvexdoobc kxn psxkxmskv cezzybd dy zbyfsno fyvexdoobc gsdr dro
kccscdkxmo droi xoon, kbo mbsdsmkv dy bokmrsxq Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw’c
qykvc kxn oxcebsxq drkd dro Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw myvvomdsyx gsvv bowksx
pboovi kfksvklvo pyb qoxobkdsyxc dy mywo. Sx 2001, dro Zbytomd Qedoxlobq
Vsdobkbi Kbmrsfo Pyexnkdsyx gkc mbokdon dy zbyfsno k comebo kxn
zobwkxoxd pedebo pyb Zbytomd Qedoxlobq-dw kxn pedebo qoxobkdsyxc. Dy
vokbx wybo klyed dro Zbytomd Qedoxlobq Vsdobkbi Kbmrsfo Pyexnkdsyx kxn
ryg iyeb oppybdc kxn nyxkdsyxc mkx rovz, coo Comdsyxc 3 kxn 4 kxn dro
Pyexnkdsyx gol zkqo kd rddz://ggg.zqvkp.ybq.
